1b1(rnying rgyud): rgya ga ska du/ hrI g-i ru ka sarba d+hA sa sbrul ta n+danan/ bod sa dang/ dpal khrag 'thung 'dus brtsa ba rgyud ces byug/ dpal 'jig
1b2(rnying rgyud): byed chen po khrag 'byung te nag la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di spyad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he cag chen po// gsang ba chen po'i mabya' dbyings
1b3(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i nga ni/ 'jigs kya rkyen po ma po sani/ smye pa dang / 8 shes/ dang/ ba zhe ga dang / kam he dang / rjes
1b4(rnying rgyud): dang / raHkro d+hI shA rI ma dang / pad+ma krod+hI shA rI ma dang / ka ma g+hod+d+he shrI d+ha ma dang / tsu ga dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / nI la daN+Da dang / ya mAn+ti/ dang /
1b5(rnying rgyud): na sa sa
2a1(rnying rgyud): du/ tham dang / btu ma nga/ dang / nad/ slong/ ba dang / na 'ang /
2a2(rnying rgyud): 'dug/ na nus dang / ma da/ hA/ sa pa / dang / ban du dang /
2a3(rnying rgyud): mo bdun phrag bzhi dang / mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khya' pa dang / thabs cig tu rol pa chen pos bzhugs so// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor de dag rnams kyi / dpab he ga la 'drin
2a4(rnying rgyud): gsol te// sem bcom ldan tes// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kun// sa rje ni pa'i rang bzhin pa// dza N+Di tho ci zhig lags// he sa/ d+hi lta zla// thabs dang shes bzlang bgang // ma dzangs dus ni rnaMmang//
2a5(rnying rgyud): dang bdag ma spya maH// yang bya rje kyi gas// thams cad kyad dang cig pa yis// mam pa dzin na kya bajug// 'dul bar kya 'di da // bdag cag rnams la bstan drugs la// zhes zhus //
2b1(rnying rgyud): de nas dpal chen he rugs// 'dus pa'i 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// shin d+ha khro zhing gtum pA la// zhibs phran par mi 'gyur te// khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pas ni// gdug pa ma lus 'dul bar byed// thams
2b2(rnying rgyud): cad dbang du gyur nas kyang // bsgo ba'i bka' nyan bran bzhin gnas// he ni dgongs shing bzhad pa'i gsung // du ni kun la chags pa'i thugs// ka ni mnyam nyid ye shes su// shrI ni snying rje bdag gzhan rtogs// ma skyes dbyings ni shes rab ste// ma 'a
2b3(rnying rgyud): sprul pa de yi thabs// dus gsum dngos po thams cad kun// mnyam nyid gnas pa sbyor ba yin// phung po lnga nyid he ruka/ kro d+hi shwa rI 'byung ba lnga// ma mo rnam par shes pa brgyad// de yi yul brgyad phra men gyur// 'du shes bcu nyid khro bor gyur// 'gyur ba
2b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin khro mo ste// sems las byung ba mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// thams cad nga yi sku gsung thugs// ye nus gnas shing ldan gyis phub// 'dus ma byas shing g.yo ba med// mdog rtsa ba yan lag bcas// skye ba byed de yi gnas ma mthong // gal te bdag nyid
2b5(rnying rgyud): shes 'dod ni// yang dag grub phra gcig pa nyid// sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'das pa// rnal 'byor bab mi phyagasu mardzogs// mkha' 'gro zlum pade mchog 'di// 'gro ba tA tshogs thabs kyis 'dul// de nad mangs pa'i rung 'di ton// zhes ga
2b6(rnying rgyud): dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa ca ba'i rgyud las// gling gzhi'i don bsdus pa'i lezhwa ste dang po'o// / de nas 'khor gyis yang zhes pa// dpal chen he ru ka yai rje// ma 'ongs sems can skal med cing // gdul bar dka' ba gang zhig sa
2b7(rnying rgyud): ji ltar nges pa'i don bstan yang // myur du rtogs pa ma yin pas// bsgrub pa dang rje chen po dang // bsnyen pa dang ni nye ba dang // las kyi khyad par ma lus pa// rim pa bzhin du bstan du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
3a1(rnying rgyud): rnags// / na tsu na/ na dug tu/ smra ga na na/ su da // //
3a2(rnying rgyud): dngag shing gsal ba dang // gam 'ang grag par bdang ba// dkyi' 'khong ba byin kyis parnas// mum dang ma kyi mang pol// gdug pa 'i zag 'azung rnams pa ma// phrin mchogs pa'isadzangs pa// rag ga
3a3(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa rgyas gangs// gnas pagasags mtshan pa yi// rnam pa'i na 'di // mthi ga dka sa rid ma dang ldang // dngas nga thugs pa 'i ba 'dzes/ gnas drang lnga ma /
3a4(rnying rgyud): brjod la mags pa'o// tshogs pa'i tshad dang mnyam pa'o// dmigs pa gsal ba ba tu bsgom// bdag dang ye shes sems dpa' gnyis// soso ma yin tha da min// mchod ba nyid mnyes pa bzlas pa dang / gang ngag shin mi brjod pa da /
3a5(rnying rgyud): ma pa rab thab dang // dbyis pabaskyed cing mis pagyur// ldan ma dang ni mthar drag pa// ba ni nying 'angs shes shing / gnyis su 'dzin pa ma dang// yod med rje 'jigatag ca dang / ngapa mi mi
3a6(rnying rgyud): par shi na// dang thal pa'i thub pa po// da ma dang nga ba yis// sangs rgyas na sres dang da'i zas// kun nas rab tu bathub pa yin// rnams pa dang ni ting rje'is// khang+gA sa gang la gnas pa zad pa'i// dba'i rnams cad
3a7(rnying rgyud): la btsun pa chub pani// rnala'i byong ya shes rang ga // mi gzugs kyi 'tha'adu yis// skabs ma brjod med chog las 'das// 'dzin meng thag ma rdzus brgyan// sems can rnams kyi kyi dang dang // gas pa she da /
3b1(rnying rgyud): drisemams bzhug nas ni// dam chog chen po bde ba gnas// bsnyen par gnang ba'i dbang thob nas// bsgom dbyangs yig thub cad bstan// oM ru la d+has d+hA dz+han+ta// dbang mchog thob nas 'khor dang bcas// ston pas bstan pa'i lung
3b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin du// bsgom rgyud gsal bar ci nus bya// de yi dang la nye bar bston// gang zhig bdag gzhan don gyi phyir// phung po mchod rdzas bya ba dang // rtsi brgyad bdud rtsir bgrub pa dang // bstan la rab sdang bskal ba dang // lus bral dang du drangs pa dang /
3b3(rnying rgyud): nga nyid kun rdzob gnas pa dang // chags can gnyen pos gdul ba'i rigs// de nyid dbang du bya ba dang // brtag dang dbab pa la sogs kun// nga la nye bar byas pas 'grub// ces gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rgya ba'i rgyud las/ he ru ka'i
3b4(rnying rgyud): yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// mgon po he rug dpal rje// skal med sems can gdul dka' ba// shin tu rtogs mar gyur pa'i lus// nyon mongs pa yi sems can rnams/
3b5(rnying rgyud): shes rab phun sum ma tshogs shing // rab tu 'bad pa chung bas na// shin tu bsdus min rgyas min par// khyod kyi rang bzhin bsgrub pa dang // gtso dang 'khor gyi bzlas pa'i gnas// rang gi rigs dang phrin las dang // zhub dang mchod dang bskal ba dang // rtul/
3b6(rnying rgyud): zhing gnas nas drang ba dang // bsrung nga lhung zhing gsang dngag so// lus dang las la mngag pa rnams// mchog dang dman dang bar ma yi// blo dang yid la gang rigs pa'i// 'bar ba'i rgyal po sru bzhengs la// rol pa'i cho 'phrul rab ston cing // gsung
3b7(rnying rgyud): gi yi ge 'khor lo'i gnang // 'od zer rab tu khyab mdzad de// thugs kyi gsang bklong brtol nas// ma 'gags thabs kyi rang bzhin las// sa dang 'gro ba smin pa'i chos// da lta nyid du bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das
4a1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po he ru ka chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su ga sang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+hag yangs pa'i klong / dum tshig chen po'i byin gyis rlabs pa'i dkyil dza gyi ting ngo dza
4a2(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa'i skyes zla chen po'i gzugs byang chub kyi sems rdo rje khro bo chen po'i longs spyod rab tu rdzogs pa'i sku/ 'jigs byed 'bar ba kun tu bstan te/ dgos pa chen po'i gang mo'i sras/ stong gsuma'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu
4a3(rnying rgyud): gang bar mdzad nas/ rdo rje drag po chen po'i thugs gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po// thams cad kyi ngo bo rab tu gsal bar mdzad de/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// dang po mnyam
4a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzhi nyid las// 'das dang ma 'ongs bcings dang grol// brtan dang g.yo ba srid dang zhi// yongs su grub dang kun tu brtags// gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa yis// nga nyid gtso bo lta bur snang // phung po lnga dang rnam shes brgyad// yul bcang
4a5(rnying rgyud): dang ni 'du shes bcu// 'gyur ba bzhi dang bcas pa kun// yang dag mthong ba gong ma'i gnas// yid las byung ba'i rtogs pa'i dngos// ma lus lus pa med pa kun// bdun phrag brgyad phrag bzhi bzhi dang // bco brgyad dang ni dug cu bzhi// bzhi
4a6(rnying rgyud): dang bdun dung bzhi gnyis dang // grub par shes pa 'og ma'i gnas// nga nyid drar snang rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas gti mug de bzhin gshegs// nga rgyal rin chen 'byung ba ste// pad+ma chags rab he ru ka/ phrag dog las ni rab tu bsgrub// gzugs dang
4a7(rnying rgyud): rnam shes tshor ba dang // 'du shes 'du byed lnga rang bzhin// ma bcos pa dang zhi ba dang // rab tu rgyas dang dbang du byed// tshar gcod drag po ji bzhin bsgrub// ngang nas shes shing gnas pa yin// zhes gsungs so// dang la khrag 'thung 'dus pa/
4b1(rnying rgyud): rdza ba'i rgyud las/ gnas dang rigs bsdus pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas he ruka dpal gyis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ lus ngag yid gsum brlab 'dod pas// shes rang
4b2(rnying rgyud): kyis ni hriM gyi nas// klas pa yi ni dam tshig dang // gtsang dang 'jigs pa'i brtul zhugs bcas// srog lus yan lag rdzas rnams kun// bla ma mnyes par bya phyir dbul// dngos grub 'dod phyir gsol ba gdab// blo zhen shes rab cang ba ris//
4b3(rnying rgyud): bams kyang 'dzub par mi 'gyur te// phung byed gnyis ka bsreg pas na// de bas gzhan du bstan pa med// nges par brtags pa'i sa gzhil// phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan nas// dur khrod sa ni rab tu brtags// 'byung po'i gtor ma btang nas kyang /
4b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba don gyi las rnams kyad// rnam par rtog pa bgegs yin te// rnam rtog rang gi sems las 'byung // sems nyid ye nas ngag shes na// gzhan nas bgregs zhes bya ba med// mthun pa'i gnyen pos 'dul don du// zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting
4b5(rnying rgyud): gyis// mkha' la zho bu 'tshal pa d+mo// bskrad dad brdeg dang gcod par b+ha// rdza ma las ni gnas bskur te// rdzas dang sa gzhi brtags pa der// slob dpon ji bzhin snyan bder gnas// rab tu mnyam pa'i tshad gzhal te// rangadabyung de dud rtsi chag za
4b6(rnying rgyud): gang bA// bras twA mi cig gi banade/ khyi mig byed pa'i thong ba bzhi// bzang bregs chen pa das// mdzang ga dka me dam dang 'ang // rab tu mang bdu6// 'khong mtshabs brgyang ba ga tshogs bzhin bzhin byams bas
4b7(rnying rgyud): 'od kyi nga bzhin bcig pas tsu// la 'dod yin gnas la sogs// mtha' 'gro drung khrong gnas chen dun// ji lha gsungs pa bzhin du 'o// sngon gyi phrin las shes par bya// rdul chen gzhal las khang ngal// de ltar dgos pa'i rjes rnams
5a1(rnying rgyud): lha rnams rab tu 'asrung ba yi// gnas rnams so song nyid du// rjod pa chu thib dang // sa so'i yi ge phreng ba'i sngags// snang ba'i 'od dang bcas pa dang // lha zhal ldan pa'i phreng ba rnams// sku gsung thugs dang phrin las rten// mtshaH
5a2(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pa'i snod nang du// 'bru bcud bdud rtsi rab sbyar ba// yon tan dngos grub 'byung ba'i rten// rdzas kyi 'khor ba mdzes par gzhag/ phyi rol bar chad srung ba'i rgyan// mig gi rten yang mngon par ngagram// rdo rje slob dpon rgyal thebs dang // shes rab ma dang
5a3(rnying rgyud): las mkhan dang // dral gyi dgos pa tshangs pa yis// phyi dang nang gi 'grul bcad de// lhag pa'i rtags kyi kun mtshon nas// chu ba rdzas de dag byin gyis brlab// rang gi gnas su mnga' gsol te// mchog tu bya phyir rab tu brtan// dmigs med stobs kyi
5a4(rnying rgyud): gdeng can gyis// sku mchog 'bar ba'i tshul du bsam// khams gsum khrag tu dmigs nas kyang // dur khrod kun tu khyab par bsam// zhi ba'i tshul gyis bka' bsgo zhing // khro bo'i las kyis bsrung ba ni// 'bar ba'i me dang mtshon cha lnga// khrag 'thung
5a5(rnying rgyud): lha rnams sprul pa'i tshogs// blta ba rnam dag don rnams kyis// phyi nang gsang ba kun tu bsdams// tshogs bsag phra mos kha bskangs shing // zhi ba'i mchod pas mnyes pa dag/ bsnyen po'i don du 'di dag bya// de ltar bdag nyid brtan byas nas//
5a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes dkyil 'khor ba grub pa ni// dang po chos kyi dbyings nyid las// dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom// chos dbyings ye shes de nyid kyis// ma khyab pa la thugs rje bskyed// dngos ni hUM du byin brlabs nas// rin chen gsal bar shar ba dang /
5a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'jos// mos pa'i thugs la mnyes bsams te// 'od 'dus thog ma'i sbrul gzung // sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yum lnga yi// mkha' dbyings rnam dag 'byung ba sdu// rang gi sa bon lnga las bskyed// de nas drang khrod bdag
5b1(rnying rgyud): do dag/ phug rgya che dang ldan pas ni// rab tu 'bad pas bsgom byas te// de yi nang du snar bshad pa'i/ tshad med gnas te bsgomathub// srugasum ldan pa'i thod pa ni// skam po sharas thaMd rnon rnams// rlung dang brtsig pa khabad // d+ha nan du
5b2(rnying rgyud): ka ba la// gza' klu rgyu sker rnams kyis phubs// dbang phyug dang ni 'khor los sgyur// ba dan phyar zhing rgyal mtshan phyar// kun gyi tshul dang ma lus ldan// drag po'i gnas kyi dbus dag tu// rU tra nyi zla pad+ma'i steng // gnas gzhan rnams suM tir ro//
5b3(rnying rgyud): lha rnams rang gi sa bon las// phyag mtshan snying po phra mo dag/ brtan par gyur nas mkha' la gzhag/ bskul ba'i rang bzhin kun 'dus pas// des kyang spro ba'i lus rnams byas// yi rang bzhin lha rnams kun// so so'i sku mdog phyag mtshan dang /
5b4(rnying rgyud): bskyed rdzogs grub pa'i lha dag bsgom// de yi rim pa'ang 'di lta ste// mi dmigs chos la blo brtags shing // ye shes can gyi byin stobs kyis// thams cad dam tshig chen po yi// bde mchog sgyu ma'i brda' mtshon te// rdo rje pad+ma ldan byas nas/
5b5(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi bde chen las byung ba'i// rang gi ye shes de las bskyed// ji bzhin mkha' la gsal dag pa'i// sprin med nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'tsher// rang gi byin gyis brlabs las byung // rigs kyi bdag pos rang dbang bskur// lus kyi khyang par bstan
5b6(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // so so'i gnas su brtan par bsgom// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// bzhugs dang rten dang mi g.yo bas// dam tshig zil gnon phyag bya dang // mchod dang bstod dang bza' ba dag/ tshul bzhin goms pa'i blo dag gi// ci ri
5b7(rnying rgyud): su ni spyad par bya// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa dang // sbrul tshig dbyangs kyis de dag mnyes// 'khor bcas mchod pa rdzogs nas ni// bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin brtson par 'bad// zhag grangs dus ni brtags pa'am// mtshan ma brtan po byu
6a1(rnying rgyud): ba na// bsgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gsheg pa
6a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag pos nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+hag la dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya byin gyis rlobs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa'i sems can gyi
6a3(rnying rgyud): sa / na
6a4(rnying rgyud): ka dpal gyi// rtags kyi phyag rgya 'di ltar ro// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzher bgrad// rdo rje kha T+wA~M rje'u chung g.yas// dril bu chu zhags khyud khra g.yon// he ru ka ye ye shes bya// shes rab
6a5(rnying rgyud): dbyings ma'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // g.yas pa thabs kyi yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la sprob// kro d+hI shwa rI dbyings kyi rgya// bud+d+ha he ru'i phyag rgya ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sug
6a6(rnying rgyud): nag mthing dang dmar ba'i zhal// ti raM rdo rje khyud chen g.yas// b+han dmar rgya zhags pa su g.yon/ bud+d+ha kro d+hI yum dang sbyor// rat+na he ru ka yi phyag rgya ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ser nag mthing dang dmar ba'i zhal// rin chen pos
6a7(rnying rgyud): dbyug dgra sta g.yas// b+ha na dmar ri rab rgyu zhags g.yon// rat+na kror+b+he yum dang sbyor// pad+ma he ru'i phyag rgya ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang// dmar nag mthing dang dkar ba'i zhal// pad+ma be con dgra sta g.yas// b+han dmar thang gshol ri rab
6a8(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo ti nga me g.yas// dril bu bung dmang rgyu zhugs g.yon /
6b1(rnying rgyud): g.yon// padz+ra krod+d+hi yum dang sgor// karma he ru'i phyag rgya ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ljang nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// gya gram ral gri dgra sta g.yas// thod khrag ri rab thing gshil g.yon// karma po d+hi yum dang sbyor// yum chen
6b2(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis 'khyud// so so'i gtso bo'i sku mdog la// g.yas pa kha T+wA~M yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab yum 'di dag thams cad kun// nyi zla pad+ma rA tri gnon// khro bo'i gar nyams
6b3(rnying rgyud): dgu ldan zhing // dur khrod 'jigs pa'i chas kyis brgyan// ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// ko'u ri b+ha na dmar byis dbyug sngo// tso'u ri mda' gzhu 'aglengs ma ser// phra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan dmar// be ta byi za rdo 'phyar nag/ puk+ka dmar ser gyis rgyu 'dren// b+ha
6b4(rnying rgyud): dung dmar khrag 'thung ldang // sma sha mthing nag byis snying za// tsan d+ha ser skya mchog lus 'bral// phra men rnams kyi phyag gya ni// seng ha ser mo zhing za ser// byA b+ha dmar mo lag bsnol stag/ sri la nag mo byes ldag wa// shwa na mthing ga sha 'drad srung /
6b5(rnying rgyud): gr-i D+ha dmar mo dung gri rgod// kang ka dmar spug zhing khur dur// k+Sha ka bya rog b+han gri gnag/ u lU mthing nag lcags kyu 'ug/ lha mo dang ni phra men rnams// khro mo'i lus la cung zad zhi// khro bo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// hUM ka ra ni sku mdog sngo// phyag gnyis mnga'
6b6(rnying rgyud): gzhu 'grengs shing 'phen// rnam par rgyal ba sku mdog dkar// g.yas pa 'khor lo g.yon tri shUl// dbyug pa sngon po sku mdog sngo// med bal g.yas la dbyug to g.yon// gshin rje gshed po sngo skya'i mdog/ g.yas pa thod dbyug g.yon dgra sA// mi
6b7(rnying rgyud): g.yod ni mdog ljang sngon// ral gri g.yas la zhags pa g.yon// rta mgrin can ni sku mdog dmar// wu gri g.yas la lcags zlog g.yon// 'dod pa'i rgyal po dmar skya'i mdog/ b+han+d+ha g.yas la rnga yab g.yon// bdud rtsi 'khril pa ljang nag ste// g.yas
7a1(rnying rgyud): sa// pa // sa na / / // ga smrag/ sgyu / slo sa /
7a2(rnying rgyud): brdzun pa// / ldan pa ma ma ma gas da/
7a3(rnying rgyud): da dgas sa tsun cing // 'ang gi mas rnyed laganas/ gagasas stsags pa nga ban/ nga'i tshig 'amang yin// gsagasas so// da gag 'dus pa pa pas sa nga dran pa na
7a4(rnying rgyud): 'o// danam sa ma sbyin 'a sa sa ca ci bdag srings/ ngas gsus kyi bde bdu gshegs pa sa d+hu gas ga drugs pa byung ba da dag pa 'dus
7a5(rnying rgyud): sa sangs/
7a6(rnying rgyud): sa hU~M
7a7(rnying rgyud): nga sa /
7b1(rnying rgyud): ta/ bdag gas pa te/ badzA thAkas pak+ta/ bAdza umAmra paH/ badz+ra \u0f89\u0fa4 ka b+h+yo/ badz+ra bang maH/ badzin la \u0f7f\u0f7f/ badz+ra yAsa?/ !/ badz+ras \u0f7fsa tsal tAM/ brda ta la g+hu baH/ bzlas par nga ta badrA a aita sa? anra/ brda rdza sa ba yaH/ badz+ram d+ha
7b2(rnying rgyud): badz+ra Ar+tha te dza tang dza/ badz+ra a mu khe b+hu/ badz+ra lo ka baM/ badz+re b+ham+bI pa la yA ba tu ho// rab tu bskyed pa'i snying po'o// A~M badz+ra shrI he ru ka po hI shwa ri s+t+waM/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ rA go&te/ rA ga yA mi/ badz+ra sarba ta thA ga ta A nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA wa Ar+tha ko&
7b3(rnying rgyud): hUM s+pha ra na phaT/ saM hA ra na d+haM/ nges par 'byung ba'i snying po'o// AM sarba t+ta thA ga ta tsakra kA ya a d+hiSh+ThA na AM/ A sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra pad+hA b+ha ka a d+him+b+ha na AH// A~M sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra tsit+ta ad+hISh+ThA na tAM/ byi nA gyis rlabs pa'i snying po'o// A ma bA shU r+ya ta
7b4(rnying rgyud): shaM sa ma hA pra ta bek+Sha Na kr-i d+hAn+yaSh+TA na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+mako&haM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ dbang srur ba'i snying po'o// A~M badz+ra shrI he ruka kro d+hI shwa ra a tsakra maN+Da la A ra li hring theng dza dzaH/ bod pa'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra shrI he d+haka pro d+hI shA ri e tsa maN+Da la sa ma ya dzaH
7b5(rnying rgyud): pra bi sha tiSh+Tha a AH/ bzhugs pa'i snying po'o// I badz+ra shrI hI nuka k+ko ShAM shwa ri ka ru Na ma hA mAM sa rak+Sha a mr-i ta i dr-i gr-i d+ha ba liM ta pe pA haM// / ga ba khA hi ShA hi a la la ta// bsgrub cing bza' ba'i snying po'o// tshA badz+ra shrI he ru ka kre d+h+r-i shar ma hA ba ti tsit+tadz+nyA na ma
7b6(rnying rgyud): dzi/ drangs thab ba ba // thams cad nyi ba ni 'dus byar// sras \u0f7f/ dge ba'ig tad ces/ gnyis med da na la byu brtson pas// ngab sa tugablangs pas de sdug rigs
7b7(rnying rgyud): gyi yi ge'i sgra bsgrags pas// dkyil 'khor lha rnams gsal bar bskyed// 'brug ltar zab cing sgra bsgrags pas// gau tum dang gdug pa lhan ner 'gyur// mkhur ba dbugs kyi rlung 'byin gyis// khrobakhra mo'i sprul pa 'gyod// rdo rje srin po'i 'drung
8a1(rnying rgyud): skad kyis// gdug pa can rnams snga bkod 'dul// 'thun cing gdung ba'i sgra 'byin pas// rdegs pa'i tshogs rnams rgyal du rmo// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi 'dren tshul gyis// thams cad ma lus dbang du spyad//
8a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ yi ge phreng ba'i don yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdug po des/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams
8a3(rnying rgyud): cad kyi thugs kyi rdo rje de kho na nyid kyi snying po chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi don dam pa lhun gyis grub pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen par byin gyis pa
8a4(rnying rgyud): nas// 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma 'khor pa'i sems can rnams// nga yi dang las ma 'das kyang // nyon mongs las kyi 'khrul pa yis// brtags te dra la gzugs su mthong // sgra dang dri re reg dang chos// thos shing tshor myong brtags shing spyad
8a5(rnying rgyud): skye bo de yis nga mi mthong // nga la gzugs med mthong ba med// sgra med zos pa'ang yod ma yin// ro dang reg med myong tshor med// yid chos rtog pa ga la yod/ brten pa'i gzhi ni gzhal med khang // 'byung ba lnga ni dag pa'i yum// phung po lnga ni grol ba'i yab//
8a6(rnying rgyud): dbang po dag pa phyag yin te// phyag mtshan drug ni yul drug 'dzin// khams chen bco brgyad dpa' bo yi// nyams dgu dang ni chas brgyad do// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs dbu gsum ste// khams bzhi zhabs su snang ba yin// de nyid stong zhing shin rje stong // rab
8a7(rnying rgyud): tu stong pa chen po'i nga // grol zhing shes pa sang yi gzugs// dgos shing chags pa'i thugs rje'is// snyoms mdzad yi shes gang yin pa// he ru// ster yi zla// dri ni dag pa'i phung po lnga// ro ni su drug ye shes drug/ stobs dang mi 'jigs reg pa yin// ma
8b1(rnying rgyud): dades chos ni bco bsrud de// sems can rnams kyi sems byung dang // ye nas 'brel par ma gyud// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa las// rdung zad 'khrul bzhud cig zhi// lam ni smin cing grol ba'o// rang gi de nyid lags mthong zhing // sar gnas dbang rdzob 'thang du
8b2(rnying rgyud): dmigs sa// ngab cwa zhes nga pa na// bangadag da zus po// mag pa ga na// shes na gas nga shAn// la / sa
8b3(rnying rgyud): bshang gtso khrub khrag dang sha// nga mi tshigs rnams mched pas mnyes// rur khrod mi gtsang bam pa'i rdzas// ma byin blangs te yid bzhin spyad// mdang sring mo bu mo sogs// nus dang ldan la mi tshangs chud// dzang shes rab man pa yis// kal
8b4(rnying rgyud): rnams laM rdzun du srA// log pa'i lam zhugs stobs can ni// kar+ra Na lis bsad cing bskal// spang zhing mched de sbyangs pa yis// nga yi nga du gzhog par bya// e ma yul dang bsam pa'i dngas// s+ya 'gag tag chad 'gro bong dang // rid med rtag chad dral
8b5(rnying rgyud): de n+d+he/ rnapa digs sa kyi rab bad nas// ngadag mas med pa yin// zhes gsungs mo// dpal blag das pazla ba'i byud lus ba blan myed pa dag par bzlas pa'i ste ba pas// de das bcom ldan 'ang me
8b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag padam/ de bzhin nag shegs pa rnams cad kyi nams rna rdzogs pa'i rdarnga dngas su bci bar gyur ba'i snying po rabatu btu ba'i ting 'dzin ma rgyams par thugs te/ 'jig rten khams thams cad kyi rig pa ma rin pa
8b7(rnying rgyud): bram sris pa rnam par dag pa mtshad pa rjes byin gyis brlangs te/ gtsang ba dang bya ba'i gapa ma sus par bzlog po/ dzad ma chog can par ba tu blang pa byed/ 'di nyid sa pa/ 'phrul te// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'a'ar tshogs tan// na pa mchogs pa na
9a1(rnying rgyud): ldan zhing // tshul ri mgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sngon du 'gro ba'i las spyad de// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen yang // 'jigs pa med pa'i sems kyis bzlog/ dngos gru basbyin pa'i gzugs brnyan yang // ro dang chag dang /
9a2(rnying rgyud): dok+ka pa yis// ngan pa'i don gyi sems mi dbyung // byin gyis brlabs pas ma lus byang // nga dang lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i// ji ltar bshad pa'i pho brang du// rigs chen rigs lha b+han+d+ha lnga// rnam par dag pa'i brgyad kyi dngos// phyi nang gsang ba'i dam chog ste//
9a3(rnying rgyud): sdo po lo ma me tog dang // 'bras bu gar+b+ha shun pags dang // rtsa ba dang ni skogs ma'o// don snying lnga dang khyer log/ lam gnyis brgyad ni nang yin no// sems bcud dri ni gnyis dang ni// go ro tsan mAM sa lnga// gsang ba yin te bya ba brgyad// mngon pa
9a4(rnying rgyud): daded sbas pa nang // rgyal blon skyobs dang bcas pa ni// lo thog shing thog me tog dang // TI thog 'bru dang rdo shing bcud// sems can bcud dang rin po che// ma lus lus pa med pa kun// dug lnga sman du bsrub pas na// dgag bya gang yang yod ma yin//
9a5(rnying rgyud): ro dang nus pa kha dog rnams// rnam dag rtsa ba yan lag bcas// spang bya gang yang yod ma yin// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas su dgod// snang ba chen po shar ba dgra ma// sgrub pa po rnams rgyan rtags ldan// so so'i gral du 'khod nas ni// khrol bu btags
9a6(rnying rgyud): btsags bye ma dang // gong bu sgom lde gu dang / ri lu byas pas so so yis// dus dang rtags kyi rim pa bzhin// lnga dang de nyid nyi shu yi// bang du sbyar bar bya ba ni// snga mo'i dkyil 'khor las la gzhug/ tshangs pa dang ni drang srong chags// spyan drang
9a7(rnying rgyud): gzhug cing rtog pa bzlog/ mdzes dga' spro ba'i spyod pa brten// ngo bo rnam dag dang du gsal// 'od zer 'phro 'du bya ba dang // thams cad bdud rtsi'i sngags kyis sbyangs// de nas rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor dang // dpa' po 'dra lnga'i sngags kyis sbyangs// ye
9b1(rnying rgyud): shes lha rnams spros nas ni// dbang gi rgyal pos bsrung bar bya// rdo rje rigs kyi bsdus shing sbyangs// slar yang thabs dang shes rab kyis// mthun pa'i rdzas ldan btag cing btsag/ gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor bzhengs// yi ge dgu yi sngags kyis
9b2(rnying rgyud): sbyangs// 'bras bu lnga sbyar bdud rtsir bcas// mu sa la yis sbed cing thal// rgyas gdab mda' gsol gdab par bya// gcig tu bya ba'i tshul dag kyang // dkyil 'khor bdun dang sbyor ba brgyad// bzhu dang btal dang dab ba dang bkyil// yig dgra
9b3(rnying rgyud): yaM 'phro 'dra yis// mdzad pa'i tshul gyis 'gro don spyad// mchod pa spyod bskul dang bshags pa dang // bzlog cing bskul dang bcol sogs kyis// rtags dang ldan par mthar dbyung ste// rtsa bzhi'i rgyud ldan dgongs par bya// tshogs chen mchod pa
9b4(rnying rgyud): rgyun mi gcad// gtsang sbra gsum la gnas par bya// tshogs chen gcig gi bsod nams ni// rtag tu nyan thos brgyar bsags pas// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// mthar thug par ni de bshad bya// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni// dngos grub chen po blang bar bya//
9b5(rnying rgyud): mchod chen 'di ni yon tan mchog/ lha rnams nyer skong las rnams 'grub// rig 'dzin bzhi dang grub pa brgyad// thams cadang yi gsungs bzhin du// 'grub par 'gyur te gdon mi za// gal te bsod nams yon tan la// gzugs dang dngos bgrub 'gyur na//
9b6(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten srog chags ma lus kyis// brjod par nus pa 'gyur ma yin// rdo rje bdud rtsi mchod chen te// phyi nang gsang ba ldan pas bshad// mdor na de yi bsod nams kyis// bde bar gshegs pa kun mchod pas// 'di nyid bslab
9b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i khyad par ni// lhag pa pas kyang ches lhag ste// 'di ma rtogs pa'i mchod pa'i stobs// phyogs gzhan kun na yod ma yin// de bas rtag tu 'bad par bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ mchod pa chen po'i las yang dag
10a1(rnying rgyud): sa sam na du gnags pazlanas da na/ gas na gas rdzud ba nag shegs pa tha da
10a2(rnying rgyud): 'dre'u chen po'i sa la sgrol zhing 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin mi snyoms par zhugs te/ khams gsum pa rnams cad kyi rnam par shes pa dang rigs thams cad rab tu bskul pa'i zhe byin gyis brlabs te/ thams pa chen po dang nying rje che pos padag / bang
10a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtog pa yang dag par sgrib pa/ rdorje dngos grub chen po'i las rab tu bgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byur bas// dngos grub myur du bslab 'dod na// rdzas mchog mem ldan tag la bcom/
10a4(rnying rgyud): bgag la gartags te kyad// thal rigs dang ni tham tha dang // rigs pa gas dgas btsun dang // byed pa nga ba ldan 'ang // rkang bang ba ltar gnagal// sodas mchun pam pa'ing// mtshan dang ldan pa bab shes so// lu
10a5(rnying rgyud): tshogagasal zhing // zla kham shul tshigs rlung lhag/ sgra mtshams nas ni pA d+hA'i nga // sleb bdun ldan sde bdun par// me lus skyes pa'i rtags mtshan te// dag pa'i rdzas yin zhes bshad// zhes pa gzhan nu dbang rtsolartan// drang spyod sum
10a6(rnying rgyud): du zhugs pade// bsgrub pa mchog gi rdzas yin no// bskal zhing spyang pa'i bzhub rdzas ni// mirta b+hang chen mkha' lding kyi// shel nag d+hag dang tsar sogs// thugs dam bkang zhang tshangs par bya// nub pa po yis rol pa'i rjes// ma dza bapral ba'i zhing brje
10a7(rnying rgyud): dmigs kyis bsgral zhing mngon sum btsal// gzhan yang dbang phyug chen po yis// drang srod rdzas mchog mnyams pa// blangs te bsgrub pa bya ba yang // rgyud bzang rigs btsun mtshan dang ldan// bkra shis gtsang zhing yid tu 'ong // dus tsha ba nga
10b1(rnying rgyud): tha mal// dus labab pas blangs pa'i dus// bdag nyid khrag 'byung yab yum yi// / la thabs / nag gsam la// dbang bslar bsrang babyas nas ni// mtshon cha bskur to pa nya btang // srid pa'i rnamachog bslab rdzas 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug dngos drung/
10b2(rnying rgyud): rnga swa// kha dz+haiM mtshon mthogs nasas// dpal chen khro ze'i ting 'dzin gyis// khams gsam zil gyis gnan pa'i phyir// nyi zla'i sman gyis gsang bar bya// rdo rje'i 'gros kyis rab tu btsal// gshin rje'i khang kyi ma gzhom pa'i phyir// Sha k+Sha rdo rjes pa gang
10b3(rnying rgyud): 'ching dag bdung dang dpral ba'i phyir// gA shin rje gshed kyi phung pas btab// dug lnga sde bzhi rtsa dgacad phyir// rdo rje sder mos blang bar bya// ro nyid gsheng dang dpral ba ri b+hair// seng ldeng phur bu sor bad+mad de tshad// stobs po chu'i spang byas la// drug
10b4(rnying rgyud): sngags brgya dang rtsi brgyad bzlas// snga ma'i bdud dang ma'i lcags// gzugs dang mtshan mar bcas pa ni// phrer bus patab ste sngags bri'o// khring bung mnan nyid mod gzir // phrin las bzhi yi gzing gnan bya// nor bu ling bzhin spang bas ma d+hi//
10b5(rnying rgyud): mas kyi karmas khyer nas ni// rgyal thebs kyis ni byin gyis brlab// gling gis phra man 'jo tshul bya// dur khrod ma mo khro ba'i gnas// srin po stag dred 'thab pa dang // gcan gzan 'dab chags 'dus sar drangs// gnas de dang drung dang bskrad par bya/
10b6(rnying rgyud): sgom du stsal te rtsa yis gdab// las dang ye shes pho nya yis// de yi rnam par shes pa dang // 'dod yon rdzas su bcas pa kun// snga ma las nI ga nas bsgyur te// khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// phung po rdos bcas bem po de// phyog
10b7(rnying rgyud): bzhir blo bzhis sbyang bar bya// ye shes lha nga mkha' 'gro ma// thugs dam bgrang zhing bskul bar bya// khrus byas blag ma nub tu bdag/ 'brulnga bkod la lam rdzi ga// / de la lha rnams dgod pa ni// bdag nyid yab yums bon las// yan dag
11a1(rnying rgyud): lnga la bsam pa ni// rigs wa yab yum dgod par bya// mdun rgyab gnyis su dgod pa ni// A li kA li bsam par bya// rnam shes dbang po yul dus la// sems dpa' yab yum dgod par bya// bo chubadang du
11a2(rnying rgyud): steng // rkang mthil yan chad thub pa drug/ mtshan khung gnyis dang mkhal khung gnyis// sgo ba yab yum bsgom par bya// rnam smin zag bcas phung po la// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas// 'od zer 'phro 'dus sbyangs byas te// de na
11a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis mthar phyin phyag rgya grol// cho ga lnga dang yan lag lngas// yang du yang du spyad bar bya// byang shar mtshams su drangs byas la// de yi bsha' thabs rgyab nas bsha'// de nyid grag 'thung lha tshogs rdzas// blo steng dpal tshon yab yum gyi'o//
11a4(rnying rgyud): mig dang rna ba sna dang lci// rigs bzhi khrag 'thung yab yum rdzas// bum pa bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// dpung pa g.yas g.yon bzhag sha dang // chu mchin mgo sha gsang ba rnams// zla ba'i lha dgu'i rdzas su bzhag/ go ro tsan glang pa dang // rkang dang tshil pu shwa
11a5(rnying rgyud): dang khrag/ srog rtsa mkhris pa brgyad rnams ni// mu kha phra men brgyad kyi rdzas// yan lag rnam thar bzhi rnams ni// ye shes sgo ma bzhi yi rdzas// sgal tshigs phugs rer bsdeb pa ni// dbang mo nyi shu brgyad kyi'o// nying lag che phrar bsdeb pa ni// rang byung
11a6(rnying rgyud): bo bcu yi rdzas// sha khrag rus pa rkang dang tshil// mkha' la 'gro makun gyi rdzas// mtsha nu dang ldan pa'i b+han+ta ni// dpal chen bzhugs pa'i rten yang yin// dngos grub chen po bgrub pa'i snod// de yi nang du stsal ba'i rdzas// gau re tsan dI chen dang // ti
11a7(rnying rgyud): dang srog pa rtsa yi khrag/ mAMs mkhris pa dri chu dang // de dag mnyam pa'i chang dang sbyar// chol chen snying po lngar sbyar ba// parla nang gnyis dang rje ngar rkang // dung chen 'bud pa'i sgra yi rdzas// dpung pa'i rkang 'gro rnams gnyis ni// rak+ta phreng ba'i gzang bu'o//
11b1(rnying rgyud): bas twa li nu zhags ni// thig gang ba maN+Dal bskong ba dang // bi nA yaka bcing ba'i rdzas// shun ched zhing gi ga yang gzhi ni// p+la re phre dang dpa' bo'i chas// ya 'gal ma 'gal gnyis pode// kha tham za ba'i rdzas kyang yin// da dang so / ba'i ma ma na// ma
11b2(rnying rgyud): dmas mnan pa'i rdzas// shar sgo dngos grub gsol byang dang // rdo rje dang ni dril bu dang // bdud rtsi bum pa dngas grub rdzas// de dag sun tu bya ba ni// dngos grub rdzas dang ba nyid// thob ma lha dang rlung dang // bslab ba'i rdzas su brta ba rnams// gnas
11b3(rnying rgyud): dgod cing lha ru dmigs// sman du bkri dang rdzas su bsgrub// mchod par dbul dang rgyan du dag ma// 'bar bar bsregs dang bgegs su mnan// nga yi spyod pa mthun par spyad// he ruka dpal nyid du 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus paH
11b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyud las/ dngos grub rgyan po nye ba'i sgrub pa yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po he ru ka khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des khams gsum pa thams cad rang gi sgra gsung thugs kyi ngang nyid du
11b5(rnying rgyud): brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bye dang nang gri dngos po ma lus par snang bar byas nas/ chos kyi rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bar bya ba bla na med pa'i sanon par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang byung chub sems dpa' dang 'phag
11b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshogs mu lus pa rnams kyis ga gnas sna ngos pa/ lha dang mi dang lham yin pa/ gnod sbyin la sogs pa dwags shing gdug pa'i tsha// sa thams cad 'dral zhing tshad gcod par nus pa/ rang gi lhas dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' pa lus pa thams
11b7(rnying rgyud): cad ta druka'i rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs kyis 'gro ba don ma lus par byed pa'i thabs chen po 'di dag bka' stsal to// rdo rje rigs kyi gnas mchog ni// dur khrod dang ni lha rten gnas// ma mo'i khyim dang yid 'ang gnas// der nis yo chog byas/
12a1(rnying rgyud): skyes bu rtogs pa'i blo gras can// dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa yis// srog lus man chad rdzas rnams kun// ser sna med pa'i sems kyis dbul// tshul dgu ldan pa'i bla ma yis// rtag par dbang bslar dam par bya// ru
12a2(rnying rgyud): nyid don gnyer zhing // 'jig rten dregs pa'i phyir ma yin// brtul zhugs spyod pa mngon nus la// khur chen khur du khur nus pa'i// ye shes rdo rje 'thob byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// pho brang snying po dam pa 'dir// bdag gi dra
12a3(rnying rgyud): gzhug par bya// rin chen me tog gang gtong ba// gang la bab pa de yi rigs// gtso bor bltas nas bsgrub na ni// dngos grub myur bar the tshom med// ye shes dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan ni// kun rdzob gzugs su bstan pa yin// 'di la pa
12a4(rnying rgyud): rab tu bskyed// dngos grub ma lus mngon du 'gyur// dam tshig mchog ni 'di bzung bas// bla ma spyan grogs lha dang 'khor// sngags dang phyag rgya gsang tshig rnams// bskur dang mi spang bsgrub pa dang // rgun mi gcad cing ltangs ma btang // 'di ni
12a5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig yin// spang bar mi bya dang du blang // spyad par bya zhing shes par bya// bsgrub par bya ba'i dam tshig rnams// sems dang sems nyid 'dres pa na// ma bcings pa dang bsgrub pa dang // gcig pu dang ni lhun gyis grub// de las mi 'da' dam tshig yin// 'di ni
12a6(rnying rgyud): dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig nyams na bsreg par bya// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis grub// rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor du// slob mar bzhugs dbang bskur te// bya bral rdzogs pa'i man ngag bstan// ting 'dzin brten pa'i dkyil
12a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor du// slob ma 'bring gzhug dbang bskur te// bskyed rdzogs grub pa'i man ngag bstan// gzug brnyan bsnyen srub dkyil 'khor du// tha ma gzhug cing dbang bskur te// rim gyis blo sbyang man ngag bstan// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thas
12b1(rnying rgyud): cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po he rug chen po de la/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul snyed du phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ rdo rje btsun po'i b+ha
12b2(rnying rgyud): la dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po de dbang bskur ba yongs su rdzogs shing mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi sku bud med kyi gzugs su sprul nas bzhugs pa
12b3(rnying rgyud): gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po de// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la sogs pa he ru ka rigs lnga/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
12b4(rnying rgyud): thugs la bzhugs so// de'i tshe nam mkha'i khams kyi dbyings thams cad rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par gyur to// do nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mnyam pa nyid 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
12b5(rnying rgyud): mnyam par bzhag nas/ rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag por byin gyis brlabs so// dbang bskur ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ he ru ka zhal gsum phyag drug par de bzhin gshegs pa
12b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to// de'i tshe na nam mkha'i khams kyi dbyings na gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed du byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs shing / dbang bskur ma thag tu thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur nas/ mi bskyod pa la sogs
12b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ gsang ba byang chub sems kyi dbang la ngo mthon du ngam zhing bstod do// yang de'i skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams kyi ngan gyi phyir na/ phyogs bcu'i rnam
13a1(rnying rgyud): mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad rab tu grub pa zhes bya ba dka' ba dpag tu med pas byang chub kyi snying por gnas pa gzha pa der gsheg
13a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgra rab tu 'brar bar bstan nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ dka'ang sna tshogs spyod pa da/
13a3(rnying rgyud): par mi 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan te/ rang gi sems nyid 'odagasapa zhing dri ma med pa la gnas par byos shig ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad kyi phyag gis rmi ba'i gtsug tu rig par mdzad pas/ byang chub sems dpa dres
13a4(rnying rgyud): rnabs kyis pung bye 'ang bskur bar rig nas/ phyogs bcun bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshab lo// zhes brjod / tshul de bzhin du bcom phran 'das kyis grang chu sems dpa' byeg na
13a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i yul stobs can dang lung ljocan gyi gnas su dbang bskur to// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus su// na hor mo ri 'bar ba dang // rganam lpags me de 'greng ba dang // ma le ya ya nA mo dang // lang 'grub pa'i yul dag dang /
13a6(rnying rgyud): dang ni// ang+ga mag d+hA yi yul// I na yan+ta'i yul du ni// byin gyis brlabs te dbang basbar bar 'gyur ro// sngon tsho tshe rabs grangs med nas// dge ba'i las kyis bstan pa yi// lhag pa'i lha ni gang yin pa// da lta nyid gzod pa dang nga // snying pa
13a7(rnying rgyud): 'chang ba skye// rdo rje mi bye gsumang sgoms nas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje'i phung ni mdzad dugasong la// ba bo can mo// A/ chos kyi ngag lam dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// deng bdag byed thos brlabs
13b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i gsung du mdzad dugasal// a mdo bsngon/ rje dpal ldan thugs na rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje mi byed gsum bsgoms nas// deng bdag cid gyis brlabs nas na rnga rje'i thugs su mdzang drags pa// 'as // 'du run
13b2(rnying rgyud): bs+t+waM// phyi nang gsang bar yongs su sbyor// bum pa dbu rgyan cod pan dang // me tog phreng dang phyag rgya dang // b+han+da rdo rje dril bu dang // 'dod yon lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga// sha lnga dang ni rdzas brgyad dang // rgyal po'i bka' rtags rnam pa bdun// thun mod byed kyi
13b3(rnying rgyud): rlabs pa'i rdzas// khyad par gsang bar gyur pa ni// yid 'ong bkra shis rigs kyi yum// zhi rtags rgyan gyis mdzes par bya// thabs ni g.yas kyi phyogs su ste// de bzhin shes rab g.yon du'o// thabs kyi bdag nyid gnas lnga ru// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i snying po la/
13b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas gdab gyin brlab dbang bskur nas// bde gshegs yab lnga'i dkyil 'khor gsal// de yi gzugs kyi phung po la// bde bar gshegs pa'i sa bon lnga// 'pho 'du gsal bar gyur pa ni// rgyas gdab byin brlab dbang bskur nas// bde gshegs yumatha'i
13b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gsal// spyi bo'i gtsug dang lce yi steng // nu ma'i bar dang lte ba'i steng // gsang gnas yan lag dbang rnams ni// rigs lnga sems dang sgo ba bsam// zhi ba dang ni khro bo rnams// skyang dang bstan pa'i tshul du bye// lha rnams brda' 'phrad 'od med
13b6(rnying rgyud): gyis// dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod bstod nas// dbab cing bstim pas yab yum gnyis// rgyal po rgyal mor byin gyis brlab// ye shes dam tshig chen po yis// pad+ma rin chen ldan byas nas// bde mchog sgyu ma'i brdas mtshon te// dbyings kyi
13b7(rnying rgyud): bde chen 'byung ba ni// rang rig ye shes de la 'od// ji bzhin mkha' la gsal dag pa'i// dri med nyi ma'i 'ong bas 'chor// byang chub sems ni kun tu dag/ khams gsum rab tu 'das nas kyang // ma lus snying rjes khyab byas te// 'dod par bya ba/
14a1(rnying rgyud): rab pa sa// 'ad 'das pag ma'i gdusus la gzung // rgyal po lab sam gnas nang tho/ ngadag pade 'byags labu rgyud/ bzla'adugs papa da chud ces// nasasazhen pa byung bar gabyu / da/
14a2(rnying rgyud): phan pa'i bye rlabs so// rgas par byed pa'i rkyen rnams ni// na pa dang ni bas ba pa dang // las zed pa dang 'jud pa dang // dus pa chen pa byuzlab pan// dgacid par bsgrub pa de// rnag sa gcigag sa d+hag tung ba // rmi thal pargya thabs /
14a3(rnying rgyud): sbyo grol gling dang las mkhan dang // bslab pa phyogs mchog dbang rnams ni// thabs dang shes rab dbang chen te// dzi di la bu'i rig pa 'dzin// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba sa// chos la 'dong bzhin byi thos brnyag// za pa 'dal gnas pa yis/
14a4(rnying rgyud): rdul 'byor de diskal ba bzang // bdag dang gizhan don mi 'byed pas// sgyu ma ldan thab yul la rol// rang gi mtha yi reg pa las// chos ni gzhan nas 'byung mi 'gyur// tsi/ rnam pa yongs kyis med// rnal thor nam mkha'i la ma la gnas// mazung /
14a5(rnying rgyud): maskyes snying mo la// sgo btags chos sun ga la yod// dbang pob mngos pa de dag go// dul ba'i sems sa bzhag nas ni// dmadzag chen po bad ba gnas// khyod kyis srog chags gas pa bya// rdzu po cog kyang lbab bya// ma khyen par yang khyod kyis
14a6(rnying rgyud): l+r-ing // pha rol bud med spang par bya// dri rje'i lam ni 'di dag gis// sems can thams cad bskal bar bya// dka' tha ba dag gis gzing miH// Ni bde bang nabang bar byud// 'di ni sangs rgyas bying byung yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la/
14a7(rnying rgyud): kyis kyang ma 'jigs dga' bar gyis// sdig pa med gyi kyang ma 'jigs// gzhan yang dam chog la sdang zhing // bre bo gang dag bstan la gdod // brgya la bregs tshong byis dadrangs la// khrag chen po ni brdung bar gyis// gal na 'jig rten tanapas
14b1(rnying rgyud): nam yang dga' bar mi b+ha ste// sbrul bzang ha dra ka dpalag// khyod kyis rtag tu bsgrub par gyis// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsu ba'i chud las/ ha rba ka byin gyis brlabs pa rdorje dam chog 'byung ba'i le'u te
14b2(rnying rgyud): bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rab tu gnas par byed pa'i he ru ka chen po des/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i baspu'i bu gar basbrus te/ skra'i dbyibs su brgyad
14b3(rnying rgyud): cing rdo rje'i lam du phyung ste/ yum gyi mkha' la phab nas/ byang chub kyi sems hUM gi rang bzhin du byas nas/ dpal he ru ka 'jigs byed chen po'i sra la/ dur khrod chen po'i chas kyis brgyan pa/ phyag na gadrug byed kyi mtshon cha thogs pa de bzhin gshegs
14b4(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku'i ngo bor bzhengs te// srid gsum gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// zhe sdang chen po'i srung bstan te// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid nas// khro mo dbang phyug mngon du phyung // byang chub sems kyi sprin tshogs las// mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin
14b5(rnying rgyud): gyis// chos kun gnyis med byin gyis brlabs// dbang bskur thabs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// gnas mchog dam par byin gyis brlabs// rol pa chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// bgrub pa'i bdag por byin gyis brlabs// shes rab snying rje'i ting 'dzin cis/
14b6(rnying rgyud): yum dang rgyal byin gyis brlabs// tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// bslab pa'i rdzas mchog byin gyis brlabs// rigs kyi sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// slob ma gsar bu byin gyis brlabs// khams gsum yongs sgrol ting 'dzin gyis/
14b7(rnying rgyud): na chen po'i byin gyis brlabs// srid gsum bde sbyor ting 'dzin gyis// gaNamakha' 'gro'i byin gyis brlabs// de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin gyis// phyi nang chos kun byin gyis brlabs// kun tu snang gi ting 'don gyis// snying rje'i sral rnams byin gyis brlag//
15a1(rnying rgyud): rnam dag rgyu yi ting 'dzin gyis// rang gi sems nyid byin gyis brlabs// dbang chen mkha' dbyings ting 'dzin gyis// gyi nang 'byung ba byin gyis brlabs// bsod nams gter 'gyin ting 'dzin gyis// gzhal med khang pa
15a2(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlabs// yi ge 'phro 'dra'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs// phyag rgya 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// ye shes sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs// gnas gsum dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// mchod pa'i rdzas kun
15a3(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlabs// shes rab rtsal gyi ting 'dzin gyis// lhag pa'i rgyan rtags byin gyis brlabs// dus bzhi mnyam sbyor ting 'dzin gyis// sbyor dang srol ba byin gyis brlabs// zhes gsungs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i
15a4(rnying rgyud): phrin las kyi bdag nyid byams pa dang snying rje rab tu brtan pa/ byang chub kyi sems kyi dang las thugs chos nyid kyi zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang khro bo 'bar ba khrag 'thung chen po'i tshul du phyung ba ni/ mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po'i ngang // chos kyi sku las bzhengs
15a5(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // sems can thams cad khro ba'i phyir// rdo rje yang ni khro bar bya// zhes gsungs nas/ nyon mongs can gyi sems can ris so so'i gnas nas drangs pa dang / dngos grub kyi rnam par bsdu ba dang / gnas sbyang ba dang / bsngal zhing slar gso
15a6(rnying rgyud): ba dang / las rab tu thub par bya ba'i rim pa dag dang / gzhan yang dpal chen po'i ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa gyi dang nang gi rnal 'byor ma dang / grub pa mo dbang phyug chen mo dang bcas pa dbang du gsol te/ gang zhig bstan pa la sdang ba
15a7(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chen pos ma bsgral du zin na/ rnal 'byor chen po'i sgor zhugs kyang tshul bzhin du ma gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ma bzung bar 'gyur bas/ rnam par shes pa bla na med pa'i gnas su bsngal bar bya ba ni/ chos nyid kyi khyad par ro//
15b1(rnying rgyud): thar pa chen po'i lam chan 'dir// khrod pa can dag 'gro ba ltar// skal bar ldan pa'i nang na khyod// bde bar 'ongs so legs par 'ongs// bde gshegs thugs rje grol la mkhas// rgo na sems can snying ring nan// gnyis su med par bskal pa/
15b2(rnying rgyud): snang // khams gsum nas byung sems can rnams// rdo rje'i sgra yi khyad par gyis// 'od zer tshul gyis bsdus nas ni// de dag bdag gi gzugs la gzung // slobs rdo rje thams cad kyi// sra dang ye shes mchog tu bskal// las la bab pa'i
15b3(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor pas// dus la bab pa'i sems can 'dri// gnyis med phyag rgya chen po yi// dus la bab po sa ma ya// A~M kA re ke ha tsa ro pa ho sa ma ya s+t+waM// mtha' med 'gog med mi 'dzin pa'i// rnal 'byor mnyam nyid thong rgal du// khrog tu ma
15b4(rnying rgyud): rngadza ma'i la sogs pa// sna tshogs ston yang sems mi ga yo// a tsa la sa ma ya d+he mAn+taHswa b+hA wa At+mako&haM/ khro bo'i mtshan med byams par gnas// gsod byed snying rje'i mtshan nyid de// bskal nas bsgrub pa dga' ba'i mchog/ yal bar
15b5(rnying rgyud): mi 'dor btang snyoms s+ho// A~M ma hA kA r+'u Na ma hA mo tri sa b+hA wa At+ma kro&haM/ dzod dbugs rlan las ra~M l-i khaM// bsreg cing rtog la bkra bar bya// chu shel dkyil 'khor skye med pasamra// zhe srang sar sna gti mug ni// dmyal ba rtsol song yi dwags
15b6(rnying rgyud): lam// nga rgyal 'dod chags phrag dog ni// lha dang lha min mi yi lam// dge brlabs ma gtan snyoms 'jug ni// gong ma gsam du bye ba'i lha// de dag rang bzhin med shes shing // sems mis pa skye rgyun gcod// oM na~M sa tri sbe dzaH/ rlung
15b7(rnying rgyud): drug 'khor brtsang bcad nas// rgyud lngalam gyi sgo dag ga phyir// oM AHhUM hrIHswA hA// so so'i phyag nas sgra bkag nas// mnyes pa lnga dang stong pa lnga// slong ba dang ni grub pa lnga// 'bras bu lnga yi 'di dag bstan// zhes gsungs so// zhes
16a1(rnying rgyud): dpal thag 'thung 'dus pa ga na / thag sung ga gas chu pal pashA byung pa'i ban pa pang dag par ba sha pa pa pa pa ga na/ das susu nga na
16a2(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bdag po ha dra ka de/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rab tu bsdig pa'i phyir/ nying kyi sulas zab man panyan mongs pa'i tshogs mabyas pa zhal du dub par byed pa'i khrag 'byung gi tshogs bye bgrangs med pa dang / khwa song bang b+hag gi gtso mo dang /
16a3(rnying rgyud): khwa men ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / ma mo dang / srin mo dang / lug rgyang dang / banya mo dang / sa'i bdag mo dang / lang ka'i tshogs dang / gang gi gtso bo dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / 'bar ma dang / phre po'i tshugapa dang / bar snang yangs pa
16a4(rnying rgyud): druba'i mkha' 'pho ma rnams mngon du zung ste/ de dag cang sha la thag 'brang ba la dga' ba dang / mche ba can dang / gshog pa can dang / nam can dang / sber macan tshogs ji skyed pa gang dag gi/ gang dag 'da' bar byed pa rnams tshang gcod par dbang 'drar / bar
16a5(rnying rgyud): tsams pa dra ma di nas/ de'achags par la bzhag te/ 'digad ces bkanga' stsal to// ta cig bdag pa can chog // dpe bstan pa'i tshul 'ang byed// ma'ongs pan rtogs pa'i thas// shin gdul bar dag ba 'thang //
16a6(rnying rgyud): gzhi bzung ba'o// suni tu banang ba'i sa nan la// skur du 'bang pas bkra' bar bya// sgra dang gas dang thag ba dag/ rdza yang darje 'a'angs thab ga'o// wad kyis dang ra dgas pa// nyan mangs las dang bgacags dang // dpa par sbyi pa stong papar
16a7(rnying rgyud): ga// spel pa da rdo chos su gyis// ngasas la sleb pa blangs// rtags pa dang rkyen ma rjems// gnas pa la nga dan nyid nga // tha mang pal ba bsla zhingags// rgyam pa ma chung ga/ yang gcan ga tho nga // brjod nam ca
16b1(rnying rgyud): rnams san// nga la gang ltos zhi bar gyis// tshe dbang dkal dang dbang phyug dang // grags pa dang ni longs spyod tshogs// gang 'dod du la rgyas pas gsol// pha ma mkhan pa slob dpon dang // rgyal po rje dpon tshul dag na// ma was de yi dbang du brdzas
16b2(rnying rgyud): stong phrag brgyad chu'i bgegs dang bdud// mi dang mi ma yin/ tshogs// nga la mi mthun mngon du spyod// kye rtse khyed rnams brtson pas nga la nyon// dA yi bstan pa 'di lta ba// 'das dang ma 'ongs dus rnams la// shin tu bkod zhing rnyed par dka'// de phyi
16b3(rnying rgyud): yis khyed rnams la// gdams shing yongs su bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ las kyi gnyer gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas dpal chen po nyid las sprul pa 'khro bo/
16b4(rnying rgyud): khro mo'i tshogs dang / ma mo dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang / phra men ma dang / pho nya'i tshogs dang bcas pa de dag gi mayin gcig tu/ 'di skad ces bstod do// bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chud cing // byams dang snying rjes dag zon mi mnga'
16b5(rnying rgyud): zhing // gdug pa 'dul gyir dus las mi 'da' ba'i// 'jigs byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes pa la sogs pas bstod de/ phyag 'tshal zhing zhabs la spyi bos gtugs nas/ dpal chen po nyid kyi bstan pa'i gnyer gtad pa rnams bsrungs shing myong
16b6(rnying rgyud): par khas blangs shing / dam bcas so// nyid kyi skug sung thugs kyi yon tan dang phrin las rnams la rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par dgu'o// de nas 'khor gyi tshogs ma lus pa de dag ni/ dpal chen po nyid kyi sgra la 'od zer gyi tshul du thim par gyur te/
16b7(rnying rgyud): dpal chen po he ru ka yab yum nyid kyang / rol pa chen po'i ros tshims par mdzad nas/ bde ba chen po'i dang lte ba med pa'i chos kyi sgra mnyam pa nyid kyi klong du thim par gyur to// sems can gyi khams me lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyang / dpa'
17a1(rnying rgyud): sus rnas sa sa sa/ ma mdun naH/ cad gargyam par gnas/ da kyis bas pa gnas pa saso// dpal sa byung
17a2(rnying rgyud): las/ byin kyis rlabs pa'i mo 'phral gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsdus pa'i le'u skye bcugs ma par/ bcom ldan 'dres gsang ba dpal te draka gal po bzlas pa/ dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa ca drang ces kyi rdzogs //
17a3(rnying rgyud): phya gar gyi mkhan mo mabo dpon chen po bcu 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi'o// khri tsan bdag gi bsla shing zhes te gtan la phab pa'o// rdul po'i gling pa'o// gter gyi/ sgrasarba/ gtang tse/ r+tha rgA N+ye// rmug na/ ya d+ha nags cung
17a4(rnying rgyud): la tan tA nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed rab tu 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs byed khro bo'i rgyal po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
17a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pag shin rje thams cad kyi gshed/ wa 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po chen porade/ 'og min gri gnas ri rab chen po'i khang bzungs dam pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa na/ sku gsung thugs kyi rol pa chen po bsamangs mi khyab pa
17a6(rnying rgyud): bzhugs pa'i dus kyi tshe/ 'khor 'dus pa ni/ sku gsung thugs kyi sras dam pa'i mchog tu gyur pa gshin rje gshed kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / myos byeng 'bar ba zhes bya ba dang / 'phags budamar po zhes bya ba dang / ral pa dgu pa zhes bya ba dang / rigs kyi rdza
17a7(rnying rgyud): chen po de dag gi sbrul dgyes par sbyor ba'i yum/ ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba dang / gtum mi chen mo zhes bya ba dang / 'od zer can ma zhes bye ba dang / dpal chen mo zhes bya ba dang / de dag gi phrin las rdzogs par byed pa/ sgrol ba'i yum nag mo chen mo zhes bya
17b1(rnying rgyud): dadang// 'dod chags khrag gi bdag mo zhes bya ba dang / gling bzhi rab tu 'byams ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo mgo 'phyangs ma zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang gshin rje'i gtso bo chen po nag po'i tshogs 'joms zhes bya ba dang / dbang phyug rdzogs pa zhes bya ba dang / yid pa
17b2(rnying rgyud): 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang / do ma gyi glang mgo can zhes bya ba dang / yu ti zhes bya ba dang / tshig dmar zhes bya ba dang / rab tu dmigs pa zhes bya ba dang / shin tu til ba zhes bya ba dang / bdud 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi rdul snyoms bya ba dang / 'bar ba dam po zhes
17b3(rnying rgyud): dang / thod dbyug can zhes bya ba dang / de dag gi sku la rab tu sbyor ba'i yum nag mo ral gcig ma zhes bya ba dang / shel gyi gdong dgu ma zhes bya ba dang / kho mo shel mig ma zhes bya ba dang / dkar sla mche gtsigs ma zhes bya dang / dred kyi ag sham
17b4(rnying rgyud): can zhes bya ba dang / khrag gi ra la gcig ma zhes bya ba dang / kla mo pus 'gro ma zhes bya ba dang / spyan gsum mche gtsigs ma zhes bya ba dang / srug nag ral gcig ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje'i ral pa can zhes bya ba dang / da mer mo mgo dgu ma zhes bya ba dang / nag
17b5(rnying rgyud): mo lag mgo can zhes bya ba dang / gshin rje bye rgod kyi mgo can zhes bya ba dang / stag gA mgo can zhes bya ba dang / kang kwa'i mgo can zhes thu ba dang / spang ki'i mgo can zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang gsod par byed pa'i lonya bzhi dang / gsod par byed pa'i ba
17b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi dang // tham la 'dabs pa'i rtsis pa bzhi dang / srog le dbang ba'i bshan pa bzhi dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten mi dregs pa nAn po dang mo'i rnam pa dang / rje dang bran gyi rnam pa dang / 'khor dang gsog gi rnam pa dang / bu dang bu mo'i rnam pa dang / gzhan/
17b7(rnying rgyud): yang lha'i gzugs dang / lha ma yin gyi gzugs dang / nam mkha' lding gi gzugs dang / klu'i gzugs dang / gnod sbyin gyi gzugs dang / sbrul po'i gzugs dang / lus srul po'i gzugs dang / yi dwags kyi gzugs dang / sha za'i gzugs pa/
18a1(rnying rgyud): grul bum gyi gzugs dang / lho 'argya chen po'i gzugs dang / dri za'i gzugs dang / sen po'i gzugs dang / dud 'groni gzugs dang / rgyal song ga gunags dang / dAmyal 'a 'i gzugs dang / zla' phral pa dang / ga
18a2(rnying rgyud): gi sprul pa dang / thugs kyi sprul pa dang / yon tan gyi sprul pa dang / phrin las ni sprul pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sprul pa dang / de la sogs te thugs zhib chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis dang las ma g.yos kyang / sgra dang gsu
18a3(rnying rgyud): dang / nga ro'i sgra drag po dang / gtum po dang / 'jigs pa'i sgra dang / gdug pa'i gzugs dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs 'chang ba dang / ma rungs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa rnams dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don rjes
18a4(rnying rgyud): su bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phrin las kyi rol pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang gzhal du med pa mdzad par gyur to// de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnas der rab tu 'dus par snang ba ni 'di lta ste/ gti mug da
18a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dang / zhe sdang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / nga rgyal de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'dod chags de bzhin gshegs pa dang / phrag dog de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
18a6(rnying rgyud): pad+ma de bzhin gshegs pa dang / ral gri de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'khor lo de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dpal gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / grags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / ye shes de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa/
18a7(rnying rgyud): dang / gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa dang / brtson 'grus de bzhin gshegs pa dang / bdud bcom pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das pa yang dag par bskul ba'i/
18b1(rnying rgyud): kye kye de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku yi sku ste spu yi mchog/ rnam par dag pa'i dbang phyug che// gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa// ma lus thob cing spangs pa'i bdag// bsags dang spangs pa
18b2(rnying rgyud): las byung ba// ji bzhin ma lus sna tshogs pa'i// mkhyen pa dang ni ye shes bdag/ rang dang gzhan dang phyi rol pa// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa la// che chung tshad ma'i skur ston pa// gang la dges pa der snang zhing // ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas sbyi pa//
18b3(rnying rgyud): yang dag pa dang nges pa dang // drang ba'i gnas dang lam tshol dang // ji bzhin ma yin dgongs pa dang // ldem po dang ni spyod pa dang // sar gnas pa dang rdzogs pa dang // rang byung ba dang rtsol ba dang // rgyu dang rkyen dang byed pa dang // gzhi dang khams dang bsam pa
18b4(rnying rgyud): dang // lus dang rigs dang gnas la sogs// ma lus rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can// thugs rje che la thabs mkhas pa'i// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug po// mthu stobs 'chang ba'i dregs pa can// yi dwags gshin rje kun gyi gshed // 'jam pa'i dpal
18b5(rnying rgyud): las byung ba yis// 'jigs byed chen po sku bzhengs la// khyod kyi zhing khams gzhal yas khang // bsgrub pa nye ba'i sgrub pa dang // mngag pa'i las dang yon tan rigs// rang ngo gtan tshigs bye brag dang // khyad par de yi dgos pa dang // gnas sbyor ba dang
18b6(rnying rgyud): tshogs chen dang // 'gyur ba'i gnas dang rang gi mtha'// phrin las dang ni mthar thug pa// gsal bya rjes bzung longs spyod dang // dmigs pa'i ched du bya ba dang // rang gi 'khor lo legs par ston// gdul bya yongs su min mdzod cig/ 'di ni sangs
18b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi// sngon gyi phrin las dam pa'o// zhes bskul te/ skad cig de nyid la rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs par gyur to// gshin rje gshed 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas rgyal
19a1(rnying rgyud): pa rdo rje 'dzin// gshin rje'i khro bo kun gyi gshed// sku gsung thugs kyi rol pa che// rab tu bstan nas 'di skad gsungs// nyan cig 'jigs byad chen po'i 'khor// ngan thog ma mang pa nas// ngang gis gnas te shes
19a2(rnying rgyud): rang rig byang chub sems kyi gzhi// spros med brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das// nyon mongs sems can las kyis mnar// skye 'chi 'khor ba'i gshin tshogs la// 'dul zhing sgrol ba'i gshed yin pas// de dag nyid kyang skyob pa'i rje// rang bzhin dang ni bzod par
19a3(rnying rgyud): grub pa dang ni las rnams kyi// gzhi dang thabs dang 'bras bu ste// gdul bya sna tshogs snang ba yis// las kyi sde dang zhi ga nas dang // rang sangs rgyas dang 'gog pa dang // srung bgrod rab tu dka' sbrang dang // 'gyur ba 'gog dang bzang ngan blta// dag pa'i cho ga gcod
19a4(rnying rgyud): spyod las// brtag shes mthong bas khyad par yin// blo dang dbang po bsam pa yis// myang 'gro rdzogs pa'i don du bstan// las kyi 'khrul 'khor gshin rje'i tshogs// gnas ngan len tshogs de yis spongs// thun mong ba dang khyad par gyis// phung po ma yin las
19a5(rnying rgyud): las ldog/ 'byung ba phung po khams dang ni// skye mched rten cing 'brel la sogs// rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin// rgya stobs ldan par 'gyur byed do// gnas dag gcig gnyis gsum bzhi dang // lnga dang drug gi yon tan tshogs// ji snyed ji bzhin ma lus pa'i// shes
19a6(rnying rgyud): bya dang ni sbyang bya dag/ thogs med mkhyen pa grub pa'i mtha'// mi 'dod pa dang dbang med dang // gnod bzhi dang sbyor ba dang // rang dbang thob dang tshar gcod pa// de yi zin las rdzogs pa yin// gsal bya rang bzhin rtags dang ni// thabs dang 'bras blangs par bya// 8
19a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin bde ba chen po yi// mtshan nyid bzhi dang mtshan nyid dngos// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// thams cad de nyid kho na'o// 'khor ba'i gnas lugs shi ba'i gshin// kun gzhi'i rnam shes de yi rje// de dag 'dul skyong gshed du 'gyur// rtags ni ma lus gzugs
19b1(rnying rgyud): sgra// rang gi gdul bganyen mas 'dul// skab zed rnams kyi phrag sung thugs// gnas gas ma shes pa thabs yin no// mi gnas thal ba'i lug sum gyis// dag pa gsum ci bdag ting ldan// gzhi dang lam bya rtag pa 'joms// khams gsu mang thab
19b2(rnying rgyud): rigs drug dang // khyad par gdug pa can gyi rigs// gnas ngan len pa che la sogs// thams cad ma lus gzung bya'o// gnas srid sprul pas yongs su gcod// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// sru yi bsgrub pa dmigs pa'i ched// 'di dag rigs
19b3(rnying rgyud): kyi bdag po'o// de yi gsung du snang ba yang // a zhes bya ba chos kyi sgo// ma skyes thabs kyis rdzogs pa'o// kro zhes bya ba de nyid las// ma 'gags snang ba'i bdag nyid yin// te ni gnyis med rang byung ste// zung 'jug mthun par ston pa'o// ka ni sku ste sna tshogs
19b4(rnying rgyud): sdang // rang gi gdul bya rtogs pa'o// ya ni gsung ste stong nyid wa// zag pa med par brjod pa'o// blan ni thugs kyi ngo bo ste// ma lus 'dul ba'i bdag nyid can// ta ni yon tan rdzogs pa te// srid zhi mthar thug rtog pa'o// ka ni thugs rje shugs kyi rtsal/
19b5(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten chos la sdang ba'o// ha ni phrin las grub pa ste// rang gi dmigs pa ched du byed// na ni ming gi sgo 'dogs te// sna tshogs btags pa ma 'gags chos// ma ni yid kyi rnam rtog la// ma lus skyob byed rab tu brtags// tha ni 'gro ba'i ded dpon rje// gnas
19b6(rnying rgyud): brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/ b+ha na ni 'ching byed rgya las grol// 'khor ba'i 'brel thag bcad pa'o// dzaHni bdud las rgyal ba ste// byang chub sems kyi khyad par ro// AM ni rigs kyi gtso bo ste// hUM gis rab tu brtags pas spang // phaT gyis las kyi phung po
19b7(rnying rgyud): gsung gi dbang phyug smra ba che// ma 'gags rtsal gyis longs spyod byed// thugs ni rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid// rab tu spros pa ma g.yos chos// gnas pa'i 'khor lo g.yo ba med// srid pa'i 'khor lo yongs spyod che// sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'gro don rdzogs// spyod pa'i
20a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo rngog shul spyod// 'dun rigs kyi la bangar du shes// nus pa/ man rdzog na 'das pa rgya bya na dus/ zhugs pa rnags na rlung bzhin rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i 'a steganyis dag/ de nas
20a2(rnying rgyud): ma dzi dzin// grags thugs kyi 'bang mi sa na sa sa stod / thal mi pas sto mang byed// na 'i tshogs cid/ danyes pa'i mangs kyis pa 'dul ba// e ma nags// mthas
20a3(rnying rgyud): snang // yid bzhin nor bu ji lta bar// yang dag zugs kyi ye shes de// rab tu mchod cing bstod par bya// shes bya'i yul dang shes byed gzhi// sna tshogs nga yi thugs la gnas// bsam zhing 'dod pa 'di las byung // rang gi byang chub sems nyid 'di
20a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag nyid de// sku gsum rdzogs par rang la gnas// rig pa'i rgyal pos dbang bsgyur dus// phyi dang nang dang bar ma dang // snying dang srid dang rtog pa dang // bsdus dang spos dang 'tsham pa dang // thams cad rang rig sems
20a5(rnying rgyud): byung // de nyid gnas su gyur pa yis// gzhi dang rdo ba rang bzhin dag/ ma bcos mthus grub pa ni// thos bral chos kyi sku yi gnas// de nyid gzugs su bstan pa ni// 'dod pa'i yon tanam bklag chos// ji ltar 'dod pang gis rdzogs// longs
20a6(rnying rgyud): zong 'khor po las// bya dang byed pa sdang ba'i dris// gnas 'gyur rung ba skrong dus na// thogs med 'dod pa yid las skyes// don rigs snang ba sbal sde'i gnas// ye shes thugs ni nam mkha' bzhin// stong zhing snang ba mtshan nyid can// 'ang
20a7(rnying rgyud): bskye med pa// chos dbyings ye shes gnas pa'o// spro dang 'asdeb phyag cu'i las// 'dod pa'i rjes gro ma lus pa'i// me long rje zlabasags pa'i// gzugs brnyan sdang bdang 'dra zhing // shes dang shes bya ma thus gas pa// blatshogs spang ba /
20b1(rnying rgyud): ma grub rang gi dang du gsal// gsal ba'i ye shes gnas pa'o// rang rig thugs la bkod pa yi// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// dbang po lnga dang rnam par shes// yul grwa kha dog byed pa lnga// yab yum rigs dang phrin las lnga// ma lus rnam dag ye na
20b2(rnying rgyud): gnas// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gnas// de dag kun gyi gzhi dang yul// khams kyis bsdus pa'i sna tshogs lus// ma lus dbyings su ril gyis mnyam// mnyam nyid ye shes rang rig gnas// kun gyi rang rig byang chub sems// de las byung ba'i drin/
20b3(rnying rgyud): las ni// nan tan spyod pas kun la khyab// ye shes bzhin du gnas pa'o// sems nyid me long brtags pas ni// sbyar byas byang chub de nyid do// 'jig rten gsum yang rang gi dngos// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yang // sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan
20b4(rnying rgyud): med// de nyid 'khor ba las kyis// mya ngan 'das pa ltar snang zhes// rang gi zugs la de nyid gnas// don dam snying po byang chub sems// thams cad bden pa'i chos nyid do// brtags shing dpyad pas shes min te// nam mkha' lta bur smos dang bral/
20b5(rnying rgyud): kun rdzob snang dang srid pas bsdus// log pa dang ni yang dag skye// rtog pa phyir 'gyur med bzhin snang // ma 'dres brtags bzod gnyis su gnas// don gyi gnas lugs blta ba ni// mig gi dbang po ji bzhin du// mthar thug rdzogs par mthong ba yis// spang blang
20b6(rnying rgyud): sgron yon spyad thob dang // shes bgrod yul dang gnyen po'i tshogs// ma lus rtog par nyams su myong // yan lag nyid lag bya ba bzhin// 'gro 'chag nyal 'dug spyod lam gyis// gnas dus yul gyi bye brag la// byas shing spyod pa chud mthos// rang gzhan
20b7(rnying rgyud): gnas kyi don spyod cing // yid la 'dod rdzogs spod pa'i gnas// thun mong pa dang khyad par gyis// phyi nang rtsol ba ma 'gags pa// sna tshogs pa dang kho na yis// nges par spyod pa thabs kyi gnas// shes rab kyis ni blo phye nas// de bzhin nyid du yang dag mtha'// gnas
21a1(rnying rgyud): rgyun pa zugs ga// mdud pa gang nagags pa// na gas 'dun smra ga sa// mnas gas thAg pa / na lan cad pa gnas/
21a2(rnying rgyud): sems las rung ba'i ting 'dzin ces// ri ma med pa'i shes rab kyis// sgra gsum mngon du gsal bar rdzogs// yang dag ye shes thugs kyi dngos// nges pa yis ni bkag pa dang // bsgrub pa med pa'i chos thams cad// 'khrul gzhi 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'o/
21a3(rnying rgyud): las kyis mthus gcod pa ste// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dag/ ye shes rig pa'i mtshon cha yis// mnyam nyid dbyings kyi dang du gcod// 'khor ba'i bag rgyags gnas dran len// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med// rab tu 'brel ba'i ye shes kyis/
21a4(rnying rgyud): na mongs pagatam min cing bsag/ brtse bgasu ma dang snying rje las// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med pa'i// byang chub sems 'od byer las// cho 'phral sna tshogs snang ba yis// 'khor ba'i mum khang thob po 'doms// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis 'a
21a5(rnying rgyud): don dam pa bac+doMs rang byungs// 'khor ba'i nyon mongs thur ma dang // mi gtsang ldan sbyin pa was skyes// gnyis med thugs kyi 'khor lo dag/ zin las thugs kyi 'bri 'dra yis// rab ba skor snying pa'i gsum gyi dngos// mr-i zhes rmongs pa rab tug cang /
21a6(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa dang ni thugs rnams// bdag dang gzhang du snang ba las// srid pa skyong mngal dang dong // de mthag tu btus te ste// gnas gzhi rtsa ba yongs gcod cing // bsreg 'joms gtsang dang them pa yi// thugs las blang ba'i ny-im bzhis// dus gsus spangs
21a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas malus pa'i// dgongs pa dang ni ye shes tshogs// khams gsum 'thob thams cad kyi// las dang sdug bsngal rgyu 'bras dag/ gsal bar sprin cu gzhan dag/ las// ma spros pa dang rang la rdzogs// thugs kyi nyi ma bzhi yin te// gnas pa lte ba'i
21b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo ste// ma lus yongs su rdzogs pa'o// srid pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba// kun gyi lto bar gnas pa ste// gnas ni 'jig pa'i mkhar lta bu// dbadag la gnang bcung rdzogs pa ste// de bzhin 'jam dpal mkha' las byung // gshin rje kun gyi gshed
21b2(rnying rgyud): gyur pa// gnyis med thugs kyi ye shes 'chang // 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams// lha klu mi yi srid pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum// dbang po lus ngag yid gsum dang // thig le gnas dang longs spyod gsum//
21b3(rnying rgyud): rtag chad dbu ma mtha' dang bcas// skye 'jig gnas pa rang gi gzhi// ma lus sku gsum 'du zhing rdzogs// rang gis dbang bsgyur spyod pas na/ gal/ gseng dbang rdzogs pa'i spyod pa'o// mngal skyes srid pa dang po yi// lte ba'i gnas na brtsam pa ste// bcom
21b4(rnying rgyud): khang khri mon bcug pa yis// steng 'og par gsum zo khyu'i khyud// las kyi dashugs kyis 'khor zhing chags// stobs gzhan gyis ni bskyod mi nus// 'jigs byed chen po bdag nyid kyis// las kyi gshin rje gzir ba yis// lton srid pa gsum gnas shing //
21b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad kyi// rnam par shes pa'i rten 'phos tshe// de nyid las kyi rgyal po yis// phyag gi 'du byed byas pa yis// las kyi 'phen pa gnas mthud cing // nying mtshams phung po nyer len pas// srid pa'i 'khor lo zhes kyang bya// kun
21b6(rnying rgyud): gyi ma rig 'khrul pa las// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa yis// chags dang zhen pa rab tu brtag/ srid pa'i rtse mo man chad nas// las kyi mnar med yan chad du// las kyi dbang gis 'khor bas na// 'khrul pa'i snang ngo zad mi shes// las
21b7(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khrul 'khor de nyid las// rtsa ba yan lag sna tshogs kyi// nyon mongs phra rags ma lus pa// rang byung shugs kyi ye shes kyis// ma lus mthar thug gcod par byed// shes pa'i srid pa gnas ma yin// zhi la mi gnas snying rje dag/ tshogs
22a1(rnying rgyud): rgyanaganyis lam ma yon tan nas// ma lus gcod pa'i 'khor po'o// de las yon tan sprul ba smos// datsur ma rgya 'phrul 'byung bani// sems dpa' gnyis kyiskabs dgaganas// dril ma ska ma'i byes bra //
22a2(rnying rgyud): snad cing spyod pa'i// las kyi rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ gshin rje rgyal po 'arjing pa'i zhabs// 'bar ba'i stobs kyis gnon pa ni// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs drug las byung // nyon mongs gzhi bcas 'gro badrag// sdang ba yul gyi tshogs drug dang // kau pA la ma rnye
22a3(rnying rgyud): drug dang // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan thos rang rgyal chos dang gsum// las dang nyon mongs sprul pa drug/ rang gnas las kyi 'khor lo drug/ 'gyur med rang gis rag non cing // thugs ni thabs kyi srul ba drug/ rigs dang khams
22a4(rnying rgyud): dang byed pa cu// phas dang bang thobs pa pa dag// mthun 'jug blo yis don mdzad cing // tha du dang bskal pa ste// sri ma'i lus kyi rnam gron gyis// gcig nas gcig su ba brgyad cing // 'khrul zhing 'khor pos pa dzad pa te// nyon mongs drug grong khyo da
22a5(rnying rgyud): las// sgo tshogs 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul te// donal mdzes sdang ba'o// phrin las gcod pa'i 'khor lo ni// gadrag byed mtshon marnon pa bzhin// phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'i tshul gnas shing // gang la dmyigs pa pogs med gcod// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin kyil gyi/
22a6(rnying rgyud): blag+sa man 'i khyor mo rnam pa pa ni/ bar bya dang \u0f7fsa par tha'o// dbang dub dz+ra dang gcod pa'o// las kyirnam pazhis dngas mig cang // zhabs 'dags pabargyad las skyob// byab pa'i bar na da du yis gcod// ches byas 'arjor bangag ldan zhing // ra/
22a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i bar tshad gcod cing sel// dbang gis mos pa rnam bzhi 'dra// gang gis mi 'dul phyogs kun gcod// drag pos dag bgegs zer gcod cing // mi 'dul bar gcod 'khor los gcod // phrin las bzhi yis gang dmigs gcod// gcod pa'i 'i khor mgri
22b1(rnying rgyud): las mchog/ rtsol med rang byung shugs las 'byung // rab tu 'khor bas 'khor lor brjod// gnas pa gzhi yi 'khor lo ni// ma lus sems la 'dus pa las// bcos med snying po'i don dang ldan// chos kyis zhes bya bar brjod// bsam byang sring pa 'a
22b2(rnying rgyud): po ni// rten pa lus kyi ngo bo nye// snang ba rnam dag ting nge 'dzin// rdzogs par longs spyod sgra yi mchog/ 'dul rdo sbal pa'i 'khor lo ni// brjid dag non zhabs kyi stobs bcu ste// rigs dreg ser gnas chos kyu las// nges 'thung sbal pa'i 'khor lo'i du
22b3(rnying rgyud): gcod pa'i 'khor lo tshogs kyi las// brgyad dang drug dang bzhi gnyis kyi// yan lag las kyi 'phro 'du byed// lha tshogs mngon par byang chub sku// dang po don gyi 'khor lo ste/ dru ste yang / lhag ma gsum gyi rtags 'khor lo// lta ba phrin las gnyis su 'gyur/
22b4(rnying rgyud): spod so sor mgyur na// don dang ldan zhing de min pas// gsang ba'i sngags dang lhong pa dang // sta ba tsog tu tsam brjod kyang // mtha' drug rdzogs par mi nus na// lnga snod mdz+wal gyur pa'o// tshe 'phrul res don ldan pa yang // phyi nang 'byung ba
22b5(rnying rgyud): dang // yul sems 'phrad pa'i rtogs pa yis// ldang ba stod pa tha mi dad// de nyid kyis ni rnam par 'phrul// phrin las gcod pa'i 'khor lo yang // 'byung ba 'dus pa'i dngos po yis// myur mgyogs rtsal gyi drag shul can// rdzas kyi nus pa thugs
22b6(rnying rgyud): 'byin du// gang la phog par 'joms shing gcod// gcig gis las kun bsgrub par byed// ma grub srid du mngags pa yang // rdo rje'i 'khrul 'khor shugs bzhin no// gcod byed 'dra ba'i 'khor lo ni// nyi mu bzhi yi so sor bskor// lham gas
22b7(rnying rgyud): rnam grangs kyis// dgu dang drug dang gsum dag tu// chen po chung ngu bar ma yis// rnam grangs dgu dang 'od zer brgyad// pho mo sbar ba bzlas lugs bcu// ru ba zhi bsgom pa brgyad nyid dang // a lon don du bskor ba dang // gsal byed mtsho sdebs dmig
23a1(rnying rgyud): sAl dag// brtsad par byed pa gang yin yang // rba dang chung bas gzung bsangs te// mugasang thugs dang yan tan dang // bran las rnams kyi bslab par bya// dang shi dang mags pa'i rtsa ba gsum// gsal thad nga bsla na tu
23a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi// rtsa ba de ni yan lag gi// kha bskang ba dang bsdus pa dang // mthar thug gi ni gnad la dbab// gzhan yang lta ba spyod pa yis// don dang rtags kyi khyad par las// snying po rig pa'i byang chub sems// 'khrul 'khor 'khrel dmigs dmigs sa pa dang /
23a3(rnying rgyud): gsal byed rnams mu don gyis gnas// dam tshig bsrung ba'i srog 'khrul dang // dge sdig las kyi 'khrul pa las// srog dang srog gi snying po las// ngo bo rang bzhin yon tan no// dge sdig gis ni gsod pa dang // gso ba'i phrin las grub pa'o// mi zla gnyis dang
23a4(rnying rgyud): drag po gnyis// yan lagazhi ba rgyas pa dang // zhi bar gnas dang rgyas par spro// dbang du sdud dang bsad pa dang // dgug dang dbye ba bskrad pa dang // skyo 'bog lcags dang gnan pa dag/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chos mthun zhing // gsal zhing bsil dang dngos po che/
23a5(rnying rgyud): the tshom med par 'grub pa'o// glang po chen po che ba'i tshul// ye shes byin rlabs 'jig rten pa// tha mal pa yi yon tan gyis// rgyas pa rab tu 'grub pa'o// dbang du bsdu ba b+ha ga ste// bsad pa gshin rje'i lto bar ro// seng ge'i snying la dbug par ro// da
23a6(rnying rgyud): dang ma he'i bar// bslad parnga mo'i gsang sgo ste// skyo 'bog ri dwags rtsub tu'o// lkugs pa lug gi khog pa ste// gnan pa'i rab rmang du bskor// rang gi yon tan chos mthun gyis// dbang du bsdu dang drag po 'thab// me chu drag dang mtshon dang ni// pha rol dpag
23a7(rnying rgyud): dang mu ge dang // dgra dang dus min par 'chi ba'i// 'jigs pa rnams la zhi bas skyobs// tshe ring ba dang dbang che dang // bkra shis pa dang gzi mdangs che// 'khor dang longs spyod rgyas pas spel// pha ma mkhan po slob dpon dang // rgyal po rje dpon tshul dag gi/
23b1(rnying rgyud): mos par bcas te dbang du bsla// dkrug dang bskrad dang dbyed nga lpags// myos dang gsad dang gnon pa yis// drag shul spyod pas phrin las 'doms// chags pa'i tshul gyis dbang byud cig/ drug thul khros pas sgrol ba dang // myang ba'i shugs kyis spyad cing dkrug//
23b2(rnying rgyud): mim thun rdzogs kyim sor 'byo// lkog myur chags pa gzhan slod pa rjod// gtsang snga smras kyis myos pa dang // grags pa'i nus pas lpags byed ci// ring ba brjid pa yis ni gnon// nyim pa na la ga mtshams pa'i// kyi nang gapang rgyas sor drag/ rdzas ma/
23b3(rnying rgyud): reg glang po 'gros// mtha' dang dbus med dbus nas mthu'// mtha' nas dbus su so sor bskor// tshogs bsag pa dang bsrung ba dang // bskyed dang spyan drang bzhugs pa dang // phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags// bstod dang 'phrul dang gsol
23b4(rnying rgyud): dang // bsnyen pa nye bsnyen bsgrub pa dang // bsrub pa chen po'i phrin las kyis// nye dang brtan pa thob pa dang // myur mgyogs rdo rje'i las la sbyar// gdug pa can gyi mtha' bsdu zhing // gyi nang gsang dang rab tu gsang // mtshams sbyor ba dang bsdam pa dang // gzhu
23b5(rnying rgyud): dang gdags dang dbyung ba dang // yon tan mthar thug bsam mi khyab// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsrub pa yis// shes bya don gyi gnas lugs te// nges pa don gyi lam mchog kyang // rten lus rtsa dang rlung dang dbugs// thig le byang chub sems kyi dang /
23b6(rnying rgyud): chos nyid byang chub rdzogs pa'i dngos// khyad par gzhi dang lam 'bras bu// snang ba gzhi dang gtso bo sems// sems las byung ba de yi 'khor// chos dang chos nyid 'dus ma byas// 'dus byas ston pas gzhi ru 'gyur// tshogs brgyad yul la kun
23b7(rnying rgyud): nas ldang // theg pa dgu dang gnas pa gsum// sbyor ba bzhi la sogs rnams kyis// lam rtse rtog pa sna tshogs kye// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo khyad kyis// gong nas gong du rab bgrod cing // 'jig rten 'jug dang rnal 'byor gyod// gong ma dag gis kun 'byin zhing // 'og
24a1(rnying rgyud): gyur parda la rten// thams cad rdzogs pa'i rim pa las// nyan thos rang sangs rgyas pa dang // sgra mangs la zla gsum byas// 'bras blagasum kyang por gnas// ngag dang mdag rnam par dag/ yul la nges pa rab tu sto// ga na
24a2(rnying rgyud): 'dul brtsa ba'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bzhi'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsam pa'o// / de nas rgyal ba rdo 'dzin// 'dir bshang 'khor lo 'grub byed pa'o// rtsa ba bslab pa sa gsung thugs// yongs su thogs pa 'ag /
24a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid ldan pa yi// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma dang // 'di nyid sku gsung thugs rdzogs shing // yon tan ldan pas phrin las tshogs// bslab 'dod bslab rung sprin gyur pas// nga yi rigs dang tshul mthun zhing // mtshan nyid rdzogs pa'i gnas de ru// garten pa
24a4(rnying rgyud): gzhi nyid rab brtags te// bslang dang bsrung bas bdag gir byas// bya chen sha za mang po'i 'khor// cho ga brtan pas rab sbyangs te// dur khrod rdzas dang bdud rtsi lngas// gnas la dmigs pa'i pho brang bgengs// bzhi dang bcu gnyis pa dag gi// 'khor lo jo sra pa'i dkyi
24a5(rnying rgyud): As+ya// rgyas dang bsdus pa'i khyad par gyis// rigra lnga rigra bzhi'i dbye ba dang // gsum dang gcig gi dbye ba yis// dkar ser dmar nag mthing ga'i mdog/ ji ltar rigra dang sngags pa yis// bshad pa'i rgyan rtagla ma lus ldan// dmigs rten rdzas kyi mdzes par bya// yul gsum gsal zhing brtan pa
