24a6(rnying rgyud): zhi gnas lhag mthong ting nge 'dzin// gzugs brnyan sa yi sbyor ba yis// bsnyen pa'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya// gzugs dang sgra dang chos rnams ni// dbang po gsum gyi yul du 'gyur// rin po che dang 'bru mchog dang // sa sna lnga yi yo byad ni//
24a7(rnying rgyud): babring tha ma'i 'gyor pa ste// gang gis brtsam par gyur pa nges// gyi nang gsang ba'i yo byad kyis// phangs pa med pa'i 'bad pa dang // mchod cing bstab pa'i longs spyod kyis// yongs rdzogs mnyes par bya phyir rtsol// de nas rab tu bsung bya zhing /
24b1(rnying rgyud): mngon du snang dang mi sdang las// bka' bsgo dbang bsku mtshams bcad de// spyang dang bsreg dang gtor ba dang // bskrad dang bcing dang mnan pa yis// ma lus tshar gcad rdzogs par bya// de nas tha mal rtog sbyang gyir// dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mkha' las sprul/
24b2(rnying rgyud): phyogs bzhi sgo bzhir gsol gdab cing // gzhal yas blta ba'i smon pa bya// lus ngag yid kyi bya ba yis// phyag 'tshal gsol ba gdab pa dang // rkyen kyar gyi nang gsang ba yi// mchod pa'i khyad par rim pa yis// mchog gi sku gsung thugs mnyes bya// de
24b3(rnying rgyud): nas bslab pa'i dam bca' zhing // lhag pa'i ye shes byin rlabs blang // nyes pa bshags shing tshangs par spyad// rang gi byin rlabs yongs rdzogs pas// gnas sbyangs rgyud smin spyod bzang 'gyur// lhag pa'i lha yi nye bar bsten// de nas rab tu bslab pa'i phyir//
24b4(rnying rgyud): dngos dang dngos min chos dang rten// ma lus rang gi mtha' la blta// de nyid ma rtogs snying rje'i yul// rgyub kun la dmigs pa bsam// rang gi snying po de nyid ni// dmigs pa gsal rdzogs rgyu ru bsgom// de la sgo dang bsdu ba yis// sbyang dang mnyes pa'i las rnams /
24b5(rnying rgyud): thog ma'i gzugs la thim bsam nas// rang bzhin gnas dang grub pa yis// dag dang ma dag gnas gyur pa// ye shes 'byung ba lnga nyid kyis// rang gi sa bon rnam par bsam// eHyaMHraH su~M ra~M oMH/ mthing nag ldang sed da mar dang dkar// gzugs thal zla ga mag
24b6(rnying rgyud): 'dra zhing // grwa gsum gru bzhir rab tu brtsegs// rang gnas de nyid ye shes dang // 'pho 'dulas kyi sbyor ba yin// bdag med stod pa'i nga bor bya// kun rdzob rgyas pa rdzogs ldan zhing // rang gi mtshan nyid so sor 'dzin// 'da' tshon sgyu ma'i tshul ltar snang // de 'i
24b7(rnying rgyud): bsam pa ni// drong khrod chen po'i gzhal las khang // gzugs brtan mtshan nyid ldan pa la// b+hani 'jis byed rnam par sbed// rang gi khams da byed pa dang // gdul bye dang ni 'dul bar byed// gang la bsngags pa der sdang zhing // tshod med rdzogs pa nyid kyis gsapa//
25a1(rnying rgyud): ma bsgribs mnyam nyid ldan par bsgom// rang sngags snying po las kyi ga ni// byin rlabs tshe 'phrul byung ba ni// a dang me dang bdag las// gsal byed snying po bsil byed can// dag pa gsum la sa dpas mnyas// ma
25a2(rnying rgyud): pa ni// ta yi rnam par spos las byung // de dag steng du bsgom pa ni// hUM chen 'bar ba'i 'od 'phros pas// 'dam dpal mkha' las byung ba ni// gshin rje kun gyi gshed gyur pa// chos kyi dbyings las 'gyur med pas// mthing nag 'bar badzi'ang mdog
25a3(rnying rgyud): sa / sa/ du pa nga ma/ / sa /
25a4(rnying rgyud): phyogs brgya 'phrul// smig N+DI ba gcod payis// brtsi ba pa zhi rabatu tsos// klam pa'i bag zugs gtin pa sa// gangs nas pa shes // mag ni med mi gyi per ba nga // gdug pa'i tshogs kun rjes nan/ rje'as
25a5(rnying rgyud): du sdung mdzad pas// zhal nus hUM sma drag po sgrogs// chung drug dbyings su sgrol ba yis// phyag drug mtshon cha dang rtagla 'dzin// g.yas pa'i dang po dug lnga'i tshogs// gtan nas 'dojoms mdzad po con bsdams// bar ma ral gI 'dzin pa yis// skye shi'i
25a6(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa rtsa ba gcod// 'og mdagra sta 'dzin pa yis// stobs kyi dug zhi gnas bzhi 'joms// g.yon gyi dang po sdigs mdzub kyis// gdug byed zil gnon 'big pa'i brda'// bar mthugs kyi ye shes kyis// 'khor ba'i gting 'byin mdung ring bsdams//
25a7(rnying rgyud): tha ma dbang srung thod khrag 'dzin// zhabs bzhi byed kyi dor snabs kyis// dregs pa mang pod bang du byung // skragasum rang bzhin spyan thub pas// thod pa gsum gyi phreng pas brgyan// gdug pa klu yi drug 'joms pas// rigs lnga'i sbrul gyis tshogs brjems/
25b1(rnying rgyud): ga gas gas// zin las pazhim tshwa 'phrul ston// rgyu gdub pa phral mdang pas// klang ceras ga dang ming bang ga// lags pas yin pazang gsal// drag gsam gan nam 'jas 'dral bas// gzal cad sa/ ma
25b2(rnying rgyud): bur mor byas// mtha' gnyis spangs shing khyab pa yis// rdo rje rin chen gshog pa gdengs// nyon mongs rtsa ba yin lag tshogs// brtseg mdzad bskal pa'i ma dpung 'bar// gta mug ma spangs ngon mdzad pas// mnya nags dpas sa dngo/
25b3(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i ye shes ldan// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// chos dbyings ye shes don rtogs pas// g.yon phyogs khro mo bai tA lI// nag mo gtum chen dbyings kyi yum// sku gsum rdzogs pa'i spyan gsum ldan// gnyer rlabs kyis rab tu grong
25b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba ma lus gnas nas 'dren// dbu skra kham nag rab tu 'tsher// skra yi cha lugs gdug pa 'dul// za byed rngam pa'o rol pa'i stabs// zhal gdangs tshems ga tsigs ljags 'di la zhing // mi dpyang 'dir ba'i rdu bzhugs// drag ga
25b5(rnying rgyud): dgra sta g.yas// g.yon na b+han+ta khrag gis bkang // spros bral nyon mongs zhal du rngubs// grol mdzad dral pa gcig ma ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis su mdog mthing // dbu yi thor tshogs gcig tu 'khyil// chos nyid yang dag ye shes 'brings/
25b6(rnying rgyud): lus rtogs pa'i rtags yin te// g.yas kyi tri shUl rtse gsum 'dzin// dug gsum 'dzin bcad nas gcod// grwa yang gzhi gas pa'i du mtshon gyis// bdud bzhi'i rtog pa zil gyis gnon// g.yon mthong pa khag gis bkang // 'khor ba'i nyor mongs da
25b7(rnying rgyud): du srud// 'gro drug dbyings su grol ba yis// khro gnye 'jug gis rab tu 'bar// gtso chen dgyes pa'i rol pa stob// ha hi gsang ba'i nga ro yis// rang sngags gsang ba'i sgra sgrogs shi// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'gro
26a1(rnying rgyud): sa / su / na sa shun/ du na//
26a2(rnying rgyud): las// 'khor lo 'bar pa'i shar phyogs su// ya ma rA nga zhes bya'i sras// mthing nag zhal gsum phyagadrug pa// g.yas dkar g.yon dpar dbus mthing zhal// 'khor lo ra la yi lcags su g.yas// kha rjengs su tu zhags gi yod// sor sum dang oM
26a3(rnying rgyud): gzugs// gcol 'khrud cing nga dbar sto'o// srol sum nag thong te// grwayas g.yon ral zin rgyal 'don// phyogs suni myos byed bar// seng dag zhalags pa gdugapa// g.yas ldog lan du par dbus se shal// ba rjo nga la thaMd bsdig yas/
26a4(rnying rgyud): tu lakhor lo rgya zhags g.yin// gtum ma ser nag sbyor ma 'i/ sa coM 'khrung mi du lag s+hog// ser nag khrigs bdag man// g.yas na sa ting 'gas pa yon// rnab phyogs dpags pa pa rtse// da mang dugang thagasu cad ru //
26a5(rnying rgyud): dka na yon pa bas dam ga// btso dbug to TIg pas// zlog lag 'khor lo chu zhags gapyod// despri can ni gnyis med kyod// gcos brgyad cing dra lag stopa// gling bzhi 'joms mang gosang ni// dmar po'i ti khrag 'dzin// byed phyogs dang pa
26a6(rnying rgyud): dgran// sdang nag dbregasam thag drug pa// gu pis dkar ga por dmar dbus ldang // bconag ldan shing byam mag yas// drang thug 'khor la rgya zhags g.yon// ngo matan na ba'i tshul// srin mo ljang nAg mgo 'phangs pa// dgra grang shing drang dam
26a7(rnying rgyud): ses cag ba pa'i ma nam na// mas dgas kyi na de// cha masas pab ma// rgyal tha rdzogs par// rjes tha' sa ma 'khong pa la// gangal pa gshing byud // phyogs gnas pa'ig /
26b1(rnying rgyud): gas 'joms zhes byab// zhal gce// ga gnyis su mdog 'thung // g.yas padz+ra rdzag yod dpaH// nag ma lagacig sum dang bcas// dbang phrag rdzogs pa sgra dgar ser// ma tham thong ga shol lcagags 'angan// gdang dag ma sbyor ba'i yal// thab
26b2(rnying rgyud): 'joms mdog dkar g.yas ring // phyag g.yon gyis ni 'khor lo 'don// khro mo shel meg ma dang bcas// skrag nag chen po glang mgo can// phyag g.yas kha T+wAM g.yon lcags su// mche gtsigs ma dang gnyis su med// sngo na ga ya ba ti zhes pa// g.yas pa
26b3(rnying rgyud): ral gri g.yon lcags kyu// a ba sham can zhes yum dang bcas// mig dmar skrag nag g.yas ral gri// g.yon gyis ti ra'i dbyug pa 'phyar// dmar mo ngal gcig yum dang bcas// rab tu dmigs pa'i dung kha'i mdog/ thod phreng g.yas te lcags slog
26b4(rnying rgyud): g.yon// klu mo pus 'gro yum dang bcas// gshin rje til pa sngo nag mdog/ g.yas pa spu gri zod khrag g.yon// sbyor yum spyan gsum ma dang bcas// bdud 'joms smug nag phyag g.yas na// tho ba g.yon na b+han+ta 'dzin// lkug nagaral gcig ma dang sbyor//
26b5(rnying rgyud): chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba// dkar ser rdo rje khram shing 'dzin// rdo rje ral pa can dang sbyor// 'bar ba dmar po g.yas kyis ni// gyis byang g.yon nag tun shing thogs// dmar mo mgo dgu yum dang 'khril/ rgyagra ma yod/ thod dbyug can ni mthing nag mdog/ g.yon na sh+lo rje
26b6(rnying rgyud): g.yas ti ra// nag mo phag mgo can dang sbyor// phyogs kun skyong ba'i gshin rje skye// khro bo gar dgu'i tshul dang ldan// zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rab tu mtshungs pa'i yum chen yang // kha T+wAM shel gyi lcags kyu dang // skar mda' khram shing tsit+ta mdud//
26b7(rnying rgyud): tha~Md rnon ral gri nyi nying dang // hri tA la rdo rje zhags bdag/ rim par g.yas pa'i thag gi 'dzin// g.yon pas dring dmang lab la stob// rang gi tshigs nas brjid pa'i tshul// sgo bzhi shar lho nub byung du// khro chen dkar mthing dmar ldang gdong // tha men lta bu bu nod dang /
27a1(rnying rgyud): phyag dang gang ga sung ka'i mgo// derje rin chen pa dang // rgya gram rim bzhin ga las kyi 'dzin// lcags kyu zhags pa grags sok+Sha dang // shes ky-i la thag yon na bsnams// zla ba gang dang sman pa dag/ rang 'brusags pa'i
27a2(rnying rgyud): don gyis dbyung // khro ga khro ma'i ma dang // nga dang gnyis med dus gsum mi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis// sragasung thugs su byin brlabs shing // chos dbyings mnyam nyid me lo dang // so sor tog dang nan tad kyi// rang gi ye shes ldan par
27a3(rnying rgyud): byas// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sgrub pa yis// lus ngag yid kyi nus pa yis// yul gsum gsal bar rab tu bsgom// de la brtan par gnas pa dang // gnyis med ye shes dkyil 'khor che// rang pa sbyin thub pa'i pho brang na// khyad par de tshul snyi
27a4(rnying rgyud): lhag pa'i gnas su myong byed pa// mnyam nyid rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin can// dgug rting bsti ma dang dbab pa dang // mnyes dang mchod pa bsgrub pa dang // rab tu bsnyen dang shin tu bsted// 'gro 'du las kyi sbyor ba dang // zhi bar bya dang byas par spel// dbang bya
27a5(rnying rgyud): dang dag pos 'dul// 'khor lo bzhi yi longs spyod kyis// las kyi mtha' dang bcas pa dag/ mngon sum nus par rab tu bshad// ces bka' stsal to// gshin rje gshed 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sru'i 'khor lo rgyas par sgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhin /
27a6(rnying rgyud): de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// byang chub tshul gyis sbyor ba dag/ gsung gi snying po gas bdag/ 'dus pa'i 'khor la rab tu bstan// lnga ba spyod pa tshe 'phral dang // phrin las rigs kyi khyad par gyis// nga rgyal gti mug 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang phyag do
27a7(rnying rgyud): snang ba yis// thugs kyi snying po 'di nyid ni// blo can rnams la nges spang ba// mnyam pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings// ma mor rtog pa'i shes rab dang // kun tugs la dang nan tan spyod// gcig la kun rdzogs gcig gi dang // gcig las spros dpa
27b1(rnying rgyud): N+Dig tub // nga gang rtog pa'i byed pa// dan kyang ba nyid las// mthang ba'i yul tshul bsgru ba las// yang dag nyid la yang dag pa lta// 'jig rten pa dang de las 'das// gang zag dang na chos kyis brtag/ tshu la dang na pa rol \u0f7f// sred pa dang ni nang dra
27b2(rnying rgyud): chos// mnyam pa nyid kyis gang bsgom pa// mtshan mang sngang dang mtshan ma med// rgyu 'bras stong pa nyid la gnas// gang la gnas pa de bsgom pa'o// 'gro dang 'chag dang 'dug pa dang // ba dang 'thung du nyal ba dang // bad byed dang gnas pa dang // gdus
27b3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur rtog pa'i khyad par spyod// ji ltar gang la cir spyod pa// 'jigs byed gshed kyi brtul zhugs te// dang po pa dang mnyam gzhag dang // bde bar gshegs pa kun spyod do// de dag kun gyi phrin las tshogs// ma lhas grub byed rgyas pa ni// dmigs pa
27b4(rnying rgyud): yul gyi b+ha ba dang // lam dang gang zag 'bras bu rnams// 'thob byed gsang sngags 'di dag go// A~M a kr-it+te kA ya kyAr+b+ha ka ha na ma thAHdz+dza hU~M phaT/ rta ba'i nye ba'i snying po'o// IMk+ShA lAR+ShA pa dzAM pAT/ skra'i snying por// oM la lI d+ha ka hA phaT/ gsu/ rlu nga/
27b5(rnying rgyud): A~M hrI ts+tsha khri kri tAn na hU~M Ta/ thugs kyi snying po la// A~M ya ma rA dzas do mi la/ ya mo d+honaN yod yA/ yAng yo ni yar+dz+dza la/ yA N+DA ya nIni d+ha ma ya hUM phaT/ rab tugs pa'i snying po'o// A~MmA kro tika hU~M baT/ A~M b+hi t+pa pa~M ra kA ma~Mn hU~M phaT/ dza
27b6(rnying rgyud): dag nying kha ga pa e Ta b+ho r+tha \u0f7f/ oM la ma dza ti ta bkrol lha dz+haH/ sa sna / sh+tsaka Ta/ oM ma la skye / la pan+d+ha ga pa m+b+hi n+d+he d+hA hrI / oM drug mo ga su te rtsal shAs /
27b7(rnying rgyud): rig mo ga mo khrag pa zu sha / I ga mong ga mo tis mi ma mahA/ I ga modag mi tid ting ka la mab+h+yo/ A~M he ma dai ts+tsha trAM/ A~M la ma tudz+dza/ A~M na gad ts+tsha Sh+kaM/ A ba dag ts+tshiN+Te/ A~M badz+wal ma dag kr-iti hU~M phaT/ A la ma ri ti tra~M dzaT/ A~M yas pahA
28a1(rnying rgyud): oMms sa/ mam sa pa sa/ sgyum ca sa/ myur/ marnas// sa mas chubahAnas/ sa zhu sa/ la sa shA /
28a2(rnying rgyud): phaT/ A~M ya ma hri ti baM hUM phaT/ oM ma ma rag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ AM rag mo rak+Sha ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma yag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ A~M ma ma rag sha hri ti snying tsu lu b+h+yo/ A~M ma ma rak+ka ma ti ru lu b+h+yo/ A~M rag mo sta na du lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma na ga ru lu d+ho/ oM ba ya d+he ba ru wa b+h+yo/
28a3(rnying rgyud): yag mo yag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma badz+ra e ka ru lu hUM/ oM ma ma yag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ A~M ka la rag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ A~M ya ma aM gu sha dzaH/ A~M ya ma pa sha trUM/ A~M ya ma s+pho TA br-i/ A~M ya ma g+haN+Te hoH// rab tu bskyed pa'i snying po'o// oM sa man ya ma b+h+rU~M shrI
28a4(rnying rgyud): tra yA man ta ka pA ts+ya ti ra ni hUM dzaM/ ma ma e ka dzaHti tra ga rak+sha khi mun+ta/ mu tra ma ma s+thing kha rag+ma d+ho/ rag mo te/ ke tsa tshe kha la ma he b+h+yo// ya ya lo na tsin+tan ma ma b+h+yo dza/ snying kha rag srog la b+h+yo/ bsgrub pa byA ba'i snying po'o// e ma ma te k+She ra tsa si r+tha ru
28a5(rnying rgyud): na yo ni ra ya ts+tsha ni hU~M phaT/ ya ma ra tsa sa twa me ya/ a mu ka pra ma ya ni sha ku ru ni hUM phaT/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ a mu ka ra ga ta ra tsa ya ni sha ku ru hUM phaT/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya/ srog \u0f7f a mu kaM ni sha ku ru ni hUM phaT/ ya k+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ a mu kaM ma ra
28a6(rnying rgyud): ya ni sha ku ru hUM phaT/ phrin las kyi snying po'o// gshed chen lto ba dkrugs pa yi// srid sbyar yab yum 'khor lo bskor// zab dang 'phangs dang las kyi mchog/ bzlog dang gzir dang dkrug par bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje gshed rab tu
28a7(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud de las/ gsang ba'i snying po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sngon gyi phrin las dgongs mdzad de// gang gis btul ba'i gdul bya de// phyi ma'i dus na dgongs mdzad de// mngon du spyod pa bka' stsal pa//
28b1(rnying rgyud): dayis sngar bshad gnas dag tu// gsum dang gcig gi khru tshad kyis// pho brang dkyil 'khor mdzes par brtsigs// dur khrod rdzas kyis rab tu bstar// dbus la gru gsum sgo bzhengs bya// 'khor lo mu khyud ldan par byed// gtso chen sku gsung thugs kyi gnas/
28b2(rnying rgyud): ji ltar rigs pa bsam bzhin dgod// gla glo a ba b+h+r-i shi ta// rang skad smra ba de dag gi// mtshan ngan sdod du drag po'i rdzas// myos 'thib gsod par nus pa dang // dran pa'i rten dang 'khor ba'i rgyud// mdzes shing mnyes par bya phyir dgod// mi rta mu mchog glang
28b3(rnying rgyud): chu grang ma he dran dbang rten// gser dngul zangs lcags 'khor lo dang // spu gri gri gug pa shan gri dang // mtshon lcags phur pa drug shing khram// shwa rje dkar nag dmar dang sngo// bzhi 'am bdun nam nyi shu gcig/ so so'i grangs dang mthung pa dgod//
28b4(rnying rgyud): yang ging bdud bshan pa dang // rtsis pa rang gi gzugs brnyan rnams// dus gzhan dag tu ngas bshad bzhin// sku gsung thugs kyi rten du dgod// mchod pas mnyes gyur dam tshig rdzas// bza' dang btung dang mad dang ldag/ zab dang bdug pa brdeg pa da
28b5(rnying rgyud): bslad dang bcings dang mnan pa dang // gtor dang spar ba'i rdzas kyis bstar// ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa dang // las kyi rim pa bya ba dag/ gtso dang 'khor gyis gnas bsgyur te// maM las ma he bskol ba'i steng // nyi zla 'khor lo gsal ba'i steng // ya
28b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'phro 'du las// gshed chen 'jigs byed bskyed par bya// dmar nag ser ljang las kyi mtha'// gang gi dmigs pa de dag gi// zla gam yum gnyis sras dang gsum// gri thogs bzhi dang khram thogs bzhi// rtsis pa bzhi dang bshan pa bzhi// bzhi'am
28b7(rnying rgyud): dam bcu drug gi// ging bdud gnod sbyin srin po rnams// so so'i gtso dang 'khor du bcas// lus dang longs spyod ldan par bsgom// rang chud gnas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dmigs par ldan pas bos shing bstim// gnas nas drangs shing bos dang bskul//
29a1(rnying rgyud): mags kyang nga shes panas pa sa// yam rdzas dam pa/ nga sa yod pa/ yang ldan pa pasgrib/ bathes ts+li nA pa / sbyis bzhi 'dzin pa su byu/ gle ga gad/ kAm+b+ha naH/ mas ga
29a2(rnying rgyud): pa d+hu d+ha thun ya/ rU tra thun ya/ rak+ta thun rbad/ rak+ta thun rbad/ bdud tri nir zung / ya tri nir zung / tri tsa pa la nir zung / chu ma shig yang tri nir zung / dun tri pa tri dan tri sho ma tri thun dza/ mar tri dza dzi/ ya yA/ thing thaM/ kro ta ni krota ni/ pa tra ba tra/ ga sum
29a3(rnying rgyud): sha d+dalad+ha sha ng+gI wau/ yag sha p+l-i ba lag sha thI ba phaT/ badz+ra badz+ra dang libs/ khal mu tid spyi gang rjod/ lum dun teng mAr ya rbad/ badz+ra tik+Sha zad/ tsakra dra tri zang / badz+ro shu tri dar tri ya rbang su nang su/ rbad du na dang / da ra ka sha ta sa ma ma/ mad
29a4(rnying rgyud): pas bod par bya// nye dang bsnyen pa'i rtags mthong nas// las la sbyar ba 'di dag go// ging ka ra gling kar srog la rbad su rbad su/ shwa la ha ba ha ba/ rus la chem chem/ rtsa la myag myug/ khrag la hu ba tub/ rbad rbang rtsub rngub/ a su ka tsit+ta lugs/ ra
29a5(rnying rgyud): ra ya khA ga ling / snying khrag ti ma tsa ti rbad bun tshugs khram hor rbang / a mu ka mA ra ya ma tri ga na gug lid rbad/ bdud ni rbad Tu ma ri li li/ a mu ka shig kha la ku ru/ a mu ka mu tri hrI ma dun ni pho ba ya/ ya tI nad bu ma ri li li/ rbad rbad/ b+ha sha ts+li
29a6(rnying rgyud): thum ri li li/ yaSh+ka grI wa zang bu dzum ri laM lo/ yak+ka tsakra tsit+ta mA ra ya b+h+yo/ sa ma yang mdza dza/ tai ti du na rbad/ su da ra phreng breng rbang / rat+na dzakra a mu ka ha ri ni b+ho/ ba ma mun ting sha ling tri tsar nr-i rje par tri rbad rbang / ging kar tsa d+ha ma tselas la ya
29a7(rnying rgyud): rtsal drug dbugs la nyung thum/ srog la dun dza/ sha la gug thun// sngags 'di rdzas la bzlas shing gdab// byung dang brtan dang las byed dang // grub dang mthar phyin rtags dang sbyar// dang pos 'bod cing gzugs la dbab// gnyis pas dpung dang dpral bar
29b1(rnying rgyud): bya// gsum pas gnas su dgug cing bcings// bzhipas bsad dang brdegs pa ste// nyi ma bzhi pa'i 'khor lo yis// g.yas gcod g.yon gcod go rim gyis// 'phang dang bsreg dang gnan pa dang // las kyi mtha' mardzogs pa yis// gcod pa'i 'a
29b2(rnying rgyud): lo cho 'phrul yin// gzugs med gzugs can 'dod pa'i khams// ma lus ngo bo nyid kyis bde// 'khrul pa'i las kyis 'khor lo rdzogs// gnas nas 'pho zhing sdug bsngal gyi// rang gis bde la dri ba cing gcod// de las bzlog pa de nyid de// 'khor zha
29b3(rnying rgyud): dang gcod pas so// byang chub lam dang srid pa'i gnas// rten 'brel rdzogs chos rjes 'gro zhing // bzlog pa ma lus kun tu brtag/ de nas gzhan dbang bsam pa'ang 'byung // yongs su grub pa rjes yin no// dus bzhi skye ba'i gnas bzhi dang // phug bsngal
29b4(rnying rgyud): bzhi dang 'gyur ba bzhi// yul bzhi khams dang byed pa bzhi// lam bzhi pa bzhi ye shes bzhi// sru bzhi rdzogs pa'i lta ba bzhi// ma lus 'pho dang gcod pa dang // 'gro zhing ldog pa'i 'khor lo ste// bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu gnyis dang // bcu drug pa
29b5(rnying rgyud): gnas yul mtshon// phyi nang yul dang dngos thams cad// gzhi dang gnyen po 'byung ba dang // chu dang 'bras bu byed pa'i rkyen// 'jig dang gnas pa'i rten 'brel 'byung // brtan g.yo dbang po drug gi yul// rang gi nus par bcas pa dag/ rang bzhin dang da
29b6(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid kyis// bya dang byed dang chags sdang dang // bag la nyal dang klan nas ldang // 'byung dang ldog pa'i rten 'brel gyis// bag chags las dang nyon mongs dang // shes bya tsam gyis sgrib par 'gyur// bcu gsum pa dang yan lag dang // sbyor dang mnyam nyid
29b7(rnying rgyud): ri// pa yis// rgyu mthun dbang dang rnam smin ces// dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu baphreng // nga ni thog ma med pa nas// dus gsum spros bral chos skur gyur// chos mthun longs spyod rdzogs par bstan// cho 'phrul byin rlabs 'khor lo bzhis//
30a1(rnying rgyud): dganas papas la pa'is// dag par // sas rdzogs 'an pa// nabazhis par ma ste// e ba sa s+ho// gsusdug shad du 'dus pa kha'i dudulas/ gab nga ma
30a2(rnying rgyud): lo'i khyad par gyi las bshad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// khyad par swA yi bo bdag/ bsdus pa'i yon tan 'di gsungs so// bruM chen 'bar ba'i 'phro 'dra dang // rdo rje rtse
30a3(rnying rgyud): byin rlabs kyis// 'jam dpal mkha' las byung ba'i sku// bcom ldan gshin rje kun gyi gshed// gnyis med kun la khyab pa'i sku// chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // ye shes sgyu ma'i skur snang ba// 'gyur med rdo rje sku yi mchog/ zhal gsum
30a4(rnying rgyud): phag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang// chos nyid mi 'gyur sku mdog mthing // sku gsum rdzogs pa'i dbu gsum gsal// chud drug sgrol ba'i phyag drug ni// dug lnga 'joms mdzad be con 'phyar// skye shi rtsad gcod ral gri gdengs// bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i
30a5(rnying rgyud): sA 'dzin// gdug byed 'bigs pa'i sdigs mdzub mdzad// 'khor ba'i gting 'byin mdung thung bsor// ma lus dbang spung thod khrag stob// srid zhi mnyam nyid zhal mdog can// bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes kyis// rnam dag sku yi rgyas ga dang cing //
30a6(rnying rgyud): dbu skra ral pa srid rtser 'bar// sa dgu rdzogs pa'i spyan dgu gzigs// nyon mongs bag chags sgrib pa'i tshogs// shangs kyi ye shes rlung gis gtor// slar me 'bar srid gsum bsreg/ zhal nas hU~M chen chos sgra sgrogs// ljags kyi klog 'od khams
30a7(rnying rgyud): gsum gsal// mche ba gtsigs pas skye bzhi sgrol// khro gnyer brjid pas dbang du spang // sku gsum rdzogs pa'i thod phreng brgyan// gdug pa 'joms mdzad srul gyis dkris// theg pa rim pa dgu rdzogs pas// glang ko rlon pa na bzar gsol//
30b1(rnying rgyud): smin las rnam pazhi ba rdzogs pas// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs gso dgi ga rdzogs pa rgya 'dral mdzad pas// mi dbang pags bsra la gsol// dak+ta'i thig les 'dod chags 'joms// thal chen mtshan mas gta mugasal// zhag gzongs zhe sda //
30b2(rnying rgyud): rdorje gshog pa nam ma khar gdengs// rin chen gshog pas 'gro don rdzogs// mtha' gnyis ma spangs kun lakhyab// bskal ba'i med pung grong da bzhugs// bag chags rtogs pa ma lus bsreg/ dug gsum sa gesum rab sto bas// yi dwags mnye na thung
30b3(rnying rgyud): gnon// ye shes gsum gyis don mdzad pas// t+yai zla pad+ma'i gangan la bzhugs// snyoms mdzad rtul ba kun gyi yab// sku mchog gcol phrag 'tshal bstod// chos dbyings gnyis med stong ba yaM// yum chen po mo bai d+ha lI// gtum chen dbyings kyi yum gcig
30b4(rnying rgyud): ma// mthing dag 'bar ba'i sku mdog rten// zhal gcig rgyag gnyis kho gnyer ma// drag gsum tha dag cod nga gra sgra ga yas// nyon mongs rngub mdzad thong khrag tog// dpal chen sra drang gnyis su med// chos nyid dbyings su yang dngag sgor// sgol mdzad yum chen pal
30b5(rnying rgyud): gcig ma// bai rur sngon po'i mdog 'dzin ma// g.yu li ral gcig gtsug tu la khrel// zhal gcig tug gnyis rngo man// dpal 'bar khro mo ma rdung me// g.yas kyi tri shul gyi gsum 'dzin// dugag su mchad nang gcod cing sprol// g.yon na zhing ljags rgyal mtsha
30b6(rnying rgyud): brdung bzhi'i rtog pa 'dul bar mdzad// gtso chen zin pas byung bsgrub ma// sbyor dang grol ba'i bdag nyid kyis// 'gro don rdzogs mdzad dpal 'bar ma// chos dbyings rdul ba kun gyi bum// 'dul mdzad yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// gnyis me thugs kyi sprul pa
30b7(rnying rgyud): 'dra// phyogs pa'i rdul pa'i gshed ca pa'i// de sdang migapag rje gshong// gti chags ga pag shi rjeg ning // 'di chags pa shes gshin ga dang // theg dag le gas gshi gagang // 'jig byed che pang chung bzhi /
31a1(rnying rgyud): gi dbang phyug 'jam pa'i dpal// blugs mchog rnam dag chos kun gsal// yon tan mnyam nyid ma lus rdzogs// phrin las mi bzang gdug pa 'dul// stor dang sgrol mdzad yum dang bcas// byang chub sems kyi phrin las kyis// phreng
31a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo gnas nas spongs// ye shes sems dpa' rgyal ba'i sras// 'khor lo bzhi yi bdag nyid rdzogs// gshed chen tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan sngon gyi phrin las las// bdud 'dul pho nya'i las mdzad pa// gshi rje ma mo mkha' 'tshor bcas
31a3(rnying rgyud): stsogs mtshams steng 'og ma lus pa'i// phyi nang stong pa'i dam tshig can// nyi ma bzhi pa'i las mdzad cing // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul// 'khor dang bcus la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bka' stsal nas/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs
31a4(rnying rgyud): bcu ma mkha'i khams thams cad ma lus par khyab par mdzad nas/ sems can gyi khams snang ba thams cad/ rang rang gi mdun na de bzhin gshegs pa rang rang gi rigs dang khams byed pa dang / las kyi khyad par dang rab tu mthun pa'i chos ston cing gnas pa dang /
31a5(rnying rgyud): srid pa dang / sprul pa dang / gcod pa'i sgo nas/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / dbang phyug chen po gzhon nu dang / lha dang / klu dang / bram ze dang / glang po dang / cang
31a6(rnying rgyud): shes dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po dang / ru ru dang shing rta mo dang / sdig pa dang nya dang srin bu la sogs pa sems can gyi gzugs sna tshogs pa dag gis/ kha cig la ni zhi ba dang / kha cig la ni rgyas pa dang / kha cig la ni dbang du bsru ba dang / kha cig la ni tsher gcad pa dang /
31a7(rnying rgyud): kha cig la ni bskrad pa dang / bcing ba dang / dgug pa dang gnan pa la sogs pa gang gis gnyen por gang 'gyur ba de bzhin du bsten te/ thams cad kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi bkod pa'i zhing khams su sdang bar mdzad do// gshin rje gshed rab tu 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/
31b1(rnying rgyud): gdung thugs kyi 'khor lo pon tan rdzogs par snang ba 'a la du skye bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid kyis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sdug sung blugs kyi khon nyid gsang ba bas kyang rjes gsang ba rmang du thung 'tha rol par
31b2(rnying rgyud): phrin pas de dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus su snyigs pa lngar gyur pa'i sems can la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang la gdams te yongs su gtad nas/ smon lamagyi dbang gis mi bskur bar mdzad de/ nyid kyi thugs khyad par du dga' bub kyi lus
31b3(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i phung po las bzhengs nas dge sbyong du sprul te/ de dag dang mthun pa'i chos bstan pa sna tshogs kyi thun mong ba dang / drang ba'i don dang sgra ji bzhin pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin pa dang / spyi'i don dang yi ge'i don dag gis rjes su bgyu ste thams cad
31b4(rnying rgyud): las 'das pa'i sa la myur du 'god par dgongs so// bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje gshed rab tu 'dus pa rtse ba'i chud ces bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / 'od kyi lo sno gi ro tsan bdag
31b5(rnying rgyud): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe/ gter chu/ swas rgyu/ gtad rgya/ rgya rgya rgya// / rgya gar skad du/ shri b+ha ga bA na ma hA ba shaM sa pu dA ya mU la tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal bcom ldan 'das dbang chen 'dus pa bya ba'i rgyud ces
31b6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid dbang gi rgyal po de/ 'og min gyi gnas gsang ba'i bde ba chen po/ rnam par nga
31b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyings/ pad+ma mchog gi pho brang dam pa chu dang tshad med pa'i gzhal med khang rnam par dag pa na/ yab yum gnyis su med pa'i rol pa chen pos dgos pa'i bde ba dang ldan pa la/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i rang bzhin gyi rigs kyi sprul pa snang bar gyur pa 'di sa
32a1(rnying rgyud): bag / na nas nga/ dang sa na sa gas sa dang / rnam pa pa rgyags gA da/ sa da /
32a2(rnying rgyud): rgyag sa kyig zugs kyis 'tho ba 'dul par byed pa'i zhib nyigs las bskyas pa rnams dang / lag rten gyi rigs paca po tshogs dang / mo'i tshogs su sur pa rnams dang / stong gsus kyi 'a ga rten gyi bams kyi 'i rgyal po mab dang brnas pad+hA /
32a3(rnying rgyud): par chog sus rungs pa la wAng ba'i gapa dang d+ha kar hU~M tshogs dang / de dgral sogs pa rdegs pa'i tshogs mtha'i rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ 'dul bar mdzod pa'i khyer sprul pa'i 'od bang rab tu 'gro ba las byung ba'i zil gyis gni bu'i khrab che po rji dbu me dpa
32a4(rnying rgyud): bcas pa'i dang / phrin las bzhi so sor bsgrub pa'i phyir sgo bzhir gnas pa'i lha mo bzhi dang / gzhan yang su dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las sna tshogs las sprul ba'i mkha' 'gro bzhi dang / ye shes las byung ba'i spyan dang ldan pa'i sprul pa brgyad dang /
32a5(rnying rgyud): las kyi lo nya ba byed chen po'i tshogs kyi gtso bo bcu drug dang / lus kyis mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshul du sprul pa'i phrin las kyi mgyogs ma brgyad dang / sras pa'i ma mo rtsal dang ldan pa'i mgos brgyan pa'i ma tshogs kyi srin ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten
32a6(rnying rgyud): ci las la grub pa'i lha dang glu dang gnod sbyin dang dro za dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci la sogs pa'i 'khor gdug pa can bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po gsung gi mnga' bdag
32a7(rnying rgyud): snang ba mtha' lam de nyid kyi srog sung thugs ni bachen po chos nyid mnyas pa nyid las ma g.yos kyang / thugs rje chen po dang thams pa che pos gdul byar ma nus pa'i rdzogs pa can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir/ srugasung thugs rigs byed chen par sprul ba
32b1(rnying rgyud): lnga ste/ phyogs ban+d+ha ma lus pa'i nam mkha'i khams thams cad ni mthing nag grug sum bu makun ta bzang po'i mapa' dbyings rlung gi khams thams cad ni 'thod drung drag po ljang gu b+ha ga ma rgya kram/ rigs kyi yum dang dam tshig sgrol ma'i mkha' dbyings rba'i khams thams cad/
32b2(rnying rgyud): ni cha sba pa'i gzhi khrag gi rang bzhin dmar zhing zlum pa/ rigs kyi yum mA ma kI'i mkha' dbyings sa'i khams rnams cad ni phung po ti ra'i rang bzhin/ ser po gru bzhi pa/ rigs kyi yum sangs rgyas spyan gyi mkha' dbyings/ me'i khams thams cad ni rab tu 'a
32b3(rnying rgyud): zhing sreg par byed pa rigs kyi yum gos dkar mo'i mkha' dbyings/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam pa thams cad ni/ keng rus 'bar ba'i ri rab chen po/ rab tu rngams pa'i gzugs/ rigs thams cad kyi bdag po chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du
32b4(rnying rgyud): sprul zhing byin gyis brlabs so// gzhan yang snod kyi 'jig rten rin po che'i gzhal med khang mdzes par snang ba rnams ni thod pa skam po dang rlon pa dang sha khrag ras ris su chag pa brtsigs pa'i gzhal med khang rdzogs pa'i sku gsum gyi rang bzhin/ 'jig rten gyi lha dang
32b5(rnying rgyud): klu dang gza' chen po bsgral zhing mar bcad pa dag la ka gdung gi tshul du byas pa ni dman pa'i theg pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin/ bar snang gi lha bran dang chu skar gyi tshogs thog grab kyi tshul du byas pa ni/ bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi rang bzhin/ nyi ma dang zla bas gsal ba'i
32b6(rnying rgyud): 'od 'phel 'grib med pa ni mthongs khung gi tshul ni/ thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin 'jig rten gyi mthu dang dregs pa can dbang phyug chen po dang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dbang du bsdus te rgyal mtshan du 'tshogs pa ni/ chos kyi slad
32b7(rnying rgyud): po ma lus pa thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i rang bzhin// phyogs bzhir sgo bzhir snang shing dus bzhi shes par byed pa ni tshad med pa bzhi'i rang bzhin/ gyi dang nang gi phyogs thams cad du bskal pa'i me 'od chen po 'bar de ni ye shes na pa lnga'i rang badzin/
33a1(rnying rgyud): stong gsum gyi klu'i rgyal po gdug pa can gdan du byas pa na nyon mongs pa'i dug ma lus pa 'joms pa'i rang bzhin/ pad+ma rnam par dag pas gdan byas pa ni/ thugs rjes sems can la chags par mdzad kyang / nga'i stan gyi sA mgos pa
33a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin nyi ma dang zla ba pad+ma 'bar bas bteg/ pa ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par dag pas bskyed pa ste/ de ltar snod kyi 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad dbang du bsdus pa'i sprul pa rnam par 'phro bar mdzad do// gzhan yang bcud kyi 'jig rten kye
33a3(rnying rgyud): 'gro gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyang bdag nyid dbang gi rgyal por snang bar byas pa'i tshul ni 'di lta ste/ nga ni bde gshegs kun gyi gtso// da ni skye 'gro kun gyi yab// nga ni gshin rje kun gyi gshed// nga ni ma mo kun gyi rje// nga ni sbyor bdag chen po ste// yo/
33a4(rnying rgyud): sha shrI he ru ka/ de ni sgrol bdag chen po ste// rag sha shrI he ru ka/ nga ni sbas pa'i rang bzhin te// gu ya dpal chen he ru ka/ nga ni dam tshig chen po ste// sa ma ya shrI he ru ka/ da ni dus gsum mngon du dbyung // dus gsum 'di ni nga yi dbang // thams cad nga yi
33a5(rnying rgyud): dbang du bsdus// bka' dang dam las khyod 'das na// gso glug med par dmyal thag gcod// de bas nga yi las rnams sbubs// zhes gsungs shing thams cad dbang du sdud pa'i rol pa'i cho 'phrul chen po drag cing rtsub pa'i shugs spyod pa kun tu bltas pas 'jigs
33a6(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur ba rab tu bstan te/ gsung yang 'di skad rab tu sgrogs so// AM pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta ha ya b+hI pa ma hA kro d+ha e ka dza nI sa ma ya ru lu ru lu hUM b+ho hUM/ A ra li dza/ hrIHde ma da ri ha ya b+hI wa e ka dza nI sa ma ya hu lu hu lu hrIHdzaHdzaH/ e dza b+h+yo nr-i dza rba da/ hrIHpad+mAn+ta kr-i ta
33a7(rnying rgyud): ha ya prI wa e ka dza TI hu lu hu lu hI dza dziH/ a ti sarba byo ba zlog/ ces pa'i gsung gi sgra stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byas pas/ phyogs bcu'i sngags pa dang/ rdegs pa can gyi tshogs thams cad 'jigs shing sngangs spag dargyal bar gyur te/ sa la
33b1(rnying rgyud): kha thub tu 'gyel nas dbang gi rgyal po'i bka' nyan cing bran bzhin du las byed par khas blangs shing dam bcas so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ pad+ma rol pa 'dakyil 'khor chen po mngon par sprul pa gling gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de
33b2(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gri rgyal po de la 'khor gyi thog ma rigs kyi khro bo pad+ma he ru ka chen po chu bdag gi rigs dpag tu med pa rnams dang lhan cig mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma bcom ldan dbang gi rgyal// pad+ma rigs mchog de bzhin gsheg
33b3(rnying rgyud): dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsung gi rang bzhin gsung gi bdag/ gsung gi gtso ste gsung dbyung ba// gsung mchog rnam par dag pa'i sku// ma chags mi chags chags med gsung // gsung gi dbang phyug sba ba che// bdag cag nyan par
33b4(rnying rgyud): lags kyis// khyod kyi su yis ci zhig mdzod// de bzhin gsung gis ci zhig gsung // thugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu// khyod la yon tan ci zhig mnga'// mdzad pa'i phrin las ji lta bu// gzigs pa yis ni ji zhig blta// ting nge 'dzin na gang la bsgom/
33b5(rnying rgyud): dus bzhi yis ni spyod pa gang // 'thob par bya ba ci zhig lags// bdag cag rnams kyi the tshom 'di// myur du chod cig lha yi lha// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten khams// ljags kyi dbang pos khyab mdzod la// khams gsum ma lus thams cad kun// gsung
33b6(rnying rgyud): dbyangs snyan pa'i sgra brjod de// gsal la rdzogs shing ma 'dres la// lhag dang chad pa'i skyon bral bar// legs pa nyid du bstan du gsol/ zhes gsol te gus pa chen po dang bcas pas mdun du 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
33b7(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbang phyug des/ chos thams cad kyi sgra'i snying po gsung gi phyag rgya'i 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba yang dag par rtogs par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ yab yum gnyis su med pa'i rol pa chen po rnam par 'phro ba rab tu bstan /
34a1(rnying rgyud): tshul tsud rtsol la ga sngags kya ba mas thab par ya na/ 'did rjes pa b+h+yan to// 5/ mas ma rnam/ r+dz+dza ga // dgas sa//
34a2(rnying rgyud): stsogs// da rji las ma mas mdang// ga nga 'dzin pal ba bas// bany+dza ny-id ga cig med pa bsgom// ma ga tshal ba med par spyod// sgra dang yi shes byer med par// dmi la ba par thub yin// ga lan po da//
34a3(rnying rgyud): pa rlob // da'i segasu par bstan kyis don/ sa gsas ca thams su gyis pa'i chus byed kyis parnabs pa tsha phral rnam par dag pa'i ring bzhi du bstan pa 'di du hU~M/ 'khor ba'i sems can pa thugs rjes rab tu chags pas srid pa ngo da
34a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// dgas pa'i lcagasu pa dang ldan pas bu gsum kyis mangs pa'o// dbyum+WA pa khyen du dzes pa ni ma ga pa tshangs pa'i na'i klubs gnon du'o// hri baM ga drug na na mgo ldang sa ta jig pa'i tsho pa ni khyad par da dbang gi sbyin las do sa rje pa
34a5(rnying rgyud): tsan tsha gcod cing dbang du sprad pa'o// zhal nas hrIHdngaT kyi gsung sa drug ba sgrogs pa ni/ marungs pa log par lta ba can rnams 'dul bar mdzadzod pa'o// shangs nas rdo rje'i rlung ba tshubs mjug por 'khyil ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cadag
34a6(rnying rgyud): zhing mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa 'dul bar byed pa'o// ag tshem dang sbyar smin ma ser po la bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar bar snang ba ni/ mi shes phun pa'i phyogs ma lus par sel bar byed pa'o// sun dgu nyi ma dang zla ba'i zer lhur 'bar zhing 'tsher
34a7(rnying rgyud): ba ni/ 'gro ba rnams la thugs rjes gzigs nas rang gi rigs la 'god par byed pa'o// phyag drug gis ni mngon par shes badrug dang rdzun pas 'thad na mthar byin par mdzad pa'o// rdo dang brel bu 'dzin pa ni/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rang
34b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin du gnas pa'o// kha rtag ni nyan mongs pa drug gsum gyi dngos po rtsad nas gcod pa'o// sbrul chen po'i zhags pa 'dzin pa ni gdug pa can rnams gdul zhing thugs rjes 'dzin par mdzad pa'o// b+han+ta dmang po khrag dang zhag gis bkang ba sol te/ lang nga
34b2(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal ma lus pa thugs rje chen pos zad par mdzad pa'o// lcags srog gi rgyun 'dzin pa ni// khams gsum thams cad thugs rjes mi gtong bar bde ba chen po'i ngang du 'khrid par mdzad pa'o// glang po che'i pags pa dang zhing phrag chen pog bani/
34b3(rnying rgyud): rim pa dag gi gang du phyin cing thugs rje chen po'i sprul pa rgyun du 'phro ba'o// stag gi pags pas sham thabs su dkris pa ni/ phrinA las kyi khyad par ma 'dres par so sor thub par mdzad pa'o// dur khrod chen po'i chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa ni/ ye shes dang la
34b4(rnying rgyud): las grub pa'i ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dbang du sdud pa'o// klu'i rgyal po chen po rigs lngas brgyan pa ni/ gdug pa can gyi tshogs zil gyis gnon pa'o// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums dang dong stabs su bzhugs pa ni/ bdud dang mu stegs kyi phyogs
34b5(rnying rgyud): ba'o// klu pho mo gdan du bting ba ni zhe sdang dang gti mug rang sa myong ba'o// pad+ma dang nyi zla'i gdan bting ba ni/ ma chags pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs skyed pa'o// yum e gadza nI ra la gcig ma dang gnyis su med par 'khril ba na/
34b6(rnying rgyud): shes 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang la gnas pa'o// sku mdog dmar nag la 'od 'phro ba ni/ chags pa dang bde ba chen po gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin no// zhal gcig ni tshes sku mnyam pa chen po gcig tu mtshon pa'o// phyag gnyis ni snying rje dang stong pa rdung
34b7(rnying rgyud): ba'o// baT+wAM ga ni sku gsung thugs kyis 'gro ba'i don rgyun du mdzad pa'o// thod khrag ni 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad zad par stob pa'o// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pa ni/ thabs thugs rje'i rol pa chen par/
35a1(rnying rgyud): zhabs sa ga// nyi ma tha ba stan nas bcwan// sbrul gyi phred bsdug bAn+tha dz+dzaH// b+h+yordzag gan drug pan// mdog drug la kri gsas hA// rAd+hA gsum dru da gaH// drug pa gnas kyi sgra dang 'khrul// ser 'ang du na
35a2(rnying rgyud): ra// stug ma bcings pas gzhan gnas 'jigs// sprul pa'i pa ti me 'brug gi// khro ba yi ni dkyil 'khor tshogs// nub tud rje dra ba mchog/ dmar ser rdo rje dbyug pa bri// 'a khor lo sbrul zhags me long chu// lha mo 'jigs chen 'bas kyis gnon//
35a3(rnying rgyud): 'od bar klog gi phreng bcan// sbal bya'i bonyaci skyeng gdang // 'gram phrag gri drang pod khrag 'din// byang du 'ong byed 'jigs rkyen sra// rdzang grwa ci gsum mda' ma che// nad bu drung khrag wA mdzung khrag ngacang // rar+yamig dasar zi kyi mngon//
35a4(rnying rgyud): khro bo sra dang 'khril// cod ben klu mogo gdengs ka'i ldan// dus mtshungs phud kyi sgra chen sgrogs// kun snang rjod phreng g.yang gzhi dang // dur khrod gnas 'byung gtsang sde byed// mtshams kyi khra ba chen po bzhi// rigs kyi byed gzugs thig les mtshan//
35a5(rnying rgyud): glim gyi ga dun rtsod mad ma nan// khyod byug sa // hUM sbyang bu byung gnas lcags sbyi/ da tha~Mng TIg la smra'i rgyun// nA m+bu phrul zla babs su sbyar// rnyi san+ta m+b+ha mang chags kyis brjod// phan du ldan dam di de'i madz+nyAn// hAn
35a6(rnying rgyud): gas pa sa// thu li rtsal pa'i gnas ni zhugs// gzhon dz+nye dril 'joms par byung // A~M ma hA nA ya~M grI ba par+d+ha d+hA dz+nyA na bin+d+ha d+he r+ya hrI Ta rtsa bde sngags so// min mo / ud trA~M rmA A kr-i bA m+sa // Ag du lI / ska
35a7(rnying rgyud): smos sas sa sa sa kyi'i pa'i phyir bu rgya sa na sa sum na su na nga gru
35b1(rnying rgyud): mgo brtsegs sprul pa'i 'khor dang bcas// rang gi las kyis 'khod pa dang // 'jigs pa'i cha lugs rngam gzugs gnas// las mdzad klu yi dkyil 'khor 'dul// klu chen brgyad sogs bsdus byas nA// mAthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par bya// rang gi dam tshig
35b2(rnying rgyud): dran pa'i thugs// spyan nas sa spyan dang 'dod par byed// yin ma m+me gnanA gar d+hA ya sam+b+ha ya dz+raM// dkyil 'khor gsang par dbang bsgyur nas// da bzang gi po medangs mi dpyang 'bor// rigs kyi rgya rkyen gsal byed kyi// na
35b3(rnying rgyud): gnas bcas te// dkyil 'khor gsang ba dgoms zhugs kyis// tshul 'dzin dkon mchog mngon du dbye// tshogs rnams ma lus mgrin gcig tu// gang dbang sku la skyabs gsol zhing // 'dod yon gsol 'debs das bcas pa// bsod nam
35b4(rnying rgyud): phung po'i gter la spyod// kye ma dkyil 'khor ya mtshan che// bdag cag 'khor rnams rab sgrol mdzad// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor dpe bral bas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gnas// bde chen lam 'di sngon ma rtogs// da ltar thugs
35b5(rnying rgyud): rdo drin gyis rnyed// rnal 'byor gsang bar 'dzin byed kyis// ji ltar bsgos pa'i bka' bzhin 'gyed// rdo rje gsang ba'i dam 'di las// gal te nyams na 'das par shog ces dam bcas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad k+shi dgongs pa ma
35b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan pad+ma'i sbas// yum la chags tshul 'dzum mdangs kyis// bka' yi bsgo bas dkyus
35b7(rnying rgyud): mdzad de// mi shigs teng 'dzin la gnas mdzad// phyogs skyong dri za rgyal chen po// rang gi chung ma tshogs bcas pas// gnas gzhan 'jigs par mdzad pa dang // rang gi mthus bcus 'dul bar mdzad// spun pa nur 'char ba'i mdangs//
36a1(rnying rgyud): su sa sa// / du ma sa/ sa su
36a2(rnying rgyud): ngadas de bzhi gshegs pa thams cad ci bdag pa des sangs rgyas rnams cad kyi drugs kyid khro skyed rang bzhin ljongs su dge ba'i ba ny-i da 'gro ba ma lus pa la spung zhing gsal bar mdzod pa de/ 'di sa ces bka' thal to// zlog pa med pa'i dris nyid dang /
36a3(rnying rgyud): byung dang mthong dang myong ba dang // gdam dang drad pas smras pa// snying po byang chub sems yin te/ 'di las g.yas pa ci yang med// gzugs dang padog mtshan pa dang // snying ga dra dang bsnyed can// nam mapa'i tshe 'phral dri ba'i / pang
36a4(rnying rgyud): sa rjod kyang sa y-i nga/ byang ba nyid dang d+hA y-i// snang ying dang las nga // dag pa'i dus na gis // rnam par shes pa mi gshegapas/ dngas gis da nga// rngon ci ga gas pa
36a5(rnying rgyud): nyid la// phying du bzhidadu/ rtogs sa yod pa ma mam/ bas+yAd kyim dunags nis brjid// kun khrid na mya nga bzhin mas+ho// yod dang med da gathang dang 'don// skyedang 'gag dang ga dang da// nga ti med dnga'i ba dang // pad dang
36a6(rnying rgyud): da med dang mdzad me dang / pa bla pa 'du ba // 'dug da nga mi nga // zagapa pa dang gi rdzus dang // ban the yang mi dang / 'jig 'dus dadim 'das dang // rdzi ma
36a7(rnying rgyud): gas pa// ma thaMd dang // margya sa pa rdzogs nga// rang gim gyi ted ma sring // maud de ya 'das da // bags pa cam des sus dang // rlu dang nga da das// hrIn kyings sa ma na// ma
36b1(rnying rgyud): sa pasabyung ba dang // rtag pyong bus byed ma gsang pang dang // bags tam dang sa srung // mnganang rtswa dang gal ba dang / bangs susu ba da tu gags// gzhun tu dbung las bur bdang // byang dag ba dag las thung ba'o// ngas zlag /
36b2(rnying rgyud): las pa dang med// dbar nam bya dri ldan na/ sa dang // dnga'atsas 'am rngan pa dang // rje bca dzad dang mag// nga yang byab las g.yos pa meng // de bzhin pa mi thigs byedag// maskyes sa skye mang // mang pa sheg
36b3(rnying rgyud): byed// myug yos mi ga sogam pa med// nga bad cig ni nyid las// rang bzhi du sa sbyid ces zug/ rtogs pa tsam gyis mngon du byar// rgol med sbyi lenas spangs// rang 'ardzogs shing gzhanas dang // sremangom kya dang na
36b4(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rgya ba'i rgyud las/ thugs rnam par dag pa dbang drug gsang ba'i le'u na bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cada'i bdag po dang/ debade
36b5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan thun sum tshogs pa rab tu drang bar grub par byed pa'i don rnam par dgu pa'i che ba 'di nyid ston pa 'di lta ste/ sku gsung thug kyi cho 'phrul cing yang 'phur zhing ston pa thams cad la snang yang gcig tu nges pa'i phyir/
36b6(rnying rgyud): che ba nyid dang // gsung gi che ba nyid dang / sku'i che ba nyid la sogs pa gang yang ma 'bigs pa'i sgo nas/ byin gyis rlabs sto rdzogs su 'byung ba ni/ 'jig rten gsum las rngam par spel ba'i don/ theb pa dadu rtsi che ba dang / rkyen thos kyi
36b7(rnying rgyud): rnas kyi ga pa ca pa bstabs sa thing gyi/ 'dul ba'i dus la gnas pa myong bas par drangal gnas pa'i gan mya macu'i kyis par bdag pa dge rgya rjod par dris shing da ba'i dag shegs pa ngam ga shes
37a1(rnying rgyud): skyes bu ni smad par bya ba rnams 'dul zhing rang gi sa la dgod nus par zad kyi/ bla na med pa'i lam la spyod par mi nus pa rnams kyang / nga'i thugs dang gsung dang sku'i yon tan thogs pa med pa spyod pa la ni rgyu tsam du yang mi nye'o//
37a2(rnying rgyud): da ltar dbang gi rgyal po nga'i thugs nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis thugs rjes stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sa le snang ba bzhin/ sems can gyi khams rnams kyi sems kyi bu las snang ba thams cad bdag gi ye shes la snang par byung ba
37a3(rnying rgyud): po yan chad yin no// ri rab kyi rtse mor rnam par snang mdzad gang gi mtsho chen po'i lus lha'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i lces bu'i tshe na/ nga'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen por sems bskyed do// bdag dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams// mthon mu
37a4(rnying rgyud): bsgyur te// bar snang khams kun rab snang zhing // phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng 'og kun// khro bo khro mos bkang byas te// rin chen rtsal chen seng ge dang // rta dang glang chen nam mkha' lding // grangs med gnon pa 'og min gnas//
37a5(rnying rgyud): par rgyal// zhabs 'bring rdo rje rol pa mo// bye ba khrag khrig rjes su 'brang // lus dang yan lag thams cad kun// thod rlon phreng dang srul gyis brgyan// spyan dgu 'bar bas sa dgu gzigs// dbu ska ral pa me stag 'phro// rin chen 'bar ba zur du da rdza/
37a6(rnying rgyud): se mo do dang do shul dngar// mgur chu chun 'phyangs zar tshags// de bzhin zhabs kyi chas brgyad kyis// khro bo chen po brgyad 'dul bas// tshangs dang brgya byin smos ci dgos// dbang chen nga yi 'khor rnams kun// bka' bzhin byed pa yon tan yin//
37a7(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang nga yi yon tan ni// blo dang dbang po bsam pa dang // khams dang rigs dang yul dang dngos// dman dang bar ma mchog tu byed// bya ba'i chos dang byed pa'i yid// gzugs dang tshor dang 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnam shes phung po'i tshogs
37b1(rnying rgyud): dbang po yul dang skye mched khams// de ning yis rab tu byed// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rig 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan thos rang rgyal lha rnams kyi// yon tan tshogs kun ji snyed pa// nga la de nyid mnga' ba ste// tshig da
37b2(rnying rgyud): dang rnam grangs dang // dpe dang tshad kyis brjod mi lang // gzhan yang nyon cig he ruka/ nga la gzugs dang tshad dang dbyibs// yod dang dngos por ma gcig/ nga la rigs dang rgyu dang rkyen// byed pa po nig la yod// 'dus ma byas shing rkyen kyis phru
37b3(rnying rgyud): thugs rje mkhyen pas thabs dang ldan// 'di ni nga yi chos kyi sku// ston byed pa dang dus dang 'khor// gang gis bstan pa'i dbade// nges pa can du rnam pa lnga// nga la phun sum tshogs pa ni// longs su rdzogs pa yi sgo// sangs kyis byang chu
37b4(rnying rgyud): dpa' dang // dman pa nyan thos rang sangs rgyas// 'di las gzhan pa'i phyi rol pa// dbang phyug dang ni mangs pa dang // drag po gtum po gzhon nung ngo // lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang // seng ge glang chen ri dwags dang // 'dab chags srin bu sog /
37b5(rnying rgyud): gi gang la gang gis phyir// ji ltar nus pa'i dbang mdzad cing // rang dang gnyis med mnyam myong ba// nga yi sku las rnam skul skya// bsam gyis mi khyab brjod las 'das// shes par byos shig he ru ka/ zhes gsungs so// dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i
37b6(rnying rgyud): rlud las/ yon tan rgya chen po nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po des/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las ma lus pa bsgrub par byed pa dang / de la nye bar byed cing skal ba can du byed
37b7(rnying rgyud): pa dang // myur du 'grub par byed pa dang / legs par 'grub par byed pa dang / yang dag par 'grub par byed pa dang / bde bar 'grub par byed pa'i thabs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bu'i gsang ba dang gsung gi gsang ba dang thugs kyi gas ba chen po
38a1(rnying rgyud): bar bsrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor rang nyid la rdzogs par gsal bar mdzad nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye kye dbang chen he ru ka/ ma 'ongs shin tu snyigs ma'i dus// cho dang
38a2(rnying rgyud): dus dang longs spyod dang // las dang blta bas mnar ba'i tshe// 'dod chags rje sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dogaser sna yis// rab tu gzir zhing nyon mongs pas// gdung ba'i sems can rnams kyi phyir// nga'i sub mchog bshad par/
38a3(rnying rgyud): sems dang ldan pas nyon// dper na mkha' la 'gro ba'i lhas// de nyid kyis ni 'dul ba ltar// nyon mongs tshogs rnams de nyid kyis// rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs kyis 'dul// de bas blo ldan skyes bu yis// thog mo nga yis bsrub pa'i gnas/
38a4(rnying rgyud): tukha bltas dben pa'i gnas// brag dmar tshe zangs 'dra ba'i ni// rang gi rigs lag shis pa'i gnas// chags chen mdog dmar shes rab ldan// bsrub pa'i grogs la bsngags pa yin// ting 'dzin yo byad phun tshogs pas// rab tu 'bad
38a5(rnying rgyud): bsgom par bya// khams gsum pa yi ngo bo nyid// snang dang srid pa 'di dag kun// me dpung 'bar ba'i 'od bzhin bsgom// nam mkha'i khams kyi dkyil 'khor dbus// srog rten snying po yi ge hrIH// spro dang bsrubs brtan par bzhag/ yul dang de yi yul
38a6(rnying rgyud): can kun// mA lus dmigs pa rab tu bya// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dngos// so so'i las kyi rab tu sbyang // nga dang mtshungs par gyur pa na// mi g.yo tshad kyis brtag par bya// de yis thog mar bsten pa yin// bsnyen pa yi ni ting nge 'dzin no// de nas nye
38a7(rnying rgyud): bar bsnyen pa'i phyir// skad cig tsam ma ma yud tsam ci// rang gi lus kyi nus pa gsum// dbang chen sku gsung thugs su blta// bar chad brtsams pa bzlog pa'i phyir// phyi nang gsang ba'i las rnams kyis// bsrung dang bzlog dang bslad par bya// rngams pa'i
38b1(rnying rgyud): 'khar tshogs nakha' la sprul// skrod bye gsol zhing 'dud par bya// mnyes par bya ba'i yo byad bsnyen// tshul bzhin mgyur tshangs par bya// byin gyis brlab pa nyid la gzung // dam bca' brtan po bdag gir gzung // thugs kyi snying po lnga zhing bsdu// las
38b2(rnying rgyud): ba tshad kyis blta// de nas chos ku no pa ni// yang dag pa la bdag med bsam// de yi mtshon par ma nus pa'i// yul rnams la ni rjes chags bya// nyid kyi dran pa'i rgyal po de// srog gcig 'bul dmigs pa bsrel// rje ga yan lag
38b3(rnying rgyud): 'phro 'dra yis// mchod bstod mnyes dang myang ba rdzogs// rang gi ngo bo nus dang ldan// hrIHs+pha ra Na phaT/ sraM ha ra Na hUM/ e yaM ra suM raM hri sma ra na phaT/ saM ha ra na hUM/ stong zhing g.yo dang bskyod dang gzhi// gtsang sbra chen po lnga dag ni// dag pa'i dag byed ting nge
38b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// b+ha ga yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rang gi ngo bo las bskyed pa'i// byin gyis rlobs pa'i mchog yin no// b+h+rUM swA rA Na phaH/ sa~M ha rA t+na hU~M/ phra zhing mkhregs pa'i chu 'di las// mdzes shing 'jigs pa'i phyi dang nang // ji ltar bshad pa'i
38b5(rnying rgyud): g+han dang rtags// 'byung ba'i nus pa 'od ldan zhing // rol zhing 'brar ba rnam par bsam// gzhi rab tu bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin no// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dbang gi rgyal po nga yi lus// che ba'i che mchog rta mgrin can// dgos pa'i
38b6(rnying rgyud): yu ma dang mnyam spar nas// 'phags pa'i tshogs kun ma lus pa'i// mnyes pa'i mchod pa rab bstab ste// 'gro ba rnams kyi zhing dang rgyu// dag pa'i ngo bo nyid du sbyangs// slar nyid sa bon mngon du gyur// sa ma ya ho// sa maM ya s+t+wam/
38b7(rnying rgyud): rdorje ti/ trig yAM mi/ hrIHsa rbata thA ga tam nu dag Na 'adz+ra thA wa A t+mako& haM// nga nyid dbang chen du ste// khams gsum ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir// sras kyi tshul du mngon par gzung / nam ma pa'i dbyings kyi phyogs su dgod// de nyid 'dra he drug/
39a1(rnying rgyud): dmar zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon thod pa// de dang rjes su chags pa'i gram// kha thod pa 'dzin cing stob// phyogs nas gcod pa'i lce bzhi las// dbang po yi ni phyogs ngos su// rdo rje dbang na
39a2(rnying rgyud): he ru// mthing na gzhal gsum phyag drug ldan// dang po rdo rje thod khrag ba rnams// gshin rje gnas pa'i phyogs dag tu// rin chen dbang chen he ru ka/ ser nag/ zhal gsum phyag drug ldan// dang po rin chen zod khrag bsdams// klu dbang gnas pa'i
39a3(rnying rgyud): phyogs dgra du// pad+ma dbang chen he ru ka/ dmar nas zhal gsum bya ga drug ldan// dang po pad+ma thod khrag bsdams// gnod sbyin gyi ni phyogs de ru// phrin las dbang chen he ru ka/ ljang nag zhal gsum phyag drug ldan// dang po rgya za mthong khrag bsdams/
39a4(rnying rgyud): bar ma gnyis ni sbrul zhags dang // khaT+wAM rtse gsum 'dzin par mdzad// tha ma dbang gi phur ba 'dril// dbang chen kho bo 'di dag kun// dbus ma'i zhal ni sku yi mdong // g.yas zhal dkar la g.yon zhal ldang // rta mgrin ljar gus kun la mngos// dur khrod
39a5(rnying rgyud): dpa' ba'i chas kyis brgyar// zhabs gnyis bcangs bskum phyogs dag gi// rdzogs pa pho mo brdzis pa ste// 'di dag kun gyi rol pa'i yum// rigs kyi dbang phyug khro mo bzhi// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las// so so'i yab la 'khril mdzad cing // zhal gcig
39a6(rnying rgyud): phyag gnyis chags pa'i tshul// su yi kha dog yab dang mtshungs// srung ba dmar ba'i mdang pakyis mdzes// len+do thod pa phyag gis 'dzin// yab yum 'di dag thams cad kun// khyo bo'i gar nyams dgu dang ldan// sman gsum gzigs shing mche ba tsigs//
39a7(rnying rgyud): sa pa dang rdzogs/ pa mas ma// sa rgyu la gas sa ma pa sa
39b1(rnying rgyud): du chur+m+ma/ mas / na rgya tu ma rgya /
39b2(rnying rgyud): dad bang chen rdo rje ste// skyeng gi sum zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir// 'arigs bye rdul ba rnam par 'gro// 'bar ba'i khyams la mdzes par dgod// khro ba chen po 'di rnams ni// mdog dam gal gsum phyag byug ga/ g.yAH dkang g.yon sngo dbyes dmar
39b3(rnying rgyud): dang ts+tsha rta mgo ra dzin// 'jigs bye ngu rjod ches kyis bcur// rdung par ni bani la gnon ni// 'kho lo po rdo rje rin chen g.yas// pad+ma ral po dri la khrig pon// sangs rgyas rigs lnga zhabs kyis gnon// mi pha ma tho mo yum deng byor// 2
39b4(rnying rgyud): rgyong zil gnon ni// bad+ma byug to sa thig yas// kha T+wAM dgra bA h+ya bA pa ga yon// las kyi khro bcu zhabs kyis gnon// lha mo thig nyer ma dang byor// ye shes ma ma thal gnon ni// sngags mdzub lcags kyu sbal zhugs g.yas// lugs zlog dza nga /
39b5(rnying rgyud): gapon// gtso mo dbyings kyi yum drug gnon// ro langs mdang gnyis med sbyor// ya shes khrung rnams zil gnon ni// rdo rjes dang me khyung g.yas// nam mkha' chu rlung khrung ni g.yon// zhabs kyi dgas lha'i khung rnams brjes// rdza mo sman gcig
39b6(rnying rgyud): brim dang myor// dz+rad zil gnon tu mayin ni// rdo rje thong sam zhug sag pas// drong rma rjeng phred ning dajugs/ yon// dregs pa'i lha brgyad zhabs kyis 'arjig// rdo rje las kyad ma nga rkyor// mo cung zil gnon tu mgrin ni// rdo rjer 'bri gas
39b7(rnying rgyud): brnams// g.yon na zhags pasdigs mdzub ste// tham med ga buM'i gengs par// ma bdun sring bzhi nadun gyis gnod// gshin rdzogs byeng ma dang spyod// bruM rnams zil gyis gnon pa ni// klu rigs drug gi rdul zhags 'dzin// rigs pa zhi
40a1(rnying rgyud): na sug 'o// rnamapa rnyam na da// sa da nang rnams pa 'dus/ gags par 'asreg pa// nga zag kyi banang nanagapan// gang rgya rgya napas ma gnas/ gan na
40a2(rnying rgyud): la byed ma dang sbyor// khro mo yum chen 'di rnams la// mdog dmar chags pa rgyas pa'i tshul// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab la 'khyud// Sha N+DI 'dzin cing thod khrag stong // yab yum bcas pa'i khro tshogs kun// shar nas brtsams te rim pazhi
40a3(rnying rgyud): na / mA moSh+ThA / sa ba pos/
40a4(rnying rgyud): n+tu/ nr-id+ha / po d+hi tra~M/ ba po ts+tsha/ sngo ba mtsho sngon ga so / oM yi ga mo krod+hIhU~M/ tI To/ dregs pa can gyi tshig sa zil gyis gnon pa'o// khri bar byung ba'i ting 'dzin ni// ngan
40a5(rnying rgyud): dbang chen rdo rje ste// phrin las rnam bzhi bsrub pa'i phyir// sprul pa pho ha las le khrid// tshad med sgo bzhir gdab par bya// dzaHhUM baM hoH// khro mo mdog dkar lcags kyu 'dzin// ser mo zhags pa 'dzin ma dang // dmar mo lcags glog sbom byed ma/ 7
40a6(rnying rgyud): mo dril bu 'dzin ma ste/ srin lasna bzhi mdzod pro ta ma// rim par rtogs kyi rgol dbab// oM badz+ra a~M ku sha dzaH/ A~M badz+ra pA sha trUM/ A~M badz+ra s+pho dzA baM/ A~M badz+ra d+hanAM hoH// po nya 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin no// dbang chen 'dus partsa ba'i rgyud pas/ bstan pa
40a7(rnying rgyud): nye ba'i lha rnams nges par dbyung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / gzhan yang nga mis bshad kyis nyon// bdag gi dam tshig brtan gyur nas// gsal zhing mig yo tshad ldan no// gnyis med ye shes gzug par bya// bsam
40b1(rnying rgyud): rjes pa khyab nam mkha'i dbyingang // bye ba til gyi gang bu bzhin// longs sgra rdzogs su kun gyi mchod// thams ca dang yo tshogs kyi sna gang // dag pa'i mkha' la skar rtogs bzhin// dam tshig pa la rab tu dbab// dbye ba med pa'i chos nyid
40b2(rnying rgyud): kyis// tshul chus cag bzhin du blta// de la 'dud cing mos pa dang // stob cing mnyes pa ma lus pa// chos nyid sme las byung ba yi// rang las sprul pa'i lha rnams kyis// ji ltar mos pa bzhin du 'grub// de nas khyad par bye ba'i las//
40b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis med lus kyi srog gi dngachu skyes phyogs bzhir ba ldan pa'i// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi dbus// nga yi sems kyi ngo bo nyid// tshon gang dmar po zhi zhing khro// rang gi sku dang mtshungs gyur pa// nyin mtshan gsal rus 'od
40b4(rnying rgyud): ldan pa// sran tsan yi phye cha'i steng // kun gyi gsung ste khyad par thugs// srog yig le brgan til 'bru'i tshad// gsal zhing 'od dang ldan pa la// yi ge phreng ba'i gzugs kyis 'dud// de ni tshogs pa'i tshad dang mnyam// rang gi lus dang
40b5(rnying rgyud): tshul gcig pa// kun nas re rer bzhugs par bya// rang gi ming gi sgra brjod pas// nam mkha'i khams kun gsal bar 'phro// dus gsum gyi ni 'phags pa mnyes// kun tu sbyor ba gsum rnams kyis// srid pa'i zhags pa ma lus gcad// thams ca
40b6(rnying rgyud): kyang ni rang gi tshul// nyid las gzhan pa yod ma yin// de nyid brten pa'i tshad kyis bltas// gal te lhag par bsgrub 'dod na// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs rnams kyis// brten pa'i gnas gsum pho brang du// gcod byed 'dam skyes rdo rje la//
40b7(rnying rgyud): gsum rtsa ba rnam dag med// shel mdog bye ru bai DUr+ya// yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa yis// dngos po med dang rtog pa yod// ma lus nga yi ngang du sbyangs// khyad par du ni dbang gi rgyal// nga yi sngon gyi dam tshig ste// lus kyi steng phyogs mthar thug pa'i/
41a1(rnying rgyud): dgas kyi bdag pas lus pan gnas// rtag du napa kyad kyil labar bzlas// rlung gis brjod kya skyes pa yis// gsar chu ba thags sasangs pa dang // mag me 'ardzu da// mdab mdus
41a2(rnying rgyud): rang dang pha rol phyi dang nang // kun du spro ba'i las rnams kyis// sbyangs shing bsdu dang ba sbal dang gso// mchod bstod par dang bcol zhing bskul// gang dang gang la bsngags pa des// 'bad pa'i stobs kyis dmigs par bya// slar 'dus rang ni
41a3(rnying rgyud): gzhi nyid la// thim pa'i tshul gyis byin brlabs nas// gnas pa'i ngo bo de nyid du// rdzogs dang rab tu rdzogs pa yis// don de nyid la bsam zhing blta// nga dang gnyis su med par 'gyur/ dpal dbang chen 'dus pa zla ba'i rgyud las/ nye bar byed
41a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i las rdzogs par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po nges yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang 'grol bar byed pa'i tshig ma lus pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin
41a5(rnying rgyud): la mnyam par bzhag nas nyid kyi ming gi 'khor lo spa tshig rab tu g.yo bar byed pa/ gsung gi ngo bo'ub cing chub pa rang gi ngo bo las mi gzhan pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad nye bar spyad cing myong ba/ las thams ca
41a6(rnying rgyud): thogs pa med par bslab pa 'di gsungs so// oM ni ye shes lnga nyid rtogs pa'o// pad+ma dngos po kun lam chags pa'o// ta kr-i khro bo'i gar dgu rdzogs pa'o// ha ya grI pa ni khams gsum dbang srud rta mgrin no// ma hA kro ta cha ba tsan 'dul
41a7(rnying rgyud): khropo chen po/ e ka~M dza tI ral gcig ma dang gnyis su med cing dges pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o// sa ma yang ma tshig la dgongs pa'o// ru lu ru lu khro bo khri mamo'i tshogs kun dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams dbang du sdud pa'o// hU~M dregs pa'i tshogs rnams
41b1(rnying rgyud): sa/ shA dgams pachud dan// rlungs nga rdzu/ rnam nas sa pa / ga/ ga gas pa // na nga stsa// / spyabs da po pa byas// rna
41b2(rnying rgyud): pa cwo chen tshigs// dri me thams cad 'dus pa'i gsungs yin no// hA ya grI ba ma lus dbang gi rgyal po'o// a kAd ti skyes pa'i yum dang slong ba'o// mu ru rigs kyi sras dang bcas pa'o// wa sbal pa'i bral gnon lab yum /
41b3(rnying rgyud): dza ni dbang ga sgoma'o// rnams dkrugs shing zad pa'o// de mchog tshogs kyi bsgrub pas na// zad pa'i lung bzhin brtson par bya// paM b+h+r-i dwags pa'i tshogs bcas dbang du sdud// di ma d+hA kun lag bar byed pa'o// ha ya
41b4(rnying rgyud): dgang gi lha gsal ba'o// A ka rnaM tshogs dag don gyis bskyod pa'o// lurba lu khro chogs sprul pa'i byed pa'o// Sh+T+rI dzi na las bzang pa'o/ / bris na byo ba lkog/ pha rol rnas pa bzlog pa'o// phun na gzang // sdig drug
41b5(rnying rgyud): pa can rnams 'dul ba'o// pha rol nus pa 'joms byed pa// bzlog pa'i dus su mngag par bya// dbang chen gas ba d+ha rgyud kyi// srog snying thugs rgyad bsrul ba ni// 'bar zhing gas pa bgrangs las 'das// bsrungs shing bzlog dang gsad da
41b6(rnying rgyud): 'dul// gang la dmigs pa myur du gub/ hA pa Sh+T+rI b+h+yo/ bA na na man+ta/ d+hamag+ho/ graN+DaHt+ta mgyo/ kam tsid+ham d+hi/ sarba tsot+ta ma dz+nyA/ kham rgya mjug gi drag sngags so// oM shwa ri khA ni shwa diSh+Te \u0f85 hUM/ grub spel rnams kyi rdeg sngags so//
41b7(rnying rgyud): iSh+Ta la ba shAn sa ba nga rgyu/ pa sa / brogs drag sngagasus// dzugs gsheg ni 'jug / da na pa ga te/
42a1(rnying rgyud): 'brug mo bzhi yi drag sngags so// oM badz+ra sha ra sing ha hUM/ rat+na sha ra sing ha hUM/ pad+ma sha ra sing ha hUM/ karma shar sing ha hUM/ rtsal chen rnams kyi'o// nyon cig dbang gi 'khor tshogs rnams// nga yi sku gsung thugs
42a2(rnying rgyud): kyi bdag/ yon tan dang ni phrin las dang // ma lus bsgrub par 'dod pa yis// shes par bya ba 'di dag yin// lus kyi mdun rgyab yab dang yum// g.yas dang g.yon ni dbang gi sras// snod dang don snying bcas pa ni// dbang chen rigs bzhi pa pa
42a3(rnying rgyud): yum mo// yan lag nyid lag thams cad kun// khro brgyad yum dang bcas pa ste// mthil bzhi sgo srung bzhi ru bsam// spu dang ba spu bka' nyan tshogs// bya ba'i chos dang byed pa'i yid// phyi dang nang gi shes pa yis// gzung ba'i yul
42a4(rnying rgyud): dang 'dzin pa'i sems// yul lnga nyon mongs rtogs pa dang // rnam shes brgyad dang de yi yul// dag pa'i 'byung ba bzhi nyid kyang // rim gyis shes par bya ba yin// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// dge dang mi dge'i rnam rtog ni// dbang
42a5(rnying rgyud): tshechetshe nang la yod ma myong // snang ba snang min sku yi tshogs// grags dang thags min gsung gi bdag/ stong dang stong min thugs kyi ngang // yod dang yod min yon tan te// bsgru ba dang bsrub min zin las so// 'di la the tshom byar mi rung // zhes gsungs
42a6(rnying rgyud): so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kyi bdag srid
42a7(rnying rgyud): can du gyur te/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings ma lus pa la rab tu gzigs pa'i lta stangs chen po mdzad nas// 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e mnyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor// nga ni dbang gi rgyal po ste// dbang mdzad dbang gi lha yin no// @
42b1(rnying rgyud): dbang du gyur pa las// sangs rgyas nyid du ma lus mthong // 'di la blta bar bya ba med// ma bltas pa nyid blta ba yin// de bzhin mthong dang dran pa dang // blo dang rig pa yod min yang // kun rdzob tsam du rig par snang // phyi rol dngos po snang ba 'i
42b2(rnying rgyud): yul// ma 'grags dpyad cing btags yod tsam// 'di ni phyi yi dbang chen no// nang du 'dzin byed sems kyi dngos// ma phyes rang gi ngang gis stong // nang gi dbang chen yin zhes bshad// gnyis 'dzin rtog dpyod rlung lta bu// dri ma med cing 'od ga
42b3(rnying rgyud): ba// sbas pa yin te kun la snang // 'di la dbang thob gyur pa na// dbang gi rgyal po mngon du gyur// nga ni ma yengs mi rtog pas// gang yang bsgom par bya ba med// ma nor ma bcos kho na nyid// dmigs med tsam du snying rje'i dang // rang la gnas pa//
42b4(rnying rgyud): bstar ma nus// 'khrul pa'i gzugs la blta ba yang // kun rdzob tsam du bsgom zhes bya// phung po nga rgyal brtan gyi bar// 'byung bzhi mthun pa'i phyogs tsam spyod// bla med gnas sum stobs par// dus bzhi mnyam par lus kyi lam// bar chad
42b5(rnying rgyud): gdug pa gdul gyi bar// ma rig mun pa thibs po 'joms// ngan song gnas rnams stod par byed// khams gsum srid gsum dbang du sdud// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed// bla med byang chub gnas su 'god// dug lnga sru lnga ye shes lnga// cho
42b6(rnying rgyud): drug mngon par shes pa drug/ yul brgyad yid chos 'byung ba bzhi// stobs dang mi 'jigs rig pa'o// khams dang skye mched bco brgyad po// ma 'dres bla med rdzogs pa'i chos// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// so sor rtogs pa de
42b7(rnying rgyud): yi 'khor// nga yis thob par bya ba ste// 'dod pa'i blo yis thob mi rus// ma thob pa nyid thob pa'o// 'di la som nyi ma za zhig/ ces gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i chud las/ lam gyi de kho na nyid nges par bstan pa'i le
43a1(rnying rgyud): hUM dgu pa'o// / de nas pad+ma he rug la sogs pa yongs su dag pa'i 'khor de dag gis/ dpal dbang gi tshal po la mgrin gcig tu snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis bstong pa/ nI rig dbang su ying rgyal sgra sgrogs shing //
43a2(rnying rgyud): gsum pan m+b+ha med pa rgyal ba'i thugs// gar mkhanar m+bu 'dra thabs kyi rgyal por grags// gang dbang ta mchog pa d+mad bang ga rgyal// zhe sang dpal 'bar zla ba'i bruMs cing// che bas 'phags pa dbang phyug che ba'i dpal// 'bar gas k+ta yi
43a3(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// dbang chen gnyis med rnal 'byor zab mo'i sku// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med 'brel mdzad cing // bgro don yid bzhin thugs las dbyung ba'i phyir// byang chub sems kyi 'grong du spel mdzad ma// dbang mchog gsang ba'i yum la phyag
43a4(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// hrIHdbang gi rta gdong zin las mgyogs pa'i mthu// ye shes rgyang baphyogs shes rab pha rol sbyin// rtsal gyi rlabs kyis sa gsum cig char bzod// 'tshor skad gdangs snyan gsang ba'i thugs dam bskul// rngams pa'o kha rdzal
43a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor tshogs dbang du sbed// stabs drug 'gros kyis rgyud drug thabs kyis 'dzin// rol pa'i rta gros bdud bzhi thal bar brlag/ 'jig rten sgrol mkhas mi bsnyel thabs kyis mchog/ rta skad rnams pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// hrIHdud men rang
43a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin rgyu ma'i khong gsang can// yul drug dbang po rdzogs pa'i rgyan du che// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten nas// skal med 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i sde 'gre dang // zhe sdang shugs kyis myol pa'i srin po dang // gti mug ldong
43a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang gyur gnod sbyin dang // nga rgyal dregs pas khengs pa'i bdud rig sogs// dbang bsdus drags po'i shugs kyis bskal ba rnams// che ba'i rtags ldan thabs kyis rgyas mdzad phyir// gdug byed so so'i b+han+d+ha bcad nas kyang // lhun gyis
43b1(rnying rgyud): brjid pa 'jigs byed rgyun du stsal// dur khrod gas rab rkyen po rdzas kyi mchog/ dbang phyug gsang ba'i skul rgyan du bgrubs// thod dus me ltar 'bar ba thod dkyil nas// ral pa dmar po dbu gtsug me ltar 'bar// skye med chos su yon tan kyang /
43b2(rnying rgyud): bar rdzogs// dbang chen thabs kyi rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod pas/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po des 'khor rnams la nyid kyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir// dbang bskur rab thabs kyi phyag rgya de dag gi spyi gtsug tu mug par mdza
43b3(rnying rgyud): de/ hUM hrIHdbang chen rdo rje thog dang ser chen 'bebs// d+hIHdang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jig/ hUM mdzad hU~M gi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skem// mtshon che ni gnam ljags 'bar ba'i mthu rdul gyis// gsang
43b4(rnying rgyud): sa 'gri par bang rigs pa 'joms// 'jig rten 'di dang pa dol gnyis ka cwa// gdug pa 'dul zhing drug gisum cad nas garjod// sridagasum 'dul ba'i bdag tung bang bskur ro// A he ya sle bas na be hUM la ka ya Sh+Thanam sa ma/ zhes
43b5(rnying rgyud): sa pa'i tshigs ma lus pa 'dul zhing tshar garjod par dbang bskur ro// 'jig rtes su 'angs pa dang 'jig rten pa rnams kyi dbang gi rgyal por bzhag go// de nas tshogs bcu'i de bden ga grags pa rigs kyi bdeg po rnams kyis/ dbang gi rgyal
43b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams la rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM bud+d+ha bo ro tsa na s+t+wa~M/ hUM badz+ra satwA dz+dza/ sA rat+na d+h+r-i// hrIHpad+ma a mi de badz+ri/ hA karma pra Sha dz+ra ga/ de nas 'jig rten gyi bdag po lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po yab yum+b+ha 'jo
43b7(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa rnams kyis rang gi srog gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM ma hA de ba u ma da ba lang tha ma di rat+ka kaM ka pa ya hUM d+hi pa ba tsag+na na d+h+r-i dza/ de nas gshin rje tshig rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM pa ma med s+t+rai rA dza sa do ru Na yo na ra ya ts+tsha ni hrIHd+hIH bau kr-i tA na
44a1(rnying rgyud): las nyid la khrag padu lazad/ danas rna gas nas gsu smram pa// stonas / phrus pa gag pas smra nagagasacu na du sa dang / dpa tu bya
44a2(rnying rgyud): snying po 'di rdul lo// A~M pak+ka ya ba myar gadrad ri ma bral thag sha durnam sa hU~M / de nas bdud kyi tshogs rnams kyis rang gi srog gi snying po 'di phul lo// bdud d+hi rbang ba rji khrag tid cang du gzug N+Di d+ho da/ de na srin po'i tshogs rnams
44a3(rnying rgyud): nga gi srog gi snying po 'di sam gro// oM kA sha pra las mA dus chung myo ga phul shig Ni taT+Ta d+he/ de nas 'jig rten gyim po tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di rnam mi// dz+haiMd+hag dag/ snying kha dag ma tsi ta ma srog mi ga la zeng zer/ kha la du
44a4(rnying rgyud): tid tshul sod/ de nas gzang tshigs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di tshul lo// A~M pa sha~M ma~M ki ru du ma tI la ti sad+d+ha hrI sarba d+ha thA d+hi ni/ de nas mkha' 'gro mo'i tshogs rna kyis rang gi snying po 'di yul lo// ma mjug sha ste brag la thabs
44a5(rnying rgyud): sa ni nying la thun dag ma chog rbad du/ gzhan yang 'jig ted gyi khams kyi gdug pa pa dang byed pa rnams cad kyis kyang drang gi zing dang byung ba thul te/ thams cad kyis rab rgyal pa nyid kyis pa ka 'di ltar stsal ba bzhin lam chags pasgrub cing bcwo
44a6(rnying rgyud): mtha' ngag nyan par khas blangs ni// dpal dbang ci 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ da~M ltar bsgrub pa zin lngas kyi khyad par kyi le skye badru ba'o// / de nas yang dbang gi rgyal mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul ba'i bdag
44a7(rnying rgyud): cad jug te/ gang ga garten gyi khas sangs khyod rdzogs pa'i ba snang bar mdzad do/ di ska kyis bka to// e ce 'angs pa'i 'kho pa // des ng+ge'i da// rang ga kyang chub thams las da/
44b1(rnying rgyud): dag mas sa mas// bdagazhags gsung ga sa thabad// yang dag dan na na// bcugs sa blang sa mtshan pa rtags// dbang dan pa sdus dang sa// slod pa sar 'tho bzhin// zag pa'i ngas pa ga na
44b2(rnying rgyud): me ya jig yang // na nga tan pa nang// 'dradza da nim 'judag/ gang rdzogs kyid nga yis pang ga// dab da kyi ga rnams kyi// rkye gagang nyi rtse// gsang ngadags pas bag shes
44b3(rnying rgyud): spang ba yang // tshul dme dkyil 'khrir kun pa cing // snang mi ma lus babral bar bya// bka' slod ben la sa rdzogs par mdzad// rkyen gyi tsug na byings nas bsngal// 'dra da thong dol dang brdzu // malus 'dra' byung po
44b4(rnying rgyud): nas ma bcos pa me sa// thabs dang shes rab dacings pa shes// dan ma ngano rdo pa sdang dang byung // gnyis me dang pa'i don yin no// dbang gi rgyal bar bsamasbyong bas// khros pa'i rgyag cigasung gi sa// 'jig rte rdzogs pa'i rtogs
44b5(rnying rgyud): g+hun// dbang med sgrog pa'i tshul bzung zhing // myur bzhin las gnas bzhin byed// dbyings nas gzugs snang thams cad kun// dbang bsgyur snang ba mnyes mdzad// 'gal ba de ti dang du sbyangs// bzung drung 'jog dan tshang ga
44b6(rnying rgyud): rigA pa'i rgyal po ru tho'o// oM thA thub rgyag mug zug byung // shar shang dag zhagasag she te// rbad zad nga dza d+hoh+l-I// zhes gsungs so// dpel dbang chen 'das partsa ba'i rgyud las/ dgongs pa yang dag pa da las kyi ste hU~M
44b7(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'o// / de nas dang gi rgyal po yis// rab tu brtsub pa 'dig sangs sa// nub tu rgyags bdabang giganas// shes pa'i rdzas dang ldan pa'i drung // chags ldan rigs kyi byed par gyi// 'di da mthun pa'i
45a1(rnying rgyud): ru la na/ na ma jug// ma tshung sa sas rgyas par ma// gas spya pas//
45a2(rnying rgyud): da gyur / bapa da pa shis/ pa sa sa // na / zhen dun ba / band sa nga / /
45a3(rnying rgyud): gapa ba ma sa ma ga kyis sa/ sa spyarnamam sa rgyan gyu na// rngam gag na nA~M// satham paldan // thog thA/ ga yangasam g+sa s+ho/
45a4(rnying rgyud): sbyang ma rnas/ ra rag ma la cad dang / dag N+DI nag pati pa tsas/ ba thengs du shag pa/ nAg gA mi meng / byangs byings tshugs rmugs te la te ma dun dun// myos kyis byeng byeng nang nadu/ zlum pa la mil / ting nang pa
45a5(rnying rgyud): 'phrog shA ya/ kye khrag rje na sa la song su sri sa muka mA yangaH/ thus ba sre pa nag badz+ra li rmA s+t+rai ma kA li ye mA la laH/ a mra ka sar+b+ba sha rnaM mra ma zad ni zlang bram / mahA pa shA ts+tshaka~M dz+wa la dza la dam ba/ hU~M ga tsa sa
45a6(rnying rgyud): s+yub+ha ya nan nan/ d+hAnA nu d+h+ya d+ha nAn/ sa mu ka na la seM / rmipra ta mA ra yA oMt+ma/ rba ye kAr thA ka la sa tsug dri ma la sang/ a ni sra phre kyi/ gling sa ra/ mam mtshang ba gemag ma gram bus u par tsal dz+ha na
45a7(rnying rgyud): ga dzas khrel ma lam/ sams pa sler rnyen d+hAT+Tan+tu/ nyel nyel/ matamaH/ thathun pardzun/ bca // dang / oMn+naHT+Ta/ gan tan/ bral thal/ gtasaH/ d+ha d+har/ dr-i ti rbeta ma mas ma pa
45b1(rnying rgyud): sa / sa / / sanas sa nas gas na N+Dal ldaldanan na/ na/ nan/ gam ldan nga/ zug
45b2(rnying rgyud): rgya na yi pa nas/ dzun dun/ napa sa// deg brdzags pa'i jas du / ci na gtu bams// gang ya sa sa brdzur phrog/ sa
45b3(rnying rgyud): byas bang ci 'das pargya ba'i rgyud pas/ yina'i brang badrag pa'i sna ma rnam brjod pa'i ba skya bcuganyis pa 'aM/ de nas dbang gi rgyal pad+ma bzhin gshegs pa thams ca ci gsung gi bdag nyid can pa des
45b4(rnying rgyud): la mkhor rnams la gsung gis chen pos rab tug par mdzad de/ bka' stsal pa/ kyem 'ongs pa'i dus phyim/ snyigs ma'i dus rab tu snyigs mar gyur pa ni/ rigs kyi zlagang dgang dang pa'i bdag pa snang ba mtha' las dang / stan sa
45b5(rnying rgyud): gzinas dang rkyen la sogs pa/ pad+ma'i rigs 'chang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dra pa' chen pa rnams ladad pa dang 'drung ma dang mos pa dang gsol par byed pa de dag pa ni/ bdag cag rnams kyi cho dastobs dang /
45b6(rnying rgyud): nga d+hA / grags pa dang song ste spyo dang / yon tan tshigs dag myung la ba byed // gzhan yang ba'i sgra dang / gas thugs kyi can nyid yang dag par yongs su shes par 'dad pa yon tan dgapa/ bded
45b7(rnying rgyud): byed rlon mangs spyod par nus pa dag gi ni/ ngadang ngas gsum du phyogs bcu dgan 'tsha zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs sanyes par byas shing gnyis su med par bsgrub pa yin no/ nga'i tshu 'di lta bu 'dim ni/
46a1(rnying rgyud): gang zag dbang po dman pa dang // blo rung ba dang / shes rab rtul ba dang / yid mi gzhung ba dang / blang ba dang dor bar spyod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang / log par blta ba can dang / sprul ba rung zhing gyos pa rnams
46a2(rnying rgyud): kyis gdung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / blta ba dang / bsrub pa dang / bstan pa dang / bshad pa dang / mnyan pa la sogs pa'i rngo mi thog shing dbang du mi 'gyur te/ rna lam du yang grags par mi 'gyur ro// de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpang sems
46a3(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po rig pa 'dzin pa rang bzhin thub pa dang / sa la spyod pa dang / tshe ring bar dbang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi zugs nye ba'i sras su gyur pa/ khyed rnams kyis yang dag par zung zhig longs shig chongs shig/ lkog cig/ sbubs shig gzhan dag la yang
46a4(rnying rgyud): cher rab tu nyon cig/ 'di ni nga'i bskrun pa bla na med pa/ gong na med pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ dpe med pa/ zla med pa/ mchog tu gyur ba/ rab dang ga tso po dang / phul dang dam par gyur ba ste/ rnyed par dka' zhing ngo mtshor ba 'di/ khyed rnams la
46a5(rnying rgyud): rjes du gtad kyis/ nga'i bsnyen pa 'di yal bar mdor byi // 'di rnams par 'gyur ta re/ zhes gsungs nas/ nyid kyi phreng gsung da thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i dkod pa rgya chen po de dag 'dir gyi tshul du slob mdzad de/ yang nyid kyi skragasung thugs rdo rje ra ba
46a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis na dpa'i tshong ba'i 'a nga tu smras nas/ rol pa chen po'i 'od kyi gyis khyab par ma dzud/ thabs kyang rjes kyi byings dngogs su med pa rgyas pati g.yo gabyed pa la rab chags par gyu to// dpal byung chen 'jas pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ ya
46a7(rnying rgyud): bdun pa nga gtad pa'i ba gang med na// bcom ldan 'das dang sa ma rdzugs // rgyan kyim 'a sa na pa 'dra ga nga nga/ tha~M sus rgya ma gagis 'i du ta na la
46b1(rnying rgyud): pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// gter rgya/ sras t+ya/ gtad rgya/ n+ya rtsa n+ya// / rgya gar skadang / su ga ta sarba karma samA dza kI la ya mA la tan+ta d+ha ma/ bod skad du/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las 'dus pa phu rab rtsa ba'i chud ces bya ba/ bcardza
46b2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zin las thams cad gdon mi za bar yang dag par grub pa khro bo thams cad kyi rgyal po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skang bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas gsang ba mchog gi dbyings/ phrin las rgya chen pa rnam par
46b3(rnying rgyud): rol par mdzad pa'i dur khrod chen po rab tu bskyod cing 'khrugs par byed pa'i rlung ldang nag 'bar ba/ phrag dog gi ye shes las grub par byed pa'i pho brang chen po na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las rdo rje sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i gzugs
46b4(rnying rgyud): can/ 'jig rten gsum rab tu sgrol bar mdzad pa de/ dbyings kyi yum chen mo 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma dang gnyis su med pa'i rol pa chen pos mnyam zhing dges par bzhugs pa la/ 'jig byed 'bar ba'i drag po'i phrin las yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i
46b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'di lta ste/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sras kyi mchog tu gyur pa/ bud+d+ha kI la ya dang / rat+na kI la ya dang / pad+ma kI la ya dang / karma kI la ya dang / bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi rgyal po r+g+haM kA ra dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / dbyug pa
