46b6(rnying rgyud): sngon po dang / gshin rje gshed po dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / rta mgrin can dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / 'dud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / stobs chen por gyur pa dang / gzhan yang rol pa'i yum chen mo wa 'byin ma dang /
46b7(rnying rgyud): snyems ma dang / sder mo dang / dur khrod kyi bdag mo dang / gtun khung ma dang / gtum mo chen mo dang / mda' snyems ma dang / rlung 'byin ma dang / gsod byed ma dang / spyod par byed ma dang / de dag thams cad kyang sprul pa dang / sprul pa'i yang sprul pa dang / sprul
47a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i pho nya dang / pho nya'i pho nya dag dang bcas pa rnams kyis mdun du bdar cing bskor te/ gzhan yang byas pa so so skye bo dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu dang / bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i bar du bzod cing sbyangs pa la
47a2(rnying rgyud): smon pas dka' baspyod par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis nye ba'i thugs mi thub cing 'dul ba'i skal ba dang mi ldan zhing / longs spyod thams cad rab tu rdzogs pa'i sgra khro ba dang / rab tu khro ba dang / 'jigs pa dang rab tu 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang
47a3(rnying rgyud): tubazhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi su'i rnam par 'phrul pa khro bo chen po drag shul can du snang bar mdzad kyang / thugs rab tu zhi ba thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i thugs gsang ba chen po las byung ba'i khro bo'i tshogs chen po rnams kyis nyid ci su'i
47a4(rnying rgyud): yon tan dkyil 'khor chen po rnam par dag pa'i gzhal med khang chen po dang bcas pa la rab tu khro zhing ngo mtshar ba'i sgo nas/ dga' ba chen po yang dag par 'khor rnams kyis masmin gcig gis mngon par bstod pa/ e ma ho// mtha' dang dbus med nam ma
47a5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin las// rlung nag rdo rje rgya gram gtams pa'i steng // khrag gi rgya mtshon rmong 'khrugs pa'i dkyil// keng rus chen po brtsegs pa'i ri rab steng // gser gyi sa gzhi zhing chen ti ras gtams// me ri sdug nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i grong // nam ma
47a6(rnying rgyud): mtha' dang mnyam rdzogs gzhal yas khang // rin chen 'bar ba thod pa gsum gyis brtsigs// lha klu nyi zla gza' skar srul gyis brgyan// ye shes tshad med gu chad sgo bzhi rdzogs// gyi nang me dpung rin chen 'od dang ldan// dreg pa'i bdag dang hrI zla
47a7(rnying rgyud): dbus// med pa'i rdu las yod par mngon nyung ba// bde gshegs dpal chen zin las rdzogs pa'i sku// dbug sum cig tu // zhabs bzhi rgya 'phrums pas// g.yas ci zhal gdong dka bang bstan pa ni// bde chen longs spyod rdzogs skumathar byin cing /
47b1(rnying rgyud): dpar nag srul su'i 'gro don mdzad// yongs rdzogs sku dang dbus zhal mthing nag ni// skye med chos kyi sku la 'gyur ba med// ral pa gyen pardzes dbang drag dus gcig rdzogs// ye shes lnga bdag rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// spyan dgus sa dgu mi
47b2(rnying rgyud): dmigs dbyings la gzigs// sman drug rgyud drug nyon mongs 'khor bar 'dren// shangs nas stong gsum grol ba'i rlung nag 'byin// zhal gsum nyon mongs dug gsum dbyings su grol// rdo rje'i mche bas bdud bzhin nas gcod// le brgan ljags 'jil shes rang
47b3(rnying rgyud): mthor byin gsal// gsung gi dngos 'jig rten mthu chen dang // phyag drug phyag mtshan dang rtags yon tan ni// rdo rje rje dgusas dgu'i yon tan rdzogs// rje lngas rgyud lngartsa bcad rigs lngar sbyor// me dpung 'ab de bas nyon mongs dug lnga bsreg/ ban+d+ha rtse gsum
47b4(rnying rgyud): du gsum rtsad nas gcod // rdo rje'i phur pa srid gsum dbyings su 'debs// zhabs bzhi tshad med rnam bzhi'i phrin las mdzad// dpa' bo'i na bza' rgyan gyi che ba ni// glang chen ko rnon theg mchog stobs bcus bzod// stag gi sham thabs zin las sna tshogs mdzad//
47b5(rnying rgyud): chen ga yang gzhis thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dul// sbrul gyi chun pos dpa' chen gdug pa 'dul// thod pa'i phreng ba su gsum dang la gnas// don dam bcud ldan gzi brjid sa la dgod// rak+Sha'i thig le chags med pad+ma'i spyan// thal chen mtshan mas sangs rgya
47b6(rnying rgyud): phrin la rdzogs// rdo rje'i gi shog pas ma lus zil gyis gnon// rin chen gshog pas dgos 'dod re ba bskrad// ye shes med phung rnam rtog bag chags bsreg/ gnyis med yum chen don dam dbyings su sbyor// yon tan mtha' yas kun gyis rab
47b7(rnying rgyud): brjen pa'i// phrin las rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// chos dbyings skye med dang las ma g.yos kyang // spu ma'i tshe 'phrul cing yang stoni mdzad pa// thugs rje'i thabs kyis gdug pa 'dral smad de// drag shul spyod pa'i phrin las sun kyi bdag/ don dam
48a1(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems las 'gyur med kyang // ting 'dzin longs spyod thabs nyis bgro don mdzad// zin rlabs phyag d+ha'i 'od zer 'gro 'dra'i klong // rang bzhin spros bral nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod pas slar yang rol pa chen por
48a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs shing sdang bar gyur to// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i chud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas yang 'khor chen po de rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di snyed ces gsol to// rtse ma
48a3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar rje// 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i// phrin las khyed mdzad kyi yi phyir// rdo rje gis ni ci phyir brjod// thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nas// gzhon nur grags pa ci zhig lags// dngos por snang ba'i chos nyid la/
48a4(rnying rgyud): khyad par phur pa ci'i phyir 'dzin// thugs rje zhi ba'i ngang nyid las// khro zhing 'jigs par ston mdzad cing // drag po'i rgyan bcas mdzad pa gang // gzhan yang khyed kyi sku gsung thugs// gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba// rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul la/
48a5(rnying rgyud): bdag cag the tshom skyes gyur te// ji ltar ji ltar mdzad pa yi// don de bdag la nges ston cig/ ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las mdzad par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
48a6(rnying rgyud): las kyi ngo bor bya zhengs te/ sgra dang gsung dang thugs kyi yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad sngon du 'gro bar mdzad nas/ nyid kyi gsung gi gsang ba chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las bsrub par nus pa'i yang dag pa'i snying po 'di sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsang ba las
48a7(rnying rgyud): phyung ngo // oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba baM dz+ra bo hUM phaT/ 'di phyung ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yo bar gyur te/ gang dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje zhi ba chen pos 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i dregs pa can rnams
48b1(rnying rgyud): kyang rab tu 'bar zhing spangs spag ste brgyal zhing sa la lhung nas shi ba'i dus la ma bab tsam du gyur pa la/ yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis de dag gi lus khyab par bkye nas/ thams cad kyang lus dang ngag dang yid bde ba dpag tu men
48b2(rnying rgyud): pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing / dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams zhi ba dang dul ba'i sems kyis gnas nas gsung rjes su bsrub pa'i bran bzhin las byed par khas blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
48b3(rnying rgyud): chen po 'dus pa de dag la bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tsho gas chen rnams// sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba'i// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa'i// dbang
48b4(rnying rgyud): dang byin rlabs 'dir gsal bas// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje yis// 'dus byas rdzasA las ma byung zhing // dus gsum kun tu 'dus ma byas// spros pa'i mtshan ma kun dang bral// gdod nas ma byad skye ba med// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i ngang // de ni sra
48b5(rnying rgyud): mkhregs rtsal shugs ldan// cis kyang mi shigs rdo rje'o// dper na pha lam rnon po bzhin// sus kyang gzhom par mi nus shing // stong nyid snying por ldan pa yis// go cha mchog gi rdo rje'o// dus gsum bzhugs pa ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye
48b6(rnying rgyud): shes sku// ngany+dzid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag skyed cig/ myur du sprul pas gzhon nu ste// ngal bgres rgud yongs mi mnga'// skad cig nyid las byung ba'o// oM shrI badz+ra ku mA ra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM
48b7(rnying rgyud): phaT/ thabs kyi shes rab yum dang sbyor// byang chub sems rgyun ye shes che// A~M hrI gtsal du lu ru lu sgo// gnyis med ye shes 'ong zer gyi// 'gro 'dugasal ba'i byin rlabs las// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// sring pa rdo rje 'grub par mdzod// sri
49a1(rnying rgyud): dang ba // ba ba ma na/ mya snrelA pA r+Nag/ las / la la d+hAl/ sog la pad+d+has/ yo g+hatA//
49a2(rnying rgyud): luShadz+ra/ oM badz+ra i khu ba mu ShI d+h+waM/ gardza karda hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta bi dza ya hUM/ oM badz+ra krodz+haiM k+ShaM saM ki hUM/ oM badz+ra b+hag+ma mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra gr-id+d+ha mu khI hrI/ hA na ha na hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ko ta nI la dAHhUM/ oM badz+ra kr-i trA~M ta na pa ti hUM/ oM badz+ra tsi mar mu khA tAM/
49a3(rnying rgyud): datad ha trA~M ra / A b+ha r+g+haM/ oM badz+ra ba~M d+d+hi thA shA na pa trA~MhU~M/ oM badz+ra NI su badz+ra/ oM bag+h+ri s+ye b+hag du dza~M dz+dza/ pa 9/ oM d+has byas tsal dz+raM/ oM badz+ra bo d+hi mus m-i/ oM badz+rId+ha k+She pra khA dz+ra/ oM badz+rA g+hA
49a4(rnying rgyud): \u0f7frA b+h+yaHhU~M phaT/ oM dz+ra go d+ha hA yar+m+ma badz+dza/ oM radz+ra oM hrIHts+tshi hU~M/ oM badz+ra bITA la mu Sha~M hUM/ oM badz+ra pan+d+ha ti mu Sh+Ti hU~M/ oM badz+ra pA tsa la mu khadz+dza/ hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha a pa ra tsiha~MH/ oM badz+raM gr-i tI satwA~M tidz+dza/ oM badz+dza
49a5(rnying rgyud): (dz+dza/ dz+ra pa d+hi ru shI tra~M/ Sh+T+rI hU~M Ta/ oM badz+ra bo d+ha mr-i ta kr-iN+Dali ts+tsha/ oM ba~Md+d+hakrod+d+hi sam+b+hi nga nA hU~M/ oM bar+d+ha sa~M ti mu~M khadz+dza/ oM badz+ra mr-i ti tI la mu ShI d+h+waM/ ts+tsha hU~M phaT+Ta/ oM badz+ra d+hi tri lo byabi dza ra hA/ oM badz+ra bo d+hI Sh+Tha
49a6(rnying rgyud): tAM/ oM badz+ran su la mu ShI trUM/ bid+d+hi Shit+ta hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta ma hA ba la hUM/ oM badz+ra gr-i d+hiHts+tshatrA~M/ oM badz+ra ra~Mk+Sha mu khe hU~M/ oM badz+ra pu She su~M Sh+Ti hU~M/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra yaSh+Ti Nin+da/ ang+ku sha dzaH/ oM badz+ra NI rang hUM/ pA
49a7(rnying rgyud): 'o// oM / ra~M k+Sha/ Aha~M/ rdo rje maH/ sa~M ha daHhU~M/ 'did srid pa'i tshul du byung // yab yum byeng chub sems pas brjid/ yig 'gro 'dra'i rkyen las gyur// rang las zung
49b1(rnying rgyud): dbyings su 'debs// srid pa'i phung bzhes su bshad// snang zhing gsal ba'i chos rnams kun// mjus 'di yis legs par btab// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// 'bru chub 'dus pas sur ba ste// kun rdzo ba rtags su yis bzung // don
49b2(rnying rgyud): tan tshogs chen las byung zhing // ma lus phrin las rdzogs mdzad phyir// phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas zhing // kun gyi mdzad pa rdzogs spyod cing // sems can khams kun yongs sgrol ba'i// 'jig byed khrob tu byung ba ni// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir
49b3(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// rdzogs bcu'i dregs pa gnon par mdzad// phyag drug dang po gnyis kyis ni// rdo rje dang ni thod khrag 'dzin// tha ma phur pa 'dril zhing sdom// hUM chen sngo skya mda' gzhu 'gengs// rnam rgyal 'khor lo tre shul dkar// dbyug sngon mo dab pa dbug po
49b4(rnying rgyud): 'phyar// gshin rje gshed ni mthingag ste// thod dbyug dang ni dpra sna 'dzin// mi g.yo ljang sngon ral gri zhags// rta mgrin zhags pa spu wi dmar// 'dod rgyal dmar s+ya b+han+ta yab// bdud rtsi ljang nag rgya gram dri la// khams rgyal skyil zhags rdo rje ma ti // stob
49b5(rnying rgyud): chen dud kha zo ba zhags// yum rnams yab kyi mdog ldan zhing // spa 'byin ma ni g.yas be con// snyems ma ral gri 'dzin par mdzad// rdo rje sder mo lcags kyu'o// dur khrod bdag mo thod dbyug 'dzin// gtun khung ma ni tho ba'o// rdo rje gtum mo spu gri 'dzin//
49b6(rnying rgyud): rje mda' skyems thob can// rlung 'byin ma ni dgra sba'o// rdo rje gsod byed mgri gug/ srul byed rdo rje rtse gsume 'dzin// phyag g.yon rnams ni thod khrag stob// yab yum 'di dag thams cad kyis// srid pa'i phur pa spros pa las// rang gi sku mdog dang
49b7(rnying rgyud): mthun pa'i// zhal gcig phyag gnyis lham dral tshul// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyogs gnas shing // yab yum phyag mtshan so sor 'dzin// g.yon gyis mtshon byed phur pa 'dzin// sngon gyi dngul gzhi las byung ba'i// so so'i gdong gi khyad par ni// swAzhwa
50a1(rnying rgyud): byargo bya rog g.yang // sha ba zhug pa gzig dang rnga// bIl pu shung sbyang kI wa// seng ge ga wang sre mo dom// phag dang thrig bu bri badred// rim bzhin du ni dang gnas blta// phyogs bzhir pu shud th+ya ka dang // sinar+tha kha yi ga
50a2(rnying rgyud): can rnams// kha dog dkar ser dmar dang ldang // lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// rim bzhin g.yas bsnams g.yon phur bu// nye ba'i sras mchog phur bu ni// bde gshegs rin chen pad+ma las// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgradang/
50a3(rnying rgyud): dkar ser dmar dang rdzo ba'i zhal// khyad par bud+d+ha kI la ya// zhal gsum mthing dmar dbus dkar zhal// phyag drug rdo rje chu zhags g.yas// g.yon na dgra s+pha ral gri'o// sras mchog rat+na kI la ya// zhal gsum dkar dmar dbus ser zhal/
50a4(rnying rgyud): du
50a5(rnying rgyud): dpa' brjed dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// phyi rol dngos po'i chos rnams kun// gzugs su snang dang spa ru zag/ dran dang bsam dang rtog dpyod tshogs// 'di dag rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// 'di dag nyid kyang de dag ste// chos nyid khyab pa'i phur ba'o// de
50a6(rnying rgyud): nyid thabs kyi shes 'byung zhing // shes rab nyid kyang de yi thabs// don dam gnyis med phur ba ste// kun gyi dam pa 'di zung zhig/ rtog pa'i 'ching bas 'ching byed cing // grol ba yang ni de nyid do// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang chen 'di// rtogs pa dang
50b1(rnying rgyud): shes bya'i yul// khyod kyis the tshom ma bskyed cig/ ces gsungs so// phrin las 'dus brtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku yongs su rdzogs pa phrin las rtsa ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yi// dam pa'i dgongs
50b2(rnying rgyud): pa 'di bshad do// ngo bo rig pa byang chub sems// kun gyi sa la ma lus 'debs// chos nyid ye shes gnyis su med// chos can kun la gdab par bya// de nyid rtogs pa'i ye shes ni// chos nyid mnyam pa nyid du'o// ma lus mkhyen pa de yis ni//
50b3(rnying rgyud): cad de bzhin no// rnam rtog tshogs la chos lus gdab// yid kyi rnam shes ldan pa'i lha// kun rdzob sdod btsud snang la gdab// thugs rje chen po thabs kyi mchog/ ma lus sems can khams la'o// mtshon byed rdzas kyi gnod par 'jams//
50b4(rnying rgyud): btags pa'i ming tsam mo// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med// spros med gsal lnga phyogs dang bral// chos dbyings rig pa'i ye shes te// ste 'gag med pa'i grong du'o// snang zhing srid pa de yi yul// gnyis med sems su rtogs pa thabs/
50b5(rnying rgyud): de nyid 'chang zhing stong // mthong yod sems las ma 'das par// de nyid kyi ni yon tan yin// dkar dmar sdang ba byang chub sems// mnyam nyid yum gyi mkha' la btab// thabs dang shes rang gnyis su med// skye 'gro rigs kyi rjes su phu // mdor gyur
50b6(rnying rgyud): long sa sbyor rdzogs pa'i sku// 'gyur med gsal ba 'bras bu yin// snying rjes sems can blos mi 'dod// ma dag sdug bsngal spyad phyir gdab// chud drug yul te tshad med bzhi// dag pa'i go 'phang snang bar byed// 'khor ba'i gdis ngan ldar ba yid/
50b7(rnying rgyud): de nyid rtogs bskul pa'i sra/ 'og min bde chen ldan grub gnas// chu da ngag chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa// de yi bdag po de 'dir gnas// bsgom bya rnam par rtog pa'i lha// snang zhing nges bskul pa'i tshogs// zhi rgyas dbang drag bye brag gis// pa yi
51a1(rnying rgyud): stobs padu mi dajig sa rigs pa ni// zhes pa dang 'dun/
51a2(rnying rgyud): 'jal la/ nas tu na pa gyugs// rgyu spya pa drus // cad phyul// gas gapas kyis kla smra/ sa gyu// gdus ga ma thang ma
51a3(rnying rgyud): bal dzags// gang 'ad pas pa rgyang bar du// gyis pa ba bya'i gas nga tid// tshigs dbus de stsal ba shesam// bad pa da nga ba bcad// rig ba ba 'i// gas 'i thugs kyis TIgs brgyugs/
51a4(rnying rgyud): bdag gas pa'o// shi pa dang // nag / ba ning rjor// 'ad migs pa pa 'i sa te/ rang ga' // san ba/ gdag pa /

51a8(rnying rgyud): bskyed par 'ang bye ga ma sa/ 'arnaM kyi la ma// rimi pa skye sa su na// de sa zhig yang sa nas// nga gi rgyag srinanapa des/ mam
51b1(rnying rgyud): phyog kyi mchog// gang la dmigs pa de ldan zhing // re dang dgas pa'i sems spangs te// brtul pod drag pos 'dug par bya// rtsi nang bsrung ba 'ab pas brtsam// rnal 'byor chog yong snga rdzogs nas// num mkha' spangs pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/
51b2(rnying rgyud): oM mahA pra dzAka dz+nyAn pa ngas thal A t+ka na/ chos rnams de nyid yin mod kyang // sdug bsngal spyod la thugs rje bskyed// oM ma~M hA d+hamad+hA trA swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&H/ 'dus srungs rtags kyi gnyen po ste// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// mtshon chen
51b3(rnying rgyud): po 'bar lta bu// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shad// 'bar bas rmyi rtog yi ga~M hUM// rtog pa bskal pa gsum gyis sbyangs// ye shes 'byung ba yum gyi mkha'// rnam dag dbyings las shar ba'i hU~M// phrin las yongs gyur gzhal med khang /
51b4(rnying rgyud): rang lus rdzogs pa 'di nyid de// mtshon chen rdo rje hUM sngon po// lus kyi sgo bcur shar ba dang // 'phro 'du gsal ba'i phyag rgya yis// ye shes sems dpa' yab yum gnyis// snying ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya// mdun rgyab g.yas g.yon gnas
51b5(rnying rgyud): bzhi na// rigs kyi sras bzhi bsam pa'o// spyi gtsug hUM mdzad yab yum ste// dpral bar rnam par rgyal ba'o// mgrin par rta yi mgrin can dang // snying gar bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsgom// lte bar gshin rje gshed po ste// gsang ba'i gnas
51b6(rnying rgyud): suM stobs po che// dbang pa g.yas su dbyung / son tsam/ gau yon bas pa / nga man rgyal mo// rkang bgralas pa m-i gas ba// g.yon la gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// yan lag mthil bzhi rnam pa'i// ba sde'i bug thams cad kyang //
51b7(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba rdo rjer bsgom// phung po rdo rjes gtams byas nas// steng 'og gnas gsum sde gsung thugs// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rje ldan pa'i// rnam par shes po rdo rjer bsgom// sdig drug ye shes rdzun sbyar bas// dris bsal bar rig chen lnga// ma
52a1(rnying rgyud): mang byang chub sams kyi d+han// mgrin par babs pas dngos por 'dzin// bsal ba'i 'bras bu sngang mtha' yas// ye shes 'khor lo lta gang 'gyur// bdag la rnam pas bad bar gyung// shes rab ma shas gsal ba
52a2(rnying rgyud): dbang // gnyis med dri ma ngas dbang bzhi rdzogs// ting rjes bskal ba'i dam chog ni// ma lus mdzad pas kun drangs te// rgyal ba'i sras su bya ba las// gsad cing gnan par ma yin te// 'gro 'du las la kun sbyor bus// 'di ni bsnyen
52a3(rnying rgyud): gsol btab dbang ba sgyung brdzogs nas// 'di dbyings gras gnas byin parlabs shing // many+dzus mdang bskul ba'i 'ang phung las// 'gro 'drilas kyi gsal ba shu pa d+h+ye/ DU bya
52a4(rnying rgyud): r+d+hat+ma ts+tshin+ma tsAd+ho/ hahaM ha nye ha he he he ha haM he he ha hi ha ha ha he he he/ dzaHhUM baM hoH// srid pa'i phung pa mngal skyes tshul// rang gi ming gi 'od kyi dbyings// slar 'dus so sa'i gdan yin te// brgya byin me lha ga shon rje dang // srid po klu dang rlung gi
52a5(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin dbang ldan pa bdag dang // tshangs pa nyi zla 'di rnams kun// rang gi ming nas byung ba'i steng // 'khor bcas rdzogs pa'i lus su blta// bdag nyid gus pang/ dam tshig gi// snying ga'i 'od 'bar ni sngon las// srid pa'i phur bu bsrub pa dang /
52a6(rnying rgyud): dang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang // mthun pa'i gzugs la rab tu dba'// oM badz+ra ku mA ra kI li kI la ya g+ha na tsakra e A ra i hrIs ma ya tit+ta lhan/ \u0f7fhUM baM hoH// srid gsum gajug pa bsngal
52a7(rnying rgyud): ba dang // nga rgyal bdud rnams gzhom pa yi// dpa' ro rdo rje 'khor bcas la// rtse gcig yod dang lus kyis 'dud// thun mong dang ni khyad par gyis// khyad par gsang ba'i mchod pa yis// mnyes mdzad byin gyis brlang ba'o// oM AHhU~M brjod pa/
52b1(rnying rgyud): tu / na / na na/ na rgyu na
52b2(rnying rgyud): ma la ta ma b+h+ya ma ga ny-i hi/ sa go na pas / ga/ ga / man+ta ba ni oM s+yai m+b+ha ga ga tA mA~M \u0f7f/ oM many+dzu gi dpa ma ga tes rbag ga k+ke hU~M/ mahA nyag ta ru ra gag pa9/
52b3(rnying rgyud): ti 'dzin ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan d+hi nA mA yi// bta brjing gsel ba nyid du bya// khro ba kho mo rnams bzhugs pa'o// sngon gyi thugs de ma chen po ni// rtag dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // kI le ya yi dngos grub rtsol// su gsung thug kyi byed nga
52b4(rnying rgyud): gyis// bdag la byin gyis brlabs midzad cing // bdag gi rtag pa'i bsam pa rnams// 'grub par byin gyis brlab pa'o// bsgril zhing rgyan yang bsgril ba la// sems kyi chos la sku mi mnga'// grwa las 'das pa'i sbyong ba skye// bas
52b5(rnying rgyud): bral ba'i ye shes so// srid gsum 'joms mdzad mnyam nyid dang // khro bo rdo rje 'du 'phro mdzad// khro bo 'gro don mdzad phyag 'tshal// dgug cing bsdam dbab phyag rgya yis// nam mkha'i khams dang gnyis med sbyor// de nyid bdud rtsi
52b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i mchod// sngags lnga btsun pa'i rnal 'byor nges// bdag gzhan don gyi bzlas pa brtsam// sngags 'od yum gyi zhal sgor zhugs// sdig bral dbu ma'i nang brgyud de// dbyings nas gsang ba'i lam la thim// ni nyid dbyangs nas rna las
52b7(rnying rgyud): bskul// lu gru brgyad kyis brjod par bya// rten 'brel lugs las bzlog pa'o// mtshan me byung ba'i bzlas pa ni// gtso chen yab yu mthugs bskul bas// chos sku spyan drangs zhal du thim// dbu ma'i nang brgyud padrang babs// 'gro masra
53a1(rnying rgyud): mchog 'dus kun rdzogs// kI la ya yi sa ngas byung ste// gtso dang mthun pa'i sku mdog la// sgra slad DUr gsum sku gsung thugs// rgyan ldan 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs// ye shes rnga snod 'dra bab// rgya
53a2(rnying rgyud): gsang de nyid kyis// mnyes pa'i cho ga tshul bzhin bya// 'bru nag dug khrag bdud rtsi yis// dbang byin brlabs te las la mngag/ snying dbus sa bon las sngags sgo// tshul 'dra'i gzugs la nges par bstim// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba
53a3(rnying rgyud): hU~M ba~M hU~M phaT/ ldeg 'bar 'od dang zla 'a byin dang // bzang po ma mthod par smra'o// myo du bathun mtshams bya ba'i dus// 'di ni sgrub pa zla med pa'o// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa bstan pa rtsa ba'i le'u nying
53a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan khro rgyal gyis// nyid kyi sku yi dpa' bo'i chas// yon tan khyad par 'di bshad do// glang chen ko rlon theg chen stobs// dpa' gtumi za byed stag gi rgyar// mnyen lhag 'khril yum sbrul gyis
53a5(rnying rgyud): brgyan// byang chub sems lhan tsarma ste// zong phreng gsum ni sku gsung thugs// thugs rje chags pa rak+ta'i gyen// gdul bya'i phrin las thal chen po// zhag gi ri mo don dam bzung // rgyu yis mtshon nas don drug ldan// glang chen gyis stobs
53a6(rnying rgyud): ches rgyab yang // lus rags rin thang tshe 'gyur zhing // khro ma btags gzhan gyi dpung 'joms nus// theg chen 'dir ni lam kun shongs// dge dang mi dge mnyam par 'degs/ mtshams med las sogs byas pa'ang shongs// nyon mongs 'dod yon
53a7(rnying rgyud): ma spangs 'grub// lam 'di yon tan dpag tu med// ma rig zag pa myur du 'joms// stag lpags mdzes shing dpal 'bar 'dzin// rtsal ldan sha rus mi 'byed za// ri dwags chen po'i gnyen por 'gyur// gcan gzan phra mo zil gyis gnon// dug lnga rig
53b1(rnying rgyud): lngar shas pas dpa'// rkyen mongs pa shas thub pas mangs// hwags ngas dbya bsrang yangs ma ma dang// brag chags skrag pa d+mas gcag 'arnams// rdzogs pa rnarda gnyen por 'gyur// dman pa rtsod pa zil gyis gnon// rdul rigs brda
53b2(rnying rgyud): pa gdugs che// mnyen zhing lkug la dri ma 'gyur// kha dog gsal zhing du mer snang // spyod pa 'di nyid spangs shing 'jigs// nyid la 'arjid cing gzhan la gdug/ rang gzhan don la 'dud cing mnyen// 'bras bu'i khyad par gas pa zhi mthong /
53b3(rnying rgyud): tshedang lam 'bras bu// gang zag blol sna tshogs ston// dug gsum lam gyisA log lta 'dul/ thugs rje zin pa dman mi gtogs// zhing lpags mthong 'jigs tshil khrag chu ser basbyar bcas// grang mnyen rlung skyob yan lag tshad // 'di ni zab
53b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i stod blangs pas// ngan pa'i blta ba 'jigs pa bskyed// dman la mos pa'i yid skrag 'gyur// gnas dang 'pho dang zhi ba dang // khro brtan thugs bskrad bsdus dang gtor// rgyas zhum 'pham rgyal dbang du bya// rdo rje'i theg mchog 'di la gnas/
53b5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa dang ni nges pa dang // skra tsam sgra min dgongs pa dang // zol byung dang ni yi ge dang // spyi dang gab sbas brda dang thabs// bla ma mnyes la drang zhing mnyen// las kyi rlung dang g.yul ngo bzlog/ gzhi lam 'bras bu lta spyod dang // dam tshig kyin
53b6(rnying rgyud): rlob yan lag tshang // skam rlon ra ri dbang po tshang // rigs ldan pa dang zlum pa dang // smos pa nyer ni chos kyi sku// dus gsum dgongs pa tshang zhing gtsang // longs spyod rdzogs snga rol pa sla// dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la go nang // khyim na spyod pa
53b7(rnying rgyud): lugs 'dzin// gzhan don sprul pa drug la sogs// sku gdung ring bsrel lhag mar bcas// rigs dang pha ma gnyen 'dun dang // 'khor dang bstan pa gnas pa'i tshad// phyir mi ldog dang rtse ba gcig/ thogs pa tsam dang srid mtha' ma// mngon po rgya chung
54a1(rnying rgyud): sa na/ ya nga ba pa bas// nga na gas/ rnas 'a shas/ rjopa sa sa gas/ sa ga // 'a da jug pa dag la/
54a2(rnying rgyud): dgadong dayang drug pang// rjes bgos sa gyur ba nas// yid rigs sug sung chags she ba na/ ba gas pa pa ga dang / ba gas ga gdas don phyin kyis rgya/ ba zhi ga da shes kyis/ tha ga
54a3(rnying rgyud): ngas/ ga pa la bye// lhag pa rgya bdan dang // dag shing ga la shA tot+te / khying sa sa drid pa sa da// grog pa'i mun pa bzlas ma// be shes snang ba tshogs kyi bskyed// drag ngos las sogs myur du 'dul// khams dang pag la N+Dal bdang /
54a4(rnying rgyud): ji ltar 'tshams pa de bzhin ston// nges 'byung skal ba yod pa yis// rnam grol gro 'i phang myur 'thob byed// bag chags cung zad mi gnas par// 'byin pa'i don de nye bar gnas// bcud mchog snum zhun rig pa mnyen// 'gru ba'i nad sel
54a5(rnying rgyud): bas pa mi rus// dri dang kha dog rab gsal bzhin// rdo rje theg mchog gya nom pa// rig pa can gyi gnyen por 'gyur// nyon mongs lnga dang drug nyid kyis// yan lag nang du gyur pa sel// grangs med bar du chud mi za// blo ngan shes rab chung ba yis//
54a6(rnying rgyud): 'di la nges 'byung skal med de// dus la bab nasar gnas byed// 'di dag rdzogs kyir rab tu bcan// gzhan yang ba mi bstan pa 'dis// rdo rje'i theg pa de ldan zhing // khong chud pa'i mthu mnga' bas// glang chen ko rno nu rab tu bgos// rgol
54a7(rnying rgyud): mthun par tshar gcad phyir// stag gi sham du dkris pa'o// lto 'phye'i dug 'joms thul gyis brgyan// sems gnyis mi 'gyur tsarba'o// sku gsum bang gi thod phreng brkus// zhi ba'i ting rjes ma gnas chags// gzhan don gzigs paraH'o//
54b1(rnying rgyud): gang dulal byad thul can tA// kun gyi se mas rtogs bdud kyis bgyur// gzhan yang ga ti mug 'dod zags dang // sna nga dag/ chags phrag dag dang // sar srung na la ma btags rgyud// dbang byad rim bden rtags kyis brgyan// 'jig tan
54b2(rnying rgyud): phri las tsho ba med pa 'angs// drugs padu da la ba / yang yang gyi dag zugs// mi la 'dus can po ga ga // man las gra pa ldan pa/ bskal ba'i phags pa na tha~M nga // gnag
54b3(rnying rgyud): brkyen// zang mong khyad par phyi dang rung // rtags kyi don mtshon tsam nyid de// don dmangs pa yul dang dngos// de la bya dang byed pa med// gtsu pa zhing khro bas 'dul ba la// rang gi snang bsangs na sa mthu// zhes gsungs so// phyin las 'dras pa
54b4(rnying rgyud): pas/ dur khrod chen po'i nas rgyun gyi rtags dang yon tan gyi li m+b+ha lA pa'o// / de nas zla ba'i rgyal po las// mngon spyod las kyi rim pa lus// mchod sbyin drag po 'de gzungasas// rnab dkyil la'i nyid kyi drung /
54b5(rnying rgyud): gsus 'ugang rgya dang dbangs// mur na mo dag sum thar bstod de// khrag sa yid rgyas nyi dang // gcod pa'i 'khyor bats+tshabs pa ni thA// pang dang mtshan ma dbyings su gong// phyi la skyes mchog cig patshur ro// sras tshangs sgo can dag gi/ 'od na
54b6(rnying rgyud): tha rings nag dang // rnga bong bong gA'i bdud rtsi thugs// 'bru nag/ me tog nag po dgram// tsha zhing rtsub la rno ba'i shing // maM yi dbyibs su brtseg par bya// drug shing gis 'i phyogs mtshams bskor// 'phan gdu rgyal mtshan pa du
54b7(rnying rgyud): bdad dgi kha'i dag pas na// ming nyis mau pa ma dzan// rjeg zag 'phru mang dag pa ba sa// zla gra khrag dang yi da/ rnam par sa da// kyang dag ga // pa kyi med rtsod //
55a1(rnying rgyud): snunan// / ga// ga da
55a2(rnying rgyud): da ga nyis nga/ da phyug na kyis kyi sa ma /
55a3(rnying rgyud): rang gi sngags pacwasangs kyi zla// g.yas kyi phyogs cu ga dag pa \u0f7f// dzas gzhanarnams ni g.yo phyogs / pa nyid labasam pa'i dngos// a yis na pa kyi 'khor dbyu // steng du sa ma ga nga 'o las/ @
55a4(rnying rgyud): ba// se pan n+ya yis mgon par bsgom// las kyi sgo stong bad+mo 'dra yis/ gtso tshon rdo rje chad ba // slang bshad rtags dang ldan par bya// rigs kyi bdag pas dbu mdzad cing // rang gi sems dpa'i phyi la gnas// gas dang ga
55a5(rnying rgyud): sa ni// dkris pa'i yum nyid tshu la bzhinang dang // de nyi dbyings kyi gnas mchog tu// seng gis pon rig tAM/ oM dang bapra ba mngonags pa byas// tshul 'dra'i ye shes dkyil 'khor bdag/ gnas dngas cang du 'bong par/
55a6(rnying rgyud): mchog dang // ji snyed pa yi 'khor rnams nyid// gtso bo dang mthun rigs kyis dbyung // las la 'bad pa'i tshogs kyang bzhig/ snying na rdo rje rnam bsams nas// lag pa rdo rje bcu mdzad de// dgug gzhag bcing dang dbang dubya
55a7(rnying rgyud): 'os kyi phyag rgya ba 'ang // rgyas gang ba phyag rgya chen po'o// gad na ba nyeb pa dang 'dud pa dang // mchod bstod mnyes bya sgo tshig dbul// de nas me lha mdog nag po// padz+ra nag po la 'dug cing // khros par tshug can bskyed par bya// da
55b1(rnying rgyud): samangs khrod nas// blangs par pa ladrag par 'byud// g.yan pas bdud rtsa bas btar \u0f7f// sman drang pa dang bgasus bsgrad dang // bsrung dang phyogs bcang nges par bya/ kyad pas brngub par ba rngan pa// dam tshog gas pang bdang
55b2(rnying rgyud): dngaH/ mcho na dri bas// nag po'i cha lugs 'dzin pa mnyes// lce gzang kha pa rang sngags bsam// g.yon gyis blag pa'i gzang bu bzung // bdud rtsi gadrug pa'i ba gyu te// shin byegadangs pa'i rnapa na// ba
55b3(rnying rgyud): shA cag N+Di dang // oM badz+ras na me brdzi ma hA bu dza sarba b+ha s+yai ku d+ha sarba shuta trUM phaT// mnyes shing bgegs paskad dngos phrab gsol// mchod pa sreg rdzas gzhan rnams kyang dan la// dngang ba dang rmyi dzI ba rtog/ de nas rigs kyi pa
55b4(rnying rgyud): ting// sung bcas pa'i rjes kyi gsad // khrug 'thung khro ba 'khor dang bcas// 'brar ba'i dbus su dngas byas te// skar bshad tshogs mnyes par bya// kye yi bus dang thug ga rdar 'thil// chos kyi lag 'bar bar bas pa/ yong
55b5(rnying rgyud): hA paM pA la yas ma ye ma d+han \u0f7fk+Sha ma d+hi ra~M raM khaM ba nyaM khA hi/ dgang blag kyis ni dang po ru// drag dang bsgru ba'i 'bu mar dbul// de nas rdzas kun rnams ca dang // tha mar drug dang 'ja ma mA/ brkya ma stor du dbul bar \u0f7f/
55b6(rnying rgyud): lha rnams ring / sngags kyi phreng ba dag gis s+ho// de nas rjes ku gcig bsdus te// drug dang kha ba'i 'brumar la// dmigs pa'i gzugs bcas gzug cing dag/ mtha zung nas brnam mdzin gyis gtub// gco nas brtsamar ri
55b7(rnying rgyud): e pre ka mA ra ya // bka' las 'da' ba'i sdig can rnams// rdo rje mi dpang stong bsreg nas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rdzog/ gang la dmigs pa gtan nas 'jo// snga zhing srid pa 'di rnams kun// 'ab chub gcig tu 'bang
56a1(rnying rgyud): mdag tshangs par gsol nas ni// gca pa rnams dang me lha gshegs// rtsa ba las byung rang la bas/ Ar yang rjem mthun ral pa ston// bam dang gnas du'i sbyor ba brtsam// zhes gas // smin pas 'das pa
56a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyud las/ sbyin sreg mchod pa'i phrin las kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// rig pa chen po 'di gsungs so// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas nyid du// rgyan dgod pa dang bsrung bya ste// srid pa'i gur pa bslab
56a3(rnying rgyud): byas shing // khyad par dmigs pa nyid la gzhug/ phreng ba drag pos sras mchog sgo// dmigs pa dgug bstim snying nas gzir// srog rtsa zod rlon la sogs rtags// rmi dang mngon sum nyams la rtags// ma byung bar du ba las bslab// dus mtshungs
56a4(rnying rgyud): gsal ba gsum gyis brdeg/ snying gar nyi ma dbang chen gyi// 'od dmar thugs las khams gsum 'phro// khru ba khrag gi rgya mtsho ste// khro bas de rngub shin tu khros// khams gsum yongs sgrol mchod pa'o// rang gis gzhibs pas bkrag mdangs
56a5(rnying rgyud): bskyed// drag po'i las la 'jug par nus// gnas nas dgug par bya ba ni// sngags bzlas 'od zer drag po las// stong gsum gang ba'i khro bo'i tshogs// yul de dgug cing snyim par byed// sngon du bshad pa'i chos rnams kyis// dam tshig
56a6(rnying rgyud): po'i dus la bab// kun gyi sbyor ba'i byin rlabs sprul// sbrul pa chen po'i dus la bab// de dag bka' sdong po nyam// phyag brnyan chen mo'i dus la bab// ji ltar nos shing khas blangs pa// khyod kyi mtshog dus la bab// dang po dam pa den gyi phyir/
56a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub mchog gi sems bskyed cing// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob par// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams pa ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang // dngos gru 'phrog cing 'tsho ba rnams// khro ba chen por
56b1(rnying rgyud): byin rlabs kyis// yud cig gis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang // lus dag rdul du bshigs nas kyang // sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// pho nya 'jig rten rab gang bas// gdug pa kun bstim las kun byeng //
56b2(rnying rgyud): kI li kI la ya dzaHhUM baM hoH// 'dren pa'i snying po 'di yis ni// yud tsam de nyid gnas su dgug/ oM badz+ra k+Shi pi kI la ya hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ badz+ra ging ka ra hUM hUM a A/ rlung gis shing po bskyod bzhin du// dbang sdud zil gyis gnon
56b3(rnying rgyud): dz+ra ku mar b+hud+d+ha he ru ko rat+na he ru ka pad+ma he ru ka kI li kI la ya hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ de yis ri rab bzhin du 'gyur// g.yo 'gul dran pa med par byed// de nas kha sbyar rab tu dge// gzhan bsrung ba la dbye ba ni// brnag pas thun bzhi
56b4(rnying rgyud): dros par 'gyur// de nas gzugs la bsdu ba ni// dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// lha'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings// rdegs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// oM a pa ra bi d+h+wan+da tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT/
56b5(rnying rgyud): b+hin d+ha b+hi na d+ha hUM phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M phaT/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ ta tha ya ta tha ya hUM phaT/ phur pa dang ni 'bru thun brdeg/ ha sa ya ra na da ha na hUM phaT/ khrag dug sbyar ba'i thun gyis brdeg/ shri kri A na ya hUM phaT/ dud pa dang ni thal bas
56b6(rnying rgyud): bajig/ dzal pa ya dza la pa ya hUM phaT/ mtshon cha drag pos gtub par bya// A be sha ya A be sha ya hUM phaT/ bi da ya bi da ya hUM phaT/ 'di yis dbab cing dbang du spus// byin gyis brlab par bya ba ni// thugs ka'i hUM gi spro bsdu las// gdul bya'i snying
56b7(rnying rgyud): la khro bo thugs// gong ma'i gnas bskul skyo bas phyung // nyes pa'i tshogs bshad bdag nyid khros// snying rtsa bcad cing bdag la bsdus// de ni de yi dbye ba'o// thog ma'i dus na gnas dbye ba// kyo ba 'dzin mdzad khro bo spros// de nyid gnas bcu dag nas da
57a1(rnying rgyud): gzugs la bsdu ba'i gnas yin no// gdab pa'i gnas ni 'du byed kyis// lag pa yum bzhir byin brlabs nas// rnam dag skye med yi ge yis// snang ba gsum nyid gsal bar blta'o// chu gsum ldan pa'i dbyings su
57a2(rnying rgyud): byang chu mas kyi chu chun no// oM badz+ra ku mA rA kA li kI la ya hrId+hIH/ a A/ sras mchog N+DI mdzad la sogs gdab// de yis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khyab// gnas ngan sbyangs la smyung la bkra// kun gyi mthu dang gzi byen pa skyer// byin gyis 'du
57a3(rnying rgyud): dngos su bstsal// tshe dang bkru ba'i las yin no// phaT gyis rab mtshan sras kyi mchog/ 'bru dgu'i rjes la gzem sber// dngos bcom dbus su 'dus pa yang // sa bon drug la 'od kyis btab// 'bras bu pho nyar bcas pa dbang // phur pa gsang ba
57a4(rnying rgyud): gnas bu d+hi ma// khyad par las su rab bshad do// bdag nyid sras dang dmigs pa rnams// gsal ba gsum ldan byin brlabs te// yo na gdape cir bskul ba ni// bran dang bka' nyan mo nye'i tshogs// khyod kyi dam tshig rus la bab// rngon
57a5(rnying rgyud): daji bzhin dam bcas pa'i// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// de yi snying pos gnas bcur gdab// han ha na badz+ra/ da ha da ha badz+ra/ pa co pa tsa badz+ra/ maM tha ma tha badz+ra/ dz+wa la dz+wA la badz+ra/ su ru su ra badz+ra/ mu ru mu ru badz+ra/ gteg ye badz+ra/
57a6(rnying rgyud): dza nyaM u pa dz+ra ta badz+ra/ mAr sin pra man ni hU~M phaT/ 'khor tshogs kun yang sngags kyis gdab// drag po'i rdzas dang phur pas brdeg/ khrag drung rnal te rul phyag bsam// bsad dang gso ba las kyi mchog/ ma lus gnas 'dir rdzogs par bya//
57a7(rnying rgyud): rgya che'i don yin no// zhes gsungs so// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gtan 'pho ba bskal ba'i phrin las kyi ledra ste bdun pa'o// / de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// drag shul bskal pa gsungs pa las// mtshon rnon gdug pas/
57b1(rnying rgyud): byin 'arlabs te// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'dang byed pa// stobs chen khro ba chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// zhes brjod yan la gting lag dang // khag pa don snying bcas pa dang // bcad ci gtub pa nyid du sa// de
57b2(rnying rgyud): nas mtshan sngags brjod pa ni// hU~M ma ma pa sha~M ku ru ma me ku ru ma stam hA/ id ma ku ru/ i daM d+ha d+hi ma ma ma shI g+h+raM/ karba kA ra ya hUM phaT/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hU~M phaT/ gzugs bla bsam pa 'dus pa yis// ma lus rdul phran bzhin du dmigs// de nas
57b3(rnying rgyud): lhag par gnas pa yi// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul 'phrog pa ni// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa yi// lha'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // bdag la bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par gyis// snying po 'di yang brjod par bya// sarba A na ya hU~M phaT/
57b4(rnying rgyud): tad+ya thA/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ pha rol mthu dang rdzu 'phrul 'phrog/ bdag la bstim pa de ldan bsam// bag chags sa bon phra ba yis// gal te lhag lus brdung ba ni// rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje thobs
57b5(rnying rgyud): brdung byes na// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur// kha rbaM kha thaM ha na ha na hUM phaT/ mung+ga ra mung+ga ra a ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ byin brlabs dbyings mchog gru gsum du// gsang 'byung rdo rje tho bas brdung // gnas sgro drag po gsum gyi las// rten dang brten pa'i
57b6(rnying rgyud): lha rnams kyis// hU~M hUM hUM/ sgra brjod de dag thugs ka nas// nam mkha' las sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor/ phaT phaT phaT/ de dag thugs khros drag shul gyi// badz+ra yak+ka kro d+ha hUM/ smrar yang thugs rje shin tu khros// lha mos thod bkang shA khrag stob//
57b7(rnying rgyud): kha kha khA hi khA hi/ phul ba zhal du gsol bar dmigs// ha ha hi hi mnyes par bsam// mthar phyin rdung ba'i phrin las so// rang bzhin khyad par bzlas pa yi// slar yang rim pas gso ba ni// chos nyid don dam bden pa dang // gsang sngags mthu yi byin rlabs
58a1(rnying rgyud): gyis// sangs rgyas stobs dang mi la grwa pa'i// rdzu 'phrul 'byin pa las yan na// a \u0f7fm+b+hal kA la ya sarba bak+Sha badz+ra laT// bdun rnam badra pa nyi shug cag/ ste dgur dras zhing btang pa las// zung po kham par
58a2(rnying rgyud): skye mched kun// lha dang lha mo'i tshogs su sprul// de dag sras kyi sku la 'dus// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bzlas// bdag nyid stong pa'i gnas su dril// slar 'dus sbyor ba ljon pas lhag/ rdzas dang bdag nyid gso ba yin// ngas bstan phung bzhin gnas
58a3(rnying rgyud): ni// yab yum sbyor ba'i sems phab pas// pha rol sems rgyud nam mkha' gdon// hUM phaT ces pa'i sgra yis ni// rang bzhin gnas la gsol ba gdab// dbang bskur bas ni 'od 'bar gyur// yab kyi zhal nas yum gyi mkhar/
58a4(rnying rgyud): las gyur gsal phaT kyis gdon// slar yang bsdu dang gtor ba yis// 'og min gnas la gsos gdab cing // dbang bskur 'od zhu hU~M du dmigs// phaT kyi sbyor bas lhums su 'phang // bsnyen pa dang ni nye bar bsten// bsgrub pa bsgrub pa chen pon
58a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pas slar bzhengs phyir byon nas// dbu rgyan ldan pas dbang bsgyur te// phaT kyis 'og min gnas su 'phang // tog dkar rgyal tshab dam pa yis// bcu gnyis mdzad pas 'gro don rdzogs// rdo rje'i gnas su lus sbyor ba'o// srod chad mdzenan
58a6(rnying rgyud): mtshon shi ba'i// thod rus nang du dmigs pa gzhug/ mi shis gnas su gnan pa ni// oM laM AHl-i hUM laM/ stam b+ha ya nan/ mo ha ya/ shrI kra b+hi kri/ badz+ra hUM ka ra hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ rdo rje ri rab 'phros pa yis// rab tu gnas pa'i sbyor ba
58a7(rnying rgyud): brtsam// ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par// gnas ngan bag chags yongs mi ldang // rdo rje can dang mtshungs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dreg shul mngon par spyod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
58b1(rnying rgyud): nga rgya' bangs// ngag shul rgyu kyakyang nga 'angan// mang ra du sdud pa 'phran las bshad// ngati da nga dang 'dra ba yis// 'khor banas sna chag drag pa las// rungag gnas bla' ba shing // baThar byag sul sanyas dngas bya 'brung/
58b2(rnying rgyud): badz+ra li kI la la d+had+hi ma ma kar+tha/ mA ra sa naM/ sra mdan ya/ sarba ba~M hUM phaT/ sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // kun gyA n+ya pa'i phrin las so// yab yum bzlas pa'i thugs kanas// mag le me lta bu'i rid thos pas// khro ba dkyi'i 'jo
58b3(rnying rgyud): gas pa// rkyod baphrul byin brla ba dbang bsur bya// A~M badz+ra kI la kI la yAd+ha d+hi ma ma karba/ a dzi ta a pa ra dza ta/ nga ya byA dza la kata ka ya mA rA sa ni/ pra yAn ni yes r+b+ba baM b+h+r-i da hU~M phaT// 'di ga 'an gyis mi thab cing // rngam par rgyal ba'i tha
58b4(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid khri do'i tshogs kun gyis// drug sngags sgra ni gnam lcags kyi// zhun mas la brdapa 'dra ba'i// 'od 'phros gdug pa tshar gcod byed// oM badz+ra kI li kI la yaM/ adzi ta a pa ra dzi tadza ya bai dza ya katang ka ye/ ma ma ba shaM ku ru ma
58b5(rnying rgyud): !1ra ma~M di/ d+he d+hi ma ma karma d+hA ra i dar hrIdz+nyA kA ra ya/ mA ra sa na sa mdza yesarba nga b+h+rU~M hUM phaT/ 'di yis ma lus gdug pa can// tshar gcod las su 'dzud par byed// 'jig rten 'das dang mya 'das kur// sog nas drangs pa bsrub pa che// bco
58b6(rnying rgyud): hr-i 'dus thams cad bskal// oM badz+ra bAM pa k+Shi la li bar bir+d+har+tha mA re sa na bri mdzan me d+hi phaT/ sarba big+h+nAM a rU ya ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ patsa paH/ bar d+ha banaH/ br-IHgr-it+ta/ ma thamatha/ hoH/ hrIHta/ ta thA ya ta thA ya/ tas ya dza dar/
58b7(rnying rgyud): Abe sha ya A be sha ya/ shaM kr-i An ya/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa la/ ta thA ya ta ShA pa~M/ bi ta ya ba ta ya/ sha~M dza kA ra ta ya/ dza yo badza ye/ ka taM ka ye// mdza ta sa pa ra dzi ta pa ya ba hU~M phaT/ 'di las 'jig rta dregs pa tsan// thams cad 'ang kyang pas
59a1(rnying rgyud): 'jo// phyogs pargya dra dang lha rnams kun// mthong nag pa smra dkyil 'ang // a r+d+hak+Shi la k+Sha la ya/ maN+Da Sh+yata la bar+d+ha nA pak+Shi pa ya d+hAk+ShA ba ldan la dAt+tA ya an+taka/ maHla ta pa bA ma/ a pa dza ta a mrata
59a2(rnying rgyud): lo kya 'i dza pa/ ma hA ba la pa di d+hAR+sha/ dz+hin+ta tshin+ta/ a pa ra dzi ta/ ma ra se ni ye pra mad ni pre sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT// 'di ni rab tu sgrol ba yis// khro tshogs 'khor bcas mngag pa'o// oM badz+ra kA li kI la ma mo tA ya g+ha ta ya/ su dra su ru badz+ra/ mu ru mu ru badz+ra/
59a3(rnying rgyud): yadza ya dz+ra/ ma tha mtha badz+ra/ kr-inA kA ra~M ya/ mar se ni pra mdza ni ye/ ma hA tsid+ha kha hI ma sha rbad/ ma hA sha ya thum myeg rbad/ kaM ka sha ya mA r+ya ya phaT/ 'di ni rdzas kyis dmigs pa bsngal// khro bo jo mo hrul ba dang // yang ska la pho nya tshogs dang bcas/
59a4(rnying rgyud): nga po d+ha ga ze rol bar bya// mo d+ha k+She tsI pa ya b+ha ga d+hAn/ mo ha ya g+hA ta ya/ ts+yai d+ha ba hoH// shaM kr-in gyi gror/ d+had+hi ma ma shrIm+ma kA ra ya/ oM ru ra b+heSh+Tha/ trag sha rdzag sha/ tsat+ta ga na/ na cung chu / rdu 'ang / d+h+r-ig tu bar chub/
59a5(rnying rgyud): gr-ig/ sha b+ha rtsa/ dz+r-i dza mA zad/ brnag pa khon nyid yang // 'di marjod tshad brtag la dbab// mtshan ma brtan po dpung bar bya// zhes bka' stsal to// phrin pas 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ drag po ngon du myod pa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul ba chen po
59a6(rnying rgyud): las kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// gti mug 'dod chags dmyal dang // phrag dog 'dul ba rab mdzad phyir// slar yang rigs kyi khro bor bstan// sangs rgyas khros pas gti mug gcod// mchon chen dkar po 'bar lta bu/
59a7(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings nas thigs par shar// rtsod A gyis dngos po sbyang // ye shes 'byung ba yum gyi mkhang // rnam dag dbyings nas shar ba'i b+h+rUM// phrin las yongs gyur gzhal med khang // rang lus rdzogs pa 'di nyid de// mtshon chen 'khor lo oM dkar
59b1(rnying rgyud): lus kyi sgo ru shar ba dang // 'du 'dugs pa par rgyaHbas// pa shas sems dbya yab tum banyis/ b+h+ya zam snang du bsam par \u0f7f// 'dun 'am mo gzhan naH// la banas D+ha// bdang byugag pas ga po cu gnas bcun/
59b2(rnying rgyud): badz+rahrI stsogs 'asgom// snying gar hU~M mdzad yab yum sogs// sngar bshad bzhin du bsgom bya ste// oM dkar 'khor lo 'bar bar bsam// phung po 'khor los gtams byas nas// rnam par shes pa 'khor lo dang sgom// oM pud+d+ha kA li kI la ya
59b3(rnying rgyud): sarba shAn+ti oM hUM phaT// dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la// zlum por 'dus rdzas las la mngag/ yul gsum mtshan ma brtan gyur na// lha klu gnod sbyin bgegs rigs dang // 'du ba bzhi gyur yan lag nad// 'jigs dang dus min 'chi ba brgyad//
59b4(rnying rgyud): dge gnod pa'i las la sogs// ma lus zhi ba'i phrin las so// rin chen khros pas nga rgyal gcod// mtshon chen ser po 'bar lta bu// nam mkha'i dbyings nas thigs par shar// rtog med tAM gyisaM dngos po sbyang // kha dog rin chen hUM ser pos// dpral ba'i
59b5(rnying rgyud): dbus su bsam par bya// 'di las rin chen gzhon nu ste// rat+na kI ya ya zhes pa'o// bud+d+ha kI la ya sogs dang // lte bar hUM mdzad la sogs bsgom// gser mdog trAM las rin chen 'bar// lus kun rin chen 'bar bas gtams// rnam par shes kun rin po
59b6(rnying rgyud): che// s+pho raNA kI li kI la ya sarba bud+d+ha trAM hUM phaT// gser nga mi ser po'i shing rnams la// gru bzhi gnas pa'i rdzas la mdag/ yul gsum mtshan ma rab brtan nas// tshe dang longs spyod dbang phyug dang // bsod nams ye shes dregs pa dang // dpal da
59b7(rnying rgyud): 'byor pa rigs 'dzin dang // dga' bde rang gzhan phun tshogs pa// kun tu rgyas pa'i phrin las so// pad+ma khros pas 'dod chags gcod// mtshon chen dmar po 'bar lta bu// nam mkha'i dbyings nas thigs par shar// mi rtog hrIHyis dngos po sbyang /
60a1(rnying rgyud): chos kyi pad+ma hrIHdmar po// mgrin pa'i mtshams su rab tu bsgom// 'ang spyor pad+ma gzhon nu ste// pad+ma kI la ya zhes bya// mdun chub g.yas g.yon gnas bzhin// rat+na kI la ya sogs bsgom// dpral bar snang mdzad
60a2(rnying rgyud): so pa// gzhan yang rang gi gnas su bsgom// dam rags la hrIHlas brda 'bar// phung po pad+ma'i rang bzhin te// rnam par shes pa pad+ma'o// oM pad+ma kI li k+ShaM la ya/ sarba pa shaM hrIHhU~M phaT// zadras mdamar po'i shing rnams la// bra ga ma
60a3(rnying rgyud): skyengs la mang ga/ yul gsam mtshan ma brtan thob nas// phyi rol brten pa'i sa rab zhugs dang // log par blta dang the tshom can// ngargyal drags pas khengs pa dang // cha btsan mtho btsun ldan pa dang // gdug zla ba gnod lhor 'tshong ba dang //
60a4(rnying rgyud): drang rlom sems dang ldan pa dag/ mos shing bdud pas dbang du spyad// chu gra ma khros pas phrag dog gcod// mtshon chen ljang gu rab 'bar ba// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs par shar// rtog med hA lis dngos po snang // sku rdzogs las la byung ba
60a5(rnying rgyud): rgya gram brtan par hA ljang gu// lus kyi sgo ru shar ba dang // 'phro 'du gsal ba'i phyag rgya yis// ye shes sems dpa' yab yum bzhi// gsang ba'i gnas su bsam par bya// mdun rgyab g.yas g.yon gnas bzhi ru// pad+ma kI la ya sogs dang /
60a6(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi sras bzhi bsgom par bya// phrin las gzhon nu rab sbyor bas// kar+pa kI la ya zhes b+ha// snying gar hUM mdzad yab yum dang // gnas gzhan so sor khro tshogs bsgom// hA ljang rgya gram 'bar ba yis// lus kyi phung po rab tu gtams// rnam shes
60a7(rnying rgyud): rgya gram ral gri ste// oM karma kA li kI la ya sarba mA ra ye hUM phaT// lcags sa ma nag po'i shing rnams la// gru gsum dbyibs kyi rdzas la mngag/ yul gsum mtshan ma gsal ba dang // lus can lus med rab rgyu ba'i// 'jig smod snyoms dang gnod
60b1(rnying rgyud): ngangaH// ba kyang grol 'grod las so// nga las 'ad dag klad par na// shAr kya nu ba byung 'jam dang rtag/ mangs dang rnab bakhyud par gnas// dag kyang rgyal po tham zad pangs// rgan pa dang mthad pa da dang // blang ba rdan pa gan ba dang
60b2(rnying rgyud): sras// gnas pa so sor stor ba'i mchog/ drin pas rba dad skor po yis// lam wA m+b+ha lA ye shes lnga// rigs lnga'i tshul gyis zad cing bsgrub// nyin mongs su par shes pa shes// pi po kyi ba dge
60b3(rnying rgyud): la gang gis gang gi nyid// gi 'dzin pa rnal 'byor rje// mkhas rtogs shes rab ldan pas spyod// ces bka' stsal te// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rigs 'dzin tha dad kyi sgo nas phrin las bzhis sor ba can pa'i yedz+ra lnga bang //
60b4(rnying rgyud): dang sa bo'i rgyal po ris// phyi ma'i dris ni rig pa 'dzin// skyes bu men po rnams kyis ni// nga yi bstan pa 'dzin cing bsrung // de phyir de yi tshul bshad de// srid pa las kyi mthuN+Dal can// bcu gnyis lha mad lang ces pa'i sa// dung chog
60b5(rnying rgyud): rabs// rjes spyo nga yi rnal 'byor yin// gzugs brtan chen po'i drung ngu ni// me dedun pa stsol ba'i lo brang bcug/ gtsang sreg brtan pa rnams kyis bskor// gser dngu la zangs ljags rin chen dang // khrag zhag 'om ma
60b6(rnying rgyud): dza dU pang ji khrig/ gsum cu mo bra gsum du'o// lpags pas byas pa'i phur ba ni// drug pa'i gzugs cung mor brgyad pa// dur khrod rgya ba mgo nang du// zhwa dang s+yAng / b+hi phar 'khyam// Nita tsal te gangasas dgur// rin ma na bzhir dang /
60b7(rnying rgyud): nga // dro yul nas thod parba// rigs gnyis po bu rgya lug snying // stsal ba mtshon zer gnas su dgod// rin chen mtshan ldan rjod nang du // mi dbang kyi/ sha khrag bcas// sal bzhi ze pa la btad do// mau dang / da med rigs med kyi/
61a1(rnying rgyud): na su nan tu rmAn
61a2(rnying rgyud): gzhu 'ad grus rgyal mtshan / sa // rung shi na dus// la bas yis pad/ sbyor ba tho pa brtul// / na/ gta pa/
61a3(rnying rgyud): pa na rdzag
61a4(rnying rgyud): ka / d+d+hoH/ maN+Dal tu y-i ga mdunaH/ zad mau thar // gsuman pa shin yak+sha t+ta shA shA // tha srin nasrang shAl ki mAr ta ba ltar ya nang b+h+yo// zhes pas da
61a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i yul la rbung // badz+rA ts+tshan ma kha shan gyi'i shrI pAr+m+ma kha T+wA~M ka rmA ga/ myug+sa/ dz+nyA nad na/ sa matsat+pal gyi nang dang / d+hag ma ma tI ma ti mA ra ya ts+tshaN+Dal zug tra mnAd le/ drag dag shu t+ya ra ma N+Da m+b+ha ra ya N+Da la gtu ga
61a6(rnying rgyud): trag rag sha ru ti ri ma 'dzuHr-i la nAd/ rag na d+hid+h+waM/ trug rag sha trUM tI man+taHdz+nyA nA yi la rlung hU~M/ rAg ma tso ba ri mar mai n+te rbad/ yag moH bi ri ma ra ya hUM rbad/ gadza tsi pa rim+bA ra ya bur hU~M rbad/ hu lu ma tsi bi r-i mA ra ya hUM b+h+rU~M rbad/ phung po myur du
61a7(rnying rgyud): bsgral bar bya// drag po rnams kyis dmod pa ni// badz+ra su dzi ba a pa ra tsita tr-itsapi pa ma shatsiSh+ThahUM \u0f7f/ dz+r-i dzaHmA ra la du ya ma tsau d+ha rak+ta tshal pa/ du mtha ma du tse ta la khug/ ba ma ril/ ma ra pra ma a pa ra dzi ta/ i tri sa ma rni dza/ dun dun nr-i zad
61b1(rnying rgyud): thaM/ g+ha gyi ma pa'i rjes su brtsam// brtags shing brdeg pa 'phang bsreg dang // gzir ba'i lus kyis tshar gcad pa// 'di ni lus ngag yang gsum ldan// shan tu dmigs pas myur du 'gag// gyi rlung gsang btags dang mad// mngon sum
61b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin du gsal bar ltar// thogs pa med par las 'grub byed// phrin pas gcod pa'i mdo yin no// zhes bka' stsal to// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sprul pa'i phyag brten dam tshig chen po'i phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//
61b3(rnying rgyud): khro ba'i rgyal po yis// rgyud don nye bar bsdus te bshad// rnal 'byor ye shes rang rig pa'i// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor rtsa ba ste// gzhon nu rigs kyi gtso bo lnga// dus gsum sangs rgyas sras mchog rnams// kun lhor nyis brgya lnga bcu rdzog
61b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs bcu dkyil 'khor du// yab su minye pa'i sras gnyis las// sprul pa dang ni nye bar sprul// thugs kyi bdag dang bcas pa yi// brgya dang brtul lce rnams sbyang // mngon par stong pa la sogs pa'i// 'dus byas lnga rnams
61b5(rnying rgyud): gzugs brtan pa// rdo nan zhal gsum phyag drug ldan// so so'i rigs kyi gtso cher lnga// gang gis 'dul ba der snang rnying // 'i dang dbang rgyas drag pa las// ma mi'i phrin las dzar la ste// dbyibs dang kha dog rdzas dang sbyar//
61b6(rnying rgyud): smang ba d+hAms b+hab// rigs d+hIs b+h+re pa gangs kya byabs// rnam po sa bzhi sabam dang// bu gsum rnams ni kyad per yin// zhing 'ogadang rnam tha ste// logs pa'i rgyas babyeng pa da // rnarnams rnags nyid yin no// ga
61b7(rnying rgyud): gnas la gzhal mang khang // 'khor lo rtsi bas brgyad ldan pa la// lte bar gardza tha lab sum bsgom// rtsibs la phyogs mtshams khro bo brgyad // yab sum sbyang 'og gnas su ni// hUM mang de dang sbubs pa che// ya gra sras dang bcas par// skye
62a1(rnying rgyud): sa / na du na na na bya / du / nas sa//
62a2(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ pa nga b+hU ba'i gnas sa bas ma/ nga ma gnas kyi nas shin/ gas nams ba rgya ba'aM/ lhag ma'i sras mchog pa sgos paste/ bdun durgya bad+ha byung ba yis// des la dmigs pa dkyil 'i rdzog
62a3(rnying rgyud): 'di dag ma long ba rtags brten bzhin// rang bzhin mam+b+ha ba snang ba ni// sam+b+ha sde ma pyar gA'o// mAn sa sbrul ra rdzogs pa// yongs stong gas T+TA bag+hAn+ti// bsti'i zuga'i tshul thams cad// 'ab bag khro rlung gams na/
62a4(rnying rgyud): bdag gzhan ma gyi kyi 'on med pas// myu rab stsal ba'i phu la ma shrI// thugs ma yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khoraH// rang byang ye shes gnas la 'ang// 'di ni sku y-i dkyil 'khor yin// rigs lnga 'bru dgra kI la ya// thams cad gsung gi dkyil 'khor gas /
62a5(rnying rgyud): bris te yig 'bru dgod pa dang // phur byu go ni dngos su bathung // thukra m+b+hi k+Shig 'i kho rdza ba lnga// bris te phyag mtshan so sor dgob// mchod cing las bcol dngos grub blang // gtso mo yum gyi sgrogs pa yis// dkyil 'khor gnas su bri bya zhing // lha dgod rdzas
62a6(rnying rgyud): spyad bskul bas rdzogs// bsgoms shing dgod pa'i ting nge dzin// bskul zhing yon tan ldan pa yis// rjes kyi dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin dbyung // nyi shu rtsa gcig e yi dbyibs// tshad dang ldan pa rdzas dgod cing // dngos grub blang bar zad don/
62a7(rnying rgyud): rjes bsag bskyed cing tshad ldan na// rgyan rtags dgod pas 'tshal pa rdzogs// stong dang rtse brgyad bsgrub pa'o// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems las nga // / las kyi dkyil 'khor brtsig pa dang // bsag mchod gsad pa'i rgyu dang ni// chos
62b1(rnying rgyud): ldan pha rol bskul ba sdus// gzugs bsreg pa nas sbyang las rnams kyis// ma lus 'dus par brgyad du bstan// rigs can lnga la kun sbyangs pas/ bsnyen bsgrub sgra gsung thugs kyi dang // TIg le gcig la rab tu 'dus// zhes bka' stsal to//
62b2(rnying rgyud): zin pas 'bras pa rgya ba'i rgyud las/ khyad par gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor spro ba'i phrin las kyi laM'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// rang gi 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs la// shin tu gdams pa 'di skad gsungs/
62b3(rnying rgyud): mas sa mchog 'khor gyi tshogs// sprul pa po nyar bcas pa rnams// rtogs ma'i sems can gdul dka' ba// thugs rje'i thabs chen sna tshogs kyis// nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ thams cad du ni snang zhing ston// bdag gi don du bzhugs
62b4(rnying rgyud): snyoms// rang gi rnam rtog nye bar gnas// kha cig tu ni dge sbyong che// nyan thos rang rgyal spyod pa ston// la lar byang chub sems dpa' yi// spyod pa rlabs chen nus par mdzod// kha cig la ni ljongs stod rdzogs// dpe byud brgyad rje ldan pa'i/
62b5(rnying rgyud): bar gnas la zhi ba dang // gdug pa can pa khro bo ste// ning khams rab tu bkod pa dang // gzhal ming khang pa'i bzang rdzogs// gnyis med sbyor ba'i tshul can dang // sman gcig ldan pa'i sgra yi rigs// yab dang tshur gyi rnam pa can// gang gis
62b6(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba der snang zhing // rigs drug sems can kun la yang // rang rigs gang yin der 'byung bas// tshangs pa brgya byi ni dbang phyug dang // gnod sbyin mkha' lding mi'am ni// lha min dri za mi rnams dang // rnol song yi dgas dmyal ba rnams
62b7(rnying rgyud): gang 'dul de nyid kyis// rang gi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// dman pa rnams la rim pa ste// rtag pa ma yin sdug bsngal dang // mor skye sangs kyis 'byung ba dang // phun su mtshogs pa rnyed dka' dang // skabs 'grogs sbyang bslab gnas bcwa/
63a1(rnying rgyud): rdob don dam rang bzhin gyis// sems dbang bskur te bdag med pa'i// rtogs pa rab rdzogs dbu ma ston// de nas lus ngag bya ba dang // spyod pa rab sgrub rnal 'byor ston// bskyed pa'i rim pa rnal 'byor che// de yi rjes su rngal
63a2(rnying rgyud): 'byor dang // rab tu rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang // thabs dang shes rab 'jug pas don// sgra lnga chos lnga ye shes lnga// lam lnga rigs lnga dag pa lnga// sa bcu stobs bcu ma 'dres pa// bco brgyad nges par 'byung ba dang // bskal pa chen po grangs med
63a3(rnying rgyud): gsum// skad cig tsam la rdzogs par byed// blo dang dbang po bsam pa dang // tha ma 'bring dang mchog gyur la// tshad med rnams kyi khyad par gyis// brtan dang thob pa dus gcig dang // tshe gcig srid pa bar ma dang // gsum mam lnga 'am bdun dag gis// /
63a4(rnying rgyud): rang gi sa la gnas par ston// 'byung ba chen po rnams kyis mthu// phan tshun log par phyin srid de// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// dus la bab pa gang zhig na// sangs rgyas rnams ni cung mi 'da'// nga yi ye shes tshul 'di la// khyed rnams/
63a5(rnying rgyud): 'jigs par ma byed cig/ ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po khro ba chen po'i rgyal po chen po de nyid phrin las kyi rnam par rol pa chen po'i sgo nas/ yul gdug
63a6(rnying rgyud): pa can 'dul ba'i rigs rnams kyi don rab tu rdzogs par mdzad pa la rjes su yi rang ba rgya che'i sgo nas bstod pa ni/ kye ma bcom ldan rig pa'i rgyal po khro bo'i rje// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyi dpal chen po he ru ka/ rig pa'i rgyal po sku lnga ye shes lnga
63a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs spun grub cing // dkyil 'khor gsum lnga brgyad kyi ngo bor spel rab 'dus rdo rje 'chang // phrin las bzhi dang gtso chen drag po mngon 'thung sbyin mdzad pa'i// gzhon nu lnga ldan myur 'byung 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas bcom ldan
63b1(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis/ 'byor 'dus pa can po dag nyid kyi sku la rab tu bzlas te/ skulas 'dan tu chags can po snang bar mang nas/ mi gnas par dbyangs chos nyid mnyam nyid spros pa dang bral bar dang ladags pa can pas pa dgus par bya
63b2(rnying rgyud): las 'dus brgya ba'i rgyud pas/ rgya tshu mo ngas par 'byung bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bcugasum pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin pas 'dus pa phur bar+Na ba'i drud/ ma
63b3(rnying rgyud): gas so// slob dnga'i can po pa d+hi thung gdas dang / da kyi la rtsub par can ba nags bsgyur tso zlas te gtan la phub pa'o// rgyal po'i thung ba/ gter \u0f7f/ rdzas \u0f7f/ gtang ma'o//
63b4(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ mams nga / bod-i / mamyo dris parda ba'i d+hA rjesad+ha ba/ bcom la mdza rdzogs rgyal po ti rAka laphyag 'tshal ma// 'di skang bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom na 'angs dang nag shegs
63b5(rnying rgyud): padagra pa ma pa yang ga ngog sa rgyas thaM med pa mngon pa d+ma ba rdzog sa pa rdo rje hrI d+haganas tha / thog 'chen po mnyam nod kyi rang du sring pa tsha kyi bzlas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rang bzhir du gan
63b6(rnying rgyud): grub ba ri rab chen po'i rje mo rtsal po'i gnas// 'dre chen po'i glong / yu mtshan mo de kho na nyid kyi gzhir thar pa mkhal dgongs pa ma lus par shar ba'i klong // b+hag yangs pa'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin phyogs pa tsu rnam sa
63b7(rnying rgyud): khams yongs su khyab pa'i gnas snyoms par thugs te bzhugs nas/ rab tugs pa'i dbang phyug ye shes kyi rdo rje shugs chen po 'azang ba/ pad+ma'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i blong chen po dang gnyis su med pa'i 'phro 'drangs gsum du rtsen ma tha dpa /
64a1(rnying rgyud): 'theb las// b+hin kyis rlabs kyi thul chen po dpag tu med par byung bar 'dis so/ mtshan pa dang / mtshon po dang / chu chen po dang / rlung rten po dag gi gnas pa dang // bzlog pa dang / gshor ba dang / na/
64a2(rnying rgyud): cing g.yo bar byed pa'i mthu chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa snang ba las skyid pa'i 'jig rten bskyod pa'i sa bon+de dang rtsa ba dang / bcud dang bcas pa/ dngase ma dang 'bras bur bcas pa/ yon tan dang dus pardzogs pa/ phyogs dus rab tu gle ba med par bzhugs
64a3(rnying rgyud): pa las/ dbyings kyi yum kun tu bzang mo sring pa thams cad kyi bdag mo/ he ru ka thams cad kyi yum chen mo/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rig pa'i dbang gyenam/ 'jig rten gyi khams pa'i 'das pa thams cad kyi gtsomo/ de kho na nyid kyi ge 'i mu lal
64a4(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba de nyid rol pa chen po gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skul ba'i dbyings kyi sku chen pos gsol ba btab pa/ e ma ho// bla med mngon rdzogs rgyal po he ru ka/ snang stong gnyis med kun la sdang ba'i sra/
64a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan med spros bral mi rtog grags pa'i gsungs// bde chen zag med zung 'jug khyab pa'i thugs// ma lus rang la rdzogs pa'i yon tan mnga'// phrin las mdzad phyir rol pa'i sku bzhengs shig/ a la la haM// zhes bsngal ba mdzad nas/ bcom
64a6(rnying rgyud): 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dang // mnyam nyid dbyings kyi ngang las mi g.yo zhing // ma rtogs 'khor ba ngang gis bsgral ba las/ 'khrul ba'i blo la dngos por yongs mi snang // gdul bya'i
64a7(rnying rgyud): pase pa rnam dag som nyi med// dus la ma ba bzhi par gnas par bya// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang yum chen mos 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po las// ma nor ma lus mi zad mi khyen pa las//

64b2(rnying rgyud): pa mdza dade/ dbyings kyi yul chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ti// srid gsum 'jig rten kun na rab bde ba'i// kha skyor dga' ba skad cig gnas skabs pani// 'dod chags chen po mthong bzhangad reg cing sbyor// rdo dang rigs byas
64b3(rnying rgyud): khyad pa gang snang ba'i// mthar thug rim bzhin rjes 'byung nus par dzan// mkha' bzhi bang byeng chub sems kyi gnas// nam mkha' khyab phyim nyi nyid tr-I mdzad phyir// ze'u 'dab bcas pad+ma rgyas mdzad cig/ sa ma sa ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ !/
64b4(rnying rgyud): gau ny+dza ma~M/ sa m+ba ya badza pra be sha ya phaT/ ces bskul nas/ yab khre la gnyis kyi gtsigs pa dang band pa dang / reg pa dang bskyod pa'i ngol pas snyoms par zhugs te/ 'od zer kye 'gro 'du chen po g.yos pa las/ phyogs bzhi dang dbus kyi b+ha ga yang
64b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnar ba chen pos khams gsum pa rnams la gsal bar mdzad de/ phyogs lnga dang / 'od lnga dang / rigs lnga dang / bsam pa lha dang / rtsa balnga dang / 'bras bu lnga dang / nus pa lnga dang / khams lnga dang / byed pa lnga dang / las ldeng / khyab pa lpa
64b6(rnying rgyud): dbang lnga dang / chu lnga dang / rkyen pa dang / bag la nyal lnga dang / kun nas snang ba lnga dang / shes pa lda pa/ phung po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / 'gro ba lnga dang / yul lnga dang / 'dod pa lnga dang / sbed pa lnga dang / bsrung ba lnga dang / blang ba lnga dang /

69a1(rnying rgyud): sar ga rdzun// 'byung ba bzhi yang snrel 'khor 'dzin// snyam pa ma dang par rdzogs pa// g.yang ga nam dang zab pa// gsung byed ma dang bzud pa// skom thang ma sazla ba rnams// dkar nga ma da par dang bur/
69a2(rnying rgyud): mdo na go chu gon// zod khrag dang ni mtshon cha thogs// mche gzigs ma dang kha 'byams ma// mthu 'jib ma dang rkang ldag ma// dkar nag dmar ser zod khrag 'dzin// lha dang gishin rje klu gnod ni// dkar sdong mar ser srin mo bzhi// rdo rje thod khrag
69a3(rnying rgyud): sbrul dwags dang // ne'u bo'i rgyal ba rin chen 'dzin// 'di dag kyang ni ma lus kun// nga las byung zhing khyod la snang // de lus rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ste// rab tu thub par bya ba yang // phung po khams dang skye mazed dag/ ma lus 'dir ni shes pa dang /
69a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin srid pa'i dkyil 'khor de// gnyis med ye shes dbab par bya// gsang chen sems kyi dkyil 'khor de// rtsa bar gnas pa'i nyon mongs drug/ dbyings chen drug tu dbab par bya// rten cing 'brel 'byung chos bcu gnyis// bye byed yid chos
69a5(rnying rgyud): rtog par bcas// rje dpon mo ni bcu bzhir dbab// sems las byung ba'i rtog pa dag/ de dag ma lus 'khor du bya// de nyid der shes dkyil 'khor yin// de nyid kyang ni yang dag pa'i// dngos po'i mtshan mngang gis stong // dbyings las 'char zhing dbyings
69a6(rnying rgyud): la thim// gnyis su med n+d+ha gnyis pra rA // dum pas ni gcig dang bral// zhi ba dben pa rtag cing bde// bdag med stong zhing mtshan ma med// blon med mngon par 'dus ma byas// thams cad shes shing thams cad snang // ma bcos snying po bsam mi khyab/
69a7(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi rgyal po rtag pa'i gzhi// tshogs kyi gtso mo srid pa'i bdag/ de las dman pa'i rigs can dag/ rang gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dgug/ gnyis med bsten pa'i sbyor ba'i chos// cho ga mnyam pa nyid du bya// gnyis su snang ba tsam gyi phyir// sgo lnga'i ngong
69b1(rnying rgyud): nga gnang / nyas bcud pam byas na// dbyang dag ba da ces// lhagasung thugs sa rgyas thar pa phyin// byang rnamasams ma can bya// glang phrag gas gas pa/ dab dgrags par shA/ bad pa ma lus dang na// rtang btud/
69b2(rnying rgyud): rabyed kyis cag/ sred pa'i rang bzhin rdzogs shes na/ mang rdzogs tha mi dgo bang 'bob// chos bkang du pa to// sul byo da bzhin srid pa'i dkyi pa khor bsta pa'i lang ste gnyis pa'o// / de sa gan
69b3(rnying rgyud): nga // dang gi dus gnas pa ni// mawan pa zag brgya las// gnas pa rjongad phrag bdun cu gnyis// bzlas pas brgya dang hU~M shun+te// 'khor lo'i napa pa ni la garas// de nyid rnam pa gsum du gdus// gal sug yod kyi dbyer 'o// mi 'thod
69b4(rnying rgyud): brdung pas dang // sems dang 'dzin ku rjo // da la gsum gyu ba'i // yan ba rag tu grags pa yang // ti gi tshangs pa'i gnas dag \u0f7f// sra ma d+ha rdza gnyis rab tu gnas// dog ma gnod pa bskyod pa'i grangs// zong rgyad drugacung ba tu gas
69b5(rnying rgyud): zang // ma par gas pa// bzad par ma// rnam bas// / ya ga 'du// ban da /
69b6(rnying rgyud): sa / bas na bye bab ste// degang ma da na par drab da / da brgya dad ga nas bya// ra bde pags pa //
69b7(rnying rgyud): nga / sa to ngas ni/ rlud pa tho mi myong nga // rangasu pa cu pa can// gnas sas pa dang byas sa// dadag dron dus pad/ nga gdag da/
70a1(rnying rgyud): rbA/ rnga tu tu nga// ga gas pas mag// bya nasu ma gas spyad// rgyas byu na nas/ sgrub sgrubs nga// zlas /
70a2(rnying rgyud): rtsa bar gyur pa zhes bya ste// las kun byed pa yan lag yin// rtsa bzhi dbus dang lnga les ni// dngas ma yum chen gtso mo lnga// nyi zla dang ni rgya mtsho dang // rang gi dngos dang brgyad yin no// khros ma bzhi dang sgeg ma bzhi// rgyan byed ma bzhi bcu gnyis dang //
70a3(rnying rgyud): batsho mo bzhi dang bcu drug gi// 'dod pa spyong ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs// srid pa 'di dag thams cad kun// chags par byed dang snyoms pa dang // gcig tu gnas dang spro ba dang // nam mkha'i khams kyi rgyal mo dang // 'dod pa khams kyi gtso mo dang // gling 'a'i/
70a4(rnying rgyud): stong gi spyi phud dang // srid pa 'degs byed rin chen ma// gar gyi dbang mo gnyis las ni// srid pa'i gzhi 'dzin brgyad yin no// phyogs bzhir gru 'degs byed ma dang // las kyi dmag dpon chen mo bzhi// bcu drug gis ni sum cu bzhi// gzugs khams pa
70a5(rnying rgyud): yi 'khor po'o// las kyi srin mo brgyad dang bzhi// dbang chen bzhi dang gdong mo bzhi// sa bdag mo dang ma mo brgyad// gsang ba gsum dang pho nya gsum// nag po'i chung mar grags pa gsum// 'jigs byed ma mo chen mo gsum// sum cu gnyis kyi rang bzhin
70a6(rnying rgyud): gyis// ngan 'gro'i srid pa dgag pa'o// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor lo rdzogs// bya dang byed pa bdag po gsum// kun gyi bzhon par bcas pa ni// ri rab dang ni yongs 'du'i shing // srog shing tshul du gnas pa yin// 'di dag ma lus khyod kyi lus/
70a7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bzhi yi bdag nyid kyis// phyi yi don du snang ba yin// longs spyod 'dod spyod dkyil 'khor la// dbyings drug lha drug rtsab ste// nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// de yi 'khor du gtogs pa ste// ri rab steng gi 'khor lo yi// gnas chen bsam
70b1(rnying rgyud): dgajugang gi bdag po te// thang chung pa'i rtsal gnyis ces// sum na rtsa ga nyis 'dod pa pas/ gdag rnab ni pag med// dede zlas kyides
70b2(rnying rgyud): grags pas/ dong pazhis bya rdzogs// dmyal ba'i srid pa nyi shu dang // de'i nyon mongs te shur bcas// dbyings gnas pa dang 'thor ba dang // sgrib pa gnyis pad/
70b3(rnying rgyud): 'byor ba mjogs// kyai l-I rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi// lugs su byang dadu ba zlog pa yis// gnas dang yul du snang ba 'aM// nyi shu rtsa bzhi kyang la byung // sras la rdzogs pa gyid/ rtag
70b4(rnying rgyud): rlom pa'i tshul// somani pag gnas pa// sang snga ga bdU na lo dradi 'char/ zag med pa byed pas ba dbar 'byor// rnal pa 'i shwa n+ya gzug gis// phar la bya babar po'o// drug gam nga byas spang bar brjod// da nyi
70b5(rnying rgyud): dang rang gi khams// gzugs brtan dag dang gsum yin te// 'bar dang 'gro dang brtan pa dang // thod rgal rab tu 'bar ba'o// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag lnga// ngo bo ming gi bye drag go// bsam gtan srog rtsol dbugs rngub dang // sbrad dang 'dzin pa'i ting
70b6(rnying rgyud): 'dod// sngang 'jug gnas pa gcig dang gsum// lus dang shes pa g.yo bad // rab 'bring nam gsum gyi tur// srog dadzin mi mnyam nu sa pa dang // tsan du tu dang khyad par byed// chos dang thal pa gsang ba dang // bangs stong bar ca nga
70b7(rnying rgyud): gnas/ bye'i la 'an 'dzin pa'i las/ ma 'i rkyen 'am 'angag cid/ rgya'ing 'bang ba'i di par byed/ da shes pa 'ang nga bdang // dang bdebs kyis byab dang / nga spang ba dgas kya dpar 'gyur/
71a1(rnying rgyud): rab tu shin tu tu/ mngon par rgyu dang yang dag r+b+ha// mig dang rnab sgra dang // bkra'i gnas kun khyab pa ste// mthong dang thas char yang dag \u0f7f// bsam pan tad rtogs par byed// dang /
71a2(rnying rgyud): zhing brlang dang bsgom pa yis// rtsa ba yan lag kun la khyab// snang dang dran rtog byung rgyal dag/ mos pa lhag bsam mnyes pa dang // yang dag thun mong lta ba dang // rten cing 'brel pa'i byin rlabs kyis// longs spyod snyoms 'dug bde ba
71a3(rnying rgyud): bsgom// nus pa'i rten gyi ti zla gnyis// g.yas ga yon mdun du ring dang drung // gsum gsum dgu dang bur dang drabs// 'khor phrag gsum gyi skabs su sbed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab ba rnams nas// dpag pas me shing gi yal ga
71a4(rnying rgyud): bcing // ti zla steng gi phyogs su 'phang // gling bzhi gling phran tshags su gzug/ thog dbyung 'brug sle bsgrags par bya// glang chen rtag dang lgang kai wa// 'og ma'i gnas nas rim bzhin 'phad// rnam par grol bas lus la dgram// dbang
71a5(rnying rgyud): dang bskyil dang bzlog pa dang // bgos pa skye rags zhags pa dang // 'khor po bus pa'i 'dug sbyangs kyi// bdud rtsi'i don du 'gyur ba ro// yul gnad dgu bcu rtsa bdun 'dra// dgu dang drag dang gcig tu badz+ra// ma dang thog dang shing dang srug
71a6(rnying rgyud): 'khong ngo thig le ste// rang gi pha ma bzhin myong ba'o// drug rngu thu bdi'i gnas su blang // gtso bo brgyad kyi aM dang bcas// rab tu dbang bar nyid bsam// d+hi nang gas ba'i bzhon pa las// 'dags byer 'byung dang rtsong pa dang // 'jig dang ga
71a7(rnying rgyud): da ci dang // bas cad 'jigs dang na khye/ dpo tu'i byed pa// khyed byar 'tho dang maphyogs byung / dang rngam dang byung drad // sa dang 'byad dang rjong bdag nga byang chung sams bad/
71b1(rnying rgyud): ga/ 'byung dang ngag dang gnas dang gnas// ba dug dgang byug pa// tha nas gabang du ba dpa// pazas na las kyang byug/ nga ba 'drang phyu dpas// sa cadatha' la 'angams pa dang // dadu byung can bang gdang byad/
71b2(rnying rgyud): shar d+ha chub byed mtshams zhir brnyas// !tha tshogs dang zhing rmongs shing // mi r+tha shwa dang sprin dang // sra dang pa rje so sa na // zil dang drung dang 'gro ba yis// rang gi dz+nyAn las ngas brlab pa// rtags dang 'on ta nang byed par tsam/
71b3(rnying rgyud): sdig dang 'bral dang sbyang ba dang // thob dang rdzogs dang snang dang 'grub// bcom ldan rtag pas skyed cing // snang bya ba spong bya gnas bya dag // lha dang 'acu ga sum gsum dang wa// bdag nyid rdzogs pa dang gnas so// de bsang ni mngo rdzogs pa /

71b5(rnying rgyud): yang khor nyid kyi/ byang chub sems la gnas pa ni// thun mong dang mi khyad par te// don dam thun rdob rang bzhin gyis// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid brgyad// rlom dang bsdam par bya ba dang // bat+ta dang shes par bya ba dag/ sngang dang rdzogs pa
71b6(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i tshogs// sgyu marmi lam sdig tu dang // rig yor sprul pa dri za'i grong // gzugs brnyan drag cha sgra brtan tshogs// rdo srid tsam du mtshon pa pas// b+h+rUM mtha'i srid pa man ched du// sngon pam tsam du ma bca' zhi // lus rig yi sa ba
71b7(rnying rgyud): 'dag pa'i// rtsol dang bsgrub pa gang yin pa// phung pos bsdus pa'i shes pa lnga// kun gzhi khyod kyi bdag nyid la// ma rang bzhi cings pa nyid dang bcas// rig deng rngab sna dang lce// lus dang yid rnams de la yul// babyed cing mazed par

72a3(rnying rgyud): gnas pa dbyings sa la// gangs rgyabs dang sa badz+ra/ tshul gnyis kyis ri ban pa'i// / de dge la 'ong du byer// dra dmas med pa las// 'd-i gang sa nga zhes pa dang // tshenams kyad pa sogs kyi// rangs rgya sa dpa
72a4(rnying rgyud): spyod dang // pad char stsal pa'i gnas dgaH// tshwa dang bsgra dang brtan pa las// rgyab sa thogs stong pa dag gyi bdag tung rin pa thom// rnams kyi dbyings dkyile la// rig pa la shes chags pa// gtso dang la dza dra bcas pa
72a5(rnying rgyud): ba// dpe 'bras bya tshul chen yang // srAr+d+hag las ni mnod dang // ma lus mkhyen pa bcu gnyis te// don gnyis ma pade dag dang // gzhan gyis rig par bya ba las// 'dus rgyud bas ma gyis ma che pa// gdul bar bya ba rnams pa snang //
72a6(rnying rgyud): dus gsu ma dus med rtogs pa dang // 'bad rtsol bas ma shes yod min zhing // gang la 'dod pa de bdag nyid// bral ba mchis nyid // gsang the rnas pas rtse mo thang ba// gab pa'i gtar du sdang bste// 'jig rten pa rnachags pa med//
72a7(rnying rgyud): ngas bcang brtag pa dang // brlo cing grol par rgya d+he// mnyam pa nyid drug dbyas pa// @da skyes par rjeg nga // drang nge dang nas pa nyid de// byu dang thangs dang bras bu dang // gan dngapa mdang ring nyid dngos// pras
72b1(rnying rgyud): longs spyod chu mi gsan// gtong dang gzhan gya nan spyod pa// sa sar 'gro bas thar pa dang // ma lus mnyam par rdzogs spyong pa// rig pa'i snying po byang chub pa// bla na med pa yongs bzung zhing // rang bzhin mnyam nyid 'byung ba gan// zangs
72b2(rnying rgyud): kyi gnas skabs 'bras bu gsum// stong dang mtshan ma rngon pa med// rten byed lus la g.yas g.yon dbus// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis// 'byung 'jug gnas dang 'du ba bzhi// phan gnod btang snyoms sbyor lags so// tshig mar
72b3(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa nyid du skyes// thabs kyi mnyam nyid skyes pa la// shes rab lhan cig smras pa yis// rab 'bring thA li yul rnams la// 'du shes gsum gyis rab sbyangs te// thug bsngal bral zhing 'dre ba dang // rnam par rtog pa sbyangs pa dang /

72b7(rnying rgyud): zag med 'dab rgyud mi 'chad// snying rje srog dang mkhyen par ldan// yul snang dge pa rgyur mi 'tshang // mnyam nyid lhan rtog skyes pa'o// rang bzhin tu 'bras tshogs pa yis// dbyar med lhan cig skyes pa'o// nga nyid mdan du rdzogs pa ste// sa
73a1(rnying rgyud): dbyes rig pa sa shes dang // dbyings dang bkas gnyis mdabs// dka da mar ma bdag dang stan cing // dbying sa las 'thur ba mthi dga' mdag/ bganags ngas pa rgya ga pang // som ba ma sogs pan
73a2(rnying rgyud): hril bu// gdug pa 'dul mdzod sngal lcags g.yas// 'khor ba dbang phred g.yon d+har+tha// dreg pa 'dul mdzad ga ya m+ba stA re/ me thog ma dngas sreng gajug yon// rdzu 'phrul dang ba zhabs bzhir ba mad// gti mug 'dod chags na gang dang // dmyal dra ga do
73a3(rnying rgyud): ser ba yi// glang chen mi dang stag dang ngos// thal ba dag zong phreng dang // me ri 'ab bas brgyan pa'o// phya la le ni dbyings kyi yum// mi 'gyur mthing nag chos kyi su// ye shes lha yi zhal byang zhing // 'byung ba lnga yi mkha' gsung can// rdo byeng zhabs bdu
73a4(rnying rgyud): kayas// dril bu Than+da ga yang gzhig yod// nyon mongs 'joms shing steng rjes 'dzin// 'di med dngos grub stsol bar mdzod// brdud 'gyur bde ba ston pa dang // chos nyid panyam par longs spyod pa'o// zhabs brgyad rnam thar brgyar gyi dang // 'khor ba dang ji myangan
73a5(rnying rgyud): 'das / de na nga phyin thob bden pa'i dngos// dbyer me 'gyu 'phrul mer ba dang // rgyun mi 'chad par myong pas te// don rjen ga brjingams pa'i gter// mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i bu gsung thugs// dgongs pa'i khyad par gang yin pa'o// snang shing ji dbus
73a6(rnying rgyud): pad+d+ha srung dang // rnal 'byor lar gyi ye zhes kyis// zol zhing rtog pa ma lus da // shang zhing ldang ba rab rtags par// mi sna mi 'geg la ma mchog ste// de bas su kha 'i zhes bya// zhes bka'aphral to// mul l-i gsang ba sems kyi dkyil 'bo ba
73a7(rnying rgyud): zhe mo// / de gagang dang byed te byis// ma pa 'byung po' bye 'bong dang// rdzom rgyas chub sang nga ni// drug po sngags kyi byung can// rjid la mi bzar byer byung bas// drang khrod lags pa'i gnas sa bya// srid pa'i dbye bang
73b1(rnying rgyud): ten pas// de dkyil mngon rdzogs he ruka/ dbu dgu bco brgyad phrag dang rngan// tshwas nyid kun tu bzang mo nyid// mkha' bzhin dag pa'i rang bzhin pas// 'brengs dang bskyod dang sbal blud ma// lan rtseng tsams pa
73b2(rnying rgyud): sdom byed ma dang sa ma bdun// yab cin ma shes rdzogs dga'as// maso brgyad ni phyag g.yas la// yul brgyad rna me phyug g.yon pa'o// mthabs bum thabs pa rnams pa ni// phyag mtshan las kya
73b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor ro// de yis 'jig rten dregs pa gzir// brgya byin gyi ni gdun dag la// sha las rnam snang gsal du bskyed// gshin rjer drod las 'od 'bar gsal// phag las mnyan gsal chu bdag stang // dbugs las yar gsal gnod
73b4(rnying rgyud): sbyin gnon// mdun du bdud la bkrag las ni// de nyid gsal la bskyed pa yin// rgya mtsho me dang ti hUM dang // pa'i chen byang chub sems rgyu las// dpal 'bar khro mo bskyed par bya// phung byed sbas pa'i ma bzhi dag/ sa sor bskyed
73b5(rnying rgyud): bsgyel ba la// dngos ma bzhi las yum chen mo// bde ba za byed rgyas 'debs ma// tshe 'phel pa dang rmongs byed ma'o// khros ma bzhi dang dges sde bzhi// gdan dang dbang po sgo bzhi dang // rnam shes rig par bcas pa las// khams
73b6(rnying rgyud): gsum gad sha gtsang ma bgyud// chags byed na snyoms baspel ba la// gsang ba'i rtswa las drug gisum dag/ dbang snang mamo bskyed par bya// e ka dza d+hi sman drug la// gzhung chen rtsa las sgra shi dag/ rtsa dag cod byed pa btad par

74a1(rnying rgyud): klo hrI sa rjem// dpag gi rgya ral zhi nyid dang // gling bzhi'i bad+mang la gang lag na// sa pa // dab rnag pa thabacad// rnang bangs yang min shes smras// //

74a3(rnying rgyud): cad zil gyis gnon pa'o// de rgyas kyi ni gdon rnams kyi// snying khrag zhal du rngub par byed// dam tshig pa la bzhag pa yis// rgod cing gtong ba'i phrin pas nyid// srid gsum ma mo mkha' 'gro dag/ dbang ga ma dang tshe yi pa dang // dang
74a4(rnying rgyud): rims mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyis// dang gzhan don du bsgyur ba dang // gang rigs pa las dmigs pa ni// phrin las rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// gyi bdun dmag dang dpung bsdu dang // dmag drangs pa dang dpon bsko dang // ngo
74a5(rnying rgyud): lhag ma bahUM ba dang // mdun dpung bshigs dang gtor ba dang // mchod dang dus gdab las rnams la// gcig tu dril dang so so yis// bsnyen pa dang ni 'khor lo bskor// glo bur dbab pa brnag pa'i grogs// thams cad gzugs kyis bslang
74a6(rnying rgyud): dang // zhing chen por byas pa dang // dbang dang drag shul phur pa dang // phra men so sor dbye ba dang // ngan sngags thun gyis bsad pa'o// gnad la dbab pa'i blta spyod kyi// dgug pa gsum gyis gdags pa dang // ma lus don la stsa
