74b1(rnying rgyud): da dub tang // kun pa 'thon das dang / gas pa can lag// thags dung byung ba dang // dgas nas rdzogagacung dang / can shAn nga nga/ su na pa nga
74b2(rnying rgyud): dbang po dan snying yan lag dag/ rgyal mtshan the zar tshag/ rang gi rigs dang rnam grangs mdzun// mchod chen rab tu sbyar bas ni// gnas dang phrin pas dmigs par bya// oM phre dz+ra shI he ruka NA a \u0f7f//
74b3(rnying rgyud): ru ka bu r+d+ha d+hA na kro trI shwa rI sAma?/ ma ma yo gi r+t+ti ru wa ru lu dzAM b+h+ya tAM/ AM nyid ba zhe mu kha le kro d+da shwa rI b+ha ga pang+gar+b+ha bad+mi k+Shong 'dus ng+yas na sring / sha y+ra ti rnin+dadz+dza dzAM/ AM g+ni sa prad+h+we ha/ Ang+ga le rAm raN/
74b4(rnying rgyud): ha/ U d+hi ya yai ha/ oM ma hA lo te ha/ I kro d+hI shwa rI b+haM ga pang+gar+Ya hUM hAM/ au badz+ra shA na ti pad+ma ka ru tid+ya b+h+yo/ oM mud+d+hi ni b+h+yo/ AM a shan tri nI b+h+yo/ A b+ha ga dun tr-i ni b+h+yo/ AM kha mun dan d+hi ni b+h+yo/ oM badz+ra surba ta
74b5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra da d+ha bI to a to ye/ oM badz+ra kha ra ga bi to a to yaM/ IM badz+ra srid 'gro bi to a to ye/ AM badz+ra a kaM a kau b+h+yo/ oM badz+ra ta kau ta ko b+h+yo/ A~M ba dz+ra nI la nI la b+h+yo/ oM badz+ra lan d+ha lan d+hab+h+yAM/ oM badz+ra dza rbe mu ra sha paH
74b6(rnying rgyud): g+ho/ AM badz+ra kha rag snying khA rAg ma b+ho/ trag dag sha tra ga ga sha d+d+ho/ trag rag sha mu tra baM kha mu tre bai rik+Sha b+h+yo/ pra ka ra ka ti tiSh+ThA b+h+yo/ pra b+hI wa g+hI she b+h+yo/ oM hU~M ka ri ka/ ba rod+d+ha rang / nI lo chu mi ha/ kha T+wAM ga/ da la tsa
74b7(rnying rgyud): tsir+tha/ mgrar ga te/ ting saM tingasaM/ e A ra li/ pra byai ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ thag rag sha drag rag sha ts+tsha/ a ting a ting hU~M/ gyi ting byi tang s+t+wa~M/ sra ting su ti d+hi/ y+ra ting y+ra ting b+h+yo/ badz+ra shwa ts+tsha/ badza
75a1(rnying rgyud): badz+ra ga ting har ti b+h+yo/ badz+ra sgrub nyid grub tid hU~M/ ta mnyas b+h+yo/ a bar d+hA la a par dz+wA la b+h+yo/ d+hu la dz+nyA na d+han b+h+yo/ d+hi na ma ma yas ma mA yas / rang gA las kyi mtha' yis te// gsang sngags
75a2(rnying rgyud): kun gyis gsad dang gso// gang gis gang la bsngags pa de// haM rba ka yi gsung gi grwa// drug sngags bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// zhes bka' stsal to// mu kha le thun mong lus kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u stel pa'o//
75a3(rnying rgyud): de nas gzhan yang khyod nyid kyi// sku dang mtshungs par bstod pa ni// hUM bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug ste// zhal g.yas dkar ba chos kyi dbyings// g.yon dmar rig pa'i ye shes nyid// dbu
75a4(rnying rgyud): mthing gnyis med 'gyur ba med// phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje ni// bag chags rtog pa ma lus 'joms// bar ma dril bu chos sgra sgrogs// tha ma sbrul zhags gdug pa 'dul// g.yon gyi dang po b+han+da ni// 'khor ba zhal du
75a5(rnying rgyud): rngub cing gsol// bar ma g.yang gzhi ma tshogs 'dul// ba ma gzu bkrag mdangs sbed// rdzu 'phrul zhabs kyi bdud bzhi gnon// dur khrod chas brgyad rdzogs pa ni// sa brgyad mnan pa'i rtog pa 'dul// kun tu brda
75a6(rnying rgyud): myo mra Sha le// dbu gcig zhal ni phyogs bzhir gzigs// sku gcig mkha' gsang phyogs bzhir bgrad// sku mdog mthing nag 'gyur ba med// chos kyi sku yi dbu gcig las// ye shes lnga yis kun tu gzigs// pha
75a7(rnying rgyud): rol gyin drug phyag rgya las// dang po rdo rje dril bu bsdams// nyon mongs 'joms shing chos sgra sgrogs// bar mdzil zhags b+han+da ni// khams gsum spros bral sa la 'god// tha ma bdud rtsi g.yang gzhi yis// thugs
75b1(rnying rgyud): mongs spyod mnyam par mdzad// mkha' bzhi pa de klong gcig tu 'khril// rigs lnga gcig tu skyed cing srung // zhabs brgyad rtogs pa'i lha brgyad gzir// rnam par thar brgyad lam la 'god// gnyis su med pa'i 'pho
75b2(rnying rgyud): byang na lnga sem gyi srin tshogs las// ye shes ma mo 'char zhing 'phro// las kyi ma mo rgod cing gtong // sprul pa'i ma mo mchod cing lha// mngon rdzogs yab yum sba la bstod// shar phyags mkha' 'gro seng ge'i gdong
75b3(rnying rgyud): rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam da gsal// sku mdog dkar mo shel ltar dag/ dkar la dag pa'i na bza' gsol// dgra gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir ba med// mi 'jigs seng ge'i gdong dang ldan// dang po rdo rje b+hatra 'bar
75b4(rnying rgyud): mi na tsun zhing 'jig/ tha ma sang gi mchog chen stod// zhabs bzhi pa cu byin steng nas bgrang // sku phyogs mkha' 'grib glang gdang // rtag pa'i rgyal ma'ong 'bar gas lA// skye ma dag sngon mo 'bar ba la// na
75b5(rnying rgyud): mthing ldan bai rjer+ya// dengu gang ma phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po rin chen b+ha nr-i 'bar// bar pa mi dpal dbyug to bsnams// za ma stag mo zhing chung stod// zhabs bzhi gshin rje'i steng na bgrad// nub phyogs
75b6(rnying rgyud): jolud ga dang // rtag pa'i rgyal mo mnyen gsal ma// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar bal// na bza' dmar mo dbang gis mdzes// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad // dang po pad+ma b+har+tha 'bar// bar ma zhags pa tri shU la/
75b7(rnying rgyud): rngam ci spying zhing drung spyod// zhabs pazhi chu bdag steng na bzang// byang gi mkha' 'gro byung chenag dang // drug pa'i rgyal mo yang gas la g.yos// sku mdag sdeng gru'abar ba pa// na bza' ljang gru rdzuH// dbugasum phyag drug 'des
76a1(rnying rgyud): bzhir bzud// dang po cas mab+harba bsnams// bar ma dbyug sa rgya zeng 'dzin// tha ma spang bzhang cung spyod// zhabs bar+b+ha gan spyad steng dung zad // nam mkha' mkha' 'ab rna ma rba// rtag pa'i rnam po nga
76a2(rnying rgyud): gsal mnyam// su mdog ser po 'bar ba la// na bza' ser po bcom gser// dbu gsum gyag drug zhabs bzhir bzang // dang po 'khor lo b+ha dz+ra 'bar// bar ma rgyal mtshan spra ze 'dzin// bla ma ldag pa zhing rung
76a3(rnying rgyud): zhabs bzhi bdud kyi steng na bgrang// yum chen rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga// dbyings kyi yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma chen sring ba bde 'gro ma// khams gsum kun gyi yum mchog ste// sku mdog mthing dag 'bar ba la
76a4(rnying rgyud): dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// phyag g.yas dang po 'khor lo bskor// bar ma g.yang gzhi bsnams shing brde ba// tha ma tshwa yi ga'u sbed// g.yod kyi dang po rin
76a5(rnying rgyud): bar pa b+hing+ga dmar gyis bkang // tha ma lcags kyi 'bar ba bsdams// zhabs kun brjid pa'i tshul gyis pazhugs// ma gcig te bla thod phreng cang/ spu mdog dkar mo 'od dang bcas// sprin dkar bre rdzogs pa'i na 'tha' can
76a6(rnying rgyud): 'ja' tshon 'od kyi cha ge can// nyi zla stong gi dbu thod can// phyag g.yas zangs lcags dkar dag la// snying gis bzlas pa'i zhags pa 'ber// g.yon pas nyi bla'i zhags pa 'phed// zhabs gnyis brjid pa'i tshul gyis bzhu
76a7(rnying rgyud): nyi ma khros pa'i dbang po che// khru mdog dkar mo 'bar ba la// na bza' shel gyi gau zu gsol// phyag na shel gyi spu bri bsdams// khrag 'thur khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar ba la// na bza' g.yu yi go zugasol/
76b1(rnying rgyud): phyag na tho khrag 'dzin cing gsol// bdud rtsi khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// na bza' le bzhan go Ta gsal// phyag na bdud rtsi'i bus pa bsnams// srid gsum ltos pa'i drabang ma che// sgra mdog se
76b2(rnying rgyud): ba la// na bza' ser pags ltar 'tshor// phyag na rgyal mtshan cing zhugs bsdams// dkar mo sring ba'i rgyan byed ma// lag na sra yi zhags pa zlogs// sngon mo dbyings phyug rgya la dzo// zhing gi dbyig pa rdzagan ba rnams// dam
76b3(rnying rgyud): mo 'dag nyid rten mo ni// phyag na nu mra'i dgas pa bsdams// ser mo chen mo gcig myong me// rgyag na zhing grig yang gzhi brda ba// dkar mo chen mo mig gcig me// phyag na d+haHzlum po bsdams// drag mo chen mo mche ba can//
76b4(rnying rgyud): na byar+Na phul mang thogs// dmar mo che ni mo dbang lhud ma// phyag na b+han+da lcang lo thogs// ser mo chen mo cho 'phel ma// phyag na thod pa rgya gra ma thogs// las kyi srid pa chags byed mi// spyi mdog mthing nas 'bar ba la// na pa
76b5(rnying rgyud): g.yang gzhi rlon pa gsol// phyag na tsit+ta 'angar ba bsdams// rnal 'byor srid pa cha skyoms ma// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// stag lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// lag na thod pa khrag bkang thogs// ma mo e ka dz+wa rje ma// sku mdog
76b6(rnying rgyud): dkar gsal 'bar ba la// na bza' sbyin gyi gozu gsol// 'ang 'tshon 'brang ba'i 'od kyis btsun// kha r+t+r-i dang ni zhing chen bsdams// 'dod khams gtso mo chen mo ni// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar ba la// su snod stag gi g.yeng gzhi la/
76b7(rnying rgyud): spad zangs kyi sbeng mas g.yogs// phyag na bdud kyi tham shing thogs// gling bzhi spyi phud bdag mo ni// dkar mo sgeg pa'i cha byed can// ni bza' shel gyi go zu gsol// phyag na lcags sukyu 'od 'gro thogs// don chen srid 'debs chen meni//
77a1(rnying rgyud): mdog sngon mo chen po la// TI khru ba nazug sol// phrag dgang / yegan nabs// brtag tha dang khrugs// thu y-i ma byung dmar pos/ la banan dmar ma gzugasol// phyag dang
77a2(rnying rgyud): bsdams shing gsol// rdo rje gar dbang drug ma// sku mdog ser mo 'bar ba la// nu bzla' gse hU~M ba~M zla gsil/ phyag dathong khrag spyang la rdzogs// mem hA ting den mo ni// yul shU la k+Sha~M go zugs y-i/ lag na rgya la~M
77a3(rnying rgyud): thogs// grub ting ser mo chen mo ni// sku la gser gyi go zla gsol// lag nas yi dkyil 'khor thogs// sman ting dmar mo chen mo ni// su la byi ru'i gozu gsol// lag nA me yi dkyil 'khor thogs// du tong nag mo chen mo
77a4(rnying rgyud): ni// skra lag yu yi go zu gsol// laphra na rlung gi dkyil 'khor thogs// srin mo rkyen mo skam pa mo// sku mdog dkar mo so zu can// lag nu shel phu b+han+da thogs/ srin mo chen mo phor thogs ma// sa mdog skyon mo go zu can/
77a5(rnying rgyud): nazod khrag bsnams shing gsol// srin mo chen mog yang gzhi ma// sku mdog dmar mo go zla can// phyag na b+ha hA thod sbam thogs// sbyin mo chen mo zab mo// de mang mo phyag na pazlas rlon thogs// srin mo chen mo gsod byed ma//
77a6(rnying rgyud): b+han+da ral gri thogs// srin mo chen mo ze byed ma// ser nag b+han+da lpags kyu thogs// srin mo chen mo sgom byed ma// dkar mo b+hany+dza rngon pa thogs// shar kyai dkar mo mche gtsig sam// phyag na thod pa dkar po thogs/
77a7(rnying rgyud): nag mo kha 'byams ma// phyag na b+han+da sngon po thogs// dud kyi dmar mo mchu 'jib me// phyag ni b+han+da dmar po thogs// byang gi ser mo dang ldag ma// phyag na d+har+tha ser po thogs// gling bzhi ma gyogs ma lha yi sring // dkar
77b1(rnying rgyud): gas byugs// pabyung 'a thung skyong ga she rdo'i thod/ ma jug na tha dathug 'grus// dam ma ga phyug pa dgal thong // dbang bsgral na gagags pa zugs/ drugs ra can nan na na
77b2(rnying rgyud): co da 'din bskye sa// legs ldan du brnyes byas dang // phrin las ste// theg pa ni byi pa las 'gyur ba med// gsung mi zag sang ba dang / batshams
77b3(rnying rgyud): spel pa'i Ta// yon na mamam phran srim chags// rnams drug thal gang+gAg nga// nga 'gu' ngas na srid pa'i grol// des 'ga' gdu sa sa gas ba'i // ram ngag zhan pa 'byor ba
77b4(rnying rgyud): la// 'dzig pa stegs kyi tshul// phrin kyang drung srong chas kyis brjod// ma ma tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bka' phul to// sA kha lce lus kyi dkyil 'khor la ba stod pA'i le drug pa'o//
77b5(rnying rgyud): de nas gzhan yang ( thug sa thugs kyi dgongs pa dag/ ma lus bkang bar byab yang // gyi thams cad gzugs kyis bslang // r-i rab ri bdun bcas pa dang // blang bzhi gling sman 'chas pa dang //
77b6(rnying rgyud): yuMg bcas pa dag // 'dod bar sa ste rang shes wan me// mA kha' snying bya dang 'dab chags tshal// ra shes rta dang zag men thang // shel dkar lug la cha nAr// gtan gzan gzug pan rlung gyi// mkha' la n+ya dngas
77b7(rnying rgyud): bral gnas dang me 'og 'dzal// pra dang de re ngas par bcas// ji ltar 'byor ba kun gyis bkang // dang du ma hA lu khas bkang // lus kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa ba ni// byang chub sems dpa' gro zang tshogs// bskyed dang srog dang rtsom
78a1(rnying rgyud): bdang// rnga ba dang badz+ra da lta d+mag dang // 'jug pa sanas TI rdung ba dang // dang dkyil ng+gA sacwa shA chu // sa sa r+b+ba kyus pa// / dadag nga dra nas// gas par nga /
78a2(rnying rgyud): dang // snang ba dang ni stong ba ste// zabs dang shi seM sa nyid kyis mo// bde ba'i rnam pa gsal ba ste/ gsal bden mi rtog pa'o// mi rtog pa ni po shes kyi// ye shes de ni dbyings kyis so// ma zus pa ni des bskangs pas// sangs rgyas byang
78a3(rnying rgyud): sa dpa' dang // rgyal 'phras dang bcus pas nyeg// yon tan tshogs su bkang ba yang // gyes pa'i ma dri bud med kya // tir rgya mchog mtshan ldan de// gyi nang khrub kyis dag bras te// shes pa dag gis byin brlabs nas// phus kyis mngon rdzog
78a4(rnying rgyud): po ste// yid kyis grub le khrid nyid // rnab snang mdzad pa rjes par te// 'od 'bar gsal mdzod kyis so// khrag gis mnyen gasngal matid de// yang dag gsalam dbug kyis so// gzhan yang dan med nang rol dang // dbang po yan la/
78a5(rnying rgyud): ting lag gis// ma mtshogs dang bcas pa yi// mu gsung bcas pa ma lus bzang // phrin las khyad par las kyi mchog/ bsgrub pa'i don gyir bskal pa'i rgya// rngog mdangs ji snyed gnas pa yis// phrin las bdag med drag bkang // badz+rab
78a6(rnying rgyud): na po rgyun du ni// bskyed dang dbug dang gzhug pa dang // bcing dang gnyis su med pa dang // spyan drangs pa dang phyag btsang zhing // mchod rdzing bstod pa bzlas pa yis// bskang bar bya ba nyid yin no// 'di la byang chub bla med phyir// smin par bya ba 'di nyid kyi//
78a7(rnying rgyud): kyidang ni dang dasang ba dzes// de'i byang chub mam shes byed// bum pa dang ni shes rab dang // bya rdzob dang dam byang chub sa mas// ri po gang gis yang sbyin / rgyal ba'i kyil lang ba // rnamam pa re 'an dzas tung pa'o// nga
78b1(rnying rgyud): nga can du// nas gzhas ma ba dang // ga/ nga // 'ad 'a gas/ na rna dang// // slong dang
78b2(rnying rgyud): dzi// byinapa brgyan gyirnal 'byong mi// mi mi mim rtog pa bsam pa tshugs// rdzong rgya badran pa dang // thong pa byed 'dzin pa drug/ thang chu'i mim kyi rang bzhin do// 'dzin pa dang ni bzung ba dang / na nyi
78b3(rnying rgyud): dang rig pa pa'i// 'jig sa ba thams cacad// dang thong pa slang brdzogs pa te// chom sran dpa yang mang po na// pe bzhin pa sa gas zhing / mtshan ted dgro bar byas ma rnaMs shid// 'dre brel med par sa nga // ting shA ba
78b4(rnying rgyud): shi pa da ba / shing/ yi mi rjes kyis sbyi / ma nA brjid // mthus pa sa par byo na// rang da// ga pa'i kyi
78b5(rnying rgyud): du yi na 'a bab / zhes sa sams gca gags pas hU~M / yum tho pa su 'i 'ong ba'i 'byos sa kyi / su bya ma bya ba shA/
78b6(rnying rgyud): ga rten pa'i sa ma ngasal napan rdzogs rgyam po ba d+hi shA rjes pasgru ba d+d+ha/ btsun pa'i gas thams myigs pa ma babyong chubasems dpa' darjes rgyags pa gnas pa / rje'i
78b7(rnying rgyud): ma nga du da// ma su sa sa / sa sa sa kya rgya sa sa sa
79a1(rnying rgyud): shAgang da du grangs su sa phul b+ha rAn/ bda'adang / rig pa 'dzin 'das kyang da pas bya ba/ 'dugs pa 'dzin lardzu 'amal ba// 'dadang ba thos pang da phyag gang/ tshun
79a2(rnying rgyud): dang bamang sa kyis rlab 'i chen pode/ de pa gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsurig tshogs yang dag par 'dus pa'i gnas/ ri'i chu'i ba dang / grong thar chen byed de/ drur khrod kyi gnas ma drangs pa dang / mthong ter gyi gtsug bang dag na/ rig yo
79a3(rnying rgyud): chen po rab tu 'dus pa 'di rta te/ bde snye gshegasa' thams cad kyi bla'i rigra pa 'don pa dang / gsung gi ribra 'dzin pa dang // thugs kyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / yon tan sI rlig pa 'dzin pa dang / phrin las kyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / dgra sbyong gi rnyed pa 'dzin pa dang /
79a4(rnying rgyud): rtsub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / drug shul gyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / phyag rgya'i rig pa le// na pa dang / grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / sa'i dag pa 'dzin pa dang / rab tu smin pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / shes rab kyi rigling 'a dang / dmi tshig gi reg pa dngon pa dang / dwags
79a5(rnying rgyud): rin pa 'dzin pa dang / slar gso ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / de la sogs pa bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs nya ba'i sras su gyur pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa du ma rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas sems dpa'ardo rje 'dzin// chos kyi dbang sdug chos kyi kya//
79a6(rnying rgyud): drang gzung ba rjis kyi don// rang gi rig pa kyi 'khong la bstan// 'dra ba gshegs bzangs cad kyi// dgengs parab tu brdzu pa'i dod// ba'i tshul du 'gad pa ni// mchog dang par mdam na la sogs// gdul bya'i khyad dper grong ldang //
79a7(rnying rgyud): nyid du bstan pa'i yul// sangs rgyas rnams dang de yi sras// gang gis 'dul ba de nyid la// de dang mthun pa'i gzugs ston te// 'bad pas rab tu brtsam par bya// dper na nad kyi gdungs pa zhig/ gso byed ldan pa 'tshal ba'i phyir/ bar tu 'bad
79b1(rnying rgyud): dras gyu/ da tan ngal padang / 'dul garnam kyid kyis gtid// ta du dran dadang po su// babs ma da ba po gtabs pa// dpan pa'i sa dpas na nyid// 'dang ba shing bsal ba ba ma yod// gzha yang bas pasasam ma dra /
79b2(rnying rgyud): bu gzhan// ma sog+sas yong spong ldan pa yisa?// gsos cang 'tsho ba 'i 'gyur rnyed// thog mtha' beng pa'i rwa bong badras// yang dag ma bzhid pan+d+ha/ mi shes rmongs pa'i bus rnams// ma dang mnongs pa'i rig dzin// steng dang
79b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs de grog/ mig du thal ba'i rjem dun// gsul ba kyis pamed// de du rid rabang// bde ni byed mi rdzas ltar// bajig ca pa lam pa/ papa ma pa
79b4(rnying rgyud): rab ra da // mig zhan rig pa ni// thar pa'i las la gro da zhes pa// rdo rje can dag nye bar brten// de 'i sanges par zab dang // rdus gi sum sangs d+d+hi rnams kyi gsun/ pa nyid tu bya ba yang // don tu yul
79b5(rnying rgyud): da dang // grong nas gong du skyel ba dang / rkyenam / 'i rtsi bu / sbyin pas phreng sa shing byung du / myang du brtan pa mdzad par tho ba ba ga tshigs po mi gnas 'a/
79b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dregra bcom nyan thos rang rgyal dag/ ro'i rtse bo dang ma pa'i// yan tan gyon tshogs ma lus pa// gongs dag pa brten nas 'byung // gsum dang lnga yi 'bras bu yis// drug dang nyi shu la sogs pa'o// 'a#
79b7(rnying rgyud): bcu dang lnga sogs paskyed// de dag 'di la brtan nas spang // thun meng pa yi sangs rgyas dag/ grangs med gas rba du thogs par snang // snyigs mtshan gyi sems can dag ga ma sha da/ 6// mthung nad mang zhal bzhan/
80a1(rnying rgyud): gcig du ma pod min pas/ dmas sku mthung de// dag ca po dgra ping lag/ spyo pa 'amal pas smra bdag/ rung t+yAng gnas ldan mi gang // dang ba'i mang gnas la phrogs pa// byang chub
80a2(rnying rgyud): dpa thad// de bas gnas skabs mthar zug tu// 'brang bu chen po 'thob 'dod pas// ngoms pa med cing sdug bsngal ba'o// stozlab med cing dka' ba bzod// gtor pod yangs pa'i blo dang ldan// chog par mi 'dzin rtsol ba yis//
80a3(rnying rgyud): dper na 'jig rten bye mo gnas// las dang bzo la rtsol bar byed// 'di ni thar pa'i pha rol tu// 'grod cing phyin par 'dod pa yis// rdo rje 'chang pa'i tshul 'dra ba// mtshan nyid ldan pa ces me sten// rigs bzang chung ngu spyod lam
80a4(rnying rgyud): thos dang yon can brtson 'grus ldan// yang dag don rtog ston par mkhas// zos pas mi khengs shes rab che// 'jig rten rnyed pa don mi bsgrub// snying rje byang chub sems kyis 'dzin// gyo med dka' ba ma lus brjod// man ngag ldan zhing lam la goms/
80a5(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyud rig dang drod tshad ma las// ma lus shes bya'i gnas kun rtogs// bslab pa'i gnas kun zhib par dpyod// tshe 'di'i yon tan donA ma gnyer// de la sogs pa'i yon tan tshegs// ma lus rigs par ldan pa bsten// ston byed nges pa'i
80a6(rnying rgyud): gang zag kyang // de nyid ldan pa'i don grub po// 'jig rten gso dpyad sgra dang gnas// rig pa nyid dang phrin las tshogs// gang bstan de nyid kyi yin no// 'tsho byed thabs sbyor lus dang sems// stobs skyed pa dang 'jig rten pa'i// tshul mtshungs
80a7(rnying rgyud): ngo bra la yod bcas// nyin 'brel tsam gyi gnas skabs so// gros dang phung po nang dang dgra// gnas dang 'brel pa longs spyod dang // bgegs dang sems dang brtson 'gros nang // lam gyi grogs 'gyur cha mthun zhing // gyi ning gsang ba'i tshogs
80b1(rnying rgyud): ta// rab tu san par byed par // zas pa'i lam dang rim pa gnyis// ldan pas rgal bani mas bzlas drung // mthong ba dang ni gnas pa yis// gnas shing zab pa bstan byas pa// de dag dmas kyibye bgag/ dus gsam sangs tab rdzang/
80b2(rnying rgyud): 'drang ba'i// kun nas bsgrangs pa'i bsam pa ni// 'jig rten khe grags rnyed pa dang // bkur sti gzhan gyi dor skyong dang // nga tsa khre la lha dbang med dang // rdzogs dang dregs pa dang rgyud phyir// lus 'dir bcan ldan phyir min// 'khor ba'i med pa don
80b3(rnying rgyud): dang // gcig pu zhi ba'i phyir min zhing // gzhan don mchog tu bya phyir de// rang rgyud spod pa'i mthun sbyor dang // 'khor ba'i yon tan dga' bde dang // zhi ba phyogs gcig dmigs pa bzlog/ mthar thug rdzogs dang gzhan don stong // nang pa
80b4(rnying rgyud): sran pa ldan nyid dang // nad mos pa dang de yi g.yog/ nyon mongs nad dang de sos pa'i// sman dang sman pa grags bzhin no// rgyal po tshong dang de yi nor// dgra dang dbul ba'i 'dra shes min// thos shing bas ma dang bsgom pa yis// rtsu ba dang rdol dang
80b5(rnying rgyud): dug can gyi// skyon rnams spangs te ma yengs shing // ma brjed pa dang gnyen po'i don// bsngags par ldan pa'i 'du shes so// 'di la ma 'ongs dus dag tu// lta ba'i thab pa ni 'di lta ste// rdzo gas byas sku yi bstan pa dang // gnas pa'i
80b6(rnying rgyud): dus su bab pa'i tshe// dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' dag/ gnas dus mnyam pa bzhi pa'o// gsung tsam 'dzin pa'i dus su ni// rab tu lhag par blta bya ste// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// sku yi gdul byed pa zad de//
80b7(rnying rgyud): 'ongs pa dag ma byung zhing // gsung tsam nyid la brten pas na// thugs brgyad sprul ba'i sprul pa ni// dus de nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur// rtog pa'i dus kyi rten can dag/ las dang bsam pa ma dag pas// dngos kyi gdul bya ma yin te// gzugs mi/
81a1(rnying rgyud): sa na na smra// pa du sun // skab
81a2(rnying rgyud): yang su smid/ na pa

81b1(rnying rgyud): ba 'dzid// maud kyisas ng+yas rgyas ldan ta drang // mtshungs panyid thab byung d+ha// de las log pa gzung rtsibasam// khro dang bsgrub nyid rnams spangs// bsam pa thams cad lags pasams te// ma pag/ bas ma mi 'byung /
81b2(rnying rgyud): rjod pa cishig yod// bcom ldan rig pa 'dzin pa yis// rdzob gyu de las byung // ci 'byor pa yi yo byad bstab// phyi ma dus na stog pa can// dus dang nyon mongs longs stod dang // tshe dang bA pa bcur drug te//
81b3(rnying rgyud): gang zad tsan// brgyad srid na ma du'i dus// dus min 'che ba shin d+ha mang // 'drid ni d+hA gti mug dang // brgyal phrag dog ste sogs dang // stob sa rgyad yi gnyen po drung // longs spyod rnams kyi myongs shing na// dI ra
81b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis brgyad sogs 'dzin// de dus rig pa 'dzin min pas// skyabs mchog sus kyang mi dus te// de la mthar thug blta bar bya// de la sdig dang bya mid pa'i// nyon mongs las byung ma lus spangs// dge ba phyogs sdung bya ba'i cha// gnyen po
81b5(rnying rgyud): phyogs rnams spyad cing bsrung // spang blar gyi nang mi bya ste// gtsug gi nor bu bzhin du bkur// dngos po bsam pa yul rnams kun// rnam dag sgro yi ting nge 'dzin// chos dang lus dang longs sdod dang // rang gi dgos pa rab spangs te/
81b6(rnying rgyud): de nyid phyogs su rab tu spang // lus ngag yid kyi 'bad pa ging // skye gsung thugs kyi rjes 'brangs shing // dka' thub spyad pa dang bsngos te// rim gro dang ni bsnyen bkur bya// thub pa chen po 'jig rten mkhyen// gang du bstan pa 'das gyur te/
81b7(rnying rgyud): rgya phag dgu'i dus nyid du// nga yi tshul ltar 'chos pa nyid// tshig don yan lag mkhas gyur kyang // nga rgyal dregs dang rloms pa yis// gzhan dag rten dang chos kun la// khyad tu gsod cing gshe srung brjod// bslab bya kun la lags gnas
82a1(rnying rgyud): cang // gzhan na ma spo rang bzhin 'dod// sems mi lhag bsam bzang gnas kyang // 'jig rten chos kyi rab gapangs te// tha na la ra snang // mthang thugag nadon lags cang /
82a2(rnying rgyud): gzhan rnams sdig par myod// legs kyang de yi yon tan dang // spo bdag gi rgya che yang // gong ma'i rig 'dzin gcor mi 'dzin// lus ngag dge ba rab 'bad kyang // rang gi sems snang yang mi rul// man ngag tsun pa yod so ma yang // bsrang sdoms
82a3(rnying rgyud): bkag mtshams mi shes// longs spyod phan pa'i sems yod kyang // bgrod bya'i gnas la mi mkhas 'byung // gzhi dang rang bzang legs gnas kyang // ltos pa'i gang zag blo ring dang // rtags dang drod tshad mi rtogs shing // sangs rgyas
82a4(rnying rgyud): nyid tu khas 'che zhing // rloms pa za dag skyed pa 'byung // kha cig rang gi phyogs 'dzin cing // de nyid legs pa nyid du gzung // gzhan phyogs tha dad sna tshogs pas// thabs dang yan lag kun myong zhing // sdod cing sun 'byin 'geg par
82a5(rnying rgyud): rjes su gzung ba'i yul dag kyang // 'dod pa'i yon tan gtsor 'dzin cing // longs spyod g.yeng ba'i rjes 'brang bas// 'jig rten chos kyi dus 'das pas// 'di la don yod legs shes smra// kha cig nang gi yon tan ldan// phyi rol chos kyis ci
82a6(rnying rgyud): 'ching zhing // gcig pu zhi bad 'dod pa dang // gzhan don nus kyang skyo ba'ang 'byung // kha cig mang du thos shing bsam// legs spyad rnams kyi don shes kyang // gzhan gyi 'jig rten chos bu mthong // rgya che chos la skyo 'gyod cing // gzhan 'jug
82a7(rnying rgyud): pa'ang sun 'byin 'gyur// kha cig dang por mnyam bzhag pa'i// myong ba rung zad la brten nas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgyu// bka' lung thos bas ma 'geg pa 'byung // kha cig mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i// mdo sogs brjod pa gtso bor

83a1(rnying rgyud): za'athang 'bab// nyan kyang sa lkugs par snar pa yis// snang sanas/ sdug bsngal thogs 'chad// dge dang lag pa kyang 'gro med pas// bdapying 'grib cing bas bdon no// zhabs dang shas dang
