83b5(rnying rgyud): nga bye bdapa' gas / dpa 'i sprin ni slong mi pa rgyags// rti nga ba'i 'ag// sdigathapa pa zhi nga mi// de das ma 'a rdzogs
83b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdzogs kyis brgyad// bsgrub tha sgrub par byed pa las// rten dang rjes kyang de 'dzi ro// bstsol bya ba zhing par bya ba dziH// b+hang nga gsang de grags nga ni// zab yin tan zin las dang // drug tshul slong dang brji cang sngags// rang bzhin
83b7(rnying rgyud): su kyis thab pa dang // sadang pam la gnas pa dang // bany+tsa chog kyi ba jogs de// 'byu pa dbang ba dang // sade ngag su myi byed pa dang // gis brgyad lamal ba nga// rgyagatsun pa dang // 'amathos bzangs bya
84a1(rnying rgyud): dang // rdorje dzin chen ng+ga dang // phrin las dang ni dab 'dus pa'i// zhing myong byed dang mkha' la 'gro// yab yum mo ma'i rnam pa dag/ phrin las sgrub par byed dang bcas// nga dang nga yi tshul 'ang zhing // dbu can rdzong /
84a2(rnying rgyud): tshugs na rgyan dang // mthul rgyan dpung rgyan brang rgyan dang // stan gyi rin chen mgur rdza dang // cod pan phyag gdu bzhabs gdub dang // stong g.yog skad g.yogs zar tshags// pa ti dang li rnams kyis brgyan// rnga gling dung dang / ma ru// dril bya nga te cing
84a3(rnying rgyud): ting shag/ kha T+wAM gri gr-ig zod pa 'dzin// rang gi sngags kyi sgra sgrogs pas// 'jig rtem khams kun rab tu grags// A~M badz+ra sa pra gu ru hU~M phaT/ de dag bsnyen pa'i yo byad kyang // sha dang bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// dri dang spyan rdza thos lnga dang // ro drug btung ba
84a4(rnying rgyud): yan lag lnga// bsreg dang bdug dang btsos pa'i rlangs// 'dod pa'i longs spyod ma lus shing // klu gar bro dang sbed 'jo dang // god dang steg cing 'khrig pa dang // rol dang stobs dang bza' ba dag/ ma lus mnyes pa byed ba yi// thabs dang yan la
84a5(rnying rgyud): bsam mi byeb// ji ltar mdzes dang 'byor ba rnams// bstod dang bsgrub pa'i tshal gyis dbul// nam ma pA'i khams kyi 'jig rten nas// rig pa 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems// ji snyed pa dang ji lta ba'i// sku gsung thugs dang 'on tan tshogs//
84a6(rnying rgyud): ngang 'khor dang yongs su srid// ma lus lus pa med pa kun// gsal 'tshang ldan sdug gzi byin 'bar// 'gyid bgu sgeg nyams 'ang tshul can// gar dang 'drug stangs nyams dang wa'o// ldeg dang g.yo dang 'brar ba dang // rmugs dang mchongs dang
84a7(rnying rgyud): 'khreg 'i slod dang sra tsong smrab dang // gas tshigasngags dang hU~M tshogangs// ba zhing gsal dang mi rtag dang // zhi bar gnas dang lhag par mdzod // mnyam par 'azhig dang rjes la thog// ril por ba de rje sa yul /
84b1(rnying rgyud): dngang bsam gtan dang // ting nge 'dzin dang srog dang rtsol// sgyu ma'i lus dang 'od gsal dang // zung du 'jug dang spro ba dang // ngo bo rnam pa rang bzhin gyis// lam gyi chos su snang ba dang // rgyu dang 'bras bus yongs bsdus pa'i// chos kun rab tu spang bar bya//
84b2(rnying rgyud): de ltar 'phan rig 'dzin// 'das dang ma'ongs da lta ba// thams cad kun gyis dgongs shing 'grub// grub pa drag po'i dngos grub dang // thod phreng bsam 'grub dpung du sdud// dang po gnas nas spya drangs te// rang gi gzugs brtan dag la sti ma// rgyag
84b3(rnying rgyud): btsal mchod cing bstod dang bsnyen// dbab dang dral ba dbang dang bstim// dran dang las su byas pas bsten// gnas pa sbyar ba dang lta ba dang // yid la bya dang sgom pa dang // sar gnas pa dang spyod pa dang // rab tu brten dang thob pa dang // ma lus pa dang rdzogs
84b4(rnying rgyud): pa yis// rig pa 'dzin pa nyams su myong // zhes bka' stsal to// rig pa 'dzin pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa bsdus pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// rig 'dzin tshogs la 'di skad bshad// e ma ngag
84b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i tshogs// dri ma phyi ma'i dus dag tu// nga yi rjes su rig pa 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni// shes shing lta ba 'di lta ste// srid dang zhi ba dngos dang stong // 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// bde sdug rtog pa rab snang yang // chos can
84b6(rnying rgyud): nyid ma lus stong // shes pa'i gnas ni rdul tsam med// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // rten 'brel 'byung dang ldog pa sogs// rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong // dngos po mtshan ma mtshan nyid dang // mtshan nyid gzhi pa sogs pa kun// mi skyes mi 'gag mi rtag
84b7(rnying rgyud): ning // mtshad mi 'gro mi 'ong ste// yod dang med pa'i phyogs bral ba/ 'di ni kud la khyab pa'o// de ni rtogs par byed ste// bsrub pa'i gzhi ni sems yin to// snang dang srid pa sems las byung // de nyid brtag cing bstan du med// mkhas pa zhig gis tshol byed kya/
85a1(rnying rgyud): nam yang rnyed cing mthong ba med// sems can rang bzhin byang chub ste// byang chub nyid kyang de yin no// de yang shes pa rig 'dzin mchog/ 'dod pa de la yongs mi 'byung // nam mkha'i mthar zug rdol ba dashin/
85a2(rnying rgyud): ma lta bur gang shes pa// nga la mchog 'brur yu mi ring // tha snyad tsam gyis mtshon pa yis// rtogs shing rig par 'gyur ba yin// dper na rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa ro // ma myangs rtogs par mi 'gyur te// nam zhig rtsol bas byang gyur na// the tshom bral ba'i gyi
85a3(rnying rgyud): te// smad kyi lang rje'i ngo shes 'gyur// de bzhin yang dag mtha'i mi don// mamatshon mtshon par mi 'gyur te// brarda dang thabs dang byin rlabs dang // nga pe don rtags kyi shes bya ste// ngos bzung drod tshad ldan byas na// rang rig ye shes mthong bar 'gyur// gnas
85a4(rnying rgyud): dang bgrong dang zong pa ni// thos pa tsam gyis mi 'byung ste// ji ltar sman gyi ro 'bras dag/ 'azungs pas nad la mi phan bzhin// nyams su ma byangs chos rnams kyang // gnyen por mi 'gyur de bzhin no// de bzhin chu chen sgrol ba dang // gzhan gyi phun sum
85a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa dang // ri mo dmus bong ba bstan dang // 'on pa'i rna bar sgra bsgrags dang // sa bon me yis bsregs pa dang // sa yi sa rnyogs pa'i zla bzhin du// matogs gzhi dang ma bgrod lam// ma bsrubs 'bras bu de bzhin no// gzhan yang me ni gtsub
85a6(rnying rgyud): de dang // mang ni 'o ma la gnas dang // 'bras bu sa bon las 'grung yang // ma bsrubs ma bsrubs ma bskyed par// de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur bzhin// ma mthong ma shes mgo zhing // ma bsgrubs ma brten de mi 'byung // thabs med shes rab 'ba' zhig pas//
85a7(rnying rgyud): zad pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur// thabs gcig pus kyang 'chings 'gyur te// shes rab bral bas grol ba zin// gnyis ka med pa 'khor ba'i lam/ phyogs gcig nyid ni gnyi kas 'chings// zung du 'jug cing dbyer med par// spyad ces rgyal ba
85b1(rnying rgyud): pa cas// drang por spyad rdzob tsam du badzad// dra shes na ni nga gub tan// bye ma'i spyan+ta rig pa na// kha jig mi tshul chos shing // gang zag rtag pa'i bdag par byag// hUM bad dag kyang //
85b2(rnying rgyud): dgakyis pacog chug pa shes gapad byed pa pas to// dbadun bang nam
85b3(rnying rgyud): den rnyed pa nyams// de la rim pa yod cing ngo // gtir don ng+ge/ nus pa thogs med de 'brus bu// babyed pa'i dus na de nga// mi babyed du snyan yod de pa // da rang / de
85b4(rnying rgyud): dang 'dradangs 'byung shes// rtag par 'a dang denye te/ bsrid par mi dus par// kyi nas rkyer gyis bgyid phyir ro// 'dres bu mi bskyed dus na'o// rus bathogs med med ne/ rdzogs mang thog pa 'acas byang ba
85b5(rnying rgyud): po spyod bri pa so// debs thig par dun byed de/ nyi cig tha 'byo/ myi pa thugs pad/ rtsa bu 'bras bur bye bzhi ni rigs/ ngon byed da phyir/ 'dren na
85b6(rnying rgyud): yang khyod kyi 'bras bu de// miHga rgya nis grub phyir// phyogs gcig rtags pa khyab rte ni// 'bras du yod mi med pa byed// yod ni bskyed pa mi dgod te// 'bras bu thug med skyon du 'gyur// mad byes par 'dod na ni// red bde la dzu
85b7(rnying rgyud): dam// gdan thum zung // gdags kyi'i chu du ma thub phyir// ngan rtag gi med na skyed pa do// mthub gang zag padag cos pa// kun la lan rtags me kying // daskyebs na gang thag gi/ bdag tu dzin pade bgad dang/
86a1(rnying rgyud): chos lce bdag 'dzin drangs pa ni/ nyan rdog dang la sams ca gyi// chab kyi bdag cas med par brtags// dang ba de yis gzung ba'i dul/ thadral 'byung zhing marig pa// g.yag spangabs
86a2(rnying rgyud): de la 'dzid pa'i sems kun zhig/ tshogs drug don dam rdzas su 'dong // de ni mi rigs ma grub ste// gzung lus chos can don dam du// med de gcig dang du mar brel// de yis ma khyal yod ce na// gcig tu yod dam du mar yod// gcig
86a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs dang bcas ma bcas// bcas na gcig tu ma grub ste/ phyogs tshwa 'dod pas du mer 'drar// phyogs med 'ong pa ma dzub ste// rdzogs cha med pas dngos med 'gyur// de 'dod ce na sngar yod nyams// gal te du mar yod ce na// de nyid
86a4(rnying rgyud): gcis la ltos ma ltos// ma ltos du ma'i 'dod pa min// gcig med du ma mi dgrub ste// ltos ni de nyid ma grub pas// ltos pa'i du ma ga la srid// gcig bgrangs du ma yin phyir ro// gcig pu'i sangs rgyas 'dod rnams ni// phyi rol yul
86a5(rnying rgyud): med de nyid la// 'dzin pa don dmi rdzas su 'dod// de mi rigs te yul med na// de la 'angon pa mi 'byung ste/ rmi la me snyam mgrub na// der 'dzin sems kyang mi 'grub bzhin// rang rgyal 'dod pa 'gags par 'gyur// sems tsam 'dzin pa zhes
86a6(rnying rgyud): pastsal rnams sems kyi snang ba ste// gang 'dzi ga tib kyis stong pa yis// bya byed gsal ba gzhan mo ltos// kyang 'i don dmadzes su 'dong // de nyid mi rigs dgag pa ni// 'dzin pa'i sems de chos can de// don dam 'jal ba'i don med/
86a7(rnying rgyud): dam nga ban/ dab / phyogs gcig khyab pa med ces// dza~M kyi 'bras bu 'gags pa sas// yod med sbed ba der gnong // sems kyi gang cig sngam las// khyim gyi mabya /
86b1(rnying rgyud): sas yo ba sa// b+ha mgul tamed las bya// yod na bdag gam gzhan las rgya// bdag las byon yod pas sa// gzhan las sbed 'bras kur// ngas pang log par dbye 'ang kyang// byed pa khren sa kris// kyi na
86b2(rnying rgyud): 'bung da ci// na btags 'dod yod pa ste// phar btags rdul du gyur bsas// phan med pa skyed pa ma grub te// rtswa med gzhan la ma stod rkyer+ya// skye ma mi skye rkyon dang bcas// de gyi dkun gzhim bcos pa// ded dam thos dang bral sa
86b3(rnying rgyud): dza sangs rgyas rnams/ dus gsum dud du 'di skad gsungs// kun gzhi ni nyon mongs pas// btags pa nga bdag 'dzin pa de// lu kyi nga 'og mthang dudus sra// btsal bas gang rdum ma nyid de// bdagra gar
86b4(rnying rgyud): dzad rnams de bzhir ro// yul gyi khyad par du tshogs kun// kun rdzo ba bral rol snang hUM// dbu rib can gyis sma sha bzhin// sems la gzugs dbyibs chung brgyan/ 'thung rdzog ltos pa yod min te// 'dus mi byas pas dam mkha' bzhin
86b5(rnying rgyud): yul gyi snang ba 'di dag kun// ma 'ongs mi 'gro gnas med de// 'ja' tshon smin dang dbur de zhen/ yod dang med pa mtha' dbyas kun// ma grub pa ni dbu ma'o// ches nyid dang ni de shes pa// sdom dang bral la chos bral bzha// bsal dang gzhag pa
86b6(rnying rgyud): yang yidadi// dge ba nyid de la dag pa srung // dge par mthong nas rnam par grol// chos bdag med pa'i mthar thug go// zhi bar gnas pas lhag par mthong // mnyam par gzhag pa'i rjes la thob// ting 'dzin las su rung ba ni// tshogs gnyis gru
86b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'bras bu med// rnal 'byor pa yi blo khyad kyis// rim bzhin spyad pa rog mnas// gong mi ris nas sar 'phar te// lus ngag byab gcong spyod dang // thabs spod shas rab med pa dang // dag pa gsum gyis gnas byung dang // zung du 'brel pa
87a1(rnying rgyud): gnas dang // dbyings dang ye shes 'du bral med// skad cig tsam gyi ye shes kyi// bsags thob brtan pas rten du 'gyur// kha cig tu ni mngon shes dang // sbyang ba lnga dang bzod pa 'jus// dri ma dang bral shes rabatho/
87a2(rnying rgyud): nus bathogs med chos zur 'dod// kha cig tu ni smin cing grol// rgod krur bzhi dang shes pa gsum// 'jug pa lnga yi bdag nyid kyis// yongs rdzogs snang ba'i skur 'dod de// mdor brdzus rang gzhan phun tshogs don// spang thob shes pa'i bdag nyid can/
87a3(rnying rgyud): sbyangs shing rdzogs pas rten du 'gyur// khyab cing bden par nges dang ldan// ma 'ongs rnyog ma can gyi 'dus// nga yi bde gshegs ston pa la// kha cig chos sku gcig tu 'dod// kha cig gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi// lnga dang drug gi so sor 'dod// rang gis grub
87a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul du snang // mtshan nyid gzhi ni chos sku gcig/ ltos med ma byas lhun gyis grub// gnyis ni gzugs su snang ba ste// mkhyen zhing thugs rje nus pas 'phags// ma bcos ngo bo gzhi ru 'gyur// lnga dang drug ni nges pa dang // mnges pa yi chos nyid kyis/
87a5(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i mthun phyogs ldan pa yis// de yi yon tan ye shes tshogs// yod dang med ces so sor ste// ji bzhin shes pa de nyid las// ma lus shes pa'i gzugs brtan dang // sems bskyed smon lam stobs kyis 'byung // 'bad rtsol med pa'i don chen
87a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// skye ba'i mtha' son rig pa 'dzin// bcu gnyis mdzad pa rim gyis rdzogs// skad cig nyid la sangs rgyas tshe// chos kyi sku yi rnam par 'byung // yongs rdzogs sbrul shun brjes lta bu// sa bcu'i rig pa 'dzin la sdang // shun pa lta bu'i rigs drug
87a7(rnying rgyud): 'dren// thun mong ba yi brtags pa yis// kha cig kun gzhi nges shes dus// skye med spos bral mngon sangs rgyas// ji bzhin rtogs shing ji snyed mkhyen// ye shes tshogs dang byin rlabs kyis// nges pa lnga ldan skur gyur nas// sprul sku sna tshogs
87b1(rnying rgyud): bstan ces zer// kha cig gis ni chos sku nyid// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul te// rig pa 'dzin pa longs skur bstan// so sor spyod pa'i skye bo yis// rang dang mthun pa'i sbrul srur mthong // gang gis brtags pa de ltar snang // kha cig ye shes rgyun chad de/
87b2(rnying rgyud): chos su sgrib pa ma lus zad// chos nyid dang du tha mi dad// gzugs sku gnyis ni de nyid kyis// byin gyis rlabs kyi rig pa 'dzin// sems bskyed smon lam btab pa dang // 'khor rnams bag chags sad pa las// yid bzhin nor bu hi ma'i 'odra// bum
87b3(rnying rgyud): pa bzang dang dpag bsam shing // 'bad pa med par gzhan don byed// nam zhig sprul pa'i gdul bya zad// chos nyid tha mi dad du 'gro// mya ngan 'das zhes nges par brjod// ces bka' stsal to// rig pa 'dzin pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rig pa tha
87b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal la// rig 'dzin tshogs kyis 'di skad zhus// e ma rdo rje rig 'dzin gtso// ston pa dus gsum sangs rgyas dang // 'khor tshogs gtso chen khyod nyid kyis// zhus shir
87b5(rnying rgyud): bshad pa'i bstan pa 'di// sangs rgyas dgongs pa mi gnas shing // khyod kyi gdul byar ma gyur na// nam zhig su yis gsal bar byed// 'dri zhing 'dzin dang nyan dang 'chad// bsgrub cing ston par byed la sogs// gang zag phyi dus ji ltar 'byung // phyogs ga
87b6(rnying rgyud): tsam du ston pa'am// yongs su chad par mi 'gyur ram// bdag cag the tshom gcad tu gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso bo yis// rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs chen la// khro bar bya phyir bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rig 'dzin tshogs chen
87b7(rnying rgyud): rnams// nga dang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs// gnyis med ye shes bstan pa 'di// sems cad las dang bsod nams kyis// mun pa'i bskal pa ma gtogs par// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'gro don spyod// bzang po zhes bya 'di nyid la// byams pa seng ge rab
88a1(rnying rgyud): gsas gas/ rdza sa dang tha'abo ma ga pa// dngag tul byalags papa 'a// dag pas ma/ 'a pa sa rdzug sa/ gsu byasan / 'dun/ na ngas du smrad na
88a2(rnying rgyud): nga chub srems dpa'i ge 'dzid pa// rdzogs par 'angs spyod kyi b+he bslus// dab padri mas ca ngan pa'i tshor// tshangs dang drin byi da nga drug ci// mAn+ta gnod sbyin dri bzhin// pham m+b+ha ngan pazla ba po dang // klung pa po rtseg pa dang // kye 'i sang 'di
88a3(rnying rgyud): dbu ba bdag/ du ga gas dang yis dang 'acas// byed pa'i chu dang cha lpags kyis// mthun 'jug thabs spang ba brtan to// thabs dang yan lag tshogs kyis// dang ge gdul bya'i dan byung 'jung // dz+nyAn pa'i gsung mchog dang ga zung shing //
88a4(rnying rgyud): shing dag 'dung te bar 'khor// 'od srungs lag nordo rje cang // blo snyun rnams kyis legs bslus te// bskrad la cu mer ston par 'gyur// sbrumachog myar ni 'das 'og tu// yon brgyalas lhag gyur na// legs par gsungs pa 'grol 'gyur te// de nyid nga yangs
88a5(rnying rgyud): bo dang // dzon 'bu la sogs pa yis// ldem po gnyis sdang gzhung 'grol byed// dgra bcom po nim zhig gis// bye brag smrabar ba gsal te// gzhan yang rab tu mngon pa'i thos// bstan pa nyam sa dmas kyang tshon// gsal ba'i tshul khrims shes bya'i dra/
88a6(rnying rgyud): Ar+thasang+ga dbyig gnyen gyis// de dag rgyas shing gsal bar byed// gzhan yang drug rdzun dang // tsat+sa ki ti sa ba// drug hrI zhes pa yis// blo zin spyod yul rgyas par ston// phyogs kyi ngan glang zhes bya dang // kIr ti chos shes bya ba yis// rang gzhanas
88a7(rnying rgyud): tshig rjes par byed// dbang po pa la bstan pa dag/ nga dang ye' khor rnams kyis// den chen thigs pa mthos nas // me btung nas pa// blo ldan da la legag rten gyis// legs par gdapas te bstan son// rang thargyas par bye 'gyur te/
88b1(rnying rgyud): rgyan yul gyi dur khrod du// rang byung mchod rten chen po la// stsal nas dbyings kyi yum pa gtad// de nas las kyi dus sad de// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las rbod gtong mchod dang rten// drag sngags spyod dang las sna tshogs// gcig dang sa
88b2(rnying rgyud): ba yis// bka' rgyud de yi don 'grel btsos// ma lus gsal bar byed pa ni// rta na ko sha'i mtsho gling las// pad+ma'i steng du badz+ras skyes pa'i// rgyal ba'i sras su rab bkur ba'i// rig po 'dzin pa der skang 'gyur// ma la ya yi yul dag tu// skyeb pa
88b3(rnying rgyud): mthu yis// d+ma 'i pUng lugs gsal bar byed// b+he ta li'i yul du skya 'khrungs pa// nagasun zhes bya bas// gsung gi sbub lugs rgyas par ston// sing+ga la yi yul du ni// hU~M zhes grags pabyung ba des// khyad par thugs kyi sgrub lugs ston// thar
88b4(rnying rgyud): mchog yul du skyes pa des// drin las spyod pa rga ca bor ston// za hor yul du sku 'khrungs pa// dri ma med pa'i bshes gnyen gyi// yon tan spyod pa legs par 'byed// u rgyan tho gang yul du ni// skyes pa'i d+ha na saM sr-i tas// mngon rdzogs lha yi khyad par rton//
88b5(rnying rgyud): yi zla ba zhes bya bas// 'jig rten dang rgyud mang po ston// zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya bas// drag sngags spyod pa bsgrub cing ston// 'byung gnag gsang ba zhes bya bas// de dag bstan pa'i snying po ni// shin tu gsal zhing rdzogs par byed// gzhan yang
88b6(rnying rgyud): mkhra' grong yul// dpal ldan ma so'i mchod rten la// legs par bstan pa'i snying po ni// brgya phyed byang chub rgyal ba dang // btsun mo mas 'khor bcas pa yis// tshe 'drir grol ba mngon du byas// rjes bu spyod la rim par bstan// wa hA
88b7(rnying rgyud): gyi rdzing drug dang // padar ta dang ni yang le shod// ngur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad tu// yon tan zhing skyong mkha' 'gro dang // klu dang phyogs kyong mchod rten dang // me chu sprin dang shing chen po// legs bcas rigs pa 'dzin rnams kyi// leg pa pa
89a1(rnying rgyud): zung 'dan par 'gyur// denas pang rdzog sngam thu'al bab thal// sa gdus kyig pos // dag pa 'don pa byung chub sems// 'jig tan dbang thug dbyo gyung ba// sa kyang pa'i tha das / dza bral nga bangs
89a2(rnying rgyud): phre las na 'thugs gzhol te// rig 'dzin mdzad pa mthar babyin byed// wA gI shwa ri'i thugs kyang kye// rig pa 'dzin gyis de bzhin te// bstan pa'i rting po rab tu 'dren// hUM ba 'ag 'azhig rab bzod do// las kyi tham rab sad nas// sngon gyi gdul bya lhags
89a3(rnying rgyud): sa/ dgas pa byed de/ ma zhes par blang ba // sbrul phyi ci'i bdag/ brtan gyi bad bskrag pa thugs// tu byen pas ma 'dapa/ sa gsu ba sna pa/ na// tha
89a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba ston// stong pa'i snying pos thugs rnyed de// rta mgo 'byung bas gsung rnyed cing // rdo rje zla byas yon tan thob// mkhar spyod ma yis phrin las 'grub// shrI si d+has rang rgyud 'khol// dz+nyA na shrIs mo rigs 'gro'o// rnam snang mdzan pas
89a5(rnying rgyud): trag shul spyod// th+yang+gatra dra ba pula'is// kun gyi lung rtsol spang bar byed// mATar phyin byang chub son par byed// de bas sngon gyi tshul 'di dang // nub ci tams par mi 'gyur te// sbyin mi mthing gyen spyod par 'gyur// // de'i dus su rig pa'i
89a6(rnying rgyud): skur du thob par 'dod pa yis// 'chi ba'i dus la slab kyang bla'i// gal te 'di nyid ma rtogs na// rten 'brel gzugs la brtag pa yis// nges pa can du shes par 'gyur// gzhan yang ston pa ba dag rmi la mo gri badza na pa rtag pa dang // lus ngag
89a7(rnying rgyud): ga sa cig nas byadas sa sa pal pa brtag dang // sems ldang bamams gas da mde// basmos // gang thang bababs pa dri yang gnas sa bdud nga phrog pa dang ga
89b1(rnying rgyud): ma bya ba yid/ rab pa 'i/ zlas pa rdzogs 'di rten gnan nga 'pho ste/ ma ma 'das pa sa / mtshad sa med par bya na das 'di ma'i sogs/ ra/ rnam rtog ga 'jig rten yang snang ba'i rtags// bsas ci rnye ba spyong bral la/ bas/ 'amo dang
89b2(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba yongs ma grub// rang byung rig pa 'dzin pa'o// gal te 'pho bo sbyang bar 'dod pa na// dben pa'i gnas su lam byangs pa brtan 'jo pa \u0f7f te// lam gyi grogs kyis mthun sbyar te/ yi dam d+hi'i/ spu dang rdo rje sogs phyag mtshan spyi thog pa sa yig 'bru yis// mthar
89b3(rnying rgyud): ga nyid snying sogs la byas nas// rig pa 'dzin pa'i dmigs pa de// dag pa'i rten la 'phang bar bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur// rten gsal nus pa skyes na mchog/ de yi 'phen pa ma rdzogs na// grong gzhan dag la 'jug pa ni// gyon bral rten bzang legs par bya
89b4(rnying rgyud): ngan 'gro chos lugs bsam zhing bskyed// lhag pa'i grogs kyis bsnyen bkur zhing // chung sgo gnyis su snying po'i mchog/ rnam par shes pa snying po nyid// thim par gyur te brtan par gnas// pha rol po la yon tan 'byung // bag chags bzang po'i 'dren pa dag/ grogs
89b5(rnying rgyud): mchog de yis mthun par brjod// snga ma'i rten de legs par sbyad// rig pa 'dzin pa do 'phrad 'gyur// stobs dang nus pa ma rdzogs na// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gang du 'ang ma grub par mdo// dgon par zhugs pa'i mi lta bu// 'khor ba'i gnas pa zag bcad de/
89b6(rnying rgyud): mya ngan 'das la nges par 'gro// thamal pa dang lam zhugs pa'o// snga ma'i shes pa de bor nas// lam gyi rtog pa yang yang dradru// ting 'dzin bsam pa'i bar mdo// smon pa'i sa mthong lta bu ste// sgo gsum rtsol po'i gnad kyis gtsun// snang ba 'di dang gnyid 'jug
89b7(rnying rgyud): po// bar du rmi lam rtog pa ni// lus dang ma 'brel yid gzugs kyi// bde sdug nyams bu myong ba ni// de lha'i gnyen pos grol bar gzung // phyi rol 'byung ba rim gyis dgang // gnas pa'i rlung gi 'jug bcad de// phyi ma'i rtse ba ma blangs par// kye 'chi srid pa
90a1(rnying rgyud): bar mdo// tham 'i gzugs kyi rtog pa can// dbang po yul dmigs snyam pa dang // stobs dang nus pa thogs med cing // masbyangs ldan rigs mi mthong shing shes// rigs drug snang ba rgya zhing 'char // yang dan/
90a2(rnying rgyud): lam gyi go maswa pA mA thad// tha mA la phung po'i lus spangs pas// ngogs sa pasgribs 'jug par bya// phra ma'i 'khor mi dge sbyong grogs// sbyang nga ma khan pa slob dpon gyi// de bzhin dgongs pa der snang bya// mthun 'jug rig pa dzin par 'khyed// phung po dong ba'i
90a3(rnying rgyud): nam tog 'chi// sku mchog ldan gyis grub pa dang // phyag rgya che dang tshol dbang // rnam par smin pas yongs grub pa'i// rdo rje 'chang ba 'ba' zhig go// de bas rig pa 'don pa byed// ston pa rnams dang ngas bshad pa'i// donal the tshom mA bskyed rdeg/ legs
90a4(rnying rgyud): bstan 'grel byed lung dang bcas// nub par 'gyur bar ma dgongs shig/ theg pa chen por gang gsungs lam// log par bgrod par ma dgongs shig/ cho gcig rdzogs pa'i lam yin pas// dngangs shing sbags par ma byed cig/ nga yi bstan pa'i tshul 'di la//
90a5(rnying rgyud): kha cig 'dug cing dga' bar byed// kha cig spod cing gshung bar byed// kha cig gnyis 'dzin the tshom za// 'di dag dang zhing spyod pa'i dus// pra ma shrI te bu'i srul ba ni// sems rgyud dag parab mdangs ldan// rig pa 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems// shAkya'i yul du thu
90a6(rnying rgyud): nas ni// nga yi bstan pa'i phyogs tsam dag/ mchu skyes A kar zhes pas// gang bshang phal cher byas par byed// legs par bshad pa rab bsgrubs te// A rgyan yul du gdul bya spyad// dwa yi rig 'don rnams kyis ni// de nyid byin gyis rlabs kyis ni/
90a7(rnying rgyud): gdul bya kun la rgyas par byed// de nyid lha rgyan bram ze yis// zung 'jug spod pa rab sbyangs te// bde ba can du nges par 'gro// rig pa 'dzin pa gzhan dag kyang // de yi tshul bzhin rab 'bad pas// rim gyis myur ba'i sa lam skyong // mthar thug sngar bshad gnyis
90b1(rnying rgyud): thaMng// rang sa snang babyung drung choms// dus gsum rgyal ba'i ga dung 'dod rting // lhas dang rlung byung chub sems// di t+ta rig pa na pa 'jug/ chos dang longs sbyang rdzogs pa dang // labangs sa sung dang lta la las// rgyun du gnas dang gdul bya'o//
90b2(rnying rgyud): dang mdzes che// chos nyid nam mkha' stong gsuMm dang // gling gcig c+doMm khyab dgongs pa ste// momo spong dang po brgyad pa rgyu yis// skal ba mnyam pa zhes bya'o// wA bslus gtso dang rags pa sbyad // 'dul byed dang zhing de mardzogs// rna mi ga ts+tsha skye ba pA dag
90b3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// rig pa 'dzin pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gyi ma'i gnas la yang dag par spro ba skyed pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor de rnams kyi/ gtsa' rdo rje 'dzin pa la yang dge par dga' bar gyur pa'i tshig gi rig
90b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i yon tan lha mngon par bstod de dang rang gi gnas su dgyes par gshegs nas bzhugs so// gtso bo chen po ni rang gi ston pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs te chos nyid kyi rol pa sna tshogs ston par mdzad do// rig pa 'dzin pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs
90b5(rnying rgyud): so/ ma nr-iH D+haMrdzA rgya gar gyi mkhan po padz+ra byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo d+hUb bai ro tsa na bdag gi bsgyur zhing zhus tegatan la phab pa'o// rgyalnga po'i b+h+rUM dpe'o// gter n+ya/ swas N+ya gtad rgya'o// rgya gar skad du/ lo ka sto tra pradzA ni bi ka s+phu la tan+t+ra nAm/
90b6(rnying rgyud): bod skad du/ 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba
90b7(rnying rgyud): chen po de rje 'dzin pa/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las ma lus pa yang dag par bsgrub par mdzad pa/ mthu dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang / dbang phyug dang gzugs kyis 'jigs par byed pa/ gtum po dang /
91a1(rnying rgyud): drag shul can dang / dregs pa can dang / stobs can dang / bzod par dka' bdag myur du 'dul bar byed pa/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi snying po/ de khon nyid las byung ba/ byang chub sems dpang
91a2(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' chen po gtso bo chen po mthar phyin pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i dbang phyug lha'i rigs rnams kyi bdag po chen po/ lung lo can gyi gnas dang / ri rab kyi gnas kyi gnod sbyin rnams kyi sde dpon ched
91a3(rnying rgyud): po de/ 'og min gyi gnas lha'i rgyal po'i khang bzangs na bzhugs te/ dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'grul pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs bkye nas/ tshig 'di skad ces bskul to// kye kye gsang ba dag
91a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa dam pa srung ba yi// mthu stobs bdag po dbang bskur te// dam tshig chen pa ni gzigs la// skrag srung thugs kyi gsang ba las// 'jig chen 'jigs par byed pa yi// sku mchog drag
91a5(rnying rgyud): gsung dang bcas// gtum pa'i thugs kyi shugs phyung la// gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// sprul pa 'phrul pa'i phrin las kyis// sngon gyi thugs dam rol par mdzod// ces bskul ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das dris sangs rgyas kyi phrin las chen po
91a6(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa'i rus la bab par mkhyen nas/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs zhi ba chos nyid de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos kyang / gdul bar bya ba'i yul drag shul can rnams la gzigs nas/ phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa
91a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad du/ sku'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyabar khro bo chen po'i gzugs 'di lta ste/ sku mdog mthing na gzhal dgu pa la/ g.yas kyi zhal ni kham nag gtsigs pa/ g.yon gyi zhal ni sdug nag bsdus pa/ dbus kyi zhal ni mthing nag khro zhing
91b1(rnying rgyud): rnams pa/ rtsa gag yas drang po na rdo rje 'bar bsu g.yon gyi drung dmang dkrugs shing gsol ba/ g.yab 'og sa brgyad na rgya chen po brjod bskal ba'i mog po bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi 'og ma brgyad dku chen po brgyad kyi mag ngo ba mas pa/ de dag kyang g.yang
91b2(rnying rgyud): ni dang 'artse pa/ grwa yang byi bu rkyen la bzlog pa/ g.yon kyi spyan dgu 'byed la gzigs pa/ dbus kyi stad dge gling 'i sdang mig mdzad pa/ khro ga ti dgra po dpral bar bslus pa/ shwangs nas dri dang zung zag pa tshungs pa/ zhab nas bskal
91b3(rnying rgyud): ze 'bar ba/ mcheb dmang po ba sa thams su gcig pa/ pes go ma smin pa dadrug ni bsdu/ dpe stsa rol pa 'a nag srid pa'i na por 'phang ning 'brel ba/ snyan nas gadrug pa'i chen po byed pa/ spre ci ched po yang lag nga'i dang /
91b4(rnying rgyud): di su
91b5(rnying rgyud): ba byed pa/ grubs pa cad kyis tshangs pa dang / thab la ga dang / dang gyug med pa dang / gyin kyang ma dang bcas padag mnan pa/ ma chen pa da gtum mo 'di ga byed ma dang gi tha drung mtshungs pa nig bla ma pa byu ba/ phreng ba med cing ba
91b6(rnying rgyud): sa sa
91b7(rnying rgyud): ga na sasu ma
92a1(rnying rgyud): srog gi bdag po dang / nor gyi bdag po dang / tshe'i bdag po dang / sngags kyi bdag po dang / srid pa'i bdag po dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / dung khrod chen po dang / yum
92a2(rnying rgyud): dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi mtha' khob kyi sa dang / ri yi rgyal po dang / ri phra mo dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu bran dang / yongs su 'du ba'i shing dang / na snga tshal chen po dang / gnas phra mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can po dang mo'i rnam par 'dug pa
92a3(rnying rgyud): dang / gtso bo dang 'khor gyi khyad par du rgya ba dang / bran dang kA log gi tshogs dang bcas pa dag gis rang rang gi gnas nas myur du spangs shing skrag la 'jigs pa dang / yang ba'i sems dang / dub pa'i sems kyis zon te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar rlung drag
92a4(rnying rgyud): po'i shugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du ngang la dbang med par lhags par gyur to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa dang / khyad par du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gling bzhi dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / rol pa
92a5(rnying rgyud): chu klung gi gnas dang bcas pa dang / ri rab chen po dang / ri bdun gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang / lha'i gnas 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang bcas pa dang / dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang rtsol song gi gyi gnas na
92a6(rnying rgyud): gnas pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa'i cha na gnas pa'i dregs pa can rnams so so nas rang rang gi mdun na drag po chen po'i sku gzi byin dpag tu med pa/ gzhan dag gi nye ba'i thug mi thub pa/ re re 'dug par mthong ste/ de dag thams cad tha dad du rang rang gi sde
92a7(rnying rgyud): dpon chen po rnams la skyabs su 'gro bar byed do// sde dpon chen po rnams ni 'jigs byed chen po'i sku gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas nas skyabs su 'gro bar byed de/ thams cad kyis rang rang gi gzugs dang / longs spyod dang /
92b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang / rgyan dang / bzhon pa dag/ gnas dang / nye bar spyod pa phrin las kyi khyad par ma lus par bstad cing / ming gi spying po rnams mngon du byung lta sngas s+ho// mdzad pa ang // sum dag yang / du bram du drug dung / ngan ting mdun/
92b2(rnying rgyud): rten gyi dbang phyug chen po yab yul bdud po po dang bcas pa rnams kyis rang gi ming phul ba'o// de nas gshin rje'i sde dpon rang gi tshogs dang bcas pas/ rang gi ming dang srog tu bcas pa phul ba/ hrI Sh+T+r-iHbi kr-i tA na na ya ma pre ta dza/ mA ma ya kun tiHtri dza/ zhes
92b3(rnying rgyud): phul lo// de nas srin po'i sde dpon pa gi la bong dang bcas pas ming gi snying po phul ba/ rat+na hi shaM ma ti rabA ma bu rdzi dza/ zhes phul lo// de na sa gnod sbyin gyi rje dpon rang gi 'khor dang baH snangs rang gi ting ba grwa Sha nga/ yar+tha su dwe rAH ti ma rA hri mdza/
92b4(rnying rgyud): de nas 'jig rten gyiganong sbyin te rje dpon pa can gyi dbang pos rang gi sngal bya/ glebarta hU~M ting / zhes thal lo// de nas 'ang \u0f7fla zan kyi sde dpon 'i de sum du gsum gyi bdag po pa rang gi 'i bral ba/ garje ba sha'i pA trai la ga dag
92b5(rnying rgyud): zhes phul lo// de nas spyi bdud kyi sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas pas ming gi snying po sbas te/ drA kr-i shaM dzaHa ka ru kaM dza dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas ye shes las la grub pa dang / dal tshig gi tshogs kyi bdag mo srid pa dbang spyad ma dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / mkha
92b6(rnying rgyud): 'gro yi'i tshogs sun gyis rang gi snying po bral ba/ baM ma ma hAg pu tra dAdzA/ e kA Ni ru tiSh+Tha da to// ra hi// ba mum+ba pa'i ma gang / zhes yul lo// de nas 'jig rten gyi sgru ba can po dang chu rnga'i rigs kyi sden ni chen po rnams kyis rang gi li ni
92b7(rnying rgyud): he a d+hi hu tri ru nidzi haM ga~M dzi rje dze/ zhes phral lo// de nas 'jig rten gyi bgegs kyi rgyal po dang / l+r-i shegs byed dang / bdud dang / dkri'i tshogs kyis rang gi ming gi snying po phul ba/ bi drA ya ka ti nA ga du sun mu napang / sa zung la// de nas
93a1(rnying rgyud): tan rdzogag gi bdag pang/ dang rjen su'i bdag pa nga can dang / dub rtsal paca pang / naganas brtsan pa chags ci du can brnams sas dag gtung ba thams
93a2(rnying rgyud): kar rje pa le ra tsa badz+ra bu mang/ badz+ra sAn tri / mahA kA la ya byung / zhes phul la/ de nas 'jig rten gyi gru dang / gza' skar gyi sbed pan chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po thol ba/ nAg tseSh+Tat+ya yin ge mnaH d+da thu la ba te pa sham tsu / zhes phul lo// da
93a3(rnying rgyud): yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa'i dbang phyug mdungs pa 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis rang rang gi lus dang srog tu bcas pa phul ba/ e a tri dze sa ma ya srog phreng bred dzi / zhes phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa can 'khang dang bcas pa de dag dbugs
93a4(rnying rgyud): byung nas/ mi 'jigs pa byin te 'di skad du/ kye ma 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs// khyed rnams ngal ma 'jigs shig/ nga ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las bdag/ chos ting zhi ba chen po yi// brag rje dang ni ye shes kyi// dus gsu
93a5(rnying rgyud): 'dus byas 'dus ma byas// skad cig nyid la mngon dugs pa// ma'ongs sems can don gyi phyir// sna tshogs lus kyi gsang ba ston// dregs pa'i rje dpon khyed rnams kyang // thog ma med nas da lta bar// nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i dbang gyur te// gnas ngan
93a6(rnying rgyud): lan gyi bag chags kyis// lus ngag yid kyis me dger spyong // 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad// na rag chen por lung nas ni// thar pa'i dus med 'byung srid kyi// de bas nga lu'i dus mchog 'dir// nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs dang
93a7(rnying rgyud): yon tan dang // mdzad pa'i phrin las rab son pa// bsgo ba'i gsung bzhin nyan par gyis// las dang srid pa dan yod pa// mi dgor bag chags dor bar gyis// bslab pa'i gzhi zung sems bskyed la// mthu stobs nus pa drag shul dag/ sangs rgyas brtan
93b1(rnying rgyud): rjes su dang // dgA na rnamams kyi bka' bzhi nga // khyed bgacal bad po dadang / kun gu lagacu sangams brtson pa// dngas thub zlanas shing nan las rtsubs// dang ltar bcid byed// gsang bang chag pas 'ga' kyang
93b2(rnying rgyud): dkyi nga chog gi rgyang // ngag nyid du marungs 'jur// zhes ka' rtsal rnam ga pab kung nas bzhin na// digatan pa'i rje pa \u0f7f kA ba tu 'das pa med pakhyod 'i da bar / de na
93b3(rnying rgyud): 'i khams kyi da ga pol ba sam 'i sogs pa'i rigs pa ga pa btu ngas bad gnas/ na dam pazhin ga shegs pa ma thug sang thugs kyig sung nga bdag brtson pa la 'di gad ces gas pa// ma btsam
93b4(rnying rgyud): ldanags pa ba // 'jig rten gnas pa'i dag / zlangs // 'ad tshigs ni dab ban // gangags pa cing ba zhin bdag gan pas ni dag mthar// maud kyi bka' sa rjes parjidadu/ bcwal zhugs 'dzin pa dpal
93b5(rnying rgyud): dzin las spyod pa'i zag // bdag chags 'i gnas dang dus rang gi rdzi yang ga yod dmasabyung pa'i ma da mang po ny-id nga// grags rigs dang bas pa pa dang / khams dang byed pa'i bral dag dang // das kyig sbyor ba
93b6(rnying rgyud): par dag/ bdag cag rnams dang ma 'das pa'i// rig pa'i tshul 'dzin dam nga// 'gras byas par bshad du gsoso// zhes gsol ba so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig tan gyi khams kyi rdzogs pa can dag gi gtso ba dbang phyug chen bu la tshogs
93b7(rnying rgyud): parnams la ma mo ris dang gcig tu sbran pa dang / ngad du sba ba dang / nges pa dang / mangs pa dang / rim pa dang / 'tshal ba dang / kyai dang / nang dang / gsang ba dang / sbas pa dang / chags pa dang / 'thor ba dang / mthun pa'i rdzas dang / ting po dang
94a1(rnying rgyud): // 'da' brgyan gyi lung ni/ glang can 'dul stobs theg pa'i rgyan zhes pa// bdud 'joms sman rdzas thub dang lta ba'i gzhung // stag na dpa' rgyan brgyad can zhes pa// ye shes thugs rje'i phrin las dang du bstan// sbrul ni mnyan skrag sbyin pas kyang zhes pa/
94a2(rnying rgyud): 'jigs tshul dug gnon du zil ba yum gyi rgyun// thod phreng dbang grol 'chang pa'i rgyan zhes pa// sgra gsum theg gsum bus gsum dbang cad sgrol// gsang gini tshul khrims gos kyi rgyan zhes pa// byang chub sems tshul de ma khrims gro zhes bya/ @
94a3(rnying rgyud): grags rje chags pa'i rgyun zhes pa// mi rtog dbyings nas thugs rje'i spyan// gzi chen don dam brgyad kyi rgyan zhes pa// bcud kyi thig le don dam krin du 'ong // thal ba 'dul byed phrin las rgyan zhes pa// yi ge 'khor los mtshan ma thal bar rlog/ me ni 'bar
94a4(rnying rgyud): 'dra sreg klong dkyil zhes// ye shes thugs rje dbyings 'dul phrin las te// zad par byed pa'i mtha' 'das dkyil zhes bya// me skye sgra chen tha dad sku zhes pa// chos sgra khyab dang tid 'dzin sna tshogs pa// ral pa kham nag snyil zhing phye ma ni// de nas chos nyid
94a5(rnying rgyud): dkang drag sprul pa 'phro// sku mdog mthid nag nam mkha'i rgyan zhes bya// 'dul dbang mtha' med yon tan dgongs pa gting mi dpogs/ zhes bya'o// de la khrag 'thung zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gong du bshad par zad do// de la dpal he ru'i sku mdog dang phyag mtsha
94a6(rnying rgyud): cir yang ma nges par 'byung ste gang ltar bsgyur yang 'grub po zhes bshad do// de yang mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang // de la dngos byang phyag rgya rnams// des pa med par dpa' bos bshad// mkhas pas bsgoms la ci dgar 'grub ces 'byung ngo // 'o na yang 'di'i
94a7(rnying rgyud): gnas skabs su// he ru ka dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad de/ de yang yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad na/ grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang / mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang gnyis so// de la grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgyani dbu gsum dug gsum sku
94b1(rnying rgyud): krung thugs spyan phung // skya slong rnam gsum grub pa'i rtags// stan dbus gsum sku gsum ye shes gsum ste dgra// bzod med thob med dmigs pa las 'das pa// rtag chad spyan gnyis mtha' pangs dbu ma'i sngar// shangs gsum srog la mang dang /
94b2(rnying rgyud): mdzod ting 'dzin gsan// de bzhin nyid du kun du snang zhes bya// sku chen zla dang sgo chen rdos sgra ting 'dzin nyan// zhal gsam nam thar sgro gsum wAn+d+ha gyis grub// ljags gsum theg gsum mthar gyi shes bya'i rtags// mche bzhi phrin las mthar
94b3(rnying rgyud): phyin zhi ba'i tshul// ye shes drug ni mthar gyi phyag drug ste// pha rol phyin drug mthar phyin phyag mtshan drug/ zhabs bzhi lam bzhir bgrod pa med pa thob// de la mdzad pa rtags zhes bya ba ni/ stan dkyus dgu 'dul ba'i bye brag gzigs// sman
94b4(rnying rgyud): gsum srid gsum mgo rgyud so sor mkhyen// shangs gsum nas byung sprul pas stong gsum 'gengs// snyan drug 'gro drug gnas nas ci gsol gsan// dbu gsum srid gsum mgon mdzad sku gsung zugs// zhal gsum dbyings su dug gsum
94b5(rnying rgyud): zad par rngub// ljags gsum theg gsum bstan pa'i gdang sI dar sgrogs// khams gsum nyug byed rdo rje srin mo lce// mdze bzhi skye shi rtsa nas gcod par mdzad// phyag drug rgyud drug 'khor ba gting nas 'don// phyag mtshan pha rol phyin drug 'gro don mdzad// zhabs
94b6(rnying rgyud): bzhir phrin las rnam bzhi bzod med skyol// yan lag rtags kyi lung gis 'di ltar yang dgra bshad// rdo rje ye shes pha rol sbyin pa ni// rang bzhin mi 'gyur las ni 'bigs shing 'joms// chos sku rdo rje rtog dang bag zags bsreg/ ye shes yid gyur de la de skad rgya//
94b7(rnying rgyud): d+habazod pa'i pha rol phyin pa ni// chos dbyings spros med ye shes bzhi dang ldan// ye shes dbyings rtog zhen khrag thugs rje skyed// mtha' gnyis skyon la mi bsngags bzod pa'i mchog/ Sha dz+haiM stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa ni// drug gsum dga' bye dregs pa'i lha
95a1(rnying rgyud): bas kyis gas// zha sa rnams// nab 'ang nag tungs ga // na kyang gsunas brnalas/ sum gyis bdu klag sacu // yab man tam ma zugs sanas//
95a2(rnying rgyud): du ti dkA yaT+Ta// thugs bzhir bdang dang gshin rje dang // byin po gdod rten rje don dag/ rab srab bcas pags he nag/ byed 'og du ni gzung dang sla'i// rting pon yab shrIm rlung babyed// rte narje // b.ris bzang lha dang ga
95a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal dang // skye bdud sring dpon shar du bskyed// ma ma rje ki ma~M/ ma chen med pa'i rgyal mo dang // rul gcig ma dang bsdogs byed ma// mchogs sde pa ru'o// man+ta ta shaM// gnad sbyin patsan dmar rol brtson gyi// rje dpo nub kyi phyogs sa ba cu
95a4(rnying rgyud): thaMH 'i srung // bgegs dang thA zlog sa dgu bdud rtsi/ rjed pa byang phyogs // rjem 'dzis byi / srid pa'i sog ge bdag pa dang // ga nod tu bricha bdud rtul pa// sra lcagasang ban rje legs/ nan po chen na rgyas myang // shar rtsub
95a5(rnying rgyud): ska ba zhi bsted// phyi rol thams lardzogs bcan// sa so 'a khor g.yog yang po dag/ bka zhan gsung srong tshul du babyed// rang pa sngags kyis brtan pa \u0f7f// dbang po phral dgasal ba dang // 'jig rten rang chung sa so ye// gnas na mdzad kyi tso ba /
95a6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i snying pos myur du yod// ting nge 'dzin gyis tshul 'dra ba// rang gi gzugs brtan lus la bstim// rang chud pa dang gzugs brtan 'gre// oM AHhUM hU~M badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba dASh+TAn ta ka ha nad ha btsa hU~M phaT// sku gsung thugs ldan byin brlabs shing // rdo rje 'chang
95a7(rnying rgyud): bas dbang bsur bya// dung khrod ga// kyi dro bzhinas// bka' gan las byed lnga brgyad kyis// lus dag gus pas phyag btsal zhing // byi nang gsang ba'i 'dod dzin tshogs// 'gro zhing gdug pa'i bsam pa can// gzugs can gzugs med bzas pa rnams// dregs
95b1(rnying rgyud): gru // // na ga / nga/ 'ag // // dang du
95b2(rnying rgyud): ba 'as kyi bu ngas ug lags sa pa sasmrasade ci gan nga gis byas na cod ba ma/ sbyi
95b3(rnying rgyud): zingangs 'ad sa mdzad cing// dang gi 'a du ba bslabab// nga kyigi sa ya chub sa so/ na te/ na pa ca dgas ga// 'ang gas par bdan ni// rdzogs pa dud pa na kyang denam
95b4(rnying rgyud): bcags brten pasal / 'dzin 'a ga nying bdud/ ci thogs gi te na/ ni me myo // cing bcing ma dang tha~M pam/ rtags pa pa kyi'am brji // rdzogs parjod
95b5(rnying rgyud): kang thal/ 'ji rted pa'i 'a jin chags te pang 'arngu 'ab las cig gtad pa 'den par hU~M bshad byag/ ded ga gan tshangs pashid // dang na can pa da nga gan ma /
95b6(rnying rgyud): 'di dang gzugang mnas pa dang // brjod dang sde sa ma baphral bdag/ rdzog pa de 'a mas banapa \u0f7f// d+h+r-ithigs na ma dag dbyings kyi dkyil la bdunas/ chos sde nga shing dbyings las mi gangs nga // 'jig nyin rdzogs pa chas
95b7(rnying rgyud): nanga' du da pa ga ma ga cing bye btani// thug sa des kyis sgri gam pa'i sa so// bdags kyi sa ma ma/ sa pa dung tu sa ni ma da /
96a1(rnying rgyud): lha mo bde chen 'byung gnas ma// 'khor tshogs drag shul mthu stobs dpung gi bdang // khrog tu ma gdug pa'i rtsal 'chang dpal dang ldan// rdo rje 'chang ba'i bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub// dam tshig zer dgongs ga
96a2(rnying rgyud): 'dir gshegs su gsol// oM badz+ra sarba duSh+TA na mahAn la e dza b+h+yo// A gadz+ra bas ma ya dza dza// drar khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// zhwa chen ni zla bad+ma'i gdan stengs su// bcom ldan khro rgyal jom brjid 'bar ba'i sku// yab yu ma dgyes par
96a3(rnying rgyud): rol cing bzhugs su gsol// sbyang srid dregs pa che lus rdzing po nag rdzo// 'dod khams bdag pod dgyes mdzad yum dang bcas// lha phrin tshogs kyi gtso chen khor dang bcas// drin las mthun pa'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// dadz+ra sarba duSh+TA na ma thA na ma
96a4(rnying rgyud): sa ma la hU~M badz+ra dzad+hU bahU~M// pus pa/ srab sangs rgyas thugs kyi snying po mchog/ cho kyi tha las gzugs su 'gro don sprul// che btsan 'gran tha med pa khro bong rje// dbang srud yum dang bcas la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus sras
96a5(rnying rgyud): dang bcas// dam chos bstan pa'i tshul spang 'jig rten mgon// zhing bcu sgrol mdzad zhin las drag shu' can// sded pon sumacu'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// badz+ra sarba duSh+TA na mat+pan la e dza kyo// na ma A ra l+li ho// dpal chen rdegs pa kun 'dal yab
96a6(rnying rgyud): yum la// sku gsung thugs mnyes mthod ba 'bral ba ni// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan bla re dang // zeng ba rtse me lnga rdzi zar tshogs// bdug thos me tog mar me chab bsil dang // gzugs mdzes skye stan dri zhi ma ro bro dang // reg 'jam 'dod yod
96a7(rnying rgyud): ma lus ji snyed pa// 'phags pa'i thu mong mchod tshogs bzhes sa gsol/ khyad par gsang ba'i mchod pa 'brul ba ni// dug gsum gnas su sbyangs pa'i shadus zag/ drug rdza ldan du grub pa'i dang chog rdzas// stobs mchog nus pa pa la mcho
96b1(rnying rgyud): 'phro sa// thug su thung pa 'dung dgas pa zhes su gsol// dpal ze ru pa sum bka' ba rjes bsgrub pa'o// dbang byug byen po pabasapa mnga' bdag / 'dag tan 'das pa dab dod pa'i bzhugs 'a// bka' ba bstan srung srung po sa ma rgyas/
96b2(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i yon tan mchod cing sbyin pa ni// dkar dmar ser ldang la sogs mdog/ zlum po gru bzhi la sogs dbyibs// che chung phro mtha ring thung tshad// mdzes dang mi mdzes sdug mi skrag/ 'byung brten 'brel rol mo'i the// glu rdzog bskyod dbyangs ldan pa'i tshi
96b3(rnying rgyud): gros sman bdud rtsi me tog dri// bsreg gsung ba ma sud dri dang drad// kha mdar tsha sbyang bska' ba dang // lan tshwa krod dang d+hi d+ha gra dang // dngas rtsub bsi la yang tsha dang dro// mas 'ayon tan tshogs dang bcas// 'dod dkrur 'bul gyis bzhis skye gsol/ ba
96b4(rnying rgyud): lnga dang sha l+la dang // don snying lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// dbang po lnga dang yul lnga dang // phung po lnga dang nang rol lnga// 'tsho zhing gnod dang par du gcod// gdug par sems shing log par blta// mi mthun rdzogs lngar bcas pa rnams// so sor 'bul gyis
96b5(rnying rgyud): bzhes su gsol// badz+ra sarba duSh+TA na aSh+Ta nA ya e dzaHb+h+yo// ma hA ba li tA// a mr-iH/ su ka ta mAM sa/ rak+ta bi ba thab su ta sa ma tha/ i daM gr-ih+Nar+d+ha sa ma phu la kha khA \u0f7f khA hi// bcom ldan dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul dang // yum chen khams gsum sbyi
96b6(rnying rgyud): 'dral 'khor bcas kyi// sku mchog 'gyur med me long gzugs brnyan bzhin// gsal zhing tog med snang lam 'gags pa// sgra lnga lhun grub rdzogs pa'i dngos grub stsol// gsung mchog 'gag med brag cha sgra brnyan bzhin// snyan dang mi snyan grags stong
96b7(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa'i gsung // gsung dbyangs nam mkha'i mtha' khyab dngos grub stsol// zugs mchog spos bral bsam 'das chos kyi dbyings// me rtog pade chen thabs dang shes rab dang // rtsol med ma g.yo mchog gi dngos grub stsol// yon tan brjod kyis ze par
97a1(rnying rgyud): rgyan datshogs te// 'das dang sa 'das mchog dang blan mngag// thub pa brgyad drung mabar thug pos gra rgyab// 'jigs pa brgyad stsogs dang 'byor bcwas// mag sums pa'i skal gyis dbang bla ci
97a2(rnying rgyud): dza rjod dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i dngos grub rgyal// badz+ra sa rba rba dz+nyAn ASh+Ta mA ma ed kA la si d+hi wAgs b+h+yoHsa ti kraN sirti N+Di kan Sh+T+r-i tra~MSh+Ta// bcom ldan dregs pa kun 'dulan// dbya ga phyag ni bcobargya // sra ma dag mdzang nag rje ni ma
97a3(rnying rgyud): g.yas kyi zhal gsum phrag nog bsang // gaman gyi t+pa la gsumakhas nig gtsigs// dpyi sgrar la pa med byang 'dir// spyan dgu nga mig ba krig cing baglang // shangs nas sring po'i rlung nag 'thor// sten nas stong gsum 'brug su byung // slar lag rtsam
97a4(rnying rgyud): sbyang 'bar// mche gtsigs sred dag sumaHba gtsad// phyag dgu g.yas g.yon dang po yi// ri zong khrag dgrag cing gsol// g.yas kyi 'og mi'i phyag brgyad na// dregs pa lha chen brgyad bzhil ze'o// g.yang gzhi mug po bcas te bsdams
97a5(rnying rgyud): g.yon gyi rog ma'i phyag brgyad na// gru chen brgyad kyi b+hat+ta rA// rdzogs pa'i snying khrag bkang nas gsol// dpa' ba'i chas brgyad srul gsol// zhabs brkyang brgyangs bskums dor thabs kyis// khams gsum 'dag pa sde bzhi mnan// yum chen
97a6(rnying rgyud): khams gsum sbyi 'dul ma/ zhal gcig phrag gnyis mthong nag su// rdo rje byar zhing pod khrag stob// gnyis med thugs kyi phrin las kyi// 'jig rten drags pa bran du 'khol// lha sbyin sde brgyad las la 'byer// dgra bgegs gdug brgyad nas gcor/
97a7(rnying rgyud): rdo ny+tsa// gcol phyag 'tshal bstod// dpa' kyi bkang bzhin las mdzod pa'o// lha chen dab phyug chen poni// thal gcig phyag gnyis su mdog mthong // phyag g.yos gri grag ce g.yon// lha mo u dzini// sbyang dog mtheng nag gcol 'dud
97b1(rnying rgyud): thag galas rtsa gsum zad khrag gsan// sang gagrang can gdan la bzhugs// rjed pon dgas pa dran ci \u0f7f// rab kram su laphag rtsal btud// bad sbyinam pa'i lda dang ngan// khram shing g.yas la dgra gsan// bdud nanag zung rjem
97b2(rnying rgyud): dathAgs// kyor thab padud pa ma te// klam pas g.yas pa nang rjel gso// ba gra bang par ga dan la brtags// ga~M shrI 'i rje par can ba// ni tson g.yas le thod dbyig ga ngam// snor lam gzhi dang byed du// myig gnyi
97b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor la banor// yab rdzas mtshan byang brnon// ma po TI thog rdzan// cag ga te'i jug se la ni ba che// / min pa 'i lag ga pa ba// ga g.yas phra ga gi nga ga yod// l-ib gram 'tha~Mb dang nga na// bdang rjod pa
97b4(rnying rgyud): dashA \u0f7f// ga papa na can pa ma bri/ khyor sem pa na kyi nan dang / lcagagasas rnag gsan byung ba// gzong dag pa zhab kyiganan// gza' 'ad byed dpe chen pon// tshigagalas ma 'ag zhugs ni shags// bya
97b5(rnying rgyud): kyil 'brug ca gdan// tham ma thog gi zisags// gal mig sang rgyag gi sa thog pa dang bebs// dbus gnyis thag so/ la ga gan// hraHma dzad ba ni de // cig gsas phral nags ga ni dang rtsal// nga cung yin
97b6(rnying rgyud): sbyang mag zug mtshan ma thun pa// ya rab cu na das thal gnan// tshogs pa ni ting dog gnas bzhugs pa'o// rdzogs pa'i rjeng po da gan// drin byang bla ma dag mthing das la// maud yong na byung 'a gas tshul rnga// dur rdzo ge sa
97b7(rnying rgyud): ma gyis brgyan/ 'angag chags 'dum dzin pas mdang// rab sum bcas la cag 'tshal btad// gnang sbyin mtha~Md don// she bzo bden dgar pa 'dzi/ ded dgar rab zang zhabs kyi ga na// gnas pa rje na
98a1(rnying rgyud): du smra/ smra / na / / na smra
98a2(rnying rgyud): gang sngags panas pa rgyag 'tshal btad// mad pa mam med ponas// de ma la gams lam pa ga / zhabs kyiky-im-i thug sa mgo dgrag nan// sngags kyi mang mamanamaH// rgyu ga pas lag su sbyang bar na// dzig nag pa rnabs kyis brnan
98a3(rnying rgyud): ma nag pa cugs pa/ sa dupa sa/ ga pa tshabs / di danam pa gas sa gnas la zlas / bad 'dril chen ma/ lam na zug ga
98a4(rnying rgyud): khruga'aban/ khrag ban mog ldan dpa dzi ni// mad ba ci ban da dang dbung byung/ tshab can ga N+DIm pan/ rkang 'dra dang ni dwags pa dzin/ dam pa byud pan ston pags sa// phrin kyang rgya me napas kyis gats+tsha// rnabags
98a5(rnying rgyud): da la phyag 'tshal ba tong // bin lag bgegs kyi rgyal// zug g.yas kha cug man thong khrag/ phyi rol sbyang ba bu stegs rgaH/ dz+ye dz+wal g.yas la thong khrag g.yon// dam bdud chen ba bgag mod ni// mda' gar+b+ha dang ni shang yang 'dzis/
98a6(rnying rgyud): dag pa rgyags kyi med pa dganas// 'ad 'gang bas sa panan/ ga cag / ngas pa'i rgyal pa phrag ga 'dugagams pa cinags ga/ bang gyi gang ba bangs kyim gnan//
98a7(rnying rgyud): la ban dug 'dud dgasag ma na sa bya na ma mgyi bdag dzin lan 'dzin// rangabya brgya tshu ba rjes gas/ dug ni rdzogs kyi 'dug
98b1(rnying rgyud): sang can gsas// zhagasacags pam kyim ga/ sa man// mu ga dang sa sa da mas/ nab ga masal rtsag ma ta// da 'thung dunan// ga gdug catu dang dud
98b2(rnying rgyud): bza' ga yang gzhi 'jigs pa'i chas// sna chags mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldan// rang gi 'khor g.yog tshogs kyis bskor// sprul ba'i tshe 'phrul bsam mi khyab// mchod pa stod chen pos byed bslab na// sada'i tshogs 'dul drin las mdzod// ces brjod cing // ting nge
98b3(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pa yis// dregs pa'i sde dpon mchod cing bstod// 'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'jig rten gtso bdag byung du 'grub// rdo rje 'dzin dang gnyis su med// ces bka' phral to// 'jig rten gyi ste dpon nye par sgrub pa rdo rje'i dam chog 'tshod bstod kyi leng ste gsum par//
98b4(rnying rgyud): de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// 'jig rten dregs pa dbang sdud cing // tshar gtsang las la bkol ba'i phyir// byin rlabs gnas pa'i dbang bskur bshad// gsang zhing dben pa'i gnas dag tu// trar bshad las kyi pho zang bshams// yo byad rdzas kyi khyad par tshogs// ma lus pani
98b5(rnying rgyud): gzung bar bya// rdo 'chang ba rjes 'brangs bcas// mtshan nyid ldan pa mngon sum sbyar// dus kyi grangs dang mtshan ma'i rtags// banyen pa srung bzhin brtson par 'bang // gzugs brtan bdag pa slob ma rnams// khyad par gnas pa'i rtaganaH// bris dang darkos la sogs pa
98b6(rnying rgyud): ye// rjed po na rnams kyi gzug brtan dang // byur ba grangs dang mnyam par dgram// gzhan yang bum pa lachad gtar dang // drug gtor thun ga ter bun rdzas dang // sha khrag pa shas dang bzang btu chags// rgyal mtshan pa dan mda' dang gi za// dpa' ba'i chas dang rol mo'i sra/
98b7(rnying rgyud): rab tu bstar zhing mdzes par bshams// rdo rje 'dzin bting 'dzin pasar// las kyi rgyal pos mchod bstod bya// rgyu dang mdangs kyis thugs dam bskrad// bshags dral gzugs sud dbab par bya// mos shing spo dga' dngas pa yis// bdud 'dul gtsal skyabs su 'gro// ba
99a1(rnying rgyud): pa bsrung bar sems paskyed de/ bla ma sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin// ha ru ka dang gnyis med la// gdug byed log lta 'dul nus pa'o// mthu dbang chen po chu tshal gyis// 'phre 'i zug dgas nas na// dkyil dzong dam par gzhung
99a2(rnying rgyud): tu gsol/ nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi bu// zas gsum sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs// gnas pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// spobs 'jug pa khyod legs kyis// mngon spyod brtul zhugs dam pa yis// da mchog chen po'i sa 'dug cig/ mgo he ru ka dpa'
99a3(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs bcas pa yi// dug shul spyod pa'i pho zang du// mdzes pa'i me tog padag 'bral gyis// rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di bzhes la// dregs pa dngul chus dngos grub stsol// tra ti gr-ih+Na swAdz+ra hU~M/ dpal rjen rdorje 'chang ba yi// rjes 'jug rigs kyi bu khrod ni/
99a4(rnying rgyud): thog ma med nas da lha'i bar// bstan pa bsrung ba skal ldan te// rje dpon dbang chen dkyil 'khor 'dir// bstan pa rab dag 'i sems kyis ltos// badz+ras ma ya maHla dzag+na pa be sha phaT// rdo rje bdud ci mchog che// 'di las dul gsum 'da' chi bya// grub pa'i 'bras bu gnyis
99a5(rnying rgyud): yin te// tshul bzhin mi dada' bo dor cig/ ma hA sa ma pa e dran te na karma/ khA mi laM// rdo rje 'dzin pa bkang drin can// thugs rjes rtag tu phyin brlab cing // 'di nas rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bar// mthu tho bas dngos grub phul du gsol// padz+ra sa ma la tsit+ta sod+d+hi siSh+Thar+tha/
99a6(rnying rgyud): thog ma de sangs rgyas sbas bcas kyi// rjes su bslab pa bdag yin gyis// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// lha dang dregs pa mthu stobs can// gtso dang 'khor du bcas rnams kyi// phyagasung thugs kyi dam tshig dgongs// de'i thob parig 'dzin pa// dbang gyur
99a7(rnying rgyud): dngos grub rtsol mdzad cing // nus chen rtags mtshon baspyan du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan gyis// ji stad rkyen po'i steng 'dug la// spyod ldan slob ma mdun bzhag ste// dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i tham pa 'is// sgra gsung thugs su dbang dur bya// gnyen pos
99b1(rnying rgyud): dang gdul bya'i bral/ dregs can yab yum 'khor brdzas kyi// dngos pa'i sku gzugs su pa dbang // sasu ngas tad rdzog snying po dang // sngon lam bcas pa gsung gi'o// byed gnas gdon rtags kyi// zas bya dbang bsrung thugs kyi te// rigs kyangs
99b2(rnying rgyud): stobs la dang gis gsal// zur ba drug shu 'dzas kyi dbang // mchod gtor ba shos cha b+ha gsung thugs// mA lus mnyes par byed pa ste// yo zad tshogs kyis 'ongs spyod zer// D+ha mtshan de de rje sa dang brdas// rgyas rnams kyin drim dang rdang kyang // d+hag
99b3(rnying rgyud): dug gtor thun rdzas rnams// zegs pa'i sde dpon dbang sdud cing // pho ha phrin las bskul mdzad de// mngon spyod gdug pa tshar bcad dbang // 'di dag kyang ni gzugs brnyan 'dra// don po shes pas dbang bsrung te// chos kun spyi dang dregs pa yi// sde dpon so so'i
99b4(rnying rgyud): dmachog stsal// thugs rje dang ni rtogs pa yis/ rang gzhan doni/ kyis sgrol byed pa'i// dpag med don chen 'dir 'dus te// tha dad mig nas gcig yin no// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyis// gyi nang 'khor 'das so sor sngar// ma lus dbang spud zil gnon phyir/
99b5(rnying rgyud): so so'i snying po tshod kyis bstim// datshal brtan pos mthun du bgrel// don snying sha rus khrag sogs bza'// dug gsum tshar gcad dbyings rngas dbyung // gzugs brnyan bsti ma la rab tu gsal// dbang bsku las bcol gdul bya'i phyir// zhabs 'og brlag ste
99b6(rnying rgyud): bran bzhin bsgo// dam tshig rdzas mchod sngar bzhin gso// dam tshig dbab cing bstod bskul bcol// 'jig rten lha srin khyed rnams kyang // nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// zhal mthong lung bstan mchog sbal kyang // srid pa'i sa bon phra mo yis// da rung 'jig rten
99b7(rnying rgyud): las la spyod// rang byung thub mos pa na gnod byed// da ni bka' mi dam tshig zung // ma 'ongs dus na bsrub bya dang // sgrub par byed pa de dag la// mnyam par kun la dbang bsgyur te// chos nyid dag pa'i rgyal po rdzogs// theg mchog ma 'dres ci yang ston// ma lus
100a1(rnying rgyud): myur du rdzogs bya'i phyir// rgyal tshab spyi bor bzhag gnas pa// kun tu bzang po nyid 'thob 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po nye bang bsgrub pa'i rdo rje dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bsrung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
100a2(rnying rgyud): de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs mnyes bya'i phyir// mthun rdzas gzugs kyis bskrang ba ni// ri bo'i rtse'am chu yi mdo// 'jig rten dbang chen 'dug nas su// skal med yul la mchod sbyin gtang // thod mkhar re mig dgu brtsegs sam// yang na gling bzhi ri rab
100a3(rnying rgyud): bcig/ 'bru dang sha khrag sna tshogs la// rin chen spos sman me tog gsal// dregs pa'i bdag po so so yi// gzugs brtan rang gi 'khor dang bcas// sku mdog phyag mtshan yongs rdzogs shing // rang gi gdan khri bzhon par bcibs// ri rab zod mkhar yang
100a4(rnying rgyud): steng d+ha// lha chen yab yum 'khor bcas bzhugs// bang de ma re mig dang po rtsa// bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang // gnod sbyin gzang dang klu rnams kyi// sded po ni yab yum 'khor bcas dgod// gnyis pa la ni dkar po dang // nag mo dmar po nag po yi// sde
100a5(rnying rgyud): dpon bcu gnyis gnas su bya// gsum pa'i phyogs bzhir rdo srung bzhi// 'khor bcas rang gi gnas su dgod// tha ma gsum ma ma bzhi pa la// phyi nang gsang ba sbas pa dang // gab pa gter dang drag po sngags// las byed btags chags lha ma srin/
100a6(rnying rgyud): sde brgyad gzugs brnyan gnas su dgod// gtso chen sa so'i mthun pas ni// rang gi gdan nam bzhon pa yi// srog chags gzugs ni lnga 'am bcwa// brgya'am stod ngam nus tshang bya// skyes pa bud med glang chen rta// bgrang ra lug bye dang khri// longs spyod dkor
100a7(rnying rgyud): rdzas sngar bzhin no// sde brgyad phal pa kun la ni// shes ldan mi dang byol song ste// 'dab chags gcan gzan ri dgas dang // sartswa gnas dang phrugs dud tshogs// mthang thos drin pa rnams kyi gzugs// rnga ltar nus pa'i grangs kyis bskor// 'di dag
100b1(rnying rgyud): spong ba'i lo byad de// 'gro ba'i klung du dbul ba ni// rin chen dar mi rgyan ldan dang // nam mkha' sems kyi gzugs brtan dang // skra gsung thugs ldan ljang bu dang // shing glud yul mkhar mtshon pa dang // skyes pa bud med phyag cha dang // rgyal mtshan da/
100b2(rnying rgyud): ru mtshon rnams// dregs pa so so'i sku mdog dang // mthun par grangs mnyam gnas su dgod// mchod gtor bshos cha mar me dang // gling chad chung ngu de bzhin no// bzlog pasang drag po zor gyi rdzas// glen pa'i sa la zor phor du// gru gsum mnyam byas dug khrag
100b3(rnying rgyud): dang // thun rdzas sna tshogs stsal ba dang // gdug pa'i shing gi rtsad phur dang // b+han+d+ha dug thun gtor mar bcas// bzhi brgya drug cu sum cu gnyis// ci rigs sbyar te mdzes par dgod// steng ngu zhing lpags g.yang gzhi'am// dang nag tshon skud gdugs kyis dbus
100b4(rnying rgyud): za man ngas bzang yol ba bre// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// gtso chen bskyed cing rdzogs pa dang // dregs pa mchod bstod mnyes byas nas// gzugs brtan mthun rdzas bsngo ba ni// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin nga rgyal ba sar// bdud rtsi mchod skyems rak+tas sbeng //
100b5(rnying rgyud): chen spos kyi dri gsung dbul// rnga gling rol mo'i sgra chen bsgrab// mdang chen ba dan nag pos g.yab// hUM da ni dpal chen he ru ka/ gdul dka' ma lus 'dul bar byed// 'jig rten dregs pa zas su za// khams gsum srid gsum nga yi dbang // snang srid
100b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das nga yi bran// nga yi bka' bzhin 'dir 'dus shig/ nyon mongs dbang gis dregs pa yi// lha bdud gshin rje srin po dang // gnod sbyin gza' klu rgyal po dang // ging dang ma mo lha btsan dang // rang gi sde dang g.yog tu bcas// dam tshig dbang gis gnas
100b7(rnying rgyud): 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // ri rab chen po'i yang steng na// lha chen dbang phyug chen po bzhengs// btsun mo u ma de bI bzhengs// na bza' dar nag ber chen gsol// chibs su seng ge glang chen bcibs// khyod kyis tshe phrul
101a1(rnying rgyud): ston pa ni// gams napa rlung bkang 'gyed// g.yonan mo rgyud las la 'khol// 'khor du 'jig rten dregs pas 'dod// dmatshig dbang gis gnas dading bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // tshul gyi rnal
101a2(rnying rgyud): pose ge dang // stobs kyi rgyal po glang chen dang // shes snyan mi dang cang shes te// theg chen gang dang 'dod 'dzir pa// rin chen lug dbyig tsang gang // rnam gas kyi dang mkhal rjingaH// khyed kyis bzhed pa'i dkong du 'bral// rin rten can ldan dang mi dang /
101a3(rnying rgyud): sems kyi gzugs brtan nam mkha' dang // gru gsung thugs ldan ljang bu dang // shing glud yul mkhar mtshon pa dang // po glad mda' drang mo glad 'phang // rgyal mtshan pa ngan du mtshon rnams// nyid kyi sgra mdog dang mthun pa// nal 'byor rnams kyi klung dru 'phrul
101a4(rnying rgyud): dam rdzas sbyar ba'i mchod gtor dang // mthun rdzas ldan pa'i bshos cha dang // snang gsal 'od ldan mar me dang // rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i gling tshong dang // mdzes pa'i gzugs dang snyan pa'i sgra// nim pa'i dri dang bda' ba'i ro// khyed kyi thugs dam bskang phyir
101a5(rnying rgyud): 'bul// lha chen yab yum 'khor dang bcas// sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs te// mdos kyang mthun rdzas bzhed pa'i dkor// sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhes la// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyed kyis srungs// dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyod kyis bstod// rnal 'byor
101a6(rnying rgyud): sku dgra khyod kyis spol// thub pa po la bar gcod pa'i// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs rigs dang // bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams dang // klo byar gnod pa brgyad cu gcig/ yo 'drog sum brgya drug cu'i tshogs// dus min 'chi ba rnam pargyad dang // gshis
101a7(rnying rgyud): ngan gum pa bco lnga dang // gzugs can dgra dang gzugs med bgegs// rmi lam mtshan ltas ngan pa rnams// zhi dang bsal dang bzlog pa dang // gdul dang tshar gcod las mdzod cig/ ri rab chen po'i shar phyogs nas// srid pa'i rgyal po skos rje ni//
101b1(rnying rgyud): bdud rnams can babyangs/ nA bza' mthong ldan par chan gas pa// ral banan pardzun ltar gtib// ldan mig tu rtsib pa dang // nod pa kham ba dang /
101b2(rnying rgyud): d+ha nag po bcings// khyod kyis cho 'phya 'do pa ni// khram thogs bdud sde g.yas nas rol// sho tho bla cis pa g.yon nas 'byed// snang srid po bdud khyod kyi 'khor// da mchog dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs pa
101b3(rnying rgyud): gas ldan rta nag la sogs pa// khyod kyi bzhod pa'i dkor du dbul// drin chen ngar mi la sogs pa// rnalnga 'byor rnams kyi klung du 'bul// dam rdzas mchod gtor la sogs rnams// khyed kyi thugs dam bskad phyir 'phrul// srid pa'i bdud rje 'khor bcas
101b4(rnying rgyud): sa// thon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs la// ji ltar bcol pa'i las mdzod cig/ brgyad mo chen mo re ma ti// ma 'dud kun gyi skye dpon bzhengs// dpal ldan lha mo 'jigs gzugs can// nag mo shA bzlog bdud kyi ma// phyal mthing nag ber
101b5(rnying rgyud): gsol// tshogs su bong bu gA dmar bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa na// ma ba dang 'bum phrag pho nyar 'byed// nag mo stong ste las la 'dzud// sdang srid bdud mo khyod kyi 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir rtson// cang shes bong bu la
101b6(rnying rgyud): sogs pa// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // srin pa'i ma mo 'khor bcas kyis// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i lho phyogs nas// gshin rje ya ma rA dza ste// gshin rje'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog tAg
101b7(rnying rgyud): ral ba can// gdug pa'i thod sbrul ga yang gzhi'i brgyan// gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags pas dkris// sha za'i mgo bcad thod du bcings// zhal bgrad mche ba rab tu gtsigs// ma he nag po chibs su bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni//
102a1(rnying rgyud): gshin rje bo mo po nyir 'tshed// 'dzi bdag gshin rje'i gtsun mo ni// gsong byung chen mo tshul 'dzin cing // gshin rje mo yi ldeng dpon bzhengs// za byed drang khyod chas rgyan// g.yang gzhinag po phul gsol// rA
102a2(rnying rgyud): nag po chi bas su bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// yi dwags pho mo las la 'dzud// snang srid gshin rje khyod kyi 'khor// dam tshig dbangags gnas 'dir bzhugs// mahe chu glang la sogs pa// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // gshin
102a3(rnying rgyud): rje pho mo 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol pa'i phrin las mdzod// ra rab chen po'i nab phyogs nas// srin po nag po glog phreng can// srin po'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs// skye mdog mthing nag 'phang ba la// glog dang 'od kyi phreng bas brgyan// 'brug chen
102a4(rnying rgyud): 'urab chi bas su bcibs/ khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// srin po 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed// srin mo gsod byed las la 'dzud// gcan gzan gdug pa gyi nas rol// 'khor du snang sring srin pos bskor// srin mo sbal mgo khrag mig ma// srin mo
102a5(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog dmar nag 'jigs su rung // yus la khrag gi la banag gsol// rus sbal dkar po'i thor tshugs can// chibs su rnga bong gdong drug bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// srin mo kha 'bar pho nyar 'gyed//
102a6(rnying rgyud): gdong srin nag mo las la 'dzud// snang srid srin mo'i 'khor dang bcas// srog gcod srin po yab yum 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// 'brug sngon rnga mo la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // srin po pho mo 'khor dang
102a7(rnying rgyud): bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// re rab chen po'i byang phyogs nas// gnod sbyin yak+Sha me dpal can// gnod sbyin kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog mthing sngon 'bar ba la// me dpung 'tshubs ma na bzar gsol// stag seng rngam pachibs su
102b1(rnying rgyud): brtsibs// khyad kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// g.yas nas TI bAd+ma yal la// g.yon nas dung 'phrul tu ruH// gdod sbyin stong po nyar 'gyur// zhum can 'bum sde las la 'jud// 'dag rten gnod sbyin 'khor gyis bdar// gnod sbyi klog len
102b2(rnying rgyud): gnod skye bu mo gdug pa can// nag mo rdorje ljags mchim// spyan marin chen ni zhes mtshan// swa la wa sta nag po gsol// mi la s+ya lcags kyi phag mo bcibs// khyod bye cho 'phral ston pa ni// nor 'dzin mo ni ho har 'byed// sgo mon nag po las la 'dzu
102b3(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin mo ni 'byam skyes bskor// shan pa gnod sbyin yab yu ma 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// sta gseng phag mo la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskad// gnod kyin pho mo 'khor dang bcas// ce ltar bcol ba 'phrin
102b4(rnying rgyud): las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i steng gyogs nas// gza' bdud chen po mi bzad pa// ming ni khyab 'jug rA hra la// gza' bdud chen po'i sde dpon bzhengs// mgo dgra spad sbrul mig mang lus// chibs su 'brug chen klog 'gru bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul
102b5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa ni// 'brug sgra stong gsum ldi'iri ri// nam mkhar glog 'od khrugs se khyag/ gzang phran rgyu skar po nyar 'gyed// thog seng ki kang drag tu 'bebs// gza' btud stong gi 'khor gyis bskor// gnam sman thog gi bu yug ma// gdong mo rnams kyis
102b6(rnying rgyud): dgon bzhengs// sku mdog dmar sna mdzes pa la// na bzang go zla mdzes pa gsol// 'brug sgra glog gi 'od la zhon// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// gza' chen nyi zla klang la 'khor// rgya thar tshogs ni zhal la 'char// lha sman 'bum ni pe nyar 'byed
102b7(rnying rgyud): gdong bor ma mo las le 'dzud// bor gdong srin mo 'khor gyis bskor// gzang gdong gnam ldan yab su ma 'khor/ de mchog dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// 'brug chen thar ba la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // gza
103a1(rnying rgyud): dag da na du smran// de sa la pas brjod// na dag zugs/ bdud du nga pa/ na nas/ / na tu
103a2(rnying rgyud): sang dag smra nan pa // zang 'ja'i srogatha sa// ngasas tshuman ga pa' // khyod kyin 'thala'i gyu // can byed// buzang sh+ye ni pa mi 'dzin// thabadud ga cig 'i mis pa d+mor// byam ma das
103a3(rnying rgyud): sa/ na du pa gas sa/ da na// / sa nag sa
103a4(rnying rgyud): dzum bsnyen pa'o// bla rigs ma mo skyel pa'i byed// sa byedag gdug ni 'i gtong // snang snyeng sgra ma 'i mkhyor dang bac+doMs// gdug pa cwa badrang lab ska ma 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bklags// rba pin+da rbas thal ma
103a5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra rdzas kyis thigs mye // shA rdung pa mam pa rnam gapar// degar ba myi pa'i byod lam mdzad// de rkyen pa mings pa mo// bang dam gnyis pa'i na thogs la// gnang bye 'i po gang ba babyungad// phreng ba skyem
103a6(rnying rgyud): mi de ma bdu gsus/ wAg mi ga ga chibs su bad+hAs/ thang can sa bya na pa na// na na na / ljang dag nas mas la 'dzud/ dgalas la/ rdzun
103a7(rnying rgyud): yo du byu gyi mig par drang // kyis grangs rgyamache na// Na'abri bu kyi thong ban ngas/ rnab 'di ba'i nasakyi tang kyang drug du ma rtsibs su khyod gyis tsho 'phrul bcud pa ni 'i
103b1(rnying rgyud): phran stong sde lo nyar 'gyed// grong rtswa phywa po las la 'dzud// theHla phra mang 'khor dang bcas// zla bdud rgyal po grwa ru ma \u0f7f// mA ma g+ha yarba pon bzhangs// sku snod rgya ba'i skrag pa gsol// 'bum gyi spang kye sham thabs cam// dpalag bya rog
103b2(rnying rgyud): dkar po gsol// tshabs su rdo rta gro ba bcibs// khyed kyis cho 'phral bstan pa ni// srid pa'i khyad chen blad na ldid // hagaseng dang ma gyi nas rol// stong dpon mched la po nyar 'byed// masang sun dgu las la 'dzud// ma smin gyi 'khor du
103b3(rnying rgyud): banas// skyes bu dkar po sde gsum yang // dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// ga na ma ru rta dkar gro bo sogs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bsang // dkar po sde gas ma 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod//
103b4(rnying rgyud): bang rim gnyis pa'i lho phyogs su// mchen srid pa'i rgyal mo ni// sdang srid mamo'i sdeng po nu bzhengs// na bza' dang nag go zla gsol// chibs su 'brug mo yid mgyogs bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// tshogs kyi rje mo pho nyar
103b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyed// ldan mo lnga bcwa rtsa brgyad 'khol// snang sred ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// oM kad ti la gcig ma// bka' yi srung ma'i sdang pon te// na bza' mthing nag par chen gsol// chibs su dril rta nag po bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul
103b6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa ne// srin mo nag mo pho nyar 'gyed// pal mo nag mo las la 'khol// mon mo nag mo sna tshogs sbal// nag spug 'bum gyi 'khor gyis bskor// dpal ldan lha mo mgyogs byed ma// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs/
103b7(rnying rgyud): na bza' mthing nag go zu gsol// thibs su sa kyi rog po bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// rigs kyi mkha' 'gro pho nyar 'gyed// sna tshogs mkha' 'grolas la 'dzud// snang srid mkha' 'gro'i 'khor gyis bskor// dpal ldan nag mo
104a1(rnying rgyud): gsum yang // dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// 'brug dang dre'u rta so bya sogs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // nag mo sde gsum 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol pa 'i phrin las mdzod// bar
104a2(rnying rgyud): rim gnyis pa'i nub phyogs nas// skyes bu rdo rje bdud 'dul ni// gnod sbyin cu dra'i sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// ral pa nag po mun ltar gtibs// chibs su dre'u ta nag po bcibs// khyed kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// zhing lbaH
104a3(rnying rgyud): bgos pa pho nyar 'gyed// ral chas bgos pa las la 'dzud// snang srid cu dra'i 'khor gyis bskor// btsan N+Dal srog zan dmar po ni// srid pa btsan gyi sde dpon bzhengs// sba la dar dmar ral ga gsol// chi bas su rtsa mar glog 'gyu bcibs// dbul
104a4(rnying rgyud): bse chog dmar po gsol// khyod kyis cho 'phrul ston pa ni// btson po kha bzhi po cang 'gyed// mgyogs pa'i sde brgyad las la 'dzud// snang srid dregs pa btsan gyis bskor// skyes bu yab shud dmar po ni// rgyal 'gong rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sbrul
104a5(rnying rgyud): zab dam dper chen gsol// chibs su rta dmar yid mgyogs bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// g.yas na zo brdung tshi li li// g.yon na bshud klu gyu ru ru// rta zhon stong ni rtsi nas 'brang// sred pa'i btsan 'gong 'khor dang bcas// skyes bu
104a6(rnying rgyud): dmar po sde gsub ni// da mchog dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// dre'u nag rta mar la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // dmar po sde gsum 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// bang rim gnyis pa'i byang
104a7(rnying rgyud): phyogs na// bai nA ya ka bgegs kyi rgyal// log 'dren kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// rtsibs mu rta nag mgyogs pa bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// rgyal chen bzhi ni pho nyar 'gyed// tsog sbyong tshogs
104b1(rnying rgyud): nga la lakhang mtshon pa dang // po klung mad 'drang po krung 'pharang // rtal mtshan pa dan mtshor rnams// da kyi sum dog dang mthun pa// da la sbyor rnams kyi slad du 'bral// dA rardzas sbyang ba'i mchod gtor dang // mthun rdzas ldan pa'i bshos na dang // rmang
104b2(rnying rgyud): gsal 'od ldan mar me dang // rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i gling tshad dang // mdzes pa'i gzugs dang snyan pa'i sku// zhim pa'i dri dang 'da' ba'i ro// khyed kyi thugs dam bskang phyir 'bul// 'jig rten dregs pa 'khor dang bcas// sngon gyi dam tshig rjes
104b3(rnying rgyud): dgongs te// mdos glud mthun rdzas pazhed pa'i dkor// sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhes la// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyod kyis srungs// dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyed kyis bstod// rnal 'byor skra dgra khyed kyis sgrol// sgrub pa po la bar gcod pa'i// stod
104b4(rnying rgyud): phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs rigs dang // bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams dang // glo bung gnod pa brgyad cu gcig/ ye 'dro gsum brgya drug cu'i tshogs// dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dang // gshes ngan 'gram pa brgyad rtsa gcig/ gzugs can dgra dang
104b5(rnying rgyud): gzugs med bgegs// rmi lam mtshan ltas ngan pa rnams// zhe dang bsal zhing bzlog pa dang // gdul dang tshar gcod las mdzod cing // ces brjod rang gi mthun rdzas bstab// bskang bzlog bsad dang gso la sogs// ji ltar 'dod pa'i drin las
104b6(rnying rgyud): bcol// gang la dmigs pa de bzhin 'grub// ces bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can gyi sde dpon 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mchod bstod rgya chen po'i sgo nas nye bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dregs
104b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor tshogs 'di rnams kun// ngo bo dang rig byang chub sems// ma phyes dbyings las g.yo ba med// 'jig rten gnas dang mthun 'jug ste// mchod dang bstod pas mnyes 'gyur bas/ 'jig rten mchod pastong ces su grags// phyi nang gsang ba
105a1(rnying rgyud): theg// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskur// bang rim bsdam pa zung rtogs nas// rdo rje mdzes pa zhes bya ba// 'jig rten yaM sde dpon bzhengs// b+hin thang shel byin babung gsol// ra dkar gnam
105a2(rnying rgyud): chuthibs su bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phral bstan pa ni// 'dzin ging bzhi bcu lo nyar 'gyed// the brang stong sde pas la 'dzud// tsar rgya po la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis brags dam bskad// bad ma gsum pa byang phyogs nas// lha chen nag po
105a3(rnying rgyud): chen po ni// bstan pa bsrung ba'i sde dpon bzhengs// na bzanga' ljang nag ber chen gsol// chibs su bdud rta pra nag bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// lha dmag tshogs kyi dbugs 'byin cing // lha min ga yul ro rab tu bzlog/ phyogs sbyor
105a4(rnying rgyud): dpal mgon las la 'dzud// mi rtar lug bya dang khyi// nag po'i tshogs kyis thugs dam bskang // dregs pa'i bka' nyan sgo srung bzhi// rang gi bka' nyan 'khor dang bcas// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam
105a5(rnying rgyud): bskang // dbang chen sde bzhi 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol pa'i drin las mdzod// bang rimatha ma'i phyogs bzhi nas// phyi ye lha srin sde brgyad dang // nang gi lha srin sde brgyad dang // gsang ba'i lha srin sde brgyad dang // sbas pa'i lha srin rje brgyad dang // yang
105a6(rnying rgyud): gsang gter gyi lha srin dang // drag po sngags kyi lha srin dang // las byed myur mgyogs b+ha srin dang // btags shing chags pa'i lha srin dang // sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// khyed kyi thugs dam bskang ba ni// shes ldan mi dang cang shes rta// theg chen
105a7(rnying rgyud): glang dang 'dod 'dza' ba// den chen phrag dang gtsang ldanar// thos gsong khyi dang mkha' lding bya// khyed kyi bzhed pa'i dkor du 'bul// rin chen rgyan ldan dang mi dang // sems kyi gzugs brnyan nam mkha' dang // sku gsung thugs ldan ldang bu dang // zhing spun
105b1(rnying rgyud): yul mkhar mtshon pa dang // pho grung mda' dang mo grud 'phang // rgyal mtshan ba dan ru mtshon rnams// nyid kyi su mdog dang mthun pa// rdo lnga 'byor rnams kyi glad du 'bul// da ma rdzas sbyar ba'i mchod gtor dang // mthun rdzas ldan pa'i bshos cha dang // snang
105b2(rnying rgyud): gsal 'od ldan mar me dang // rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i gling tshad dang // mdzes pa'i gzugs dang snyan pa'i sgra// zhim pa'i dri dang bda' ba'i ro// khyed kyi thugs dam bskang phyir 'bul// 'jig rten dregs pa 'khor dang bcas// sngon gyi dam tshig rjes
105b3(rnying rgyud): dgongs te// mdos grung mthun rdzas pa zhed pa'i dkor// sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhes la// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyod kyis srungs// dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyed kyis bstod// rnal 'byor skra dgra khyed kyis sgrol// sgrub pa po la bar gcod pa'o// tod
105b4(rnying rgyud): phrag brgyad ca'i bgegs rigs dang // bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams dang // glo drung gnod pa brgyad cu gcig/ ye 'dro gsum brgya drug cu'i tshogs// dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dang // gshes ngan 'gram pa brgyad rta gcig/ gzugs can dgra dang
105b5(rnying rgyud): gzugs med bgegs// rmi lam mtshan ltas ngan pa rnams// zhe dang bsal zhing bzlog pa dang // gdul dang tshar gcod las mdzod cing // ces brjod rang gi mthun rdzas bstab// bskrang bzlog bsad dang gsol sogs// ji ltar 'dod pa'i drin las

105b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor tshogs 'di rnams kun// ngo bo rang rig byang chub sems// ma skyes dbyings las g.yo ba med// 'jig rten gnas dang mthun 'jug ste// mchod dang bstod pas mnyes 'gyur bas/ 'jig rten mchod pastod ces su grags// phyi nang gsang ba'i rtse
106a1(rnying rgyud): brag ni// spyang dang srid pa'i dkyil 'khor kun// gsang ba'i bdag po 'di nyid dang // gnas skabs mdzod bstod phyi yin no// dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung // rang gi snang ba 'dus pa'i tshogs// dbang po'i yul gyi 'ongs
106a2(rnying rgyud): spyod dang // gtsang sde'i rtog pa sbyang ba'i rdzas// 'dod chags gzhi dang 'bru bcud rtse// gnyis med pha rol sdang byed pa// rang gi ngang du mnyes byed cing // so so'i mtshan dang dpe byad dag/ nges par bstan pa nang gi'o// sems dang sems la snang ba'i tshogs//
106a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad ye nas dkyil 'khor che// ma bcos rang bzhin lhun gyis grub// 'ong nas ma lus 'dus pa las// chos gzhan med de yul nyid dang // yul du 'dzin pa snang ba'i bdag/ gnyis med rtogs shing khong du chud// mchod bstod rab tu gsang ba'o//
106a4(rnying rgyud): lus las sprul zhing bsrub pa'i sku/ 'bru badz+ra sgra pi 'khor lo gsung // rang grol snying po ma bcos thugs// lha lha gnod sbyin batshan dang bdud// srin po gza' ded mo rigs rnams// rdzogs shing gdug dang khro zhing gtum// myur mthogs rmugs dang 'drib
106a5(rnying rgyud): pa dang // drag dang bcings pa so so'i sde// ri rab ba shos gtsang rgyan dang bcas// 'bras phrag nyid rtse tsu du'i dbyibs/ dkar dmar bzung ldan dmigs kyis mdzod// phadung rgyal bro grogs dang lha// mdang rje khol bran dang bu// bsnyen pa rang gi tshul yin
106a6(rnying rgyud): nu/ che btsun dbang gi dngos phrab dang // longs spyod 'phel zhing mngag pad+mas/ zlad 'jam skyabs che bka' na rjong // dza ga N+Dal wanI zhing slar mi ldog/ shin tuta pa'i yon tan te// rang la chub cing 'cha' ba dang // longs spyod mau byor zing tshong dru //
