106a7(rnying rgyud): glo bur nad kyis gzing byed cing // rmar ldog pas zhis nyams pa dang // bsgo pa mi ta na don med cing / rang chud rtsub ci khengs pa dang // ngogs brgyad mi pe kun gyis brnyas// bas ma don mi 'grub mang 'thang nyams// rgyud don sras pam shes spyon/
106b1(rnying rgyud): khribs kyi bdag pa lta 'is// gdang kyis bzungs zhing bsgrub par bya// dbang rjen pa dang mtshungs pa'i bdud// mtshungs med thogs dang 'dra ba btsan/ gnod can thams kya gcas pa// zan pa srog la rgol ba gshed// gan nad lag par/
106b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin AH// thor pa'i drug zul tho bri// mo rbud dbang dzin rjed pa nga // mtshungs ldan de 'i gnyen pos bsgrub// lags sa ma bzug pa na metan// sa song gnad med bdu tu 'byur// gzung zer ma tha~M klu la rdzo// g+sa cos ma nyan
106b3(rnying rgyud): gsol// skyob mya dkrug mis ze myur// log gnon ma bsnyen bdag nyid stobs// dbang du ma 'dras bzho mnyan// gnang gyi yan lag brgyad kyis ni// mchod pa stod pasgrang khye dzin las bcol// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rte gyi rdzi dpon rjerje ba rnams
106b4(rnying rgyud): kyi zang ba'i mthod bstod gnad kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad za ba// 'jig rten dregs pa'i sde dpon rnams// drag po'i las la sbar ba ni// drar khrod gdug pa'i gnas dag rtsa// rtsa ba'i brten po sngon mong+yanas
106b5(rnying rgyud): so so'i mthun pa'i rdzas bsags te// drag po sa kyi khang pa ni// e dbyibs sum bya ldan par bsham// d+hI da gsang bsgragasung // gnas kyi brlab bskang dang mtshang // snyi dngos sor bsngags pa dag/ rab tu bde ba 'dod pas
106b6(rnying rgyud): dmigs// gzugs ska bsam pa'i nus pa yi// lus dang lus kyi 'khrul 'khor dang // srog dang srog gi snying po yis// sems dang sems kyi ngo bo las// rtsi nang kun du bsngags pa de// 'phro 'du 'od kyi drang zhing dgug/ rang gzhan dmig pa de la
106b7(rnying rgyud): bstim// sha nas khrag sogs ma lus bcas// dregs pa'i sde dpon sku gsung thugs// ma lus mnyes pa 'di yis bya// gang la dmig pa tshad kyis grol// ting nge 'dzin gyi brtul zhugs kyis/ thal dang myur ba zla yi stobs// 'di la
107a1(rnying rgyud): gsang ga / da ga / gad pa gsu /
107a2(rnying rgyud): da// gsung mo thogs thal khrem chi mes// gang shing drug khrag dang ba pa// gzugs parnya rdzogs par longs spyod pa'o// slar yang dmigs te lhag ma 'bral// gcod dang 'khor gyi rabartse ba'i// drag po'i chog gis rab tu sbrengs// rdegs pa'i bdag
107a3(rnying rgyud): sa so y-i// che brjod gnad rang bzlas pa yis// bsgrub ci byin pa ri ma bzhinaH// drung srong bri las rdzogs par b+ha// thal chen dang ni dag po ngas// dpe khrag gas ma dang gsod byed byas ma// mtshon dpal rin chen gsum gyi dbyi // rang byung bas
107a4(rnying rgyud): shes ldog pa'i rdzas// nang du 'dra 'grod snar ba ni// sgra tshig ting nge 'dzin ldan pas// stobs chen 'khor los dbabacing 'phang // dregs pa 'khor bcas las su dmigs// gzhan yang mchod rdzas gzugs brtan bcas// rab tu bstan pa'i dmig pas bstim//
107a5(rnying rgyud): 'bru gnasas dang chus drug dang // sra ga sher 'thab dang zung bral dang // rgya mtsho'i dbus dngas pi rtse// mtsho kyis brdegs dang rlung gis bsrel// ngagra med ldang zhing me zas 'dzums// l+r-ing nas dbyung ba'i rten 'brel te// brtags pa'i yid kyis dudzun
107a6(rnying rgyud): par gdag// gdug byed 'khor dang zas su gtad// ji srid 'khor ba ma'ongs par// thar bangar mi 'gyur las bkyis kyang // thams dang snying de'i sems mi gtong // 'di ltar mngon par spang pa yis// bstan la rabs kyir 'gyur ba'i// rjes 'brang log
107a7(rnying rgyud): pa ga ba mas// tshor ga cid blo la zhing 'dul pa yin// zhes bka' phral to// 'jig can gyi sring por rjen 'dzi pas drag pa'i las 'gyur ba'i lan bdun pa / de nas ga'an yang bshad pa ni// 'jig rten rdzogs par dag gnang // gas
107b1(rnying rgyud): ba'abang po dag thal gzungs// kun pa sus dz+wal dang bya bar bstan// badz+ras paduSh+TAn/ lag par ma yatan ya/ mam te shar da bdani/ dumanan ga sa can te / yam gang bat+tA zhwa tAnan/ 80ma ra ba/ ya s+ya
107b2(rnying rgyud): ga' dz+ra/ than la re/ nAg kra pra yin dza/ shegs sheg la du tri tsar sa ma dudzi/ mam pa po rdu wa/ mAn ga kyang drar dza du dzati/ ma so hA bA la duH ra rtog pa dang sa te tegs thaM ka rdzas ba b+hi hA ti pa 'ang ni nga
107b3(rnying rgyud): ga dU ra~M/ nu pa/ snang ba/ bang pa gas so// ga d+hA a gan la/ mjug/ 'di dag gyur
107b4(rnying rgyud): mchod par 'gyur/ sarba A lu kle tra si d+hi pra tra ba ta na dzad+hi pra dra bcu b+hadra ba sud+ha ra rat+na pr-iSh+Tasa~Md+hi/ ma hA dz+nyA na sarbad+harmag r+b+ha kA ya wAnaHt+ta sad+d+hi sid+d+he/ ba la sid+d+hi mahA sid+d+ha A be sha ya A/ ha ha ha ho/ rab tu sbyar bas dngos grub blangs/ sarba sha d+hi pan rbad zang
107b5(rnying rgyud): 'di yis rab tu zad par bya/ tr-i hur thu mdzaHshad+h+we tsed+ha mA ra ya zang / rU ba ye gan d+ha zud rbud phaT phaT// ma ra ma ra/ zlum thu ma/ hA na hA na/ da had haM/ pa tsa ba tsa/ tshal ba tshal ba/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha thun thun zad/ 'di yis dmigs pa pa tu gsang / mAr
107b6(rnying rgyud): ya mA da ya a pri pre ta ka tr-id thing tri sha ba li rU pa ya bin ti birda ta hu lu hu lu zad nan/ le nan/ a nan d+h+ye nan s+t+waM b+ha ya sne b+ha ya nan/ zhes pa yis ni ga nanA par bya/ sarba ma ra ta ka raM raM dz+wa la raM dz+wa la dr-i sl-i Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ho ha pa ho ta ya/ raM tsa ya raM tsa pa/ zhes pas
107b7(rnying rgyud): ma lus bsag par bya// mA ra ya sha trUM thun blo bla ma ril gyon te thun A be sha ya b+ho// dmigs pa nad yis 'phang bar bye/ badz+ra utsa ta ya phaT/ a bris bsngo ba zlog/ sa ma ya rba des byug bzlog/ sris las rbapa kri dur na bya ba zlog/ pha rol nus pa 'di
108a1(rnying rgyud): !/ / yas bzlog/ mat+mabyur shA sa/ a ba shu ya ma thams bcapa/ zhabs lags pabyung chu bab po// nag sagag snga la/ khro blo grol la shAr shar ram na cagan la shar shar ba mag// drag pos brjod nang
108a2(rnying rgyud): bsdam pa'o// ma hA shAn+tiM puMSh+TiM ba shaM ku ru ma ra ma ra dza ya karma ma le a mu ka sid+d+hi su sid+d+hi ka ra swa sti swA hA/ phrin las thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o// mthun pa'i rdzas dang ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi khyad par so sor dbye// gnas bsgyur dang ni grub pa'i mthal
108a3(rnying rgyud): snying rje byams pas rab bskul zhing // kun du khyab pa'i mchod sbyin bya// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang du bya// drag pos bsgral zhing char bcad pa'i// las kun rang gzhan don du spyad// 'jig rten gnas pa'i snying dang srog/ yi ge gsang ba rang 'byung gnas// mngon
108a4(rnying rgyud): du rgyu ba thugs ka te// ring thung pho mo khrag dang dung // chags sdang snying srog snying rje brtse// rdo rje pad+ma rlung dang gnas// thabs dang shes rab chos can dang // chos nyid las kyi 'bras bu yis// ming mtshan gnad ma tshang bod dang drang // grogs dang ldan
108a5(rnying rgyud): pas las la sbyar// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi las sna tshogs kyi rtsa ba'i snying po gnad kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// 'jig rten dregs pa'i gtso chen rnams// tshul bzhin
108a6(rnying rgyud): rab tu bsgrub pa yis// grub cing nye ba'i rtags rnams ni// dngos dang nyams dang rmi lam brtag/ 'di las so sor 'byung 'gyur te// dga' zhing mdangs ldan stobs rnyed dang // bde dang rtogs pa sgo skye zhing // mngon rgyu yid kyi gdeng thob cing // nyam pa
108a7(rnying rgyud): bag tsho dgos med ldan// nus ldan phrin las mthar phyin rtogs// 'di dag la sogs rigs par 'byung // lus 'jam dbugs kyis ma gnod cing // yangs shing bstan la spyod par dga'// nad dang gdon gyis brdzi mi nus// 'byung ba'i nus pas mi
108b1(rnying rgyud): spyod cig// kha dag mdangs ldan sdug cing mdzes// 'dal sags pa lus 'thung bar// da ltar bgrub gzhan gyis 'dan// nga dang sangs rgyas rnams kyigasung // mthun pa'i tshul sa 'du na 'dar// stan dang ma stan badzad rnams// nangs pa dbyangs
108b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin yid tu 'ong // grags thos tsam gyis dbang du byed// tshul rjes 'jug pa dag gi brda// gang la brtsams pa de 'grub cing // ma zhum mi spang mi 'dor bas// dbang dang ldan ning mi g.yol// gsang ba'i mthu stobs rab tu thob// ljid kyi yul du
108b3(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'o// sA phyi de ma thag pa yi// bag chags ma yin rmi lam ni// rgyal po mkhan po slob dpon dang // che bcan rigs ldan rgyan bcas ldan// gcan gzan 'dab chags dud 'gro dang // skyes pa bud med bus pa sogs// nye bar grub pa'i rtags yin no//
108b4(rnying rgyud): bran 'bangs mngag pa'i tshul 'changs shing // bka' bsgo nyan pa las byed rtags// rang gi gnas nas glu len zhing // rgyang mig blta ba g.yel ba'i rtags// rang la chad pa'i las brtsams shing // nyes la ni 'dod pa ldog pa'i rtags// zas sgo/ ma 'dod cing khre
108b5(rnying rgyud): l+r-in stsogs// rang nyid gnod 'gyod ma bskangs rtags// 'joms shing drud mom 'debs byed pa// ma dag / lus sngang nyams pa'i rtags// ngag gi bsgob mi nyan cing // slar ning tshur la 'khol 'dod pa// gnyen pos dbang dum gyur rtags// mtshon d+harnal/
108b6(rnying rgyud): zhing tshad ma ldan// nus med bya ba mi 'grub pa// thugs kyi nus pa ma gu brtags// gzhan 'dod rang la med pa dang // rang gi yid la 'dod med rnams// mchod paskud mthun rdzas mtshad rtags// sha rus khrug sogs longs spyod cing // ngo mthon rab tu cheb
108b7(rnying rgyud): ni// las kyis 'grub pa'i rtags mnan// phar la da ma gatshogs med byung zhing // na me khang par bdag zugs pa// ngan sngags gzhan gyis bzlog pa'i rtags// bye brag sde brgyang sa sonas// mi da nga drung 'gro 'ad ba chags sogs// po tshogs nag pa 'drung
109a1(rnying rgyud): kyi rtags// mo chog rgyun bzang ma mo ste// rjeb tsan 'bag seng gtsug lag khang // bus pa sgra sde rgyal po'i rtags// mirta khra spyang ri dwags ni// brag btsun ri ba can rtags yin no// chu gnas dud 'gro
109a2(rnying rgyud): glu yi rtags// ma he ra lug mig mang dang // mun pa bu yug gza' yi rtags// skyes pa chas bzang 'byor pa can// ri mtsho la gnas gnod sprin rtags// nya dang shan pa bya ba dang // dmag mi go mtshon srin po'i rtags// 'di dag sngar bshad
109a3(rnying rgyud): bzang ngan sbyar// bye brag bsgrubs pa'i rtags su 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po bsgrub pa rtags kyi le'u ste dgra pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// dreg pa can gyi khyad par rdzas/
109a4(rnying rgyud): mdzes pa'i gzugs brnyan sku yi rtan// ming nas bod pa gsung gi rten// phyag mtshan dam pa thugs kyi rten// lug g.yag dkar po sbal sbrul nya// glang rta sngon po rin po che// g.yul gshoms myur bsgral bya gcan dang // sbrel bu shel nag bya
109a5(rnying rgyud): nag dang // rta lcags khyi dang rgod nag dang // ra phag b+ha khyi dkar po dang // klu klor rog dom khyig nag/ sbrul nag b+hargo dar skyes dang // rtar bya khyi dmar po'o// snying khrag mgo dang rgyal mtshan ni// staklu gnod sbyin sbyin po dang // ma mo bdud
109a6(rnying rgyud): dang rgyal po gang // gshin rje gza' dang btsan rnams kyi// rim bzhin so so'i brten pa'i rdzas// rab tu gsang ba nyid yin no// e ldan gdugs bcas rgyud med kyi// thod pa mtshon cha phur pa dag/ dug khrag rin chen drag po'i 'bru// kun
109a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs rab tu gas dpa' rdzas// klus bzung sdod ni sha thag bcas// dus bzang rigs med myur song chu// myu gu sna tshogs dri ldan rdzas// chu drag dbab pa'i rdzas yin no// mchod rten ri rab rgya gram bcas// blo rdzas rigs ngan man
109b1(rnying rgyud): ma yang
109b2(rnying rgyud): gsum// dmigs pa'i 'bab rdzas pad+ma ni// slar la bzlog pa'i rdzas yin no// nad gdug bam ril mgo rkang rnams// rab tu mnan pa'i rdzas yin no// dug khrag tshogs dang mtshan dan sdod// dmigs pa'i rten la 'phangs pa'i rdzas// ngan pa'i sa yi
109b3(rnying rgyud): rten mkhar dang // gdug cing rab tu tsha ba'i shing // 'bru nag dug khrag bsreg pa'i rdzas// gzhan yang dbang chen dregs pa'i 'khor// so so'i rigs dang sder bcas pa'i// mthun dang ma mthun gtsang dang sme// sngags pa'i rdzas kun shes par 'gyur// ma
109b4(rnying rgyud): 'ongs dus na rdo rje 'chang // rang gi rig 'dzin byang chub sems// brtul zhugs can gyi grub pa yis// dbus dang mtha' 'khob yul rnams dang // sangs rgyas zhing gi 'jig rten khams// kun nas sde dpon g.yog bcas pa'i// yid dang dngos po'i tshul
109b5(rnying rgyud): can nams// khams dang rigs dang bsam pa dang // byed pa rten gnas mo byad dang // ma lus rdzogs par rab tu rtogs// shes ldan mig rgyan rnams la ston// de tshe dgas pa'i tshogs chen rnams// da ste yis gdams pa bzhin// yang dag don las ma
109b6(rnying rgyud): 'da' zhig/ khyed rnams kyang ni dus nam zhig/ las kyi gnas ngan len spang ste// byang chub sa la myur 'gro yis// de bas bka' yi dam mnos la// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin sgrubs shig/ gsang chen nga yi bstan pa'i tshul// phyi rol phyogs la sogs
109b7(rnying rgyud): pa yis// nyams shing dmas par mi 'gyur bar// rgyas shing brtan par khyod kyis byos// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po'i rten rdzas dang las kyi gnyer bsgo ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de
109b8(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba chen po'i sku'i rnam par rol pa chen po de dag nyid kyi sku la rab tu bsdu bar mdzad de/ dgyes pa'i gsung gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs// bdud
110a1(rnying rgyud): rgya dang ga zhan rna la sogs pa'o// 'jig nan dbang can na can nams/ myu bar thag kyang na 'dus nas cang // smras gsumasangs rgyas rnams na sa// brtan pa cag spa pa dang // dang la bya thags
110a2(rnying rgyud): mdzad cing // rdegs pa'i skugasung thugs nyid dang // yod tan mnalas rdzogs son/ 'i dus na rig pa 'dzin// skyes ba brtson ldan rnams kyis n-i// gnyis su mdzin par yongs mi// dzam dang nang ma mas kun// yang ga sems kyi sa pa na
110a3(rnying rgyud): de nam bcos yul mi bral// mchad mthung ba dag po med// gnyis med mnyam nyid ldan gyis grub// des 'gyur thad byung sgrol sems thal// mA lus rgya ba sting gi srog/ de nyid shes tharab tu blang // dpeng ga rgyal po chang bar 'gyur// gal tang dang rdegs pa/
110a4(rnying rgyud): mi so nga byud ldan pa la// gnyis 'dzin yid kyis tog dpyod cing // matsun ma rab tu zhom byed pa// rkang med khams gsum bzod 'dod cing // mig med stong gsum ba lta dang mthongs// bdud pa'i dga' babyed par byed// rnam pa 'onas
110a5(rnying rgyud): myachog ce rnams kyis// gsang ba dag nyid shes par gyis// zhes bka' stsal te nyid kyi su gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen ba chos nyid de bzhin nyid spros pa dang bral ba dbyings su thim par mdzadado// 'jig rten gyi snying pon chen po'i khor dang bdu /
110a6(rnying rgyud): chos phra mthur thug tu bsgrub par gdams pa'i maT bcu gcig pag/ / dregs pa can gyi sde dpon 'jig rten mchod bstod pasgrub brtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// / ca gar mkhan pa chen po pan+d+ha byung gnas dang / grod kyi
110a7(rnying rgyud): mnab chen padag gis ba ning grus ta gtan malab 'o// rgyam pa'i tha pa 'o// gte / tha \u0f7f/ 66\u0f7f/ gsumams// / rgyag dang / r-i ngam rdzas sra la yul / nAm/ bad kri dang/ dag chags
110b1(rnying rgyud): pan dzaH 'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthu bas thams cad kyi bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dig dbadag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rje 'dzin badzin pa nyid de rab chen po yang byur/ lung bcan gnas ma// rab tu
110b2(rnying rgyud): brgyan pa'i pho brang chen po na/ yum chen mo 'byung ba lnga'i bdag nyid mo dang / gnyis su med par snyoms par zhugs te/ sku las 'od zer sna tshogs rab tu spros nas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gdug pa can dang / dregs pa can dang / gzi brjid can dang / drag shul
110b3(rnying rgyud): can la sogs pa dag gi gnas thams cad rab tu g.yo zhing bskyod par mdzad pas/ de dag gi sde dpon dang 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams rlung gi shugs kyis bskyod pa bzhin du lhags par 'di lta ste/ gshin rje 'chi bdug nag po chen po yum dang bcas pa dang /
110b4(rnying rgyud): bdud nag po chen po me'i kha rlangs can dang / yum bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma dang / srin po'i rgyal po gsod byed nag po yum dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin chen po gang ba bzang po dang / yu ma gnod sbyin mo sha za ral gcig ma dang / lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug
110b5(rnying rgyud): chen po dang / ru tra'i bdag po thar pa nag po dang / dmu rje btsan pa rgyal po chen po dang / phyi rol lha'i bdag po kA la nag po dang / khyab 'jug chen po kun tu rgyu dang / klu'i bdag po gzhon nu gtum po dang / lha'i rgyal po li byin chen po dang / gnod sbyin chen po
110b6(rnying rgyud): lag dgu pa dang / bdag nyid chen po rdo rje mdzes pa dang / klu bdud chen po yab shud dmar po dang / gzhan yang lha dang klu dang lha ma yin dang za byed dang / yi dwags dang 'byung po'i tshogs dang / pho nya'i tshogs 'jigs par byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu
110b7(rnying rgyud): 'dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug byed chen po'i 'khor de dag rab tu 'dul bar mkhyen nas/ dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul par mdzad de/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dag/ gzugs su snang ba rab tu 'jigs//
111a1(rnying rgyud): sma ni mi lhan dragacang gnam// dzi na mnam rdul rgya gsum// ngan bsgyur cha bar bro// rag rgyu cha rtsub me sdug spyod// zhesdang chen po mi 'bar zhing // du rgyal gang dus thag tu spangs// gte phyug mun nag
111a2(rnying rgyud): rab tu 'thibs// 'dod chags thag gi rgya chen thub// brag dog rlung ni rab tu 'khrugs// tir chen po'i longs spyod dang // stag gzig gcan gzin ni sbrang dang // kang ka dur b+ha 'dab chags tshogs// sha za khrig 'thung rus pa 'joms/
111a3(rnying rgyud): bam dang rul dang myags pa dang // 'byed dang bral dang gzhig pa dang // zos dang 'thor dang rab tu 'thor// thul dang zag dang brlags pa dang // rje dang rgod dang glal ba dang // 'jig pa shing gdug dang rngams pa yi// rol pa'i longs spyod rabatu
111a4(rnying rgyud): sbrul// kun kyang gdug pa'i sems 'chang zhing // gsod gcod bsha' gtub lus kyi las// tshig rtsub brlang po'i da ro 'byin// khros pa'i brtul zhugs drag po yis// ma lus 'dul zhing tshar gcod pa'i// mngon par spyod la rab tu bkod//
111a5(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar mthong zhing snang gyur kyang // kun rdzob tsam du snang ba las// sems can gcig gi ba spu la// cung zad gnod pa yongs med de// rang gi rnam rtog bde bar spyod// nges pa'i de nyid kho na'o// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ tshe
111a6(rnying rgyud): 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i gleng gzhi'i leru ste dang po'o// / de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje 'chang ba'i rgyal po yis// dus gsum rgyal ba sras bcas kyis// thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nas// ma lus bstan pa bsrung
111a7(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa'o// gsang bdag chen por dbang bskur byer// gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje 'chang // lnga bcu'i grogs dang bcas pa yis// so so'i gtso chen mdun nyid nas// rang gi stan las rab tu langs// mngon du spyod pa'i sprul pa mdzad// thugs la gnas
111b1(rnying rgyud): pas smra // gas rnanams pa pa sta// rdza ga gas dazugs// zagag mang khrugasag gas// gas gtams gnapa// banas pa mar gyu bar// b+han+d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal las dang // gad da/
111b2(rnying rgyud): su rung ba ni// stobs chen rnams kyang nyer mi spyod// phrin las ma lus rdzogs mdzad gzugs// gyi nang mtha' dbus kun la khyab// bstan la rab sngar pha rol po'i// phung po zhabs kyi gdan du bting // 'od ldan gtsang ma yum dang bcas// che ba mchog gi slar
111b3(rnying rgyud): mdzad de// rigs can mthar gnas dbur bstan cing // stong pa bco brgyad dag cing stong // phyag gis dregs pa'i lha brgyad bskal// b+han+ta not+ta g.yas g.yon bsdams// thugs kyi dbang rtags dang por bzung // thugs rje mi 'gyur mthing nag mdog/ mr-i/
111b4(rnying rgyud): 'jigs rig par ldan pa'i zhabs// bdud bzhi phyogs dang bcas pa gnon// ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i phyir// ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar// 'bar ba'i spun gyis khams gsum gzigs// gdangs pa'i shangs kyis srid gsum rngub// snyan gyi rlung skas stong
111b5(rnying rgyud): gsum khyab// no dpal choms kyis gdug pa sgrol// sngags 'dril rgan spa drag po rdeb// khroganyer 'od kyis dbang du sdud// dpa' bu'i chas kyis rab tu brgyan// sprul pa'i lha rnams srul rdzogs// stobs ldan de nyid mnyes mdzad pa'i// 'byung ba rtsel
111b6(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur ma// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi la// gri grag tre shul bdud rtsi g.yas// b+har+g+ha zhing chen g.yang gzhi g.yon// gtso bdug tshul 'dzin rab tu sgeg/ dgyes mdzod rab tu rol pa las// 'dral byed sbal pa rab tu s+ho// tshogs btsul
111b7(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten khams kun gyi// gtum po gdug pa'i rlos 'chang ba'o// rdeg sngags bdag po ma sus kun// rang nyid ma sa'i 'khor bcas pa'i// rten dang gnas par der sbeng // rang dbang med par 'dud cing g.yo// sngo badz+ras rbanganan bka ma ma
112a1(rnying rgyud): ra Sha thA phaT// bdud dang ga zhan snyan po dang // gnad sbyin la dang lag wAnan// dman cha dang myur lathogs// gdug zad mkha' la rgyu ba dang // rgyal sa ma 'bru' lus ban dang // ngan nga dang
112a2(rnying rgyud): dang sprul pa can// mtha' 'a khob gnas bcus maM lus r+b+ba// lha bdud mi ma yin gyi gnas// kha ba can du phyogs shing srid// las kyi lus kyi nus pa 'byin// ma lus rnam pa thams cad kun// thug drag rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// rab tu 'drar ni
112a3(rnying rgyud): mdun naganas// thugs rdo'i bdag pos dgongs mdzod de// gtu ma jams 'jigs byed chen po sgra// gsang rdzog drug po'i gsang gi sgram// ma lus rnams par bka' stsal b+ha// oM ma 'dzag rten khams kun gyi// jag sngags bdag po dregs
112a4(rnying rgyud): patsan// sngon gyi don 'chang chen dang // nga yi bka' las ma'ada' bar// khyed rnams rang gi 'a khor dang bcas// ma s+ye'i las dang btags pa'i ming // rigs dang rtan dang byed pa'i las// dri dang che lpags mongs spyong rnams// 'jigs byi
112a5(rnying rgyud): glunas 'dar rnye du sbyin// khyed rnams 'di las 'gal thed na// ngami skyon gyi dam tshig gis// khyod kyi lum sa mas ga dang brnyas// mams gtan nas brgyag par gyi// zhes bka' phrul nas/ drag zugs kyi tshig 'di dag kyang bka' phyi to//
112a6(rnying rgyud): man kun tu gtan ta pa n+d+ha pAn+tu/ yam tsa rbata ka su ma many+dzu t+ta mA ba dzA dzA dzo / du thazagasas dug dun ma ti mA rA ma d+hA dz+nyA de// rag shA ga rtsom ya ti m-i mdzu rje dang / yAH A pa s+phar A me shwe pa mA ma d+he/ mdza da pa shA myu
112a7(rnying rgyud): sasu kyis sa sa rgyas chu mu ba gas ga rjes gadzin ti dul // kyi ti tu ngas mas ba meng pa du
112b1(rnying rgyud): na/ 'a pa sam pa drangang / ma lang sna 'a nga/ thal thag tum mdzad/ thas bad cing klu 'jugs byang 'bangar bar snang yang 'dugs su rung bar bstan// sas rgya thams cad kyad du khams rtang gsung na
112b2(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mtshungs pa'i sgra chen po dang / 'od dang glog 'bar ba dang / rlung gi shugs drag pos rab tu gang bar gyur to// bdud dang gshin rje la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i thogs pa can rnams kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas te rab tu 'dus nas
112b3(rnying rgyud): rang rang gi rigs kyi dregs pa dag phul te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mdun du nye bar gyur nas/ bka' rab tu bsgrub par rtsol bar gyur to// drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ byin rlabs chen pos dbang du bsdus pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
112b4(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud kyi rgyal po me'i kha rlangs can zhes bya ba/ mdog nag po kha nas me 'bar ba/ khram shing dang bdud zhags nag po thogs pa/ zhing lpags kyi gos gyon pa/ yum bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma
112b5(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba/ khram shing dang thod pa rlon pa thogs pa/ zhing lpags gon zhing bdud rta nag po la khyo shug gnyis nar zhon nus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdud kyi ris kyi lha tshogs dang bcas nas rings par lhags so// de bzhin du 'chi bdag
112b6(rnying rgyud): gshin rje zhes bya ba// mdog nug thod pa gri gug 'dzin// chung ma gshin rje za byed ma// gri gug thod pa phyag gis 'dzin// khyo shug zhing lpags rlon pa bgos// ma he chu glang zhon nas ni// gshin rje pho mo'i tshogs dang bcas// 'gal byed
112b7(rnying rgyud): gzir zhing myur du lhags// srin po gsod byed yab yum yang // mdog nag zhing gi pags pa bgos// ral gri gri gug/ yang kyigayon g.yas kyis bzung // g.yon yum gyis mi mgo/ yang cigangs thod khrag thogs// stag dang seng ge bzhon pa
113a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ bskyod// srin pa'i tshogs bcas myur du 'khod// gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po dang // rlung ma sha zar la gcig panas// mthing nag mastsags byed rtu la zhon// zhang lpags kun te phyug gnyis kyis// ral ze yang ga
113a2(rnying rgyud): dar na gzhing lpags yum g.yas bzung // gnod sbyin tshogs dang bcas te bskyod// drag sngags bdag po sde dpon te// shar lho nub byang phyogs dag gi// gnas su gtso la 'dud cing 'khod// dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba// 'jig rten lha yi sngags
113a3(rnying rgyud): bdag ni// dkar po ba dan shel gri thogs// dar dkar gos can gnam ru zhon// bregs pa'i lha bdud 'khor dang bcas// rengs par lhag ste shar phyogs 'khod// thar pa nag po zhes bya ba// mdog gnag mchod gtor dug thung 'dzin// dom
113a4(rnying rgyud): nagazhon te zhing lpags bgos// sde dang bcas te lho phyogs 'khod// dmu rje btsan po zhes bya ba// dar nag dang ni zhags pa thogs// ber nag gyon te da mur+t+ta zhon// rang gi sde dang nub phyogs 'khod// mu stegs nag po chen po yang // kha nI dang ni tri
113a5(rnying rgyud): shUl 'dzin// mi lpags bgos te ma he zhon// rang gi sde bcas byang du 'khod// khyab 'dzug rog ti zhes bya ba// mthing nag khram shing dgra sta 'dzin// sprin nag bgos shing 'brug sngon zhon// gza' bdud tshogs bcas steng nas 'khod// klu rgyal
113a6(rnying rgyud): sog ma med ces pa// ser nag sbrul lpags na bza' can// bum pa dang ni rus sprul 'dzin// chu srin zhon te klu tshogs bcas// 'og gi phyogs su 'khod cing 'dug/ gzhan yang li byin lag dgu dang // the skyes gtso dang yams shud kyi// sau
113a7(rnying rgyud): so'i sngags kyi bdag po dag/ dkar ser dmar po'i mdog ldan zhing // rgol gri thogs dang / shing lag dgu 'gyed// dar dmar mjung da / ring ral ze 'dzin// rta dkar bya rgo der skyes dang // rtad mar zhon to zhing lpags bgos// so
113b1(rnying rgyud): mang dgasug nas gang// thugs ma pa nar gnas par sayod// gzhanasang zug rtsA dang// bstan nan ldan pa bdud// skyugs ga sa dang// da dmug 'das 'thun can// yod sa ma 'jun
113b2(rnying rgyud): dpon chen po rnams bcas 'khod// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // yang gsang dang ni drag po dang // btags shing chags dang spras pa dang // las byed shan pa thor shong dang // che grags btsan dang ma mo dang // mun 'thib stong 'khrugs srog gcod dang
113b3(rnying rgyud): gleng zhing dbang che la sogs rnams// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang ba yi// bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub byed pas// mthogs dur khrod gnas chen du// 'dar zhing myur ba'i shugs dang bcas// rang gi nus pa rab bstan te// bka' nyan gsung sdod rjes
113b4(rnying rgyud): 'brangs gnas// de ltar 'khod pa'i 'jig rten gyi dregs pa'i bdag po sngags kyi stobs dang ldan pa de dag gis/ rang rang gi 'khor dang / rigs kyi sde dang / mthu dang longs khyod kyi khyad par dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bstan nas 'di skad ces
113b5(rnying rgyud): kyang gsol to// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po/ bdag cag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa ma rungs pa'i tshogs gdug pa dang / sdang ba dang / gnod pa dang / shugs dang / 'tsho ba dang / rjod pa'i bsam po dang ldan pa dang / byams pa
113b6(rnying rgyud): dang / snying rje dang phan pa'i sems skye bar mi nus pa rnams te/ rang rang gi khams dang / byed pa dang / rigs dang / las kyi bya ba dang / rten dang / nus pa dang / dbang gi khyad par dag dang mthun pa'i bstan pa mi bzad pa stobs dang ldan pa dag bka' stsal
113b7(rnying rgyud): bdagasol/ zhes shes pato// drigazugs 'dus pa rtsa pa'i rgyud las/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ya btu bkod pa'i ba skye gsum / de ma rje dzin pa mas// ma chab ba bstan cing // gsung gi snying po gnang bal//
114a1(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dgongs pa cher mdzad nas// 'jig rten rdzogs pa man stobs can// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// hUM 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs chen rnams// nga yi bka' bzhin nyan par gyis// ngan rdzas/
114a2(rnying rgyud): sgrub de chen te// ye nas ma bcos spyan gyis grub// snang ba'i skul dngos po med// ye shes sku ste sku ye mchog/ nga ni sngags gsung mthu chen te// ye nas tha snyed sgra dang bral// brjod pa'i gsung la 'dzin pa med// ma 'gags gsung ste gaslong gi
114a3(rnying rgyud): dpal// de ni bden pa'i thugs mchog ste// lce nas mtshan ma yang dag zlal// gnyis me thugs la rdol ba med// phyi me thugs te thugs kyi dpal// nga ni yo tan tshogs rten te// spyan gyis bu brjing bsam me khab// skyon med dgos pa
114a4(rnying rgyud): mu lus 'byung // dngos grub chen po bskyed pa'i gzhi// nga ni zin lasna mdzad pa ste// yongs rdzogs brtson pa'i bdag nyid can// ni rgyas dbang dang mngon tu spyod// hUM tshogs gzhan don sbyin gyis rdzogs// 'jig rten sngags bdag rdzogs pa can//
114a5(rnying rgyud): ku che na dbang brgyar byed rnam kyang // da dang ngas gsum sangs rgyas kyi// thugs dang ya nas gnyis su med// gzung da nga byab maud ma yin// sbrul sa mi sor mi lta ste// yon ten mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs// phrin las gcig gi thun mong bsgrug//
114a6(rnying rgyud): thog ma med nas da lta'i bar// nyon mongs las kyi rgyu 'bras kyis// gnas ngan len gyi phung por sbyin// nga rgyal dregs pa'i lus ngag sems// stobs dang nus pa dpag med rdzogs// che btson dbang phyug ldan gyur kyang // yang dgra nges mdzodon ma
114a7(rnying rgyud): rtogs/ don dam bden 'a khong ma chud// spos bral dge la blo ma phyogs// rang rig rgyal po'i stobs marnyed// skye ma dbyings kyi rgyal ma shar// ba che na gnas kyi gdang mthob// mtshan med brgyad kyir ma myong // chos nyid sku yi gzugs
114b1(rnying rgyud): mthong // ye shes klong gi sgom phyed// de bas rigs kyi bu rnams kyis// rang gi gnas la rab tu rtogs// lus la bdag tu yongs ma bzung // ngag la brjod par ma smra zhig/ sems la dngos por gal rtog/ gnas yul rigs
114b2(rnying rgyud): khams sde dang dpung // rten rdzas longs spyod dbang skal rnams// nga dang nga yir gzung bya min// thun mong dang ni tha dad gcig/ de dag ma lus stong pa ste// stong pa nyid kyang de dag go// de las gud na gzhan med de// gzhan las gud na'ang de me
114b3(rnying rgyud): cing // ma skyes ma 'gags mtshan nyid med// ma brim bstan ma bskyed cing // ma bcos ma bgyur ma byung la// ma skyes ma bsgrubs ma bshad pa'i// don chen de ni rang nyid las// phyi nang snga phyi steng dang 'og/ phyogs mtshams 'khor 'das lus dang
114b4(rnying rgyud): sems// kun nas rnyed pa ma yin te// 'di na'ang yod pa ma yin no// sha khrag pags pa rus pa dang // snying dang glo bstod rnams dang // dbang po yan lag bcas pa la// bde chen dam pa de mi gnas// de las gzhan na'ang gnas med de/
114b5(rnying rgyud): gnas mgrub la gnas shes brjod// gnas yod snyam na der rtogs shig/ ci 'dra ci zhig ji lta bu// gang nas 'ongs shing gang du song // gang na 'dug cing ji zhig byed// dbyibs dang kha dog ming dang mtshan// rigs dang khams la rab
114b6(rnying rgyud): tu rtogs// de la de yis der bltas pas// mthong ba med pa blta ba'o// gang la gang gis gang bsgoms pas// bsgom dang bral bar bsgom zhes bya// ci la sra zhig cir spyod pas// spyod rgyu mi gnas spyod pa che// sul skyes thob ci bsgrubs
114b7(rnying rgyud): pas// mgra ba rang gnas 'bras bu ste// ma lus med cing rnam pa yi// yon tan yongs rdzogs dbang phyug go// zhi dang rgyas dang mngon du spyod// dbang du bsru ba phrin las yin// rang la rdzogs shing rang gis grub// thag chod pa dang bstan pa
115a1(rnying rgyud): dang // tshad ldan mthar phyin la bzla dang // 'das dang ma 'das ston pa dang // bshad dang tan dang snad pa dang // gnas dus yon tan skyon rnams ni// rang ga nyid rtogs pas 'grub// rjes bka' stsal to// drug
115a2(rnying rgyud): ljasngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ don dam pa'i gnas nye bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// dgongs pa chen po 'di gsungs te// ye nas ma byung ma skyes pa'i// chos nyid don gyi snying po ni// gzung 'dzin
115a3(rnying rgyud): mtha' bral ma rtogs te// nga bdag 'dzin pa'i nam rtog gis// dregs shing gzir ba'i rA trad// ma bskal ba ni nye la ba ni// thabs dang shes rab snying rjegs ma// mthun zhing mtshungs ldan sras kyis bskal/ dam pa'i don de martogs par// dngos po
115a4(rnying rgyud): bshad pas 'khor bar sring // mkhas rtogs ldan pas bshad pa yis// 'phags pa mnyes shing sems can sgrol// tshogs gnyis rdzogs te skrag sum thob// nam rig mthong bas don thag gcad// brtul zhugs drag pos bsgrub pa brtsam// dbang du
115a5(rnying rgyud): bsdu dang 'dul ba'i phyir// 'jig rten las kyis bsdus pa'i rgyud// nga dang ston pa rnams kyis bshad// chos dbyings dur khrod rang gnas su// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don du bsdus// stegs pa rab tu 'ad ba'i dus
115a6(rnying rgyud): bstod cing gtsug lag ltos pa'i chos// skyon dang yon tan tshul du 'byung // bstan pa 'jig byed las ngan can// drag sngags stobs kyis bskul byas na// rdzogs dang spangs pa thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i rten yin te// lha dang sngags dang
115a7(rnying rgyud): dzin// rdzas rnams rgyu dang can du 'gyur// me d+ha pa dmigs pa rten// ming dus byang bra rnam shes dang // blo tshe kho ba tsun yinan// 'grags 'dren gyis ni de dag dgug/ po nyas las kun sgrub par byed// sngags kyi rjes kyis dpas/
115b1(rnying rgyud): la na ma
115b2(rnying rgyud): bskyed cing // thun rdzas rnams kyis myos pa dang // rangs lkugs mtshon 'debs rdul du rlog/ gnad du 'bebs shing steng nas 'dren// lha dang 'byed cing rtsa ba gcod// byang chub sems kyi dngos po ni// don po khrag gi li ne bu'i 'og/
115b3(rnying rgyud): kunA gzhi til 'bru ma zhig gnas// \u0f7fba klang gnas dra ba ste// phur ba med pa la lta bu yis// bsdus shing bsregs te gtsad pa yis// dmigs brtan dang bral bar byas// bkrag dang gzi mdangs dang la bzlas// phrin las rnam bzhis
115b4(rnying rgyud): gzong ba lus// dag sdig pa pa nyid duman+tam// blta srid ldan pas nang brgyan// ma bla med gnas su bsgral// bar ma y-i rnam gas ni// thaM san gyi 'phro du yis// rgyang dang sbar pa'i las rnams kyi// thugs pacwa rnam
115b5(rnying rgyud): sras su bskyed// phung po lhag ma tsam nyid ni// rten gsum gyis ni rab tu spyad// chos sgra'i gzugs brnyan bstan par bya// 'di ni pha rol bla na med// bskal ba dus gsum sangs rgyas dang // rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' yi// spyod
115b6(rnying rgyud): parlabs tshon bshad pa'o// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ grol po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dmig pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// las kyi bye brag 'di gsungs te// thog mar 'di la shis pa'i gnas// rdo
115b7(rnying rgyud): khrod chu gling ri yi sul// khros shing gdug pa'i gnas de ru// rab tu gnas shing gdeng ldan pa'i// dam tshig gnas pa'i bsgrub pa ste// yongs su rdzogs pa'i slob ma yis// sngon du bla ma mnyes byas nas// lhag pa'i lha nyid stobs dang ldan
115b8(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa he ru ka/ nye bar bsten dang gnyis su med// tshad dang ldan par gyur pa des// yang dag nges pa'i rtags mthong nas// rab tu 'bad par bya ba ni// sprin 'byor gdug cing shes pa'i sa// las la bsngag pa de dag la// dregs pa'i
116a1(rnying rgyud): gtso'akhor dmigs pa'i rten// 'dom gang la sogs tshad dang ldan// lte ba la na 'khor la' rlabs// bzhi'am drug gam brgyad du dgod// bar khyams phyogs bcu sgo bzhir bcas// rim pa gsum gyi thod phreng rdzun/
116a2(rnying rgyud): rang gi rigs la bsngags pa yi// dbyibs dang kha dog rgyan dang rtags// thams cad ldan pa nyid du bya// dregs pa can rnams sgra yi rten// bris sam brkos sam brtsigs pa dag/ rang gi gnas su mdzes par dgod// gsung gi snying po'ang de bzhin no//
116a3(rnying rgyud): thugs rten rang gi phyag cha'am// sngon nas bsngags pa'i rdzas yin no// rang sngags gsang ba'i 'khor lo dang // mthun gzugs srog gi rgyal mtshan rnams// nang du mtshon pa'i rten du gzug/ de dag tsit+ta so so ru// dmigs pa'i snying po dril to
116a4(rnying rgyud): gzhug/ gsang ba zlas pa'i rten du 'gyur// de yi byang shar phyogs mtshams su// nga yis sngar bshad nu nyid las// oM dbyibs bzhi dang brgyad bcu gnyis// khru gang mdzub gang thur du brko// bajug cing rdegs pa'i rdzas kyis byugs// bdug
116a5(rnying rgyud): cing bsreg pa'ang de yis so// de nyid dgod pa'i rdzas rnams ni// rgyud med gzugs ngan kA pa la// seng ldeng gser shing yan lag skyes// dpal ldan drag po'i phur pa dang // shel nag gnam ru nag po dang // gyi ling dkar dang gdong dmar dang // brda
116a6(rnying rgyud): migacig dang skyid shing dang // dkar dang mashrI na spyan dang // sa stong kyi snod rnams kyis lus// gyi nang par dring gsang bas brgyan// drag can g+hi yi mnyes pa'i rdzas// can ldan gzugs dang rta spring ste// gsur chen dri dang shA khrag ro// tshe rtsub re gdang
116a7(rnying rgyud): 'bru badrud bshos// sha chen mchog bdud rtsi'i tshogs// rab tu bskor zhing 'bad pas sbyar// dpa' zhing brtul pod skyes bu yis// nga mi tron gyi phrin las bzhin// khro la khros pas ni mdzad de// tha ma la gnas pa'i 'byung chen wa// jug
116b1(rnying rgyud): po sngags kyi 'byung bar bsgom// keng rus 'bar ba'i ri rab bam// ngur khrod 'jigs pa'i gzhal med khang // b+hAn+d+ha gnas rig su gsum gyis brtseg/ ti gsar rnyeng tshigs kyis gtams// rak+ta dmar pa grub cing dbab// tshal chan bud pa 'khyil
116b2(rnying rgyud): zhing 'phyar// dbang po don spyir 'phyangs shing 'phrul// bdud rtsi bshang gci dri bsung ldan// yan laganyid lag skems shing sti la// sha dang pa gus pa brkyang zhing 'phyar// phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng dang 'og/ gdus dang 'thung dang bskums dang
116b3(rnying rgyud): brgyangs// rgyal mtshon dang ni zar tshags// ba dan b+hu bre ltab lbub dang // 'phur ma dang ni ltab ma dang // mi mgo ka pA la rnams dang // rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// gzhal yas khang pa de 'dra ba// rab tu bsngags pa 'di la bshad// dregs
116b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag po yum dang bcas// sbyor zhing bsnol ba de nyid kyis// bdag gi rang bzhin yongs su bskyed// 'phro dang las kyi khyad par dang // bsdu dang rang gi gnas su brten// skur gyur mtshan nyid ngo bo dang // byang chub sems kyi bya ba yis// yum
116b5(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogs// de yi las kyang sngar bzhin du// rgyas mdzad rung gi spyan snga na// dmigs pa myur lhag de yi 'khor// bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang // gnod sbyin drag po sde dang klu// rang gi chung mar bcas pa dag/
116b6(rnying rgyud): bshad bzhin du rigs par bsam// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag ste// lha dang ma mo rgyal po ging // brtson 'gong nga mu dang mu stegs dang // rang gi sde dang dpung du bcas// ma lus dregs pa can gyi tshogs// 'di la rab brjod gang yin pa// de nyid
116b7(rnying rgyud): gsal bar bya// nga yi su dang gsung dang thugs// ye zhes rigs kyi dbang bskur phreng // byin gyis brlabs la rgyas btub ste// de la rang bzhin gnas pa bstis// yongs rdzogs sku yi brtan par bsgrub// phrag btsal mchod pa 'phrul
117a1(rnying rgyud): zhing bstod// rab tu mnyes pa rgya cher bya// phyi bshad nang dang gsang ba yis// bsgra dang sbyor dang sgrol ba dang // gnas dang rigs dang rol pa dang // bskyod dang dbab pa mnyes pa yi// gnas lugs lhun grub ma bcos pas//
117a2(rnying rgyud): ga sngags rol pa ma 'gags spyod// rang gi las la sbyar ba ni// bdud kyi khram dang gshin rje rdo// srin po'i dmar dang gnod sbyin byed// lha yi chad dang ma mo'i dal// gza' yi ki kang klu yi dug/ tshe zad pa dang khri mon bcug/ gcan gzan 'dzum dang lcags
117a3(rnying rgyud): sgrog tshud// nad dang mtshon ni khong zhugs dang // dug 'thung thog pabs bzhan du drag/ thar zhes bya ba gdags su med// bdud ni ma brtags srog la rgol// gshin rje 'khor ba'i 'khor los gcod// srin po ral gri'i so yi 'gems// gnod sbyin
117a4(rnying rgyud): gnam lcags thog gis 'joms// lha ni 'dod pa'i mdung gis gsor// ma mo dpag chen mda' 'phen 'bigs// gza' bdud stobs chen sgyogs kyis brdeg/ klu ni sa 'og ral gri'i spos// thams cad 'dul zhing gcod pa'i sngags// mun pa gling //
117a5(rnying rgyud): 'khrugs bdud kyi skad// ngu 'bod lta bu'i gshin rje ste// ro len dur ba srin pos khrid// lce mdung drag po gnod sbyin no// bka' chang drag rtsal lha yi dmod// dra 'bod gdung ba ma mo ste// 'brug sgra glog 'byin gza' bdud do// klu yi sbrul nag dug
117a6(rnying rgyud): lces so// 'jig rten lha sbyin rang sgra yis// phal pa rnams la dmod par byed// de ni drag sngags dmod pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to// dreg sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ drag sngags dmod pa nye bar bsrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de
117a7(rnying rgyud): nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// me sa'i drag sngags dmod pa bstan// phreng shigs bdud kyi drag sngags ni// rabs chad nag po'i thod padra// shel nag snying du bo stsal// dur khrod ras nag rgya yis gdab// tshon snga lnga'am nag pos bcing // gri lcags
117b1(rnying rgyud): skrag ma srog rdzar gzhug/ nyung dkar nyung nag til nag dang // sgra cho shang tsha zlar dang // zangs lpags rdo yi phye ma dang // drug khrag ngar dang bcas pa rnams// mya sur yi thod par byasmra// bdud kyi srog tig sngags kyis bsngags// bdad /
117b2(rnying rgyud): nag po kha man de bamil tsho// kA la mu tri mA ra ya dgra bo nying lid tsit+ta rbud/ dr-i zlu ma khyigs/ dr-i zlu ma khyigs/ pra ma pra ma rol 'dus/ zed spug/ dro spug/ bdud rjes chod/ bdud mos rol/ bdud brus gtor/ baM khyigs/ pra ma tri shad+d+ha rAng
117b3(rnying rgyud): ya rbad// mun pa gling 'khrugs zhes bya ba// ma 'ongs bdud kyi rang skad de// drag tu brjod cing skrag mar zab// gang la dmigs pa de myur du// snang srid bdud kyis srog nas 'dren// mi nag go mtshon bcas pa dang // sngags nag bud med
117b4(rnying rgyud): mon dang no// khyi nag rta nag b+ha nag dang // rgod nag dre'u nagashel nag dang // ri nag mtshonag shing nag tshogs// dmag dang 'khrug pa'i thab pa dang // 'khrid dang gsod dang bsha' ba dag/ las byed grub pa'i rtags su 'gyur// de nas nya
117b5(rnying rgyud): bo bstab cing bsgral// gri mtshon phudra pa rnams kyis gtub// lhag ma bdud rtsi sha khrag sbyar// ku ku nug po'i zas su sbyin// rol bar mi byed bskyar te bsgrub// chu tra myos shing 'thib nas 'chi// 'chi bdag gshin rje'i drag sngags
117b6(rnying rgyud): hUM// rgyud med pa ma kA pA la// thim tog d+ha bstar te// nang du nyid ma gtsug/ pang nis sde bar zug/ bcings dang dag pa pardzangs padag/ rab shid rjes kyis thabacing brdeg/ lam myed te/ sa dpe/ ma ma
117b7(rnying rgyud): ro ma tson/ ya mar tsa mu ka snying khrag rtsal zad/ ya ma dbusbal rngubs/ ro tsa la mar tsa ra tsa ba ril rbad/ ya mar ts+ya hr-i sti snying ling chod/ ya ma s+thing / ya ma khrag/ ya ma du bai ril rbad/ gshin rje bsdus shing dril ba'i sngags// rab tu
118a1(rnying rgyud): brdzun ga/ sa \u0f7f// nga nan rdzogs sadun sa du da ba rgya// dmams pa sa/
118a2(rnying rgyud): la dmigs pa myur du grol// gtum khros srin pa'i dmod pa ni// myur shrI 'thod par de snyid nang // dmigs pa rnams kyi gzugs brtan de// ming sngags ldan pa bral ba ste// le ba rgan kha dog dar gyis dkris// sgron dumar smad pa'i dra bar gzhug
118a3(rnying rgyud): ti ragasar ba kha phyil// dbang po don snying nang rol gyis// srin po bskang zhing dmod pa bzla// rag sha srin pos mAn+ta / dag shA n+ya tra hur nur to// d+hAta gnyen po dgral s+ho// dgra bo mu laM shi ga sod gtor// ha pra mo ts+tsha ba le la thun b+h+yo// dag
118a4(rnying rgyud): rdo tri ta dza/ du ra dur shan dza/ ragA sha rbad/ nr-i mA ra ya sod/ dmod pa rdzas la bzlas shing brdeg/ mi nag shan pa'i tshogs rnams kyi so// khrid dang gsod dang don snying ster// las la sbyar ba tshul bzhin gyis// dag po'i dngos po myur du grol/
118a5(rnying rgyud): brag rtsal gnod sbyin drag sngags ni// rta dkar steng dang thod pa ni// nya bo gzhug pa'i snod du bsngags// rin chen la phrag mu ba la// snying sna khrag sna sbar bas mchod// gnod sbyin srog ti gad mod pa brjod// yak+Sha/ baM hud ri ngo/ mag ma 'ag sha //
118a6(rnying rgyud): rba nu ma na d+ha ma ti / yan snying la shud shang du / yan srog pa zeng thun du// nyi shar tshogs dang 'od drung sgra// rlung dmar drug dang bu khrag 'ong // bas pa'i rdzas kyis drag tu ba rdog/ lhag ma bsreg cing rlung gis gtor// de nyid khrag gis
118a7(rnying rgyud): rmugs te sgrol// drag rgyal lha/ yi drag sngags ni// lhag yag dkar po'i steng nang du// brnags pa'i gzugs dang ming dus bri// rngon dmar skud pas ske nas gdags// rje rigs thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ dar dkar gyis ni kha bcad la// tshon
118b1(rnying rgyud): skud sna lngas bcing par bya// bya rgod dar ma'i sgo rtsa ni// srog rtsar bcug la dkyil du brtol// dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi la// dbus skra gru gsum thur du bru// lha rdo gsum gyi skyed phul// gang gi thod pa gzhag par bya// blan
118b2(rnying rgyud): bshos gtsang rngon cha dang // ru dkar snying dang shel dkar snying // bya dkar snying dang ru mtshon dang // ba dAn dkar po rten du gzug/ nyung dkar sngags kyi mda' mchog ni// thun gyi rdzas su gzhag par bya// drag sngags snying gi nang du brab// stobs ldan
118b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin gsal bas// lha rnams 'dus pa'i drag sngags sbreng // ma hA de ba te dze hi dza/ saM pra ma na rak+Sha kaM ka sa ma ya hU~M/ de ba rA dza ma hA ni dzA// dgra bo mA ra ya thun rbadadA/ thun rbad/ shag len dza dza/ shag len dze dza hUM hU tsa tur mu kha rag sha man/ kaM ka
118b4(rnying rgyud): ya ma hUM/ ma hA de ba a mu ka mA ra ya sod// 'jig rten dregs pa mthu rtsal can// lha yi bod rbad bas da gsum dril// drag tu bzla zhing snying la brab// rtags ni rgyal po rje dpon dang // skyes pa stag chas dar thogs dang // zhu ba can po tshogs
118b5(rnying rgyud): 'ong ba ni// gsod gcod byed dang snying 'byin dang // dngos su snying phyung 'phar ba 'ong // rtags byung snying nas ling+ga dbyung // mtshon gyis gtubs la me la bsreg/ thal bar nya bo byas nas ni// thod par bcug la lha rten nam// 'jig rten lha
118b6(rnying rgyud): chen gnas sar mnan// g+ha yi dAl yams dgra la 'bebs// nad bdag ma mo'i drag sngags ni// snrel gri mo yi thod pa ru// de yi snying ning ling+ga gzhug/ mthing nug dar gyis kha bcad la// thod pa tshon skad la yis bcing // dkyil 'khor
118b7(rnying rgyud): mthing nag gru gsum dbus// thod par bcug la bsgrub par bya// nag spug gsum gyi snying khrag gis// ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa mchod// nyung dkar nyung nag skye tshe sogs// drag po'i thun rdzas tshogs tshang la// ma mo rnams kyi dmod
119a1(rnying rgyud): pas bsngags// mam stong kha rag ma ma rag sham ma rag sha/ thag drug sha sted khrug la thu bAd+ha/ s+yAng rtsal dun dun/ drag ra ka sha ma mdza / dam dum dgra sbyang rbad branan/ mam sbyang rta lakhyA b+h+ya/
119a2(rnying rgyud): raka sha ra ka sha rag mo thun D+yan/ mug rgyag cos myos chud zad dzang / ma mthun snyed khrag thun/ shAsti snyam ma dag mos ma ya dz+ha b+h+yo/ mamo'i srogatig bsdus pa'o// bas pa las kyi ngan sag 'di// me lcags las kyis d+ha gra'am// bya rgod \u0f7f
119a3(rnying rgyud): nas bsngags// ma sring mon mo bral mo dang // byi mo la sogs bud med tshigs// bya nag rgod nag tshogs chen lhags// dngos su sha dang mgo sreg ster// tsita dngos su 'phar ba dang // bsad rtags yongs su rdzogs pa dang // snying la phur
119a4(rnying rgyud): pas gdab cing gsud// dug shing me la sbyin bsreg bya// thun khrag dmigs pa'i dgral 'phang // thal ba blangs la nya bo bya// dur khrod dbus su gnan par bya// rims nad rnams kyis dmigs pa sgrol// drag po gza' yi drag sngags ni// mon
119a5(rnying rgyud): pa nag po'amar rog po'i// thod par snying nag ling+ga gzhug/ srog myur gri lcags sbu gu gzhug/ nyung dkar nyung nag zangs lcags phye// thun du bsngags te thod par brab// ma ra ya pa shaM mi ki du ru du ru/ ma tI dz+wa la ti dza/ tsa pa ma ni ru ru rA hu la/ a
119a6(rnying rgyud): tratatra pad+ma shar shar stA a mu kA mA ra ya hUM phaT/ trai laM ka shaM ka dra hrIH/ dza dza yak+ka b+hin/ bi dI la shi ni bai b+ha ba ti/ kha yag kha d+ha na tri/ rba ti sh+tsa ta trig/ shra la pra ti mA ra ya dzA/ dbang chen gza' yi drag sngags 'dri// drag po'i rdzas la bsngags te brdeg/
119a7(rnying rgyud): sha rul khrag rul btsos dang rjen// dkar gsum mngar gsum rdzas kyis mchod// nyi zla klang la 'khor ba dang // mon pa nag po 'ong ba dang // sbrul chen gshog can 'khrug pa dang // bar snang 'ja' yis khengs pa dang // dgra bo dngos su
119b1(rnying rgyud): khrid nas 'ang // rgod dang ra dwags gsod pa dang // don snyeng nang ram thar nang ral// da 'anga'i bsad cugs rdzogs pa dang // ting dang yin tom med bsreg/ gnod rdzas dgra yi thal dugator// thong pa zla brtan sa thA// chu ga lags ser ba khrug tu nga
119b2(rnying rgyud): hur thum nad kyis glo bur 'chi// kha lugs rkang lag rengs par 'gyur// gdug pa klu yi drag sngags ni// lung gsum 'dus pa'i dben gnas su// stegs bu mthing nag gru gsum brus// dgra yi pha mes mgo bo'am// yang na mdze can thod pa ru//
119b3(rnying rgyud): drus sa ming drus bris te gzhug/ gtsang ma rjod du dkar gsum dang // mang gsum gu ldan de tshogs zlum// tig tu mdzod cing bsngags par \u0f7f// smi nag pa ti bya ma/ nAgar rtse/ dgra pa ste lngal be shan/ nAg mas thos shig shig/ tra
119b4(rnying rgyud): ti ya ti ya/ ti pa tsa ta pa tsaM/ a sha nag po ti pi tsa ya/ nA gar tsa dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/ shag ti rbad/ srog ti rbad/ s+phar ti rbad/ snying la ril shaM shaM rbad/ i nan nag po pher na sha u ta nan ra tsanan/ thi li nan/ phi lin ni// dragra tA brjod cing ba slab pa yis/
119b5(rnying rgyud): me chen 'bar dang chu chen 'brub// ba glang sbal sbrul sdom sdig tshogs// shing gcod ri bsnying brag ra la sogs// lus la shub slang lo 'byung // stobs ldan gnyen pos rab tu gtsun// de nas byang bltas chu mig tu// ba li kau ta' zhing bden pa bdang /
119b6(rnying rgyud): thod pa ling+gar bcas pa gnan// klu rgyal 'khor dang bcas la gtad// phung po lhag med pazhes par bsam// gnas su phyin la bsrung ba bya// dgra ni mdze dang rmugs pas 'chi// sde brgyad so so'i drag sngags kyi// 'jig rten las kyis mnar pa yi//
119b7(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i ru tra gdug pa can// ma lus rnams kyi gshed du 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dregs pa'i sngoso so'i phas la sbyar ba drag sngags kyi le'u ste bdun po'o// / de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/
120a1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten dregs pa can rnams kyi// so so'i rigs dang gtan tshigs dang // rje dang las kyi byed pa bstan// sngon gyi 'jig rten khams 'di nyid// phung po nyon mongs la brten nas// bdu 'dregs
120a2(rnying rgyud): gis myos// rang gzhan kun la 'tshe zhing gcor// gnas ngan len gyis kha 'a khrid byas// legs pa'i lan du nyes par spyod// ma rig rtsa ba yan pag gis// gti chub mun 'thabs bdud dang // / babul stobs kyis dregs pa dag /
120a3(rnying rgyud): po zhes par gyur// thag dog gza' dang gshin ze'i rigs// 'dod chags ma mo gnod sbyin rigs// zhe sdang btsun dang srin por gol// srog la 'bebs pas 'badud ces bya// yi dwags gshin chog rnams kyi rje// rnga mor chung sngang
120a4(rnying rgyud): don gyis srin por byung // gang gis gnod pa sbyin byed pa'i// de yi rigs dang mtshan nyid do// gang las bskyed pa ma mo ste// skyob byed nus pa lha yin no// gdug cing gtum pas mi 'tshir bas// gza' zhes bya bar brjod pa yin// bla na zhing gyos
120a5(rnying rgyud): klu zhes bya// 'gro ba rigs drug so so las// bdud dang lha ni lha min sde// gnod sbyin gza' dang rgyu skar bcas// rgyal chen rigs bzhi lha yi sde// ma mo srin po mi yi rje// gshin rje yi dwags sde yin te// klu ni byol song sde yin no// bdung rigs po dngo
120a6(rnying rgyud): yi rigs// ye nas gnas dang glo bur byung // 'thab dang myos dang dregs par byed// sred dang chags par byed pa ste// gshin rje las dang zhing ste// gzugs can gzugs med dbang chen dang // dbang med phye dang nang khyad par// las kyis rab tu
120a7(rnying rgyud): bsgribs pa'o// srin po sha zag dmo can// sprul pa dang ni gzu lums can// rab chung gcig tu gnas// gnod sbyin gcod nga 'khor gyi rtogs// gro ba dang ni rang rgyud de// thadang rigs ni bco brgyad de// gnon byeng 'tsho ba'i bdag nyid cam
120b1(rnying rgyud): stan 'ad pa'i gnags ca dang // gzugs med nam lon tu gtogs// rangab tu gzug zubacha bas na// nyam na ma ma na du grags// gang las byang dang gangad las srid// gang gis brgyad pa zhing kya nga // 'am 'as kya gragasang dang // rang
120b2(rnying rgyud): rjes shes su shi // dang dag byud ba kyis/ r+g+hang ni cong nga rnye // ma 'a 'adz+ra ba'i drag tshul // las kyi zu dag 'di // la po yang zam pa dang / ngas nga gdom pa ni rnams dang // ti shuN+Da la ya
120b3(rnying rgyud): rigs rje // 'di dgamigs sa// da sa dang rang ma ts+tshi // midag 'phral pa'i gzung 'dzin byung // 'dag ga d+hA'i gaganas// gsu'agyu slong nas 'ang // 'jug
120b4(rnying rgyud): tho de mam ldas de nayi kyi na gnyis gi yang snar chug// bdas ci mi dag zig par babyis// brgyam tho zang ma pa / 'gri bcas ngag snying gi ma gyis// gnas ngan di 'i tsun cig mdzun// dus gsu ma chogs
120b5(rnying rgyud): dang bci pa // rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa yis// 'angang 'i rten gasnying ma por btsugs/ so sto ro'i sgrog lnga gcod// mangs spyon 'phrog cing rnam par gro// gzi mdangs 'byung ba'id dang byas// gang yi 'joms shing badrag rgyang nga/
120b6(rnying rgyud): da dang skrag bsngal byed bying // madri nyes pa byin byed las/ srog len mo 'jog gcing dang ni// myos 'thibs kyang na du rims dang blams// rtog 'am lha gadrug du na du thobs shing // dme nga 'jug brjod pa dang / shod
120b7(rnying rgyud): ni pas// rang rnams // kun ma thab pa bca bachud do// drug rgya drug lan lag 'jus// sa kyi kyil bsam mi thub// rdzogs pa'i das pa sa so mas// rang ban gas pa dru // dus gdum
121a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas bstan pa dag/ tshul ldan bsrung ba'i dbang phyug can// drag sngags las kyid dmod pal// brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug gi// nus pa rdzu 'phrul mthul sogs// rang gi rigs la gang bsngags pa// de dang
121a2(rnying rgyud): de la rab sbyar bas// las kyi mtha' la gang dmigs pa// rdo rje can gyi yongs 'grub ste// nga yi stobs dang nus pa dang // mthu dang rdzu 'phrul yon tan tshogs// lus ngag yid kyis rab 'bad pa// gang yin de la mngon par 'byung // de yis thun mong/
121a3(rnying rgyud): yongs grub cing // mthar nges pa yang son par byed// 'di la ma 'ongs rtogs pa can// the tshom skyed par ma byed cig/ nga dang rgyal ba thams cad kyis// 'di ni rab tu bsngags pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las//
121a4(rnying rgyud): dregs pa can gyi sde rigs dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// las la sbyar ba'i rim pa gsungs// dur khrod chu gling ri rtse dang // chu 'dus ngam grog 'jigs su rung // phung shul nags khrod ma rungs
121a5(rnying rgyud): pa// dregs pa las kyi gnas yin no// mi rus me bsad zung shulas// dur zad po dang rul tshangs// bskyon pa'i dri chen ma rungs khrag/ las kyi rten 'brel dmigs pa'i rdzas// rta nag dre'u nag ma he dang // d+ha glang dang ni stag seng dang // rta dkar
121a6(rnying rgyud): lo rgod dkar dang // dom nag dmu rta ban glang dang // 'brug chen mgya rus sprul dang // b+ha khyi ku ku shel dang mi// rgyal mtshan thod pa snying dang khrag/ bdud rtsi 'bru bcud byang chub sems// rang gzugs snying po 'khor lor bcas// rgyan ldan bshas
121a7(rnying rgyud): chamathun pa'i rdzas// dmatshig mthod cing bsten pa'o// sa sor bsngags pa'i las khung du// thod pa 'bru nag dug khrag g.yos// rgyu gsum phur pa mtshon cha rnams// bsad pa thun gyi rdzas yin no// dam khrag gsum dang dri ngan gsum// srog chag
121b1(rnying rgyud): gsum dang pa sa gsas// thab sa gas su dang bsreg sa gsum// 'a nas gsus dang drags gsum// gzugs gas pa dang dbab sa gsus// kun lal bar snang ba zang // rba drag dbab pangs jug/ rags kya dang /
121b2(rnying rgyud): dang // gnas sbyor byang chub srid 'ad+mor zlos// legs blangs yid kyis mthun spyad pa// gang la dmigs pa der gtad pas// chos bu'i gzugs brtan rten khang la// ster tog gnas gsum bdag po ga // rgya mcho gnyi
121b3(rnying rgyud): ring bzung // bar snang khams dang nam mkha'i dkyil// bsrung dang bzlog dang bsad pa'i las// dmag dpung bsdu dang dpal bskyed dang // rab tu khros dang sbyor ba gzhig/ las kyis pha rol dmod pa bzlog/ ngan pa'i thod pa lnga gsum dang // gis
121b4(rnying rgyud): pa ma yinas brgyad du// rten cing 'brel pa 'byung sbyor bas// dmigs pa'i mthu stobs gnon par byed// khyad par las kyi bye brag gis// rgyal po la rabs rje dpon dang // chung ba sgrib dpon mkhan po dang // rab byung khyim pa sngags spyod dang /
121b5(rnying rgyud): phyi ro phyogs dang zos kyi grogs// che brtson dregs pas bsnyems pa dang // de rgyal ldan zheng skal ba bzang // kun gyis bkur zhing rjed pa dang // sems rgyud bsros dang yul gyi don// nye bar bstan cing blo spyod gnas// lhag por lha yi
121b6(rnying rgyud): rab bsrungs te// thun mong nus pa'i stobs rnyed cing // yon tan gcig gis rab bsdus pas// tshar gcad dka' ba'i yul yin te// ma lus gang la bsngags pa yi// ting nge 'dzin dang dmigs par grogs// rab sngags brtson 'grus can
121b7(rnying rgyud): gyis bsgral// gzhan yang ni dang rgyas pa dang // dbang dang mngon par spyod rnams dang // rdo rje 'dzin pang dang gzhan// mtshungs ldan rnams kyis bshad pa bzhin// thogs med nas pa'i stobs kyis spang // de dag gsang ba'i dmod pa yang // rdeg+sas
122a1(rnying rgyud): gong 'og sngags 'di rigs ma phyi sor bzhag byas//
122a2(rnying rgyud): pa sde brgya ma sa yi// gsang gnad snying po 'di dag go// yi ma bre do ni ti ta tau g+hadu kra ma~M ming sod/ khwa dri ma mdzod dan/ shon dri dza na/ yag sha da rje dag N+Did ti/ t+ta pra ma ya a mra ka srog la nga bya// b+hi tsa pa la a shug mAM/ a ti sh+tsa
122a3(rnying rgyud): shu tsakra ga sha sa ma ya/ dun tha ma ri li le/ phyag rgyag phyog phyag srag la thun tshad/ rag sha srog la thig phrig/ a pa ta lo ka ni ya ma thi thi bi tri s+thA na/ bo ma ri pa tra srog la thun b+h+yo// mahA ya ga sha thu ma ril rbad/ ma ru tse ta sha s+t+rI ba tha ma ling // 'di dag gtsong
122a4(rnying rgyud): da'aphrog byed kyi// ma lus las la bsngags par 'gyur/ rnaM bur tha mdza/ shad+d+hi mA ra ya rbang / a mra ka ma ra d+de ya ka ma ru srang sod/ gsang ba thun gyi dmod pa'o// byi sha mo ki ru ru ma tri kAta dz+wa la a ta dzA swA hA/ tsa pa ti nA tra la ma hA kr-i ta ka pa shar shang sta shar b+hi hU~M
122a5(rnying rgyud): tsa shu la ru ma ki sha dz+wa la a ta/ ma hA tsan d+ha rag shwa rbi ta bri ma ya ru tA ma sa ra tra byi na gaur tsa be ga a nan tA rag shi ti san d+ha rag k+Shi na tsit+tab+ha si ku ru mun tre tsanad+ha dum bu dum bu kha la rag shwa phu ma ri la li li/ ma ma sa ma ya tra ga rag sha ma tri ga na/ ma sA kha ya ku ru ta tso b+ha li
122a6(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ rjeka ma dul dul/ sgeg khrag la sa des/ rgyal blan b+h+yaH/ rdzag rag mdzal dril/ shag shag shar shar rdu / ma ma rtag gajug tu ba~M/ pa p+ta mA sa sa sa nu la/ ma mthag sha rdu la dz+wa la gyur \u0f7f/ mar yang zil grang dzul/ 5/
122a7(rnying rgyud): trahU~M/ trug t+ti tsi re shri ti pro ma kar grom/ re ma ti pa shang mi ki rA dra la shag shag trail gyi/ khrag la tsA rI mA shwaH/ trag thun shag ril raM shar b+ha/ dud zom kar brom shu ti prom/ nA ga zi las na shags du ma ya thil gyo/ pra ta pa sha ya/ ya ma s+t+raing yi mkhrag
122a8(rnying rgyud): la dril dz+wal shag shag ser sar dug drug/ ya ya phob ma pa/ swa ka la~M/ paka ye a pa me/ skr-i t+t+ra ma kr-in te/ ngo ba ti hu la ma hAkra ta ka ba ba ta shar sha la na ste hUM phaT/ theg nig shu ti gro mdud brom/ mthongs kyi/ lcags sgrog wal/ me reng sa /
122b1(rnying rgyud): rje dang mo tsu ru tsu ru/ ho ha mo ma grom/ mur mu ra sha du ngu zom/ thig hU~M hU~M sod song/ rlung dang sprin dang rab d+ha dang // zlog dang rtag kyi tshad ldan pas// dbab pa'i sbyor ba shes par bya// steng 'og bar gsum drag po'i las// gzhug dang gtor dang bsag pa dang // bkol dang spab dang
122b2(rnying rgyud): sbeng ba dang // bod dang sme dang gdung ba dang // gzir dang bskor dang gzhig pa dang // bcang dang dril ba'i las rnams kyis// smin pa'i lo thog 'joms par byed// nag po ti pa tsa ye nA ga rA na hi gu la phe shar ga shan na/ phos shig shig/ hu ya tu ya/ ti da ya ti da ya/ ka la nA ba d+han+ta dkra bo ma
122b3(rnying rgyud): ra/ nag po ti pa Na ya phe sha ga sha dzananA ga ka la phe sha dag shwa dzaH/ a shanA ga ti pa tsa ya dgra bo mA ra ya dzaH/ nA ga rA dza shag ti srog la rbad/ snying la ris shaM shaM rbad/ i sha na nan/ phe shwa rag she u nan/ nA ga nan/ thi linan/ phi le na na/ tsa ra nan/ a pa ra song// rma ga dul du la/ ka la rngubs kyo gr-i \u0f89\u0fa4
122b4(rnying rgyud): das du dur/ d+ha ra tar// rA d+hu ru/ ru dr-i dang/ ti te/ tri li ti ti/ ga ru Na ra gtor dza ma ra te gad/ mnad pe sha rag sha uta nan/ b+ha shi ni shar le shu ru mu le/ ta ta me de na hu ya hu la/ ra ti ra ti tsi ri sha ga tsag gi/ tri mad tr-i/ ma ma du ya ma snying ya ma khrag tshal ba bai ril/ nag po ta pa dag sha nan/ khug ril
122b5(rnying rgyud): baM dgra po mA ra ya dza/ nag po ta pi tsa snying langadza/ shag shag nan khrag b+hi ril rbad/ tsit+ta rag sha rol khug thun/ ka la snying la thu ma ril rbad/ ka la sho re nyid la tra ga ga ha ra ka/ mu ka mA ra ya pram ri la rbang // khug dang 'gro dang las byed pa'i// rang gi rtag dang ldan pa na// dmig pa'i las la
122b6(rnying rgyud): tu phyir// rdog dang ma phub 'khyil pa dang // 'byams dang drug dang zad mthar gtug/ gnyen po lngab ma g+ha sel dang / bsdu dang sgo dang mi zad ster// longs spyod thug pa med pa yis/ dbyings kyi ngang du gtad par bya// sde brgyad so so'i ming gi sngag// rang skad dmod pa'i yan lag
122b7(rnying rgyud): la// te paM me rmes rba b+h+yo bzlog/ pra mdun tsa phob/ badz+ra smri ga nas ma ya hrI b+h+yo/ san ti ma du ru/ sa ma ya tri ga ng+gA \u0f7f ki pa le hUM/ bklog bskur gdug pa'i drag sngags kyi// las kyi mtha' ba sbyar ma lus pa// nga'amang dang 'dra ba yi// rdo rje 'dzin pa gzhan rnams kyis/ phyi rang
123a1(rnying rgyud): TaH// gsang ba'i las rnams kyi// gang la bsngag pa de dag sbyar// gzhan gyis tha mams byaste// ngadang dus gsum sangs rgyas sbyis// de la rig par gnang ba yin// zhes bka' sus to// drag g+hag 'dus pa rdon bya ba'i rgyud las/ phrin las dmig pa'i khyad par ma
123a2(rnying rgyud): sbyar ba'i phe'u ste dpur 'o// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// rang gi sku yi khyad par las// dreg pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa yi// yon tan bstod pa 'di gsungs// hUM dur khrod chen po rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// gtum drug me ltar 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na// gdu
123a3(rnying rgyud): tratI ra ri khri steng nas// mdangs ldan nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng na// dreg pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ga go/ bcom ldan dpal chen stobs ldan nag po ni// sgra mdog mthing nag rab tu 'bar// sa dgu rdzog pa'i dbu dgu bstan// stong pa bco brgyad ldan pa'i phyag/ zhabs kyis 'jigs
123a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdud bzhi gnon// dbus mthing g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba// khro zhing bzhad dang gcogs pa'i zhal// ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar// khams gsum ma lus spyan gyis gzigs/ shangs kyis srid gsum ma lus rngubs// stan gyis stong gsum 'brug smras 'gengs/
123a5(rnying rgyud): tshems kyis gnod gdug ma lus sgrol// ljag kyis glog dmar 'jig rten khyab// khro gnyer 'od kyis dbang du sdud// phrin las rigs kyis dbu la brgyan// bco brgyad phyag gi dang po gnyis// dbang sdud rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// g.yas g.yon 'og ma'i phyag brgyad na// dreg pa'i lha brgyad
123a6(rnying rgyud): g.yas// tsit+ta srog rtsa g.yon na bsnams// 'bar ba'i chas kyis sku la brgyan// sprul pa'i lha brgyad sku la rdzog// g.yas g.yon zhabs kyis dregs pa gzir// ma rungs gdul dka' rnams kyi gshed // log lta rA tra 'dul ba'i dpal// 'byung lnga'i bdag mo gnyis med yum// dbu
123a7(rnying rgyud): gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi sbyor// gri grag tri shUl bdud rtsi g.yas// b+han zhing tshon g.yang gzhi g.yon// mthing nag 'od kyis kun tu khyab// ched 'ga' rigs kyi sprul pa ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// sku mdog mthing nag khro zhing rngams// phyag drug g.yas g.yon dang /
123b1(rnying rgyud): ba yis// rdordo drung khrag dkrugs shing gsol// g.yas g.yon 'og ma'i phyag bzhi yi// lnga brgyad klu brgyad tsit+ta rol// yum chen zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// sku mdog mthing nag zhabs gnyis sbyor// g.yas kyis nam mkha' spyod pa 'dekra// g.yon kyis 'jig rten sa gan
123b2(rnying rgyud): gnon// zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ma// dpal chen yum gyi byin rlabs las// sprul pa dreg pa pho mo'i cho ga/ bdud nag me yi kha rlangs can// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgra mdog mthing // khram shing tri shul g.yas na bsnams// g.yon gyis kha T+wA~M zhag pa len// na bzang zhi
123b3(rnying rgyud): blon pa gsol// zhabs gnyis gdug pa'i snying la gzir// yum chen bdud mo khrag 'dzag ma// tham pa ma bod khrag phyag na bsnams// sprul zhing lpag gsar pa bgos// bdud rtanag po chibs su bcibs// zhabs kyis dgra bkeg shug+sa kyis sgrol// 'chi bdag gshin rje nas/
123b4(rnying rgyud): po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ phyag g.yas zod khrag gri gug g.yon// btsun mo yum chen za byed ma// gri gug thod pa phyag na bsnams// yab yum zhing lpag rlon pa gsol// ma he khros dang chu glang bcibs// zhabs kyis dgra bgegs pho mo gzir // srin po gsod
123b5(rnying rgyud): byed sku mdog nag/ phyag na ral gri thod khrag bsnams// yum chen gsod par byed pa mo// gri gug mi thod phyag na bsnams// na bza' zhing ldag rlon pa gsol// lhag steng rngams pa chibs su bcibs// gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po yang // zhal gcig phyag gnyis su mdog sngo// dang nag 'phyar zhing zhing rdzas/
123b6(rnying rgyud): rdebs// yum chen gzar la gcig ma// yab kyi tshul 'dzin grub pa mo// zhing lpag gyon te gyi ling bcibs// drag sngags bdag po chen po ni// dbang phyug chen po lha yi gtso// mdog dkar shel gri ba dan 'phyar// na bza' dar dkar ber chen gsol// chibs su gnam ru dkar po bcibs// thar pa nag po d+yA tratri gaH//
123b7(rnying rgyud): mchod gtor dug thun phyag na brnams// zhing lpagla gon te do mnag bcibs// dmu bdud rje dpon nag po ni// dar nag 'phyar zhing ti ra bgrad// per nag gsel zhing da mu rta paci bas// mu stegA kA la yag sha ni// mthing nag kha T+wAM tri shu la 'dzin// zhing lpags bgos te ma he bci bas// khyab 'jug rog ti nag po yang //
124a1(rnying rgyud): 'jam pa 9/
124a2(rnying rgyud): tham shing dag su phrag gis 'angan// smin nag pags shing shugs nu bcings// la zhwag yin// sar na gsul gyin pazla gas la// bum pa rus thal phyag gis 'dzin/ rdibs su chu srin mgo dgu 'acibs// rgyal po tar mdzes zhes pa yang // mdog dkar shi ba
124a3(rnying rgyud): dpar mngon// sras mchog 'bar pad mang po ni// mdung ring g.yas la shel gri g.yon// rdo rje mdzes pa mdog dmar po// ru mtshon dar dmar phyag gis 'dzin// khu le lag dgu 'bar ba yang // mdog ser sprul pa lag dgu 'gyed// zheng lpag bgos shing ti ra gnan// drag sngags 'dag
124a4(rnying rgyud): ci khor bcas// rang gi rig kyi 'khor 'dul ba// so so'i sprul pa bsam mi khyab// gcod par byed pa 'dud kyi sde// 'ching bar byed pa btsan gyi sde// gsod byed shan pa srin po'i sde// gdug rtsub 'chang ba gnod sbyin sde// drag rtsal ldan pa lha yi sde// nad gdon 'bebs pam mo'i sde/ nem mkhar
124a5(rnying rgyud): dpang bskur gza' yi rje// glen tshugs gdug pa klu yi sde// sde brgyad dmod pa'i drag sngakra can// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// 'khor dang sde rigla brjod mi lang // phrin las mi zad longs spyod gter// yon tan nus pa dpag tu med// zhe sdang can la khro bar ston// dargyal can la lhag par pon/
124a6(rnying rgyud): 'dod cha na la mi sdug s+ho// ti mug can la myos par ston// ser sna can la phrog par ston// phag dog can la 'di ga par ston// khyod kyis mi 'dul gcig med kyis// mchod cing bskrad pa'i mthun rdzas bzhes// bcol zhing gnyer ba'i las mdzod cig/ bstod cing bsgrub pas dgyes pa
124a7(rnying rgyud): danas rang gi snying po da // 'jig rten thegro pa'i bdag po rnam// so so'i sngags kyis las lo sbyar// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis// byang chub sems kyi bsam pa yis// ltos dang re ba kun spangs te// sangs rgyas bstan la rab dmig nas// drag sngags sa dag po nyid pasla bA na// dad po sangs rgyas thams
124a8(rnying rgyud): mnyes// rig pa 'dzin pa sa thob cing // sems can rnams kyi ston par 'gyur// thun mong ba dang nye ba dang // mchog gyur ring ba'i dngos grub rnams// dpa' bo de la mngon du 'byung // yon tan mchog gi stobs rnyed cing // 'jig rten chos la rab bsngags pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang // a che
124b1(rnying rgyud): la gtogs pa yi// rlabs chen rnams kyang nus par spong // mtho stobs nus pas bsnyems pa yi// gzhan gyis brdzi bar mi nus shing // rang ga dbang du khug pa dang // bsgo ba rdzob pa med par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus po rdo rje rje pa'i rgyud las/ bstod pa yon tan brjod pa'i le'u ste babyang 'o//
124b2(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos// nyid kyi sku 'jig byed chen po'i cha lugs su sprul pa de/ bugra chos nyid zhi ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku'i gnas thams cad las 'od zer gyi dra ba dpag tu med pa phyung nas/ phyog bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dre ga pa can gyi gnas thams
124b3(rnying rgyud): khyab par mdzad nas/ ma rungs shing gdug pa dang / gtum pa'i sems dang bsam pa thams cad ma lus pa zhi ba byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par gyur te/ phan pa dang / bde ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / brtse ba dang / yid dga' ba dang bcas pas phyog der snang bar gyur nas/ thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
124b4(rnying rgyud): de la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// khyod kyis bstan pa gsang chen 'di// ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag tu// rab tu rgyas par 'gyur zhe na// bdag cag 'jig rten dregra pa can// zhi ba'i sems su gnas byas pas// rjes su spyod pa gang yin pa// de la phan pa rgyas par bstan// dren la
124b5(rnying rgyud): dang ni blta spyod kyi// khyab pa de la yongs rdzogs shing // grog dang bran dang dmangs bzhin du// gang gis bsgo ba de bzhin bgyi// dam tshig lha yi yon tan dang // rol pa'i ting 'dzin ldan de la// bka' las 'da' bar mi spyod cing // gsung bzhin bsgrub par rab tu spro// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyis// ji lta
124b6(rnying rgyud): bsngag pa'i las rnams ni// bdag cag nus pas myur du bisgrub// byin gyis brlab par gtsor mdzod cig/ ces gsol nas rang rang gi gnas su dengs shing byin par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gyi bkod pa rnams dang / rang gi 'khor gyi snang ba thams cad kyang nyid kyi sku'i dpyir mi su bsdus shing /
124b7(rnying rgyud): da kyang chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin du gnas par mdzad do// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ phrin las kyi gnyer phul ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rjog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba bai ro can bdag gis/
125a1(rnying rgyud): // bsgyur zhing zhas ta gtan la phang ba'o// rgyal ba glang ba'o// gtar bya/ thAsan/ gtad bya'o// n+ya n+ya t+ya'o// graH// rgya gang skad du/ sug ta sa mu dA yata Sh+TAnA ma/ bod skad du/ bdag shes 'dus pabargyad ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpa la kun tu 'azang po la phya
125a2(rnying rgyud): lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa/ mnyam pa'i dang la gnas shing / sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad ltar gnas pa las/ skye 'gag med cing bdag deng gzhan du mi mthong ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis chos thams cad byang chub sems su gcig pa/ spang ba
125a3(rnying rgyud): dad par snang ste steng yang gcig dang du mar brjod pa las 'das so// kye kye byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// ngo bo gcig las med pa las/ gcig la snang ba tha dad pas// gcig dang du ma'i brjod las 'das// zhes gsungs so// dpe mnyam pa nyid dang / don mnyam pa nyid dang / chos tham
125a4(rnying rgyud): da lhun gyis grub pa mnyam pa nyid do// e ma ho// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// gcig dang du ma'i brjod las 'das// 'di zhes gcig tu bsten par dka'// 'khor ba nyid kyang mya ngan 'das/ zhes gsungs so// ma bcos ma pa slad par rtog na// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba'i phyir/
125a5(rnying rgyud): gang ltar byas kyang ldan gyis grub// dbye ba med pa'i don rtogs so// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo na/ nam mkha' bzhin du brtag dka' zhing // cir yang med par cir yang snad// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su snang // gcig dang du ma gnyis su snang // 'khor ba nyid kyab mya ngan 'das// ma ri
125a6(rnying rgyud): kyang yang dag lam// byang chub sems kyi don to glan// rtog pa g.yeng ba chos kyi sku// ma rig ye shes tha dad med// so so snang ba phye ba tsam// ma rig pa yang lam du gcig/ dang po gang nas ma byung bas/ tha ma gar yang 'gro ba med/ dang po skye ba'i rgyu med pas// tha ma 'chi ba'i lam yang med/ dngos
125a7(rnying rgyud): btsal yang mi gnas pas// 'di zhes gcig tu bstan du med// skye zhing 'pho ba'i gnas med pas// bsad cing bcad pa bsgrub tu med// ma rig pa yi rtog pa yis// mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur// rdo rje lta bur gnas pa la// snam chu zla brag cha 'dra// zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu gsungs so//
125b1(rnying rgyud): rtse thun chen pa'i byin rlabs las// stong gsum rgyal ba'i sbas gang yang // byang chub sems las g.yos pa med// dper nanam mkha'i 'ang 'tshon bzhin// dkar da mar swa stangs gzung med// de bzhin sems kyi rang bzhin yang // 'di zhes gcig tu bstanan med// mi shes par snang 'ang 'tshan
125b2(rnying rgyud): 'dra// de phyi ma bcos ji bzhin bzhag/ ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu gsungs so// bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gtso/ yab yum sras dang bcas snang yang // byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gcig/ skye 'chi med pa byang chub sems/ 'du 'bral med de chos kyi sku// bzang ngan med 'khor 'das chos// tu 'bras
125b3(rnying rgyud): kyi rnam pa nyid// 'gagang med de sems nyid ni/ dper na rmi lam snum 'dra// nam mkha' bzhin du yinas gnas// nam mkha' 'di ni 'di 'dra zhes// tshig tu rab tu brjod du med// de bzhin sems kyi rang bzhin yang // 'di zhes gcig tu bstan du med// bstan na gzung 'dzin 'khrul ba'i chos// brtan du med pa
125b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i mchog/ bsgom du med pa sgom pa'i mchog// bsrang du med pa'i dam tshig ni// ma bsrungs bzhin du lhun gyis grub// ma nor pa yi chos nyid la// rang bzhin skye med chos kyi dbyings// ma bcos pa yi byang chub sems// rgyu dang 'bras bu ma bkag chos/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po la// chu bran thams
125b5(rnying rgyud): cad 'bab cing 'du// de bzhin byang chub sems nyid las// 'khor 'das gnyis ka 'byung zhing 'dra// zhes rdo rje'i tshig tu gsungs so// e ma ho// bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po ni// nam mkha' bzhin du brtag dka' zhing / mo long gzugs bzhin gzung du med// brag cha bzhin du brjod dang bral//
125b6(rnying rgyud): bcud kyi rdo rje snying po 'di// bdag dang gzhan du brjod du med// bstan du med pa'i chos nyid 'di// brjod du med par go bar gyis// brjod med brjod pa brjod pa'i mchog/ mnyan bsam bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis// blo yi rtog pa kha phye la// nges pa'i don 'di rtogs par gyis// nges pa'i don
125b7(rnying rgyud): 'di matogs na/ bsgom dang bsgrub pa yun ring kyang // mi shes gzung 'dzin 'ching ba'i rgyu// de phyir rtogs pa sngon du 'gro// rtogs pa gdeng du ma gyur na// ci ltar sprad kyang 'ching ba'i rgya// rtogs pa'i gdeng gi lta ba ni// dngos po gshes kyi gnas lugs brtags//
126a1(rnying rgyud): nges pa'i don 'di ma rtogs na// mnyam bzhag bsgom pa chags pa'i rgyu// sgyu gri'i nags tshal la sogs kyang // rang gi rtog pas brtas pa'i phyir// de phyir rtogs pa sngon du gtang // rtogs pa na 'di rab tu ga
126a2(rnying rgyud): zhes bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyi chos kyi sku skye ba med pa las chos nyid dang slar byung ba'i ngang las/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku skye ba'i cho 'phrul du 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa/ gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo ngag bras ba sa
126a3(rnying rgyud): rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / rgya phyogs bcur yongs su chad de// yon tan dpag tu med pa rgyas pa'i gru bzhir gyur pa'i nang dkyil 'khor dgu la 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud zlum po thu chad bzhi dang sgo bzhing ldan pa/ rna ma tha pa
126a4(rnying rgyud): phyi rol byang chub kyi shing la sogs pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gyi nas bltas pas nang gsal ba/ nang nas bltas pas kyi gsal ba/ ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang bu gsal bar gyur to// de ltar rang bzhin 'og min gyi gnas na/
126a5(rnying rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin tu gnas te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang / yum kun tu bzang mo dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa rang bzhin gyis gnas so// de nas bcom ldan
126a6(rnying rgyud): dpal kun tu bzang po dang / yum kun tu bzang mo gnyis chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye kye// gtso bo gtso mo 'khor bcas kyang // rang bzhin 'og min gnas mchog na// mu k+She gzugs brten 'dra ba la/
126a7(rnying rgyud): mongs drims gos pa med// rang bzhin don gyi dbyings na bzhugs// nam mnga'i cho 'phrul ston pa ltar// rang bzhin 'og min chos dbyings nas// gsung gis don rnams mi ston te// thugs kyis chos rnams mngal bang ston// zhes ya
126b1(rnying rgyud): matas pa la bzhugs rgya/ mnyam pa dang rtogs par stonas thang gzha lu steng 'dran / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang ba// 'on srin gyi gnas na yum dang 'brel tshul du bzhugs pa las/ yab kyis glengs pa//
126b2(rnying rgyud): dag pa dri ma med pa'i cho// bla med byang chub sgrub pa'i thab// 'kho ba'i rnam tog gzhom pa dang // dag pos 'gro ba drang ba'i phyir// yab yum gnyis med 'khril ba'i tshul// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i chog tu brjod do// de nas yum yang ma
126b3(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bskul ba// kye kye/ bde gshegs rdo rje rigs kyi gtso// mnyam pa chen po'i don bstan nas// gang la 'dul ba brtan pa'i phyir// mi 'gyur rdo rje'i gtso mchog la// gnyis med chen pos 'byung bar bya// zhes ga
126b4(rnying rgyud): so// de nas dgyes pa chen po des/ gas ba'i thugs mabum pa'i ngang gis/ kye kye snying po don cig to// bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi sras// 'khor ba yongs kyi dang dpon po// gnyis su med pa'i yum dang bzhugs// zhes gle he mi g.yo ba'i ting nge
126b5(rnying rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yum gyis bsngal ba// kye kye bde gshegs kun gyi gcu// ma rig mun pa 'joms pa'i bdag/ kun kyang 'gro ba'i don pa'i phyir// dri med gsal ba nyi zla'i 'od// chas nyid mnyam pa'i grong na bzhugs// rigs kyi rigs
126b6(rnying rgyud): te rigs kyi gtso// mun pa 'joms pa'i shes rab 'od// 'gro ba sgrol ba'i ded dngonag tso// 'khor ba'i dri ma 'thung ba'i chu// 'gro ba yongs kyi gnyen gcig go// gnyis med bde ba'i dbyings dkyil du// dgyes pa chen po dbab tu gsol// zhes yum gyi
126b7(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas nas de skad ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po des/ rgyal po dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i cho ga 'di skad glengs so// kyog rgyal ba 'gro ba'i don bya'i phyir// rigs kyi
127a1(rnying rgyud): yum dang gnyis med par// badra chen po gdangs su gsosu// 'khor gyi rnam pa bskyed du gsol// gnyis su med par bzhugs su gsol// de nas yum tshan mo nyid kyi bsam pa g.yos par gyung / a ma ho// rton pas
127a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa 'di bstar phyir// 'khor ba 'dul ba'i dadad pan gaH// dgyes pa'i rdarjed pa'i sa yis// gnyis med kris par gyur nas ni// gsang batshad 'a'i mar can 'ob// al la hA// sa ma ya ste/ athugs to// chung /
127a3(rnying rgyud): nas yab sum gnyis su med pa las/ 'do bar gshegs pa yab yum sras dang bcas pa rngon par gyur nas/ rang bzhin gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma skya bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// gleng slong ba'i le'u gnyis pa'o// / de nas
127a4(rnying rgyud): phyogs brda'i bde bar gshegs pa kun gyis/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzung po la byag la la nas 'di skad ces thos so// sa kyai bdag shegs kyis kyi ste// rtog pa'i dra bgagam pa'i phyir// bdag dag pa rigapa brgya'i sgrub pa'i thabs// legs par
127a5(rnying rgyud): par bstan du gsol// zhes zhus pas// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos gsungs pa/ nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs thams cad ni// rigs brgyar 'dus pa ngas bshad do// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas
127a6(rnying rgyud): dgatu// 'du 'dzi spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// me yi cho ga legs byas la// mgon po thugs dam can rnams mchod// bkra shims la maN+Dal bya// 'do ma gang rgyal chag gang dpangs// rnam lnga sprin gyis chag chag gdab// stangs stabs khro ngas
127a7(rnying rgyud): mtshams bcang pa// dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya// thig ga lag grogs dang rab ldan pas// ye zhes lnga ldan srid bu las// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab // slob dpor rngub la slob ma shang // rdorje khu dzung byin brlabs la// pho brang
127b1(rnying rgyud): dang // na su na // sgyus/ sangs nga/
