134a1(rnying rgyud): de dang rnyed// rna bas ye gzhal las bang// ye shes rlan pa'i rang bzhino// bla rnams yongs su ma chung ba// bso nams ye shes tshogs byas pas// kun tu gra ba zhir gnas gyu // ye shes lug pa 'gro' thar mangs
134a2(rnying rgyud): thams rbad ngo bo gcig pa'i phyir// rtse mo kun tu'i dus pa yin// rin chen kun sogs kye brag gis// bsam mi khyab par spras par gyur// tshad med bzhi yi sgo khyung la// rnam thar brgyad kyi rtababs ldan// kun nas 'askor ba'i kha khyer la// rol mo sna tshogs kyi
134a3(rnying rgyud): phung bzhin// hrI dang nang med kun tu snang // 'khor mo rtsi bsku bzhi ma khyud dang // klu chang bzhi ldan bur khrims dang // dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// dbus su mi 'jigs seng ge'i khri// ben byi na 'od gsal nyi zla dang // chags mad pa tha so so /
134a4(rnying rgyud): mangs// gdan ni snyam brtsegs dag tu gnas// seng ge'i gdan gyi dbus san// dam pa'i yi ge'i sa bon las// de las pa rba do nger btags// so so'i snying pos mtshon par bya// de las sangs rgyas sbyin po// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kham rnams
134a5(rnying rgyud): sems can don kun rdzogs mdzad nas// de nyid la ni thim par gyur// phyag rgya yongs su gyur pa las// kun bzang yum dang ldan pa ni// zla ba'i 'od ltar dkar zhing gsal// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mun gyis mdzes// sangs rgyas lnga yaM dbu rgyan
134a6(rnying rgyud): nAn// 'od byed rnamapas tshogs las// sprul pas sems can dron rnams mdzan// bran tu zung mo 'ang zhi ga tshul// trai la 'i kha dog 'angadra // rkyen dang dbucan pab dang mthur// phyag g.yas rje thugs kar brtan// g.yon pas dril
134a7(rnying rgyud): de yus la 'brel// ma gyis pa zlathugs ka brten// g.yon gyis nyi ma'i las su 'brel// ni bro zhing 'dud pa'i tshul// de ltar yongs su bskyed pa na// gnyis med chags pa'i sbyor bas drangs// de bzhi gshegs pa kun 'dus nas// yab la
134b1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs rnams thim// rdo rje'i lam du phyung nas ni// sram gyi pad+ma'i mkha' dkyil du// byang chub sems kyi 'gro 'dra las// ye shes dkyil 'khor rdzogs par sprul// de nas snying rje'i chags pa yis// sems can ma lus bsdus byas na
134b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor b+hai ra la 'khod nas ni// de dag 'jug par gsol ba 'debs// gsol ba btab pa'i tshig brjod nas// thams cad dkyil 'khor 'dug par 'gyur// bdud rtsi'i 'od kyis rig par gyur// thams cad rang bzhin sangs rgyas shes// de ltar rgyal po'i phyin
134b3(rnying rgyud): rang lus rgyal 'di dkyi 'ang khor che// rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ru grags// d+he mched khams rnams mang po zin// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa rba mun dang ma ma'i// me rlung gos
134b4(rnying rgyud): dmachog srol// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas shing // thams cad me lus chos so cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// sangs nas nyid las gzhan pa chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mo brnyes /
134b5(rnying rgyud): de nas rgyal ba sangs rgyas rnams// so so bzhin du dgrod par bya'o// yongs spangs gsung gi yi ge ni// yab kyi thugs kar thim gyur nas// yum gyi pad+ma'i chags rlan gyis// yab yum gnyis med thig ler sbyor// de ltar rgyal ba sgoms zhugs
134b6(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i 'bru tshogs mngon 'dra ste// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru dang // byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa// rab tu rtog pa rnam bzhi yi sa// mngon rdzogs rgyal po de nyid des// de ltar rtog pa rnam bzhi yis// tshol ba'i sra ni mngon spyod las// @
134b7(rnying rgyud): ga'i kha dog 'dra// zhal gcig pa 'i phyag gnyis te// g.yas pa 'khor lo thags kar brten// g.yon pa dril bu yum la 'khyud// thabs dang shes rab zhabs gnyis ni// mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyil krung 'azhugs// mdun dang chub med du
135a1(rnying rgyud): ta zhal// mtshan dang dpe byad kun tu ldan// 'od zer 'bar ba'i tshogs chen las// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs s+ho// rgyal ba rigs lngas dbu brgyan cing // sna tshogs rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan// btsun mo
135a2(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i dbyings stug ma// gzhon tshul 'khril ldem shin tu chags// tshe lugs la sogs yab dang mthun// g.yon pa dril bu yab la brten// g.yas pa nyi ma las su 'khril// phung po dbang po rnam shes kun// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du bsgom/
135a3(rnying rgyud): skye mched kha pA rnams byin gyis brlabs// gru gsung thugs kyi 'bru gsum gyis// 'od zer rnam pa mang po spos// phyogs bcu'i sku gsung thugs bsdus nas// bdag gi sku gsung thags la ni// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs par bsam// oM
135a4(rnying rgyud): sarba ta thA ka ta mi hA kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM// oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA lAka badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba te thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM// de ltar sku gsung thugs gsum du// nga rgyal rab tu bskyed nas ni// yum gyi sgra yi dkyil 'khor la/
135a5(rnying rgyud): yig 'bru rnam gsum rnam shes la// yeg bu'i byin brlab tshul bzhin bya// de nas yum ni byin brlab bya/ oM AHhU~M swA hA// gnas lnga dag tu dgod par bya// de ltar yab yum skya rdzogs nas// dkyil 'khor chen po rnam 'phrul gyir// gnyis med chags
135a6(rnying rgyud): nga'i snod don du// rdo rje pad+ma byin gyis brlab// hUM las rdo rje rab tu shes// oM las byung ba'i nor bur bsam// oM las pad+mar bskyed par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ bsnyen pa dang ni nye ba'i phasnyen// sgrub pa dang ni srub chen po/
135a7(rnying rgyud): yum gyi bad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// byang chub sems kyi byin rlabs las// yig 'bru rnams kyi 'phro 'du yis// sa bon mtshan ma sgra rnams rdzogs// sum cu drug gi dkyil 'khor 'gyur// de las 'gro ba rmongs pa la// bstan
135b1(rnying rgyud): da pa 'gyur bstan par mdzad// gang byugapa 'a thang la rtsibs skyed nga// bajam ldan rnam parjod du// sam tshan gan tu bzung ba rnam// gzugs dbang pa dus kyang nga// 'am ldan na byung ldan dang // sram rgyanan pab dag ma bdam/
135b2(rnying rgyud): nub phyogs 'khor lo'i thebs steng du// bcom ldan spang ba mtha' yas dang // yu ma chen mA ma kI yang bsgom// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// bcom ldan don yod grub pa dang // yum chen dam tshig sgrol ma bsgom// de yi phye re martsibs mtshan la/
135b3(rnying rgyud): sher phyogs sa yi steng po dang // yum du badz+ra lA ste bsgom// k+kon nam mkha'i snying po dang // yum du badz+ra mA le bsgom// rnab phyogs spyan ras gzigs dbang dang // yum ni gir ti bsgom par bya// thang du phrag na rdo rje dang // yum du badz+ra na ti bskam// de yaM
135b4(rnying rgyud): chad la// shar du sems dpa' byams pa dang // yum du badz+ra d+hU pe ma'o// lho ru kun tu bzang po dang // yum du badz+ra praSh+Ta ma'o// nub tu sgrib pa rnamasel dang // yum du rdo rje mar me na'o// byang du mkhyen rab 'jam dpal dang // yum du badz+ra gan rte na'o// sgo bzhi
135b5(rnying rgyud): sgo sgom ni// shar sgor khro bo rnam par rgyal// yum du rdo rdo ro langs ma// lko sgor khro bogashin rje gshed// yum du rdo rje mi pham ma// nubasgor khro bo rta mchog dpal// yum du rdo rje ral gcig ma'o// byang sgor khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// yum du rdo rje spyan gcig
135b6(rnying rgyud): ma'o// mtha' dbus med par khrad pA yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa la// rdul ba mchod pas mnyes par gyur// mnyes nas sems can don bya zhes// dkyil 'khor dam pa baspyan gyur na// sems can
135b7(rnying rgyud): tshi/ srid bsgribs nas// dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i skal med gyur// de las byang chub sems 'bros pas// oM sogs yi ge mngon par gyur// sa ba ni las ni phyag mtshan 'bar// de las thub pa'i srung rdzogs te// ma ma'i spring po brjod pa ying/
136a1(rnying rgyud): mkha' byings su gzugs gnas pa las// 'dig rkyen drug gi tshogs bcu thos// 'jig rte drug gaphyogs bdung // 'dul ba rnam nas chud na 'dzad// brkams dang rab tu byung ba dang // mngon par sangs rgyas bdud ba
136a2(rnying rgyud): dang // 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshe 'phrul bstan// mya ngan 'dang sogs thub pa yi// spyod pa rjes mthun ston par mdzad// mngon shes drug gi tshe 'phral gyis// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du son// sgra dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi// bye brag sna tshogs ston mang
136a3(rnying rgyud): pas// 'thob so sor 'dul ba bzhin// byin rlabs 'dul ba ston par mdzod// ma skye'i bsam pa'i bye brag gis// lha dang mi'i theg pa sogs// theg pa rnam lngam sor ston// rjes su bstan pas 'gro brtul nas// 'gro ba sangs rgyas sar bzhag ste// slar tshan
136a4(rnying rgyud): la thub drug dgod// steng du lha yi thub pa la// shar phyogs mi yi thub pa'o// lho ru lha min thub pa la// nub tu yi dgas thub pa ste// byang du dmyal ba'i thub pa'o// 'og tu byol song thab pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bstan nas// khyad par kun tu
136a5(rnying rgyud): bltas nas ni// sgyu ma bzhin du dmigs nas kyang // so so'i yab yu me bye brag la// lus kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par dgod// phung po dbang po rnam shes kun// rnam smin oM du shes par hUM// spyi bor yi ge oM bkod de// lce la A ni rab tu gnas// sIng
136a6(rnying rgyud): dang lhab rgya sor ni// hU~M dang s+ya d+ha rim pa bzhin// mi gA dang rna ba sna dang lce// k+Shi traM hrIHnga rim bzhin bsam// mi thi hUM dang muM dang bzhi// mig sogs phyi rol rim bzhin bsam// de ltar yi ge'i rnam pa ni// yab kyi sku la rim par bsam// yum gyis yid dkyi
136a7(rnying rgyud): 'bad du// gzugs bla dro ngo dag bya sogs// rnam ldan sde sogs shes par bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// lci po mgrin pa gnyis su ni// l-I dang mAM gnyis rim par bsam// snying ga lteb chu sor ni// pA dang tAM dang mAM rnams dgod// mig
136b1(rnying rgyud): dang nab la// d+hAd kyis rim bzhin// mig na m+b+ha rgu'i phyir ldang// mu d+hun to ma bzhin pasam// gla ga sung thugs su dbang spar zhing // ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir// rigs lnga'i dbus na kun la bas pa// thabab lum na
136b2(rnying rgyud): dang // srin rlabs dbang bkrung ma gsungs so// zhes gsungs so// snga phyag chubaskyed pa'i le'u ste bcu pa // de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// sangs cas bzhi bcus gnyis kyi// phrab phreng gsal brtan pa
136b3(rnying rgyud): a ngo na dzi ka/ mr-it+ta trI shA d+hi/ hUM badz+ra TIka/ sa rat+na r+thika/ oM A ro l-i ka/ ha prat+ka d+h+ri ka/ laM pre Shan+te/ mi mo hA ra ti/ paM rA gar ti/ taM badz+ra da ti/ k+Shi twe rA dza ya/ traM A ga d+ha ya/ tri pad+d+ha pra dam/ dai kuR+sha p+tA Nad+hIH/ hUM lA pye sa ma ya staM/ tr-im+ba gyis ma yaH
136b4(rnying rgyud): d+hI gIr ti ga haM/ A~M nair ti rA ga yA mi/ me d+ha rA ya sA hA/ krI nismA ri thA ya sAhA/ d+h+waM swa rA ro ya sAthA/ pr-itAM a ra dA gA ya s+yA hA/ dza d+b+ha be pra be sha/ druM puSh+pe I be sha/ bi dI pe pra gi raM/ ho g+ha ni d+h+ya tsi&ho// oM mra no kr-I sA hA/ oM mu nasmai swA hA/ aM mu ne hUt+sa sAtra/
136b5(rnying rgyud): oM mr-i ne pre sA d+ha/ oM mun+do k+ShaM swA hA/ oM mra ne ye swAtAM/ oM pradz+nyA na ta kri ta phaT/ hU~M yA mAn ta kri ta phaT/ hUM pad+mi ni ta kri ti phaT/ hU~M big+h+nAn ta kri ta phaT/ b+h+rUM badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro tA~M shwa dI dz+wa la nI hU~M phaT/ hU~M rat+na d+ha ri ma hA kro te shwa rI dz+wa la nI hU~M phaT/ bru~M padz+ra d+had ma hA
136b6(rnying rgyud): d+hu shwarA dz+wa la nI hrI phaT/ oM kr-i n+da d+hi ra mdza kr-i hU~M shA rI dz+wa la na hU~M phaT/ hrI ts+yai hrI badz+dzaHd+ha.a~M/ a a e ba na dra si ma nA ma/ srub skyed gsal ba d+hAH pa'i sngags// bzhi bskye rtsi gnyis snying po yin// zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas bzhi bcu ci gnyis
136b7(rnying rgyud): sa'i rtsa ba'i sngags bstan pa'i ladu skye bcu gcig // de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// ba'i bcwaH gnyis zugs tshu ni// brgya byin la sogs phyogs su gnas// mthong ga dkar po par le kan// lngang gA'i mdog tu tshor ba
137a1(rnying rgyud): ni// gtso bo gdan la rdzogs pa'i tshul// 'khor rnams sems dpa'i tshul du bzhugs// mo so'i lha mdog yab dang mthun// 'khor lo tshal po rgyal mo dang // g.yas na mthong thos sdom pa dang // myong dang btsun ma rgya
137a2(rnying rgyud): su bcas// gru chad la ni mthong byed dang // thos rgyad sdom byed myong byed rnams// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsam// mdun dang chub tu byed pa dang // bye bdag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhel 'joms pa ni// btsun po'i tshogs dang ldan par
137a3(rnying rgyud): gnas// yab yum bzhugs tshul phyag mtshan ni// rnam snang dkar po 'khor lo bskor// mi bskyod mthing ga rdo rje bsnams// 'byung ldan ser po rin chen bsnams// mtha' yas dmar po pad+ma bsdams// don grub ljang gu rgya kram bsnams// kun
137a4(rnying rgyud): tu bzang mo dril bu bsnams// sangs rgyas spun ni thor tshugs bsnams// gos dkar mo ni rin chen bsnams// mA ma kI ni pad+ma ba skams// sa sting dkar po rin chen myu gu bskams// nam mkha'i snying po dkar po ral gre bsdams// spyani ras gzigs
137a5(rnying rgyud): dbang dkar po pad+ma bsnams// phyag na rdo rje ljang gu dril bu bsnams// byams pad mar lca gar gyi gran+d+he bsdams// kun bzang dkar po rin chen ste ma bsnams// sgrib pa rnam sel sngon po po ti bsnams// 'jam dpal dkar ljang me tog ut+pal bskam
137a6(rnying rgyud): rngon mo rgya gram me long bsnams// lI s+ye sngon mo rin chen 'phreng ba bsdams/ kIr ti dmar mo po wang rgyu da 'dren ba ltams// hrI ti ljang gu gar gyi cod pan bsnams// bcug pa'i sprin 'phro ma ni spos me bsdams// dga' ba'i medangs ldan ma ni paSh+pa
137a7(rnying rgyud): bsgrums// gsal ba 'i 'di ldan ma ni mar me bri skams// gnate sdang gre dag byed dri che ba bsdams// dbye rnams 'phye zhing 'dud pa tshul// gnyis med dbyings kyi dang du gzis// ken drug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul che// gsal 'tshor spun drug
137b1(rnying rgyud): nga// / na// dag sa pa na// dug ga / dag d+hA ma zugs pa u//
137b2(rnying rgyud): ma 'o// bdud kyi 'khyil pa lnga brgyags pa rnams// dayang pa dkar po 'aklags pa'i lugs kya bskabs// ma mngon pa dgas pa bsnams// nga lag cig dmar mdang sags / brnams// thog te pa slong ba /
137b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'khyams la thub pa drug/ lte yi thub pa dkar po po wang bsnams// lA min thub pa sngon po go cha bsdams// mi yi thub pa sed po gseg shing bsnams// rtsol song thub pa ljang gu po ti bsnams// yi dwags zab pa dmer po sgrom grwa bai snam
137b4(rnying rgyud): dmyal ba'i thub pa nag po mo chu bsnams// de ltar sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi// phyag rgya chen po rigasal bar bskyed// snang stong dbyer med dkyil 'khor ni// ye nas ma bcos ldan gyis zab// ces gsungs so// dam tshig rgod kyil
137b5(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa'i la'u lteb cu gnyis pa'o// de nas yang dag ngas gsungs pa// thugs kyis thon 'od zer lus// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor ldan drangs te// rdzogs btu sa gas pa dkyil 'khor tshogs// mid ni gas dbyi pa
137b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nas// bdeg shegs thams cad spyan drang ngo // lcags rgyal sogs phyag ca bzhis// rang rang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam stong bas// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'arjo
137b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa dang / nye bar gyur pa'i dmachog mchog/ de ltar ye shes dkyil 'khor dang // dam chog dkyil 'khor mnyam sgor bya// dkyil 'khor kun la mnyam bltas nas// sgyum mig yor lta brar ba ste// de nas lhal mchod pa'i phyir// chos kyi
138a1(rnying rgyud): dbyung ba dang ma nga dang // mchod pa'i ca n+d+ha bar bsgom// bdag gi ste ga'as pon las// 'di bar mang po'i tha sa / phyogs pan+d+ha stangs rgyas thams snad ce// mchod pa'i rdzogs rnams kun 'dus /
138a2(rnying rgyud): bani gags / 'i skye // dz+ha chu pam khrim pa' dzisan/ chub sems sa da pa las// mtshang ba na ma rtsegs m+b+ha// rnal pa das ma pa ma cad par rdzog/ ma
138a3(rnying rgyud): de sngon ba/ sa bri'i ng+ges nga' den pa bu'an pasgru bzlas pa/ lanams spyan me thugasaklas ngapas da 'dum/ shes sems dpa gsal gasgos sas/
138a4(rnying rgyud): hU~M/ sa // nga shugs thams ci tshad// rjem 'dus dngas pan pa gnyis pas// thab ga ma mig zang /

138a6(rnying rgyud): dgas rna Ta/ nga ma// bad na/ yang sa la gnyis sam na/ thugasas/ nga pa gang 'a 'du par 'gyu
138a7(rnying rgyud): tshig 'ani rigs byas zhing // oM byad sa ni rdzogs par lan// thugs kyi yan pag 'dzegs pas// mnyams 'jug la rab btsunan// zhag ni sram cu zug drug gam// bcu gnyis bcudrug rgyad chad kyis// dbang sgyur rigs kyingam pa 'byung/
138b1(rnying rgyud): do ba drug can chad kyis// wa wa ldan gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig le nyid sdang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ thogs bcungs gsu pardzogs pa pa// lhing khams bas ma yas nam dag dang // ma dang bral ba'i gzha ba mas khang
138b2(rnying rgyud): 'jor mo rkyen dang ral ma 'ardzogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun// mthong na bar bsnyen pa dang // mya chen gsungs pa'i dran 'byung ba// mthun pa'i ye shes ltung ba'o// gcig dang dra mar bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin cing /
138b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te// rang d+hang ye shes gnas med spyad// ldog par rtog pa rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas nas// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang // de ltar rgyal mchog dpal
138b4(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'o// dkyil 'khor gsang ba bslab pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs ste dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gas ra
138b5(rnying rgyud): thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings// 'byung ba'i shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po yul dus snang ba rnams// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa 'i//
138b6(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi ye shes sgra mar snang // snying po thig le mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgyes la mchod par 'bral// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu mar rab snang ba// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha'
138b7(rnying rgyud): yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le de nyid dbyings// do ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag gi zhal mthong ba'o// dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin//
139a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rgyun du dkyil 'khor ma lus rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam spyod pa// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs kyis 'byung/
139a2(rnying rgyud): phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dus pa'i mgon// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor ba// bya byed med pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam bsgom la mnyam spyor gyis// rang byung kun dam lhan gyis grub// 'di
139a3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ gang zhig 'di la mos gyur na// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du// dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes pa yis// nye ba'i sras su dgo tra
139a4(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// gsang ba'i ye shes bsgom pa'i gnas// mkha' dbyings dang po dbyings nyi zla// ye shes rgyal po yab yum bsgom// gang zhig glang chen myos 'dra'i sems// mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas sa// sngags dang phrag rgya rab brtan na/
139a5(rnying rgyud): dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin las langs nas ste// spyod lam rnam par dag par gnas// snang ba'i dngos po so sor ni// lha yi dkyil 'khor shin tu bsgom// yang na l+h+wa ma la sogs tshul// zas la sogs pa bza' ba ni// dz+hal
139a6(rnying rgyud): d+hid+ha rlungs mngon kum nas// bdud rtsi lnga ni byin brlabs te/ lce yi dbang po rab spangs nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs kar bkod// rgyal po'i tshogs rnams tshems par byas// dmachog nyam pa tshul bzhin bshags// yang rtul ba'i dpes/
139a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyis// byin rlabs kyi ni rnam par bya// sems can thams cad mthong ba na// snying rje byams pa'i sems bskyed de// sangs rgyas nyid du bya'o zhes// smon pa'i sems ni khyad par can// blo can rnams kyis rtag tu bya// de ltar dus bzhi nyin mtshan du// nal
139b1(rnying rgyud): 'byor tshul la gnas pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs rim bsten pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / bud+d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bsgrub pa'i skabs te gnyis pa'o// de nas skyid pa la kun tu bzang po la/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas la sogs
139b2(rnying rgyud): pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma skyi dpal kun tu bzang // rigs lnga'i sgrub thabs bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gas na nas kyang // spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// rigs lnga'i rig 'dzin
139b3(rnying rgyud): bslab 'dod na// dben par maN+Dal gyi dor bya// bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab/ oM hUM swA A hA/ dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i dmigs rten dgod// yang na rdul tshon dkyil 'khor bzhengs// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi grwa chad dang // sgo bzhi sgo khyud rgyan bcas
139b4(rnying rgyud): da po byang chub sems bskyed de// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang // byang chub snying po'i rgyu yin yang // rtog pas bsgribs pas 'khor bar 'khyams// rigs lnga'i dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed do// de nas de bzhin nyid
139b5(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa// chos rnams mi dmigs gdod nas dag/ stong zhing bdag med bsgom par bya// de nas kun spyang ting nge 'dzin// gong gi don de ma rtogs la// khyab pa'i snying rje chen po bsgom// de nas rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin// rang sems dri med a dkar las// e'i
139b6(rnying rgyud): gr-i suM laM raM las// 'byung ba lnga yi mkha' dkyil du// rin po che yi ri rab brtseg/ de steng b+h+rUM las 'phro 'dus pas// kha dog sna lnga'i 'od phung las// rin chen sna lnga'i gzhal yas khang // 'bar ba'i 'khor lo ci bas bzhi mdzes// ye shes bzhi yi gru chad
139b7(rnying rgyud): la// tshad med bzhi yi sgo yis mdzes// rnam thar brgyad kyi rta babs la// chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor yug byas// phyi nang med pa'i gzhal yas bsgom// de dbus glang chen shar seng ge// lho ru rta mchog nub rma bya// byang du shang shang khri brtsegs sted// nyi
140a1(rnying rgyud): zla bad+ma'i gdan steng la// dbus kyi gdan steng a dkar bsam// 'phro 'dus don byas 'khor lor gyur// de las rnam par snang mdzad bskyed// yum du sangs rgyas spyan ma bsgom// yab yum gnyis ka sra mdog dkar// phyag na
140a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo 'dzin pa la// zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i skyil krung bzhugs// rgyan dang chas kyis sku la brgyan// yab yum gnyis su med par bsgom// yab yum gnyis kyi thugs ka nas// rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas bskyed pa ni// shar du seng ge'i khri steng du/
140a3(rnying rgyud): kyi thugs nas hUM 'phros pas// don gnyis byas nas rdo rjer gyur// de las rdo rje sems dpa' ni// sku mdog mthi dag 'bar ba la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis bzhugs// g.yas pa rdo rje thugs kar 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dkur brten pa'o//
140a4(rnying rgyud): yum gyi thugs nas mye 'phros pas// kun tu bzang mo yab dang mthun// myo phyogs rta yi khri skyeng du// yab kyi thugs nas skra 'phros pas// don gnyis zas nas rin chen 'bar// de las rin chen 'byud ldan ni// sku mdog ser po 'brar ba la// zhal ga
140a5(rnying rgyud): phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis bzhugs// phyag g.yas rin chen thugs kAr 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dkur brten pa'o// yum gyi thugs las l-I 'phros pas// gos dkar mo ni yab dang mthun// nub phyogs rma bya'i khri steng du// yab kyi thugs nas I 'phros
140a6(rnying rgyud): pas// don gnyis byas nas pad+mar gyur// de las snang ba mtha' yas ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i skyil krung bzhugs// g.yas pas pad+ma thugs kar 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten// yum gyi thugs
140a7(rnying rgyud): nas bAM 'phros pas// mA ma kI ni yab dang mthun// byang phyogs shang shang khri steng du// yab kyi thugs nas twa 'phros pas// de las don yod grub pa ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis su mdog ldang // zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i skyil krung bzhugs// g.yas pas
140b1(rnying rgyud): rol grodrags gang 'dzin// g.yon dril bu dkul brten// sram gyi thugs nas tu 'thos pas// dang chog grob ma la ba dang mthun// dkar rigs pa yab sam ni// man+dan lhag 'thil khrem gzhon num na// gsal 'char ldan sdug ga zibyin 'bar// dab
140b2(rnying rgyud): na napas can da// rlung ya nga bani ni med pa na// ma 'dzin ga gzugs brtan nam// nam mkha'i 'dra gyinang pazhinan// dkar dam tshig pa sprid byas nas// ye shes dekyil khor spyan rdung ngo // gnyis pa med par bstim thus nas// shes pa'i tshum
140b3(rnying rgyud): 'tshal la// byinang gis pa'i mtshad pas mchod// babyud cing drings bu ma gsol ba btab// gnyis sa med pa'i bsnyen pa dbul// oMt+ma swA s+t+wa~Mt+ma/ ma hA thA saH/ rigs ma pa pa'i thugs kar// tiklags pasnur te// ma sang yig 'thugs la zlas
140b4(rnying rgyud): bzlas// phyogs parji ba de gshegs blagasung thugs// yon tan na las dkyil 'khor mnyes// khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi// dug lnga sbyangs nas rigs ldang kyang// 'gro jug 'am lnga'i sdug bsngal sbyang // pral yAM shes thob par bsgom
140b5(rnying rgyud): nas srung sa ma// de nyid dgasal kyi zhi thub pa ma gas ma na// danas yang dgra ngas gsungs bya// de ni dag ni sgrub n+d+he// bdeg shegs thams cung rigs lda 'dus// rigs lnga bdag byed phung po la// 'dra
140b6(rnying rgyud): dngadabye ma rgyad 'byung lnga las// mchis rnaMs btsal sring bsgrib tu med// rang nyid ye nas rigs lha yin// gzugs kyi phung po de bzhin rigs// rnam shes lung brdo rje rigs// tshar ba'i phung po rin chen rigs// 'du shes zang po pad+ma'i rigs// 'dra byed bu
140b7(rnying rgyud): po las kyi rigs// shini de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// rdum pa rdo rje'i rigs yin te// rjod rdo da po gyi'i rigs// khrag ni brgya dgas kyi sum// dbugs ni las kyi rigs kyi was// khadog dkar po de bzhin dgas// kha dag sngon po rje rigs// 9
141a1(rnying rgyud): nas gas// 'ag nas gyu// 'das ma gad shin // / sa/ 'as /
141a2(rnying rgyud): ma// rlung rnams kyi rigs kyi mA// lus sbyin ma shes de bzhin rigs// mid kyin pa shes donga'i rigs// theg gi nas shes rten chen rigs// la rnam shes pad+ma rigs// rna ba'i rnam shes lus kyi dashes// byang rji da /
141a3(rnying rgyud): ba/ bye bang po sa kyisam// thig gi dab po ni rte gas yus// sa dbang po parda rig pa kyim ma// nab dbang po las sa gis kyi sras// gti mug de bzhi ni gshegs pa'i rigs// zhe rlung rigasas pashad
141a4(rnying rgyud): na rje'i rigs// de da rtags pa'i gas yinano// rig dog las kyi dgas smin no// nga tshal na rje yum// gti ga yul ni dang zhin snyam// dasngal maldan na chen sum// 'ad chags phral ni bad+ma'i thas// zag sa
141a5(rnying rgyud): nga// phung po'i dang 'byung bachen pa lnga// 'dag la dang sAl ljang bang po'o// rnam shes dang drug le ye shes la// gti phyag nes dag tshas dpying ma legs yin// de bzhin dgas kyi dang du langs rgyas so// zhe'ang nam ga par
141a6(rnying rgyud): san/ ga nga rgyas/ ska bu dag mi sa da mi sa yin// rkye gas kyang nga dus byas so// dod cigs rnaM ma dag gra drug yogs na// brgya rigs kyi dang dusangs smras sa// theg dag
141a7(rnying rgyud): nan tan gas yin// las kyi rigs kying sa ngas rgyas sa// zhes gsungs sa// rigs ldanang sgru kyil bcu drug // de nas yang dag nga sa gsungs pa// gsang sngags za mo man ngag 'di// thabs pa 'a
141b1(rnying rgyud): nas bsgrub// nyan mongs dag yul ma myod// gtazug dang gan gshegs pa'i rigs// chos kyi dbyings kyi ma shes yin// gsung dnga'i rigs phyin te// ma lo ga pa'i yegs med// da bden du da // pa ma da nga du
141b2(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags pad+ma'i rigs len te// sa sar rtogs pa'i ye shes so// phrag dog las kyi rigs yin te// bya ba nan tan ye shes so// gti mug phra rags ci spos kyang // gti mug mtshan nyid btsal bar bya// gti mug mtshan nyid masrab pang //
141b3(rnying rgyud): yul btsal bas// yul yang ma grab stong par 'dug/ de ltar rtogs shing shes tsam na// gti mug ma spangs de bzhin rigs// chos dbyings ye shes thob pa'o// zhe sdang phra rags ci skyes kyang // zhe sdang rang bzhin bcol bar bya// zhe sdang dang
141b4(rnying rgyud): grub te// zhe sdang skyes pa'i dral btsal bas// yul yang mgru bstong par 'dug/ dag rtogs shing zhes rnam na// ni sdang ma spangs da pa rigs// sa spong ye shes thob pa'o// ngar la tha dgas ci stes kyad// dpral dang ba da btsal bar bya// dathal pa
141b5(rnying rgyud): na te// darnal skye ba'i yul btsal bas// rgal yang mthub stong par 'dug/ de ltar rtogs shing shes tsam ne// ngargyal mi spangs rin chen rigs// ba pa nyid ye shes thob 'o// 'dod chags tha rags skyes pazar// 'dod chags
141b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin btsal bar bya// 'dod chags rang bzhin ma grab ste// 'dod chags yul yang stor par 'jug/ de ltar shes shing rtogs tsam na// 'dod chags ma spangs pad+ma'i rigs// kun rtogs ye shes thob pa'o// thag dog phra dgas kyi skyes kyang //

142a1(rnying rgyud): s+yAng // da bzhin rigs spangs chos dbyings ye shes med// zhe sdang grangs nan rdo rigs mchog skud// rdon rigs sbyangs ma 'du la shes med// dAN+Dal sa sa na na can rigs mchog spang // rin d+ha
142a2(rnying rgyud): ngas mnyam nyid ye shes med// 'dod chags spangs napad+ma rigs mchog spang // pad+ma rigs spangs kun tog ye shes med// phrag dog spangs na las kyi rigs mchog skar// las kyi rigs spangs nan tan ye shes med// drag rdza sbyang san rigs
142a3(rnying rgyud): lnga'i sku lnga med// rigs kyi sku lnga spangs pas sangs rgyas gdung rgyud bcad// grub par mi 'gyur dub pa'i skal bar 'gyur// drug lnga bsgrub na 'bras bu ye shes la// gti mug ma bkag ye shes grong gi lam// zhe sdang ma spangs ye shes rtogs pa'i lam
142a4(rnying rgyud): ngargyal ma bkag mnor rang gi lam// 'dod chags ma bkag chos kyi dbyings kyi lam// phrag dog ma spangs gnyis su med pa'i dang // nyon mongs dug lnga ye shes lnga yi lam// de yang stong pa bde ba chen po lnga// 'bras bu rtse med dang du ma spangs ldan gyis
142a5(rnying rgyud): grub// dug lnga rin chen dgos 'dod 'gyung ba yin// zhes gsungs so// rigs lnga'i gsang 'grub kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nyid rigs lnga bsgrub pa'i skabs te gsum pa'o// de nas sde dpal kun tu bzang po la// rigs
142a6(rnying rgyud): rje'i sangs rgyas la sogs pas zhus pa/ e ma skyi dpal kun tu bzang // gsang chen rigs gcig ji ltar bsgrub// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang // spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// ston cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// sug
142a7(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi sgrub thabs 'di// khyad par mi mthun bye brag rnams// rang bzhin gcig la gsum tshang ba// rdo rje sim+ba dpa' nyid dung dus// rdo rje sems dpa' bsrub 'dod na// dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas dag tu// maN+Dal gyi dor byas nas na/

142b2(rnying rgyud): ga la bar bsgom// de las 'od 'phros bde gshegs mchod// grug sung thugs la mchod pa phral// khams gsum sems can tog sgri basbyangs// tshur 'dus 'o du nub las// dngul dkar rdo rje sa dkrur gyur// de la 'od thos nub las
142b3(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar gyur// mu mdog rdul dkar lha bA la// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa rdo rje thugs kar 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dasul brten// glang chen gA sgrol ba'i khri stede na// nyi pad+ma'i gdan sted na// rkyen rnams
142b4(rnying rgyud): kyis brkyen phreng bsgo pa// mnyen lhag 'brel lde ma gzhon tshul che// gsal 'tshor ldan spug gzi 'dzid 'bar// de lta bu yi skur bsgoms te// sde bor 'khor lo'i thabs steng du// yi kar shel kar 'tshor ba bsgom// maphrin par byad+ma 'dra 'i dren
142b5(rnying rgyud): steng // snga nim da da mar la dngas par bsgon// snying gang rdo rnga chag sa snyeng // mthing ga hU~M ga cig bsam par bya// de lta bu yi spyod ni// 'dod chags can gyi 'drag sgo ste// spyi ba sgo nas 'jug pa'o// zha ma'i smonas 'jug pa ni// sme mdog mthing nag
142b6(rnying rgyud): 3// dri lag ci zug gnyis gabus gnyis bzad// g.yas pa ni rnaM thugs kur 'dzin// g.yon pa dril thu dgul brten// glog sham thabs sbrul gyis bcan// klung chen ka rjon de lta gsugasol// mi ni badz+rargya cig/ rdon na nas kya bya/

143a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'thor rlung g.yed pa che// de lta bu'i khro bo la// glagasung thugs kyi yi ge dgod// kyen rgyan gyi 'dug nate// khro bral nan gyin du bsgom// sangs rgyas thams cad rigs bcu rung ngas// dgas brgya ba rdzus pas
143a2(rnying rgyud): dras// rigs lnga rdo rje'i rigs su 'dus// rgyal ba rigs lnga la sogs pa// thabs kyi phyag rgya ma lus kun// chos sgra rdo rjer ro gcig pas// ji ltar snang ba de ltar yin// de ltar rgyal ba gcig bsgoms pas// gcig nyid med la kun gyi dang // rnal 'byor
143a3(rnying rgyud): 'di ldan na// bde gshegs ma bsgoms gang yang med// rjes gsungs so// pas chen rigs ga sdig bsgrub pa'i le lce ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// skrag srang thugs kyi sgrub thabs 'di// khyang par mi
143a4(rnying rgyud): mthun bye brag rnams// rang bzhin gcig la gsum tshang ba// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'dus// skye med shes rab dbyings sde dang // mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i don// 'gro don rdo rje sems dpar bshad// chos rnams thams cad 'gro ba mtha' dag ni// skye med don dam
143a5(rnying rgyud): dbyings su gcig pas// de nyid dus gsum rgyal ba'i chos nyid de// kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa'i dang // de lta bu yi/ de ni// rang rig ye shes 'du 'bral med// rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin yin// zhes gzungs sa// rdo rje sems dpa'i dang bzhin pas/

143a7(rnying rgyud): gsum sems can dag/ hUM ni khams gsum sems can yid// oM gyis lus kyi sgrib pa byung // AM gaMs ngag gi sgrib pa sbyang // phyogs yid kyi sgrib pa sbyang // oM gyis sgra yi dngos grub thob// A gis gsung gi dngos grub thob// hUM gis thugs kyi

144a2(rnying rgyud): sa pa/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi/ dbus dang bcas pa/ gzhal yas khang du grub pa'o// dkyil 'khor bzhi'i phyi rol yang / phyi khyams sgo bzhi sgo rgyun dang bcas par gyur to// de'i gyi rim rak+ta khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khor yug gi kyi la rdo rje'i ra ba dang /
144a3(rnying rgyud): me'i me dpung gi 'khor yug dang ldan par gyur to// de lta bu'i gzhal yas khang de yang gyi thod pa rnam gsum gyi brtsig pa/ nang dur khrod kyi rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa phyi rol na drar khrod kyi gnas brgyad mod pa/ de lta bu'i dung khrod kyi gzhal yam khang de'i dbu
144a4(rnying rgyud): che mchog he ru ka dang / yum khro mo gnam zhal ma gnyis gnas pa las yang yum gnyis kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi sprul pa las/ shar du thugs kyi sbal pa badz+ra ha ru ka dang / lhor su'i sprul pa gshin rje gshed po dang / nub tu gsung
144a5(rnying rgyud): sprul pa pad+ma dbang gi rgyal po dang / byang du smin pas kyi sprul pa rdo rje gzhon nu dang / shar lhong yon tan gyi sprul pa bla med he ru ka dang / nub byang du 'jigs pa'i stobs las sprul pa dregs pa kun 'dul dang / byang shang du brjed pa'i stobs kyi skal pa

144b1(rnying rgyud): don byas dag tanan gdum nas// gnag su / sa pas / sams zugs thams pa 'o// / ba da gas drug pa dru/ na
144b2(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshig dmas// gas pas ba sa pa'i dru rnams// bas thale ba na kya smras// sangs rgya thug pa rdza thos pa ni// thams cid dgas pa'i mchog yin// 'jigs byed byed da kyi
144b3(rnying rgyud): bka' bzhin pa skyed pa nga rgyug/ dang ba zlab 'i sgrub pa'i gnas// drud khrod chen por 'i 'jigs mi// gdug pa'i srin 'dra ba'am// gcan gzan 'dab chags thos pa'i sa// gnanas ga sums gnas pa// rab tu rigs pa gang phyin
144b4(rnying rgyud): gas kyo bdag po mchod pa'i phyir// gtod migatang zhing klung sung spyod// bden pa bdar zhing bka' yang ba s+ho// sasrungs bka' phrogs pasod nanas pasngags// khyi mtshams brgyad cing dan srin nan// blo zung gdags shing dkyil 'khor porjon
144b5(rnying rgyud): 'i tshiganag nga bya/ sa sa drug sams gas pa sa byung ba / pa rnamam pan/ na dngas pa / sa kyi sa pa dkyi' 'bar //

144b7(rnying rgyud): 'i ga/ nga rtsi ba cig ces dag gings nipa me kyi // bri byar bying nga ga sa bya// brgyang 'angs ba 'argyabs mye pa// bani gas 'jog kyi'i phyog sa sngo
145a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil ba pa dag gang bzhin pa// khams rnags lan ba gas// brdeg pa la shAng dkan sa dam ts+tshang// 'ad la mas sa dam gragasapa// drabargya rgyad pa mad la mda' la 'dzud//
145a2(rnying rgyud): sa mangs pa tshan// tsharol dkal mamatshad ma // rdorje'i dab mthod dag la// mang 'brang ba dmar ser ro// de lta dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ pa 'grwar yang dgrag// bas ta ma phreng bas bas// bad+ma'i na pa 'dud
145a3(rnying rgyud): byi'i// ral bri bzhi dang phur pa bzhi// dkyil 'khor chun du dgram par bya// b+han+ta dgu dang mar mdag// snar pa dgra la~M sogs pa drug ma// 'jigs kyad chen po'i dkyil 'khar yin// zhes gsungs so// rje mo rol pa'i srub tha'as kyi
145a4(rnying rgyud): tshan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi la\u0f89\u0fa4 nye shAHgnyis pa'o// / de nas yang dag des gsungs pa// dzan las nyams sa za ba ni// deng pa mtshams bcad bgegs bskrad la// rgyasas mtshams 'jig tan lha gas la// bda' ra na
145a5(rnying rgyud): bda' phyag 'tshal// dam paca byin dbab bshags pa bya// mchod rdzas byin gyis brlabs shing dbul// de nas ting 'dzin rim pa bzhin// dang po de bzhin nyid bsgom pa// chos rnams sems kyi rang bzhin te// gdod nas ma skyes stong par bskod //
145a6(rnying rgyud): kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin// khyab pa'i snying rje sems can don// yodra la khyab par bsgom par bya// de nas chu li ting nge 'dzin// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba// thugs kar hUM dang ldan par bsgom// de las yaM khaM gsam gyis// dngos dang
145a7(rnying rgyud): mtshan mi bsreg gtar bkrus// mthing nag e yi nam mkha' la// rgya gram rlung gi 'khor lo chags// mak+ta khrag gi rgya mtshor 'khyil// zhing chen 'bar ba'is gzhir chags// 'byung brjod snyoms me dpung 'bar// keng dus chen po'i rab
145b1(rnying rgyud): bcig/ spug nag rnaMs 'gro 'du las// dur khrod can pa'i gzhal yas khang // pho brang dkyil 'khor dgu pa la// kun kyang 'khor ma rtsibs bzhid mangs// grwa chad khams dang na ba khri ldan// rtsi khams skra dang du khyung dang // b+had da rbang
145b2(rnying rgyud): ngur khrod rgyan dang chas kyis bi rgyan// gyi nang med par gsal ba yi// ye shes ldan grub gzhal yas bsgom// de dbus byol song gtso brgyad khrir// ye shes sems dpa' babs pa las// spro ban+de'i cho ga gsum spor bas// tshe mchog te rung spar gsal babyed//
145b3(rnying rgyud): spuganag 'bar ba la// dbuni nye sh+'u \u0f7f gcig la// phyag ni bzhi bcurtsa gnyis gdengs// phyagan bud+ha bzhi bcu gnyis// zhabs brgyad bsrad pas gdan bcud gnon// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i chos brgyad gsol// rngom brjed chen po'i spang bsgom// ga ro rtsig
145b4(rnying rgyud): byaM 'thos 'dus las// oM mog nam zhal dbyings phyeg ma// dbu dang / phyag kyang bco brgya dang // khams chen pa rbab rkyad da bcad nas// sbyong pa bco brgyad dbyings la sbyor// g.yas pa thabs mchog gcol 'khyud// g.yon bdung dmar gtsal stob/

145b6(rnying rgyud): mkha' las khro bo 'tshal pa sgos/ ts+tshin+na ts+tshats+tsha/ bi shwa tho d+ha dzA la maN+Da la ha la ha la banra pan+tu/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs mtshams nas// bdud dang bregs pa d+yA ta rnams// thugs rje tshad med kyis bskal nas// mgrong chung ma mngang mo rnams//
145b7(rnying rgyud): bsdus nas bka' tan gyur// 'khor ba tses ma lus dbang du bsdus// de nas tshwa zon smin bslus nas// phyogs pazhi mtshams bzhir 'dus pa las// ma so'i rigs kyi gtso bor gsal// btsun mo khrag 'thung yum rnams kyang // sa so'i sbrul 'khrol
146a1(rnying rgyud): bar bsgom// de nas dbus kyi gtso bo ni// che mchog yab yum thugs ka nas// ye ge d+h+r-i gi 'phro 'du las// shar du rak+ShA ha ru ka/ rak+Sha kro d+hi shA d+he yum// lho ru gra h+ya ha ru ka/ ku h+ya kro d+hI shwa rI yum// rngub tu bi sh+tsa he ru ka
146a2(rnying rgyud): be shwa kro d+hI shwa rI yum// byang du ya kA he ru ka/ yak+ka kro d+hI shwa rI yum// dkyil 'khor bar khams phyogs mtshams su// shar du dri za 'dul byed lha// lho ru gshin rje 'dul byed do// nub tu klu gdon 'dul byed la// bya'i du gnod sbyin 'dul byed do// shar
146a3(rnying rgyud): lhor me lha 'dul byed la// lho nub srin po 'dul byed do// nub byang rlung lha 'dul byed la// byang shar dbang ldan 'dul byed do// steng phyogs lha gdon 'dul byed la// 'og phyogs sa bdag 'dul byed do// sgo bzhir mthar byed sgo ba bzhi// shar du pradz+nyAn+ta kra ta la//
146a4(rnying rgyud): lho ru ya pAn+ta kr-ita do// nub tu pad+mA D+ha kri ta la// byad du bi g+had+ha kr-ita do// phyi rim ljags ri nag po la// bka' srung ce spyang ma brgyad de// che mchog lha tshogs nyi shu bzhi// gtso 'khor bka' srung bcas pa bsgom// shar gyi dkyil 'khor chen po ru// gtso bo
146a5(rnying rgyud): he ru ka/ badz+ra kr-i d+hI shwa rI yum// yab yum gnyis kyi thugs ka nas// yi ge hUM gi 'phro 'du las// shar du bud+d+ha he ru ka/ bud+d+ha kro d+h+we shwa rI yum// lho ru rat+na ha ru ka/ rat+na kro d+hi tA rI yum// nub tu pad+ma he ru ka/ pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI yum// brang du
146a6(rnying rgyud): kar+m+ma he ru ka/ ke mi kr-i d+hI shA dI yum// dkyil 'khor bar khyams phyogs mtshams su// shar du go rI s+yed+ha gnyis// lho ruHrI b+ha glai gnyis// nub tu prA mo ste le gnyis// byed du bid+da shA na gnyis// shar lhor pra ka pra d+he gnyis// lho nu ba g+has+dza kaH
146a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis// nub byang spa sha kA ka gnyis// byang shar tsat+ta u lu gnyis// dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir gdong mo bzhi// shar du rta gdeng lcags kyu ma// lho sgor phag gdong zhags pa ma// nub tu sbal gdong lcags srog ma// byang du spang gdong thal gyad ma/

146b2(rnying rgyud): yum gnyis med byin rlabs las// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gshed chen bzhi// shar du ya ma rA dza dang // sbyor yum g.yu yi ral gcig ma// spol yum nam gu re ma ti// lho ru myos byed 'bar ba dang // sbyor yum gtum ma ser nag ma// srol yul khrag gi

146b5(rnying rgyud): nag ral gcig ma// shar lhor a ba glang mgo dang // yum du drad srod dkar skya ma// lho nub gshin rje mig dmar la// yum du khrag gi rwal gcig ma// nub byang gshin rje tel pa dang // yum du rlung lha spyan gsum ma// byang shar chos kyi rgyal

149b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i bzlas pa bya// oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka d+hA phaT/ ai ru lu ru la g+hur+m+ma hrI hrITe/ oM a kr-i ti ka pa na cu gtan manr-ib+h+yar+yA hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-ita badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya k+ki ba hUM Ta/ i dzA kI pa~M kI la yas rba bits+tsha ba hUM phaT/ oM gr-i h+ye na shwe he dra ka ba dz+nyAn kro nA
150a1(rnying rgyud): lam / sa/ ba sa kun d+hA ma sa su d+d+ha bsangs na/ sa / rags thags na du/
150a2(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi 'od zer spro bsdu bya// ke rudu spo bsdu byed pa'i tshe// yang dag sna tshogs thugs ka nas// sngags kyi 'od zer spob lnga bya// g+ho d+ha b+h+yo bsdu byed pa'i tshe// gshin rje lha tshogs thugs ka nas// sngags kyi 'o zer sgro bas bya// nub tu
150a3(rnying rgyud): bcu byed pa'i tshe/ dbang chen lha tshogs thugs kur bya// byang du slob snga byed pa'i tshe// phur pa'i lha tshogs thugs kar bya// shar sbyor slobasde byed pa'i tshe// ma mo'i lha tshogs thugs kar b+ha// lho nub spobasdu byed pa'i tshe// reg 'dzin
150a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs thugs kar bya// nub byang spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// dregs 'dul lha tshogs thugs kar bya// byang shar spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// stobs ldan nag po yab yum gyi// thugs kar sngags kyi spro bsdu bya// bsnyen bsgrub lo zla zhag srogs bslab/
150a5(rnying rgyud): rtags dang mtshon ma byung ba dang // dngos grub rim gyis blang bar bya// dus bzhir tshogs dang gtor ma gtong // lhag ma gtong zhing brtan ma skyong // dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing smon lam gdab// phrin las las kyi 'tshad rnams// gang 'ded bya ba bslab
150a6(rnying rgyud): par gsungs// zhes gsungs so// rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsum gyi skabs te bzhi pa'o// / de nas spyi pa la kun bzang he ru ka la/ 'khor gyi rig 'dzin rnams kyis zhus pa/
150a7(rnying rgyud): emaho skye dpal he ru ka/ gsang sngags ni bro rgya mtshol// sngags kyi bye brag bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang // spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// rdo rje dbyings kyi ste tshogs
150b1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi sa pa bsnan // / smras/ rnas sams/ dran pa ba sum pa sags/ man / // r+dz+dza/ dz+dza/ //
150b2(rnying rgyud): nye sha d+ha/ ga kyi/ ta ti/ bi rAd ti/ haM/ rigs rdzi snyam pa'i rdzogs so// rung ba/ waM stag sgrub pa/ ba ma ma/ k+Sha kr-i d+hi/ pa mahA A
150b3(rnying rgyud): mr-i shrI e rA gA ye sid+d+ha/ sems dpa brjod rtsin pa'i sngags/ hUM la sngas mya la s+t+waM/ traM mA l+ye sa ma sa swaM/ hU~M sIr ti dgo ha/ e ni ra ti rAka sa ma yA pa/ dzaHd+hU pe pr-i bA sha/ trA~M prab+h+re swa be sha/ bai dI pa suM ga re//
150b4(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyirtsa ba'i sngags/ oM mu ni kroswASh+Ta/ oM na swAH/ oMt+ma hrI/ oM s+yA br-i swAH/ oM mu ne hrI sad+d+ha/ oM mun ye swAH/ thub padrug gi nu ba'i sngags so// oM yA mnatakr-i phaH/ oM hA na phaT/ oM dz+dza b+h+yaH8
150b5(rnying rgyud): btsun pat+ta phuH/ e ma hA badz+ra d+hA ra ma hA kr-i thI shwa nI dz+wa la hU~M hrIH/ A~M ma hU~M bid+hi ti ma hA kro hAM shwa dI dz+wa la nI gr-I phaH/ oM bad+yA d+ha ma hA kro d+b+had+d+ha shwa rI dz+wa la nA h+nA bane/ e mra hA kAm d+har ma dz+nyA kro d+he shwa r-I dz+wa la n+yai hU~M phaT/ sgo ba yAb yum sngags so// rdo rje
150b6(rnying rgyud): rgya ba \u0f7f lub / ga tan gyil rdzogs kyi sngags pa shad / b+h+yA man+tak+Shad+ha thAH/ ma/ the mA chog tu drug yab sam kyi ba mags / shAm /
150b7(rnying rgyud): hrihrIHhe ru ka hU~M phaT/ oM shrI ma hA bi shwa he draka hU~M phaT/ oM hrI ma hA pag sha he ru ka hU~M phaT/ reg bzhi lab gyi rtse ba'i sngags so// e rak+Sha kr-id+b+ha shwa rA hU~M phaT/ e b+huH kro d+d+he shwa rI hU~M phaT/ oM bai shu kro d+de bA rI hU~M phaT/ oM la ka sha kro d+hI bra~M nI hU~M dzaH/
151a1(rnying rgyud): rigs bzhi yum gyi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA kro d+ha ga ra dza gar dza hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha ha na tan hUM phaT/ oM ma dAkro d+had ha da ha hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha pa tsa patsa hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM ma lA kro d+ha tA lu hra lu hU~M phaT/
151a2(rnying rgyud): oM ma hA kro d+ha tiSh+Tha teSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha tshin+da tsen+da hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha d+hin+da hrIn+da hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/ dreg pa 'dul ba khro bo bcu'i rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA kro d+ha ya mAn ta~M ka~M ta hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha pradz+nyA na kr-ita hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha @
151a3(rnying rgyud): kre hUM phaT/ oM big+h+nAn+ta ka~M ta hU~M phaT/ ta kr-ita k+ko ba bzhi'i rtsa ba'i sngags so// tshe mchog yon tan gyi lha tshogs kyi rtswa sngags kyi lce'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / yang dag thugs kyi sna tshogs kyi rtsa sngags bshad pa ni/ oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM ra
151a4(rnying rgyud): bA rI hU~M phaT/ badz+ra he ru ka yab yum rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha shi he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM rat+na shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM kar+m+ma shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ rigs bzhi khrag 'thung rtsu ba'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha kro d+ha~M shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM
151a5(rnying rgyud): shA rI hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kro d+hi shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM karma kro d+hi shwa rI hUM phaT/ khra ga zung yum bzhirna pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra go rI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tsau rI hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra pra mo hA hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bi ti lI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra puk+ka sI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra g+ha sa pa rI hUM
151a6(rnying rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+ra sma sha ni hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra tsan+ta lI hUM phaT/ go rI brgyad kyi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra sed ha mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra b+hA g+h+ra mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra shI gA la mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra shwa na mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gr-i d+d+ha mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra
151a7(rnying rgyud): k+Sha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kA ka r+m+ma hU~M Ta/ oM badz+ra lu lug pu khA hU~M Ta/ phra men brgyad kyi rgya ba'i sngags so// ma badz+ra mA te ti dzaH/ oM badz+ra a mu kha n+tu/ e badz+ra la ka ba/ oM brjo sman pa le la btun// slob bzhi'i rtsa ba'i sngags /

152a1(rnying rgyud): bstan pa bang gnyi tham brgyad pa'o// / bajugasang gi snyotshogs kyi sngags 'badud/ oM badzam nan t+ta ta ya kI wa byAl hU wA thA / ma 'jun/ gra ma sa rnamam /
152a2(rnying rgyud): d+hU / oM badz+ra ba ga shwa ta mu / badz+ra dbang chen lab byam pas dang kyi bzhi'i sngags/ oM par+b+ba ga ta tan tan hU~M Ta/ oM badz+ra mA dzA kro tad ta da ha hU~M dz+dzaH/ oM badz+ra kro ta pa~M tsag d+hA Ta/ oM 'gro smr-i ti hU~M ba/ oM b+ha dz+rag tu bsta
152a3(rnying rgyud): nga dzin+da hU phaT/ u ng+kA oM tag drug/ oM kro/ k+Sho Ta hU~M phaT+Te/ zil gnon khrob brgyad kyi rdzogs so// oM gr-i ts+tsha gad+hAnA~M/ oM ng+ge \u0f7f/ oM rA ga rbo d+hat+ta/ oM tsi d+ha dr-id+had+ha/ badz+rag hrIH/ aM ye ma praH
152a4(rnying rgyud): nA ga hrIM hU~M/ oM yig mo kro d+hI hA/ zil gnon khro mo brgyad kyi sngags so// shrI badz+rA aM ku shA dzaH/ hrIHbadz+ra pA she hUM/ hrIHbadz+ra tsa Ta phreM/ \u0f7fbadz+ra hoH/ dbang chen sgo ba bzhi'i sngags so// dbang chen lha tshogs kyi sngags bstan par
152a5(rnying rgyud): nyi shu rtse dgu pa'o// / phur pa phrin las kyi sngags bshad pa/ oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya shrI krA ma ra hUM phaT/ oM ta b+hi tsakra ru lu ru wa b+h+yo/ rdo rje gzhon na yab yum rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM rat+na kI lA ya hU~M phaT/

152a7(rnying rgyud): tsal hU~M phaT/ i badz+ra krota ha ya shrI la laT/ oM ba dz+ra kro sa par dza thAphaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa rbata kri / ma N+Di rjel sa dza la hrIHTe/ a badz+ra d+ha m-i hA pa la hU~M // rnga bra lab bcu rtse rdzogs sa/ oM bi d+da krad+hA
152b1(rnying rgyud): u / A / / thA / s+yA ba ga rnams paH/ a AH/ ma n+d+has/ sa san+tan+nataH/ d+d+ha swA //

152b4(rnying rgyud): mra ShISh+Ta/ oM badz+ra titI la mu dz+dza d+hI/ oM badz+ri na ku la mu Shi wa~M/ oM badz+ra ma Ni kar+m+ma NA~MhU~M/ gsod byed ma bcu'i rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra lag shi ta ts+tsha/ oM badz+ra ba ya pra hU~M/ oM badz+ra ba ya ta hU~M/ oM badz+ra ma raNad+ha/ sgo ba bzhi'i rtsa snga

152b6(rnying rgyud): bla med he ru kA ya ba su m+b+ha rtsa ba'i sngags so// 'gri ba mu hU~M hA/ dz+wa la ram pa hA/ sha s+yAn ti ha/ b+h+rUM yang yang ti ha/ ma hA la~M ta ha~M/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga'i \u0f7fsngags so// oM badz+ra kr-id+hi shwa rI thA ga bad+ma n+ya hU~M nA~M/ oM 'dza shin tad dzin
152b7(rnying rgyud): ts+tshats+tsha/ oM r+tha pr-i thA/ oM nan sh+lok+Sha/ ba gdun // btsun r+m+mAH/ a mra sU r+ya dza ti ma ta ra/ oM badz+ra na ta ma ta la/ oM bat+pa ba rag ci ta ma te me/ i badz+ra sring 'gro ta ma ta ma/ oM rdzas gam zh-in+da/

153a4(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi le'u ste sum cu so gcig pa'o// / de nas slob dpon rig 'dzin gyi sngags bshad pa/ oM badz+ra ku ru hUM/ oM rat+na gu ru hU~M/ oM pad+ma gu ru hUM/ oM kar+tha g+ha ru guM/ oM badz+ra yo gi ts+tshihU~M/ oM rat+na yo ge hrI hU~M/ oM padz+ra yo gr-in+d+hi hU~M/ oM karma
153a5(rnying rgyud): gi nI hUM/ rig 'drin brgyad kyi rtsa ba'i sngags so// rig 'dzin rtsa sngags kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'jig rten gyi lha tshogs kyi sngags bshad pa/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA na hUM phaT/ dregs pa kun 'dul yab yum gyi rtsa sngags so//
153a6(rnying rgyud): o bstu pa e dzaHb+h+yo/ u ma de ba e dzeHb+h+yo/ ya ma ya dzAHb+h+yo/ ya man dan ti ya na g+ho/ du khrag du dza b+h+yo/ dun ting du dza dz+ha/ rak+Sha rA dzaSh+To/ rak+ko radzaHb+h+yo/ yak+Sha k+Sha dza dz+yaM/ yaMg mo k+Sha dza s+yo/ rA hu pa pa tsa d+yo/ a se la a dza b+h+yo/ nA
153a7(rnying rgyud): bung tshwa/ nA ga kro N+De shwa hI phu po b+h+yo/ de ba a b+h+yo/ tri pa sha si tr-i u sh+tsa/ tig sde 'dre rum rtsa marba d+ha/ ma mdul mdzo dz+ya/ e ka na te ngag b+h+yo/ d+ha ki ni lam bcoM/ ru tran+sa mu r+ya/ a bi shuSh+ya dza d+yo/ nyi shaM tri dza sh+tsa/ bi n+da ya ga su

153b5(rnying rgyud): si / g-i saSh+Ta/ a br-i Sh+Ti/ sonan b+h+yo/ de naH/ ra / btA seM b+h+yo/ rat+ti ban 'o// dr-i ma// man sasbyin to/ bAy+YaSh+T+r-IH/ marnam / 'ang+kaD+h+we/ ASh+Ti k+Sh+ma/ bar sh+tsaH/ d+d+he/
153b6(rnying rgyud): pa ru dz+haiM/ mahA kA lIb+h+yAM/ tsA kA la b+h+yo/ kum+ba kaHd+h+r-i/ l-its+tshe dar b+h+yo/ dpeng phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi sngags so// badz+ra d+h+r-i kin+tib+h+yo/ rash+mi kau nI b+h+yo/ pad+ma DA ki n+ni b+h+yAM/ karmaT+Ta kin+thib+h+yAM/ mkha' 'gro ma sum cu rtswa gnyis kyi sngags so// badz+ra king+ka ra
153b7(rnying rgyud): rat+na ki kir b+h+yo/ bi dz+ra kaun gyi/ karba ki ne+e rgya/ ga pho bcob byad kyi sngags so// s+'u r+b+ba ts+tsha/ dz+wA la a g+ni b+h+yo/ dz+wa la ya mAH/ dri li kr-i Sh+T+r-iH/ dra la harAH/ dz+wal la ma tik+Shab+h+yo/ dz+wa la ya rdzag ru margyo/ dz+wa la ya k+ka bA ru NAb+h+yo/ 'bar ma brgya
153b8(rnying rgyud): dmar ma gyi sor bzhag
154a1(rnying rgyud): mak+Sha shA \u0f7f/ la sa/ ma ma / sgyum / rgyum / / ma \u0f7f/ ma /
154a2(rnying rgyud): mato/ phreng mo bzhi'i rdzogs so// badz+rad b+ha y-iH/ rab+ha ShA / brjod na y-iH/ ka me s+ho/ 'dag thub pa 'thob rgya kyi rdzogs so// 'jol sa pa gyi/ rarnams paco/ dbralas pa \u0f7f/ klu mangs //
154a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs so// oMnA ma madz+dza/ a shrI ma mA / ya ma man+to/ reg she mtho/ nag mA ma tsho/ g.ya po ma ma/ yag sha mA mab+ho/ sdig mA mtho/ de ba mAm b+h+yo/ g+sa mam tho/ sbal ma maH/ ma sa ma maH/ dran ci mim// ngag sa

154a5(rnying rgyud): srung gis sgrog gi snyid pa phul ba/ badz+ra shAn gca b+ha/ badz+ram d+ha sa mad+ho/ badz+radat+tabadz+rad+hi/ badz+rA makA rA ya la b+h+yo/ bAdz+ra n+d+he d+he badz+re nI kats+tshe/ bang po ta ni kar+No// ka ni ka tsa te bad / badz+ra'i ti sti sa / me mchog yon tan gyi bka' srung
154a6(rnying rgyud): mya brgyad kyi srog spyong gi le'u ste so drug pa'o// / de nas yang dgazugs kyi bku' srung srin mony+tsi thartsa brgyad kyis srog gi snying po rdulta ba/ dzA mar mu b+h+yo/ thAg si rmA k+ShaH/ d+hUthAsru~M ho/ na pAl r+b+ba Sh+T+ri / hU~M dz+wal bu to//

154b1(rnying rgyud): su \u0f7f/ kA hA / ga las// na sa / gan sa pa/ thu thog ga sa btsun pa// / nganas 'dum dpal tha / nga rnams kyis rgan na lag
154b2(rnying rgyud): 'gre kang/ kam gsa~M ka ma da ka NA~M/ mra dag bam/ t+ya shwa rba tra ma ra ya/ rba thun la/ rag sha thun ya/ mi thogs gli sh+tha zhis phul ba'o// bdun tri nir zung / ya tri nir zung / tsipa la ni dbyung / ni dbyu /
154b3(rnying rgyud): b+ha b+he/ ngan ni/ sho ma tri/ dran / mar la thi dzaH/ ya yA/ zing zing / khyu ma thogs bdud bzhi'i srog/ sngags so// dzo tani tro ta ni hU~M phaT/ par+b+ba pa tra hU~M phaT/ shu la shu la hU~M phaT/ b+ha sha d+hi ba d+ha sha ShA ba hU~M phaT/ sho thogs kyis pa'i srog sdu
154b4(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra d+ha ra li/ badz+ra snying go chod/ kha la mu zan da lo dun ting d+ha rA la rbad/ oM badz+ra brag ti tig d+har rbad/ oM badz+ra tsakra ru tri da ra ma thad/ oM badz+ra shu tri dA ri tra~M ya badz+re hU~M phaT/ zad su bdas/ rbad du rbad dre/ da ra ka sha/ shA pa ma ma/ nad
154b5(rnying rgyud): shwan pa/ drag po gza'i shAn pa/ glen pa mu'i shan pa/ myos pa btsan gyi shan pa bzhi'i srog sngags so// 'jam dpal spu'i bka' srung gi srog snying gi le'u wAM sum nu so brgyad pa'o// / de nas padz+ra gsung dge bka' spang rnam ces srog
154b6(rnying rgyud): hi phul la/ bar+d+ha badz+ra oM/ sarba badz+rA d+hi/ rat+na badz+ra tAM/ d+ha ra ma badz+ra hrIH/ karma badz+ra ha/ g+ha h+ye badz+ra phaT/ kha ma rgyu ma drug gi srog sngags so// oM sho ri khA hi sho ri kha N+Di hU~M phaT/ dmus long bcu drug gi sngags so// dIp+ta tsakra shwa na mu kha
154b7(rnying rgyud): kha long kha/ ku ku rA tsa rag sha kha long ka hU~M phaT/ khyi brgyad sbyang brgyad kyi sngags so// hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ traM hUM phaT/ hrI hUM phaT/ ha hUM phaT/ pho nya bzhi'i srog sngags so// do na la te co ra ma/ yak+sha ku pan rdo hU~M phaT/ me 'brug rlung 'jug
155a1(rnying rgyud): srog sngags so// pad+ma gsung gi bkang srung gi srog sngags kyi le'u ste sum buso dgu pa'o// / phur pa phrin las lha tshogs ste bka' lung gi sog gi snying brdul ba/ ma sun taH ti / a badz+raHmun
155a2(rnying rgyud): oM shu la da ri dza dza hUM/ oM ka mun da ri dza dza NA~M/ ma mo bzhi'i srog sngags so// oM shUn mu kha dza dza nAM/ oM shA na mu kha dza dza hUM/ oM br-i ka mu kha dza dzA traM/ oM sli gA la mu kha dzadzadz+dza/ shwa na bzhi'i thog sngags so// oM ta d+ya D+ha/ tra
155a3(rnying rgyud): ru bi ru pi nan mug ti bi ma ru lu dz+wa lu d+yo/ oM pad+ma da ri ru ma ti b+h+yo/ Sh+T+r-iHt+tadAkri dza snying la d+ho/ oM ru lu kol+la me se na me nan dza dzaH/ oM lug te ru ru tsa ba la me dza dzaH/ re ma ti mched bzhi'i srog sngags so// srog N+Da la ye ma ya ma/ stong rtsal sgrim
155a4(rnying rgyud): srog rtsal chum chum/ tse d+ha srog pa tung dung / snying khrag shad bu ma ri li li rtsegs rtsegs/ bur 'ur/ shig shig/ gul gul/ myag myab/ sod sod/ d+ha ti ma ma shrI d+h+r-i karma kA ra ya/ mA ra sin pra marda ni hUM phaT/ ba se'i skyes bu bzhi bdud pa
155a5(rnying rgyud): ging bzhi'i srog sngags so// gcig tu dril ba'o// phur pa zin las kyi bka' srang rnams kyi srog sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas ma mo rgod gtong gi bka' srung rnam kyis srog snying phul ba/ spyi ting kha la ma/ snying nga rag
155a6(rnying rgyud): ra ga sha ma/ snying kha rag dza dza/ rag mo rag sha snying kha rag dza dza/ yang ga ba ma bzhi'i srog sngags so// ru lu snying khrag kha rag kha la rag sha ni rbad zu ma ri li li/ snying la rag sha na/ sha ti zad bu ma ri li li/ tr-i sha ku ru rag sha kha ra ma ni/ ku
155a7(rnying rgyud): kha tha ma/ trag rag sha kha mu nA/ snying kha rag no/ phung byed sbas pa'i ma bzhi'i sog sngags so// ma ma rag mo snying rtsa la ma g+ho/ rag mo rag mo ru ru ro ru tsakra la dgra bo snying la rag mo ste/ rag mo rag mo tsam tsam ma/ rag mo rag mo khag la mu sha
155b1(rnying rgyud): zong nag gdang mo bzhir srog sngags so// drag rag sha mu rba kyo/ ru lu ru lu ma dag mo/ snying kha dag tu/ ru lu r+ya wam ma snying gzer drag rag sha thun to/ ma ma thag sha sgrog gzer thun zad rtsi/ ma mthag dag ga nga thag cang thum thum N+Da/ zla ga na
155b2(rnying rgyud): dbang gi bdag mo do kha ma bzhi'i grog sngags so// rba ni dun te ru la ya dza/ du ru dz+wa la ni tan dza/ ru ma rim ha he rdo rdo dzaM/ 'brung khung las kyi bdag mi las kyi 'bar ma tshos kyi ma mo nag mo phung gsum ma'i srog sngags ma// bu ma rug shin tri rbad/
155b3(rnying rgyud): rang drang la/ rba dram d+hi rgyad la/ bu la rba chu ba nga/ skyes n+ta sa ni la dang pa/ shrA ba nub pa/ rgyu mtsham rba ya/ nang pa na phyu shAg pa rda dang/ rag gabrum rmugs rbad pa/ d+han d+hi nAng pa/ srog seng gi bdag ma gsung ba ma gas
155b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba bo nya gsum kyi srog sngags so// pa mai rgod rkyong gi srog sngags kyi parda ste bzhibacun gcig pa'o// / de nas slob dpon kyi bka' srung kyi grog sa gas bral ba/ oM badz+rA n+ta ki na hU~M/ oMr Sh+Ta ka~M ts+tshadz+dza/ oM badz+radz+ra kanA nA/ oM ka rba NA
155b5(rnying rgyud): mkha' na sde bzhi 'i srog sngags so// ming rje gang kar rA \u0f7f/ oM dz+ra ra dking / ra A \u0f7f/ oM padz+ra king ka ra rA s+t+wa~M/ a~M ka rma kaM kar rAn / dpa' ba sde ni zlog sngags so// reg 'dzin ge thung ba srog sngags kyi ma khri sde ba'i bcu
155b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'o// 'jig rten 'das pa dang 'jig rten pa'i bka' srung gi sngags bstan pa'i byes te ldang ngo // / de nas skyed pal chen po nye ruka la/ phyogs bcu rig 'dzin rnams kyis nus pa/ e dpal te/ bde gshegs bslab
155b7(rnying rgyud): bka' brgyad kyi// lho tshogs de tho thams cad kyi// phru mdog phyag mtshon bsnyen du gsol// de skad gsol ba gas na nas kyang // sgo dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// tog cig 'dus pa'i chags chen rnams// che mchog yon tan ngas pa
156a1(rnying rgyud): la// gco po dpal chen che mchog rtemag/ 'jigs pad+ma dpra ni/ shAHgzug la// skal pa lhag ni bzhi bcu rtsaganasaH// zhabras kyang dor byabs rnam pa brgyad dra bathun// spyan phyag naga' ba dang shin tu nga
156a2(rnying rgyud): rdza ba dag la ni sku yi mdog dang mtshungs// dbus kyi dbu drug mthing 'jams// g.yas kyi rtsazhal dkar la 'tshor// g.yon gyi rtsa zhal dmar la gdangs// g.yas kyi gnyis pa sngol gtsugs// g.yon gyi gnyis pa ldang la rnams// ga
156a3(rnying rgyud): gyi gsum pa dkar la gdangs// g.yon gyi gsum pa dmar la 'brel// g.yas kyi bzhi pa nag la gtsigs// g.yon gyi bzhi pa ldang la 'tsher// g.yas kyi lnga pa dkar la bzhad// g.yon gyi lnga pa dmar la ga she// g.yas kye drug pa rje lag

156a5(rnying rgyud): rnams bsnams// thab drug spel mar bsdams pa // bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi dang pon// byed pa yid ni rdo rje kun bzang bsnams// bzhi bcwa rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi dang po na// byab chos ni kun bzang mata mu ga zhag 'gro// bzhi bcu rtsa gces g.yas
156a6(rnying rgyud): kyi gnyis pan// rnam pa snyed mdzad chos kyi dakhor lo bskor// bzhi bcwa rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi gnyis pa na// kun tu khyab pa dbyings phyug dril bu bsdams// bzhi brgya rtsa gnyis/ yas kyi gsum pan// rdo rje sems dpa' me bstod rdo rje bsnams/
156a7(rnying rgyud): bzhi bdun gnyis g.yon gyi gsum sa ni// bskyed mdzad sangs rgyas spyan yang drong tshugs bsdams// bzhi badz+ra rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bzhipa ni// rin chen 'byung ldan ser po mchod sbyin re slong bsdams// bzhi bcwartsa gnyis g.yon gyi bzhi pa na// phud
156b1(rnying rgyud): nga nang drugs parnams// 'brang sagasus stso bas/ dus dmas bla pa bskams// pa nas sapan byagrub // bdag sa dasus dgyur ba bcwams// bdas blas gas drags/
156b2(rnying rgyud): ba pi mthar byin gyi tham bsnams// bzhi brgya rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi drug pa ni// spyod byed dam chog sgrol ma At+pal bsnams// bzhi brgyartsa gnyis g.yas kyi bdun pa na// sa steng dkar po rin chen mya gru bsnams// bzhi bcwan gnyis g.yon gyi badren pan//
156b3(rnying rgyud): dkar mo me ldong rgya gram ba snams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi brgyad pa ni// nam mkha'i snying po gcod byed rul gri bsdams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi brgyad pan// mA la sngon mo rin chen phreng bri bsdams// bzhi bcurtsa gnyis g.yas kyi dgu pa na//
156b4(rnying rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag nupad+ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi dgu pa na// gI ra ti dmar mo pi wang rgyud 'dren bsdams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu pa na// phyag na rdo rje 'joms byed rdo rje bsdams// bzhi bcwartsa gnyis ga

156b6(rnying rgyud): g.yas kyi bcug nyis na// kun tu bzang po rin chen skye ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu gnyis na// dag pa'i mdangs ldan ma ni me tog bsdams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu gsum na// sgrib pa rnam sel klu shing lo ma bsdams//
156b7(rnying rgyud): bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu gsum na// gsal ba'i 'od ldan mi ni mar me bsdams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu bzhin// 'phags pa 'jam dpal ut+pal mthing ga bsdams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu bzhin// gan te ljang khung dge byed dri chab
157a1(rnying rgyud): bsdams// bzhi bcurtsa gtus g.yas kyib ldan// baid+hita kyati rtson thob bsdums// bzhi pan rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcoldan// drugs dam sbal mdzad ma lugs klu bsnams// bzhi 'du rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi brdudug na// yan
157a2(rnying rgyud): ti ngom byed shod dbyug bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu drug na// gnas nas spyan 'dren ma ni zhags pa bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu bdun na// pad+me ta kr-i ta dral b+hid dgra sgru bsdams// bzhi brdzun gnyis gartson gyi bcu bdunaH/
157a3(rnying rgyud): brtan par bzhugs mdzad ma ni lcags sgrog bsnams// bzhi bcurtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bsngo ba byad na// prahU~Mt+taM kr-ita gcod byed ral gri bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi 'thob kyang na// rtog bral dgyi mdzad ma ni stete bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyi sa g.yas
157a4(rnying rgyud): bcu dgun// lha yi thub pa pi wang chud mangs bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu dgun// byol song thub pa chos 'chad pu sti bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi nyi shun// lha min thub pa thag bzang go cha bsdams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon
157a5(rnying rgyud): na// yi dwags thub po rin chen sbom bu bskams// bzhi brgyam gnyis gsus kyi bri man// mi 'i thub pa shAkya gseg shang bsdams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi tha man// dmyal ba'i thub pa me chub se ladrod bsnams// zhabs brgyad byol songs
157a6(rnying rgyud): dkyang 'dzi sa// stag gzig sing go dom rnams ni// g.yas kyi zhabs pazhi'i 'og tu mnan// glang chen me he n+da srin skul// g.yon gyi 'byas pazhi'i 'og tu mnan// rtse brgyad g.yas kyi zhabs kyis mnan// klu rgyad g.yon gyi zhabs 'og mnar//

157b1(rnying rgyud): gau ti bram thogs brgyad// g.yon cwa sa d+ha zag rdzogs brgyad// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskumal pa dang mthun// yang sum rgyan ni dur khrod rgyas// rtswa bye'u lpags chas 'dral byed pas thab chas// gcan gzun gzig ces sprul pa ni rjong chas// ngan can
157b2(rnying rgyud): sbal ches dpa' bo rtag gims// gzi mdangs mi ljags ches dang dmar gsal khrag gi chos// rtsal chen seng ge'i chas dang gdug pa dom gyi chas// 'jigs pa'i rgyan ches rab tu brgyan pa'o// bcom ldan dbul chenar k+Sha he ru ka/ dbu gsum
157b3(rnying rgyud): grug nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po 'khor lo pad+ma bsnams// bar ma gnyis ni ting rgyu zhugs 'dren// tha ma gnyis na khyud chen ba su 'dren// rak+kha kro d+hI shwa rI sku la 'khril// g.yas pa 'khor lo g.yon pa dung dmar stob// bcom
157b4(rnying rgyud): ldan dpal chen gu h+ya he ru ka/ dbu gsum ser nag mthing dkar dmar ba'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rin chen thod khrag bsnams// b.rad ma gnyis na dgra sta rgya zhags 'debs// tha ma gnyis na stong gi 'jig rten bsnams// gu n+ya kro d+hi shwa rIH
157b5(rnying rgyud): 'khril// g.yas na rin chen g.yon padud dmar stob// bcom ldan dpal chen bi shwa he ru ka/ dbu gsum dmar nag mthing ga dkar po'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po pad+ma b+han dmar bskyil// g.yas g.yon par ma stong gi 'jig rten bsnams/
157b6(rnying rgyud): tha ma gnyis na dgra stagashol yang 'dzin// yum tshan bi shwa kro d+hI shwa rI nA~M// g.yas pa pad+ma ga yon bdud ldag stob// bcom ldan dpal chen yak+Sha he ru ka/ dbu gsum ldang nag dkar dang dmar po'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang ngo rgya ma thun dmar dgas
157b7(rnying rgyud): bganyis na ral gri zhags pa'i dzin// tham gnyis na dgra sna thong gi shau li 'dzin// zhabs bzhi thabs dong shes rab brgyangs bskums bgrad// yag sha kro d+hI shwa rI sbrul 'khril// g.yas pa rgya gram g.yon pa dung khrag stob// dri za 'dul byed khro po dag
158a1(rnying rgyud): dang / wa shwa c-i/ phyag gnyis dbang po stsal ba rnams// ma ny+tsa 'dul byed dam sa men pa byug to bskums// gzhonan 'dul byed mthing na gdub po b+h+ya/ brnams// phrin pa 'dul da sgyu
158a2(rnying rgyud): pa bsdams// klu rnams 'dul byed dmar po gru kri zhags pa bsnams// rlung lha 'dul byed dmar sku b+hAn+da rnga yab bsnams// gnod sbyin 'dul byed ljang bu rgya gram dril bu ba snams// bgegs rnams 'dral byed mthing ga dgra sta rtse gsum bsgoms// lha
158a3(rnying rgyud): 'dul byed sngo sku mdi'i gzhu gongs// sa bdag 'dul byed du de ka zo bzhags pa thogs// ya mAT+Ta kr-i ti dkar po lcags kyu bsnams// prat+ton+ta kr-ita ser po zhags pa bsdams// badz+ran+ta kr-ita dmar po lcags sgrog thogs// bib+han+ta kr-iti ljang bu dril bu

158a6(rnying rgyud): pa dung khrag stob// bcom ldan khrag 'thung bud+d+ha he ru ka/ de'u gsum spug nag mi thid ka dmar ba'i zhal// ti rang dbyug pa rdo rje khrung chen g.yas// rgyu zhags d+han dmar ti ra'i bsu g.yon// zhabs bzhi thabs dang shes rab brkyangs bsdams bgrad/

158b4(rnying rgyud): dag 'thung karma he ru ka/ dbu gsum ldang nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// phyag drug rgya gram ral gri dgra sta g.yas// stong gi 'jig rten b+han dmar gshol ni g.yon// zhabs bzhi thabs dang shes rab brkyangs bskums bgrang// yum chen ka mgro
158b5(rnying rgyud): hrI shA d+hI sbrul 'brel// g.yas pa la ba'i khyud g.yon pa dung de mar stob// gau rId+han dmar gyis dkrugaganon// tsau rI pa dang gzhung shengs ma mer// pra mo chu sbyin rgyal mtshan dmar// be ta bye ba rdod phyar nag/ pra ga ma ser byas rgya 'dren// b+has+pha dur
158b6(rnying rgyud): daM mar khrig 'thur ldang // sle sha mthing nab byis skying za// tsata ser skya byi lus 'bral// me d+ha mir mo zhing za seng // bya b+hU de mar mo lag bsnol stag/ sr-i gA nag mo byis ldag wa// shAn mthing ga sha drung sbyang // gr-id+d+ha dmar mo drung gri rgod//
158b7(rnying rgyud): kadamar srug zhing chung ngur// k+ShaM ka nag mo b+han gr-i bya// u lU mthing ga lugs kyu drug/ rtagadong dkar mo lcags kyu dren// phag gdong sngon mo mche zhags sdom// dmar mo skye'u gdong lcags sgrog sdom// thal byed ljang gu dral 'khrol sbyang /
158b8(rnying rgyud): yang dag thugs kyi lha tshogs su mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u sgo bzhi bcu zhi bzhi pa'o// / 'jam dpal sgo yi lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshon bstan pa ni// bcom ldan 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// dbu gsum phyag drug
159a1(rnying rgyud): zhabs bzhe bgrang // g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus nAgazhal// rdo rje la phre dgra thAg yas// sdigs mdzub mdung thung thun dam dgra yon// dang khrod chas brgyad sbrul brgyan// 'bus bzhi byad gyi dong skabs kyis// ma
159a2(rnying rgyud): mchong steng na bsrad// be ta nAg mo skul 'khril// dgra sgra 'phyar zhing drung dmar stob// sgrol byed e karda nI ni// bai DUr mdog sngon gas la 'tsher la// tri shUl g.yang gzhi g.yas na 'phyir// zod rnon moHg.yon na stob// ya ma rA nga ga shin
159a3(rnying rgyud): gshed// g.yas dkar g.yon dmare dbus mthing zhal// 'khor lo d+he shUl lcags kyu g.yas// baT+wA~M da gra s+t+wa rmya zhags g.yon// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs bzad// g.yu yi ral gcig g.yon nas 'khril// gcol 'khyud cing dung dmyur
159a4(rnying rgyud): stob// sgrol yum nag mo re ma ti// ral gri ne'u le'i rgyal pa thogs// myos byed 'bar ba ga shin rje gshed// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus ser nag/ be con ral gri dgra sta g.yas// b+han dmar 'khor lo lcags kyu g.yon// zhazas la ni gyad kyi dor
159a5(rnying rgyud): stabs bgrad// gtum mo ser nag g.yon nas 'khril// gtso la 'khyud cing dung dmar stob// g.yas na sgrol yum ser nag la// chags gzhi khrag gi bdag mo ni// g.yas pa spu gri tsit+ta zhags pa g.yon// gshin rje gshed po ma ru co// g.yas
159a6(rnying rgyud): dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// be con dbyug to kha T+wAM g.yas// b+han dmar kha nI rgyu zhags g.yon// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor sbubs bgrad// g.yon na lha mo 'od zer ni// gtso la 'khyud cing b+han dmar stob// g.yas na gling bzhi gtsug 'byams ma/
159a7(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa mi sbred tshangs par bcug/ g.yon pa dung dmar b+he n+da 'phyar// ral pa tshad dgug shin rje gshed// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ldang zhal// be con gtun shing gya bram g.yas// b+han dmar rgyu zhags 'khor lo g.yon// g.yon na lnga
159b1(rnying rgyud): nag mgo phyangs ma// g.yas pa dgra stagayon dung khrag/ gshin rje nag dngoms mthing nagazhal// rdo rje rje lnga g.yas pan// dgra sbyang bar ba g.yon na thogs// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bzad// nug mo ra la gcigag yon nas 'khripa// g.yas
159b2(rnying rgyud): pa yab 'khyud g.yon bdud dmar stob// gshin rje rgya sangs dkar 'tsher zhal// g.yas pa tshe ye bum pa 'dzin// g.yon pa rdo rje'i gshol yang bsdams// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// shel gyi gdong dgu g.yon nas 'khyil// she
159b3(rnying rgyud): ni tshogs yang la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gcol slob// kor co brag 'joms dkar ler zhal// rdo rje thag nag g.yas pa ni// me yi 'khor lo g.yon nu thogs// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrang // she'i mig khro mo g.yon na 'khril//
159b4(rnying rgyud): pa lcags kyu yab la'i khyud// g.yon paM b+han dmar gtsol stob// a ba glang mgo spug nag zhal// g.yas pa kha T+wAM lcags kyu g.yon// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// dkar skye mche gtsigs g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas pa skar mda' thogs
159b5(rnying rgyud): nas 'khyud// g.yon pa b+han dmar gcol stob// ya ba ti ni sngo nagazhal// g.yas na ral gri g.yon lcags kyu// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// g.yon du dred kyi a ba sham 'khril// g.yas pa khram shing thogs nas 'khyud// g.yon pa rgyan
159b6(rnying rgyud): dmar ga rdolnga stob// gshin rje mig dmar lkug na gzhal// gcod byed dul gri g.yas pa na// ti ra'i dbyug pa g.yon na thogs// khrag gi ra la gcig g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// gshin rje rmeg padu
159b7(rnying rgyud): zhal// thod pa'i phreng ba g.yas pan// g.yon pa lpags srog dmar po sdom// zhabs gnyis kyad kyi da stabs bgrang // nag mo sras 'grogayon nas 'khril// g.yas pa lab kyi mgul rung byed// g.yon pa dung ngam na kyi ba// ga

160a3(rnying rgyud): pa stob// myos kyi rgyal po dkar ser zhal// rdo rdo rje gsum ga su sra pan// g.yon pa bdud kyi zhum shing thogs// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor skabs bgad// rdo rje ra la gcig g.yon nus 'khril// g.yas pa nye zer zhigs pa 'dzin// g.yon pa

160a5(rnying rgyud): g.yon pa b+han dmar gtso la stob// gshen rje thod dbyug mthing na gzhal// ti ra'i dbyug pa g.yas pa na// bdud kyi sho d+he g.yon na thogs// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bkrad// nag mo phag mgo g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas pa yang kyi mgu
160a6(rnying rgyud): nas 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtsol ltob// dkar zhing 'tsher ba bya rgod mgo// rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas pa na// lcags kyu 'bar ba g.yon na thogs// mthing nag 'bar ba stag gi mgo// rin chen dbyug pa g.yas pa na// rgyu zhags 'bar ba
160a7(rnying rgyud): g.yon na thogs// leb rgan 'bar bkang ka'i mgo// me yi pad+ma g.yas pa na// lugs glog ngabar rab g.yon na thogs// ldang nag 'bar basbyang ko'i mgo// rgya gram 'bar ba g.yas pa na// shel gyi dril bu g.yon na thogs// 'jam dpal spu'i
160b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs ce su ma dog phyag mutshan bstan par ya gyu zhib rgyags sa/ // banagasu drug su tshogs kyi// su mdog tug ma tshan bstan pan// bcos lan dbul rgyan mgron rgyal pan// skum drug dam ba dpa par ba skar 'bar/
160b2(rnying rgyud): dbugasum ga yos dkar g.yon ljid kyis dmar zhal// phyag zug la rnardo rje sbrul zhags g.yas// zil bu phran dmar lpags sgeg/ g.yon na bskams// dbug tsug te mgo ljang gun skad 'tshor// zhabs bzhi btungs bskums gdug pa klanam
160b3(rnying rgyud): 'dral// yul chen me ka tsa ti sbrul 'khril// sgra mdog dmar nag sbyin gsum sngang mig bgrang // g.yas bya kha T+wAM bsdams nas yab la 'khrud// g.yon pa drang dmar gtsol stob par byed// skul pa'i phra men byal bu shud mo go// sum dog dmar
160b4(rnying rgyud): bskul pa'i mi 'dra// g.yas pa lcags kyugayon pa phur bu 'deb so// ye shes zil gnon tho ba'i rgyal pon// oM mdog dam n+t+ran gzha lde gsum phyug drug pa// dbugasu ma g.yas dkar gsan sngo dbus dam shas// g.yas pa 'okhor mo rje da
160b5(rnying rgyud): ga pa d+hA la gr-i dril bu ba snams// zhabs bye zungs bskums zil gnon tshul du bzad// dbug tu tamago slong gtus 'tshong // sum tshon pa ma thom yul thil// g.yas pa la 'i blod g.yon pa drang dmar rdzob// la kyi dzi'i

165a1(rnying rgyud): cha snyoms chen mo ni// sku mdog dmar mo chen mo ste// stag lpags rlon pa go zu la// me lpags rlon pa'i na bza' bklubs// lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang // 'dod khams gcom chen mon// sku mdog ldarnam
165a2(rnying rgyud): mo la// spu stod stag gi pags pa la// sku sprad zangs kyi zhabs mas g.yogs// lag na khram shing nag po thogs// e ka tsaM ti ral gcig ma// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// gos su sprin dkar go zla yi// mtha' ma 'ja' tshun 'bar bas
165a3(rnying rgyud): 'khrigs// lag na kha T+wA~M mi ro thogs// gleng bzhi spyi phud chen mo ni// dkar mo sgeg pa'i cha byad ma// shel gyi go zu skra la gsol// lag na lcags kyi 'od phreng thogs// rin chen srid 'degs chen mo ni// cha byad sngon mo chen mo la// mu ting
165a4(rnying rgyud): khu 'phang go zu can// l-ig nag yu yi ga 'u thogs// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma// sku yi cha byad dmar mo la// le bi rgan 'bar ba'i go zu can// lag na thod pa khrag bkang thogs// rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma// su mdog ser mo 'bar ba la/
165a5(rnying rgyud): na bza' gser gyi go zu can// lag na b+hAn+da khrag bkang thogs// ha ra ting dkar mo chen mo ni// sku la shel gyi gozugasol// lag na me yi dkyil 'khor thogs// dun ting nag mo chen mo ni// skra la ga yu yi go zu gsol// lag na sa yi 'khor/
165a6(rnying rgyud): lo thogs// shan ting dmar mo chen mo ni// skul gyi ru'i gozu gsol// lag na chu yi dkyil 'khor thogs// grub ting ser mo chen mo ni// na bza' ser po'i go zu gsol// lag na rlung gi 'khor lo thogs// srin ma chen mo skams pa mo//
165a7(rnying rgyud): mdog dkar mo go za can// lag na shel phur d+ha r+tha thogs// srin mo chen mo phor thogs ma// spu mdog sngon mo gzu sngo// lag na b+han khrag bkang thogs// srin mo chen mo g.yang gzho mo// spu mdog dmar pog bu dmar// lag na d+ha rA thod
165b1(rnying rgyud): na kun na lda na kla tu
165b2(rnying rgyud):  rgya chu
166a1(rnying rgyud): seng ge bcibs// brdzun ma sum dadzin// spum dag sa zeng nug dbar ba la// na bzang ljang dag par rgyan gsol// tshogs mag yas mthod khrag g.yon// thabs su 'degs pa'i thang chen brtsibs// 'chi 'dag
166a2(rnying rgyud): gshin rje nag po ni// spu mdog nag po 'bar ba la// gcan gzan gdug pa'i lpags rlon gsol// be con g.yas la thod dbyug g.yon// chi bas su ma he sngo nag bcibs// gshin rje gsod byed nag mo ni// spu mdog nag mo 'bar ba la/
166a3(rnying rgyud): bzang dar nag go zugasol// phyag na srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor// bdud po smyos rje drang dkar ni// sku 'dog nag po dbyung ba la// na bzang dang nag ber chen gsol// khram shing g.yas la dgra spug yon// rtsibs su 'dud rtenag po brtsibs// badz+ra
166a4(rnying rgyud): mo nag mor ma ti// sku mdog nag mo 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag go zugasol// khram lam g.yas la nad rgyal g.yon// chibs su bong bug pa bcibs// srin po nag po klog zer can// mdog nag po 'bar ba la// sras la glog gi phra
166a5(rnying rgyud): na// thog chen g.yas la sgrog chen g.yon// tshabs su 'brug dang klog la bcibs// srin mo sbal mgo khrag mig ma// phru mdog dmar nag 'bar ba la// na bza' khrag gi lab nag gsol// dzag phung g.yas la khrag por g.yon// gan
166a6(rnying rgyud): sbyin yak+ka me pal ni// spu mdog mthing nag 'brar ba la// na bza' darang nag go phyagasol// rin chen g.yas la mtshon cha g.yon// rtsigs sus ga mo rngams pa bcibs// gnod sbyin mon mo nag mon// snga mdog nag mo 'bar ba la// na bza 'ad
166a7(rnying rgyud): nig go zu gsol// spu br-ig yas la spyang mo g.yon// chibs su lugs kyi spyang mo bcibs// gza' badrad chen po hral// sre mdog dud ka mgo dgu pa// mu spyod me la su smad spul// mda' gtsug yas 'phrul zhags g.yod// tshigs su
166b1(rnying rgyud): 'a ga zad la ga dang sa brjes// gnasasan zagag gagrags// sram dag dam sgra'abar bas// na babartag par gzugasas// ga can g.yas la mar can gtsun// thabasas thag sa rnyen ma grags pa // rlu dan pan
166b2(rnying rgyud): su mdog dag badrung kha 'o// b+hi ma la sgra 'a stsa 'aM// spu'i thug steg yas la dang rgyu la g.yod// rjebasas cu na dag pa bcings// l+h+wa ma yan ldan mini// b+hUSh+Thang nga bdag pal// hU~M lung ga drug bsu pa // b+ha
166b3(rnying rgyud): gas/ sa ga // pa'i ga sus na// rgyu ba dag dag ga na// 'dus kyang pa 'brug ci// de sa ga nas na
166b4(rnying rgyud): dkang po bcings// skyes bu gnam the dkar po ni// spra mdag dkar gsal 'bar ba la// nabaza' ma dog bor chen gsol// dang mdung g.yas la ril thig yon// rtsibs su ta dkar bum dmar bathibs// shar du skye bdu dgu dumaH/
166b5(rnying rgyud): mdog dkar gsal 'bar ba la// na graza' rgya byas dkur po gsol// du mtshon g.yas la ral gri g.yod// chibs su rdo rta gro ba 'thobs// ma mo srid pa'i rgyal mo ni// spra mdog du ka gsal 'bar ba la// na bar 'dir dkar go thug po ma
166b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo g.yas la me long g.yon// chibs su 'brug mo ral chen bcibs// sngags sbrang e ka dza T+Ta ni// sgra mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag ber chen gsol// tsit+ta g.yas la spang mo g.yon// chibs su de la rtanag po bcings/
166b7(rnying rgyud): dpayang 'dag mo phyogs byed pa// spum dge nag mo 'bar ba la// naban 'di nag gi drug po'o// tsho du ba g.yas la nad rgyal g.yon// thibs sum bya dag po 'acings// ban che do rdo rje bdudu 'dra na// sram dag dmang naga' bdang /

167b1(rnying rgyud): bdu ga // radapa pang bdag gag// rab sngapagag sas stsam la dpa// la pa pa du byab sa mthag// mgasangs so// ga cad pas dug
