167b3(rnying rgyud): pa rdomamadu zhag dkrugs// g.yas kyi gnyis rnga lnga brgyan bams// g.yon ba mas// zhebs bzhis rdzogs pa po gnyid// 'byung ba rda yi dag ni// rnal cig kyi ga gnyis sde mdog mdzang // @
167b4(rnying rgyud): phyag gis dam mkha' 'dengs// g.yod kyi phyag gisas pa gnod// dale nas 'byung ba lnga pang 'chad// 'dzi ba~M dgag sprin nag pani// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nage// thod pa g.yas la gri brag g.yon// zhing lpags rngon pa na
167b5(rnying rgyud): bzang gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bshegs gzir// 'chi bdag dag po babyed yod// zhal gcig rgyag gnyis snga mdag dang // thod pa gams la bri brag ga yaH// gang lpags rlon pa na bzang gsol// zhabs gtes dam
167b6(rnying rgyud): snrums dgra bgegs gzir// badrang po ma yi kha blangs rtun// zhal gcig zug gnyis sku mdog tsug/ khram shing g.yas la brjod zhags g.yod// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dpya bgegs gzir// bdud
167b7(rnying rgyud): mngag 'o rjeg 'jig sa// dal gcig sdug gnyis spyi mdog dag/ tham shing gal sa mdzod dran g.yon// zhing lpags rnon pa na bza' gapo la// zhang gnyis dam nyams dgrang gags gzhing // phrin mo dag po gsod byer ni// dal ba
168a1(rnying rgyud): phyag gnyis smra ma dag nag// ngal thag yas la bad gag yo// zhing lpags rlon pa'i nab jug pa la// zhabras gnyis dam nyams dgra pagags gzang// sran ma dag lags byu ma// dalag sabyugag sa ma dang da
168a2(rnying rgyud): g.yas la mi mgo g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// ral the g.yas la der dag g.yod// zhing lpags rngon
168a3(rnying rgyud): srol// zhabs gnyis dra ma nyams dgra bgegs gzer// gnod sbyin sha zar la gcig ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// dang nag g.yas la zhing lpags g.yod// ming lpags ljon pa'i na brdang gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra
168a4(rnying rgyud): zir// skye chen ma hA de ba ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis spu mdog dkar// bdan g.yas la shel gri g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na ba gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgags gzing // drung thar bdag na// zhal gcig phyag gnyis
168a5(rnying rgyud): nag/ mchod gto g.yas lathun gtor g.yon// der lkugs rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// brtsod po mthu che// zhal ga ga phyag gnyis su dag nag/ dang dag g.yas lnga zhags gam
168a6(rnying rgyud): smon badren bza gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgrang gi bla gzing// hU~M stes sbru la nag po ni// zhal gcig phyog gnyis sku mdog nag/ baT+wA~M ga yas la dz+raM shUl g.yon/ ding lpags rlon pa'i na gas // ga sa 'am nyams dgra pagag gzir // bya ba du chen pa
168a7(rnying rgyud): dpag gag tes smra / tham shing gangs par smon pa nga gas pa// zhangs gnyis dang nya sa dpa gags pa pa // rgyal segam med pani// rnalagacig rgyag nyis su ma ga par// bu mang g.yas 'dzus pa gangan/
168b1(rnying rgyud): lpags glon pa'i na bzang gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzer// rgyal ba'i byin har lags ni// zhal gajig phyag gnyis spu mdog dkar// shal zla g.yas la dar dkar g.yon// zhing lags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol/
168b2(rnying rgyud): zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bshegs gzir// 'gong po khu la lag dgu ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis spu mdog ser// sprul pa'i lag pa dgu yang 'gyed// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis nam nyams dgra bgegs gzing
168b3(rnying rgyud): the'u dang rdo rje legs pa ni// zhal gceg phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// der dkar g.yas la dar dmar ga yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// btsan rgod yam shud dmar pa ni//
168b4(rnying rgyud): gcig smram dag na ga na di mas// gnyis dam kyin sung babyugags pa dang/ pada' bag pags// byung zag gnyis gnyi ldan
168b5(rnying rgyud): pa yang sprul bsam mkhyub// dmod pa drag sngags kyi lha tshogs kyi sgra mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lngab cwa tham pa'o// / tshe mcho ga yon tan rig 'dzin dang // yang dag thugs kyi rig 'dzin dang // 'jam dpal sgra yi rig 'dzin
168b6(rnying rgyud): dang // pad+ma gsung gi rig 'dzin dang // phur pa rjin las rig 'dzin dang // ma mo rgod gtong rig 'dzin dang // ldan gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin dang // phyag rgya chen po'i rig dang dang // tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin dang // sa la gnas pa'i rig 'dzin
168b7(rnying rgyud): sa thob pa yi ngag 'don tshogs// dur khrod rus pa'i rkyen cha yis// dang phyag gdub zhabs gdu dang // dpung skyon spyod g.yog spyad g.yogs dang // byin dang chas kyis btsun pa'o// dbang gi thor chu gshegs se shing // g.yas pa thams

169a3(rnying rgyud): na pa sa 'o// de ga gag gas/
169a4(rnying rgyud): sa bag na// lagan zla dri'i rje chung brdud// phreng gi phyogs kyi kyi spyang ni// dbu ni dom kyi mnapa ma// gsul la pa zung bu // ci snang rgyag tshul 'brings dag sa// 'gran ga tsaM ye 'i chung dang // shing so mtshams
169a5(rnying rgyud): di slad mo'i 'go bo la// gr-i yA yi la pardar than// cispang blag nA~M la 'byings pag can// lag na ga su li rje chung brdud// lha ba mtshams kyi ci srung ni// dbyen pa se yi ka na'i mgo// paso la bcung thacan// ce su rdza ba rtsa
169a6(rnying rgyud): sl-i gcan// lagran pas yi rje'u chung brdad// nu bzar ma tshams kyi rje sbrang ni// dpani rbang bya kA ka mgo// lcags kyi nga la pa dz+rar ba can// rje s+yA b+hag tshul dgyings bag ca// lagwa thugs kyi chang chung 'jur// byung shar mtsham

169b1(rnying rgyud): yang dgazugs kyi bkang srung na// bran ma nyi shun brgyad de// sgyu mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// shar gyi phyogs kyi sran madrug/ smuka nag g.yag ge mgo ba can// zhing dbyug g.yas la blan dmar g.yod// dmar sar sa
169b2(rnying rgyud): mdo can// ce lnga g.yas la rje drugayod// ser nag gcig gi mgo bo can// sku gri g.yas la blan dmar g.yon// dkar dmar gri mo'i mgo bo can// dung chen g.yas la b+harA g.yon// ser nag pa wang mgo bo zan// 'khor lo g.yas la bya da
169b3(rnying rgyud): g.yon// ser dred kyi mge po na// zheng dbyug g.yas la b+han dam g.yon// lho'i phyogs kyi srin po drug/ dmar nag dom gyi mgo bo can// zhing dbyug g.yas la sbyin dmar g.yon// sngo nag chu srin mgo bo can// zhing chen ga pas
169b4(rnying rgyud): dmar g.yod// dz+nyAnag sdig pa'i mag pa can// ti galas la g.yon// seng nag wa yi mgo bcad// de'u chung g.yas la byud dmang gadzod// srin mo dmar mo la yim go// dang galas 'thang khyad pa dang // nga
169b5(rnying rgyud): stag gi mgo bo can// zhing dbyug g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// nub kyi phyogs kyi srin mo drug/ dmar nag bya rgod mgo bo can// lcags sgrog g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// dmar nag rta yi mgo bo can// rdo dbyug g.yas la b+han dam
169b6(rnying rgyud): yon// dmar ser byi ba'i mgo bo can// rdo rje g.yas la b+hA na dmar g.yon// dmar nag khyi yi mgo bzan// zhing dbyug g.yas la d+han dmar g.yon// dkar dmar bu shud mgo bo can// pad+ma g.yas la b+ha rje g.yon// ldang ser
169b7(rnying rgyud): nga chad// zhing min g.yas la stan dmar g.yon// byang gi phyogs kyi sri madrug/ dmar dag d+hA'i gang ched// rnge'u chung g.yas la b+had dmar g.yon// ljang nag sbyi gyi mgo ba can// rgyagags g.yas la blan dmar g.yod// dam
170a1(rnying rgyud): na / smra/ rgyu / ma du smran/ rmug ga / ga sa
170a2(rnying rgyud): g.yonan thaMd pa khrag gis bkang / b+ha rog mag brgyan// rjengs thig mas la tan dam gnon// sri ma tshogs kyi skam pa na// nag mo khwa blag man bzhin// ljags skra ga yas la nyan dmang gamaH// skyon mA re'i mAn
170a3(rnying rgyud): zhags pa g.yas la thun dmang g.yon// dmar mo ng+ge'u'i mag c-i// phyogs smig g.yas la tan dem dgasaH// snang rdeg spyang ma'i mag pacan// dril brag sa A la thathA ga yon// yang da gzugs kyi chags
170a4(rnying rgyud): gyi// sku mdog cig mtshan pa man pa'i 'dra stel brgyaH gsum pa'o// 'jam dpal phru la bka' na// tha mdog zug mtshan bstan pa ni// gri thugs gang gi bka' srung // shar phyogs kyi na
170a5(rnying rgyud): dkar zin// sku la dzId khya ba dkar po gas pa// rdzag ni dung gau la grib sam// rgya sngags kyang ni sa pon// thul gas zhab sir pa gsal// phrag ni gser gyir la gre bsnams// rnab phyogs gang chan dmar pa
170a6(rnying rgyud): sprul ba se ma ba dmir pa gsal// rtsa gan sa ma gri yang ba skams// bya phyogs gang chen ldan pa ni// sbal gsul ba ldan pa gsal// bya ba nag yu la 'thob rnams// tham d+higs bdud kyi bkang srung ni// sha da badrang padapa
170a7(rnying rgyud): ba can// phyag na bdud kyi blam shing basmrams// thas 'dag srog badra mtsha // theg ni bdud kyil mo shing brnam po// shA rung yang ba zhags pa rgyad// glen brgyad kyi lamathong ba sdams// rjeg dring gsod kyi ma
170b1(rnying rgyud): phyag na bdud kyi khram shing bsnams// sh+lo thogs rtsis pa'i bka' srung ni// nyi ma dang po'i rtsis byeng ging // dkar po lag na sho n+de thogs// nyi ma gnyis pa'i rjes byed ging // ser po lag na sho rngo thogs// nyi ma gsum pa'i rtsis byed shing /
170b2(rnying rgyud): dmar po la ga nA sho na thogs// nyi ma bzhi pa'i rtsis byed ging // sngon po lag na sho rje thogs// srog gcod shan pa'i bka' srung ni// nad gtong ma mo'i shan pa ni// nag mo chen mo kha gdangs ma// lag na thun dang ral pi thogs// myos pa
170b3(rnying rgyud): bcan gyi shan pa ni// dmar ro 'jigs byed khrog tu mtshan// lag na btsan sring mar po thogs// glen pa r+m+ma yi shan pa ni// sku mdog mthing nag spul lpags gsol// lag na sbrul gyi zhugs pa thogs// gdug rtsub gza' ye shan pa ni/
170b4(rnying rgyud): spu mdog nag po 'jigs pa'i tshul/ g.yas na mdung nag dang nag 'phyar// g.yon na snying dang zhags pa thogs// 'jam dpal sku'i bka' spang gi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya rtsa bzhi pa'o// / pad+ma gsung ba
170b5(rnying rgyud): bkang rlung ni/ sbrum gzhug mtshan bstan ni// sbalas sprul pa'i lam d+ham// dung gi da ma mgro gsumagon// gsung lus bral ba'i bu zla mo// zungs kyi 'phur ba mgo brgyad zhen// thugs las sprul pa'i 'am ma
170b6(rnying rgyud): lcags kyi sbrang ma mgong gro zhin// yan ta na stsal ba'i kha ma lnga ma// gsu yi sbyang ma nang gsuM mdzon// phrin las sprul pa'i kham rgyam// gser gyi seng ge rngamakhri zhon// gnyis med sprul pa'i kham+bu rgya ma// dung gisang ge mgo gron
170b7(rnying rgyud): shar phyogs lang ba tu ba sbrel ni// 'brug rgyan ldan patshabs su chibs// na bza' leb nan dpu thu dgastsol// lagan lcags kyu dgra sna thugs// ma phyogs lang brgya ba sbrel ni// lugs kyi theg pa chibs su chibs// phrag na lugs kyi nga
170b8(rnying rgyud): ba kra
171a1(rnying rgyud): chen bsnams// nabaza' sa la ras mags lta// rnab grags long ba chu basbrul ni// ban glang dkar po tshabs su chibs// na bza' klu 'brug pags pa ga sal// lag na sbal gyi 'gas pa dz+ran pa// rdza thogs
171a2(rnying rgyud): dmus long rgyab sbrel ni// lugs kyi sbrang mo rkang gsum zhon// na bza' zhing gi g.yang gzhi gon// lag pa spel nas gar stabs byed// shar gyi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// dung gi khyi mo ral pa can// lho yi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// gser
171a3(rnying rgyud): kyi byi mo ral ba can// nub kyi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// zangs kyi khyi mo ral pa can// byang gi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// g.yu yi khyi mo ral pa can// shar lho mtshams nas rgyag pa'i khyi// b+hu ru'i khyi mo ral pa can// lho drub mtsham
171a4(rnying rgyud): nas rgyug pa'i khyi// mchong gi khyi mo ral pa can// nub byang mtshams nas drug pa'i khyi// bse yi khyi mo ral pi can// byang shar mtshams nas rgyug pa'i khyi// shel gyi khyi mo laM pa can// shar gyi phyogs nas rgyag pa ni// dung gi sprang mo ral
171a5(rnying rgyud): pan+dan// lho yi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// gser gyi spang mo ral pa can// nub kyi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// zangs kyi sbrang mo ral pa can// byang gi phyogs nus chug pa ni// g.yu yi sbrang mo ral ba can// shing lho mtshams nas rgyag pa ni/
171a6(rnying rgyud): mthing shun spyad mo ral pa can// lho nub mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// mu men spyad mo ral pa can// nub byang mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// mchong gi spyad mo ral pa can// byang shar mtshams nas chug pa ni// ra gan spyad mo ral pa can//
171a7(rnying rgyud): shar gyi phyogs kyi pho nyi ni// dkar mo zla 'dab 'jig pa'i gzugs// lho yi phyogs kyi pho nya ni// ser mo nyi 'dab 'jigs pa'i gzugs// nub kyi phyogs kyi lo nya ni// dmar po me 'dab 'jigs pa'i gzugs// byang gi phyogs kyi pho nyan/
171b1(rnying rgyud): 'daba' rigs pa'i gzugs// rlung 'brug sngon mug su yi 'dab gshog can// me byug dmar ma ma yi 'da' gshog can// klu 'brug sngon mo sbrul thag shog pa can// chu 'brug dkar ma sbyin gyi 'dabagashag can// tshogs pa
171b2(rnying rgyud): rje'i 'dab gshog can// pad+ma gsung gi bka' srung gi sku mngag phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u lnga bcu rtsalnga pa'o// / phrar pa phrin las bka' srung gi// sku mdag phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// shAn kha zhes kyang // lugs
171b3(rnying rgyud): nga mo mdo dag pa// mi mo lcags kyi ral can zhon// lag na lcags kyi phur pa 'dril// sr-i ka mu kha zhes bya ba// gser gyi 'phar pa lce brgyad la// mi mo gser gyi ral can zhon// lag na gser gyi phung po 'brel// I gA la mu khe zhes
171b4(rnying rgyud): zangs kyi wa mo rkang gsum la// zangs kyi mi mo ral can zhen// lag na zangs kyi phur bu 'dril// shAn mu kha zhes bya ba// lugs kyi khyi mo ral pa can// mi mo lcags kyi ral can zhon// lag na dung gi phur po 'dril// re ma ti zhes
171b5(rnying rgyud): tha ba ni// nag so la pas stod khams khyab// g.yas na mchog gi phur pa 'dril// chibs sra trail rta rkang gsum bcibs// de mang zhes bya ba ni// ser nag ma bu'i thul pa gsol// phyag na mchog gi phur pa bsdams// chibs sudri
171b6(rnying rgyud): rlung gsum bcibs// ri mang nas tha ba ni// dmar nag ra ldanag dgras la// phyag nam chag gaphrar ba bsnams// thabs su dral tagang gsum pa cims// des tshugs rba ba na// sdangan ga gi go zun pa sa// thag rtson
171b7(rnying rgyud): gizung ba brnams// rnams suthal na nang gsum pacangs// rdo rjel kyinanas kya pa// bcung nag sngags phur rol pacan// rtsibs su badrang nag pa bcabs/ can zhes phye ga// sang po gser phreng ral po // legs
172a1(rnying rgyud): gser gyi srang pa 'brel// chibs su gza' rta ser ba bcibs// dan bas byin smras thub// dmar mongs phyur ngal partan// lag nabs la phar b+ha 'dal// ma byams pa na snang po ngas// rang nga
172a2(rnying rgyud): na zhes bya ba// ldang mo g.yu phyar ral pa can// lag na ga yu yi phrar pa 'dril// chi bas su kluta sngon po chibs// shar phyogs srin po'i skyes bu ni// srin pa phyed can phur pa'i lha// dkar po lag na phrar ba 'brel// tso tshogs kyi
172a3(rnying rgyud): skyes bya ni// gshin rje nag po phur pa'i wa// nag po lag nA phur pa 'dril// nub phyogs ya bdud skyes bu ni// sog po mig ring phrar ba'i lha// dmar po lag na phur pa 'dril// byang phyogs gnod sbyin skyes bu ni// min pa gdong
172a4(rnying rgyud): phung po 'dri la// shar bdud dkar po mche ba can// lag na dung gi phrar pa 'dril// lho bdud sngon mo ral pa can// phyag na ga yu yi phrang pa 'dril// thub bdud dmar po zhags pa can// phyag na zhags pa phung po 'dri la// byang bdud ldang nag
172a5(rnying rgyud): ral gri can// phyag na ral gri phrar ba 'dril// shar gyi phyogs kyi dmag dpon ni// pra ma rA dza srin po'i gtso// dkar po lag na phrar pa 'dril// lho yi phyogs kyi dmag dpon ni// ya ma rnyang gshin rdo'i gtso/ ldan pa lag na phur pa 'dril
172a6(rnying rgyud): nub kyi phyogs kyi dmag pan ni// b+ha sha grI ba bdud kyi ging // nag po lag na phur pa 'dri la// byang gi phyogs kyi dmag dpon ni// ya krA m+me ba gnod sbyin ging // ser pa lag na gri yang thogs// phrar pa phrin las kyi bka' srang gi la
172a7(rnying rgyud): ste lngabacu drug pa'o// / mi mthong gtang bka' srung gi// sku mdog phrag mtshan bstan pa ni// mtsha sman rgyal mdapal mo ldan// sgra ma dag ldan mo ma long thogs// dkar mo chen mo dbu gsum ma// lag na stanarnam
172b1(rnying rgyud): thogs// srid pa su mdam tshig can// mar ma tha rdzas ma bzags// smag nag tsunam dbulam// lag na kyang rngon pa thogs// tham pa gang gi dbang mam// dkar ma lagan sa thugs// narab gleng ba'i 'dabang man// bar ba la
172b2(rnying rgyud): thugs// rjeg zin sag de'i dbang mchi// sug se lagan ta zugs// rgyamatho gleng gi de ba mam// migan tan sngon thogs// gnam gyi la d+har rkyenamani// nag ma mun pa'i gzacan// lag k+Sha zag pakang rdzogs// ra

177a7(rnying rgyud): tsug ga kyims nga// mamadzad mi kyi ma // zag pa sa ci ga da// bdal ga dang shing ba// gdu ngas sa
177b1(rnying rgyud): gag kyis gsal bar bskyed// bdag nyir rgyam chag ta / mthing nag dbug sum phrag drug pa// thabs pa'i byad kya dang skabs bzang // dbugs mug yas dka na ldan dmang gA/ dbus ni mthing nag sung dum thug/ d+hA jug
177b2(rnying rgyud): g.yas kyi dang bon// rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams pa'o// bar mardo rje rtse lnga pa// tha mardo rje rtsa gsum mo// g.yon gyi dang po b+haT+Tani// lcang lo khrag bkang gsol ba'o// bar mthong rnon dmar gyis bkang // tha mthong ska me mir bkang ba'o// zhabs
177b3(rnying rgyud): zhis byad kyi dor stabs so// su snod glang chen ko rlon gsol// skra smad stag gi sham thabs can// zhing chen g.yang gzhi'i na bzar gsol// thod pa tshar gsum phreng bas brgyan// rdo rje'i gshog pa khyab par gdengs// khrag zhag thig le'i mtshan
177b4(rnying rgyud): mos brgyan// thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' la// sngags kyi phreng bas bskor ba'o// yu ma ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// g.yas pa gri gug yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dud khrag gtso la stob// sku mdog rigs dang mthun pa la// su smang
177b5(rnying rgyud): gzig gi shAm tha'as can// yab yum gnyis su med par 'khril// bskal pa'i me dpung klong na bzhugs// 'bar ba'i cha lugs 'jigs par bsgom// yab yum gnyis kyi thugs ka nas// phyogs bzhi'i mtshams bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du//
177b6(rnying rgyud): mthing nag hU~M gi 'phro 'du lus// shar du badz+ra he ru ka/ b+h+yo ru 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// nub tu pad+ma dbang chen ni// byang du rdo rje gzhon nu ste// shar lhor bla med he ru ka/ lho nub rig 'dzin thod partsal// nub kyang dregs pa kun 'dul ba/
177b7(rnying rgyud): byang shar stobs ldan nag po'o// yum rnams yab dang tshig rdzogs bskyed// so so'i 'khor tshogs rgya mtsho rnams// rang bzhin dag gis gnas pa las// su mdog phyag mtshan gsal mi dgos// skad cig rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bskyeng/
178a1(rnying rgyud): skra gsung thugs sa byin parlabs shing // ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya// rang bzhan kyi la ga ba smyan drangs shing // gnyis su med par bzhugs su gsol// gaN+DIs mad dang du thug sa // bdu na
178a2(rnying rgyud): ba dang // gtor ma rak+ta bdud rtsis mchod// bstod cing phrin las bshags pa bya// bzlas pa bya zhing spro bsdu bya// oM maN+Da kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM a kro te ka hU~M phaT/ oM ha ya gI wa hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya hU~M phaT/ oM
178a3(rnying rgyud): man+ta kroN+Da hU~M hU~M/ oM k+Sha chub kyi phaT// oM badz+ra nImadu.An wA \u0f7f/ oM badz+ra sarba dradz+nyAn d+ha phaT/ gseng bsngags kyi bsten pa bya// tshogs dang lhag ma'i cho ga yang // rim pa bzhin du dbul bar bya// gtor mi gtong zhing gtor gzu
178a4(rnying rgyud): san ni// ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol// dam tshig sems dpa' rang le bsdu// skad cig ltar bskyed spyod lam bya// zhes gsungs so// bskyed rdzogs shin tu bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas
178a5(rnying rgyud): spyi dpal he ru ka la/ 'khor gyi reg 'dzin rnams kyis zhus pa/ e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ rnal 'byor rgyun du bsgom pa la// rgyun gyi yi ma bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang // skye dpa' chen pos bka' stsal ba// nyon cig
178a6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// sems can ye shes bskyed pa dang // rnal 'byor rig 'dzin bsgrub pa'i phyir// bde ba'i stan la rab 'dug nas// hU~M las 'od zer 'phros pa las// gyi nang gsang ba'i 'od zer 'phros// bla ma dang ni yi da
178a7(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs thams cad spyan drangs la// phyag 'tshal mchod zer bshags pa dang // rjes su yi rang gsol bskul gdab// skyabs gsol lus dbu dge bya rngo// tshad me bani yang bsgom par bya// de nas stong po'i 'dzan
178b1(rnying rgyud): zlum// 'od phung rgyar 'dus bdag rang nyid// de yi nang du tu gnas pa// da las tsa 'phros 'khor lor gyur// lta bar nyi bas ma hU~M nyid// de las gnod mdzes rgyal por gyur // dathugs rtsig 'gro 'dra las// khro ba chen po bcung gyur// !
178b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i gsang sngags brjod pa yis// khro brgya'i sprul pas gdug pa dgug/ sku gsung thugs kyi phur bus gdab// brtul zhing sbyangs nas nam mkhar gyur// de las d+hi gi 'gro 'du las// rdo rje'i bur dang rab dang // dra nga nyid du
178b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// hUM gi 'gro 'dus sgrar la bzla// stong pa nyid las 'od phreng byung // de las ti zla basbyar gyur// de steng rang sems yi ge hUM// 'gro 'dus 'od du zhu ba las// rdo rje dang ni dril bur gyur// de las bde gshegs 'dus pa'i sku/
178b4(rnying rgyud): khro bo he ru kA/ sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis rdo rje b+han dmar bsdams// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum dor stobs kyis// pad+ma nyi zla'i steng na bgrad// yum yang yab dang mthun par bskyed// sku gsung thugs su byin
178b5(rnying rgyud): brlabs shing // ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la// gyi nang bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'phrul// de ltar bsgom la bzlas pa bya// nyi steng ye shes sems dpa' yi// mtshan ma la sogs gsal ba sgoms nas// 'od zer la ni yig 'bru
178b6(rnying rgyud): ma gsal bar du bzlas pa bya// oM AHhUM zhes bzlas pa bya// de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni// lha nyid sems su shes par bya// rang nyid lha la lha nyid dang // bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi sa lam spang // zhes gsungs so// rgyan
178b7(rnying rgyud): ci rnal 'byor gyi bsus don/ khro bo phyag rgya rgyang pa'i sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// bsdus dang shin tu bsdus pa phyag rgya rkyang pa'i lugs kyi skabs te bdun pa'o// / de nas spyi dpal kun bzang he ru ka la zhus pa/
179a1(rnying rgyud): ma skyed pa la te sa// gyi sgrub rna ma tshon dkyil 'khor la// brtan nas sgrub pa ji ltar lags// sti dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs can rnams// bdag shegs bsgrub pa bka' ba /
179a2(rnying rgyud): ltar bsgrub na ji ltar bsgrub// phyi mtshams nang mtshams sngon 'gro rnams// mchod rdzas byin brlab la sogs bya// de nas ting 'dzin rnam gsum dang // 'byung ba rim brtsegs gzhal yas khang // gdan dang bcas pa bskyed nas ni// rgyu yi ye shes sems
179a3(rnying rgyud): sa/ tu swA// ska ma da ga zugasatshan ma lags ni// zas 'bring ba zlas pa'i ris pa dag// gang du yang dag rdzogs pa// drug ga 'is chags la// nub tu brgya gatshogs so// byung dAmar pa'i/ tshogs so// gar
179a4(rnying rgyud): mar lca chags so// nub rig 'dren sra ba dang naH// rbab kyang rdegs pa san 'dral la// byung shar stobs ldan nag pa'o// mams dbang thug tu tha brgyad// 'khor thag pal sa bka' thod do// daltar bsrung bang gsal btar bya// skragasung
179a5(rnying rgyud): thugs su byin brlabs shing // ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya// spyan drang bzhugs gsol phyag 'tshal mchod// bstod cing bshags pa dag par dbul// so so'i rtsa sngags bsten par dbul// 'od dang 'od zer spro bsdu bya// bskul zhing phrin las

179a7(rnying rgyud): bcos spros bral dang la gnas// de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// zhes gsungs so// phyi rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas bsgrub pa'i rim pa ste le'u drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// nang bsgrub lus kyi dkyil
179b1(rnying rgyud): 'dor la// brtan nas bsgrub pa bshad pa ni// bde ba'i sman la 'dug nas ni// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin las// me mchog he ru'i skur bskyed la// spyi bor rig 'dzin slob dpon bsgom// dpral bar 'jam dpalag gin rtog tsug/ mdzin
179b2(rnying rgyud): brgya dpang chen no// thugs kar badz+ra hA ru ka/ lte bar rdo rje gzhon nu'o// gsang bar tha med he ru ka/ gang g.yas dregs pa kun 'dul la// rkang pa g.yon la stobs ldan no// de rnams yum dang 'khor du bcas// rang bzhin 'khor du gnas par
179b3(rnying rgyud): bsgom// de rnams byugs kar zla dkyil steng // li ga b+h+rUM gi 'phro 'dra yis// hU~M ring hUM thung sgra las drangs// rdegs pa kun 'dul stobs ldan nas// b+h+rU~M gi 'od zer 'phros pa yis// n+ya'o cha yi nang nas zhugs// dri med te bu'i thugs ka
179b4(rnying rgyud): 'phros// de las rdo rje gzhon nu la// de las badz+ra he ru las// de las pad+ma dbang chen las// de las 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// nga las bla ma'i thugs kar ro// de las 'od zer 'phros pa yis// lus kyi mgo mjug grub pa yi//
179b5(rnying rgyud): mongs dug lnga dug gsum dang // bag chags sgrib pacad nas bcad// chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas pa'o// de ni bsnyen pa zhes bya'o// de nas bsgrub pa'i dus sun// bla ma'i thugs nas 'od 'thos pas// 'jam dpal ga shin rje'i thugs kar
179b6(rnying rgyud): spros// de las pad+ma dbang chen no// de las badz+ra hA ru ka/ de las rdo rje gzhon nu'o// de las bla med he ru ka/ de las rtswa chen g.yas zhugs pas// dregs pa kun 'dul thugs kar spros// de las cha chen g.yon zhugs pas// stongs ldan
179b7(rnying rgyud): zhig po'i thugs kar 'phros// de las shing bdud gshin rje sogs// phyag na mtshon cha thogs pa 'phros// gzas pa'i dgra bgegs cad bcad nas// slar 'dus dregs 'dul stobs ldan gyi// thugs kar 'dus te 'khor ba ni// sgrub pa
180a1(rnying rgyud): brang 'dir tshig chad 'dra sang dam dpyad
180a2(rnying rgyud): las rdzo gas sru bshad// dmas na yang 'bras pas// oM pa bzhin 'da' bras nas// sgyus mang mju gshin dang // b+huba'i thug sag rdzazhes nas na// rnam na byang ma ma bzhim // pa/
180a3(rnying rgyud): gang chen po zhes bya'o// bdag nyid gdon nas ma grub pa// rdzogs pa chen por la bzlas pas// sangs rgyas zhes kyang del bya'o// de ltar yang yang spro ba ni// dam tshig sems dpal zhes kyang bya// mar la spro bar byed pa ni// las kyi mas
180a4(rnying rgyud): dpa' zhes kyang bya// de nas ya ral bsdu ba ni// ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de ltar 'od zer spro bsdu yis// bag chags sgrib pa khad kyis 'bri// ye shes zlab chos ltar skye// de ni rdzogs chen rnal 'byor ro// rdzong dus yab yum gnyis
180a5(rnying rgyud): las// lha bkod 'od zer sgro bsnga dang // yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhigazhom pa dang // gsang ba'i dgra gsum gsod pa dang // 'gro drug g.yangs bcad par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// nang lus kyi dkyil
180a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor la brten te sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dag des gsungs pa// gsang ba'i sgrub pa bstan pa ni// rig pa ye shes dkyil 'khor la// brtan nas a ti yo gar bsgrub// mnor ma bcos chos nyid ni// btsal bar
180a7(rnying rgyud): bsam pa kun las 'das// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i dang // de bzhin nyid las khyad par 'phags// ma ti 'ode bzhin nyid ces b+ha// snang ba med pa'i chong nyid la// zlab dang mkhyab gnyis med de// kun tu snang las khyad par 'phags// ma ti'i kun
180a8(rnying rgyud): t+ya s+thAng zhes bya// btsal ba med pa'i chos nyid las// ma bskyed par ni thams cad 'byung // D+ha nyid las ni khyad par 'phags// sa ti'i rgyu 'i ting 'dzin no// btsal ba med pa'i chos nyid las// bsgrub tu med pa'i 'bras bu shed// 'byung ba lnga las khyad par 'phags//
180b1(rnying rgyud): mnas/ smras// sngam ga sa spyong// ma dang thas mdas gsangs// mang pas thang na// nas la 'ang pas cad pa da ga
180b2(rnying rgyud): sa/ sa mi pa / mo sal napa / ra 'a du rgyug mas su jugs
180b3(rnying rgyud): du med pa sems nyid kyi// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// yanas dbyer med rdzogs sangs rgyas// lha tshogs bskyed las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i lha tshogs bskyed ces bya// dngos med sems kyi ye shes kyis// mtshan pa'i rab
180b4(rnying rgyud): srab sbrid// a ti'i dbang bsgyur byin brlab bya'o// rang byung rig pa'i ye shes ni// btsal zhing bsam pas mi bskyod de// chos kyi dbyings su gshegs pa ni// spyan drangs don las khyad par 'phags// a ti lha tshogs spyan drangs yi na/

180b6(rnying rgyud): gnas pas na// phyag btsal ba las khyad par 'phags// mati'i phyag btsal de la bya// chos nyid btsal du med pa las// chos can mchod pa'i rkyen du snang // sems nyid pa tsal du med pa las// skye mched khams rnams mchod par snang // nam mkha' dmig pa
180b7(rnying rgyud): med pa las// 'byung ba cwa tshogs mchod par snang // thams cad chos nyid rgyun du gsungs// mchod pa bral las khyang par 'phags// mate ma ched pa pral zhes bya// thams cad me dmigs mnyas pa'i dang // das med pas pa 'das brjod du meng // brgya sa
181a1(rnying rgyud): 6hral las khyad par 'a dgas// sati bsnyen 'phrul gas bya// gnyis sa med pa'i sems cad kyis// thams cad rnam gyung ston pas// btubacwa las/ zan par blags// ma 1'gyu // 'ams gsupas smras pan tha /
181a2(rnying rgyud): dang // dus gsum gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // thams cad dbyer med dbyings su bskal// dag 'geg bskal las khyad par 'phags// ma ti'i dgrab sag bsngal zhes bya// snang ba'i yul ni chos nyer la// stong pa'i sems ni ye ga che// gnyis su med pa /
181a3(rnying rgyud): 'drab// srang pa gdab pe khyad par 'phags// a ti'i phur ba gdab cas bya// 'khor ba thams gang dong nas smug/ b+he shrI n+yang nas bcad pas na// pho ba mchod phul les khyang bar 'phags// a ti'i tshogs mchod bral zhes bya// rnams cad dbyings la bkod pas na// g+ha9/
181a4(rnying rgyud): ma'i mchod pa khyad par 'phags// a ti'i lhag mas mchod ces bya// ma skyes pa mi chos nyid kyis// skyes pa'i phung po ste spyan bcad// me dmigs pa yi nam mkha' yis// dmigs pa'i 'byung ba zil gyis man// thams cad kye shi'i rtsab bcad// gzer mnan byas lasa?
181a5(rnying rgyud): nga gas/ nga gning ma da zhes kyang bya// 'khor ba du nyid yang dag byang chub lam// thams cad mya ngan 'das las byed par phyags// skye med do rje lta dri nga nyid las// bye shi 'pho 'byur med pas khyang bu nga grags// nga ma don la gnas pa sa
181a6(rnying rgyud): sa pa ma ngan 'byor gang gdas pa/ nga podon pa 'dris nisangs byas yod / 'atsal du med pa'i'adi na rtogs bsgom pa yin/ mati mga'i don rtogs rim byong te// zhes gsungs so// gsang ba rig pa sems kyi kyi la 'a la ba smrab pa'i ga
181a7(rnying rgyud): ba dang rab tung dang gas ba rla ba bstan pa'i skabs te brgyad pado// / de napa skyid pa la chen pos ting nge 'dzad de las bzhengs te/ 'dras pa'i gakhong tshogs rnams la dag snga nga/ nyid cig 'dus pa'i bas tshogs nas pa/ 'dog she de ba spyo/
181a8(rnying rgyud): ruHlnga pa'o//
181b1(rnying rgyud): !// de yang rgyad 'di'i nang du 'dus// 'jam dpal sku yi sgrub paste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// badz+rag sung gi sgrub pa ste// de la b+ha dA 'di'i nang du 'dus// yang dgu thugs kyi sgrub pa ste// da yang byung 'di'i nang du 'dus// cha mchog yon tan spa ba te//
181b2(rnying rgyud): yang d+had 'dzi'i nang du 'dus// phur du zin las sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyang 'di'i nang du 'dus// ma mo zod gtod sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// rig 'dzin slob dpon sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// 'jig rten mchod rten thab pa
181b3(rnying rgyud): yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// dmod pa drag sngags sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// de phyir bsgrub pa bka' brgyang 'dus// bka' brgyang 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya// zhi ba khro bo thams cad 'dus// zhi kho 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya// bde gshegs thams cad
181b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pas na// bde gsheg 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya// rgyud 'dis dngos grub ste rabs na// mi zad dngos grub gtor gyi rgyud// gtad do 'khor cho gas 'dus pa rnams// tshong zhig rig 'dzin sa thob rnams// khyed kyis yongs su gzung bar gyis// zhes gsungs nas lci dpal kun tu
181b5(rnying rgyud): bzang po chos kyi dbyings su thim mo// rgyud yongs su gtang pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o// // blta ba thams cad kyi yang rtse/ man ngag thams cad kyi sdengs/ bstan pa thams cad kyi srog shing / sgrub pa thams cad kyi bzung / phrin las thams cad kyi rtsa ba/ bslab pa bka/
181b6(rnying rgyud): brkyang 'dus pa'i rgyud ces kyang bya/ khro bo 'dus pa'i rgyud ces kyang bya/ bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud ces kyang bya/ dngos grub gter gyi rgyud ces kyang bya/ spyi dpal kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa bkod pa'i mdo zhes kyang bya/ 'byed par byed la lde mig gi rgyud ces kyang bya'o//
181b7(rnying rgyud): rgyung kyi mtshan bstan pa'i ladz+ra ste drus cu rtsa bdun pa'o// cung kyi mjug bsdunga'i skabs te dbu pa'o// rdzogs so// / rgyal ba'i phreng lde'u bcan gyi phya ga dpe/ rgyas bta' nas rin po che'i gter du sbas pa'o// gter rgya lus kyi gtad rgya/
182a1(rnying rgyud): gas sug na la/ thug / da/ thA rna \u0f7f/ thal gta na gtu rnas sa sas sak+Sha tA pa/ bdasha da / ba nga dang gsha
182a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi lha gsung thugs gsang ba ye shes kyi snying pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing 'dus pa/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyung chen po zhes bya ba/ thams cad ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la rtseg 'tshal lo// 'di da
182a3(rnying rgyud): bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og sbyin chos kyi dbyings kyi bzang sru gsung thugs rdo rjenam dag gsang ba yongs su rdzogs pa mchog gi gnas/ rgya chang phyogs lhung tshad las 'das pa/ rang thung 'ong gyi gzhal yas 'ang na/ ston pa bcwod ldan/
182a4(rnying rgyud): 'das dpal kun tu bzang ba/ drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid/ ma bcas spros med byang chub chen po'i ngang nas rang shar nas/ kun bzung yum gyi b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs te/ kun gzhi ye nas dag pa'i gram gyi mkha' las/ skye ba'i tshe
182a5(rnying rgyud): e yaM hU~M ka~M ra~M b+h+re dra shar bas e las kun rtog go 'byed nam mkha' mthing nag tu gsal/ yaM las 'jig rten 'degs byed drung gi dkyil 'khor ldeng gur gsal/ ra las kun skyed dkyu'i rgya mchong mar nag tu gsal/ de las 'dod khams
182a6(rnying rgyud): gnas ris nyi shu longs kyi rdzogs/ sraM las brtan gzhi gser gyis rngam+b+ha ser nag tu gsal/ de las gzugs khams gnas ris bcu bdun yongs su rdzogs par shar/ raM las 'byung brjod pasnyams bskal pa'i mI'i dmang ser du gsal/ ko lAs rkye
182a7(rnying rgyud): bye dras pa'i ring ba dkar po gas la/ de las gzugs med skyemached chub zhi yongs su rdzogs par shar/ de ltar 'byung ba lnga brtsegs pa'i steng du/ hUM las ye shes lnga ldan tum+b+ha gsar rnying gnam lugs gzer chen 'bar pa'i gzhal yas khang kun tu gru bzha
182b1(rnying rgyud): da maste/ dang ma bya 'ad sub gsas/ dzad yang ma dra/ na tu bye gsu / ga rdzun sa/ gas na rdzun da da
182b2(rnying rgyud): da di sopa/ dugs kyi tho/ shi tsun pa'i san gdugs 'byung ba/ bye ma'i nga sdem s+ho// thod pa'i dra ba 'ang baT/ sagan byang brgya pa/ rmis 'iri/ 'ji ba/ zhus pa'i them pa de nas
182b3(rnying rgyud): babyir dang / chos kyi 'bar rje du srin gyis brgyad pa/ sgo lang sa kyi skyes pa/ gzin gyim thom/ bus thal gyim ma/ zhi brji sa m+b+ha migs byas pa/ tho blang ca dbu smras pa/ darje'i dam me ri da ma nag gis bskor ba/ theg pa patha dag song
182b4(rnying rgyud): ngags pa/ dnga'i bgatun la brji ma pa tu nga ba 'i// ning tung ming ra 'bangs ba na pa myo gas ma kyibs pachag yang mjugs pa/ bzang mi byeg dan dang / gartags brdzu ba kyang / ba bags pa te 'ang/
182b5(rnying rgyud): tucings su'i sprul ba'i gdung srings sa/ myi dogs seng ga dang / dbang btul rtag dang / rngam pa gcig dang / gtum padum dang / slobs lnga grang bacha dang / brjid pa ma te dang / 'jigs pa ni min dang / sheng smral dang / byil song ba 'a /
182b6(rnying rgyud): kyai th+liM dngas su/ 'khor brdzun gning gser gyi 'khor la rtsi bas 'du gnyis pa'i stengs su/ chos kyi sgra las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dpal cho mchog te cag zhes byab/ dus gsum stsal ba'i sa nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su rdzogs pa'i brdad/ dab nyi
182b7(rnying rgyud): gcig tu bstan pa/ chags pa can kyi 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyir phyag bzhi 'argyan gnyis na/ zhi ba'i lta ba zhing bu ni gnyis yab sum thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyal du bsdams pa/ zhe sdang can kyi 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyir/ dpe'i kyi mas bzus yul smrab po/
183a1(rnying rgyud): sang nas thams cad kyi bdun byu sa/ gu dbu'i chum du bzhugs pa/ sa gzo ma gnas zhalam/ dathang bu mug ba brkyad de/ theg pa dgra dang srung ba brgya ba rgyan yangs s+ho/ gas rdul du bzhugs pa/ g.yas dag
183a2(rnying rgyud): 'khyud pa/ g.yon dung dmar gcol stob pa/ thabs shes rab yongs su rdzogs brdar/ yab yum gnyis med du sbyor zhing / gzhal yas khang gangan dang bcas pa la/ 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngang las yab yum myong ba mdzad
183a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ sbrul su'i khro bo 'chol pa gyogs bcur 'gros/ lha chen po la sogs dregs pa can thams cad btul tshar bcad de/ phyogs mtshams brgyad du bting ba las/ sprul pa sku'i dkyil 'khor bkod de/ shar du badz+ra
183a4(rnying rgyud): ka thugs las sprul te bzhugs/ lhor gshin rje gsher po sku las sprul te bzhugs/ nub tu rta mgrin dbang chen gsung las sprul te bzhugs/ byang du rdo rje gzhon nu phrin las las sprul te bzhugs/ shar lhor gzi brjing las sprul tha med he ru kar
183a5(rnying rgyud): bzhugs/ nub byang du 'jigs byed las srul dpal dregs pa kun 'dul bzhugs/ gyar shar du stobs las sprul pa stobs ldan nag po bzhugs/ lho nub tu rig pa las sprul pa'i sku/ rig 'dzin rdo rje chos bzhugs su gsol// de dag la yang so
183a6(rnying rgyud): so'i sprul pa yang sbrul sum sprul khro bo dang / khro mo dang bcas te/ pho thang dgral gar dgu dang ldan pas khams gsum 'jigs byed dpal gyi chas yongs su rdzogs par yab yum gyi mkha' gsang las sprul te/ nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor ye shes
183a7(rnying rgyud): rang sna'i gi lha tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'khor ro// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ gleng gza'i lawaM ste dang rag/ @/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka la/ 'a
183b1(rnying rgyud): rigs pan cadrug pa sogs pa tha ba dang bla mo rnams dang / gsang ba'i bdag parda rna chas kyis mu ga dang kar bam du/ mami nag cig tu'ang gang bsnad nga zhus pa/ amaH// na.u gying sa zlos thal na ma pa'i nags grong nang/
183b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i sprin 'phel zhi dang khro gar mdzad// phrin las yongs rdzogs char gyis 'gro ba 'dul// phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas kun gyi yang rje la'o// oM ma gsang bdag dpal chen he ru ka/ 'gro ba'i dug gzhom yang dag lam gzung phyir// bde ga she
183b3(rnying rgyud): yongs rdzogs dpal chen thugs gsang ba// kun 'dus shin tu rnal 'byor rgyud chen rtsol// zhes bstod de klus bskul cing gsol ba btab pa las yab ci ga dpal chen che mchog he ru kas// rdo rje'i gad rgyangs bsgrags te stsol pa// /
183b4(rnying rgyud): sras mchog rigs 'dus he ru ka/ yab yum 'khor bcas legs par nyon// mun la nyi bzhin du gsol ba// gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud chen bshad// mdor na chos sgo bsam yas kun// 'di ru 'dus kyi dngos po bcu// brtan rim thag pa
183b5(rnying rgyud): rnam gzhag dang // lta sgom skyod pa 'bras bu dang // bsnyen dang bsgrub pa chen po dang // dbang bskur dam tshig mtha' rgyas su// rgyud rnams kun gyi gsang ba 'dus// skal ldan 'khor la yongs rdzogs bstan// zhes bka' stsal to// dang
183b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ gnang ba'i skabs phye ba gleng bskyang ba'i le'u ste gnyis la'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams thams cad mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/
183b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang // dpal chen che mchog he ru ka/ chud don bstan pa'i rnam gzhag de// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad ces ni gsol pa dang // ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// kye ho 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams
184a1(rnying rgyud): du / sa / na
184a2(rnying rgyud): bam dzin gyis// na bye ma'angs bajud pa dang // rnalalangang byang mtsho ci/ 'chu brjid dang thags 'a gyis// 'ams gsasam byeng drung drug 'thams// matogs sog pa gas palas// yul dbang
184a3(rnying rgyud): rdol bang tha bya rdzogs bad// dang thab par ma dang / sa ca byu nga pag zung/ gled ba dbang 'a ngan sa gas// del gag su gsum/ gang ga dbang 'brings gangs// brgyad dang rdzogs
184a4(rnying rgyud): dbang po rab la ga dge// bya dbang par me gras byed// rangs par rab dang // ngam chag dbye bar 'dod kyig// 'dun so sa rtsod sgom pa dang / drin las 'bram bu'i rim pa bcan/ rgyal dgongs thog pa tshogs kyang // klub go
184a5(rnying rgyud): yis/ 'og ming bu ma rnapa ma ldan nga// daci sa kyis grang ma 'a du// dag pagrasra ci sa srungs// ga gzug gi'i thas par bya// dpa' bar 'das mang mdzags pas/ bgang thag sa myongs pa do/
184a6(rnying rgyud): ri cad du dag/ phyag gsum byam pa sangs rgya// dkyi ngas rdzogs rgyu kyi 'dir// byang sring ma dang ga yongs su rdzogs// rgyung dang ma yang thugs kyi byung // 'di las gsang ba'i ngas don med// sa bka' ngas te// dpal zhes
184a7(rnying rgyud): ba 'dus pa rnyed kyi rgyal polas/ bdun pa rim pa theg pa'i rnab gzhag 'astan pa'i 'ang ste gsum ba'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'byor rnams kyis/ gyun pa kung tu bzang po dpal tshemachog drag la gsol pa/ ba/ yang dag do
184b1(rnying rgyud): rdzu ta// nga sa// da nas gas sa 'dus/
184b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal rate// gdi med pa'i sems nyid 'di// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yid// 'khor dang mA ngan 'das pa'i chos// ye nas ma bcos chos kyi rtsa// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// thugs dgongs yang mdzang thug
184b3(rnying rgyud): rna srid gzhir bzhe skya ba rtsa// 'khor 'das gnyis med yongs su rdzogs// he ru ka las gzhan sa rin// thig le snying po byang sems brdal// yang dge don gyi gnas lugs te// spos bral thig le gcig tu rdzogs// pa byung rab dang
184b4(rnying rgyud): dang bzhen ma bcos spos bral ba zhag// zung chen dam mkhar lding ba bzhid// rna srid rtsi rgya rlabs kyis tshad// sems las kun 'byung bad gshegs sems// rang las sangs rgyas gzhan na meng // bltas pas dpal zin 'al
184b5(rnying rgyud): mthong // tshig po tshon dper bya kun las 'das// brjod dang brjod bral gnyis su med// bsta bya ma 'gags lta byen med// gnyis med don rtogs chos kyi sku// rang rig sems la sems kyis ltos// ngos bzung mthub ngobos stong // stong pa
184b6(rnying rgyud): nga de ra dgas la la// gas pa pa'i dus na dngos po med// dngos med de tid gsal bar nar// de rtsi ga' la stong gnyis su med// sa tri ga ga 'dzin zhon zeng // de la dgangs pa mangs rdzogs te// kun gyis ma rtogs gas
184b7(rnying rgyud): garangal 'dus kyi gsang ba 'dus// theg pa kun gyi rgyal po yin// zhes bka' stsam te// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ ba btsun pa'i lengs bzhi pa// / dems yang 'dus pa'i 'khor na
185a1(rnying rgyud): cis// tod patsun tu pa nga bdapas ma nag ta ga la gsol pa/ rlung bzhin ma pacos sa bad+ma// 'dur ma maman ta// rlu nga sgom pa 'a byar// 'dag gdus sa 'dadas rna/
185a2(rnying rgyud): s+yAd gsol pa thugs dgongs te// nyon pa can pos desngang chul pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rtse gcig nyon// rgyud den bsgom pa'i rgyal ba ni// mi bsgom bsgo ma dod de shes nas// sgo gsum ma bathos sor 'dzags// 'das
185a3(rnying rgyud): 'ongs rdzogs bsgom pa yin// gdod nas chos sku rang gi sems// sta bas stong gsal dbyer med rtogs// gdeng 'og chung nas rgyan du gsal// de ni dpal chen bsgom pa yin// byabs kyis tshong pa'i lta ba yis// snang sring
185a4(rnying rgyud): dpal chen spu ru bsgom// gsal stong gnyis mid bsgom pa'i mchog/ sgra ru brag tshad ngo bos stong // zag stong gnyis med bsgom pa'i mchog/ yin ni 'gyu dran ngo bos stong // dran stong gnyis med bsgom pa'i mchog
185a5(rnying rgyud): dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med cing // thabs shes gnyis med bsgom pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med cing // 'khor 'das gnyis med bsgom pa'i mchog/ yul dang dbang po gnyis med cing // bde mug
185a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis med bsgom pa'i mchog/ rang rig dpal dang gnyis med cing // lta snod gnyis med bsgom pa'i 'chog/ rnam rtog chos sku gnyis med cing // mtshan mazil gdon bsgom pa'i mjog/ gnyis med don la dbang rdong na/
185a7(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin mongs phyogs bsgom pa yin// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa spyad kyi rgyal po las/ bsgom pa bstan pa'i lo'u ste lnga pa'o// / de das pa 'dus pa'i 'khor na du kyis/ rten pa kun tu dang
185b1(rnying rgyud): dpal chomatshan tacag la gsol pan/ rang kyang rnyog pa cad tu ba dang // 'di rjod sdem ga ten// rlu don dung bu rnal pa'o// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsal bu// ngaslad gsal ba thugs dgang sa thor pa
185b2(rnying rgyud): chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rtse gcig ton// rgyud don spyod pa'i rgyal po ni// gang ltar lha sgom phyir med pa'i// ngang las 'bral med spod pa'i mchog/ nyin sngar rtogs pa'i ngan bstan nas// d+hi las
185b3(rnying rgyud): bde bskyod pa'i mchog/ rig pa gar 'grus sta bzar// rang snang 'dzin med smod pa'i mchog/ 'dzin pa grol bas snang ba dag/ snang ba lan thub spyod pa'i mchog/ tshogs drug yul zhen rtsad chod nas// 'khor ba d+has thebs spyod pa'i
185b4(rnying rgyud): mchog/ nyams len goms pas nam rtog yal// dus bzhi mnyam sbyor spyod pa'i mchog/ mnyam rjes rtog langs dus gsum du// chos sbar grol ba spyod pa'i mchog/ 'khor 'das spang zhing rang grol nas// dus gsum bde gsheg spyod pa'i mchog
185b5(rnying rgyud): skang brag drang rtog thams cad kun// dpal med sku gsung thugs spyod pa// rgyal ba yongs rdzogs spong ba yin// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi grul po las/ spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas 'dras
185b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khyor rnams kyis/ dpal kun tu bzang po che mchog rte zhal gsol pa// / gsul yongs rdzogs kun tu bzang // bdag nyid kyi mchog te ruka/ rgyud don 'bras bu'i rgyal po de// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsal zhu// de skad gsol pa thug dgongs/
185b7(rnying rgyud): te// rton pa chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'das pa'i 'khor rnams kyi 'acig ton// rgyud dang 'bras bu'i thal por/ lci ba mngon gyur sgrib g.yogs bral// srin bzang rgyal pa'i 'bras bu yin// drin grol mthar byin phyir mi zlog/ dus gsul ba gshegs
186a1(rnying rgyud): 'bras bupar// sangs rgyas par 'an du 'dus pa// rtsub pa sa rdzogs 'bas nga// sang sadzags dadan thos thug// byab na su'i 'bras // danas rje shad na da/
186a2(rnying rgyud): yid// gnyis med nga nam cing dbang sprul// 'gro 'du su d+ha'i 'bras bu yin// rtogs na bcos med rting pa dod// yanas rang rdza bas tha ben// snang dang mi gnyis su med// tha dad byeng med na ngan/ da kyis dang sa bcus
186a3(rnying rgyud): tha dad byer med 'bras bu yid// lha sgom sdod 'bras gnyis su med// tha dad dbyer med 'bras bu yid// tshogs lhungs srung gnyis su med// thaMngadang darjer ming 'bras bu yin// rgya chang mtshang gnyis su mang// tha dang rgyar meng 'bras
186a4(rnying rgyud): dang phyi mtha' ma gnyis su med// thang da dbyer mod 'bras bu yin// rang byung gzhan kyang gnyis su med// thad da dbyer med 'bras bu yin// 'khor dang myang 'das gnyis su med// tha dad dbyed med 'bras bu yang // mthar kyang rtswa dang ma shes tshogs// thams
186a5(rnying rgyud): namongs rdzogs 'thul ba med// he mug mi 'bras bu yin// zhes bka' stsal te// dpalags dpa'adus pa cud kyi rgyal po las/ 'bras bu bsten pa'i le'u ste bdud pa'o// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ sbyor ba kun tub /
186a6(rnying rgyud): dngul cha mchog te cag la gsol ba/ #/ dkyil 'khor bdag nyid kya tu nga // sdug pa'i sgra ma ro ga te rtsa// rgyud don yongs rdzogs kyi bsted sgrub// bdag cag rnams la bka' bral bu// deskang gsol ba jugs dgongs // nga
186a7(rnying rgyud): dpos bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams ga cig ta// ni wa mongs rdzogs bsnyen sgrub ni// gzhal las khang nyid skrag phung thugs yang sa rdzogs// tshogs mtha' smos bcang bsgrub grags ngo thor byar// mes sgrub ma
186b1(rnying rgyud): rang bkwin las// yongs su sgyur 'tsho 'phrul gzhal yas b+ha// gi tho bdag shugs sprul su byas pa kyi khab// bdagashegs mkha' mnyam yongs rdzogs rtsa ba'i b+ha// bdom ldan dpal can rnams gzugag rgyan// thabs shas cang 'jug sangs
186b2(rnying rgyud): mnyam tho bas// spang gan stod byed 'de yin g.yung drung ste// rigs brgyan gnyis lnga gsum yong ma rdzogs su// chags can 'du gyir thabs gsang rang byung ba// 'byung bzhi dbang chen gzhal yas 'thil pa'i dbus// rin chen 'od kyid dkyi la
186b3(rnying rgyud): bas bzhi ba// ba' blo 'dir bar byasas drim par brtags// rdo thung na brdud ta bcis rgyun phyogs pangs// sa dkar gsal 'jor zhi rnyan man ga/ song gagang chen du dang ma tha byung // rin can gyi rkang pa dastong bar du kyil// 'adz+ra
186b4(rnying rgyud): pa nyi ma'i gdan ster gsal// mi bskyod mthing ga rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// sdang mdzad dkar po 'khor lo dril bu 'dzin// rin 'byung ser po nor bu dril bu 'dzin// mtha' yas dmar po pad+ma dril bu 'dzin// don grub ljang gu rgya gram dril bu 'dzin// kyad
186b5(rnying rgyud): kyang rdzogs skyil gnyis med yA mchen no// bzang mo stan dang bA ma gos dkar stsol// g.yas pa rigs 'dzin g.yon dril yab la 'byung // kun bzang yid mthing rdo rje dril bu bsdams// bzang mo chos mthi mnyam gzhag phyag rgya gsal/
186b6(rnying rgyud): sbrul 'khor sa snying nam mkha'i snying po dang // spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug na rdo rje ming // lA s+ye mA le gId+d+hi ni rti sring // kun bzang byams pa sgrib sel 'jam dbyangs ming // me tog bdug spros mar me dri chab sring // lha dbang thag bzang
186b7(rnying rgyud): shaMk+Sha trub seng rab brtan// kha 'bar chos rgyal l-i sogla thub pa drug/ gshi rdo rje stobs chen rta mgron bdud rtsi 'khyil// ro lang+ga mi 'pham ral gcig bro gnyer yum// 'khor rnams nyi ma'i zer ltar rang bzhin 'du// rin chen rgyan
187a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs tshul dgu'i gar ldan mangs// de las spro bsu tshe 'phrul cir yang bang // 'dre chen long spyad rdzogs su kun gyi zhal// bsam gyis mi khyab pa dar 'dus rigs brgya yongs// rdza ba sngar rdzogs de nyid kun
187a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa// gcig dang tha dad skyong nyid snying rje bstan// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' shel gyi mdog/ rgyal ba'i spyi gzugs zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// phyag g.yas rdo rje rtse lnga thugs kar bsdams// g.yon pas dngul dkar dril bu dkal
187a3(rnying rgyud): brten// zhabs gnyis skyil krung nyi zla pad dkyil bzhugs// zhi tshul rgyan ches 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar// dung khang 'khor lo ljags pad thugs rdo rje// oM dkar AHdmar hU~M mthing 'phro 'dur bzlas// gyen du bde gshegs sku gsung thugs mchod bskul/
187a4(rnying rgyud): thur du snod bcud lus ngag yod sgri bskyang // tshur 'dus sku gsung thugs bcud dngos grub bsdu// rang sems rnam dag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// sku gsung thugs su bde bar gshegs par bstan// rgyud lung man ngag yongs rdzogs sgo nas bsgrub// dgra
187a5(rnying rgyud): gsum bdud bzhi 'gro drug g.yang sa bcad// sum cu phrag drug gis 'grub las rnams 'grub// sku dang ye shes yongs rdzogs lhun gyis grub// rang bzhin zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam bkod la// bde gshegs rgyal ba yongs kyis dbu chen no// de ltar phyogs
187a6(rnying rgyud): bad+ma'i rgyal ba longs rdzogs rnams// gadrug pa 'dul phyer khro bo rol par bstan// rab tu gdul dka' khro zhing gtum pa la// zhing sa lhag pas phan par mi 'gyur phyir// gi tshogs dbu yi gtsug tu rab bsdus nas// bcom ldan par gshegs rgyal ba yongs
187a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa// rab 'jigs khro bo rol pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan// stong gsal rgyu las rang byung gzhal yas ni// chos dbyings mi 'gyur mthing nag gru gsum e// stobs chen g.yo byad ldang nag kha gde ng+ga yaM// thugs rje'i rlan gyis kun sdud dmar na gar// rab
187b1(rnying rgyud): brtan kun shor 'acu gsum rdzogs byed kyi// 'od gsal sprin byed dngos 'joms dmar ser ro// rdo rjes mkhregs nus pa'i ri rab stongs// gyi dang nang gsal rin chen yongs rdzogs b+h+rUM// gzhal yas bkod pa zad med rnam dag dbus// theg pa dang rdzogs
187b2(rnying rgyud): dpa' tshe dkyil 'khor dgu// 'khor 'das dbyer med ye shes sgo dgur gsal// ye shes lnga rdzogs rtsibs bzhi lte bar bcas// thugs rje'i zer ldan spos bral mu khyud mdzes// yon tan ma bklag rin chen bur brkyang ldang // mtshan nyid bzhi rdzogs
187b3(rnying rgyud): tshad rngam bzhis spras// de bzhin pho brang dgu la drin las rdzogs// bdud 'joms ka 'di ma srin gdan stengs badzugs// thabs shes nyi zla'i ka zhus zhing gdung btegs// thugs rjes gdal khyab rU dza'i lpags thog thub// sku gsum ldan grab zod tshar bum
187b4(rnying rgyud): brtsegs la// gnam lcags rig rtsal gzer gyis rab tu bsdams// ye shes bzhi ldan zad zal nang sgo bzhi// ye shes zer lngas gling dgu'i bar mtshams bris// chag pa'i thug rje sa rak+ta'i zham chu 'bab// snying po'i dor rtogs po smos brgya
187b5(rnying rgyud): chos sku mnyam rdzogs par khyams 'khor yug brdal// dgos 'dod skong rin chen sna lngas brtsigs// tshad med bzhi ldan sgo ba'i phyogs bzhir bathang // rnam thar brgyad kyi tham skas rim par brtan// thugs rjes 'dzin phyir chu srin ya them mdzes// @
187b6(rnying rgyud): po sri'i dul ma the ma rus sbal brjid// gdug pa tshar gcod sbrul nag skyes bu btsugs// 'khor ba rgyud gcod zhing lpags tshwa logs bcad// chos kyi gaN+DI song dang dril bu bsgrags// yul brgyad 'dzin bcom gru bkyad ka gdan stengs// tshogs brgya
187b7(rnying rgyud): rang dag skyeng rgyad ka bar btsugs// thabs shes brgyad ldan gza' brgyar gsung bskal// bcu drug rol pa'i zhing spug gdung chen bkram// 'bru byed dang grol kun grol rgyu skar dral grab pakram// bzang ngan med mnyam zhing chen lpags thog bkram// @
188a1(rnying rgyud): ngag smang na pa gas / lung yangs// 'khor 'das skyetshangs rdzas pa'i thabs pa// myur gyis mgos 'am stan padz+rar gas la// salam yangasardzogs 'khor 'dagras 'khor la brtags// kun 'jun
188a2(rnying rgyud): gzugs tog rngam// bstan pa'i spri phung bya dra dang dpyangs brgyan// phrin las bzhi rdzog sa rat+na'i rta babs brtsags// chags bral pad skyengs chos 'khor rab tu mdzes// rgyu zad phyogs su ma lhung zhing gadrags zab// rang byung mi nub mi mgo rin
188a3(rnying rgyud): tog/ rig stong dbyer med ri dwags chu srin mdzes// dbyings rig yongs 'brel sprin nag grib so gtibs// dbyings las rtsal shar sgo khang rgyan dgus mdzes// 'dod yon zhen med spyod phyir 'dod khyams bskor// dbyings nas kun sdang mu tig thod
188a4(rnying rgyud): spras// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs shel gyi mchod rten dkrigs// sna tshogs 'od gsal mchog phran he ru ka/ ma rig sgrib sel bcu gcig rdo rje gseng // thabs kyis sgrib sel zla byed rdo rjes brgyan// bdud 'joms zhing drang lha chen rgyal mtshan
188a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i g.yul rgyal zhing chen 'phan brgyad byar// don rtags brgyad ldan dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor// tshul bcu'i mtha' grol he ru'i gnas bcus gtams// khams gsum zil gnon chu gram rwa bzhis mnan// ma chags
188a6(rnying rgyud): las kun khyab pad stod brdal// sangs rgyas stong rdzogs 'khor lo rtsi bas stong phrag/ gsang sngags snying po 'gyur med brag ris gtams// gnyen pos mi shegs rdo rje'i rabs bskor// gzung 'dzin nags sreg yo shes me lnga 'bar// rtsol song
188a7(rnying rgyud): sa pa'i rma pad gang na brjid// dgos 'dod kun 'byung gter bum dpag bsam rgyas// sdang srid yongs rdzogs gzhal yas khang chen gsal// phyi nang 'khor lo rin chen gsang ba e// zhi khwa'i rgyar sogs dbye'am yongs rdzogs pa/
188b1(rnying rgyud): gang la gang 'dul dkyil 'khor 'phrul shes bya// gzhal yas de dag rnal 'byor rang lus la// yongs rdzogs sku brtan mchod rdzas dur khrod rdzogs// de yang rang rig sems kyi dkyil 'khor du// yongs rdzogs thag le nyag gcig ngom
188b2(rnying rgyud): te// rgya chad phyogs lhung kun bral gzhal mtha' yas// dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs kun gyi mthar thug yin// sgrub rdzas rten gyi rim pa mchod bcas ni// sku gsung thugs yon phrin las dmigs pa'i rten// sku rten gzugs
188b3(rnying rgyud): gsung rten snying po dgod// yon tan bdud rtsi srin las phur pa bsham// sgos rten zhib mthar thug a dkar la// che mchog yongs rdzogs sgrub rten bum mthar zug/ de bzhin yang dag me gcig gshin rje khram// pad+ma rta thong rta zhal phrin phur gcig
188b4(rnying rgyud): ma mo nal snying rig 'dzin sku gcig ma// dregs pa sku gcig drag sngags byang gcig ste// rten rnams yod rdzogs subardzas rang lus yi ni// rig pa'i sems nyid sgrub rten kun mthar thug/ 'dod yan rdzas 'jom gyi yi mchod pas te// rang lus rang
188b5(rnying rgyud): byung bdud rtsi nang mchod rdzas// rtog tshogs rang byung rang grol gsang mchod de// yid chos dbyer med dang dngas mchod mthar thug/ dkyil 'khor ste dbus zla kham e yi dkyil// chos dbyings a las rang byung ljon grub lha// kun bzang che mchog khro rgyal he
188b6(rnying rgyud): ka/ mthing na gzhal gsum phyag dug zhabs bzhi bgrang// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing bzhad gshe rngam// g.yas gsum rtse dgu rtse lnga rtse gsum bsnams// g.yon gsum b+han+da dung dmar rbod khrag bsdams// rdo rje'i gshog g.yas rin chen
188b7(rnying rgyud): gshog g.yon gdengs// sku gsung thugs ldan srog gi ye shes gsal// dpal gyi chas bcu dur khrod rkyen yongs spras// zhabs bzhi dor stabs g.yas brgya g.yon bskums tshul// gnam zhal yum chen zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing /
189a1(rnying rgyud): na cag g.yas cagasusu gathor la byud g.yon dmar thog// zhabs g.yas yab 'khril g.yod brgyang ga la stor// rigs pas rab tun dang thod nang drug gsol// gnyis yang rab tshigs pa dpung gyur na rjid// bangs
189a2(rnying rgyud): mkha' kasang rab skyor sbrul sras 'gyed// sha kyi rtsibs stong sa rak+Sha he ru ka/ spug nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'khor lo g.yas// g.yon pa thod khrag zhabs gnyis brkyang baM sum 'gyings// rak+Sha kro t+ti shwa rI cha lugs yab 'dra 'khri la//
189a3(rnying rgyud): ya he ru gser nag/ zhal gcig rgya ga gnyis rin chen thong khrag bsdams// k+Shu ya kro tI shwa rI yab 'dra 'khril// nubartsibs bi shwa he ru ka dmar nag/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pad+ma thod khrag bsdams// pi sh+tsa kro dz+nyi shwa rI yab 'dra 'khril// byang rtsib
189a4(rnying rgyud): he sha ljang dag/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgya tha mthod khrag thogs// yak+Sha kr-id+d+hi shwa rI yab 'dra 'khril// dur khrod chas gsol brda rtags gtso dang 'dra// nyi dang zer bzhin sprul pa'i 'khor chags ni// phyogs skyong dregs 'dul khro bo chen po badz+ra// ta
189a5(rnying rgyud): sgo skyong go nya bstan srung bcas// che mchog yon tan yongs rdzogs rang byung shar// phyogs mtshams pho brang bachung ngu thugs kyi sras// dkyil 'khor shar dbus zla kham e ya~M dkyil// ru d+ha nyi zla pad+ma 'od 'bar steng // bcom ldan thugs mchog ba
189a6(rnying rgyud): rug/ mthing nagu zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing bzhad rngam gshe// g.yas gsum rdo rje kha T+wAM je chung bsdams// g.yon gsum dril bu b+han dmar rgyu zhags bsnams// gshog gnyis zhabs pa
189a7(rnying rgyud): brkyangs bskums dor stabs tshul// sku gsung thugs srog dur khrod chas rnams rdzogs// kro d+he shwa rI yum chen sku la 'khril// phyag zhabs chas sogs brdas bskul gtso dang 'dra// shar gyi rtsibs stongs bud+d+ha he ru ka/ spug nag g.yas pa rdo rje
189b1(rnying rgyud): nga shA / na rdzag pas gyu ga pan nga rgya/ du / sa gag sa sad na sa mas// ma ga yas sunang nas sa ba// ra rdzoms sa // dang
189b2(rnying rgyud): nyi bsgoms// badz+ra tsugasas 'arjid g.yod ma rtog// ni nga su / nanags pa ston tha thas sa brdu // gamang pasas byud ba da cug/ do

189b6(rnying rgyud): nga pa bri bsnams// ga pa lag ba phrulas gyud kyiyon lachong// sa cos med ga'i/ mas pabargya ga med pa dag pa mas// gtum ma drug rdul g.yas 'thung g.yan dam so
189b7(rnying rgyud): sa rgyam su ming ga/ g.yas pa thugags par hU~M sang ni sa gsas 'byung nas tshun sa pa ci rid bu dgapa/ gangs pa ga shing ga 'an pa dang yang
190a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ nag mar ti g.yas 'khrung g.yon dmar stong// yul 'khor phyogs slong ched po brda gnyis dang // sgo myong bka' srung 'jam dpal sna rdzogs shar// dkyil 'khor rngub dbus n+ya da ma pa dkyil// k+Sha chu
190a2(rnying rgyud): tu 'od 'bar steng // bcom ldan gsung mchog pa d+ma dbang chen du// dmar na ga zhal gsum rtsag drug zhabs bzhi bgrang // g.yas dkar g.yon rdzo dbus dmar bzhad gsheng ma// g.yas gsum rdo rje ban+de sbal zhags bsdams

190a4(rnying rgyud): phrul gtso dang 'dra// shar rtsibs steng du rdo rje dbang chen dkar// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon bzod khrag bsdams// rdo rje dbang phyug g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stom lho rtsibs snying du rin chen dbang cher mer// g.yas pa ri chen g.yon pa rjong khrag
190a5(rnying rgyud): bsnams// rata dbang phyug g.yas 'khyung ga yon dmar stog/ rdubagribs steng dri bang+ga dbang can dmar// g.yas pa pad dag R+tha pa tha~Md khrig bsnga sa/ pad+ma dbang drug gi pas 'byung g.yon khrun stog// phung gribs phreng du ga rma bang cam
190a6(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa rgya bram g.yod pa thod khrag bsnams// kerma dbang phyug g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// sbrul 'kho zil gnon bo yab yum brgyad// sgo sbyong bka' srung pad+ma gsung rdzogs shr-ir// dkyil 'khor thung dbus d+ha ga ma oM yi dbus/
190a7(rnying rgyud): na bdu 'od 'brang // bcom ldan las sro rdo rjegazhong // mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs pa'i bgrad// g.yas dkar ni yod dmar da bus mthong babang gshe rngam// g.yas g.yang dngas rtse dgram dpung sku
190b1(rnying rgyud): par gnyis rtse lnga pa TI mtha' phur 'dril// ga sho ka kanyis zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums dor stabs tshul// sku gsung thugs srog dur khrod chas rnams rdzogs// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs yum chen skya la 'khril// phyag zhabs chas sogs 'das
190b2(rnying rgyud): bskul gtso dang 'dra// shar rtsibs sras mchog bud+d+ha kI la dkar// g.yas pa phur pa g.yon pa tha~Md khrag bsnams// yum gcig sangs rgyas g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// lho rtsibs sras mcho ga rat+na kI la ser// g.yas pa dgra sta g.yon pa
190b3(rnying rgyud): khrag pha snams// yum chen rin chen g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// nub rtsibs sras mchog pad+ma kI la dmar// g.yas pa gri gug g.yon pa thod khrag bsdams// yum gcig pad+ma g.yas 'khrud g.yon dmar stob// byad rtsibs srang
190b4(rnying rgyud): mchog ka rma kI la ldang // g.yos pa mdung zung g.yon pa thod khri ga bsnams// yum gcig las byed g.yas 'khyud g.yon dmar stob// sbrul 'khor khro bcu yab yum za gsod bcas// sgo kyong bka' sung phrin las phur tshags shar// shar
190b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor zla gam e dbus su// ma mo nyi zla pad+ma 'od 'bar steng // dpal chen bla med gsang ba mngon rdzogs sku// mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mching brjid dang ldan// g.ya
190b6(rnying rgyud): gsum rdo rje khyud khwa sbal zhugs bsnams// g.yon gsum b+han dmar zhing dbyug dung chen bsnams// kun bzang nyid bzhi bde mchog sku la 'khril// g.yas pa dril bu gtso 'khyud g.yon dmar sto ba// yab yum klu la dur khrod chas rnams
190b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// 'khor lo'i rtsibs sher rnam snang gsal dkar mo// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje zod khrag bsdams// 'khor lo'i lho rtsibs 'od gsal 'bar ser mo// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rin chen thod khrag bsdams// 'khor lo'i
191a1(rnying rgyud): nub rtsibs gnyen gsal 'bar dmar mo// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pad+ma thod khrag bsdams// 'khor lo'i byang rtsibs yang gsal g.yos sngon mo// zhal gcig phyag gnyis gya gram zod khrag ba snrums// dpal
191a2(rnying rgyud): chen mdun zur bkrag gsal mnyam mthing nag/ zhal gcig phyug gnyis 'khor lo thod khrag bsnams// sprul 'khor rje mo sman mo bdun cu gnyis// sgo skyong bka' sbrang rgod gtong yongs rdzogs shar// lho nub dkyil 'khor zla ga ma e yi
191a3(rnying rgyud): dbus// seng chen dar gyi lo long pad brtsegs steng // dpal chen rdo rje thod partsal mchog sku// zhal phyag suM mdog phyag mtshan sna tshogs kyang // mi rnams 'dul phyir zhal gcig phyag gnyis gsal// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa dril bu
191a4(rnying rgyud): 'khrol// gnyis med yum chen rdo rje rnal 'byor 'khril// yab yum srul rin chen rus pas brgyan// dbang gi thor tshugs ldem pa dar dmar bcings// 'khor lo'i rtsibs shar lhun grub rig 'dzin dkar// rtsibs lhor phyag
191a5(rnying rgyud): rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin ser// nub rtsibs tshel dbang ba'i rig 'dzin dmar// byang rtsibs rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin ldang // kun kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis thor tshugs can// rin chen rus pa dar snga'i rgyan gyis spras// sprul 'khor grub
191a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i rig 'dzin chen po brgyad// sgra skyong bka' srung rig 'dzin yongs rdzogs shAr// nub byung dkyil 'khor zla ga ma e'i dbus su// zhwa ldan nyi bla pad+ma 'od 'bar steng // dpal chen rdzogs pa kun 'dul 'jigs byed su// mthing dag
191a7(rnying rgyud): zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs pa zhing bgrod// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing rngam la 'jigs// g.yas gsum rdo rje lha brgyad mgo mo 'dzin// g.yon gsum thun dmang klu brgyad mdo kho bsnams// srid baspyi 'dral sbrul dgyes pa
191b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzul/ mkhar rtsibs sha nga yum hA nag/ g.yas pa bcon g.yan pa zo dang drug bsngams// snga ba byed sum nag na thar mabyung zag rtsub// 'amar byabs ku zusas rtang dkar nag/ g.yas pa kham shang g.yon pa zad khrag bsnams// nAn rdza
191b2(rnying rgyud): te/ khwam shing nad kyal thogs// 'khor rtsibs nub tu srin po klog phreng nag/ g.yas pa glog phreng g.yon pa ser ba thogs// rnal mgo khrag meg thar ba mi mgo 'dzin// 'khor rtsibs byang du gnod sbyin me dpral nag/ g.yas pa rin chen g.yon pa zangs gri bsnga
191b3(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin rnon mo lnga thig yu spang thogs// sprul 'khor sde dpon nyi shu rab 'jigs bskor// yang sbrul sgo skyong 'jig rten dregs tshogs shar// bAr shar dkyil 'khor zla ga ma e yi dbus// dgra bgegs nyi zla pad+ma 'bar ba'i sted// dpal chen drag po stobs lda
191b4(rnying rgyud): nag po'i sku// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi dor stabs bgrad// dbu gsum mthing nag nag dang nag 'tsher khros// g.yas gsum rdo rje lce brgyad tsit+ta bsnams// g.yon gsum tho khrag klu brgyad tsit+taM 'dzin// 'byung lnga'i bdag mo gzugs 'degs
191b5(rnying rgyud): 'dod kha mas gnon// rtsibs shar gshin rje 'chi bdag nag po'i sgra// g.yas pa gri khrag g.yon pa thod// khrag bsnams// gsod byed tig mo zangs gri tse t+ta 'dzin// rtsibs lhor bdud nag mo yi kha rlangs can// g.yas pa kha T+wAM g.yon pa tri shUl thogs// bang
191b6(rnying rgyud): ma nag mo khram shing zong rlon 'dzin// nubartsibs srin po gsod byed 'bar ba stug/ g.yas pa ral gri g.yon pa zod khrag thogs// za byed nag mo gri glag thod khrag thogs// byad rtsibs gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po lnga// g.yas pa ral gri g.yon pa dar
191b7(rnying rgyud): nag 'phyang // sha za ni mi dang dag mi lpags thogs// sprul 'khor lde dpona'i jigs byed bcu yis bskor// sngags padag bregs pa yangs rdzogs drag po shar// kun kyang khro rngam sgeg pa dpa' la 'jigs// snying rje'i sman ldan kang dgra'i chas rdzogs
192a1(rnying rgyud): na du smras susu // sa na/ na na ngan
192a2(rnying rgyud): gas gang grar ba rgya kyang gsal// mnga' 'gro ging gtso gzhi bzhi ma thing shad// zlo ba 'i khyod mdzad po rgyal yab su brgyad// ya hrIny+tsa kr-ita dkar batha~Md dbyug lugs byatshogs// rbaSh+mA kyi ti sa~M ma gyi gsul nags sogapa//

192a4(rnying rgyud): song dra dbang rgyag sa// nye ra ba~M rgyang DAkaM sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // gang chen bco brgyad lang+ka brtan ma dang // lo hA drug sus bzhi sprin lcar na skor// srang phred yongs rdzog d+hA ra gsa'i rnam par dag/ chos phra'i rang rtsal gi dang khro gar bgyur//

192a6(rnying rgyud): dad lag shin rje gshed pa thug/ gsung bsrung lha mtha' rta mgrin dbang chen la// thugs bsgreb lha rnams badz+ra he ru'i su// yin ti ni lci tshogs che mchog nyid la zug/ phrin las lha tshogs rdo rje gzhon nu nyid// drod gtong ba sgrub mtha' bla med
192a7(rnying rgyud): rig 'dzin 'asgrang mtha' rda khrod pa tsa'o// 'jig rten srung mtha' grags pa kun 'du ste// drag sngags bsgob mtha' stobs ldan nyid la jug/ thams cad yangs rdzogs tshe ya bla ba dgashegs 'dus// dril ba srug blo byang du
192b1(rnying rgyud): gamatha' yod// sku ya nga bzhin shes na yang dag su// skra yin ma bkod de nyid ba brtan nas// gas jugs byed nyid bstan par bya// bdag shegs pa sa chags nan dgra ca 'phrul// thabs shes pa 'grag ga sa nga dra dang
