192b3(rnying rgyud): thabs shes lab sum gnyis med rol babri marjes// sngags kyi sram dam 'ag bla rna tshogs gis// thos sbas 'jig rten yongs khyab ngo mtshar me// thabs po rdo rdzogs le byed shes rab padrar sbyar// zang 'drag sbyor mtshams nas byung gas rdzi pa nA~M/
192b4(rnying rgyud): thog mtha' bar bcu drug/ dam pa rigs brgya 'dus pa'i yang snying yid// oM A likA li dz+nyA na paH satwa kro d+ha mun ye s+yA hA/ oM de hA li ba na bcu gnyis pa// bzhi bsus gnyis zhi ba'i snying po yin// oM ba~M d+hi d+hA ma hA su kha dz+nyAHtu t+tA i/ oM dang ba
192b5(rnying rgyud): rang byung 'bru gcig AHgnas pa// oM AHhUM sangs rgyas kun 'dus rigs gcig yid snying yin// de bzhin hUM ni bde ga shigs sun 'dus yang snying mtha'// oM pharnga bang na yo ge bcuganas pa// oM badz+ra kro d+ha mad+hI shrI he ruka hUM phaT/ che mcho
193a1(rnying rgyud): na du ga smra/ sasam rdzu gas / su gru ts+tsha du// zan ra
193a2(rnying rgyud): katA nam pa Thany+dzahUM phaT/ gshin rje gshed pa yongs rdzogs byung ba yin// oM the bdan lo ga bcu badran pa// oM pa n+d+ha dz+dzakr-i ts+tshi tA pa hrI ban swa duM wad+d+he phaT/ bdud bar chen ma rdzogs snying po yid// u~M y-i sbyang /
193a3(rnying rgyud): tI li kI la/ serba bIk+She pa hUM phaT/ phrar pa phrin las yongs rdzogs snying po yin// oM phaT bang na yi ge rtsa dgu pa// oM su h+ya dz+nyAn nr-i ti ru ka/ gU d+hadz+nyA na kro d+b+hi kA rI s+yai/ ma ma ye gi nI d+ya wA ru mu d+h+ye b+h+yo b+h+rUM ba gra zod gtong ma ma yo des rdog snying po yin// oM phaT bar nA
193a4(rnying rgyud): brgyad gnas pa// oM badz+ra ma~M hA gu ru sarba hUM phaT/ rig 'dzin slob dpon yong/ rdzogs snying po yin// oM phaT bar na yi ge brgyad gnas pa// oM bad+hIHtrA sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/ 'jig rten mchod bstod yongs rdzogs snying po yin// oM phaTA bden yi
193a5(rnying rgyud): drug gnas pa// oM badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/ dmod pa thag sngags yongs rdzogs snying po yin// zangs shes 'od zer sras kyi dgos sngags ni// oM shrI ma hA ra ha~Mdza kaNAM phaT/ oM rat+na kroSh+NI shwa n+ti~M hU~M phaT/ oM shrI mA hA kraHhe ru ka NA~M phaT/ oM
193a6(rnying rgyud): r-ihUM phaT/ oM tsI ma hA'i sh+tsa n+ta ru shaM d+hI phaTe/ oM bi shwa mr-it+ti shwa rI hUM phaT/ i ma b+ha yaH/ he ru ka druM phaT/ oM pak+Sha krod+d+hi shwa dI hU~M phaT/ mchog sras bzhi he ru ka yab skor ba'o// oM br-id+hi shrI hI dr-i kahUM phaT/ oM br-it+ta kroSh+NIshwa hUM ru ka rl-i phaT/
193a7(rnying rgyud): shrI hi ru ka hUM phaT/ oM rat+na kro dz+nyA tA r-I hU~M phaT/ oM 'dra d+h+wi N+De ru ka d+hu phawaM/ oM pad+ma rbo Sh+yA hrIrI hU~M phaT/ oM ka rma shrI hi ru ka hU~M phaT/ oM kaM marbo d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ badz+ra he ru ka'i sras pazhi rigs bzhi he ru ka yab yul gyi snyingang ngo // oM ya ma rA dza pre ta ho
193b1(rnying rgyud): drangs/ byung rtsal shas / oM ya ma n+ta sa te byi pad+ma ka d+ha phaT/ ya du zug la rgyashA pa \u0f7f/ oM la man dziH ta dz+wa la dz+wa phaT/ ad k+Sha tang las man+ta/ al ma la k+Sha ba tad kan rdza ban/ na nga ba d+ha/ ga
193b2(rnying rgyud): gshed sras rigs pa de'i yab sram gyi snying po yin no// oM padz+ra kro d+ha ha na han d+hu phaT/ oM badz+ra shwa rA kro d+hI hU~M phaT/ oM rat+na pad+ma kro d+had ha da ha hA phaT/ oM rat+na shU rI krod+b+ha dzAM/ oM pad+ma kro d+hi pa rU pa tsa hU~M phaT/ oM paSh+TiM kro t+te shwashrI hUM phaT/ yo ka
193b3(rnying rgyud): brda d+hA ban d+ha hUM phaT/ oM kArma shrad+hi hUM phaT/ pad+ma dbang chen mas rigs bzhi yab yum gyi snying po'o// oM br-id+d+ha kI li ny+tsi la ye hU~M yaT/ oM prad+d+ha kro d+hI shwa rI hU~M/ oM rat+na kI li ki la ya hUM phaT/ oM radz+ra k+ko trI shwe d+hI d+h+waM/ oM padz+dza kA moM ke lA ye d+hi phaT/
193b4(rnying rgyud): sa sa
193b5(rnying rgyud): dzid kyir ma d+hiH/ thas da/ yid dra bahrI/ oM pa / na pa ni'i stong // yu ma \u0f7f/ yaya / la k+Sh+ma/ nga zag / \u0f7f/ tho /
193b6(rnying rgyud): gsang pa 'dums sa sri sti snying ba// / ya/ sa su rtsom pa // bzug
193b7(rnying rgyud): sa dag mas rnags dag das sa rtag sa rmyig tanasas kyi rdzuT/ yam sa pa la/ yi ma ni/ yid pa/ yid lan/ yany+dza ya~M/ yaSh+Ta la d+hA sa pa
194a1(rnying rgyud): marnam ma dz+walaT/ gshin du yongs ga b+h+yo ga sngags sa// oM bad+yA d+ha kr-it+ta/ ha ya gI mA/ mahA \u0f7f/ ek+shadza n+ti/ sa ma yan wumra su ts+tshats+tshadz+dza/ A le/ gan zlab sha/ mal pa tsha pa/ dum ngas thardza du/ madz+ra
194a2(rnying rgyud): chen mongs rdzogs kyi steng bal// oMn skyes sa hU~M dz+dzaH/ oM A t+ma hA hU~M hU~M phaT/ b+h+yo na mahoH/ rdu li phra rdul zad/ kA ka ra k+Sha/ mr-idrA \u0f7f steng la shad shad/ son d+ham chis la ko ko/ rba ti ga zung / d+h+yas te/ dbugs la tha'ajab/ oMd+d+hi ma
194a3(rnying rgyud): rul ru murAsh+mi b+h+yaHdza/ yang dag yongs rdzogs drag sngags so// oM shrI me hA sa ma ya/ badz+ra yak+Sha haM haM d+h+waM/ oM bi shwa kro d+ho kro d+hA dz+wa la maN+Da la r+g+haM/ ma hA srog shra kha thun ha la ha la hUM phaT/ dzaHdzaH/ tshe mchog yongs rngoHsa drag sngags so/
194a4(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kI li kI la yau/ oM sarba bi b+h+rUM baM hUM phaT/ ma mar klo ya g+ho kA la rU ba snying rtsa li yaM yaM/ srog la yaM yaM/ snying la phral phril/ srog la d+h+waM/ hit+te srog la tud tung / snying khrag shad dza/ thu ma ri li li/ snying cog tsog 'ur bur/ shig shig// gul gul/
194a5(rnying rgyud): rgyags// sod sod/ d+ha d+hI ma ma/ karma shi g+h+raM kaR+Sha ya/ mA ra saM na pra mdza nA ya hUM phaT/ phu ra pa yo dra rdzogs drag sngags so// oM badz+ra ni la kha T+wAM gA krodz+nyAM shwa d+hi/ b+ha ga pad+ma rgya bde klong shon mdzaHdzaHD+ho b+h+yo/ ma ma rak+Sha ma ma rak+Sha ru lu ru lu/ ra glo snyid khra kA la ma b+ho/ dza ga
194a6(rnying rgyud): ma ma grog bun b+h+yo/ me dz+ra Sh+yag s+thing mA ra ya phaT/ badz+ra ta cha khrim mugs shi mugs sha/ rbad dar rbad dang / mugs te myog shar song/ ci sod snying la thu mo ri la yA/ mig dkyus nas phyung zhig/ rgyangs pa rtsang nas tshed cig/ lce lkog nas drongs shig/ ma mo yongs
194a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs drag sngags so// oM badz+ra ma hA ku ru sarba hUM phaT/ kA la rU pa che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ rig 'dzin yangs rdzogs drag sngags so// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn hU~M phaT/ ging kar bdud tri mA ra ya hU~M/ a bi shra ba sha mi kinA ga yat+na/ rak+Sha ma ma che ge mo mA da ya rbad/
194b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzi na yadang rdzogs drag rtags so// oM badz+ras rba rba Sh+TAn hU~M phaT/ ya ma/ nA ga/ de ga rA thA la/ ya Thar sbyad+hA sa/ g+h+ri sa/ che ge ma mA ra ya rbad/ dmod pa yangs rdzogs drag sngags so// oM mAt+ma swA hA mu hrIHg+husaH/ a badz+ra thA ma hA thon d+h+we/ shAta drak+Sha/
194b2(rnying rgyud): ka dza~M rad+yA NA kr-iH/ hU~M badz+ra shI li kI la ya/ ma hA lak+Sha/ kA la ru ba/ yak+Sha kr-i \u0f7f/ badz+ra sarba d+haSh+TAn/ oM dzA wa~M badz+ra ga~M n+ya ta/ ma ma kr-id+d+hi b+ha rti/ karma ngaM/ dz+wa la da / dwe hUM ga Ta laT/ ni khro ba da gshegs songs rdzogs bzhin bi smrab las su btsas pa'i
194b3(rnying rgyud): 'dril chen mo'i snyigs so// oM badzi ma hA krod+ha/ pASh+Takr-ir+dz+nyA ShA dI badz+ra kI la ya/ ma hA yak+Sha kA la r-I pa/ ka ma ra ra dz+wa la re na hUM phaT/ yongs rdzogs nus pa dril ba bsnyen bslab las s+ye btsas pa'i sngags so// oM la ma n+ta kr-itA phaT/ badz+ra a kra shadzaH/ oM pa
194b4(rnying rgyud): phaT/ badz+ra bA sha hUM/ oM badz+nyA na ta krita phaT/ badz+ra b+h+r-i TA ba~M/ oM bi krAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ badz+ra ga ti hoH/ slob yang sum brgyad kyi snying po'o// thabs shes gsal dbyangs dag les spros pa yi// gzhan yang las byed snying po gang gang dag// 'di nyid gong 'ag yan
194b5(rnying rgyud): la du shes 'phrul// thabs shel A li kA li'i don shes nas// slar grags thams cad yongs rdzogs sngags snying rang shar bas// rgyu 'jug gnas de yi ge gsum gyi dngos// 'gyus dran 'dzin chags rang krol don snyid hUM// 'di gshegs
194b6(rnying rgyud): jog gi ga sla sngags mtha' ni// zhib ma lus snying po gsung gi mtha'// A li bco brgyad ljags la yongs su rdzogs// de yang bzhi brgyartsa gnyis snying po'i mtha'// ba d+hi bcu bzhi pa la yongs sa ngogs// de nyid rigs lnga'i yang snying 'bru rdo
194b7(rnying rgyud): sum ri// gcig gsung mtha' 'brags ma ste// ji ltar rje snyed chos kun mthar thag de nyid yin// hUM du kun 'dus yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpal// da byin khro ba'i gsang sngags mtha' yas las// che mchog sngags 'dus yi ge bcu gnyis te/
195a1(rnying rgyud): gshin rje gshed po'i sngags mtha' bcu bdun pa// badz+ra he ru'i gsung mtha' 'bru dgu mchog/ dbang chen gsung mtha' yig 'brub tu dgur 'dus// rdo rje gzhon nu'i gsung mthudu 'bru brtu ba // tha med te gsu mtha' phru
195a2(rnying rgyud): grupa// ge 'dzin gsung mtha' yog bcu par thung // de bzhin dregs pa kwa 'dul gsung mtha' 'bru bcu ba// stobs ldan nag po'i gsung mtha' yige brgyad// ri khro longs dril ljags mtha' don brgyad min/ khro la pos rdzogs dag rdza ra
195a3(rnying rgyud): sa// de nyid gsung khrog yi ge hUM la thogs// gsung gi rang bzhin shes pas gsung mtha' bug/ bde gshegs ma lus yongs rdzogs dgongs pa'i mtha'// bye brag dang ni yongs rdzogs yang dag bshad// ma rig 'ching bzlog 'chi bdag bdud che de//
195a4(rnying rgyud): gzhi mi shes snyeng po rtags nas spangs// mam cos spos med nga dngas sdug par zhog/ sdang srid khang 'debs gshin rje gshed dgongs yin// 'khor 'das snang stod dbyer med ta skad gsum// rang sems dri med rna mngags lam bcad// \u0f88\u0f90nga sno dun k+Shor
195a5(rnying rgyud): g+sa stongs mar zhog/ 'khor 'das zil gnon rta smad dgongs pa yini// chos kun sems sa yang dag gnas lugs te// rang bzhin rnal 'byor spos bral su gsum rdzogs// ma bkag rang 'byung ma 'breng rang zhing zhog/ gzung 'dzin phran gsel mi gcig
195a6(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa yin// ma rig rnam rtog nyon mongs dug mtsho'i nang // rang byung ye shes rtsi bcud thig les gzhom// ma spangs mi gnas 'drod yon rnam dag zhog/ bdud rtsi 'chi med dgongs pa mthar thug yin// nga bdag gzung 'dzin dgra gegs ling+ga pa// rang
195a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes rur bas khyab par gdab// rtogs pa thal phyung gsum mtha' gcig tu bzhag/ phur pa thal byin dgongs pa chen po yin// ma gcig kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo la// snying po rig pa'i ye shes thams cad mkhyen// ma nor ma bcos kun khyab ma bslab/
195b1(rnying rgyud): zho// gar tha ba ma chen dgongs pa'i mthar thag yin// thabs shes sun ldan la stong bdag nyid rag// ma bsgom ma yongs rig pa dbyings su 'dzin// brjod med shes rab g.yom da dang bral zhag/ reg 'dzin rang rgyal dgangs 'chen
195b2(rnying rgyud): 'das chos kun yi grol pha mtha' yas// 'dzin med rang grol gza' gtad 'khrul pa zhig/ lha 'dre rad snang rang grol chen por zhog/ 'jig rten kun krol dgongs pa mthar thug yin// srid rtsa nyes rgyu ha la bdag tog dug/ rtsa bral snying
195b3(rnying rgyud): kyis dug dang bsad// dug lnga ye shes lnga ru rang grol bzhag/ dug lnga rang gshed mtha' bral dgongs pa yin// de dag yongs rdzogs sems nyid chos kyi sku// snang srid gzhir bzhedu 'khor 'das dbyer med rdzogs// gsang ba bla med byang chub snying pos
195b4(rnying rgyud): khyab// 'khor 'das dbyer med thig le nyag gcig las// ma 'gag rol pa sna tshogs rtsis gdab bral// rang bzhin med grol skye med dbyings su dang // ma 'dres yongs rdzogs rang byung ye shes dang // bde gshegs dgongs pa rtsis gdab brjod med
195b5(rnying rgyud): srug stang thugs mtha' khog dkyul spos bcad nas// rnal 'byor blo mthun bslab lugs rtsa lag gnyis// 'di ni yongs rdzogs bsgrub chen dril ba dang // zhi khro kyang dang sku gsum yang dril las// yan lag sngags bslab brgyad las 'dir ma
195b6(rnying rgyud): 'di dag spos bcas spros chung shin tu chung // sangs rgyas bstan bsrung tshong gnyer don du bstan// mdor na ngas bstan chud lung thams cad du// bde gshegs 'dus dang yongs rdzogs kun dril dang // kun rig kun gsol kun rgyab gsang 'dus
195b7(rnying rgyud): sogs// sna tshogs phun sum thams cad ma lus sgra// thugs dgongs lhad med gyud de mtshon tshig las// ming phyogs blo mthis phyogs ris ltos mi bya// sgyu ma smig rgyu waM la ma gzugs brtan dang // dri za'i grong khyer brag ce Tu zla dang // chu spar dmigs
196a1(rnying rgyud): can rnal pa la gags// thabardzun lag rnams su thangs/ thags pazlas ga thogs na// das sprul tha sa ga ta nadamapas rlab// man dpa nga
196a2(rnying rgyud): yid 'ad ban pa bsgru ban+d+has smra// N+Dal kyidang mchad pa bshas// yan lag bcu 'is chog ldan pas// gzhan yang ga ci / nga gas pa' mtshams 'a // gnas dung mtshams cad kyi
196a3(rnying rgyud): sa chag cag gdang/ thig ci sla byin rnapas dung mtshungs// khrims dpas makyi byugs pa pa// nagus pa dang chub da // ni thaMd ya rdzogs pa// da gras sa pa/ da naman ma dang /
196a4(rnying rgyud): de bri dgang // bcan gzungs drug rgyan gyis thas// de steng mnam ldan gapal// dpal chen gyis phrad migs pa'i nyid// sngags ze ma na ldan pon // thag la gyi 'jug pa kyis sas/ byang ba shid a la ga cig
196a5(rnying rgyud): gtod d+han la sogs pa// rkye nang gsang ba'i mchod pas bskor// mtshams gcang klo dbye brda 'phyag 'tshal// byin dang bdam bshags mdzod rdzas dngul// de ltar las bdun yong mardzogs nas// khyad par srin las de bzhin nyid// kun snang rje las
196a6(rnying rgyud): bring rim brdeg/ gzhal yas gdan ba byed tu skyelas// bdag nyid che mchog te sa// mthing nag khrul gsum bya gadrug pa// g.yas kyi thag gsum dor la// gsod pa phyag gsum thad dmang bsdams// zhabs bzhi bcangs bsum ma da rdzangs
196a7(rnying rgyud): tha~Md // rdorje rin chen gtsug pa gdangs// du da cham rdzogs sum tshan mo// gnasas la zhal gcig tsug gnyis 'phrul// g.yas pa rgyas yon drung dmar// sgra ma dag rgyan rnams yab dang mye tshungs// kun gyi bdag nyid ci ltar/
196b1(rnying rgyud): dpal gyi rtsig tsug mngon pa dang / thugs kAskye ba 'khor lo bzhir// 'jam dpal spyan ngas gzigs dbang dang // rdo rje sems dpa' rig pa'i bdag rim pa bzhin pa sgom rigs lnga yis// dpral brgyan te yan lag lta'o// danas mas pa cag go rje'i
196b2(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpal gshed rjegashed// mgrin par rnam grin dbang gi lha// thugra ka rabadza ti rbaka/ lte bar rdo rje gzhon nu che// gsang bar bya med te draka/ spyi bor rig 'dzin 'dus pa'i sgra// zhabs kyi pus mo g.yas g.yon ting // rdegs pa kun 'dral chen po dang // da
196b3(rnying rgyud): ldan nag por skyed// rdo rje rin chen sa shog dgung khyer// klu 'drul khyang chen dkar nag bskyed// so so'i 'khor tshogs khro bo dang // khro mo yang sprul sum spa'i bcas// 'bar khro ma brjid gsal brtan nas// byin rlab dbang bsrur spyan drang ba
196b4(rnying rgyud): mchod pa stod tshogs 'khor dus bzhi dbul// de dag sems kyi cho 'phrul te// rang bzhin skye med chos kyi sku// lha nyid sdang stong gnyis su med// rol ba ma 'gag lodra spyod wa// thugs rje'i 'gro 'dras 'gro ba 'dul// phrin las longs spyod slar 'i
196b5(rnying rgyud): sgra gsum dang lango sprad nas// bla med rol pa'i 'gro 'du yis// bdud bzhi ga zhom dang dgra gsum bsad// 'gro drug g.yangs gcod pa'i phyir// srog snying rjod dang 'phrang gnad kyis// yang dag res dod+ha rab ldan pas// skang stong phrag ga/
196b6(rnying rgyud): nga rgod gnyis spangs te// kun sdigs srog hU~M gi bsnyen// 'ad ba bstod dbyangs bcas rig rtsal sbyang // de rjes bde gshegs yang ma rdzogs pa'i// gsang sngags 'dus pa k+She ba ba nyen// oM AHhUM swA hA// trA~MSh+T+rI trAM yaHoM badz+ra nI ya~Mng+ge /
196b7(rnying rgyud): shrI te ka/ ya mAn+ta ka/ ts+tshi d+haH kr-ita/ d+hu dz+ra kI la~M kI la ya/ badz+ra ma hA paT+Ta/ kA la khA pa/ yak+Shadzo d+hI/ padz+ras pa Sh+Tan/ me hU~M// badz+rag rnguT/ ma ma go d+hI shwa dI/ karme rer/ dI la raH hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ gseng ba'i nges pa'i dra ga~M tra gas 'di// mi
197a1(rnying rgyud): nas/ na mas da kyang pon las pa sa// da pa bcwa// grangs 'drab rnyan cing rtags la ma// khalam thang lung ba dngas ba par// rnas pa'ang dang dra bar byung // la
197a2(rnying rgyud): nyam shar// mdzod rten rtsa la ldad pa dang / thad med tshigs 'das bzhin pa par byed// sras padang gnamasams rtags 'char// bum pa'i ngas la dngas grubazang // rgyun na ma tshogs dru bab na// bdag shegs gcig ba kyang ci @
197a3(rnying rgyud): 'gas chos las blong thogs// gas thugs byung byebs ma byas hU~M// laste skar la sogs gang dang gang // gdul ba rnams cad zotshom med/ dkyil 'a bar bzlas tu rkyen snang ba// ni ska ma nga gas bsnyen pa skang 'did// dus gsum bdag rje
197a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba 'dus// bdag gzhan yangs kyi dpal chen pa// mchog gi dam pa 'di bsgrubs pas// bdag srung rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa'o// nas bka' stsal to// dpal gas pa 'dres pa grang mi rgyal po las/ zhem mangs rdzogs 'das pa'i bslad pa skabs 'i
197a5(rnying rgyud): bas bcang pa/ ded sa dus pa sa yan pa /
197a6(rnying rgyud): dag da ba stsag sa/ na shUs ba~M// das par / ngag gags tham rdzogs pa'o// rlung sa
197a7(rnying rgyud): nal// bzhin grang sa mchags gzhag zung // go ris pas thom drag zung// dngas gage bani sgrub gzung barbangs te// mtha' nas chags rjes bsrung // bsgrubs de mnas ma chags bdun dkyad // bzlab marnas su chags ni/
197b1(rnying rgyud): gagags bka' drangs pa slab tu dben// dbang rnams yangs rdugs dam la gnas// bskabs thag chad dang 'dzin gsal// spyad pa blang dar man ngag can// gsang sngags mtha' drug rdzogs pa la// zas pas chung gral zhing rnga yas//
197b2(rnying rgyud): thabs mkhas de nyid bsten// klub rten slob ma phun tshogs ni// dam gtsang dpa' brtan snying rus che// blo che shes rab mchog tu bzang // bsgrub dang phrin las brtson 'grus can// bza mkhas rig gsal dad ldan gces// bslab gnas mun
197b3(rnying rgyud): sram tshogs pa ni// bkra shis gangs kyang ri bzangs 'dab// gnams pad 'khor kha sbyar 'dra// sngon yang grub thob rkyen thub par// bsgrub khang pho brang lta bur brtsig/ bslab pa'i grogs 'khor phun tshogs ni// rgyad zhe sham gro gsal zhing /
197b4(rnying rgyud): mi bsla gsang thub dalo yang // de 'dra'i rgyal the bra karma dang // las brgya mdzes sdug yid 'ong ba// rigs dang mtshan ldan 'dris thub rte ni// sgrub pa'i yo byad phun tshegs ni// rten rdzas mchod rdzas dngos grub rdzas// 'tsho ba zas dang kyang
197b5(rnying rgyud): ga stan// sna tshogs de skang yo byad sogs// bslab pa'i dus tshod phran tshogs ni// spying na lo zla gza' skar dang // zhag dus dang dang yang ngo gces// bye brag zha rgyas dbang drug gam// bsnyen bslab las myur dus kun bci// skab chos
197b6(rnying rgyud): sum tshogs pa ni// ma hA'i rgyu dang a nu'i lung // a ti man ngag skor la sogs// shes bya kun la mkhas par sbyang // mdor na bde gshegs gsang 'dus pa'i// yongs rdzogs 'di nyid 'jam par bya// sdom 'dug ste gon rim pa bcas// sa brta
197b7(rnying rgyud): gsung srud dkyil 'khor ba cig/ sgribashags bskad bya phye mtshams bcad// sri mnan gro srung byang bu gdags// ma tra mnan gying byin gyis brlab// smra brdzas byin brlab chag chag gdab// thig gang bas tshon rkyen gyis brla'o// gzugs brtan dkyil 'khor

198b1(rnying rgyud): 'bar 'drir pad+ma zer ba'ang 'dug
198b2(rnying rgyud): gro gdugs dang ngar dpungs 'phan// dpal rgyan rgad chen dkri ying dgram// sman raka d+ha ka'i mchong gtor sags// nang mchad pas bslabs la dgang // de nas dngos gzhi bzhin pasgrub bshad// rang ba rgya nang gsang mtshams bcang // oM ba banas
198b3(rnying rgyud): mas ma yangs dras hrI paT/ hU~M ba thA badz+ra cigadul mdang / ta la ta la/ hAM phaTi/ don ma parda' gad thabs/ thA ba ba sha phaT/ de nas brda li phyag kyang badz+ral/ hUM drug a ti ba t-i/ pra N+ya ta~M/ de nas dam bca' yongs su gzung // hUM badz+ramam
198b4(rnying rgyud): da ba bya// ma ba 'a rnaMs ma mangs \u0f7f/ Ab ma ma ya/ de nas marjod pa sbyin pa nabs 'phrul/ oM m+b+hahA/ ba bye hUM/ d+hUd+hA ba~MH/ bi sbrul kIng+ge/ bdag / badzin pa / badzag tu

198b6(rnying rgyud): sa~M b+ha ya swA hA/ de nis nyams nag gdong 'gyod bshags// oM A hU~M / snu ma ya / naraka/ me ta/ la ka/ man+taSh+TaM/ dA we/ a la/ a la~M bi shaH/ dag sha/ pradz+re gr-id+hisap+pa/ glang gzhi gang byang thabs chen po/

198b8(rnying rgyud): ge mapang ba'i gling / gang na pa gachags 'thas// tig sa rnams ca nyid du/ sa hU~Ml 'i sa sa sa las byung na du run palas ma byung ba ying med/
199a1(rnying rgyud): tshag dang 'di med pa'ang 'dug
199a2(rnying rgyud): byed pa rgya/ sa 'a ma bas/ tshan na can rban+ta// / ngam ba/ bskal pa gsus gyi 'jigan sbyangs// yenas dag pa'i dang nyid las// rdorab tur kyang bye bu nga
199a3(rnying rgyud): las mam pa'i ban // d+has dzA ga 'bas/ gaga'adugs pad// las
199a4(rnying rgyud): ba da la ya/ nga // drar khod rab 'degs dpel 'bar skyed// shrI ba shrIbi shuH// ThathA gtazhan e tsab maN+Dal hrIH/ glags la shes 'char chu'i de bras// ches su 'thur meng ma dugs pa// drug marjon mazeng bkyang // de can mangs pa'i
199a5(rnying rgyud): 'kho ba rtsibs bzhi ma khyud bcas// zla chung bar tham+ba khud rdzogs// rang b+hi lhani grub ngo mtshar cha// dregs pa nyinA pad+ma'i gdan// gtsa dang la bar rab cas 'tshams par gsal// b+hUM dradra dro d+hi ti Ta/ ma swaH maN+Dal ma \u0f7f maN+Dal/ pi pa maHla/
199a6(rnying rgyud): n+ya mi lI ga gdan la babs// bdag nyid che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag dbu gis mi phyag drug pa// zhabs bzhi kyad kyi dar stabs bgrang // g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// su mchog rigs lding dbul rdzogs// sman dang kal bzang
199a7(rnying rgyud): miching gtsigs// g.yas kyi phyag gsum rdo rje bsdams// g.yon gyi thagags mnyan dmir bsnams// dur khror 'jigs pa'i chas kyis brgyan// gnam zhal yus mchog kun bzang stor// g.yas pa gtso 'khrud 'ab bsdams// g.yon pa chags pa'i
199a8(rnying rgyud): sa @#

199b2(rnying rgyud): ga su na nabla sa /

199b4(rnying rgyud): ngas/ kho che la dkyil 'khor ljin gyis grub// bskal pa me skar 'bang rmod nas// dade byung ye shes khri chags shar// shAng dra ba rbaka/ ban trI shA ni sum// rigs bzhi yis gas 'arang bcas gapal// ga drim dpal gshin rjebashang/
199b5(rnying rgyud): ba rtanag ma yil// rigs bzhi la sogs 'khar bcus smras la// rgyab d+hA dbang rna nA~Mnamathun tu la// bdag ce na khyim ldas// rigs pa nis sogs kyi bar bcas gas la// byung dru rdzag na // 'khor la rgyas 'dabs dpal
199b6(rnying rgyud): rigs bzhi la tshogs 'khar bcas gsal// shar wAr bla meng ste na// tid bzhing du mchag yum chen sngar// mAwa la sa gsal bar dang bcas// gan pa rig 'donan rje'i sra// bde can donan la 'gyur la khri la// rigs pa ni las gas bar
199b7(rnying rgyud): ng+yas gsal// zugs pa gan 'dul dpal// dmas pa me pa 'dul 'jal/ dgas zhal gags 'ab cagags / maung ga skabs rin dge pa/ TI 'i bdag pa sa// rigs pa rnams
199b8(rnying rgyud): yang rgyam byeng / me rje 'ang bar mid/ dpas ngas pa'i rgyal ba sa/ ngas zla pa'i gas dran na/ yun su 'ag/ sngags rgyan gsung byangs rgyas sa/ na du su gyisangs smra'i
200a1(rnying rgyud): mtshan can cha grags// ma'adras mangs su rtags par gsal// b+h+r-i thA sgril 'khar dpal tshun chags// mthun la yangs su rdzogs pa'i phyir// srag srang thags su byon pan bzong // yo shes la yi dbang bdu
200a2(rnying rgyud): Ar+tha/ de nas rang pazhi rdzu rlung sa// tesim mi / de nas mchog pa dgal bzhi ste// sam ya a ba sha ta / denas rtsagagen byed pani// mata pag/ mas/ na
200a3(rnying rgyud): rgya gar gyi mchod// ma hA pra dzi su drA ha~MH/ de nas ye shes glu yis mchod// mA d+hA na ten+da r+b+he/ ken NAM/ ten ta~MN+Di hU~M/ de nas phyi nang rnam lngas mchod// oM pan pa/ ba rba swa d+ha to// ke pra pa ra pra/ sarba data thA ga ta sid+hiH/ sa ma yo tA ma?/ oM AHdz+dza/ ma hA pan+d+ha bA
200a4(rnying rgyud): ta ShA b+hU ti/ oM shrI badz+ra rA ga tu bad+d+ha/ praSh+Tem+be/ A lo ko d+hIH/ gar+b+heg na/ naibi lA~M mA~M/ gauN+Di hUM/ de nas bdud kyi smin mchod 'bral// lha rnams so so'i rtsa sngags la// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mI ta kha da~M khA ti/ de nas bdud rtse'i dngos gru bablang // kA ya mr-ir+d+harma/
200a5(rnying rgyud): sad+d+hi AH/ tsing+ka sa~M d+hitrA~M/ swa d+hIH/ de nas bdud rtsi gsang nin mchod/ mahAb kr-i amr-i ka ShA te/ de nas mchags gtad chen mtshad// lha rnams kun gyin sngags la// ma hA ba liM ta kha ShA ti/ lha rnams kun gyi sngags mjug la// ma
200a6(rnying rgyud): bar ShA ti/ de nas yab srem sbyor mdzod 'gal// daHtrA~M ba~MrkoH/ pad+ma ya gai nI/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya phaT/ de nas sgrol ba'i mchad pa bya/ oM ma hA shI he dra ka/ ma tri dranga? pra thAn tsa ba d+hi phaT/ pra be sha ya hUM phaT/ tai d+d+ha a swar t+te phaT/ de nas yig brgyas
200a7(rnying rgyud): bshags shing bzang // oM A hU~M s+yAt+ma/ oM badz+rag rmugs ma ya/ man+ta pA la sa/ badz+ra te nagatan pa ti// dr-i nAm b+ha la/ mu ma thA pa/ ar+tha k+to mthal/ sra bo b+ha mab+hawa sa rbas d+hi m+me pa yats+tsha/ sarba ka mas tsam/ tsit+ta shre yAM/ ku ru tAM/
200b1(rnying rgyud): na/ ma tu ga / // tu bya/ s+yArnam/ ba zugs nam/ danas dkris parab da mtshang \u0f7f// ma pa nyid skul rang bzhin mo// kun pacang zag pa med par dadang // sas /
200b2(rnying rgyud): par gshegs// thugs rje'i skal phyag 'jal ba stod// A~M tshul med pa byung sa bu'am// ma 'gags rang gsal 'dzin pa byed// chags med spyan bral pad+ma'i gsung // yang dag gsung la phyag 'jal btid// supa med pa'i rje
200b3(rnying rgyud): cidang // ma skyes 'jig med rdo rje'i thugs// glang dor med pa chos kyi dbyings// 'gyur med thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// sna chos dbyings rol pa chen po las// rtsal dang rol pa mi dmigs kyang // nam mkha' mdzod kyi cho 'phrul gyis// yod
200b4(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal ba stod// hA rang bzhin cir yang mdzes kyang // dkyil 'khor chen po'i ma babyung nas// rtog med dregus pa dang gis 'dral// phrin las mdzad la phyag 'tshal bskyed// gzhan yang don mthun ci rigs bstod// oM A hU~M swA hA/ na ma tra dA la
200b5(rnying rgyud): dri nas lha tshogs mtshan don nas// las bzhi la sogs bcol bskul bya// oM shAn+tiM ku ru/ swA puSh+TiM kA ru/ A~M ba shaM ku ru/ ha mA ra ya/ hUM sarba sid+d+hi ku ru hUM/ de nas brda gshegs kun gyi gsang // 'dus pa'i snying po 'jo ba bzlas te// zhi bas 'i
200b6(rnying rgyud): cing jo bar bslab// thog mang zhi ba'i 'dzab bzlas te// bde gshegs yongs rdzogs snying po 'di'o// oM pheM d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha gnya' nat+te tu a// de yang 'di skad bskal zhing bsnyen// hUM gsang ba yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor du// che mchog dpal dgra'
200b7(rnying rgyud): dbu kun nang // thabs shes nyi zla 'od kyi dkyil// ma chags pad+ma'i gesar la// mi bskyod rnam par snang mdzad dang // rin 'byung mtha' yas don yod grub// yum chen kun bzang sangs kyis spyan// mA ma gos dkar ngamachog spel// rgyal ba rigs lnga yang
201a1(rnying rgyud): bum bcas// kun bzang yab yum dkyus par sbyor// sras mchog sems dpa' sems mar bcas// sbrul su thu ba drug mthar byed brgyad// mnyan lhag 'bre lA ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal 'tshor ldan sdug gzi brje dang par//
201a2(rnying rgyud): dbu rgyan phreng bcod pan dang // do shal dasbrang rtsen ma med// rin chen dang dbyangs chas rnams rdzogs// gsung gi snying po sngags sgra skugs// thugs ni rang byung ye shes gsal// 'dab kyis sku gsung thags chud bskul// spros pas stong gsum swa
201a3(rnying rgyud): prA las gsung byung sngags 'brug ldir// bsdus pas chos dbyings mkha' la thim// ma gsal bar du bskyed cing bsgom// oM bo d+hi tsa tA ma hA su kha gnya' na d+hA tu a/ brgya stong khri 'bum bye ba sogs// bsnyen pa sum cha de la bsngal// stong tshig
201a4(rnying rgyud): na lag bdun mchod bya// tshogs kyi 'khor lho ngas drug btang // de nas bde gshegs kun gyi gsung // tshom bu dgra yi snying po bskyal// oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ oM ru lu ru lu hwA b+ha hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-i e kr-ita na na hU~M phaT/ oM d+ha gI 'bral
201a5(rnying rgyud): oM ba kI le snre la ma ts+tsha phaT/ oM gra h+Na gaga' na TIg po shwe phaT/ oM badz+ram thA gnas brdeng// oM sa na rje phas/ mi brda sa rba dz+nyAn ma wAd+ha swAH/ legs/ trA~M phaT/ sarbat+t+ya rnaMs ma la dz+ra~M d+ha phaT/
201a6(rnying rgyud): ltar bskal cing bslab// hUM dbus phyogs 'khor lo'i gzhal yas nas// zla ga ma dbang chen e yi dbyibs// byol song gtso brgyad dregs pa'i steng // thabs shes nyi zla 'od kyi dkyil// ma chags pad+ma'i ge sar la// bcom ldan che mchog he ru
201a7(rnying rgyud): yum chen gnam zhal dbyings phyug ma// gnyis med 'khril skyor sras 'khor bcas// sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs su rung // dgod dang gshe dang snying rje rngam// 'bar khro zhi tshogs gar dgu ldan// skul dur khrod chas rnams rdzogs// gsung
201b1(rnying rgyud): ni drag po'i sngags sgra sgrogs// thugs ni rgol mdzad srog dang bcas// 'jab kyi rgyud bskal sku gsung thugs// phaT t+ya sbas pas stong gsum gang // bsdus pas yum gyi mkha' la 'khrel// gsang ba'i grwa za nas thubs kar thi ma/
201b2(rnying rgyud): mgasas bar drab skyed cing bsgom// ma 'grub par du mi gtong ngo // badz+ra ga d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ brgya stong khri 'bum bye bas bsgrub// stong tshig yan lag bcu pa bya// de bzhin khro bo kun la gyur// dus drug tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor//
201b3(rnying rgyud): pa sum gnyis pa la bsgrub// de nas las skyong sngam cha'i bar// dgongs pa gsum gyis mthar 'gyur te// bdag nyid yongs rdzogs dpal du bskyed// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad kun// chos nyid don la 'gyur med phyir// thams
201b4(rnying rgyud): da sgra mdog mthing nag la// rdo rje phur ba 'dril zhing 'debs// dgra bgegs las rgyan gcod par bsam// rnal 'byor dur khrod chas gsol te// bsgrub phur rnams la drag tu bstim// oM badz+ra ma hA krota/ pad+ma kro tI shwa rI/ badz+ra kI li kI

201b6(rnying rgyud): thod pa ru// ling gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bsgon// gu gul gyis bdug lha dang dbye// dbang gsol phyag rgya bzhi yis bcings// dz+riM tri che ge mo dzaHhUM ba~M hoH/ A be sha ya a a/ phrin las rten gyi phur pa bsdams// gu gul byin bskyed khrag
201b7(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur// yungs kar brab cing phrin pas bcol// tshe wang khrus kyi dgongs pa bya// che mchog phur pa srog rtsar gdab// badz+ra he ru snying gar gdab// gshin rje gshed po dpral bar gdab// rta mgrin dbang gi lce la gdab// rdo rje
