202a7(rnying rgyud): bcang chad nI// nyams len rtsa pa mongs rdzogs phyir// dbyi zhabs kun tu mun dag gang // mad las rke ba rgyas mtshang na 'ang // nyid las mi gzhan rig 'don gyis// rags par spel bar bka' gang gis// rgyud dga'ad kun nas kha bsang bya/
202a8(rnying rgyud): dag ras pa'i don la gyur// 'bar la bka' ba ga zung baphrug// ra tshad bral la btags te 'i zag/ rdzun du byung ba'i dngos grubablang // bzlab nga'i gags min nam rtag pas la// dasgyur bsgrubs pa'i grub rtags pa shad// bsnyen padz+ra
202b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtags su ni// dpal chen la sogs bde bar gshegs// gang na gang gi zhal mthong zhing // ngag gi bden pa grub pa dang // nyams snar mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan 'byung // mi mang 'dus nas phyag 'tshal dang // mag la nyi ma shar ba dang /
202b2(rnying rgyud): mchod rten che la 'dug pa dang // grong khyer nyams dga' mthong ba dang // rigs lnga'i phyag mtshan rnyed pa dang // bcud 'thang me tog zos pa dang // dmag dpon ded dpon byas pa dang / bslab pa grub pa 'irtags dag ni// gangs dkar rtse la 'dzegs
202b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang // ri bo'i snrel 'dug pa dang // dar gdugs rgyal mtshan 'phyang ba dang // bud med tshogs 'dus skar pa byed// lus la khrag 'dzag sems can thon// b+han+da phur pa lde gcing 'phar// sku dang 'od sga lha mor ston// dam rdzas khal las ru pa
202b4(rnying rgyud): las sbyor grub pa'i rtags su ni// zhi bas 'jigs pa brgyad skyob nas// rgyas pas 'byor drug spel bar nus// dbang gis bdud bzhi dbang sdud nas// drag pos dgra bgegs myur bsngal nus// nyams su pra khugs dmigs pas gsod// ba
202b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i don grub zhag dus thebs// rmi lam du yang dung 'brang dang // rnga sogs rol mo sgrogs pa dang // stsogs 'phang hom sbar rdzing brtol dang // mchod rten lha khang mkhar spe'u brdzig/ bsos btab mi rnams bran du 'khol// mtshan nags de dag
202b6(rnying rgyud): cad kyang // rab dngos yang yang brtag zub cing // 'bring du thun khol bdud rtsi kho la// 'od sogs nyams la snang ba yin// tha ma rmi lam brtan po 'byung // ma grub rang la ngan srid na// nyams dmya' dpa' chung stobs zhan dang // mdog ldog skad
202b7(rnying rgyud): 'gag mi mi nyan// rmi lam du yang grogs med 'khyams// gos med mtshon sogs tshur sgyogs 'byung // gtor ma dus yol chag yod na// khral 'dzed nye drung thams cad 'khang // sgo non rang yang ltogs skam sems// nyams
203a1(rnying rgyud): me gtsang gos srid na// lugs sa mdze can gnyen thos dang // nam ngan kha ba zla yug 'chub// 'dam rdzab dub mun gling 'khyams// bskang dang bshags pa rgyun du bya// de ltar mtshan ma bzang dang ngang // ga
203a2(rnying rgyud): snang yang btang snyoms 'dug/ rloms sems rtog pa mi skye bar// dngos grub blang zhing ngan pa bzlog/ dngos grub len khang blo bshags bya// zhag grangs them mam rtags bzang na// dngos grub bcud sman zas bzang dang // ka pU la yi ba
203a3(rnying rgyud): dang // rgyal bzhi khro'i mtshan don nas// dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga bya// slob ma bzang la dbang yang bskur// de nas dngos grub dbang rdzas rol// bsrub pa'i skabs skabs shis pa brjod// de ltar bsnyen slab rim pa dag/ rab tu lo bskyab rtags
203a4(rnying rgyud): dang sbyar// 'bring la zla drug grangs dang sbyar// za ma zhag bdun dag la bsdus// dad brtson drag pos bsrubs gyur na// mtshams med lnga smad zin mos kyang // dngos grub thob pa gsang sngags khyad// dam ldan rnams la smos ci dgos// de nas//
203a5(rnying rgyud): mtha' sdud cho ga yi// rim pa bsgrub chen rjes kyang bshad// sbyor ram sgrol na gdab las bya/ myur du sgrub byed sbyin bsreg bya// gtor ma gtod khar cha gsum bgo// dang po gter du sgra bya ste// sa yi lha mo'i mkha' dbyings su// gter sbed cho ga
203a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas par bya// cha gcig sbyin bsreg gseb tu gdab// tha ma'i cha yis skyong ma mchod// gtor gzhong 'og tu dam sri brub// phrin las rnam bzhi'i bro yis mnan// bkra shis tshe yi cho ga bya// dkyil 'kho bsdu zhing lhag chad bskang // bzod par
203a7(rnying rgyud): gsol zhing tha ma la// gtang rag rgya chen legs par gtong // mar me thogs la smon lam gdab// lus bsrung rgyan gyi ting 'dzin gces// dus mtshams sgrol ba'i gtor ma gtad// sprin gtong bsgrubs tshar bsngo ba bya// phyogs bcu dus
203b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i rgya lang rnams// yongs rdzogs gsang ba'i bslab can gyi// mang don mtshon pa de ltar yin// nyid las mi gzhan rjes 'dug gis// de la sgo bsutsa rigasupa// dus dang rtswa rlung rgya ga'i zags// drang ba don du 'khrul gas bya// mthar zag/
203b2(rnying rgyud): yang dag sa la sbyor// phun tshogs gsang ba'i bslab chen 'di// sku gsum yongs rdzogs sa la sbyor// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ zhi khro yongs rdzogs gsang ba bsgrub chen gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//
203b3(rnying rgyud): de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// kun dadus ston pa he ru ka ra// rgyud don bskyed rdzogs rab bsdus dag/ bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// kye 'dus pa'i 'khor
203b4(rnying rgyud): rtsegacig nyon// rgyad don bskyed rdzogs yang 'dril bshad// zhi khro bde gshegs yongs rdzogs kun// sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub par 'dus// sngon 'gro rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje sems dpa' zhi dang khro// yab yum rkyang sag gang bde ba'i//
203b5(rnying rgyud): bskyed rdzogs zud 'jug gsal bsgoms te// oM AHhUM/ sku gsung thugs ldan yongs rdzogs pa'i// 'khor 'das srog snying 'bru gsum ldan// bdud gzhom dgra bsad g.yang sa gcad// bsnyen rdzogs las rnams ma lus 'grub// rdzong 'phrang
203b6(rnying rgyud): srog gi tshad ldan te// de ltar sku gsung thugs bsgrub kyang // bla med yang dag yi ge hUM// zab ma thugs kyi bsgrub par rdzogs// de nyid nyams len bslab par 'dus// dkon mchog bla ma bde gshegs la// skyabs su 'gro zheng sems bskyed bya//
203b7(rnying rgyud): yan lag bcu pas tshogs kyang bsag/ snying rje byams dga' btang snyoms bsgom// lho rags la thugs 'od 'gro 'du las// sung mtshams khro bcu'i 'khor lo bsgom// khro bcu'i sprul pas gdug pa bskal// oM su~M d+ha ni sr-i d+ha hUM// gr-i h+Na gr-id+d+ha rmA
204a1(rnying rgyud): gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya trAM/ A na ya ha~M/ b+hag wAn bid+hA rA dA ya hUM phaT/ oM na maH ma nu badz+ra kA ya wAka tsit+ta n+te/ g+hag+ha/ g+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAM hUM phaT/ kI li kI la ya sarba pA pe phaT/ badz+ra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ de yis bkags
204a2(rnying rgyud): bsrung rab sbyangs te// snying ga'i hUM 'od rdo rje'i gur// rab gtams me 'od 'bar bar bsal// snying gA'i hUM las b+h+rUM 'phros zhu// de las gzhal yas khang sgo bzhi// rta babs 'dod yon pha gu dang // dra ba pu shu dar khad dang // 'phan dang rgyal mtshan dur khrod
204a3(rnying rgyud): mdzes// pho brad rat+na zur brgyad dbus// nyi zla pad+ma brtsegs pa'i steng // tshangs pa chu byin bsnol ba'i khar// nyi zla'i ga'u kha sbyor dbus// rdo rje rtse lnga'i lte ba la// rang rig hUM mthing gcig tu bsam// grib ma'i tshul du dril bu bskyed// de las bde
204a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs yongs rdzogs sku// yab yum 'khril sbyor zhig tu bskyed// de yang yab kyi ming 'dogs ni// dgyes mdzad rdo rje zhes kyang bya// bla med he ru zhes kyang bya// bde mchog 'khor lo zhes kyang bya// che mchog ho ru zhes kyang bya// bde gshegs
204a5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i sku mchog nyid// sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig pa// phyag g.yas rdo rje dung dmar 'khrugs// zhabs gnyis brgya dra bskums lha chen brdzis// kro d+hi yum chen yab 'dra 'khril// yum chen de yi ming 'dogs kyang // kun bzang pha rol phyin ma
204a6(rnying rgyud): dang // rdo rje phag mo rnal 'byor ma// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs khros nag mo// e ka dza Ti ga nam zhal ma// de ltar yab yum zhal sbyor la// dur khrod chas brgyad rdzogs par bsgom// oM AM hUM/ oM hUM swA hrIHhA/ sku gsung thugs su byin brlabacing // ye shes
204a7(rnying rgyud): lnga yis dbang yang bskur// spyan drang bstim mchod bstod sogs bya// lhags la gyad du gyur pa na// phra mo'i ting 'don gsal bsgoms te// kun gyi sde srog hUM gis bsnyen// 'dzab dbyangs zab mos nyams rtags spar// rdzogs rim lha nyid sems
204b1(rnying rgyud): ba / tu dang ya nga bad lta/ dbyar ma tsas nyid mang dang bral// rdzogs dmags pa kyis galas byung// nogasum rtags la slar cing bsgrub// zin las ga pa ba bsgyur ba// 'bras thab dang 'das rgyag rgyur// thAgasus ldan dang /
204b2(rnying rgyud): dang pol// phyogs bzungs pazhi'i rgyal ba dang // ni kha bka' ba rgyad lta tshogs rnams// rje mchog dpal gyi sa 'das// che mchog nye ga jig/ mnar ma btsas chos kyi byung sa// chos twa thegs rtagag cig na// zhes bka'
204b3(rnying rgyud): dpalagasang nga 'dus pa rgyad kyi rgyal po las/ bskyed rdzogs yang zil gyi sgrub thabs bstan pa'i le'u lte bcapa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu/ ston pa can tu bzang po dpal mi mchog he ru ka la gdo
204b4(rnying rgyud): gre kye ste/ chos kyi dbang lta ga kun tu bzang // dbang chen tshi mchog te duka/ ts+tshed don dbang bskur rim pa dag/ bdag drug 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad ge bal ba'i don dgongs nas/ smyon pa nyid kyis bkang stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'jo
204b5(rnying rgyud): tshogs rtse gcig nyon// rgyud don dbang bskur rim pa la// lnga sna ngo ba nges che ga dang // dbye ba slar thabs dgos ched do// ngo bo rang rig dbang tshugs thub// nges tshig sems nyid rtsal dbang bskur// dbyen khyad par thun mong ste// khyad par gyi nang gsang
204b6(rnying rgyud): dbang gsum// thun mong yin dang nus dbang yin// dbang chen slar thabs rim pa ni// tha ma gang gis slob ma ni// gang la bskur gyer sdod bcud bstan/ ji ltar slar thabs nang gsang // lan dus yongs rdzogs dag yin te// dkyil 'khor
204b7(rnying rgyud): rnams gsub dang mtshungs// khyad par dbang gi sgor rdzas ni// dardza'i bur dgra phyag sa tshan bri// sman dang rin chen 'grosogs sul// 'bras ldan brgyad dang snas bcing // sA lnga'i gzungs zag rdo rjes bsrung // byi zhe na dza rags lngas bcan//
205a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor lha tshogs kris sku gzug/ phyag mtshan bris pa'i srog zhu dang // me long shel bcas rdor dril dang // zhi rgyan khro tshogs rus rgyan sogs// dbang rdzas rim pa thams cad bsag/ mtshan ldan mu dra men dang bsham
205a2(rnying rgyud): gon rdog byad la du gzhug/ mdor na dbang gi sngon 'gro rjes// bsgrub chen bsnyen bsgrub khog phub la// las dang dbang gi spyod bas te// lha rnams bsnyen bsgrub sngags gzhug la// dbang gi gsang sngags 'dig dgra bsnyen// kA ya wA ka tsi d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa A// bod
205a3(rnying rgyud): bsdu'i sbyor ba yis// bsgrub rdzas lhar gsal bdud rtsir bsgyur// slob bu'i sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyang // dus drug tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// lnga bdun nyer gcig zhag tu bsgrub// de nas cod pan dbang bskur te// zhu 'bral rjes gnar cod pan dod// oM badz+ra pra
205a4(rnying rgyud): A be sha ya a a/ lha ngos bzung zhing gsang mtshan gdags// slob bus gsal gdab bla ma yis// gsang ba'i sngags 'dis byin chen dbab// oM AHhUM badz+ra gu ru sarba sa ma ya/ A be sha ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a.a a// de nas sdig tsug bum dbang bskur// oM A
205a5(rnying rgyud): hUM swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta shI he ru ka/ badz+ra kA la sha~M/ k+Sha ya wAka tsita a b+hi Shits+tsha hUM/ su ra ta s+t+waM/ de rjes dbu rgyan dbang bskur te// rigs lnga'i phyag mtshan drod sbas la// oM AHhrI swA hA/ badz+ra/ bud+d+ha/ rak+Sha/ pad+ma/ karma mu ku T+TaSh+Ti a b+hi Shi wA hUM/ de rjes phreng tshog sazhi rgyan
205a6(rnying rgyud): bang // gnas su bkod de dbang bskur ni// oM do d+hi Nit+ta mudra ru tsi ra ma Ni pra brta ya swA hA/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ de nas dpal gyi chas gos rnams// gnas su bkod de dbang bskur ni// oM shrI he ru ka sarba yo gi/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa sa ma ya shI ye hUM a/ de rjes dam rdzas
205a7(rnying rgyud): mchod pa'i tshogs// spyi bor bzhag nas dbang bskur ba// oM AM hUM sarba pa d+ha amr-i ta ba liM ta da~Mk+ta sarba pU dza sa ma ya a d+hi Shi ny+tsa sid+d+hi a b+hi Shiny+tsa a a/ de ltar byi dbang yongs rdzogs nas// nang gi lha dbang bskur ba ni// rigs lnga khrag 'thung lngar bcas pa'i//
205b1(rnying rgyud): sgrag tsugs la ba ma dmigs pas bstim// smra ba'i gzug nas bskur bar bya// oM A t+maswA hA/ rU mAn bA hU~M/ ba nas twa dAn a d+hi'i lham/ bar+d+ha dz+nyA na a Sh+TaShe l+h+wam/ rat+na dz+nyAn ma d+hi Sha Sh+yas/ pad+mad+hAn ma ti ny+dza.a/ ka martan na shA ma/
205b2(rnying rgyud): ka badz+ra kr-i trI shwa rI a d+hi Shiny+tsa a/ bud+d+ha shrI he ru kA bAd+d+ha bo d+hI shwa rI a b+hi She s+ya a/ rat+na shrI he ru kar NA krod+hI shwa rA a b+hiShiny+tsa a/ pad+me shrI ho ru ka pad+ma go d+hi shrA d+hi me d+hi ShiH a/ karma hU~M he ru ka karma kro d+hI shwA rI a b+hi Shin+d+ra a/ de nas rgyal rdzogs bzhi'i dngang /
205b3(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpal ye shos sems// oM bAg+h+ra shwa ri mr-i/ mgrin par sman ras gzigs dbang phyug/ A r+yA ba pa~M ki tai shwa rA ya/ thugs kar gsang bdag rdo rje sems/ badz+ra sar+b+batrAM/ lte bar drug pa rdo rje 'thung / am hA badz+rad+ha rA Ad+hiShe d+ha ma/ de rjes dpal tsha
205b4(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung dgu'i// cha lugs gsal ga bu dbang bskur te// slo bu'i spyi bor cha mchog bstim// oM brda lo d+ha many+dzu shrI he ru kar+g+haM/ swAzas ma ya/ e d+hi Shi g+has/ dpral bar gshin rje gshed po bsti ma// oM ISh+T+r-i bI gr-i trA~M nan hU~M sangs ma ya/ a r+tha/
205b5(rnying rgyud): a/ mgrin par pad+ma dbang chen bstim// oM ha ya gI wa hu lu hu lu hUM/ sarba sa ma ya a b+hi Shi d+ha a/ snying gar badz+ra ha~M pra bsgrim// oM ru ludz+wa lu trUM dz+dza hAM/ sarba sa ma ya a d+hi She d+ha e/ lte bar rdo rje gzhon nu bstim// oM badz+re kI la~M kI la ya hI/ sarbas
205b6(rnying rgyud): ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ gsang bar bla mod he rA bstim// oM gu h+ya gnya' ni shrI he ru ka kro d+hI shwa dI hUM/ sarba sa ma ya a d+hi Shiny+tsa a/ rig 'dzin rgyal po spyi bor bstam// oM badz+ra ma hA gu drA sarba sa ma ya/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ biR+Ya g.yas dregs pa kun 'dul ba sti ma/
205b7(rnying rgyud): 'dra sarba trAn traM/ sarba sa ma ya a b+hi Shi ny+tsa ma/ brla g.yon stobs ldan nag po bstem// oM badz+ra sarba duSh+Tan hUM/ sarba sa ma ya a b+hi Shi ny+tsa ma/ dpung gnyis khyang 'o khyang mo bstim// oM khrig Na Ni dz+dza/ sarba sa ma ya ma b+hiShi rgyas/ de nas spu gsung jug
206a1(rnying rgyud): dang kra// thugs sa snang dku na// / ngas ga tu/ ma na / sa / man
206a2(rnying rgyud): da'ang bsrur// ma~M dz+raM b+ha / de rjes lha dang dbyer med par// rab tu gnas pa'i dbang bsgyur ba// oM hUM swA ny+dzihA/ yai d+han he d+ha prASh+TA zhes d+he rbu thA ga taHwAdat+ta/ taiSh+Tha wA pa~M ni ra Sh+Ti mi waM 'dre mahA shra ma/ AtraM/ sa phe la sam
206a3(rnying rgyud): de rjes lha dbang mnga' gsol gyir// zhal zas tshogs kyi dbang bskur to// badz+ra A yu She/ hUM b+h+rU~M nr-i dzaHa b+he Shiny+tsa a/ sid+d+hi pha la sarba a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM a/ de rjes sngar srid dregs pa yi// srog dbang mthu rtsal dbang bskur ba// slob ma mdu stobs bdag por 'byed/
206a4(rnying rgyud): bsgrub phur bsras la lag tu gtad// he ru ka dgra'i sngags gzhug tu// drag sngags dgu po btigs la bskur// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn/ ta ka ha na da ha pa tsam tha hUM phaT/ kA ya wAka tsit+ta aShi ny+tsa b+h+rUMs/ sde brgyad gzugs la dmigs pas bsting /
206a5(rnying rgyud): bu'i zhabs 'og bran du gtad// oM AM hU~M badz+ra sarba dud+d+hAn trig nan oM tur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbang / tsit+ta rba d+ha nar/ ya ma rA dza sa ma ya dzaHbe shaM ku ru hUM phaT/ trag rak+sha khA mun tra dzaHba shaM ku ru hUM phaT/ tr-i ruru hI du ru ru ru ha pa shi ku ru hUM phaT/ shu la da dzi
206a6(rnying rgyud): sha ya dzaH/ ba shi ku ru ye hU~M phaT/ badz+ra sAt+ma sa mA ya dI dza tri s+yedz+dzaHba shai ku ru ye hUM phaT/ hU~M badz+ra ya hA b+h+yodz+dzadzaHba shaM ku ru ye hUM phaT/ nA gA rA nga sa ma ya phuHbai shaM ku ru ye hU~M phaT/ bran du gyur nas phud kyis gso// a I d+h+waM/ sa ma ya a hr-i ta khA ba khA hi khA hi/
206a7(rnying rgyud): rjes slob bu khri la bzhag/ rab 'byams bka' yi dbang spyir te// rdon slo ba de danus pa'i dbang // slob dpon bka' rtags rdzas gtad cing // dag gis rjes gnang legs par sbyin// oM sarba ta thA ga ta gu rug rgya shwa 'adz+ras b+hA ba At+maka&haM/ de nas gdug
206b1(rnying rgyud): kyis dbang bsrung ba// yo sa?n shar rdza.a 'i rgyam // denas rdorjes dbang bslar ba// na pa badz+ra mA be sha ya ma/ de nas dril bas dbang bskur ba// d+hamadaHa mam tra kau Tata/ de nas nyan pa'i dbang bskur ba// ortam+ba thA gaHsa sbal ya ta/ de nas 'dra ba 'ad
206b2(rnying rgyud): bslar ba// d+harba le kha na A li kA li swa b+hA la sAr+tha kau ha~M/ de nas chos 'chad dbang bskung ba// oM sarba ta thA ga ta thA Sh+Than d+harmas b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de nas bslab pa'i dbang bskur ba// oM saM ba yogs cata thA ga ta ma hA swa b+hA wa A t+ma kau&ti/ de nas ts+tshats+tsha sdes dbang baphrer// rdug
206b3(rnying rgyud): tsha sna bu ram sbyar// chang bcas brud de sngags 'dis bskur// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da lI raM/ sarba ta thA ga ta sha ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ de nas rab 'byams don dbang ni// 'phrul chen lnga bcu brjod la bskur// de nas phrin las nus dbang bskur// badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba a b+hi ShiHhUM a/
206b4(rnying rgyud): de ltar nang dbang yongs rdzogs nas// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang bskur ni// mtshan ldan pakra shis yid 'ong ma// pad dung glang sna gang rung ldan// bcu drug lon pa'i rig ma ni// gdan khar rigs kyi yul du bskyed// rang nyid rigs kyi yab tu gsal// mkha
206b5(rnying rgyud): gsang brda' yis byin gyis brlab// phyag rgya bzhi gdams pad+ma'i dbus// rdo rje snyoms 'jug dal gyis bsub// yab yum gnyis med 'de ba skye// gnyis med bde ba hU~M du bsam// hUM ring hUM thung sna nas bzang // mkha' gsang bar nas hUM sngos pa// slob
206b6(rnying rgyud): gzungs ma dang bcas pa'i// shes rgyud dug lnga sbyang bar bsams// yul gsum gsal ba rab tu gces// phyi yul lus la bde ba skye// tha mal lus su tshor ba med// nang yul dbugs pa 'gyu me tshor// tha mal rlung gi rtog pa 'gang // gsang yul sems
206b7(rnying rgyud): la bde gsal 'bar// tha mal nyon mongs 'dod chags med// de ltar yul gsum gsal ba dang // gsang ba'i dgra gsum so dbus mnyam// phyogs bral dmigs pa med pa yis// phyi dgra gzung dang 'dzin pa gsang // 'dod chags bde chen ye shes 'bar// /
207a1(rnying rgyud): nang dgradrug lu ga gsum gsad// nam rtog pag chags mnan man// gsang dgang bdag tog phyags// sgeg gnyis kyi 'brang las rnam// rkang man las bdud ba zhab ma// yab sam smras nam med par /
207a2(rnying rgyud): reg tu phung po'i bdud kyang bcom// bde ba skyes pas nyon bdud sgrol// bar gcod lha yi bu'i bdud bcom// yab sum thabs dang shes rab la// skye 'tsho mi mnga' rdo rje'i sgra// 'chi bdag bdud bcom rdzogs sangs rgyas// las dang bag chags nyon
207a3(rnying rgyud): rmongs dang // 'gro drug kye mkhan skye gnas med// de phyir 'ab jug g.yangs chod// de nas yum nyed kha slab pa'i// mkha' nus byung sems dkar dmar blang // mtshan ldan ka pA la'i nang du// dza gad bdud rtsi yang gsum sbyar// de nas tha ma sna rnams kyas/
207a4(rnying rgyud): byang sems dmigs pas dbab cing bstim// rang sngags brjod de dag la bskur// oM d+hi d+hitsit+taM ka ma laM sid+d+hi d+hi ma hA la// kha ho// a b+hiShi T+Ta a/ de nas bra la yum gtad de// d+h+ye shes rab mtshan ldan pakra shis yum/ bden pa dbyer med bad chen bsgyung
207a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo'i gnas bzhir dbab bzang la// brten nas chos nyid don rtogs byos// oM sarba ta thAg tA graHprad+mA sha~M re swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM ho swa kha b+hany+dza moM ny+dzanaHde nas ngas kyi yol ba'i phyir// slob bu yab yum ltar gsal gdab// rtsa rlung jig la
207a6(rnying rgyud): gnad bstan la// mkha' gsang byin brlab dbab gzung bzlog/ dgram dang rgyas gdab 'khrul 'khor gyis// bde mchog lhan skyes rtogs goms sbyang // sems kyi dri ma des dag pas// bde chen lam bsgom rjes gnang sbyin// de ltar yab yum sbyor ba'i tshe//
207a7(rnying rgyud): rtsa gsum gsal bar gyur ma gyur// gsang ba'i dgra gsum mid ma yod// 'jigs pa'i bdud pa'i com mtshams// 'pho drug ga yangs tshod mtshad// chang dang ldadan pa thams btag/ nan pan mongs ma spangs dag/ da byung ye shes dang sha te// 6/
207b1(rnying rgyud): rnams rdon byung po ldog/ ko 'bang dbang gis bgrod par byed// de nas rig pa'i dbang bskur te// lag tu don dril bu gtad// me long shel bcas brda' du 'phyar// tshig gis mtshon pa 'dun smad// hA sams nyid gsal la dzan rtag med// ka
207b2(rnying rgyud): ljin grub ye shes su// gnyis med 'din thal thugs rje'i gsung // rang rig yang dag rdo rje'i thugs// den pa ny+tsata bkA ya ya/ de ltar gsang dbang yongs rdzogs nas// yang gsang lta ba spyi 'byams dbang // yongs rdzogs kyal thebs 'di nyid de/
207b3(rnying rgyud): ba mig ldan gcig la bskur// slob dpon mnyam gzhag phyag tu'i mthil// a dkar gsal 'tshor gcig la gzhag/ dgongs pa chos nyid ngang la gzhag/ slob bus nor bu rin chen thogs// dpon dang slob bu yab yum kyan// kun pazang yab yum dUr
207b4(rnying rgyud): gsal gdab// hUM thams cad lhan grub kun tu bzang po dngos// rang bzhin brjod med kun tu bzang mo'i rang // gnyis med thabs kyi rgyal pos yongs la khyab// dbyer med chos kyi dbyings su dbang bskur bas// kun tu bzang po rang byung bcom ldan 'das/
207b5(rnying rgyud): kyi byings la gcig tu bzhugs pa yi// rang rig byang chub sems kyi lnga yin te// don dam sems kyi lha la bdag phyag 'tshal// phyag g.yus ar bcas slob bu'i smigatsug gzhag/ bru~M kun tu bzang po dri ma med pa yi// yongs la dbang bsgyur ye shes rgyal
207b6(rnying rgyud): shar// dang sems rnam dag lta ba'i rgyal por shar// byang chub snying po bde ba chen por shar// thams cad ma lus lhun grub chos kyi sku// chos rnams thams cad rang gi sems su 'dus// sems kyi bdag nyid ci yang ma yin pas// thig la smos pa med pa'i
207b7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin nyid// mnyam pa'i rgyal po kun la dbang bsgyur te// chos nyid rig pa'i rgyal po rdzogs pa che// ma 'dres cir yang ston pa theg pa'i mchog/ 'di dag ma lus myur du rdzogs bya'i phyir// spyi blugs lba ba'i dbang mchog 'di bskur bas//
208a1(rnying rgyud): ga mas canal pas sa// sa ba \u0f7f/ !6 mthun / nas smra 'dab thAg/ sa lags nam // ga shAg sa byag/
208a2(rnying rgyud): nam lakha' 'di la stos// gsal la dngas pa mtha' dang bral// gang la'ang 'dzin med pade chen 'di// lta brdzogs lhung bral ba yin// 'di nyid don la gnas par gyis// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgongs pa men// mngon// de nas bsgom pa'i dbang
208a3(rnying rgyud): 'apur te// hUM rkos sheg ltos shig rigs kyi za// rang gi sems la nang du ltos// gsal la mi rtog ma yengs pa// mer me rlung gis ma bskyod 'dra// bsgom par du gsal 'dzin med yid// 'di yi don la rtag tu sgoms// dus gsum sangs rgyas
208a4(rnying rgyud): bsgom nyams yin// a ti ho/ de nas 'bras bu'i dbang bskur te// k+She ltos shig ltos shig skal ldan khyod// chos sku 'gyur med don la ltos// skabs ma brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das// mkhur bzlas bkang sgra 'ad 'dra// gang yang mgrub
208a5(rnying rgyud): stong pa'i ngang // mi ste mi dgeg chos kyi su// 'bras bu mi 'gyur gdang ldan yin// 'di yi don la gnas par gyis// dus gsum sangs rgyas 'di la gnas// a hi ho// de nas spyod pa'i dbang bskur te// blo nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi bu// 8
208a6(rnying rgyud): b+h+yo ye shes rol pa la// ma 'gags thabs kyi rgyal po yis// gang sdang sangs rgyas mdzad spyod la// ci bder spyod par ngasar grol// spyod pa spyi 'byams yangs dog med// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgongs spyod yin// eta to// de ltar lta skom spyod 'bras/
208a7(rnying rgyud): 'a// sum tho tho na lar ba gnas na// theg pa spyi byams dbang chen 'thab/ dbang rnams de las rab tu 'tho// dbyung dbang gi rgyal po yin// rdzobaskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa'o// 'di las 'thos pas grol lams// ting 'din gsum dang /
208b1(rnying rgyud): dbang chen gsum// chog gsum dang lhar gas lag dang // byin brlab dbang bskur ye shes bstem// phyi nang gsang dri phyag rgyas mchod// bstod bskul 'angab bsnyen dbul la sogs// bskyed ram grol ba'i lam yin te// thams cad sems kyi dzA
208b2(rnying rgyud): 'phrul yin// rang sems rgyal skyong chen po'o// dz+haiM lha rnams gnas su rdzogs rim ni// yid ni yab la chos ni yum// phung po yab la 'byung ba yum// rnam shes yab la yul lnga yum// dbang po yab la dus bzhi yum// nyon mongs drug ni sprul pa'i sra//
208b3(rnying rgyud): lus chos yab la mu bzhi yum// thabs ni yab la shes rab yum// rang bzhin de ltar shes pas na// ma bsrungs ma bsrubs dang ltar gnas// rang byung gnas 'gyur rdzogs rim yin// rang byung lhan rdzogs rdzogs chen ni// sangs rgyas thabs mkhas
208b4(rnying rgyud): thugs rje yis// theg stobs ma mi khyab gsungs kyang // thams cad blo yi 'bring thabs yin// chos rnams thams cad sems su rdzogs// chos kun bden pa dbyer med pas// thams cad yin la gang yang min// sangs rgyas mthar thug chos kyi sku// kun la
208b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs tong ma shes// ho 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// 'khrul snang 'dzin pa gnyis su byung // yang nga gdon la dbye ba med// gnyis ka rang gi sems kyi rdzogs// ho chos su 'dzin pa thams cad ni// spros pa blo yi chos yin phyir// skug sum rang yang grangs su
208b6(rnying rgyud): zed// 'dus byas chos kyis sangs mi rgya// hoHsangs rgyas chos su 'dzin pa ni// mthar thug 'khrul blo chen po yin// sangs ni chos min gcig gis rgya// blo las 'das pa rdzogs chen yin// hoHrgyas bsdus rim par rang lus bzhin// rim pa dbang gis bzod
208b7(rnying rgyud): par bya// sa ma ya ni shel gong ltar// gzhi ni dam tshig gtsang mas bzung // ting 'dzin lus dang grib ma ltar// nyams su ting nge 'dzin gyis long // man ngag gar chang 'thung ba ltar// don ni man ngag zab mos bslab// lta ba nam mkha'i mdung skor bzhin//
209a1(rnying rgyud): thag dnga'apha na ltabs bcad// spyod pa me sha rlon pa bzhin// lani spyod pas dor bar bya// zung du 'brel la go las med// tshig tu rtog lam brtan par// sku gsum don po gcigatu rjel// mtha' jug rgya mardzogs
209a2(rnying rgyud): gyis// mthar thug don dam nang nas 'char// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bzhin// thams cad stong pa'i ngang la gnas// hoHde ltar dbang rnams yongs rdzogs par// bskur ba'i yon tan bsam mi khyab// gsang sngags dngos grub dbang las 'gyur/
209a3(rnying rgyud): rtags mkha' 'gros lung bstan cing // ltas su yid bzhin gtsug na 'chang // mgo la nyi shar dmag dpon byed// mgo dang ro spyod yang la bde// bum bcud 'thung dang zas bcud zos// rang rig rtsal la dbang bsgyur nus// dbang ma thob pa'i nyes pa ni/
209a4(rnying rgyud): shes rab gsum rlom las bsog kyang // 'bras bu med cing rlag par byed// dbang yon ma phul shin tu nyams// de nas dbang yon dbul ba ni// byin rlobs dbang gi bla ma la// rgyal srid yul 'khor rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor dbyig dbul// zhes
209a5(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ gsang ba yongs rdzogs kyi dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams mgrin gcig tu/ ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la
209a6(rnying rgyud): gsol pa/ kye rtse kye/ dam tshig chen po kun tu bzang // rdo rje 'chang kun yongs kyi rje// chud don dam tshig chos kyi srog// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol bar don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnam
209a7(rnying rgyud): rtse gcig nyon// rgyud don dam tshig 'asung grub// rtsa bsku gsung thugs dang ni// yan lag nyi shu rtsa lnga las// spros na bsam gyis mi khyab kyang // rtsa ba yan lag nyams mi bya// yang na mnyam rdzogs chen por gnas// sku yi dam tshig rdo rje ste// slong dpon mchod
209b1(rnying rgyud): dang lumajal la// brdag bcog spar ba nam yang min// ngan sams 'phras mas gcig ma tha// gsung gi dam chog dbang thob nas// yid ma dkyil 'khar tshogs kyi// sngags dang phyag tu rgyan mi gcad// tha med thag mchog mi srang ngo // thugs
209b2(rnying rgyud): tshig gsang ba bcu// gnas dang dus grogs thams cad gsang // sbub rdzas lag cha thams cad gsang // ma gsang mu stegs 'chal bar 'gyur// sman dang gtor ma mchod rdzas gsang // de ma gsang na dngos grub nyams// spyi 'dzab rtsa ba'i snying
209b3(rnying rgyud): gsang // ma gsang mthu dang byin brlabs nyams// sngags pa sngags dang phyag rgya gsang // de ma gsang na smyon par 'gyur// sbyor dang sgrol ba'i lag len gsang // ma gsang skye bo'i ya gar 'gyur// phrin las mdzod spyod kun kyang gsang // de ma gsang na ru
209b4(rnying rgyud): tshod 'gyur// rgyud dang sgrub thabs man dag gsang // ma gsang mkha' 'gro'i bka' chad 'od// mdor na gsang ba 'os rigs gsang // de ma gsang na lkugs par 'gyur// ched du gnyer gtad man ngag gsang // ma gsang nyams pa chen por 'gyur//
209b5(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni// nyams na bskal pa gcig gnyis gsum// rdo rje dmyal bar gdon mi za// shes bya lnga dang spyad bya lnga// mi spang lnga dang bsgrub bya lnga// dang len lnga ni yan lag ste// nyams na mnar med dmyal bar 'gro// gzhan yang khyad par dam tshig
209b6(rnying rgyud): dang // bla ma bkur zhing gsung mi bcag/ thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor yengs mi bya// lha dang sngags la the tshom spangs// mched lha ma kun la gdung sems bskyed// sems can kun la snying rjes babyung // nga rgyal jom sems zhe sdang dang // 'dod chags phrag dog 'a
209b7(rnying rgyud): btang // gsang sngags blta spyod chung du spel// bskyed rdzogs bsnyen paslab mtha' du dbyung // le lo gnyed dang chang dbang spang // yang dag don gyi mchog tu// 'khor 'das chos rnams rang rig sems// gdod nas rang kyi bcos sku'i dang // de nyid len sa
210a1(rnying rgyud): bsung nyams na// mi bsru zla las dor du med// nyams rgyan thob bya'i 'bras bu med// ma spangs mi gnas gzung 'dzin 'das// skye medag nyan pasam shigs dam// mu stegs bdug tu 'dzin pa zag/ snga rabs 'das pa
210a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyang // dam tshig dag la brten te rgyas// da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // dam tshig 'di la rab tu gnas// slad kyis 'gyon pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // dam tshig dag la brten nas rgya// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po
210a3(rnying rgyud): las/ dam tshig dag la brten pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ sprul pa'i sku mchog kun tu bzang // skye med chos te sna tsho
210a4(rnying rgyud): smyon// rgyud don mtha' rgyas yid pa'i du gtud// bdag cag rnams la bkang stsol cig/ de skad gsol ba'i don dgongs te/ sbyin pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyud dran mthu' rgyas cha dang rkyen// man ngag le sogs bsam yas kyang // dgos pa mad tsam
210a5(rnying rgyud): bshad par bya// ji ltar 'dod pa'i don rjod cig/ de skad rjes su gnang ba dang // gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje chos// dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar// kye ho dpal chen yid bzhin mdzod// bde gshegs zhi khro yongs rdzogs pa'i// gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud mchog gi/
210a6(rnying rgyud): nyams len mdor bsdus bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don gsungs pa// bde gshegs yongs rdzogs gsad rgyud kyi// mdor bsdus nyams len sgrub lugs gsum// skyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen te// gcig la gcig brten gcig gi da // phyi dang
210a7(rnying rgyud): nad dang gsang ba'i tshul// phyi ni rdul tshon dkyil 'khor la// brten nas skyed pa'i rnal 'byor ni// gong du bstan pa'i sgrub chen yin// de yang gang zag blo rigs kyis// rab tu spros la mi dga' bas// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa'am// yang na zhi khro dgos
210b1(rnying rgyud): sgrub bam// che mchog yab yum gnyis su dril// thugs srub hUM du bsrub kyang rung // rgyud 'di sor gzhag kho na ltar// bde gshegs rtsab yongs rdzogs pas// rigs lnga zhi khro bka' brgyad gtso// rtsa ba'i lha tshogs go gcig skyed// nyi ma dang ni zer
210b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin du// 'khor rnams rang bzhin lhan skyes rung // mdor na sku mdog phyag mtshan sogs// zhal gyag mang nyung bsam yas kyang // ye shes lha la rang rgyud par// rtsis gdab khrigs su gcad pa med// gdul bya'i blo dang gang mthun par// chos sku'i rang
210b3(rnying rgyud): rtsal cing yang snang // thams cad sems kyi cho 'phrul yin// dkyil 'khor lha sngags ting nge 'dzin// rgyas bsdus gang ltar bsgom yang rung // nyams len bde la don mi 'gyur// de phyir bde chen g.yung drung lha// 'du 'bral med pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// sems
210b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin sems kyi rtsal sbyangs pas// de gyer sgrub chen bskyed pa yin// nang ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid la// brten nas rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor bstan pa ni// sngon 'gro'i lha sku gsum sngon du song byas nas// ma bskyed rdzogs pa'i ldan tshul lha bsgom pa// ye nas
210b5(rnying rgyud): kun gzhi stong gsal de bzhin nyid// de nyid kun khyab kun sdang snying rje'i dang // 'gag med rol pa hU~M ni kun gyi rgyu// ma bskyed rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom// de bzhin 'byung ba rim pa lnga brtseg kyang // ma bskyed dang la rdzogs tshul 'di ltar bsgom// sems
210b6(rnying rgyud): nyid nam mkha' stong gsal e yi dang // 'gyu byed 'thor rlung spyod byed stobs ldan yi// sdud byed khrag gi rgya mtsho chu yin pa// gzugs ni rab brtan sha ni sa yin suM// sprin byed drod kyi rang bzhin me yin no// skal tshigs rus pa'i ri rab brtseg pas kau// khog pa gzhal
210b7(rnying rgyud): yas khang gi rang bzhin b+h+rUM// yab yum byar sems dkar dang dmar mthing gis// srog rtsa dbu ma drang po tshangs pa'i thig/ 'khor lo bzhi yi tshangs theg cha bzhir bgo// rtse chung gnyis rtse tshangs pa'i rtsal zug/ de smad rtsa chen long rtsa gnyis la zug/ lag
211a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis bak+ka \u0f7f thAHrnam pa gnyis// phan tshul bsngom nas 'brel ba rtsa gA nyis te// de bzhin srog pa'i rtsal rab tu gyes// pho brang lang rdo dgu yi tshul du tshang // yang tsha la rtsa yi 'dab bzhi bzhi// phyogs bzhir dgyes pas
211a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i tshul// rtswa yi rgyal po srog pa'i rtsa de las// rtsa chen bzhi sdes rtsa chen cha gcig ni// a wa la bug dbang po 'char byed rtsa// rtsa zan lnga brgya'i 'khor dang 'dra 'phro byed// rtsa chen gcig dang gnyis 'brel dbang po rgyu// rtsa bran lnga brgya'i
211a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang 'du 'gro byed// rtsa chen gcig dang de ltar 'brel byed pa'i// 'byorar+ya lo sbyar byed rtsa ste lnga brgyar ldan// rtsa chen gcig dang gsang 'brel 'byung byed na// rtsa bran lnga brgya'i 'khor dang 'phro 'du byed// de yang klad pa'i a wa d+hU ti las// mtshon rtsa dgu bcu rtsi
211a4(rnying rgyud): da rten 'brel gyis// dbang po rgyu byed rtsal de bzhin pas// laR+Ya lho rgyu byed rtsi la de bzhin pas// 'byung ba skyed byed rtsal de bzhin no// brgya dang nyi shu pags pa'i mtshon rtsa yin// brgya dang nyi shu rus pa'i mtshon rtsa yin// brgya dang nyi shu gdags sribs mtshon pa'i /
211a5(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba'i rtsa bzhi srog pa'i rtsa dang rnga// de ltar bdun brgya nyi shun+da lnga po// bde gshegs bdun pa rgya nyed sgra'i pho zang yin// ma bskyed dang rgyal yongs su rdzogs pa ste// de bzhin nad+ha'i gzhal las rang gi mgo// snying drung thugs ye shes dgra'achar bas// thugs
211a6(rnying rgyud): dgu dngos grub yid bzhin gter// tsit+ta'i pho long ba su'i dra phyed dang // zhing lpags b+ha pre rak+ta'i rgya mtsho dang // sha chen keng rus dri chen dri chu dang // nang gi dur khrod gnas brgyad ring la tshad// nyi zla'i skar khung rang gi mig gnyis la// kha sga gsang bshang dkyil 'khor
211a7(rnying rgyud): zla ba zhi yin// de ltar gan po las yinas rang mardzogs// sbyirnams rang sa yangs rdzogs 'di ltar bsgom// srog cas kyid dkyil lakhor dbus yin te// kunag gi sems kyi rang bzhid de la brten// de phyir rje mchag yab grum rang rdzogs bskum// sro
211b1(rnying rgyud): 'i gang gas nying yin rig pa shang // thags mchog pa gi stsal pa sam paso// phrog tu rnamag dbang ba na tan rnas// spyamachag gshin rdog shed po yab yum bsam// thog tu rlab maldan pa 'dus rnamachog nag// gsungs rgyag pa dra dbang rgyan/
211b2(rnying rgyud): pab sum pa nas// srog ci'i byang gi srid pa nyenas chags// srin las ring gzhon du yab mam bskyed// srog ts+tsha sha tshogs ga nas bdeba'abang// tha med te nag can yab sgyum bsgom// theg tu'i grwa pa spyi bo dbang gi gnas// rig 'dzin ma rdza ba
211b3(rnying rgyud): cham bzhom// g+sa byung / g.yas dang garjod // ra 'di rdzogs pa zin 'dras yAb sum ba sgom// srog ci'i byang shar dang ga la nang ngagading du// bdud 'dral stobs rdzun ga po ya byas sa bsgom// rdzi lpags thams yin gyis thab ba drug rnams// @
211b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtsangan bka' sdong po nyer bsgom// phyags pa'i gter sngal rdo rje dag te// btsun mas ni bskal pa'i ba 'o// de ltar gsang yongs rdzogs su rnams kyang // rang rgya da phyogs des dajas po 'dzin med pas// chom thag tsa cung yab yum gang gsal rung // dab
211b5(rnying rgyud): rlab pa mang byeng dkyi sa 'dog// ji ltar mos pa'i drisu 'bring rig rtsa la yin// de ltar la rdzogs dan shes rang gsalan// b+hu drang bstim mtshang ba snyed bshags b+ha brdegs// 'dzab kyang rlung gi smad rang slar ldan// b+h+ring du thug sa rgyal kun 'dus lhags//
211b6(rnying rgyud): dra dzang sgra les bzlas pa rtse// tshogs kun gyis der di sgrogs par stsam// 'od zer myur 'gros sgo gsum sgrib basbyang // 'od zer gyen rdzog sa rdzogs pa'i rim pe ba sgom// rtsol mong dang rdzogs hral sbyangs pas// dpyir rdzogs pa nang sle ba yin// gas nga
211b7(rnying rgyud): de mis kyi kyil 'khor la// brten nas rdzogs chen rnam 'byor ni// gnyis te dkyil 'khor rang rig la// rdzogs pa'i tshul dang nyams len no// rang rig sems su lha rdzogs tshul// snying po dang rig 'phrul mtshab mchod// nga bdag dasang gegs med med/
212a1(rnying rgyud): da/ sa pa gas// gags dugs/ du chu sa// na smras/ gas / da na kyi
212a2(rnying rgyud): tsha ldan pa gam pa// 'ang grags pa ya byar rdzogs/ su sem mangs tsag da dbang bsrud// mchod ngas pa shes med par rdzogs// hUM gag gnyis medang blang sa/ ting 'dzin thebs la med par rdzogs// byung ba na
212a3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das// dbang sernams la dkyi med rdzogs// don gyi sring ba tsang kyis 'das// gzhal la migs pa'ig ba byed par rdzogs// 'ag pa'i 'i tog dbyer byed pas// nyib+ha bdag na mtshan me rdzogs// sran gzhes pa rnam thong yang we// yid bye rdu pa
212a4(rnying rgyud): rnamapa dag/ yi shes sems dpa'i chos spang rdzogs// bdag me nga dag zung chub sems// gaN+DI mug nam dag chos bye dbyings// ye shes rang ga ba'i rkyen don// rtse mchog te sred por rdzogs// zhesang rang byeng rang dag gis// ye shes rang shar ba ga
212a5(rnying rgyud): phyogs// btu gling bar rdzogs// nga rnal rang dag man pa nyid kyi// yogs rang shang ba gshegs sde// gshi jig shadang po'i 'jo bor rdzogs// 'dod chags rang dag pa tog gi// ye shes rang shing bde gshegs gsung // dbang chen rnam
212a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// zag dog nga dag nan na ci// ye shes pa shar bde gshegs zir// rdo rje gnod dang bar rdzogs// bag chags mngon kur byang chub sems// chos kyi phung snang brjid pa'i spobs// tha med te ru bang rigs// nam rtog gru byed mid dag pas// so
212a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs bu 'jigs pa slobs// rdzogs pa 'ad rdzogs// drag 'i khrag dag rnam dge pas// sprul phra sna chags cad kyi stobs// stobs ldan na ga zibang por rdzogs// thAsras rjes bcas rnab dag pas// rgyal ba rig 'dzin thags
212b1(rnying rgyud): dang skyo rje mang rdzogs// 'jig rten 'dzin rtog rnam par dag/ bstan pa bsrung ma dmamatshan / bas// dpal gyi bka' srung rdzam chags// darkar yangs chags rdul ba rnams// car yang snang thabs yab kyi tshul// shes rab mtshan 'das sum kyi dang /
212b2(rnying rgyud): lha tshogs de dag thams cad kyang // ye shes mtshan gyir ming du btags// don la rang byung ye shes sku// ma bcos thig le nyag gcig yin// ye nas rang dang lhan cig gnas// spyan drang bzhugs gsol mi dgos rdzogs// bzang ngan med mnyam
212b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis med mchod// phyag dang mchod pa mi dgos rdzogs// rang rtsal thabs kyis 'gro don mdzad// phrin las bstod bskul mi dgos rdzogs// mtha' bral snying po brjod du med// bsnyen srub 'dzab bzlas mi dgos rdzogs// rang rig ji med 'odags pa lha/
212b4(rnying rgyud): chos sku ldan grub 'bras pa yin// de ltar rdzogs pa'i don shes na// gsang ba'i nyams len mthar thug pas// rdzogs pa chen po'i sdom bzhi yin// gza' gtad med pa'i lta ba yis// yin pa med par dang ngo sbed// dmigs gtan med pa'i sgom pa yis//
212b5(rnying rgyud): mi nang med par rnams su blangs// tha~Md dor med pa'i spyod pa yis// yin min med pa klag kyang brtsam/ yang rdzob med pa'i 'bras bu yis// rang dag pa'i galas bcad// lte pa rang spyad do nags ma ste// chos rnams mnyam nyin ma
212b6(rnying rgyud): grub mtha'i tshogs 'dzin grol ba dang // phyogs ris med par la bzla'o// mnyam nyid nga rdo sprad pa ni// 'khor 'das chos kun cir snang yang // snang ba chos nyid ma yin par// stong pa chos nyid yin pa'am// chos can ma yin chos nyid gci// logs nas 'byung bar 'ad
212b7(rnying rgyud): pa'am// yod min med min yin sems mam// rang min gzhan min rtog pa'am// rngan min bden pa min zhe na// de ltar tha dad ma yin te// chos rnams rangadabyung ye shes nyid// chos min gtad med nyid snang ba// snang na dang sdang stong dang stong // snang dang stong pa ye nas
213a1(rnying rgyud): nanas / / na smra// dadugan /
213a2(rnying rgyud): dan nyid bden// rngan dang bden par mnas panyam// kyang zhen mas pa nyid gyi// rab chags kya gang yang dzin// de kyi kyim min gtid 'a // dpe nag zang ldan drug bzhin// se nas mnamasha nga byed// grub rgya pa'i rgyags 'don grol ba na/
213a3(rnying rgyud): rnams mags gi ma pa 'grol ba// skyes pas rang rlung bzang ba tul// chadA pas stong par bcang bas log/ theg da ldan sdang ba dgang bltas gol// byang sems gnyen pas spangs pas bsgribs// mtha' dmas snang bar blo 'dags 'thams// rtag sdel
213a4(rnying rgyud): nang dag snang du// bsgyur bas chos min gting matogs// mdor na phyogs 'dzin lba ba'i bad+mad// gza' gtad med pa'i lci ba yis// chos min rtog pas phyogs 'drin zol// phyogs ris med pa'i la bar+d+han// chos can dngos po gang drang la// byung tshub ming
213a5(rnying rgyud): gzugs mi mnad pa dang // las dang 'a dog dbyibs suthal// byas pa bsu brtags na 'di yin med// mad pa rdzogs su ma lung zhing // zer yang snying bas med pa yi// phyogs sa yang ni rtsa mchud// gnyis ka 'ongs nas rang da dbu'i// gnyis med phyogs
213a6(rnying rgyud): rma lhung bas// mnyam nyid tu chang ris med par// yang dag don gyi la bzla'o// bsko pa'i nyams len lagasum ste// bdag 'dzin do dang dpral ba dang // bden rdzun 'khrul pa gzhig pa dang // yin min blo dang dpal ba'o// bdag 'dzin ro dang dpral ba ni/
213a7(rnying rgyud): byed ma khan po nan te// bcom nas kyi gas pa pa khod// nga bdag nyid kyis nyid la brtag/ 'gro lus sems gang gis kyis// sras kyis byas nam go yan lag/ don lnga sgo 'jugs rdzas pags// gang gis zas te der mi snang // gal zhes mas
213b1(rnying rgyud): kyis byas sems na// rnga ba stang pas byed ma khan med// rang bzhin gas lnga yang gArtIHthal// mtshan nyid 'gra nga na 'dzin chags ni// gang yang mgrab bdag ma nad// de ma rnyed pas bsgom bya ya// chos dang wang bya'i snang bzhig/ de phyir dmigs gta ba
213b2(rnying rgyud): dang bral// bdag 'dzin no med rdo sprod no// bden rdzun 'khrul ba zhig pa ni// phyi yi snang yul rang rgyud par// bden cing grub pa med par nges// bden na rigs drug ltar snang dang // mu stegs rtag chad pheg dgu yi// mthong snang tha dad cil rigs// de phyer chos
213b3(rnying rgyud): men rang sdang zhing // snang ba'i byed maldan ma grub pas// ljang yul bden rdzun 'khrul snang zhig/ gnyis 'don 'khrul pa gzhi rtsa thal// yin min gro dang bral ba ni// de ltar 'khrul gzhi rtsa thal bas// bslab bya 'di yin pa slab tu med// spang bya 'di min phrang
213b4(rnying rgyud): du med// thams cad yul med rig pa nyid// phyogs med rang snang yul med grol// yin min blo dang der bral mod// smod pa'i 'gag sdom la yang gsum// chos byas gzung 'dzin gcad bya zhing // ma bcad lhun grub rdzogs pa dang // sgyu ma mnyam nyid 'gag bsdam
213b5(rnying rgyud): mo// ched byas gzung 'dzin bcad pa ni// gza' gtad med pa'i lta ba yis// yin pa med pa'i phyogs las grol// dmigs gtad med pa'i bsgom pa yis// min pa med par grogs su 'char// blang dor med pa'i spyod pa yis// yin min med pas ci yang
213b6(rnying rgyud): spyad// chos nyid klong las 'das pa med// dge brgya pha rol phyin drag dang // chos spyod bcu stsogs 'di blang bya// mi dge bcu dang mtshams med lce// rnam smin sdig che 'di spang bya// mtshan ma rang dag gzhi med pas// brang dor gzung 'dzin med med de// yi
213b7(rnying rgyud): min gnyis kyi chos las 'das// ma spyad ldan grub rdzogs tshul ni// de ltar sgomachos nyid kyi// rang las 'gros ma rnyed pas// mi dge bcu dang sgrib gnyis sogs// ma spangs chos min lhun gyis grub// dge bcu chos myed tshogs chen
214a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis// ma brtsal chos min ldan gyis grub// bsrub bya skra dang ye shes sogs// ma bsgrubs ldan gyis rdzogs pa'o// sgyu ma mnyam nyid 'gag bsnam ni// 'khor 'das kyis bsdus chos thams cad// snga ma'i dpe
214a2(rnying rgyud): dgu ji bzhin du// yod nas snang ba ma yin te// yod pa nyid nas rang snang phyir// skye ba med pas thams cad skye// skyes tsam nyid nas rtse med de// snang ba'i dus ni snang bar mnyam// stong pa'i dus na stong par mnyam// gnyi ga'i bus ga gnyis su mnyam// gnyi
214a3(rnying rgyud): med gnyis su med par mnyam// mnyam nyid phyogs las grol bas na// sgyu ma lta bur 'gag bsdam mo// 'bras bu'i la bzlal yang gsum// rgyu 'bras yul 'das zag gcad cing // spang thob mtshan med gtan tshigs dang // bsgrub med ye rdzogs la bzla'o//
214a4(rnying rgyud): 'bras yul 'das zag gcod ni// gong bzhin bdag 'dzin do bral bas// rgyu ni sems can yul las 'das// chos nyid ci yang ma yin pas// 'bras bu sangs rgyas yul las 'das// mnyam nyid phyogs bral 'dzin med pas// rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi yul
214a5(rnying rgyud): las 'das// 'dus ma 'das kyi blo grol bas// gnyis med kyi yang yul las 'das// spang thob med pa'i gtan tshigs ni// bsgom pa min pa med pas na// gang snang thams cad grogs su shar// de la spang bya'i yul med pas// lta ba yin pa med pas na//
214a6(rnying rgyud): phyogs las grol te thob yul med// de phyir spang thob mtshan ma med// bsgrub med ye rdzogs la blo ni// lta ba yin pa med par rtogs// mngon du sbyar pas chos kyi sku// sgom pa yin pa med pa ru// rang sar grol bas longs spyod su// spyod pa min pa med pa ru/
214a7(rnying rgyud): don rdzogs pa sprul pa'i sgra// gnyis ka chos nyid de bzhin nyid// gcig tu rdzogs pas ngo nyid pu// phyogs bral kun rdzogs chen po chu// la zlos chos zad bde chen sra// de ltar klong grwar ma btsal bar// ye nas lhun mis yongs rdzogs pas// re dgas gnas med
214b1(rnying rgyud): ba'o// deltang byams pa len pa ni// su mjogs mata' dgo sa pas+ho// rma na 'ga'ang pa // // / dbyal gsang ba 'das pa nga byan la ba las/ gsang banyam sa yon mo rdzogs sa da rdzus kyi ma ma sa/
214b2(rnying rgyud): napa yang byor napas mkhyen pa g+sad+ha/ pa ba ra byed pa'i ga tags gas pa// slod pa'i la po natu bdang // rdzogag ga/ sras gan sa mam de dgag da// bdag pagarnams 'i dag
214b3(rnying rgyud): gas da nga nas// skyon pa nyid kyis bka'al pa// myi nal 'tshang mam ga // stong pagabye dang zhin cu ba// dam sa skye gas cig/ bdun na rgyaganyis zlan/ zhes kyi nig stong dag ba ni med// dbang bldan
214b4(rnying rgyud): ma// deb sa lal // oM d+heng+ga da gsapa so// rnams sa bya ni// dpag migs bzhin sa nam gnas// rags pa 'i ma pan hrIH// ga kya pa ba marnam// la ma bca' ba gaganas pa// gangs
214b5(rnying rgyud): wAng gnas bsnyen// mi ga te mgo thang bzhin na // dzin ga yang da 'bo lnga A// sa dab brgya ga gnas lags ni// thi m+bu'i rnab nga gnas// snying gardzas kyi 'khor lon/ brgyad 'dab brgyad baN+Da'adra// de dpas 'i gzungs
214b6(rnying rgyud): pa ma dzin// // gse gags pa'i byas/ sa kri ma na sa/ ni bas ni ts+tshag// dbas shesas gnas pa// de ban N+DI sdigag ma na dza // gnan
214b7(rnying rgyud): thig dog cang // rgya ban 'dod chags kyi gnasas// dbus kyi mchog ma te// g.yas kyi rgya chag la lanA'o// gi lan tu mtshog sanA // tI rang lags ma yin te// thabs kyi d+hA tI blangs pa ste// de nas byang sems dka ba rgya// shes rab tu rdzo
215a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtsa// de nas byung sems dmar po rgya// gsang ba a wa d+yAn+ti'i rtsa// rtsa gnyis par na drang por gnas// de ni dper na bzag la// nyi zer logs pa lta bur yod// de nyid mab mtshan mar thug/ rtse mo spyi gtsug 'khor
215a2(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa'i bu ga'i nang na gnas// de nas sor gsum klad pa'i dbus// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ste// rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi// dbus na de nyid gnas pa yin// de 'og bcu gsum sor 'og na// mgrin pa phongs spyod 'khor lo yi//
215a3(rnying rgyud): 'drang bcu drug dbus na yang // de nyid zang thal gnas pa yin// de nas an stong rus pa yi// tshigs gnyis par nas mdun du 'khyog/ snying ga chos 'khor rtsa 'dab brgyad// de nyid dbus na zad bal te// lte ba sbrul 'khor rtsa 'dab ni// drug tu
215a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis dbus zang thal// dper na 'khor lo'i srog shing 'dra// g.yas kyi la la nA yi rtsa// dbu ma'i g.yas 'grims yar gyung ste// mig g.yas khribs la slebs nas sku// sna sgro g.yas nas rlung rgyu ba'i// las kyang de yis byed pa yin//
215a5(rnying rgyud): de rtsa lhag pa g.yas su 'gyog/ an stong rus pa'i trA tI la// 'khril nasatwA tI'i g.yas 'grims te// spu ni nag gu'i mtshams su sleb// g.yon phyogs rA sa nA'i tsa yang // yar 'grag mig g.yon lcibs su sleb// sna sgog yon nas rlung rgyu ba'i// las kya
215a6(rnying rgyud): de'i 'byed pa yin// de sdug pa'i man stong nas// dz+haiM tI de ngag shibs spen gi su'i// dkyil du thebs nas gnas pa yin// de ltar g.yas g.yon mar pa gnyis// dzA tI'i skor chung de'i yon tan// Na rung bsgoms pas spyi drung // chud pas phyag rngu chen po
215a7(rnying rgyud): 'char// de zhing hUM tI bru~M gyud rtse// rtog pa dang 'ag gi ye shes 'char// shugs kyis d+hU tIr drung drud tshul// pho mo bde baspyod rjes su// byang sems lengs cho d+hA tI rbud// dran med bde la spra mi shes// de bzhin brgya la ma 'chi khar yang // d+hU tIr rung tshad
215b1(rnying rgyud): mi dran// dasengs su na// tha da kyis du sa la shosaH// don rtsa gnas ma pa'o// dpalagasang ba 'dus pa rgyad kyi rgyal po las// las la rtsa gnas yangs rdzogs bstan pa'i le'u brgya bzhi ba'o// / de nas yang 'dug pa
215b2(rnying rgyud): das kyims ben ga cig bar yod pa pa chen po ma mchog te dag lags la pa/ me se che/ 'byung ba'i rang rtsal kun tu ba da // thabs rgyan rgyal po nyis// dgra zed stobs ldan rlung gi gnang // bdag cag rnams la bkra' rdzol dzig// de// dgasol ba 'don
215b3(rnying rgyud): 'grongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bkang bral ba// 'khor 'das po gran gzhi dang // bA rig 'gyu byed chung dbang gis// mang lA rgor/ thazag spyor chags nas/ lo gcig ba bcu gnyis par// zhag rel niHyi gle ga/ nyis dri rje nyes brgya
215b4(rnying rgyud): 'phel bas// stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis rtsa// rim gyis chags shing de bskyed de// rtsa yig tso bo srog pa'i rtsa// 'grub rlung gis sems de grangs// nyi khri chig stong rgyud byas pas// de las 'bras grub rgyad khri dang // bzhi stong ngag tu ra
215b5(rnying rgyud): cing // de nyid rnam grangs mang gis kyang // rdza bar bsdus na sde brgyad de// phyi rlung nang rlung gsang chung dang // rlung la nyams len goms rtags dang // gegs sel rlung gi yon tan no// de yang phyi ni chung brgyad de// lus 'degs rdang dang 'gyang
215b6(rnying rgyud): rlung // phung sro 'jig chung rgyan gcod rlung // 'byin byed rlung dang las khyod rlung // 'phrigs byed chung dang khyab rlung ngo // nang ni yang ni rlung brgyad de// gyen rgyu bur du sel ba'i rlung // dngas snyigs 'gyed rlung bkrag gzi skyed// snying rje med dang me mnyam chung
215b7(rnying rgyud): dngos snyigs phyir 'byed shes rab drung // gsang chung kun gzhi byang chub sems// rlung gi las ni gag gcig la// nyi khri dang ni tshig stong rgyu// bskrun nyon mongs ye shes rlung // zhag ri la yang drung de gnyis// khro tshe dang lnga brgya rgya// de yang 'gyung 'jug
216a1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa yi/ rlung gsum dag tu 'dus pa yin// 'byung ba'i rlung ni so bcu drug/ phyir 'byung nang rlung sor bcu drug/ nang 'dug gnas rlung skad cig tsam// lte ba dag na gnas pa yin// rlung la zhon nas yid 'gyu bas/
216a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor bskyed byed rlung yang yin// de phyir rigs drug rang pa tshang // de nas rtse rnams 'bri tshul yang // lo gcig lon nas lo brgya'i bar// zhag re lon nas rtsa gnyis gnyis// bri nas lo brgyus nus pa 'jig/ de tshe dregs pa byang chub 'im
216a3(rnying rgyud): snying rje med pa'i rlung la zhon// gsang ba nus thon dmyal bar skye// rig pa thur rgyu'i rlung la zhon// bshang lam nas thon yi dwags skye// rigs la me mnyam chung la zhon// skye ba nas thon byol song skye// yang ni rig pa byang chub sems// bzag dang gzi
216a4(rnying rgyud): mdangs rlung la zhon// mig g.yas nas bon lha gnas skye// rig pa dang snyigs 'byed rlung zhon// kha sga nas zon mi ru skye// rigs pa phyir 'byed rlung la zhon// lhag ca nas thon lha min skye// yang ni rig pa byang chub sems// gyen du rgyu ba'i chung la zhon//
216a5(rnying rgyud): tshangs bug nas thon ba thugasum non// rig pa shes rab rlung la zhon// spying ga'i dbus nas ye shes lam// mig g.yon 'bras bla rang blo shes// thams cad rang byung ye shes 'char// de ltar rlung dang rig pa gnyis// don byed gtsog la mtshan
216a6(rnying rgyud): ti gnyis// rang rig mtshon nyid rkyen ning gas pa// rlung gi mtshan byed pa stod 'khrugs tu bye byas// de gnyis bsdang ba'i dper brjod na// rig pa 'phye bo mgacan 'dra// rlung ni rta long rkang rgyan 'dra// de gnyis brjo dra pas phyogs brdang bgrod/
216a7(rnying rgyud): phyir rnam shes rlung gis bskyod// oM pa?'i yul sogs kun tu b+hU// rig pa'i rgyu dang rlung rkyen 'dzem// 'khor ba'i bya ba thams cad byed// meta thal na 'gro rgyu med// de bzhi rna lam gyin pa 'byor pas// d+hIr rlung badrung sgom par tshe// rta med 'bye ra/
216b1(rnying rgyud): 'byung // rag zung ste ga phyo bra med// rig pa las su rung ba yon// mag med du ma dang 'dra ba'o// khyod byer rdu rig med pa'o// 'gro bar mthas dang dbang thog// nga rgya yang dag rang nga skad// rlung ngog nga dngas dang sangs kyang // dbyung/
216b2(rnying rgyud): dzin nyams len ni// tron du tshogs pas ga bra ma mdzod// bgegs bsrung skyab sung thos mas bskyed ste// khams gso bdu TI srinA mar sbyar// dngos go de'i dus su 'brel ma tho mas gcad// dben pa'i 'dol ba'i rkyen la 'dug/ lhags pa rgya
216b3(rnying rgyud): d+yaH// rkang pa rdo rje gyi la blang bca'// A la tshigs gser gyi dang bsrang // se ltar spyod 'gyings yod dbyar bya// margya'i mgrin bzhin yid dbrog pa// lag gnyis mnyam gzhag sder tshe 'dra// mig 'bras sna yi d+he la dbab// was gan drug la legs
216b4(rnying rgyud): goms nas// dag kyang 'bru gsum 'khor lo ni// nub ba byil 'brang dang 'gor bas haM// bde gshegs rnams kyi yang snying mchog/ rngu brdung oM le ba hU~M la gnas cwa// 'phang ba hU~M yan rlung gsum gyi// gnas pa tral zin nan bskyed// 'khor lo ba'o/ rabag
216b5(rnying rgyud): drugagasas sa su 'o// babras su mongs tu me byung // babadu brnya na rlung po gdod// rna thag g.yon nas rgyubar na// shes rab phye shes rlung phyin cir// bzud rnon med namam rtogs 'bab// d+h+rU drug gnyis nas mnyas gyu te/
216b6(rnying rgyud): shes gnas su med du'i ru // a la d+ha tI'i skrod rgod pas// 'dongs 'byad na ye shes 'char// de skyer rlung brgyar gnad 'di haM// gra gu 'tshams pos bshang spro bajam// sdong du 'og rlung bsdams te 'then// dgasum kyis rgyang drag drur// rog rang
216b7(rnying rgyud): brnams te ste rlung ni// rung cing mnan ti'i skyil bar bya// tshad du slebs tshe mda' ltang du// snga nas mda' gang chod du 'phang // yang rngub yang bskyil yang 'phangs te// gnas pa'i rlung de bskyil yun bsring // 'gyorangs rbo d+hA hUM rlung chud nas// spyod
217a1(rnying rgyud): ga tso 'phrul thal// rig pa gar sbyin sgyur 'byar 'dra// datsho drung nyid las drang bas// tham la shes pa skang dbus sad// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// ma bcos byang chub sems rtogs pas// nyon mongs rangs du
217a2(rnying rgyud): ye she rgyas// gsang rlung ngos zin ngo mtshar che// de ltar rlung bsgoms 'gyongs rtags gsum// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i tshul// rtsi rtags drod lce 'phar dang 'dang // 'gro ma tshogs yang la 'jigs pa med// nang rtags snang ba kyi mang rtogs//
217a3(rnying rgyud): 'gyu mi tshod dbugs mi 'gyu// lto gos ched med la sogs 'byung // gsang rtags bde gsal 'dzin pa med// ma bcos bde chen 'gyur med brtan// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin no// bla ma'i man ngag ma thob na// rlung ro lus nas ge glesu 'gyur// mdo
217a4(rnying rgyud): dgang 'phen la sogs// btod ngan bzung tshad ma shes shing // 'khor lo'i go rIm log kyang gegs// 'gyur tshul srog rtsad rlung 'grims te// shor ba srid na skyo nas 'gro// sha mdangs bar du rlung shor na// mdze 'bras dmu chu shig nad 'byung // snying la go
217a5(rnying rgyud): snying rlung 'byung // zur rlung log na gyis dang // byang sems dkar dmar 'dzag pa yin// gyen du log na mgo 'khor zhing // 'khrugs dang stod gzer sna gzer 'ong // de sogs rlung skyon bsam yas kyang // mun la nyi bzhin dug sel thabs// rlung bsgom kun
217a6(rnying rgyud): mtshom+bu thams cad du// hUM ring len gsum bus rjes su// nya drag par yang bskyed cing gdab// ro stod yang snyam sems na gzhag/ des ni rlung skyon 'od me srid// tshig chod thabs kyi rgyal po yin// de ltar gegs bsal zung bsgoms pas//

217b1(rnying rgyud): rtsal dbang nges par 'thob// tshe dbang rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i// yon tan brjod kyis mi lang ngo // zhes bka' stsal te// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyad kyi rgyal po las/ 'gu byed stobs ldan rlung gnanam ma chogs bstan pa'i po wa sgo bco /

217b3(rnying rgyud): tshul mad// de skad gso pa sa don dgongs nas// nyon pa nyid kyis bka' yul pa// byangasams thig le'i man ngag gnad// gsang sngags grol lam chu yin cing // thabs la mthun gyi mthar thag yin// \u0f7fgnas pas la ga brten pa'i/
217b4(rnying rgyud): sa sto zhus su pa dang // byed dang bzhib rgya yod na yar// bldan dngas sdigs srog 'de na gsum// dngas ma las sur dbyung sems ni// bza' btung bzung thos dngas 'gyur dz+wal// zhag 'dun ston nas chu ser 'gyur// bdun mag shal badridzin tshol/

218b2(rnying rgyud): dmar po 'khyi lnga ba ne// hUM ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo ru// sbrul bzhin dkar dmar 'dres 'khyil bas// lce 'og sor bzhi 'os 'byung nus// don dam gtum mo d+ha khab tsam// dmar gsal gyen du 'brar ba yas// rtsa ba ra raM dmar gcig tu gnas// @
218b3(rnying rgyud): lus kyi steng da ni// rdza bsregs zur la sgrub pa 'dra// gsang gnas yi ge yaM dkar las// rlung gi 'od zer gyen du 'gyus// don dam tsaN lI la phog/ ri nyid me 'bar lte ba yis// sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'od du 'bar// de rtags l+r-is ni be maM bem byed/
