218b5(rnying rgyud): dgod dang a e zer// de nas me lce grad dkyil drang // klad pa bde chen 'khor lo zos// nye ba'i thig le byang chub sems// haM mgo thur la bstan pa de// 'od du skyem gyis zhu nas kyang // byang sems thig le bcu drug 'jog/ de las bde chen gyi dz+ha
218b6(rnying rgyud): klang dkyil babs pas dga' ba kye// de phyir mgrin pa'i 'khor lo 'dzag/ da yis bde ba mjug dga' ste// de phyir snying gar bzhi 'jog pas// dga' bral ba de stong dga' ba skye// de phyir lte dbus gnyis 'jog pas// lus med bsam pa'i dor skye/
218b7(rnying rgyud): bde stong dbyer med bde ba'i mchog/ lhan gyis ye shes dga' ba skye// bde nyams 'di 'dra smra mi shes// de nyi dngos bzung bsgom byas na// bde stong dbyer med rgyun 'thob 'gyur// thig le byar sems rdo slar gsum// sems badrang ngo ldad zhen ba rlog
219a1(rnying rgyud): dang po kyang sems gzung thub ni// smyigadrug pa ldan 'bar par ma// mthun pa longs spyad labar lor AH// steng gachos kyi 'khar lar rje// skye ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo ny+dza// byang sems 'khor lor bsgom pa la// de la
219a2(rnying rgyud): bede rkyen du smad// 'khor lo bzhi yi yi ge ba'i// 'od 'a dod kyi thig le bri'i// de la sems gtad mi 'phron// snying gar drag tu gtad pa bzung // de las 'gros na 'groms gtad// dAr cig glong la rjes ngos gzung // rang rig sprin med par sbyang bzhin// dngulags la pa/
219a3(rnying rgyud): rang ngor dog/ me song nang ge gzugs brtan ltar// sa la le tri ga ge 'dzin med zhog/ de ti dang srod bstan pa ni// de sbyar srog 'dzin byung chub sems// bde sto tsed+ha dbus su bas // thams cad ye shes rtsal du shes// snyan gyis ye shes ris zin tshe// shes pabade
219a4(rnying rgyud): gsal mi tog gsum// rang byung shugs las char ba yin// de yang nyon mongs med pas bde// ma 'gags mi 'dzin mi rtog pa'o// de ltar po sprod ngo bo rig/ rang bzhin dngas la rig pa g.yer// sngar ma mthong ba'i don mthong rig/ chos nyid ma bsrad rang bzhin dngas/
219a5(rnying rgyud): gsal lam 'gags 'dzin med pa de// de ltar nges rtogs lta ba ste// de las mi yengs sgom pa nyid// de nyid mi nyams spyod pa yin// de nyid mthar gyi nu 'bras bu'o// mtha' ru zhen pa bzlog pa yang // ltar rdzogs pa'i ngang shugs la// chags pa'i blo med/
219a6(rnying rgyud): 'grib chod// gzung 'don sems bral mi pho dang jis// mngon zhen kun pa zlog yang dag don// de ltar nyams su lon pa'i tshe// 'dang kar 'bras bu don spyod tshul// gor bstan srog 'dzin byang sems gnyis// ma rig las zang skye med dang // rang byung rang shar ye shes bstan/
219a7(rnying rgyud): zab 'gag med 'gro ron mdzod// phrug sum ldan grub mtshar che// zhes bka' stsal to// dpalags dpa 'dus brgyad kyi rgyal po las/ thig le 'bar 'dzag tsaN+Da lI'i gan yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'aro
219b1(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis mthen gcigaH/ skyon bkun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he rug la gsol pa/ gre cekye/ ye shes lnga bdag kun tu bzang // thub bdag rten bta ka/ rim la gdan gcig yo d+ha rdzogs don// bdag cag rnams la bka' la chag/ de gad
219b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i don dgongs te// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// dpal chen khrag 'thang he ru ka'i// bskyed rim rgyas bsdus zhig bsgoms te// rdzogs pa'i rim lnga gdan gcig la// bsgom pa'i don rab 'di lta ste// sngags sems lus dang 'od gsal dang // rdung
219b3(rnying rgyud): dag ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje'i bzlas pa srog rtsol rlung // oM dang AHhUM yi ge gsum// 'byung 'jug gnas dang ldan par bsam// gnas pa rgyun bsringad dbu mar 'jug/ 'di las khyad 'phags sngags med phyir// rdo rje'i sngags bzlas rim pa'o// ma
219b4(rnying rgyud): la dmigs pa'i rim pa ni// lhar gas pa snying dbus 'dab brgyad la// dgod bya'i yig 'bru 'di dag ste// yang dag skye med snying po a// aM A/ i I/ u U/ ra d+h+r-i/ me ShAM/ a i/ o o/ aM aH/ kA khag g+hang / mtsho d+hita/ dzaHDar+ha Na/ ta rbad d+han/
219b5(rnying rgyud): pa phab b+h+ram/ yang pa pra/ shang sa ha/ ThaHdngul dkar lugs nas byung nga drang gas pa// gsal byed phyir la dmigs pa gtad// snang ba'i byang chub sems bskyed de// rtags ni ti zer 'od 'dra byung // dbyangs yig nang la dmigs pa gtad// snying ba mched pa'i
219b6(rnying rgyud): shes skye// de rtags zla 'od zer 'dra 'byung // dbus kyi a dkar la dmigs na// sdang bter thob ye shes kyi// d+hArmA ni mi rtog mun lta bu// bde stong nyid 'char sems dben yin// sku lus bsgom pa'i rim pa ni// sgying na a las 'od dkar 'gros// dang
219b7(rnying rgyud): bdag rlung sems 'dres// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku mdog dkar// g.yas pa rtse lnga g.yon dril bu// ser khri pad nA nyi ltang na// skyil krung 'od lnga'i spu yol mangs// sgra marmi lama'angang 'drar ba sgom// snang la dngos po ma grub pas// bden sdang mi bden sgra rdza
220a1(rnying rgyud): yin// spyod gsal bsgom pa'i rim pa yang // nor sems dpral bar a dkar bsam// a las 'od dkar lus khyab 'phros// sgra lus 'od 'u a la 'dus// A ni skyo ba med pa'i sems// sems las sems bud
220a2(rnying rgyud): sems nyid don// stong par thim nas 'od gsal gnas// rtags ni du 'dra rang bzhin med// zung 'drag bsgom pa'i rim pa yang // swAd+ha bA cha nas sku lus dang // rang bzhin che nas 'od gsal gnyis// bud 'jug dbyer med su yin te// stong pa nyid la
220a3(rnying rgyud): gzugs gzhan med// gzugs las gud pa'i stong pa med// nam mkha'i dang nas 'ja' sprin bzhin// zung 'jug mnyam bzhag de ltar bsgom// rim lnga thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor pas// 'da' ka chos nyid 'od gsal gyi// bar dor zung 'jug longs srur bzhe
220a4(rnying rgyud): smon lam stobs kyis 'gro don 'byung // gsang sngags chud sde rgya mtsho yi// bcud mchog nyams len rim lnga yin// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rim lnga gdan gcig la yongs su rdzogs pa bsgom pa gsang sngags leg len
220a5(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ zung 'jug bde chen kun tu bzung // sbyor ba'i bdag nyid he ru ka/ skyod ba bde mchog chag
220a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol ba'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang sngags chags spang sbyor ba yin// rnal 'byor chags pa can grol phyir// bde mchog sbyor lam spyad 'dod na// rang gi bde ba
220a7(rnying rgyud): sngon du sbyang // zhing skyes sngags skyes ma srid sogs// mtshan ldan yongs rdzogs mu dram// bcu drug lon pa rab tu shes// dbab dang bzung ba zlog dgram pa dang // gegs bsal ched dang ldan nam brtag/ mtshan ldan sha rgyas sna bug gi// g.yas steng yang na myung
220b1(rnying rgyud): g+ha ru// sleb yod na de yi mkhar// dung can rtsa zhes bya ba gnas// rtsa des rdo rje 'jib bsdam shes// de bzhin rigs ldan gang du dag/ khrus byas kyan gdags zas brgyad gtang // bdud rtsi sman dang dri zhem thugs// zas ngan skyes pa gzhan bsten spang // chu 'bras
220b2(rnying rgyud): chos bshad slob bskyed// chags pa g.yo byed gtam brjod pas// rtog pa gzhan 'gags chags bde skyed// yang ni bskyed kyi 'o khyud bya// steng rlung mnan cing 'og rlung bsten// ting 'dzin mi yings dal gyis bsrub// spyig tsug bde chen 'khor lo
220b3(rnying rgyud): nas// rim skyes dbab cing zad kar gzung // de yang a wat+matI'i Ta// yar lnga sti gtsug mar gyi sa// rdo rding spa gur zag pa las// g.yas g.yon ci gnyis meg sgo nas// lhag pa'i ngos su 'khyog pA las// mgrin po da rabaspangs pa mes/
220b4(rnying rgyud): ana? stod rus kyi tshogs par sbyar// rtsa gsum der 'dus rang bzhin gyis// bsdams pa de la gzung ba ni// 'og rlung bsdams te shes pa gseng // thig le gyen du 'khyil bar bsam// g.yo dus skabs 'dir ma bzung na// 'og ma rnams ni zin par dgapa//
220b5(rnying rgyud): mgrin par babs pa'i tshon yang // mgrin par dgye byas tshigs gnyis sbyar// rtse gsum 'dus pa'i shugs kyis bskum// de bzhin sti dgra lce 'khor dang // gsang 'khor rdo rje'i rtse mor yang // thig le phebs tshe shes pa gseng // 'og drung bsdams te
220b6(rnying rgyud): bskyil zhing bzung // des mi thubun rdo rje yi// rtsu bar lag g.yon srin ma theb kyis// tshir gyis mnan la rlung yar 'then// bde ba rab skye mi rtog bsgom// bdegs la mi rtog nyams dang ldan// de nas bzlog pa'i las byas te// yum gyis drung gis tshur
220b7(rnying rgyud): phul cing // yab kyi rlung gis tshur la drang // 'og rlung bsdams te rdo rje byung // dngas mtshur 'dus snyigs ma ni// mkha' ru thul yang du mi 'chag/ dngas ma bzlog pa'i 'khrul 'khor ni// bshar ba'i lam dgag rgyu zhabs bsdu// lce tso mdzad drug
221a1(rnying rgyud): mig bzlog ste// nyig brjod 'og drung gyen du drang // dgram pa 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa yi// dmigs su dgram par bstan pa ni// seng ge rnam grol phyag rgya yis// g.yas bskor g.yon du khyab par dgram// rjes su lus kA gzil
221a2(rnying rgyud): phril bya// de dag nyams kyi rim pa yang // spyi bo nas 'dzag dga' ba ste// mgrin par mchog dga' snying ga ru// babs pas lhan skyes dga' ba la// lte bar babs pas dga' bral nyid// gsang ba rdo rje 'phebs pa'i tshe// don dam bde stong dbyed meng
221a3(rnying rgyud): 'char// mi rtog lhan skyes ngos gzung bya// de la zhen na zag bcas gol// gegs ni yas bzlog ma khrims na// chu si grang shum chu lam tsha// seng ldeng gdus khu til mar sbyar// lus la bsu mnye byas pas sel// bde ba mi skye thig le 'tshod// de la
221a4(rnying rgyud): dam bshags dbang rdzogs zhu// thabs dang rig pas gegs rnams bsal// 'gyongs pa'i tshad dang ldan gyur na// rlung rig gtad cing tshur drangs pas// yum bcud bdag la 'du ba 'byung // 'o ma dro la rdo rjer ldud// 'o ma brgyud nas kha ru 'drongs//
221a5(rnying rgyud): snang ba thams cad bde bar 'char// gzhon nu'i sha chags rkang mgyogs 'grub// ting 'dzin rig rtsal rang dbang thob// snying rje che la chags sems med// rmi lam sgyu ma'i nyams dang ldan// srib gnyis bag chags kun byed nas// bde chen longs spyod
221a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs sku 'thob// ces pa bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ bde mchog chags lam yongs rdzogs gnad kyi le'u ste bco bkyed pa'o// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun
221a7(rnying rgyud): tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa// kye kye kye/ khams gsum yongs sgrol kun tu bzang // bdud 'dul rgyal po he ru ka/ drag pos tshor gced sgrol ba'i lam// bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don dgongs te/
221b1(rnying rgyud): sum pa// gsang dgas bya shA m+b+ha sa// gagagadug pa sa // sus na nga pa ga rnams// dgazugs sa sa chags gnas thog pagang// nga kun pa nga yang// pa / gdags sa
221b2(rnying rgyud): yongs rgyas kyi rang bzhin / 'an na mchog // sred gsum gdug sa mangs bskal gyur// rje mchog yongs chags drag sngags 'di'// maM pra ma hAs m+b+ha y+ya bAd+hA m+b+ha/ ta ha thA paH/ oM badrab shAkro d+ha ta ma maHlaH/ ma hA brog nas bya
221b3(rnying rgyud): mas sa ma rbA dz+nyAn mA ma hU~M paH/ badz+ra ma hAta Tha ga drug dza d+ha paH/ bdag shA \u0f7f dz+wal maN+Da la/ tA la thAl/ maN+Da lA mA mA jugarak+ShamA T+TAr wa d+h+r-id+han+tu/ bam mar jug gcad de drud tar byu / nagan ga pa/ sA ra la na
221b4(rnying rgyud): r-i tA rnaM ts+tshan ba tu btun ma/ oM badzi swA d+ha lam/ ma kri maH/ arbar+d+hak+Sha swa ma n+taka kA la rU ba tA baT+Ta/ a tata/ nga rka ma zad/ kI li kI la ma/ da ba rlung / de ni nga/ rbaka/ srid gsum gdug pa yongs sgrub byer// khrag 'thung yongs rdzogs dreg/
221b5(rnying rgyud): sa ma la du hU~M/ rten so+o/ rdul pa rnal zin/ kau ma pa ldam sa shi shing / ma sa 'gro// bal bang dang / ho// dbugs la rdab ba/ man pa margyad/ rnga wamal /
221b6(rnying rgyud): kI l+r-i tAM li ya dgra nga rma dza dang / drin 'angam dpal ga shin rjegashed// srid gsum gadrag pa mau dra bsgral byer// gshin rje bongs rdzogs drag sngags 'di'o// oM ma kro ta ka ya maHka ta nam tha rtan d+h+waM phaT// oM sa pa ya ma t+taM shrI la mon+ta ka/ ya me d+ha ma pa me//
221b7(rnying rgyud): rje pa ga thal sumangs nyi ba dag r+b+hud+d+ha/ t+tab+h+yaH/ yam/ yin pos/ ma pa rkyong zheng par rdzogag 'a durgyas pa/ oM la tsug pam ma'/ mau dang / ma dam/ yang meni/ da ma ny+dza sa/ sak+Sha mar+d+ha
222a1(rnying rgyud): sras kyang da nga gzhan la mau bdu so bskulas bzung mi sna
222a2(rnying rgyud): ma ya/ zag ma mAr ga rdzas/ an lam nal na phrag langs/ sdug la mang / spris le rnaMm/ thom pas bris pas/ lcags kyi sgra gzugams dgra pa'i gang byung nag/ mAr la dza/ kauk+She la pa dgra ba ni zad/ hU~M/ ngan badzad /
222a3(rnying rgyud): srid gsum gdug pa yongs bkral phyer// padz+ra yongs rdzogs drag sngags 'dir// y+YA ta ye grI wa hU~M phaH/ oM bang+kan kr-i ha ta ya gI wa ma hA kr-i d+ha e kA dzA rje sa ma ya ru wa dr-i wadz+ha d+hA phaT/ sAr le mA y-i thab thung/ lcags sngags/ zlag ga/
222a4(rnying rgyud): shar shar/ zhar bar b+h+yo/ zhir bar d+ho/ dang klag grag/ du dang dra dang / zang chung / dzang d+ha g+h+ra/ hUM waM lcags rbad/ phyogs zad/ mo du sid mo drar yig ched/ srog gi ste dre blo snying khwa la rag tsang yA/ tat+t+wa thA/ snying la rbad ya// khrag ti ma dz+ha/ ma ri khrag
222a5(rnying rgyud): yA/ mgo khrag ni chod/ stsal chod/ mu lo chod/ shal khyi khyer/ dgra'i snying srog srang nas byung zhig swAhA/ kI li kI la yang gra bo nI zad/ nga ni rdo rje gzhon nu che// srid gsum gi drug pa yongs bsngal phyir// lung du yongs rdzogs drag sngags 'di'o//
222a6(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba dig+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ dzaHhUM aHma raklo yal+lo/ kA la rU pa/ snying rtsa la yaM yaM/ srog rtsa la yaM yaM/ snying la phril phril/ srog la chu ma chum/ tsit+ta srog la tud tung / snying khrag shad dzaHthu ma ri la li li/ snying rtsegs rtsegs 'or 'u/
222a7(rnying rgyud): cig shig bral gul/ lcags lcags/ sod sod/ d+ha ti ma ma ka ma shI g+h+raM ka rA ya/ mA ra se na pra marda na ye hU~M phaT/ kI li kI la ya/ dgra bodz+ra rbadadaM/ da ni bla med he ru ka/ srid gsum gdug pa yongs bskal gyir// ma mo yongs rdzogs drag ljags
222a8(rnying rgyud): di // ru ts+ya NAn shrI he ruka/ gu h+ya dz+nyAn kro d+hI shAM hAM s+t+ra/ ma ma ya ge ne ru lu ru ludz+dza hUM phaT/ oM ba dA ne la khaN+DaM kro Sh+Ti shwa rI/ d+ha ga bad+mar+tha/ bde klong shAn mdzadza d+yo/ ma mju gar thA/ ru lu ru lu daglo steng khrag la ts+tsha/ trag dkA ma cig thAm dz+ha/ cha ga
222b1(rnying rgyud): grwar ya dza da paH/ brda byas ta sam/ rlu gra ga rmugs sha/ bad dar thad dang/ mur ti lcogs thod/ sri sre ba skang re ma sha ya ya/ srag ra ya ya/ mig dkyus nas phyung zhug/ rgyangs pa rtsad nas tshod cig/ kye lkog nas drangs shig/ oM ma mar d+huH/
222b2(rnying rgyud): nga khe rag rba sa d+ho/ 'gro ya blo rbad sa tshaM/ ma ra ya tshaM tshaM/ zad mA ra ya rbad/ sod mA ra ya sod/ bu ma rel tra ga ra karbad gtub/ rmad gtub/ dr-i pra be baM/ dgra bgegs kyi srog la mA ra ya rbad/ kI li kI la ya na rbad/ nga ni reg 'dzin thod partsal// sr-i
222b3(rnying rgyud): gsum gdug pa yongs bsngal phyir// rig 'dzin yongs rdzogs drag sngags 'di'o// oM badz+ra ma hA gra rus rba trA~M laT/ kA la rU chag mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ kI li kI la ya nri tre nad/ da ni dregs pa kun 'dul de// sred gsam gdug pa yongs bskul byer//
222b4(rnying rgyud): dpon yongs rdzogs sted pa 'a // oM badz+raH sarba du Sh+TA na e ra ts+tsha// dgra bgegs che ga mo sha d+ha b+her bu ma nga/ a ras rbad/ gang kar gi dka ra sa rba tra dzab+h+yo// the ga mau sha d+de b+har tha mdzaHpA ra ya rbad/ bdud tri ma ra ya sarba du nyan chad du tsa b+ho// che ga ma sha tre hra Ta ma
222b5(rnying rgyud): par ma rbad/ a baM shwas bcang rduH// Ni ge ma sha~M d+ha b+ha bu ma \u0f7fmAr ya rbad/ pa sha mi gas rbang s+ho// che ga mo sha t+l-i b+ha tham mar ya rbang/ rlugs rba prang b+h+yo// che ga ma sha d+de tha~Mr tham dza mA ra ya rbad/ yaka/ sarbe k+Sha \u0f7f// che ge ma shar+d+ha tra thu ma
222b6(rnying rgyud): mA ra ma rbad/ rags tha ra \u0f89\u0fa4/ tsi g+ni mo shat+taM d+ha bu ma de A ra yA rbang / mams ma // che ga ma sha ny+dza hrar bum dza khA ra ya rbad/ kI li kI la ya gra bo nr-i rbad/ nga ni stobs lhun nag po'i sku// srid gsum gadrug pa yongs bskal phyir// snrub
222b7(rnying rgyud): yongs rdzogs drag sngags 'di// oM badz+ra sarba drabAn/ s+ye pheM dz+ha dza~M dzo ngoH/ cha ge mar+tha bur thum dza mA ra ya rbang / ya ma sarba rbet+te dza~M dza // che ge mi nr-i bur bram dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ ma ma sa rba tsit-i dza~M dzo // che ge mo dri war thum dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ nA ga riHsarbaHts+tsha
223a1(rnying rgyud): ju/ gas ma ma ma na/ gas na / gas byur ba / shA gas ga sa hA/ zlugs nas gcag ma thar ma
223a2(rnying rgyud): yarbad/ bzlar nas rba rban tu na che ga tra~M thang tham m+bar ya zad/ d+hA sha k+Shi wa sa sa tsat+ta rmA trA~M / che ge mo d+hi thar thum dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ kI li kI la ya dgra ba ni rbad/ bde ga shegs yongs rdzogs drag sngags 'di// thigs pa marungs la du rdzo
223a3(rnying rgyud): gdab pa'i grags dgra zhes kyang bya// 'di la nyams len rim gsum ste// sham thar gdagis dang thar tshugs bsrub// gar dgos las li sbyar ba'o// dang po sham zur bstan pa yang // gsang bsgrub chen las spyor dus// mtshan ma ma
223a4(rnying rgyud): bcas pa la// dpal chen yongs rdzogs phur bskor tshe// gnas dgra drag sngags de dgras gdab// sred pa gsum po dus gcig sgrol// drag sngags gnam thog mtshon tshwa 'di// phan tshugs tshig dril srog pasgrub ni// dben gnas thag pad
223a5(rnying rgyud): drang khrod du// dpal chen da rgyal ldan byas te// maN+Dal mda' gang phrag gis byug/ dbus sa khrags ma gting du ba'o// de nang mtshan ngan thod parba// rongs 'khor lo gnyis rim gyi// rtsibs la dgra gzugs basman la gzir// seng sdeng ga
223a6(rnying rgyud): 'angul sagrus par bya// 'dom mda' khru gang sor ma ba tshag/ rar 'bring gang rigs lha grangs kyar// stong gal phyag ga shog rdzogs sam// 'og nyizhal dbyung rgya mdud dganyes// dpal gas mdzA sbyin khanas dbyung // thar pa'i skye zag rnam pa
223a7(rnying rgyud): ba)// yongs rdzogs dpal gyi skye bskyed de// srogasang thugs su byed gyis bzlag// ye ga po lnga dang ngas dbang brgyar// 'dibs mkhan gdab yul chakhrus lung // gdabang theb pa tshad 'a sa// phrar pa zas spang gas kyi// ngas
223b1(rnying rgyud): yangs rdzogs dpal chen bskyed// de las sbal pas dgra bgegs dgrag/ thar pa'i lha rnams grogs maH// oM dag pa mAHdmya bu babring bsrob// de nas phur pa'i skyeg tsug dang // mgrin pa ske dag stegasang dra// 'bul rigs lnga bskyed la
223b2(rnying rgyud): na/ don mi shes pa ba te// bran kyis mjig nyid // logs rnams la snying rnge byed// gnyis med sgrol pa'i snying nge bzhom// de sbyi rje'i thar ba ste// dang rgod lta gas la jug g.yas gson// rigs pa/ khrag 'thang sab babyed/
223b3(rnying rgyud): ra brkyang chub mas pa bzhes/ de ni zung sems byur ba yin// thar pa del cang dag khril// graphral bdag cing drug zag zug/ 'ab la oM yi gdan la bzhugs// mtshan mardzas kyi phung pa yin// de nas paskyed rdzogs gsung bskangs te/
223b4(rnying rgyud): banas rtags la krung cing bslab// bdag nyid lha spyod zung 'dug pas// thar pa 'dril shing drag sngags bcus// gad ba srel dgra bgegs log lngacan// gzugs la brten nas dngos gsal gdub// wa yin ma shes srog rnam po// snying nang khrag dang
223b5(rnying rgyud): go ts+tshaH// da pas ma dzad theg pa'i da // tra~M yang gcig yad gdab pa'i yul// de nas phred rtsi phyogs ma dang // tsig bdag tu zug sam bsnam// ngag drug sngags dgra brnas kau // 'jil zhing 'jil zhi la g+has// dr-id mas
223b6(rnying rgyud): banas gyi sa// la 'dus nas m+b+ha dag gsas// rang la bstan pas de d+har 'dus// dz+nyA yang dgangs pa yin// denas dag thog dag gas makyi// nga bzugs sa glenas padi// byang sde thugs sa gyis 'phangs te// 'og men dpal mi bags/
223b7(rnying rgyud): slis// rkyen 'dis mgrin pa'o// lal bam nas a yang Ta// rdung 'ang mi bem mo 'od bya// rga'atshogs la brgyad sum ma khar babs// rgyal ba'i sras sa byis pasan// gnas sar pab ma thas yin// de nas gnas dgrang dpa 'a'adu
224a1(rnying rgyud): smras/ gas na// na sa na na ma na nga /
224a2(rnying rgyud): gags sa sa ma sa
224a3(rnying rgyud): ga sa ni shi na da sa
224a4(rnying rgyud): sa sa
224a5(rnying rgyud): su rgyas skye
224a6(rnying rgyud): ma ra rdzu chu rgya dums dgazugs mardzogs par nu ngas ma kyis da sa
224b1(rnying rgyud): 'dag pa chas chag cag la gsal ga/ chu ba ba/ yan tan bdag nyid kun pazang // 'dud rtso la rtsal ba taphra// dmyangs smad bya 'a sgrub pa glong // bdag cag nams la bka' sul cig/ nan gsal bdan dgrongs nas// stan cad kyi pa
224b2(rnying rgyud): pa// mthong brtson rname tog 'joms 'dod nyon// thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la// rang gang rnam tog mtshoms na// sa ni sman gyi sgrub pa bstan// 'di yang sbub chen khog nas 'byung// thog mar khol bu'i bsgrub pa la// mtshan ldan zor
224b3(rnying rgyud): dang // ldan rnams yongs rdzog swa grA sA lngar sbyar// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// dri chen glang sha dA ti shar// byang sems seng sha bzang drug dbyes// sha chen ta shika ko la lo// badz+ra'i dka rma bya'i shau nug// dri ru khur sha gung gus
224b4(rnying rgyud): kya// gzhan yang ga pud a bar gyur// bili ka rdo rje a ga ru// du ru ka dang steng skra'i tshogs// tse ta ka dang zho sha gsum// tsan dan rkun 'brum sna dbu dang // kyai bag la sogs sman rtedan chad// rtsal me rtag 'bras bu dgod// na ke shug 'jug phan pa mchi//
224b5(rnying rgyud): dkang gsum par dag sum la sogs bsag/ blan du gyur pa spyan gyis po rgong// chang chu 'amangon chen bsham// yan tan rgyas grub smin pa'i phyir// l+r-ing bcwa sa lug dus pa// gi ma ba lan stobs srabs ga/ gzung bag 'thags pa dang sung
224b6(rnying rgyud): ga kyang byas tshogs la ngaH// bdag nyid mengs rdzogs sbyang ba sgomasaH// thugs ka mad 'thos san spangs te// kaM las tha~Mng byed gram pa dgal// oM lus chung byung sa // dasangs rgyal 'dud kyis/ oM AHhrI AhA/
224b7(rnying rgyud): ma / de nyid rgya brgyad brjod pas// phyag 'tshal la'i tshu nyid las// rigs sa yab sum badrad gyur nas// rkyong ma dza byang sams padud byer gyur// srang bang thams cad de sang gas la// mamardzas rgya/ rdu / rjes ya
225a1(rnying rgyud): na rigs brgya'am// thams cad rigs wa 'ang bor bsam// blas la mi dga' rdo rje sems// rigs gcig kho na'i da bong bsgrub// rtsa sngags bsnyen rjes sogs 'ang bzlas// oM y+YAt+ma/ s+yArba pa b+ha a d+da d+hAr sA yAn tan/
225a2(rnying rgyud): ya su h+ya sid+d+hi hUM hriH/ drang srong rnams la gsol ba gdab// khrol bu zhag gsum tshang rjes su// gong gi rigs lnga 'od du zhu// gnyis med bdud rtsi'i ngang du sbyar// thams cad gnyis med sems dpa' bsgo ma// oM sarbe bany+tsa a mr-i ta 'adz+ra tsit+tas
225a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' gsang bdud rtsi bskyil cing dbab// mchod bstod dngos grub blang gis bsdu// thabs shes mnyam pa nyid du sbyang // zhing steng gtun bzhag yab yum sbyar// oM AHhUM/ sarba bany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ sman rnams btag btsag
225a4(rnying rgyud): dud rtsid sbal// thod par blugs te rgyas gdab dril// mtshams bcang nyul le drag tu bskrad// yi ge lnga yis sngar bzhin spyad // yum gyis pho brang yab la 'bul/ gzung thag bzung zhing dkyil 'khor bskyed// las gzhung tshogs 'khor dus drug bya//
225a5(rnying rgyud): kyil 'khor bdun brtseg bsgom pa yi// ting 'dzin sngar dang mtshungs pa las// bdud rtsi'i dkyil du bcud 'dus pas// khro rgyal dpal chen yongs rdzogs pa// che mchog bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sku// ljang ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis ni// yumra pa
225a6(rnying rgyud): khyad nas thal mo bzed// ye shes bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin// yab yum sbyor ba'i sbyor mtshams nas// ye shes bdud rtsi phab nas bskyil// oM AHhUM sarba bany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM hriHTha/ gsol 'debs tshig gis skabs skabs bskul//
225a7(rnying rgyud): sbyin drangs gsol 'ad bas ni// hUM dzangs bdag gi gtso bo mchog/ dung dgi thor tshugs khong gser can// tshangs pa kun sgrol che po dang // drang srong chen po ljang tron dang // tsang ka de'i nabs so skyes// thaskar bu dang lha skyabs dang // rgyurna gas dang /
225b1(rnying rgyud): ga rdzogs pa// gang la gnas dang ma bstan 'as// nang gnyis spyod dang ga stan// shAng tha dang ni nga spyo // ma tha ba thasas cas// bram thog zhod du'i phrin dang ni// den pa kyang nga na// gnan/ sang dang bskyabs dang // khyabs kyi chu
225b2(rnying rgyud): dogs// khyed cag 'kho dang bcas pa yis// don d+had bslabs nas grub bskyen// yon tan bdud kyi'i sid+d+hits+tsha'o// zhes brgya drug gsol ba gdab/ den bya ba rtags gzugs sgra 'od/ d+hInan tub mang du 'dul/ rnams sems kyi bskyed da
225b3(rnying rgyud): spang / de nas gang thA zhag gcig bsgrub// srog pa'i cho ga dag kyang bya// 'phro 'dra'i ting 'dzin gong dang mtshungs// rtsa sngags stong bzlas dngos grub blangs// oM swAHd+hI/ sarba badz+ra a mr-i ta kA ya sid+d+hi oM/ wAka sid+d+hi AHsad+d+hid+hi/ sar+b+ba sid+d+hi hrIHdrang rdor bso
225b4(rnying rgyud): ba gad ba rjes la// hUM/ rigs lnga yab yum mkha' slong du// thabs dang shes rab kyor ba las/ gnyis med byung sems 'gro 'du mdzad// snang srid kyi brgyad sman rnams ni// thams cad dag pas bdud rtsi che// bdud rtsi lnga rwa yi sangs rgyas// bse phor dam du
225b5(rnying rgyud): mdzes pa dang / shel gor dkar po dri med mdzes// bdud rtsi lnga li bcud blugs te/ dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i chu 'di ni// ye shes lhal phul ba'i tshe// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes// dam can rnams la mchod pa yis// srang ma
225b6(rnying rgyud): kyi thugs dam bskrad// rig 'dzin rnams la phul ba'i tshe/ dngos grub rgya mtsho thams cad snyir// rnal 'byor bdag nyid myong ba'i tshe// dbang dang dngos grub yongs su rdzogs// bdud dang bgegs la phrogs pa'i tshe// lus sems thal bcul
225b7(rnying rgyud): srabadz+rag/ e ma ta// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i chu 'di ni// mthang nge ma thos sa ma dag pas kyang // thams cad dbang phyug bdag gis thob// e mthabs tshod khyad par tshe// oM mthabs chen bla na med// oM mngom char zang byung ba// sra ba
226a1(rnying rgyud): byung nga mazang ba// spyod pa kyang byung dam thar na// nyan mangs ma grangs nga mtshar na// gnas 'ardzogs pa chang ma// zhul ldan grub dam tshang // chos skrag cag la ba dad pa// rigs lnga'i dngas grub 'dir thang ba// mang
226a2(rnying rgyud): dga' ba med ngan brnyes so// zhes brjod lharnams bdud byer // bum gcig nas dbang bskur bya zhing // bde gshegs yongs rdzogs sman mched bya// kyai thog lan bdun dngas grub theng // rjes su bdud kyi 'khyil pa babyed// rig chen gzur gter
226a3(rnying rgyud): 'di grub rgya la sras dam par 'gyur// rtog pa ye shes ldan sbyar bas// drag la san gyur ye shes spyong // mnyam nyid rtags pas yan tan rdzogs// dang byung dam dag man tan ma chag/ dmadzes bdud rnaMHba wa// rang lcags dngam bskyaban
226a4(rnying rgyud): rnam snang bdud rtsi phun chags gtso// phyi dang kyi grags ma ste// rgyal khron 'khor chags kyi nang gsang// las tshogs dam pasbyangs gags bas lan// yon tan 'bras tha tha na mang rdzogs// rjes kyi chog skyeb chen bzhin// yaHtan
226a5(rnying rgyud): 'dug/ lags pa ma brgya margyal ba las ng+ya mangs yongs chags bad kun thum // gas sa gyis ba da
226a6(rnying rgyud): ban tu rang ba kyimachag te cag la gsol ba/ kye/ mi tog rtag thal glis tu ba dang // rang sa grub kun 'byung tsa draka/ dngas gru brdzas chen pa sgrub thabs// bdag cag rnams la bka' tshul cag/ bzhed gsal ba'iden gangs te/ na
226a7(rnying rgyud): po nyid kyis bkar rgyal pa/ dpa' gtam nus pa ldan kun nyon// gzigs spangs la yi sgo nas bsgrubs// thugs rje'i yul dang srab ma dang // kyai dang dran mtshang rdzas sa// mtshad zas dngas grwabar chog smrab ni// ngan sa gnas nas zang
226b1(rnying rgyud): pa// nangon grub 'byung ba'i bam brtags te// spang dang blang ba'i bam tshogs gnyis// spangs pa dam chog spun grogs dang // nad ngan 'go rimasnga mdo 'bras tshogs// phyi mched chos rigs kun kyang grangs// lnga 'das la sogs dang
226b2(rnying rgyud): mas 'ang // brang bya'i ma gang yang rung // rigs bzang rtsa wa man chad lon// dngas grub ya mtshan chen pa'i rdzas// skye ba bdun pa'i bam ni rab// rigs pazang ba pa shis bu mo shi ba'i// na gzhan gcing ma'i bamani 'bring // so bdun rjes
226b3(rnying rgyud): ba sa// lan cha sngags g.yog sa brtan pas// dang lum yangs chags kyang gsal gdab// rjes bzung dngos grub len bsnam 'gro// rigs 'dzi na dam can lags su khri'i// ba nya'i 'gros pa rdo rje'i 'phos// 'gags
226b4(rnying rgyud): bsdad rtogs bskor ngo gshed mnan// rdzor grangs nyung phur dud pas gzir// yongs rdzogs bro yis rab tu gdul// 'dag chal sug chu'i khrus kyis bkrus// snying rjes rigs drug gnas nas drang // de nas dkyil 'khor slab rdzas rnams// gas
226b5(rnying rgyud): nga'i drub chen gong bzhin bshams// bskyed rdzogs mchod 'i skar rdzogs rjes su// busgra dbang phan dang nus dbang bskur// ro 'i slob mang shes bya ste// dbang stegs khar bzhag dkyil 'khor du// 'jug drang rjes gan ma stag dang // de nas lhar shes bya ba'i
226b6(rnying rgyud): kyil 'khor dbus bzhag rgyan sbas te// spos la dga' bas gnas dgu ru// longs rdzogs lnga dgod 'gro 'dubya// yang na spyi gzug mgrin pa dang // snying ga l+le dbus gsang gnas su// rigs lnga'i srog snying 'bru lnga bsam// de las 'od byung dkyi
226b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi// lha tshogs la ji mthu glang ma bzhed // lha las 'od 'phros kyi nang gi// bdud rtsi bkug nas rigs lnga yis// nang du spro zhing dgyes pa bskyed// ye shes chen po'i bzud tshur la// ba ma la thim pas dngos grub thob// 'od byung ba dag gi
227a1(rnying rgyud): steng gar brim// dngos grub phongs rdzogs thob pasam zhing // 6 sngags sham thur 'di btags bcas// nga smag ShaT/ ma hAsar+b+badz+dza/ sa sa d+hU pa la sid+d+hi/ sa had/ d+ha a/ stong stang ba zlas shing nga ched du//
227a2(rnying rgyud): ga rgyas par bya// rjes la lha baspu dngos grub blang // de nas bam de byang shar bzhag/ dgra bgegs rba dra bstim la bsgral// rgyu ba nas thig gdab rgyab nas bshu// gsil te rat+na'i gzhong ba ru// mgo dang sbrul rus srog rtsa dbus// skyong shar go ro can lho/
227a3(rnying rgyud): lcenub lto ba byang du dgod// gsang ba shar lho rgyang lho nub// nung byung ba rla g.yas rgya chen la// byang shar rtsa chen g.yon pa 'god// blo mchin mkhal ma mtshed mkhris pa// gru bzhir gtubs te bzhi bzhing skor// lag g.yas lho la g.yon pa rung /
227a4(rnying rgyud): rkang g.yas shar la g.yon pa byeng // gnas bcu gnas brgyad yongs su rdzogs// las kyi gzhung bsang tshogs 'khor bya// de nas yongs rdzogs lhar bskyed la// 'dzab dang 'phro 'du gong ltar bya// lha tshogs sel bu'i mtshan brjod cing // thugs
227a5(rnying rgyud): dam bskang zhing drag tu bskul// don gyi dam rdzas phud dkrol la// dngos grub blang zhing ting 'dzin pasu// de nas sil bur mchod rdzas bya// sha khrag phud dkrol gtor ma gtang // rten bsna rus tshogs sbyin bskyeg bya// des ni nyams cha ga tu
227a6(rnying rgyud): bskangs shing // dngos grub rnam gnyis 'phral du 'byung // mtshan ma'i rnam rtog rang sar grol// gsang spyod 'di la rab tu brtan// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyad kyi rgyal po las/ dngos grub rdzas chen yongs rdzogs pa ma
227a7(rnying rgyud): kyi le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ 'chi med rdo rje kun tu bzang // tshe bdag chen po he ru ka/ tshe dbang rin chen
227b1(rnying rgyud): slob 'bas// 'dug cagarnams la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal ba// tha med gsang bsgrub rtse gcig rten// tshe dbang rin chen mchog sgrub pa// bdud rtsi shal gyi bu ma bcud bshad// dang
227b2(rnying rgyud): dngos des kyi/ na du bsod dupa la tshogs chen bsag/ dngos gzhi bzud len tshul du'am// rgyas par sgrub chen kho ga nas dbyung // de 'akyang bang bdud kyorjes// 'byung ba ma snyoms 'di sti ste// rgyu gnyis kyin gsum bdud rtsi 'o// 'di srung
227b3(rnying rgyud): yon tan byas ma 'i khyab// me 'a ni rje sems dpa' 'grub// de phyir legs skur bsgrub na mchog/ rgya gnyis rigs lnga yab was gyis// byang sems ceng ni brag zhun yin// cong lci bzang rigs bri gang dang // brag thu na bzang po dri la ga bsod// rjen
227b4(rnying rgyud): gsumachi par snang sum rba// glang zong dang bur bre gsum// bzang bakhrag rdzobs kyis goso sa yin pas so// 'tsho med bdud rtsi rnam pazhin// shug pa bas mkhan pa mamo// 'dab ma me tog bcud bkrus bsag/ de rnams sman mar sbyor legs bya//
227b5(rnying rgyud): rje ring dad dkon te// khyad par tshe dbang mchog 'dod na// gsang ba slab chen po zang dbus// sngags par tshal med par// sman rim lha grangs many+dzum byas lhag/ par dra'i kha bsam gzungs thag gdags// dar srer gur phub gu gul 'jug
227b6(rnying rgyud): 'asnyen smrab cho ga gas gong bzhin bya// tshe dbang 'gro 'du'i ngasbyin pa ni// rtsa sngags sham thur 'di nyid bzlas// oM 'adz+ras twA trA~M k+Shasak+Sh+ma a l+r-ir swA oM badz+ra sa twAdz+raM/ rat+na ma dzu \u0f7f/ A mra ra gnyi'an hU~M zlaH/ de nas slab pa'i sngags 'di babyas//
227b7(rnying rgyud): mo// ma dzatre/ a des gaN hU~M/ de ngas las sbyang 'chi med sngags// 'di dag bzlas shing dngas grub b+hang // oM baja la hrI hrI/ sarba ta thA ga ta ma be \u0f7f A/ oM sI sar gtang dum //
228a1(rnying rgyud): grub rtags 'od dang dra bsrA// ni zhim ying du'ang ba 'byung // skabs rnabus kun ta drang srong rnams// spyan dngas tsha yi gsal ba gdab// de nas rang gzhan dbang bsgyur ba// bdud rtsi bam pa smra bar bzhag/ rtsa sngags rags nga
228a2(rnying rgyud): nga por bcas// brjod cing rim gyis gnas lhung gtugs// bdud rtsis lus gang rdo rje rabs ma// slo ba com pa Sh+T+r-i hrI oMSh+NI Sha~M d+ha ya/ sman phung drang srong lha mchod de// 'du rlo bas sbyar zhing kun dru babra'// zas ngan bsrung zhing 'bru brjid gtang // mdzes
228a3(rnying rgyud): shed man ngag ldan pa gces// tshe dbang phun tshogs 'dis 'grub pas// sman bcud yon tan bsam mi khyab// rgyu gnyis sman gyis shA rus rgyas// rkyen gsum stobs bcud bkrag kyang 'phel// rtse bzhi'i tshe ring 'byung ba snyoms// rtsal ni seng chen rtobs
228a4(rnying rgyud): glang po// mdangs ni rma bya yang rtsal khyung // gsung ni tshangs pa ba nin// mkha' 'gro dbang sdud lnga brgyad 'khol// tshe dbang phyug rgya'i rig 'dzin 'grub// ces bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ bcad len yongs rdzogs 'chi
228a5(rnying rgyud): med tshe sgrub kyi le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ gyon gyis mgos kun tu bzang // dri med dpal chen he ru ka/ dam 'gal
228a6(rnying rgyud): nyams pa ji ltar bshags// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol ba'i don dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// nyams grib gnod 'gyod can nyon cig/ sems can las dang rkyen dbang kyis// rtsa ba yan lag nyams srid na// dbang
228a7(rnying rgyud): zhu sgo gsum dad bskyed de// bshags thabs rmad byung 'di lta ste// lus ngag yid gsum sgo nas sbyang // sngags dang phyag rgyas lus nyams bshags// bla ma bde gshegs yongs rdzogs rnams// dbang po'i mngon sum 'dra bar dmigs//
228b1(rnying rgyud): na rag dong spug brkyang phyag 'tshal// e ma ho// phyogs bcu dus bzhi kun gyi bdag nyid che// bla ma zhi khro yongs rdzogs dgongs su gsol// 'dir gshegs nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// nyams chag na rag sbyang phyir phyag mchod bzhes// yon tan dun
228b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// dmigs med spos bral chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bde chen longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro mgon cir yang sprul pa'i skul phyag 'tshal lo// gnas lugs mi 'gyur rdo rje'i yu la phyag
228b3(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// yang dag mngon par byang chub sku la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs 'joms mdzad zhi ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// log lha tshar gcod khro bo'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// zabs mgon tshe bdag 'jam dpal sku la phyag 'tshal lo// skyon bral sgra zlogs
228b4(rnying rgyud): pad+ma'i gsung la phrag 'tshal lo// yang dag don ldan badz+ra thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// dug lnga'i nad sel bdud rtsi sman la phyag 'tshal lo// dregs pa 'joms mdzad phur pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// 'byung ba'i mnga' bdag ma mo'i tshogs la phyag 'a
228b5(rnying rgyud): sa dang lam rdzogs rig 'dzin chags la phyag 'tshal lo// bstan pa bsrung mdzod dam can tshigs la phyag 'tshal mo// dgra bgegs bdud 'dul sngags bdag rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de rjes phyag rgya'i lha mchog bsgom// gang gis rgyal bzhi
228b6(rnying rgyud): yi// dkyil 'khor mtshan thos phyag btsal na// nyams chag ma lus kun byang na// mtshams med rdza lnga spos ci dgos// na rag gnas kyang dod sngags te// riga'i ran rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// sngags bzlas skyon mtho la dag nyams bshags
228b7(rnying rgyud): rdorjes mas dpa' gtsug tu dmigs// las sgrib nyams grib dag byed pa// 'khor ba dong spug yang snying 'di dag bzlas// oM AHhUM sA hA/ oM badz+ra sa twa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA lA ya/ badz+res twA dz+nyAn pa te d+de dr-i D+hom D+ha ba/ su ta d+yo ma b+ha la/ a nur ma
229a1(rnying rgyud): b+hA la/ sku bco maHwa/ sarbas d+him+me pra saH/ sarba karma sa tsam/ tsit+to sh+le lA~M kura?H/ 1111// D+hag wAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badz+ra mA me mu la/ badz+nyAHwA/ mahAs ma ya/ badz+ra swatwA ma/ da rgyal ba'i sras su
229a2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// ho bde gshegs yongs rdzogs dgongs su gsol// rgyal ba'i bka' dang bla ma'i lung // ji bzhin ma spyad slob dpon smad// rdo rje mched dang lu ma dral la// lha log ngan sems ngan du spras// brdeg btsog gnod pa dngos su chud//
229a3(rnying rgyud): dang dkyil 'khor nyams ma gsal// 'dzab bzlas ma dag zur chag g.yel// gsang bar 'os dang gnyer gtad spras// gsang bcu bsgrags dang tha ma bslus// rtsa ba'i dam nyams mthol zhing bshags// gzhan yang spyad rgya'i dmatshig lnga// rma
229a4(rnying rgyud): spang lnga dang dang len lnga// shes bya lnga dang bsgrub bya lnga// yan lag dam nyams mthol zhing bshags// bsnyen bsgrub ting 'dzin dam g.yel zhing // nya bzhi rus drug dus mchod chag/ le lo gsog 'jog tshogs srung byas// phung lhag nyams
229a5(rnying rgyud): shIng tshar shor// tshor dang mtshor rkyen dbang gis// sgogasu ma bag med dam nyams bshags// yid kyi dmanyams lta bas bshags// de yang kun gzhi byung chub sems// yin pa med pa'i lta bas rtogs// min pa med pa'i rkom nyams yon/
229a6(rnying rgyud): yin min med pa'i spyod pas rtogs// ri dogs med pa'i byang chub ni// rtsa ba yan lag thams cad kyi// chag nyams ma byung ma byis pas// bshag/ bya bshugs byed gnyis med grol// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las
229a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyod cings yongs rdzogs na dag dang spug bshags pa'i le'u ga nyer gsum pa'o// / de nas par 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu dazang po dpal che mchog he dug la gsol pa/ rkyen gyi/ rin can 'ad 'a
229b1(rnying rgyud): kun tu brdung // thams cad cis byung nam mkha'i mdzad// lha rnams mdangs kyis ji ltar bskang // bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa 'idan dgongs nas// ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'bar rnams ci gcig ton//
229b2(rnying rgyud): lag dam tshig g.yel nyams nyon// le los dus mchod chag pa'am// lha dang 'khon gcugs sbyang ba dang // bsod nams tshogs chen bsag bya'i phyir// bskang gso'i rim pa 'di lta ste// dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin bzhengs pa'i rtsar// lha bkram
229b3(rnying rgyud): rten gyi tshogs kyang bsham// 'byor ldan yo byad gtor mchod bsham// skal ldan mi yi tshogs kyang bsham// phrin las tshogs 'khor gzhung bsrungs rjes// dang po lta dgongs bshags pa bya// de 'og mchod rdzas rang rtags brjod// bla ma lha tshogs
229b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan brjod de// mad dra bskang cho ga rgyas par bya// de nas phur gdab sbyor sgrol bskang // rjes su rkyen bzlog byol chen gdab// de rnams rdzas kyi phyi skong yin// dam can kun mnyes rkyen dbang bzlog/ nang ni ting nge 'dzin gyis bskang // rang nyid thugs
229b5(rnying rgyud): ka'i 'od 'phros te// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhong pa ru// bcud kyi sems can 'dod yon srung // rig pa'i lha mo glos te bskrang // gzugs spyan l+la lhan dri shangs dang // ro mchog ljags la reg bya sku// snang srid bcud kyis thugs dam bskang // 'dod yon
229b6(rnying rgyud): dbang po lngar thim nas// lha mnyes phrin las bsgrub par bsam// des ni lha mnyes dngos grub ster// gsang ba gnyis med lta bas bskang // bskang bya'i lha sems skong byed kyi// mkhan po dag kyang rang gi sems// skong ba'i rdzas mchog sems
229b7(rnying rgyud): yin pas// sems nyid gzhi rtsa bral ba la// mchod bya mchod byed gnyis med pas// gnyis med don gyi thugs dam bskar // ye shes lha tshogs kun mnyes nas// mchog gi dngos grub rgyan mi 'chang // ces bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba
230a1(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ thugs dam yongs su bskang ba'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol
230a2(rnying rgyud): pa// kye kye kye/ 'jig rten dbang phyug kun tu bzang // 'khor 'das mdos bdag he ru ka/ lha 'khrugs mdos kyis ji ltar bskang // bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol ba'i don dgongs te// ston pa chen pos bka' stsal pa/
230a3(rnying rgyud): 'gro phran byams sems can rnams nyon// rnal 'byor dam nyams mkha' 'gro 'khrugs// de dag mdos kyis bsal phyir dang // nyams chag gso dang mtshon 'khrug gcod// nad gdon gnod pa zhi byed cing // tshe dang longs spyod bsod nams srel//
230a4(rnying rgyud): snang srid dbang sdud dgra bgegs sgrol// don chen kun grub phur kha bzlog/ rtog tshogs lha ru ngo sprad cing // bla med 'bras bu 'thob bya'i phyir// yongs rdzogs gling bzhi spyi mdos bshad// rnam dag spros bral chos sku las// byin rlabs longs su
230a5(rnying rgyud): dpe byad ldan// thugs rje'i sprul skubasam yas kyang // bsdun bka' brgyad yongs rdzogs yin// las dang ye shes tshul du snang // lta spyod zung 'jug mdos kyis bskang // de la ngo bo nges tshig dang // dbye ba mthun dpe dgos ched dang // bsham
230a6(rnying rgyud): zabs sngon 'gro dngos rjes kyis// nyams blangs zag bcad 'bras bu bstan// ngo bo gnyis med byang chub sems// nges tshig gar 'dod mdos kyis sel// dbyen las dang ye shes kyis// bsdus te pho mdos mo mdos dang // yongs rdzogs
230a7(rnying rgyud): mdos rnam gsum ste// phyi nang gsang ba'i mdos su bstan// mthun dpe kun 'byung rat+na 'dra// dgos ched mchog dang thun mong dang // gnyis med bde chen don rtogs shing // phrin las bzhi sogs las kun grub// bsham thabs mdos dngos
230b1(rnying rgyud): mchod rdzas rgyan// sa stegs 'dom gang gru bzhi pa'i// steng du maN+Dal 'bru phye la// rat+na brdar te gong bu bcos// hUM raM yaM khaM laM hUM/ 'phro 'dus 'dod dgur byin gyis brlab// ri rab gling bzhi bzang por bsham// steng du pho brang gling dgu/
230b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes lha rnams dbang rdzas ni// snying phye'i dpal bshos rtse dgu la// sngags ldan phur nag dgu yang gzug/ dbus su dpal chen dgu po la// zhal mthun kun tu zhal dgu gzug/ phyi gdugs chen po gcig 'og tu// gdug brgyad 'thun dang rgyal
230b3(rnying rgyud): gzung // mda' dgu rang rtags phyag mtshan bri// shing ris zhal dgu 'phan dgu dang // drang rgyang ngu mtshon pho mo'i gdong // ngar glang pho grud mo glung dgu// 'khor los sgyur ba lta bur dgram// bang rim gsum pa yan chod du// yongs rdzogs kyi skong de ma rdzas su// nam
230b4(rnying rgyud): mkha' dbus mthing mtha' 'ja' ris// khri gzhad rma bya dar snas brgyan// stag gzig grang gi rgyal mtshan dang // ru mtshon der rgyang mda'i 'phang dang // shing ris dar 'phan la sogs te// stong dang lnga brgya brgya la sogs// rab 'bring za ma gang spobs bdag
230b5(rnying rgyud): khyud chen rma byA sang ge 'brug/ stag gzig glang chen rta mchog dang // skyes pa bud med glud la sogs// re re'ang stong sogs ci rigs bsham// bang rim tha mar sde brgyad rdzas// nam mkha' mda' 'phang rgyal mtshan dang // gzug glud la sogs so so dang /
230b6(rnying rgyud): mthun par ci rigs skye 'gro bsag/ gling bzhi las kyi pho nya ste// srid pa'i dbang chen sde bzhi la// nam mkha' mda' 'phrang rgyal mtshan sogs// gzugs gru dam rdzas tshang bar bsham// gzhan yang ri rab gling khengs par// 'phur dgu 'dzul dgu skye dgu sogs// ma
230b7(rnying rgyud): me gser skyems rin chen dang // sna tshogs dar gyis bkrabs la bzhag/ zor rdzas kun gyis mtha' ma bskor// phyi yi lha tshogs mnyes mdos yin// sgyu lus phung po'i ri rab la// rnam rtog phra rags rdzas kyis brgyan// nang gi lha tshogs skong mdos yin// b+ha ga'i
231a1(rnying rgyud): gzhal gas ra rab// byang chub sems sbyin kun gyis brgyan// bdam rgya gdon ldan chos sur rdzogs// gsang ba'i lta tshogs mchod mdas yin// daltar phranasu ma chags bshams nas// mnas kyang ngan du 'grub// / rbangs
231a2(rnying rgyud): cha nu mad yang bstag/ las kyi gzung bsrang 'dzab bzlas bya// dngos gzhi 'jug khar chas gos gsol// tshe mchog dgu bsgo dang rgyal b+ha// snang srid mdos su byin gyis brlag// mdas kyi mtshon pa la brten nas// las kyi lha rnams rdzas kyis bskang /
231a3(rnying rgyud): shes sku rnams don gyis bskyad // gnyis su med pa thugs rnam bskad// yongs rdzogs rjes su bye thag pa'o// phrin las rnam bzhil sogs pa'i// ging bsrub las gteras sor gtad// zong bsgyur sgo dbye lam bstan bya// tshe 'thugs bkra shis cho ga bya// dbyu
231a4(rnying rgyud): nas mdos phyung 'gro don mdzod// slar yang chos kyi dbyings su thim// dngos grub thams cad mdos las 'byung // zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gas ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ yongs rdzogs gling bzhi srid pa spyi mnos gyi badz+ra ste nyer lnga pa'o//
231a5(rnying rgyud): de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ruka la gsol pa/ kye rtse kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang // thugs rje che mchog te drug/ ji srid par du 'gro 'dral ba'i// su gsung thugs rten bzhed thabs grang /
231a6(rnying rgyud): zhes gsol ston pas bka' stsal pa// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs yongs rdzogs// snod bcung tshul du bzhed thabs bshad// dang po snod kyi gzhal yas khang // yid 'od dge zhing dul ba sar// sa yi sta goni sngon song nas// snod kyi 'jig rten rtog
231a7(rnying rgyud): skyeng byer// ro rab gleng bcas za mthun du// brtsigs te chos sgobs ma yas par// gzhal yas sbo mar chen por bzhengs// sku gsum yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir// mnyam nyid chos skur byin brlabs te// sa gzhi cha mnyam stong par sbyang // ma 'ag
231b1(rnying rgyud): longs skur byin brlab gyir// yongs rtogs dkyil 'khor bzhengs la gdul// thugs rje sbrul srur byin brlab phyir// pan rag brtsig par bya ba ni// pan dgra steng nas rmad byes te// grub thob dge gnas sa sna dang // dpal che re bzang gangs no dang //
231b2(rnying rgyud): lung bzang mdo dgu'i bye skrag dang // rat+na lnga yi phye mar sbyar// 'dam shing sngon song chu sbyangs te// gzhal yas phyi dbyibs mngon sum mthun// lha rnams theg pa yongs rdzogs dgod// de bzhin bzhad thabs rim pa yang // 'byung ba lnga brtseg cha
231b3(rnying rgyud): mthun par// gdan ni rim pa la brtseg steng // ri raba'i po mchog bzhin du// gzhal yas par rim bzhi ldan la// khongs pa khri rkang cha mthun du// sgo mo dgu bcu go gsum dpyod// rnam rgya khang bzang cha ma thun du// pho brang gra bzhi bskor byas brtsig/ lha dang
231b4(rnying rgyud): gtso bang cha mthun du// the bzang sgo bzhi ldan par brtsig/ yongs 'dus brtol cha mthun par// srog shing bzang po mthung gzug/ sum cu rtsa gsum cha mthun par// 'khor lo 'khor 'degs rim par brtsegs// ngog min chu mthun chad lem tog/ bya rul
231b5(rnying rgyud): sogs mdzes par dgod// sgrog mtshon grwa bzhir gA lhag bya// re bdun mtshon phyir 'khor yug tu// 'khor sa bang rim bdun gyis bskor// nye zla'i tshul du sgrol ma dang // spyan ras gzigs khang shar nub brgyan// mtsho bdun rgya mtsho mtshon pa'i phyir// gsubrang
231b6(rnying rgyud): legs bya khron bu bla// gling bzhi gling phran tshul mthun du// sa steng gling gzugs bcu gnyis te// sbrul sku'i mchod rten bcu gnyis brtsig/ mu khyud cha mthun brag ris bskor// de la tshad med sgo bzhi dgod// rten gnas che chung spobs par sbyar// de ltar rten
231b7(rnying rgyud): gnas de nyid la// brten pa bcud kyi 'jig rten dag/ srung phyir lha tshogs bzhed thabs bshad// stod rim gsum ni sku gsum zhing // nyan thos rang rgyal byang sems kyi// gzugs na mra rgyas bsdus ci rigs par// bang rim 'og ma'i sgo nang bkod// de ltar
232a1(rnying rgyud): rim gsum sgo'i nang // kri ya u pa yo ga yi// lha rnams rgyas bsdus gang 'tshams dgod// ze bum pad 'khor gdugs tog nang // ma hA a nu a ti yi// lha rnams yongs rdzogs zhi dang khro// bka' brgyad bslab pa'i/
232a2(rnying rgyud): dgod de// kun bzang tog la bzang mo gdugs// 'khor lo rdor sems 'degs gsang bdag/ bre stod zhi lha bzhi bcu gnyis// bre smad nang sgo bcu gnyis gzug/ khrag 'thung lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dgod// bum dkyil bum pa'i rdzogs mtshams su// bka'
232a3(rnying rgyud): brgyad yongs rdzogs lha rnams dgod// sgo bzhi rgyal chen sde bzhi la// gza' brgyad rgyu skar bskor ba dgod// lcog bzhi gnod sbyin nor gyi lha// po dgu mo dgu la sogs dgod// gdan rim lnga brdzogs steng nang du// klu dbang nyi zla brgyad bskor bzhengs//
232a4(rnying rgyud): 'og gru gsum dong nang du// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i dgra bgegs grub// 'khor sa rim pa bdun nang du// bskal bzang sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis// mdo 'dul chos mngon rgyud ris bris// nyi ma'i khang par thugs rje che// zla khang grol ma myur ma dgod/
232a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi gling phran brgyad lteng du// mchod rten chen po bcu gnyis nang // skal sku'i mdzad pa bcu gnyis dgod// 'khor yug re re ru ba'i nang // bstan pa srung ba'i lha ma srin// chos skyong pho nya'i tshogs rnams dgod// sgo bzhir dbang chen sde bzhi dang /
232a6(rnying rgyud): ka dang pa'i ka/ kang king lha mo mgon po nag/ skol ging dkar dang nag po dgod// lha tshogs de dag thams cad kyang // lugs 'bur ri mor gang lcogs bzhengs// sngags dang phyag rgyas smin par bya// spyi gtsug gdung gzhug mgrin pa ru// A likA
232a7(rnying rgyud): gzhug par bya// thugs kar man shel hU~M bcas gzhug/ srog shing che nas rmang yan chod// theg pa'i rim pa dang sbyar ba'i// rgyud lung man ngag rim par gzhug/ srog shing nang du srog phur gdang // srog shing rtsil tshe dpag med// gzugs dang sngags
232b1(rnying rgyud): su bcas pa dgod// kha dog phyogs mtshon gdul byar bstan// dar bzang la sogs na bzas bklub// bang rim dang po nas brtsams te// bsgrub rdzas mchod rdzas rkyen dbang bzlog/ bang rim gsum pa'i nang du bsag/ bus dkyil bsla khang rnal 'byor
232b2(rnying rgyud): gnas// sgo rnams la ni 'khor rim bzhin// nyams len bsgrub pa'i gnas byas na// grub pa mthar gyin 'khrul pa sel// sku gsum rgyal bzhi dang khro// gsang ba yongs rdzogs bde gshegs kyi// rten gsum yongs rdzogs ngo mtshar che// rten
232b3(rnying rgyud): 'di ji srid gnas kyi bar// de srid sangs rgyas bstan pa rgyas// 'gro ba kun 'dul bas sgrib sbyang // bsod nams phun tshogs longs rdzogs shing // chu stor bzhengs mkhan ma lus kun// tshe 'dir bkra shis tshe ring 'phel// phyi ma zhing kham na
232b4(rnying rgyud): drag thob// yul phyogs gling khams bkra shis 'byung // thabs mchog yongs rdzogs rmad du byung // bstan pa'i rim gro 'di kho na// dang du longs shig bsam pa 'grub// ces bka' stsal te// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rten mchog bkra
232b5(rnying rgyud): shis sku gsum yongs rdzogs su bzhed thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa
232b6(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang // thugs rje che mchog he ru// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs rten la// ye shes rab tu gnas thabs gang // zhes gsol ston pas bka' stsal pa// bde gshegs sku gsung yongs rdzogs rten// rab tu gnas thabs rnam gsum bshad//
232b7(rnying rgyud): smos pa rgyas bsdus spos med de// rgyas mdzad bla ma mkhas pa la// slob bus yon dbul lan gsum par// gsol ba gdab cing bla mas kyang // rtags sbyar rab gnas bsnyen pa bya// dus tshod gza' skad bzang po la// gsang ba sgrub chen skabs bzhin du// dkyil
233a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor rten rdzas sngon song nas// dkyil 'khor de yi byang phyogs su// rten gsum gang yin khri la bzhag/ brab bdug bgegs bskrad srung 'khor bsgom// skyabs 'gro sems bskyed mchod sbyin bya// gsol ba gdab cing bsnyen pa
233a2(rnying rgyud): bskyal// tshul bzhan bsgrub te byin chen dbab// khrus dang nye reg 'thor 'thung bya// sngags kyis bgegs bskrad tshal gyis bkru// ras sa mdar gyis rdul phyis la// ri yaM khaM gyis rab tu sbyang // tsan dan gur gum a ga ru// dA ti g+ha d+hi dri lngas byug/ sku dang mchod
233a3(rnying rgyud): rten gang yin yang // sku gsung thugs dang rten 'brel snying // bde gshegs yongs rdzogs yang snyid rnams// rigs dbye sku yi gnas lngar gzhug/ sku gdung ring bsrel nor bu lnga// sman 'bru dar gyis gril te gzhug/ de nas dkyil 'khor legs bris te// bum
233a4(rnying rgyud): pa la sogs mchod rdzas bsham// bskyed rdzogs las kyi gzhung bsrangs nas// mchod bstod bzlas pa tshul bzhin bya// bum pa byin brlab bzhub tul bya// rten la bgegs bskrad sku khrus bya// rten sbyid bskyed rdzogs sngang bzhin bya// sku gsung thugs su
233a5(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs la// ye shes lnga yi dbang yang bskur// spyan 'byed snyan shangs zhal tshems drud// longs sku'i rten lan bza' gsol// dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba gdags// sbrul sku yin na dbu skra bzhar// glegs bam dag la bde gshegs yongs//
233a6(rnying rgyud): gsal dbyangs lnga bcu'i yi ge bsgyur// bden gnyis chos sgras 'gro 'dul bsam// mchod rten dkyil 'khor cha mthun par// nang du chom dgu 'i lha tshogs bskyed// de la ye shes dkyil 'khor dgug/ bstim brtan dgyes pa bskyed pa dang // phyag
233a7(rnying rgyud): sogs mchod pa kun gyis mchod// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bla bre sogs// rnam bdun bkra shis rdzas brgyad dbul// bstod cing mnga' gsol 'gro 'du bya// rten gsum rim pa gang yin yang // ye shes yang yang dgu gcing bstim// sngags kyi bzlas
233b1(rnying rgyud): pas sor bya// sku gsung thugs su byin brlab cing // ye shes la yi dbang bsgyur bya// bum dbang gzhung bzhin bskur ba'i rjes// nas 'bru me tog dkar po la// rten 'brel 'brum bsnyen me tog dang // na morat+na tra yA ya/ a yatarmA ha tu prab+hA sa hen
233b2(rnying rgyud): ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya wa da ta/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswA hA/ de rjes bu slob yon bdag la// bum dbang bkra shis rdzas bzhi dang // sna bdun rdzas brgyad dbang bskur bya// tshogs 'khor bzang pos zhal bsro bya// kha brda bzang sgra spyod lam gzab/
233b3(rnying rgyud): bkra shis skyid pa'i lha bro bA// rgyas pa'i sbyin bsreg smon lam gdab// lud gtor lha dang chos skyong mchod// rten gyi gnyer gtad drag tu bya// gtang rag mchod pa dga' ston bya// yon dbul dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo// spros pa nyer bsdu'i rab gnas ni/
233b4(rnying rgyud): 'gro khrus sogs yongs rdzogs rjes// gang la bya ba'i rten de nyid// cho ga gsum gyis sbyangs byas te// rang rang ye shes ngo bor bsam// de la dbang bskur me tog gtor// mchod pa bzang po med phul nas// yi dam lhag pa'o rten du bzung //
233b5(rnying rgyud): ltar bsam pa de bzhin yin// spos med don gyi rab gnas ni// bsnyen rdzogs rtogs ldan rnal 'byor pas// gzigs pas rab tu gnas pa 'chags// phyi nang snod bcud snang srid kun// ye nas chos sru'i ngo bar gnas// der shes dbyings las ma
233b6(rnying rgyud): g.yos na// rnam dag rten mchog bla na med// snang bsngal grag pa gsung // dran rtog thugs kyi rang bzhin yin// sku gsung thugs rten yongs rdzogs kyang // blo man grol der mi snang // shes rab blo ldan skyes mchog gis// rdul gcig steng na rdul
233b7(rnying rgyud): snyed kyi// sangs rgyas ma lus yongs rdzogs skur// rab gnas dam pa de nyid do// rang rig ra gsal rab gnas rab// rab gnas kun gyi rgyal po yin// rab gnas phran tshogs de dag gis// ji srid yun gyi rten byas na// bkra shis zin chen bsam/
234a1(rnying rgyud): ga / lkug chu kla ga sa / sa 'du na /
234a2(rnying rgyud): mas rgyas ma dpas ma na sa / sma
234a3(rnying rgyud): bdag cag bar dka' sam mo// da dag // na byinan pas dkyu sprul pa// bdeg shegs dkang ba srung gyur lo// ma nga su dag na// nga la nga pa su / ga sa da /
234a4(rnying rgyud): na pa rnams// da na pa mi/ / nga shA na ngas grub ga mas pa /
234a5(rnying rgyud): das su skye ba 'o// 'du ba meng ma dgas 'ad ga aH// mu du 'dunan tha/ ngas gzugams s+ho// sa pa du
234a6(rnying rgyud): sa// gyus / smras sa
234a7(rnying rgyud): rdza nam rgya mu /
234b1(rnying rgyud): gu ma
234b2(rnying rgyud): phyi ma mu khyud bdun pa la// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang // dbyug to rgya gram mtshon cha'i tshogs// me ri lnga yis 'khor bar bri// rdzas kyi bsrung ba'i skyobs ngar gdags// ga pur tsan dan gla rtsi dang // gu gul li sho shar kun dang // a mr-i ta dang chang spar
234b3(rnying rgyud): phyug/ gtod tshogs gzhung bzhin bshams nas kyang // las rim gzhung bsrang lha rnams bstim// dbang bskur rab tu gnas pa bya// dar sna lngas gril tshon lngas bcings// dus tshes bzang la mgul du gdags// bkra shis mnga' gsol brjod par bya//
234b4(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin rang nyid hUM r+yaka/ yongs rdzogs pa'i nga rgyal bsgom// 'di las khyad 'phags spang ba'i thabs// 'jig rten khams 'dir sngar ma byung // mi 'byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// ci phyir 'di nyid yongs rdzogs yin// lus ngag yid gsum spang ba
234b5(rnying rgyud): mkhar// rdo rje'i go khrab phub chen yin// nad gdon dug mtshon gnam lcags bslang // mdor na 'jigs pa kun gru ba ste// phyogs ngan kAn dang gnod las rgyal// tshe 'di bar do phyi ma yi// srung ba'i rgyal por 'di 'gyur te// ngan song gnas ngan kun/
234b6(rnying rgyud): las grol// 'di yod 'gro ba sangs rgyas yin// rgyal ba rnams kyi sras su gzigs// dam can rnams kyis mgon stongs mdzad// lha srin sde brgyad bran du 'khol// 'da' khar byang chub rtags la sbyor// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba
234b7(rnying rgyud): 'dus brgyad kyi rgyal po las/ bde gshegs yongs rdzogs bka'i srung 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/
234b8(rnying rgyud): kye rtse/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang // thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ srub chen las bzhi'i don myur byed// sbyin bsreg las kyi rim pa gang // de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // ston pa nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// las rnams kun gyi rjes sgrub myar//
235a1(rnying rgyud): rnam pa/ sbyin pasreg 'di ltar bya// dkyil 'khor can pa'i phyogs bzhin// gi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i bab// rgyam po gru bzhi zlab ma dang // grwa gsum la sogs gang mos bya// dkar sar dmar ldang kha dog bstsu
235a2(rnying rgyud): byang chub skyer ldeng dug shing sogs// las mthun shing brtsig bsreg pa'i rdzas// phrin las gang bsgrub dang sbyar te// zhil dkar gsum rgyas 'bru'i tshogs// dbang la sha chang drug khrag drag/ phrin las gzhung bsrang tshogs mchod bya// mi yi lha ba byed po rgya
235a3(rnying rgyud): bstod bya// phrin las gang bsgrub dang sbyar te// lto bar yongs rdzogs lnga bskyed de// ye shes bkrig bstim brgyan mchod rjes// bkra shis pra dz+nyes sbar te// sbyin bskyeg rdzogs byas las ljags ni// \u0f7fsngags dag la 'di ltar bsgral// shAH/
235a4(rnying rgyud): brAny+tsau/ pa shaM/ mAr la/ las zhing 'dod gsol dang banas bsreg/ zhe bus dbang drag gang bsam 'grub// ye shes sems gshegs dmachog pas+dza// rjes su las bzhi'i gro bzhi drung // thal ba rlung na mnan pa sogs// saso las kyi dmigs dang bgyis/
235a5(rnying rgyud): me yis las kun myur du 'grub// ces bka' stsal to// dpal gsad pa 'dus brgyad kyi rgyal po las/ las bzhi sbyin bsreg yongs su bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu rtsa
235a6(rnying rgyud): ba kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa// kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang // thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ las rnams rjes bstan dgra bgegs gzir// dpal chen rol pa'i bro rnams gang // de skad gsol pas bka'
235a7(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// gzir mnan gro yi las sbyor ni// dgra bgegs dam sre gnan gzer te// rnal 'byor dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas// dpal gyi chas kyis rab tu brgyan// yongs rdzogs lha yid rgyal bskyed// lag pa lu gu rgyud du sgril// rkang stabs rdo
235b1(rnying rgyud): rdo'i 'gros subya// dpa' brjod rngam pa'i sde sgrog/ klums stan dadrang zas gzang gnan// bran las rnam pazhi migs bsal bsgrub// dang po klu yis spyan drang tA// dz+ran tha grangs rdzogs dkyil bar // dpal chen che mchog pu sprul nas// mkha
235b2(rnying rgyud): 'gro'i tshogs dang rol pa ni// thabs shes gnyis su med par sbyor// byang chub sems kyi 'phrong du las// khro bo khro mo'i sprin 'phros nas// glu bro gar gyi thugs dam ste// tshun chad med par brtan par bya// zo 'di 'bar ba'i phyag rgya ste// rgyal bstor dang mnyam
235b3(rnying rgyud): par byor// muni tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzin// ma dang mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bsgral// chog nidon dam rtogs pa'ichog/ chos soms gnyis su med par rtogs// 'di ni gzogar gyi bdang // gar ni thub gad la chen pa'i gang// b+h+yos
235b4(rnying rgyud): bcu'i zhing khams khyab par byed// phyag rgya bsnol ba lu gu rgyud// dus gsum rgyal bzhi khro bskul// khrag 'thung rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// che mchog yab yum sras dang bcas// mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas ma lus kun// sngon gyi thugs dam ji bzhin du//
235b5(rnying rgyud): glu brog ral gshegs su gsol// hUM hU~M hUM badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha sarba A be sha ya pra be sha ya dzaHhU~M baM hoH// de nas za bskor gzid cing brdung// NAM zhi khro yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor 'dir// khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro gcig brdung // phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams
235b6(rnying rgyud): kun nas// khro bo khro mo'i bro brdungs pas// la la thabs dang shes rab zo// la la rdo rje pad+ma'i zo// la la dbang po yul gyi bro// l-i la 'jig rten dbang srud zo// la la 'dul sbyong rtags kyi bro// la la dregs pa 'dul spyod bro// la la mos pa rgyan
235b7(rnying rgyud): kyi bro// la la longs spyod dpal gyi bro// la la spor byed gnas kyi bro// la la sdud byed thabs kyi bro// zol rnam grangs bsam mi khyab// glu la yon tan brjod mi lang // tshig la man ngag sna tshogs gsal// bro 'odi phrin las rgya mtsho 'dra//
236a1(rnying rgyud): glu 'di lta ba rgya mtsho 'gru// cho ga 'di 'du 'bral med pa'i chog/ phra yi ming ni stam b+ha nan// glu yi ming ni pA shad+tha// tshig gi ming ni ar+tha sha// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor// kun gyi thugs dam chen po yin//
236a2(rnying rgyud): m+mehrI hrIHhrIHhUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ hUM gsang ba yum gyi mkha' dbyings su// bde chen rol pa'i bro gcig brdung // sna la pad+ma rol pa'i bro// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis bzung // de nas shes rab thabs kyi bro// b+ha ga'i dkyil du dgra bgegs brdung //
236a3(rnying rgyud): de nas dbang po yul gyi phra// lha mo brgyad dang thabs cig rol// de nas rdo rje pad+ma'i bro// phyag rgya chen por rgyas 'debs so// de nas gdul bya drag po'i bro// khrag 'thung rgyal po'i 'khor la brdung // de nas mos pa rkyen gyi bro// ma srid rgya mtsho'i 'khor la
236a4(rnying rgyud): bzung // de nas 'dul byed thabs kyi bro// phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor ma lus sdud// de nas spor ba gnas kyi bro// rgyud drug rnam shes dbyings su sdud// thabs dang shes rab ldan byas nas// glu bro dam tshig rgyal po yin// brtan pas bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i
236a5(rnying rgyud): zo// bro 'di bar chad med par brdung // lta ba dran par bya ba'i phyir// glu ni 'du 'bral med par blang // dkyil 'khor rang la gsal ba'i phyir// tshig ni snying po 'dzab tu bzlas// ye shes dpal gyi bror tshugs// bdud bgegs bar chad ming yang med//
236a6(rnying rgyud): a la la ho dgyes pa che// hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M che mchog 'khor bcas rol pa'i gro// dgra bgegs dam sri'i srog la brdung // badz+ra he ru rol pa'i zo// dgra bgegs dam sri'i sgying la brdung // gshin rje gshed po rol pa'i bro// dgra bgegs dam sri'i klad par
236a7(rnying rgyud): brdud// rtam grin rgyal po rol pa'i bro// dgra bgegs dam sri'i lce la brdung // rdo rje gzhon nu rol pa'i bro// dgra bgegs dam sri'i lte bar brdung // bla med he ru rol pa'i bro// dgra bgegs dam sri'i gsang bar brdung // reg 'dzin thod rtsal rol
236b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i blo// dgra bgegs dam sri'i spyi bor brdung // dregs pa kun 'dul rol pa'i bro// dgra bgeg dam sri'i brla g.yas brdung // stobs ldan nag po ral pa'i khro// dgra bgeg dam sri'i brla g.yon brdung // zhi lho bka' brgyad rol pa'i gro//
236b2(rnying rgyud): g.yas su bskor te dgra la brdung // g.yon du bskor te bgegs la brdung // g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab bro// ru dra dam sri thal bar rlog/ hUM s+t+wam b+ha rak+Sha dgra bgegs na na// phrin las rnam bzhi bsgrub pa'i bro// bro bca' phrin las
236b3(rnying rgyud): dbyibs su bca'// hUM sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rdzogs pa'i dpal// gti mug bde gshegs 'khor dang bcas// de bzhin rigs mchog ma lus kyis// 'jig rten khams 'di rab 'byams na// shin tu
236b4(rnying rgyud): rmongs pa'i sems can kun// zhi ba'i thugs rje chen po yis// zhi bar ma gyur gang yang med// zhi mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal lo// nad gdon rnam rtog shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA// hUM sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rdzogs pa'i dpal//
236b5(rnying rgyud): nga rgyal bde gshegs 'khor dang bcas// rin chen rigs mchog ma lus kyis// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// shin tu dbul ba'i sems can kun// tshe dbang longs spyod rgyas par mdzad// rgyas par ma gyur gang yang med// rgyas
236b6(rnying rgyud): mdzad lha lnga phyag 'tshal bstod// tshe dang bsod nams praSh+TiM ku ru swA hA// hUM sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rdog pa'i dpal// 'dod chags bde gshegs 'khor dang bcas// pad+ma'i rigs mchog ma lus kyis// 'jig
236b7(rnying rgyud): rten khams ni rab 'byams na// shin tu chags pa'i sems can kun// thams cad dbang du sprad par mdzad// dbang du ma gyur gang yang med// dbang mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// lha 'dre mi gsum pa shang ku ru swA hA/ hU~M sangs rgyas kun gyi
237a1(rnying rgyud): sku gsung gas// yon tan zin las rdzogs pa'i dpal// zhe sdang bde gshegs lakhong dang bcas// rdo rje rigs mchog ma lus kyis// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// shin tu gdug pa'i sems can kun// rdul
237a2(rnying rgyud): dum brlags gang yang med// brlag mdzad lnga la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra bgegs gnod byed mA ra ya hUM phaT/ de ltar bro yi las rdzogs nas// nad sos skyo thul dam sri non// bar chod kun gyis tshugs mi 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal
237a3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ gzir mnan glu bro yongs rdzogs kyi le'u ste sumA cu pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka lA gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thams cad
237a4(rnying rgyud): ston pa kun tu bzang // thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ sangs rgyas bstan pa mthar bskyang phyir// mngag pa pho nya yongs rdzogs gang // de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// mdor na dpal gyi mngar 'dus pa'i// lha srin dam can bsam yas kyang // bkra
237a5(rnying rgyud): shis dam ldan mthu che ba'i// sngags bdag ded dpon sum cu yin// pho nya yongs rdzogs 'di bsgrub na// dben pa'i gnas su sgrub rdzus bsag/ dkyil 'khor mnga' gang gru bzhi yi// dbus su khu gang gru gsum gru// ro ras sam ni dug shog la// 'khor
237a6(rnying rgyud): lo sum cu rtsibs ldan bri// dbus su dmigs pa'i ling+ga bca'// rtsibs la srog sngags sum cu bo// thod ngan kha sbyor nang du brub// pho nya mchod rten rten gtor du// ri rab bshos bu sum cus bskor// a mr-i ta dang phud kyis bran// sngags la ba liM ta khA hi
237a7(rnying rgyud): zhes// rtags byung ba sngo zhing grub dus btang // yongs rdzogs bsten pa'i drag sngags la// pheM nya'i drag sngags 'di btags bzlas// nyung dkar lcags phye'i thun la bstim// ma hA da wa/ um de wa/ ya ma dA dza/ ya mdun tid / ma ma ru lu/ e kaH
237b1(rnying rgyud): sa// smyam+b+ha / / sma / m+b+ha m+bu/ dag d+hAr+m+mar+m+ma r+m+ma rdzu / g+sa/ DUnA/
237b2(rnying rgyud): sarba d+hAN+DakrI dz+dzaH/ nyams rtags tapa mau ngas gas// dmag zam 'dun sgrak+ki gdags// sded ngon ngo ri'i sngags gzhag \u0f7f// dgra po'i srog la b+h+yo mAr ma tha~Mng / bdag nyid yongs rdzogs ste dag sa la nas// sded pon drang dang tshi lugs s+ho//
237b3(rnying rgyud): rab 'jigs lig che sna tshogs thogs// dgu bo 'gregs gsod sha khrag rol// grog tshang 'bras snyigs lta bur bsam// dus drug blun thab brnag pa bskyed// skabs su mchod cing las la rbad// de yi nyams rtags pho nya yis// dgra bang dang
237b4(rnying rgyud): bli gsod 'dzin dang // bag gzhag shing gtsod sting srin 'byung // da rgya bus kyi li na dbyung // smyung ba gad ba rjing bsreg mnan 'byung // de yis bstan pa'i drung snre lA// gtor tshogs mdos kyi gtang dag gtang // rtag tu mdzod na kyi bzhin 'bring /
237b5(rnying rgyud): phyir dregs pa'i bdagra por 'gyur// ni blo bka' ba rgyad rnams cad kyi// pheM nya yongs rdzogs 'di nyid do// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsung ba 'dus pa myed kyi rgyal po las/ dam can mo nya yongs rdzogs kyi badz+ra ste sgo gcig pa'o//
237b6(rnying rgyud): nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khod rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu kun bkun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he drug la gsol ba/ tsi kye/ thams cad skyon pa na bzang // thugs che mchogate su// sgrub pa'i mi byed kun rdzogs // 'did yo nor sgrub yod/
237b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs gang // de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// de dngon nor bdag gnod sbyin yin// gnod sbyin bye brag bas ma yas kyang // nyer bsdus pho dgu mo dgu yin// gtso ba dza ma la gcig pur 'dus// bslab lugs spyi chings snying khol las// spyi chings
238a1(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin srog la ba te// maring shog dag la dan las// pad la par klag ma 'dab brgyad bri// ma khrang lus pa kang ste dbus sa/ smrang bag/ sngags 'chang chag mAl bur+d+ha sa r+b+ba sit+ti b+has/ darma b+h+ya ste ba'i su khyud ba /
238a2(rnying rgyud): dza dgu be dgu spel mar bskor// tsakr-i rtsibs kyi nang brgyang du/ yo rjes la dze li nA ya swA hA/ gyibs mtshan pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// oM ba su~M tA ra NI swA hA/ mu khyung nad ma yak+Sha brgyud // sid+d+hiNAM dang spel bar bri// daM yi phyi ma las mkhan srog sngags ni/

238a4(rnying rgyud): bris te// de nyid ma'i dbus ni// dang dz+ra nI la ta dka gsumang // mang dgasum 'thum rgyas pa// ma'i garje 'tshims pa gzug/ yangs rdzogs kyi pa'i snang ba las// oM yang bcwam / /

238a6(rnying rgyud): skyod du sbyin bya'i shas brgyan pa'i// rtag gtor gcig bshams dus dkar la// byis pa'i gzugs legs rgyan can bre// mda' bzang du skyod gcig la gdags// gzhan yang ras dkar gtsang mo'i nang // pha la khang bru she 'byi r+ya// gas

238b1(rnying rgyud): nor 'khrugs pam tha ga dgas/ Sh+T+rI d+his rba ma/ dngas sa kyi 'ad na rnams car// mig ma 'ad na sngags 'di 'azlas// n+d+ha stahA/ de yis mngan shes 'jig rten san// dbang bsod 'do na sngags 'di gdags// sarbanan
238b2(rnying rgyud): kur+ya s+yAt+ma/ de yang sngags rgya 'di 'on// rgyan tu bsrubs pas bas mchod 'brub// sid+d+hiHzlab shiku nus ma yi swAhA/ dngas grubasgyur 'byong rgyuni du brnyas// zhag gsum rjes la zas gtor sbyin// gter rnyed 'bru char 'bab pa dang // byis pa phyag
238b3(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo thog brdal// badzang rtags de yin lo khros na// mi nag mdze pho rtsod rgol cing // rgyan gtor sbrang po nor 'dod 'ong // dgongs pa bsor cing nyams pa bshags// gtor ma gtang zhing dbang du bsdu// tshe dbang bu nong bdag por 'gyur// zhes bka'

239b1(rnying rgyud): dang tshig myur bar du mchod// tha ma stong phrag brgyad bcu'i bgegs// chags 'jal sha 'khon rjod rdzas pa rlabs// dwe wa nA ga/ yak+Sha/ gan+d+haH/ b+hU ta ta nir ti/ ga ruH/ kin+dar/ ma ho da ga/ pre ta kA/ mnut+ta/ a mnud+ya/ sa hA bi tA b+ha // skyugs/

239b3(rnying rgyud): gdab// skad cig lhar bskyed lus bsrung bya// bdun po tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom// b+h+rUM las gnas bskyed de dbus su// stong nyid sa bon phyag mtshan las// sngags brjod ting 'dzin dam tshig bskyed// ye shes mdun dgug mchod pastod
