239b5(rnying rgyud): bden bdang chos gsum sbyin// 'phags tshogs gshegs gsol mgron gsum dgyes// de rjes snang srid 'khor 'das chos// byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun la// bzang ngan rtog tshogs mchod rdzas sbas// 'dzin tha la gtor chen yongs la
239b6(rnying rgyud): khyab// chos dbyings skye med rang rgyas gdabu// de dag sngags rim 'di was// oM swa b+hAwa bi shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmAr+thaswa b+hA la bi ud+d+ho&haM/ na maHsarba d+hathA ga~M te b+h+yo/ bI sh+tsa mu khe b+h+yaHsarbatak+Sha~M ur+tha te hrI mig gin khA swA hA/ a a mr-ita kut+ta li ha na tan
239b7(rnying rgyud): phaT/ oMn maHsarba ta thA ga ta a wa lo ki te/ oM sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na aM wa lo ki te/ ni maHsa ma n+ta s+pha ra Na/ rasmai b+hA baM sa ma ya ma~Mny+dza ma Ni/ du ru du ru hr-id ya/ dza la ni hU~M phaT/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ gra he shwa ri pr-i b+hany+dza ti/ ma rdza sa ma ya swA hA/ ljag
240a1(rnying rgyud): 'tshig dang phyug rgyas brgyan// byang chub sems can spyod lamabya// gnyis rdzogs byang chub 'grub pa'i rgyu'o// rnal 'byor ljang tshe rim pa gsum// lus lcu ga sngags sems nyid ni// spros thal phyung srid smig rgyu blta/
240a2(rnying rgyud): khrus gsum chu gtsang dri chu dang // sems nyid dag bya kho na yin// maN+Dal phyi nang gsang ba ste// rin chen maN+Dal dri gtsang byug/ me tog ri rab gling bcas dgram// rin chen bdun gter nyi zlas brgyan// yang na zhing chen khrag byugs la// dbang po rnam lnga'i
240a3(rnying rgyud): tshom bu dgram// nang gi mchod sprin gtibs la dbul// mtha' bral rang sems rtog tshogs dgram// rnam dag rang grol gsang mchod dbul// gsol 'debs gsum gyis nyams sbrel ba// spyi gtsug bla ma rdo rje chos// rig 'dzin tshogs bskor
240a4(rnying rgyud): byin chen la// lus kyis phyag sbyar dag dbyangs su// 'bru gsum snying pos gsol ba gdab// rang rig bla ma chos skur bsrung // rgyun gtor gtsang ma ci 'byor la// 'bru gsum sngags kyis spel skrangs bsgyur// phyi ltar lha rdzas nang 'dod yon//
240a5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba 'khor 'das zhen rtog bral// rtsa ba gsum stsogs sri zhu'i mgron// yon tan snying rje lan chags mchod// chos sbyin dmigs med rgyas gdab bya// chu sbyin bum nang chu ar bsam// 'bru gsum nyer gcig brjod sbrengs pas// bdud rtsis yi dwags
240a6(rnying rgyud): kun tshim bsam// gtor pas rigs drug sdug bsngal grol// bza' tshogs rang nyid lhar gsal gdab// gnas gsum 'bru gsum rtsa gsum dngos// 'od kyis bag chags sbyang spel bsgyur// bdag mchod kun mnyes tshogs 'khor che// 'gro na ye shes
240a7(rnying rgyud): mkha' la 'gro// 'chag tshad bdud rtsir byin brlab smin// nyal tshang mi rtog chos dbyings nyal// 'dug tshad rnal 'byor gsum ldan 'dug/ bskor ba yongs rdzogs rten mchog la// 'gro kun 'khor rgyun gcad phyir bskor// ye shes 'khor lo rgyun mi 'cha
240b1(rnying rgyud): shAm gsam tshan don phyag 'tshal zhing // yig gdum gro 'drabya// rnam dag pa hA shAnyi myas byangs// dz+nyAm byag 'byung ba dang // nang bas gsang bar sems la gangs// stabs kyin na 'arigs kun la bsgrab// chos rkyen gtu 'i ma ga
240b2(rnying rgyud): zing sdug phongs re ba bskang // nad gdon kun gyi gnyen por ni// su gsung thugs kyi snying pos gzhom// oM kyis pho gdu ma khred tshad 'joms// AHyis mo gdo gang bar sel// d+h+r-i gis klug don drung 'dus sol// bar chod kun si la gtor rjod /
240b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor khrag byug e khram steng // gtor chen khra gzong rtsang bcas dgu// rtse la stobs chen babyang sul gzugs// sbyor dngos las kyis gzhung bsrungs la// dpal dbu'i snying po sham bur bcas// so lnga'i drag sngags phung badzug pa zla// lci dang sgos
240b4(rnying rgyud): bzlog bcas// phur thun tshom bu bskul cing bzlog/ dus min 'chi lha sla bzlog/ lho tog sprin rdzid rdzogs byed pa// char pa 'bebs na klu yod sang // maN+Dal legs byas klu mchod bya// rjes su klu sman bgra ts+tsha sbyar// ril bu sgong 'dra ris gzhing
240b5(rnying rgyud): ril bu re la sngags stong stong // bzlas te chu mig khyab par gzhug/ oMn+ta ga phu/ pra tA badz+ra dun te/ me li mi li swA hA/ chur pho ba ya/ oM nA ga shu li ni swA hA/ char phob/ mang du bzlas pas gdon mi za// dka'i na gzir te dbab par bya// yongs su rdzogs pa'i
240b6(rnying rgyud): bsnyen phur la// rtsa sngags shram bur 'di bcas bzla// na mo bud+d+hA ya/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ nA ga rAdz+dzaSh+T+rIHt+taM/ me li mi li/ nA ga du hUM phaT/ char pho bi ye b+h+yo// khri tsho gcig sngags chu dmigs gzir// char pa chen po gdon mi za// zhes bka' stsal to//
240b7(rnying rgyud): dpalags ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ yongs rdzogs thu ni mog bskong ba'i rim pi ste so gsum pa'o// de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu rton pa kun tu bzang po dpa' che mcho ga he ru ka la gsol pa
241a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad ston brdzun tu bzang // thugs rje ma mchog nye su// dz+nyAn+ta mang las khyang las brgyad dang // sa rab shA dang char ngan gyis// mthog ma rnangs bsrungs thabs gang // de skad gsal bas bka' stsal ba// blan mang nyid
241a2(rnying rgyud): las khyad par brgyad// rig byed skye bdun de nyid dang // gi hang gur gum ki na ra// rgya tshwa pi ling tsher rgod thA// gapur dang sbyar sngags 'dis bstim// oM AHhUM/ sarba sid+d+hi sAd+ha hU~M/ khri bzlas ri lus las kun byed// rgyal rigs skye bdun snying gang mar/
241a3(rnying rgyud): ra mo shags kyis yang bzud sbyor ShA/ A~M AM A t+yat+tA re swA hA/ 'bum bzlas zos na mkha' la 'phur// rje rigs de nyid rta shar sbyar// bya rgod tshil la gsang sngags khri// oM AHhU~M/ dza bgr-id+ha mutrA rbad yaM/ rkang mthil byugs pas sa rnams gcod // nya tis rgya
241a4(rnying rgyud): thos rus sbal snying // sbrul mgo thog lcags bcud la skyer// oM AHhUM bag shi ta ki la d+ha ra ya/ 'bum brjod longs spyod gter rnams rnyed// 'dre mthong ku ku dkar mo'i snying // 'ug srin mig sbyar khye'u skyes zhos// legs sbyangs sngags 'dis mi
241a5(rnying rgyud): la byug/ oM AHhUM/ u lu tsak+Shudz+nyAn thol/ khri stong gis bsrub mngon shes 'char// lding nag khyi nying sog thi la dang // khA ta'i sgod du yungs kar sbyar// oM AHhU~M/ muM khAM hi shu/ bdun 'bum gyis bsrub gasder du dril// lce rdzir bcang sarba grib shing
241a6(rnying rgyud): thar ni lcags phyi sir tshur dang // sbyar rtse'i dngul chu mu zir sbyar// oM AHr+g+haM/ so na ga sa rbi le// stong tshe gsum gyis bsgrub skye bsreg/ lcags sa mazangs nyid gser du 'gyur// ku ku dkar mo sna dmar laM// khyi gu de 'dra skyes pa'i zho// rdo rigs gsu
241a7(rnying rgyud): dang mtsho chu dang // cong na brag zhun ra shag bcud// snyoms sbyar gser gyi bum par bsgrub// oM AHb+h+rUM a mi wa badz+ra A mr-i Nu ny+tsa b+h+rUM/ zla drug sngags zos drug brgya thub// de ltar las brgyad gang bsgrub kyang // rnal 'byor rdo rje sems dpar bsgom// thas
241a8(rnying rgyud): brang wa hA / dru/ ya
241b1(rnying rgyud): shes rdzas ldan ma lus 'grub// se rab gang bsrung yul da yi// lha srin yul lha thams cad la// mchod bstod phung gtor gsol kha b+ha// sang ldeng phur ba bcu dag la// rtsa sngags brgya bstim las sngags ni// ral stong bsti mgu gul bdug/
241b2(rnying rgyud): ba dun ta mi le me le/ phye shag phye shag swA hA/ mthob tu phrar par bcas te dgram// rab gnas byin brlab mchod pa bya// ser smin 'dus na yongs rdzogs bsgom// sngags bzlas lus gang ba mdza sa bya// sa rabs tshug pa mi 'gyur ro// chang ngan da
241b3(rnying rgyud): nig/ zhung dru shrI// gnod pa selan seng ldeng gis// phur pa sor brgyad lnga gsum la// rtsa sngags stong bsnyen las sngags 'di// khri'am 'bum bsti mgyog su bstim// na ma thud d+hA ya/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ nA ga duHn+te/ mi li mi li/ nA ga ni swAhA/ nA ga
241b4(rnying rgyud): du sa sa
241b5(rnying rgyud): dpal gsang ba'i dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las// khyad par gyi las chen brgyad bsgrub cing / shwa ser chung dam ga yongs rdzogs zlog thabs kyi loT sgo mo bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang
241b6(rnying rgyud): dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang // thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ tshe 'das rigs drug nas drang phyir// bdun tshigs 'dren pa yongs rdzogs gang // de skad ces gsol bka' stsal pa// tshe 'ad sa ngan
241b7(rnying rgyud): song gnas srung phyir// dkyil 'khor mchod rdzas bum pa stsogs// gsang sgrub chen po'i skabs bzhin te// dkyil 'khor lho ngos rigs drug gi// maN+Dal dbang stegra bcas pa dang // lha ba shos gtor madrug drug bsham// rten nam mtshan byang dri rten
242a1(rnying rgyud): dgod// bskyed rdzogs gzung bsrang 'ja brdzogs nas// tshe 'das dgug cing gshed dang dpral// rigs drug las byang gnas nas drang // khrus bya lan chags gtor ma gtang // mit+ta/ chos bshad dbang bsgyur bya// 'khor ba'i
242a2(rnying rgyud): 'brel bcad lam yang bstan// rgyas gdab dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo// mtshan byang bsregs la tsha tsha gdab// dkyil 'khor bsdus la rdzogs rim bsgom// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus brgyud kyi rgyal po las/ bdun tshig 'dren thabs yongs
242a3(rnying rgyud): kye le'u ste so lnga pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kyai kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang // thugs rje che mchog he rA ke/ dbyang chad 'byung
242a4(rnying rgyud): 'dus zhig pa'i ro// bag chags sbyang phyir bsreg thabs gang // de skad ces gsol bka' stsal pa// ro bsreg sbyong gi drim pa ni// sa bdag klu gnyen med pa'i phyogs// maN+Dal mda' gang 'dom gang bsham// 'dom gang nang du dkyil 'khor bzhed//
242a5(rnying rgyud): zur grwa bzhir ka bas bteg/ thog phub steng du bsreg khang ni// mda' gang gru bzhi gseng du bya// de nas phrin las rnam bzhi yi// thag bung steng nang gru gsum la// de steng zla gam gru bzhi zlum// shing rnams rim pa de bzhin brtsig/ de nas ro de khus byas la//
242a6(rnying rgyud): dgug dang gshed dpral rigs drug drang // bsreg khang ro gzhug gdugs gsum dbub// zur bzhir 'phan bzhi phyogs bzhir dang // rol mo'i bye brag kun gyis mchod// ro yi snying gar 'khor lo ni// pad+ma tshon spel brgya ldan la// dbus su yongs
242a7(rnying rgyud): rtsa sngags bri// bde 'dab rtsibs la yig brgya dgod// 'khor lo'i lte bar gzungs thag gdags// ting 'dzin sem+ba dpa' sum brtsegs bsgom// rtsa sngags yig brgyar bcas bzlas shing // spro bsdu sgo gsum sgrib pa skyeng // ro yi snying nang 'khor
242b1(rnying rgyud): ni// de bzhin bsgoms te lte ba yi// dpa' bo rigs lnga'i 'bru la la// me lce brgya 'bar gzung 'dzin gyi// bag chags rtog sgrib sbyang bar bsam// me nyid me lha yongs rdzogs kyi// lha rlabs mA ta mchod pa'i tshogs// gyi nang kun gyis mchod pa/
242b2(rnying rgyud): ma sbar bsreg rdzas nyung dkar dang // til dang shug ti zhun mar la// rtsa sngags yig brgya stong sngags te// oM swa b+hA wa ag+na ye/ ma ma sarba pA paM shA n+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ma ma sa rbakarma A wa ra na bi shud+d+he shrIn+tiM ku ru swa hA// dgang thug dag gis rim
242b3(rnying rgyud): mchod// las bzhi rdzogs nas bsta bya zhing // smon lam gdab cing dge bar b+h+yo// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po la la/ rab sreg bsnyen pa yongs rdzogs kyi li sti sa drug pa lnga// de nas yang 'dus pa
242b4(rnying rgyud): khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpa' che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa// 9/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang // thugs rje rje mcho ga he ru ka/ thabs ldan yun gyi rten gyur pa// tsha tsha ga dab thabs rim pa grang // zhe sde gsong
242b5(rnying rgyud): napas bka' stsal pa// de nas tshe tshe gdab ba ni// sbyor dngos rjes kyi tshogs te// sbyor ba skyabs 'gro sems skyed nas// dngos gzhi lha yin la 'byor pas// smin pa'i sa brkos spos chus sbyang // oM a sa me/ tri sa me/ ma hA sa me swA hA/ 'bi 'ab+hi
242b6(rnying rgyud): ma ldan chos kyi sku// d+harma kA ya A/ brko sa phor zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs/ oM sha~M d+ha ni sarba pA paM/ bi sho d+ha ne/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+ha sarba kar+m+ma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ de nas rtsa sngags brjod cing gangab// che tsha sprul skye 'gro don mdzad// oM
242b7(rnying rgyud): na k+Sha ya swA hA/ tiSh+Tha wAn zhes bzhugs su gsol// phyi ni gzhal yas ning yongs rdzogs// lha tshogs 'gro ba 'dul bar bsam// 'byung ba zhi gzhan la de bzhin gdab// des ni sku gsum lhun grub ste// ma grub bor du 'khor lo babyung // sa
243a1(rnying rgyud): sbyong rgyal chen nyid du 'gyur// ni rgyas dbang drag las bslab na// zhi ba'i brkos por zlum pa thogs// rtsa ba'i sngags dang 'di spel bzlas// oM badz+rag nika d+ha ga shrIn+tiM ku ru swAt+ma/ zhes gdab nad gdon rnamachog ni//
243a2(rnying rgyud): brkos phor gru bzhi thogs// rtsa 'di sngags la 'di spel ba zlas// sA rat+na kr-i ni ka che ge mo tra a~M ku ru swa ta/ zhes gdab tshe dbang 'byor drug rgyas// dbang gi brkom ro nag mthogs// 'i sngags oM 'di skal bzlas// a @
243a3(rnying rgyud): che ge mo ba shaM ku ru swA hA/ zhes gda' khams gsum dbang du spyad// drag po'i brkos phor zung gsum thogs// rtsa ba'i sngags la 'di spel banas/ karma da ni/ che mo mA ra ya phaT// bdung dang dgra bgegs kun char gtsang // da
243a4(rnying rgyud): ma bzhi'i mtshal// srog shing ya snying me tog dbul// yongs rdzogs lha dang gzhal yas khang // da kar ser dmar ldang 'od zer gyis// gang 'dul zhi byas dbang drag gi// sen las thams cad 'khyab par bsam// gal te tshe
243a5(rnying rgyud): na// rus pa'i phye ma 'dzem par sbyar// gang ba zhabs gson dang mthun pa la// gdab pa'i dmigs pa'adi dag gyung// di kanI/ nan n+dan/ d+hA mAn trA sa na/ tha ti tan pa ha na/ sa
243a6(rnying rgyud): na song gnas drangs brkos phror bstim// chos dbyings rgyas gdab rgyal sras su// rang shar 'gro don byed par bsam// na rag ngan seng dong lug 'gyur// de nas cha tshe gang yin par// rab gnas dam tshig mchod bstod la// ye she
243a7(rnying rgyud): drang mchod rten bstim// rten 'brel snying po brgya rtsa brgyad// nas la sngags ha rab tu bstim// phyag 'tshal phyi nang mchod par bral// yun gyi rten du gsol ba ga dang // bkra shis bsngo ba smon lam du// don ldan rten mchog 'di la 'a' /
243b1(rnying rgyud): byung na' mchog gi 'bras buthob// zhes bka'astsam to// dpal gsung ba 'dus brgyad kyi rgyal ba las/ ma rten gsun yongs rdzogs kyi rnams bdun pa'o// / nas yang 'das pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcigatuganapa na
243b2(rnying rgyud): mang po dpar tshe mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang // thugs rje che mchog he ru ka/ dmanyams log lta tshar gcang phyir// bsad mnan rlung 'khor rnam gsum gang // de skad ces gsol bka' stsal pa//
243b3(rnying rgyud): kyi tha ma la// sangs rgyas bstan la klu dgra dar // de tshe lag lta tshar gcod pa'i// bsad pa srog gi les skyong ni// dkyil 'khor mda' gang grubazhi'i dbus// khru ga dgu gsum 'brug khung nang // dgra bo du yod ling+ga ni// nal bu rgyal pa'i nang du d+ha
243b4(rnying rgyud): lte bar 'bri ru g.yas pa gzug/ lcags phur brgyad kyis tha ma bskor// skye tshe shad tshe thun gyi rdzas// 'bri ru na thugs sngags kyis thab// nal bu'i lte bar mi rkang gzud// nang nas thun sngags bcas pas brab// zhag grangs bdun gsum nyer ga cag
243b5(rnying rgyud): gri dang ma'i sngags rdo de 'dis// ma yengs sel med thog ltang 'phangs// mA ra ya thun b+h+yo/ A pra sib pre/ i nad phu ni/ i sa tra bo ri/ bin na bi na na/ a bud ti sad ta sad ta/ khrid ta khrid ta/ dag sngags bdun pa de bzlas pas// dgra bo dngas
243b6(rnying rgyud): nya mas/ khrid nas gsod// gsod mkhan nga yi gdan 'og gi// mu skyugs rab 'jigs kho na ste// bsad pa'i mthar thug de kho na// dgra bgegs mnan pa'i las sbyar ni// drag po'i sbyin bsreg thal ba dang // dgra ba'i zag rdzas dug chus smras// dgra
243b7(rnying rgyud): bgegs gzugs byas rgyab spyad la// 'gug 'dren byas la re bas grol// snying gar dug gi phur pa gdab// mnan sngags khri'am stong gis brubs// rgyal ma mchod rten the ma 'og tu// spyi tsher bcugs la tsha tshas mnan// dgra bgegs lcags khang po/
243b8(rnying rgyud): sngags 'di rnams dpe 'dra min med//
244a1(rnying rgyud): med brub// de nyid chu srin ge bar brda dA// ri rab 'og tu mnan par bsams// yongs rdzogs ca sngags sham thu r+ya// oM ma hUM li dgra bgrags gnod byed che ge mo kA ya thA katsi t+ta sa ma d+hA ya nan/ zhem bzlas phrin las
244a2(rnying rgyud): bzhis mnan// bskal pa'i mthar yang ldang mi srid// stobs ldan rlung gi las sbyor ni// ya thA rdo rje sems dpa' nas// ma tha the'u brang yan chod po// bsnyen bsgrub las sbyor stobs bskyed ni// bzlas brjod rlung la bcol bas 'grub// gang zag gnas
244a3(rnying rgyud): dus pun tshogs nas// grub thob bsnyen rdzogs pags pa la// 'khor lo rtsi bas bzhi mu khrung ni// bdun dang bcas pas bri bar bya// rtsibs bzhi dbus lngar phyag mtshan la// rigs lnga yab yums bon sngags// ming rul 'dod gsol bskar
244a4(rnying rgyud): bri// oM lA~M hUM muM sAnAM AM prA ha t+ne/ mu khyud dang por dbyangs yig ste// gnyis pa gas la byed sngags rten 'brel// kun gyi sham bur 'dod gsol gdags// gsum pa yongs rdzogs rtsa ba'i sngags// bzhi pa phan yang tshe sngags dgod/
244a5(rnying rgyud): lnga pa dam cad yaM shrIs pa// drug pa bka' srung 'jig rten pa// rtswa sngags sham bur phrin las bzhi// gang byed bsgrub cing dmod pa bri// bdun pa mtshon cha lnga yi gur// seng ldeng phur po'i srog shing la// dpal zung bzhi la zla gzug //
244a6(rnying rgyud): lha gzhon dar thog bri// rlung khang gru bzhi rlung hU~M can// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor gang byed kyang // sngags rnams bklag phyogs 'khor bar bya// dbang srud rgyas byed g.yon du bskor// bsad bzlog zhib kyi bskor shes// de la yang
244a7(rnying rgyud): chags bstim// gzung bsrung chags ga pa dang ba gnasaH// skabs skabs kun tu mnga' gso'anas// gang bsgrub bla na rlung gis bsgrub// 'di las rgyas 'bring rtsi bang bar// yongs su rdzogs dang bye brag la// gsang
244b1(rnying rgyud): gang bsgrub 'di skab ma sbyar// rlung stsogs 'byung bzhi'i las bcol 'grub// dper na nor bu rin chen 'dra// 'di ni gsang ba'i 'khrul 'khor yin// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ bsad mnan rlu
244b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor yongs rdzogs kyi le'u ste so brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po dpal che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang // thugs rje
244b3(rnying rgyud): mchog he ru ka/ 'jig rten ye shes gang bsgrubs kyang // skyog gzer kha bsgyur rim pa gad// de skad ces gsol bka' stsal pa// ye shes 'jig rten gang bsgrub kyang // srog sdom gzer bzhis ma thebs na// nam yang don med yug pas kyang
244b4(rnying rgyud): drung don rdzun gyi 'khrul 'khor yin// yongs rdzogs dpal gyi srog 'phrog thab so// gcig shes pas ni kun srog thob// dper na sgra gcan 'dzin gyis khas// nam mkha'i nyi ma gcig zin pas// chu bran stong gi nyi ma kun// ma bzung bar yang stong srog
244b5(rnying rgyud): thob// de phyir srog gi gzer bzhi gces// dben pa'i gnas su maN+Dal bsham// dbus su mtshan ldan ka pA lar// dpal chen sku gcig gsal bar dgod// bskyed rdzogs gzhung bsrang 'dzab rdzogs rjes// mi rtog bya bral so mar gnas// de nam
244b6(rnying rgyud): dpal gyi srog 'phrog thabs// ting 'dzin gzer dang snying po'i gzer// dgongs pa'i gzer dang 'phro 'du'i gzer// ting 'dzin gzer ni thod sku la// rtse gcig sems gzung yongs mi bya// yul gsum gyad du gyur pa dang // dpal ldan he ru dngos dang
244b7(rnying rgyud): mjal// bzlog pa he ru kas mi spyod// ting 'dzin mi 'gyur gzer med na// sku ni nams kyang mthong mi 'gyur// snying po sngags gzer yongs rdzogs kyi// gtso bo'i sngags dag mel med bzlas// thugs srog hU~M la rtsa sngags bskor// gsal ba'i 'phro 'du
245a1(rnying rgyud): srog sngags bkrung // de tshe pa 'byon lung yang ston// nus pa'i rtsal rdzogs carnams 'khor// sron snying bsnyen rdzogs gzar med na// lha dang ngam can 'char mi srang // dgongs pa'i gzer ni khro \u0f7f// yongs
245a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs dpal chen rang sems las// gud na med cing ru dra yang// log na med de rang gi sems// sems nyid stong pa chos kyi sku// gsal lam 'gags longs spyod rdzogs// sna tshogs rang shar sprul pa'i sku// snang ba yab la stong pa yum/
245a3(rnying rgyud): snang stong dbyer med ye shes sku// 'gyu dran rnam rtog bsam yas kyang // yongs su rdzogs pa dpal gyi 'khor// bsam gyis mi khyab yi sangs rgyas// rang bzhin nyid las g.yos pa med// dgongs pa mi 'gyur gzer med na// dpal chen grub kyang thun
245a4(rnying rgyud): las// mchog mi 'grub cing ru drar ga la// 'phro 'du'i gzer ni dmigs pa yi// bskur kha shes na 'dod dgur 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin gyi 'phro 'du yis// sems kyi nus brtsal rdzogs te// gang ltar bsam pa de ltar snang // sngags dang phyag rgya'i byin drang
245a5(rnying rgyud): mthus// zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod sogs// phan gnod las ka gang yang 'grub// dper na nor bu gcig nyid la// gsol mchod rkyen gyis bye brag tu// ji ltar 'dod pa so sor bskrang // 'phro 'du sna tshogs gzir med na// dmigs gtad gcig
245a6(rnying rgyud): la don mi 'grub// 'phro 'du'i las kha bsgyur shes na// the'u rang tha chung gcig kyang gis// phrin las tha~Mg med las kun 'grub// thams cad sems kyi cho 'phrul yin// kha basbyar gnad kyi man ngag 'di// yongs rdzogs dpal chen nye ru nas// 'gong po gro
245a7(rnying rgyud): rgyug yan chad po'i// ye shes 'jig rten gang na yang // gcig la brten rdzogs grub zab na// las kyi kha bsgyur gang yang 'grub// dper na lcags rdo ngar btul na// ga khrob mtshon cha cir bsgyur nyan// dza ma thul ba sngags yid kyang // ma bsgyur
245b1(rnying rgyud): kyi bajo mi brtag/ da phyir lha 'dre gcig bslab na// kha skar gang la zhugs kyang grub// dang pa che sred 'asgyur ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang drang // de yi bstan bslab yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rngas pasham// blang bar
245b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan ldan du// tshe chang tshe mar ri lu thAg/ kha ni tshe zan zlum pos bcad// de la gzungs zag btags byas la// yongs rdzogs rtsa ba'i sngags de la// tshe yaM yang snying 'di spel bzlas// A yuHla la sa~Md+d+ha hU~M a/ rtags dri kho la dang lung pa
245b3(rnying rgyud): 'byung // de ltar byung na tshe bstim la// tshe 'brang za zhing tshe tshang btud// de yis tshe bsring 'chi bskur 'gyur// rmongs po srid spel kha skar ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung // de yi bsten bsrub yongs rdzogs nas// 'di nyid gzhung bsrang maH
245b4(rnying rgyud): rdzas bsham// khyad par srin rdo khab len dang // bud med mnga' khras b+he ru dang // de rnams le brga na dar du gril// srog steng rtsa ba'i sngags de dang // srid spel yang snying 'di sbrel bzlas// pu tra A yAHpa la sid+d+hi trAM/ ra lug gang shing gta'

250b3(rnying rgyud): hUM la bstim// ro la drod dang ma dngas kyang 'byung // de nas ro dang kha sbyar te// rang rig hUM dang rlung du bcas// sna bug g.yas nas rtsal bskyed de// ro yi sna bug g.yon nang brgyud// ro yi snying gar hU~M gnas// yang yang bstim zhing brtan par
250b4(rnying rgyud): bya// de nas ro 'gul ldang zhing smra// grogs des bud chu mdar gyis gso// zhag grangs nyer gcig brtas su gzhug/ de nas bag chags mkhyen pa drad// rdzir dang 'dra bar gyur pa'i tshe// snga mo'i phung po bsreg spangs te// tsha tsha ma
250b5(rnying rgyud): bzhed par bya// khyad par bar do grod 'jug lnga// rang bzhin do ltos ting nge gnas// rmi lam mtshams sbyar skye 'chir bzla// srid pa bar dor las 'phro 'bud// ces bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pargyad kyi rgyal po las/ 'chi brtag
250b6(rnying rgyud): bslu 'pho ba grong 'jug yongs rdzogs su bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu ston pa kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka la gsol pa/ kye kye kye/ thams cad ston pa kun tu bzang // thugs
250b7(rnying rgyud): rje tshe mchog he ruka/ rgyud chen dgongs 'brel bstan 'tshal na// bcom ldan 'das dang bde gshegs gsang // thams cad kyis ni sku gsung thugs// gsang ba ye shes snying po dang // thams cad yongs rdzogs bsdus don gang //
251a1(rnying rgyud): zhes gsol snyan pas bka' stsal pa// / bdud rnams can 'ang lan tan ldan// bad bar gshegs pa'i tshul brjod na// gzung 'dzin nan mangs mi gnas da // 'bras bus gshegs bde bar gshegs/
251a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun khyab skye 'gag med// gnyis med skra ga sung thugs yin te/ gab zla sa ngas gsang des shes shang // sra bzhi mnyam grol snying po 'don// sbas dang sgras med ngan thams cad// rmad 'dir yangs rdzogs 'das pa'i don// @
251a3(rnying rgyud): pa yi bde bar gshegs// rang rig sems kyi chung 'dzegs// dbyer yongs su rdzogs zhes bya// zhes gsungs 'khor gyis yang gsol pa// dpal dang gsang ba 'dras pa gang // rgyang dang chen po rje swa hA// zhes gsal sman pas bas
251a4(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// mthar thag gnas skabs thams cad du// bde 'bras rang sha ngan byang dpal// thugs kyi dgangs pag ba pas gsang // don gyi snying po 'dus pas 'dus// phun sum tshogs pa'i phying de/ de las 'phags pa gzhan mang rtsa//
251a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs 'khor gyis yang gsol pa// ngo mtshar phran tshogs rgyud mchog gi// de ba gang yin nges tshig ci// dbye ba mthun dpe ldang tshang dang // dgos chad dang sbar mtshan 'dogs gang // zhes gsol ston pas bka' stsal pa// ngo bo rang rig
251a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes te// ma bcos ma bsgyur bslad pa med// skye 'gag rtag chad 'gro dang 'ong // yod med mtha' bral dbyer med pa'o// nges tshig 'bral cing mtshar med// dkrugs dang yangs rdzogs phun sum tshogs// dbye ba chog/ chung ngan rgyud do//
251a7(rnying rgyud): mthun dpa' din chen dra ba 'dra// ldang chad gleng rmugs dngos po brgya// bstan rim blta/ bsgom spyad 'bras dang // basbyin dang bsgrub chen dbang dmatshig/ mtha' rgyas man ngag la sngags pa// / gling gzhi nas bzung chud gtad par// dbu rnabs/
251b1(rnying rgyud): yangs su rdzogs par bstan// dgas chad dang sgrar mtshan dan ni// bdud bcom dpal ldan skyon grolangs// bcom ldan gral rgyud ces kyang bya// lam bde 'bras bu'i sar gshegs pas// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud du gsungs// snang /
251b2(rnying rgyud): stong gnyis med gnyis snang ston// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud ces bya// gab spras spros bral don gsal bas// spros bre la don gsal rgyud ces bya// rgyal bzhi khwa yongs rdzogs pas// yongs rdzogs chen po'i chung du gsungs// dpal
251b3(rnying rgyud): chen kun gyi gsang 'dus pas// dpal chen gsang 'dus rgyud ces bya// ma rig mun pa'i tshogs 'joms pas// nyi zla kha sbyor chung du gsungs// rigs drug 'khor ba dang spags pas// 'khor ba dod sngags rgyad ces bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi
251b4(rnying rgyud): dgongs 'dus pas// dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud du gsungs// bsnyen pa sgrub phrin las yongs rdzogs pas// phrin las yongs rdzogs rgyud ces bya/ gzhi lam 'bras bu'i gsang rdzogs pas// gsang ba yongs rdzogs rgyud du zang //
251b5(rnying rgyud): zhes bka' stsal te// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa chud kyi rgyal po las/ rgyud kyi dgos 'brel mtshan yongs rdzogs su bstan pa'i le'u ste zha gcig pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams mgrin gcig tu/ rab tu spo ba'i sems
251b6(rnying rgyud): kyis ston pa kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka la rdo rje glu yis bstod pa ni/ hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha/ ho ho ho// kye kye kye/ e ma ho hUM/ bcom ldan dpal chen che mchog mi bzad he ru ka/ chos sku skye med dbyings nas bzhengs nas kyang // gzugs sku rab 'jigs cha lugs
251b7(rnying rgyud): gtum rjem khro bor ston// sangs rgyas kun 'dus yan tan dbang phyug bdud 'i dul rgyal// gsang ba'i yum mchog khro mo gnam zhal bede chen sbyor ba'i yum// dus gsum bder gshegs rgyal ba ma lus kun 'dus bskyed mdzad ma// gnyis med mnyam sbyar
252a1(rnying rgyud): yan tan sna tshogs 'gro ba 'dul// che mchog yab yu ma rol pa'i sbrul phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM che mchog skra ni gshin rje gshed// me mchog gsung ni na mgrin dbang // ma mchog thugs ni dpal rdo rje// rje mcho g.yon tu
252a2(rnying rgyud): yangs rdzogs nyid// che mchog phrin las kI la yA// tshe mchog rbad gtong ma mo'igaH/ mchog rig 'din thod paHla// rje mchog phanya drags pa'i gtso// tshe mchog dmod pa sngags bdagag sa// tshe mchog skal ba sras mchog rdzogs/
252a3(rnying rgyud): chog bka' sbeng dum can ma// yongs rdzogs dpal chen 'khor bcas rnams// ye nas rang dang gnyis med phyir// gnyis med gus pas phyag 'tshal ba stod// ces mngon par bskrad do// dpal gsang ba 'dras pa rgyad bcal po las/
252a4(rnying rgyud): na pa kun tu bzang po chu mchog he ru ka la yongs rdzogs su bstod pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la/ ston pa kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka rab tu dgyes nas/ rdo rje zal gnon bde gshegs 'dus pa'i glu
252a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa/ hUMng ni che mcho ga he ru ka/ zhi khro bde gshegs yongs rdzogs su// rdo rje'i glu gcig gnam nas len// steng gi lha rnams zil gyis gnon// rdo rje'i glu gtsigs nas len// bla gtanas bdag 'il gyis gzhon// rdo rje'i gla gcig rtsigs
252a6(rnying rgyud): bcur sgrogs// phyogs spyod dregs pa zhabs 'og gzer// rdo rje'i glu skad tsor ngore// hUM gi 'brug sgra ldi ri ri// phaT kyis gnam lcags tshul le tshal// drag po'i pa shug glas khams gsum g.yo// shangs kyi TI sbas srid gsum sgrol// snyan nas 'brug skas
252a7(rnying rgyud): stang gas ma 'gengs// ljags las gleg 'bru bar srung khyab// spyan nas chu byung steng gsum la ze// zhal nas mcha gtsigs bdud bzhi sgrol// glu brang khor gsum tshams sa chem// glu khro' por gcig dang ba yis// gzugs med mu bzhi zil gyis gnon/
252b1(rnying rgyud): blo 'khor ga tus par ba yis// gzugs khams bcu bdun zil gyis gnon// gla zo 'khor gsum tha ma yis// 'dod khams nyi shu zil gyis gnon// rdo rje zil gnon gla bro yas// lha srin sde brgyad dbang du sdud// dregs pa'i tshogs rnams 'brab
252b2(rnying rgyud): tsang rgyal// rdo rje'i 'gros stabs chems se chem// khro bo'i gar skabs log ge log/ bro ni dregs pa bdud 'dul bro// glu ni khams gsum dbang sdud glu// tshig ni dond mo mtshon pa'i tshig/ zhabs g.yas thabs kyi bro brdungs pas// khro bo'i tshogs
252b3(rnying rgyud): dbang du sdud// zhabs g.yon shes rab bro brdungs pas// khro mo'i tshogs rnams dbang du spyad// g.yas g.yon thabs shes bro brdungs pas// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bri// dgra ni dum bur gtub pa'i bro// dam sri thal bar rnyog pa'i dri// hUM hUM hUM/ zhes chog
252b4(rnying rgyud): lha'i dre gas pa zil gyis gnon cing / tshar bcad de gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i 'khod rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ho 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// rdo rje 'dzin pa tshur nyon cig/ dgos 'dod de slong yid bzhin gyi/
252b5(rnying rgyud): rin chen lta bu'i rgyud chen mchog/ dpal chen gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud// snying nor yin no mig 'bras yin// theg pa yongs rdzogs rtsa rgyud 'di// gtams so gtad de thub par chongs// dam nyams rnams la shor srid do/ g.yos can
252b6(rnying rgyud): la shor srid do// snod med rnams la shor srid de// bstan pa'i snying 'di thub par srungs// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rgyud don yongs rdzogs 'khor la gtad pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o//
252b7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra gsung thugs gsang ba ye shes kyi snying pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing 'dus pa/ dpal gsang ba 'dus po rgyud kyi rgyal ba zhes byab uD+yan gyi mkhan po radz+ra sa b+ha was sgrar rang 'gyur du bsgyur badzu
253a1(rnying rgyud): danag por na sngags thams ca rtsa ba 'phung 'jud//
253a2(rnying rgyud): ga gi pa mam ma/ rgya ga skad du/ shweHtrA gra h+ya kA la tam+b+ha/ bad skad du/ dpal blags nag pa'i rgyud/ 'jam dpalagashin rje'i gshed la phrag 'tshal lo// 'di dang bdag gis thos pa 'dus gcigs/ 'dam pa la gtsun
253a3(rnying rgyud): gzed po snyamachog ya m+b+han+ta ka/ lha thugs gshen rje'i gnas du phred can pa gdum drag tsha la zhes bya ba na/ kyai khyod dpag tu med pa/ mang gi ser du snang ba/ logs g.yu nga sna ba/ rtsom gnam lhags sri mo snang ba/ 'khor rdzo gtams pa'i bang btags pa/ 'a da
253a4(rnying rgyud): na thugs kyi mug sul zheng grab/ rjod dung 'dam mad+ma 'grags pa/ mtshom tshan dang dang chen mchog sa mo 'dril gta ba/ bam chen gyi pa la cu srin gyi gzhunan/ 'khor la 'bar ba'i ga gdan can/ gdam lugs thog gi kyi 'jag/ za pa rtags pa
253a5(rnying rgyud): 'bur byung ba/ zhing chen pa'i blar dang / rma srin gyi rgya la mtshan dang / 'phan gdugs dang / dpal phyogs pa zhir bkram pa/ tsi tadapar po sbyin du gtibs pa/ rtsen mo'i sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ keng rdzas kyi dang zang dang / gnas lcags kyi 'ang ba zangs dang // 2nga
253a6(rnying rgyud): lo gzhi pa yas dang / ri sngags kyi da mdzad la sogs bdur srod kyi gnas stong mang ba/ nyi ma me she 'a dang / zla brgya shes dang / skar ma phra min gyi mthongs yod pa/ gzi' mar mang bas brgyan pa/ chen po'i dbas dang / rlung nag gi grib song da /
253a7(rnying rgyud): rus kyi ri rab dang / me ri'i rlabs yod pa/ mtha' lhags ri nag pos bskor ba de lta bu'i gnas de na/ dur khrod kyi robam pa mang po brtsegs pa/ mi gtsang bas yongs su gang ba rnam pa ro rul ba dang / phyed rul dang / bam pa dang / rnam par rul ba dmar ba/
253a8(rnying rgyud): rnam par bam pa dang / ra ngas pa dang / rnam par ngas pa dang / gang rdzas phred pa dang / chus paphrul ba dang / 'thams pa dang / rnam par 'khrums pa dang / langs pa dang / gnapa dang / brab pa dang / 'brel ba dang / drer khrod kyir la 'dral ba dang / gnas
253b1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / gtub cing 'tshed pa dang / ro la langs spang char sdang ba dang / drar khrod kyi bcas pa mnam pa dang / khrag dang / rnag dang / chu ser 'dzag pa dang / mi gtsang ba 'dag pa dang / da lta bu garnas dan stag dang / gzig dang / dam dang / drang dang bya ga dang / dang ka ma gyur dang /
253b2(rnying rgyud): gyan dag gshog rdebs dang / sbrang ki rdzi rnon dang / ce srung ro rngam khwa dang 'ug pa dang // ling du khwa dang srin bu ka ka ri/ de la sogs pa sha za khrag 'thung dang // rus pa 'cha' dang ldag myod byed pa dang // blta dang dgad dang du dang chongs 'debs// ku tse 'don zhing mtshang
253b3(rnying rgyud): rgal byed pa dang // drag po'i rkan rdebs ltas ngan skad sgrogs dang // gzugs mi sdug dang 'dzum pa'i mdangs ston dang // 'khor lo'i bro brdung lcags kyi mda' 'phen dang // bshugs pa'i gla len mi mgo'i dud 'gud dang // dar nag g.yab 'dor rang la rang khro dang /

253b5(rnying rgyud): ni// phyogs bcungs gsum bde gshegs 'khor rnams dang // phyogs snying gshin rje yab yum 'khor rnams dang // 'jig rten rlig byed gshin rje gshed bzhi dang // stong gsum mur par gtong bar pho bdud mo bdud dang // 'jig rten mes bsrag
253b6(rnying rgyud): btsan po btsan mo dang // skyo 'bog gtong bar byed pa'i ging gi 'khor tshogs dang // drag po gnam lcags 'bebs pa lha dang sman gyi 'khor// chu 'khyags khrag tu 'bebs pa khyab 'jug gza' yi 'khor dang // mngo nad dz+wa la gdug pa klu yi 'khor
253b7(rnying rgyud): dang // srog gcod spu gri thogs pa gnod sbyin 'khor tshogs dang // yams dang nad gtong ma mo'i 'khor tshogs dang // gzhan yang dri za'i rgyal po kha thun ra k+ka la sogs dri za'i 'khor sde dang // shan pa nag po la sogs gshin rje'i 'khor sde dang // nA gang la
254a1(rnying rgyud): lasags la ra thu dang // yanam ga gal sa gas nan rgyun d+hA / stong gsus su shul srod pa kham 'dubs la sogs mam 'dapar byu // tan bgashams gas du thum par lda ga// gra bra
254a2(rnying rgyud): gas na cegs sna nga// nyi la shegs byag dab da/ sbyi pa pa na me // radu ba tud pam ngas bsnas kyis ma dang / gzhanas 'a jugs stsal/
254a3(rnying rgyud): la ba yang rgyal gro// blon mod ni yang rnon mo// na mo dang ni g.yog pa gas// dadug mi migase la ze na yang // 'dra ba rnam bzhin nga gam/ bsgri ba can bzhi'i rna sa kyang chags// bas ma gyis ma khyabazung khrig bzugs/

254b1(rnying rgyud): srog bdag gnod sbyin dmar po dang // bdud kyi rgyal ba lkog dgu stan gcig dang // gzhan yang kod ci brag 'joms 'khor dag na// bdud kyi rgyal po stag thabs gnas// a ba glang mga' 'khor dag na/ bdud kyi rgyal po u 'bi gnas// rdzogs pa mgo dgra'i
254b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor dag na// bdud kyi rgyal po gur bdud dang // bdud kyi rgyal po 'jug med gnas// yab te yi 'khor dag na// bdud kyi rgyal po be'u log nag po dang // bdud kyi rgyal po nag po spyi ring gnas// tel ba'i 'khor dag na bdud kyi rgyal po glid bzhi yang bar gnas//
254b3(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor dag na bdud kyi rgyal po phye bdud dkar po dang // bdud kyi rgyal po phya bdud dmar po dang // bdud kyi rgyal po phye bdud ldang nag dang / bdud kyi rgyal po phye bdud nag po dang // bdud kyi rgyal po phya bdud sngon po dang // bdud kyi rgal pa phya bdud phud byed thug pa'i
254b4(rnying rgyud): can dang / bdud kha tod me 'bar dang / bdud mi lag spre'u'i mgo can dang / bdud rngam tshan mi lag dung gi rna cha gnas// ral pa tshar dgu'i 'khor na ba se'i skyes bu gdug pa can gnas/ stag mgo can gyi 'khor na klu bdud nag po sbrul gyi rgya ma can dang / gri rdo
254b5(rnying rgyud): ging gi pho nyabacu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje yang mdun gyis bltas te bka' nod pa'i tshul du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos khams gsum dbang du bsdus srid gesum zil gyis man/
254b6(rnying rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mun nag tu gtibs te/ thugs ye shes kyi rtse las 'khor lo'i tshogs dang gnam lcags kyi gzer dang / lcags kyu dang zhags pa'i tshogs dang / lcags sgrog gi tshogs dang / dril bu'i chags bsam gyis mi
254b7(rnying rgyud): khrab pa 'bros te/ smye hUM dang paT par dang ha la ta la dang / dzaHd+h+r-i ti/ e Ar l+r-iT drang bya nas 'brug sung gis s+tha dus gcig tu ldir btsam gyi sgra bsgrags nas dbang du bsdus pas rang gi 'khor rnams kya bred/ rab byed/ kun tu byed/ 'ad rab tu 'dang / kun
255a1(rnying rgyud): tu 'dang / sngangs rab tu sbyangs/ kun tu rab tu spangs nas thams cad bde ba la bkod do// 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po'i rlung las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste skabs dang po'o// / de'acha de'i dras rnga bcom ldan 'das
255a2(rnying rgyud): lamathu spobs kyi bdag po la sogs te/ gdug ba can gyi 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho 'jigs byed chen po lags// bdag cag gdug byeng 'khor rnams kun// snang srid 'ang
255a3(rnying rgyud): rten khams 'di ru// stong gsum mun par gtong ba dang // 'jig rten khams kun bsreg pa dang // log rtog 'jom dang gnam lcags bye// skyo 'bog yams nad srog gcod dang // mdze rigs gtong ba'i las 'di dag/ bdag cag rnams kyi rang las
255a4(rnying rgyud): lags// dpa' bo chen pos ci la bkyon// thugs rjes bred yang mi mnga' 'am// dpa' bo chen po khyod nyid ni// thugs rje byams pa'i mnga' bdag na// 'di lta'i cho 'phrul ci la ston// gdug pa'i gsung sgra ci la sgrog/ thugs rje'i sprul ba ci la 'gyed// 'a
255a5(rnying rgyud): byed chen pos bdag cag la// bka' 'bab myi 'tshal 'bangs su mchi// 'bangs la nan tan ma chung zhig/ ces brjod de/ so sor rang rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM a kro ta kA ya mAn+ta ka ya ma rA dz+wa la ri pa ya tAM/ ni k+Sho d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la raM d+haM/ ya trad+daka sha dz+ha
255a6(rnying rgyud): pa ya hUM/ ra rag mo kro d+ho ShA rI dzA la rdin+d+he/ oM a rak+Sha dz+wa la ra~M ba ya hUM/ rag mo kro d+hI shA rI dz+wa la r-I Nirbi N+yai/ oM tra trag bo dz+wa la raM pa yA hU~M phaT/ tsit+ta kro to la ko shwA rI dz+wa la ri ba ya d+h+waM/ aM ka shr-i ga ma ya d+hi rtsa ra ya dz+wa la ra~M hU~M/ oM nai ra ts+tsha ruHkro Sh+Na shwa d+hi ti ni dz+wa la raM/ oM d+ha
255a7(rnying rgyud): shwa rag dze dza la ribs hU~M/ oM shI tA li reb d+hI trA hrIdz+ri nA~M/ oM n+da tra gan ni dz+wa la ba ya~M trA~M/ oM tra r+thag mo shA br-i hU~M hU~M smr-i/ oM sar+b+ba hrI nAg padrug tra ga ni hU~M/ oM nAg thAkra d+d+he tsA hU~M/ oM man+t+ra shrI badz+ra ma r-i \u0f7fga na dz+wa la ra ba yahU~M/ oM drug mo rje 'a
255a8(rnying rgyud): sparnaMnas mo bakhrang/
255b1(rnying rgyud): pa ya dza~M/ zhes phyogs skyong gi gshin rje rnams kyis phul lo// rba trab tra ma khrag ngar khrag tsa pa ta yang bdun ta ba mA hA/ sa ma ya A ba Ta/ ru tsa rAk+Sha rbas pa aR+tha d+hi mA ra a ku sha dza dz+ra/ oM bi shal du ru ma shrI Sha dza la a ta swA hA/ hri shag ru rag ri nA ga tsi.A Sh+Tha ma ma long rdza
255b2(rnying rgyud): ha ha ga sha pa tshaHdzaH/ ma snying kha rag snying kha rag ma ma ra ga sha/ ma ma rag mo thun thun/ snying la thun dza dza/ snying la dza/ ru lu ru lu dza dza/ rA dzA sa ma ya dza hrI d+hi dza/ ra li pra ma ni hU~M hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ tri tri rA dza tsa pa la a shug me dza dza/ b+ha hra yag sha du ro tsa
255b3(rnying rgyud): ram trig be tshil ma khug yag sha thad ma thang me ya dza dza/ oM nA ga ra dzA ma hA kA lA ti pa tsas kha ma kha sha ru hUM dza dza/ nA ga rA dza dzaHdzaH/ de dag la sogs 'jig rten khams dag na// gnas pa'i lha dang lha ma yin// nam mkha' lding dang dri za dang // mi 'am tsi da
255b4(rnying rgyud): lto 'phye'i rigs// gnod sbyin srin po yi dwags dang // sha za 'byung po grul bum dang // srul po dang ni lus srul po// skem byed dang ni 'jigs byed dang // smyo byed dang ni grib gnon dang // gnon po dang ni nam gru dang // de dag la sogs 'khor na yang // sha za wag
255b5(rnying rgyud): 'thung bsam mi khyab// bka' nyan zer zhing srog snying ltal// gnas pa'i 'khor rnams mgrin gcig tu// thal mo sbyar nas gus phul ba// dur khrod me tog sna tshogs ni// srin po ro dang ro chung dang // mi ro dang ni rta ro dang // ro byed gzhogs ni phying ba dang // ro yi phreng ba po
255b6(rnying rgyud): brtsegs dang // bam dang rul dang rul ba bru la// b+han+da de bzhin sgal tshig ma dang // dbang po rkang dang rgyu ma dang // sha khrag la sogs tshil bu dang // go ro tsan la sogs te// gzhan yang ro yi rnam pa ni/ gya ma la sogs char du phab// lhan cig 'dug nas 'di skad
255b7(rnying rgyud): brjod// he te dpa' bo 'jigs byed gdor// bdag cag rnams kyi srog tig ste// dpa' bo lha rdzas bzhes su gsol// bdag cag rnams kyi rang lam dang // 'tshal skal 'dul skal gang lags pa// dpa' bo lha rjes bzhes su gsol// zhes gsol to// de ngas
256a1(rnying rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das 'digs byed rtson pas bdi skad rgyas bka la// rnaMH/ dAn dus gsum rnam par// thams cad ma lus 'dul ba'i bdag/ du yis bka' rnams kyad kyis nyung// sems nan ma lang rdzam byed// khrung
256a2(rnying rgyud): cag rnams kyi rang las ni// sangs rgyas spyan pa 'jig pa dang // chos 'khor 'joms pa'i rlung rnams// khyed kyi 'dul skal zas skal gyis// zhes bka' stsal to// bka' bzhin nyan par zhal gyis bzhes te/ rang dam rang gis bcas so// de'i tshe de
256a3(rnying rgyud): sa nimatha grus kyi dag dang rgyag gdan las gas/ dmacig ni thugs d+d+ha/ dus mgasas pa'i 'angs la bcugs nam cas gsapa te// 'dus sa lags sa ldan pa'i la / \u0f7f dus ga
256a4(rnying rgyud): da du// sems canan mas la gnod pa dang // 'dig rten khams sna gyu nam pa ta po// san pa'i 'khor du 'das nas kyang // rang 'di tshul bzhin paspang pa dang // las thabs bya ba gang yin pa// nga nyid du dpral bar gyis// zhes gsal
256a5(rnying rgyud): ge gnas su 'khod par gyur te// de nas dregs pa can gyi 'khor rnams kyis// e ma 'jigs byed chen po lags// bdag cag rang rang bsgrub pa dang // las dang bya thabs thams cad byung // bla mas mgon chen po nyid la 'brel// dpal chen po yis pazhes su
256a6(rnying rgyud): gsol// zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po dgyes pa chen por gyur te/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bka' yi phyogs slong gshin rje dang // gdug byed lha srin pho mo rnams// nyon cig khyod rnams
256a7(rnying rgyud): rjes da// ngas bsangs pa lasams rgyud kyi// das+yAng+yas gsum thams cad du// sems ca rnams la gdod pa dang // 'jig rten paras su spyor rnam pa bang // nga yed pa las ma'ada' tshwa// don sems ca thams cad kyad // 'ad
256b1(rnying rgyud): khyed kyang bde bar 'gyur// khyed kyi zas skal las thabs kyang // lnga brgya'i tha ma byung ba dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa mi gnas shing // chos nyid bden pas mi 'dul te// bstan pa thams cad nub pa dang // las ngan mtshams med pyod pa dang // zas ngan lhub
256b2(rnying rgyud): za ba dang // gos ngan dug hrul gyon pa dang // ma gshin bstun pa byung ba dang // mu stegs bstan pa dar ba'i tshe// khyed kyi zas skul thams cad kyang // dus der 'byung bar ngas bshad kyi// nga yid ma las ma 'da' zhig/ ces bka' stsal to// dpal zla gas
256b3(rnying rgyud): nag po'i rgyud las/ gleng bslang ba'i skabs te gnyis pa'o// / de nas phyogs skyong gi gshin rje rnams kyis thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i ched du/ bcom ldan 'das la phrin las zhi ba'i sgrub thabs 'di phral lo// rab tu dkar da'i yung
256b4(rnying rgyud): la// mgu ba'i sems dang ldan byas te// dad pas mgu ba'i las bya zhes// gshin rje gshed po nyid la phul// gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad zhi bar bya phyir du// sa gzhi gnas dang ri brag dkar /
256b5(rnying rgyud): nyams dga' bkra shis gnas// zhi ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// zlum po dkar ba'i dkyil 'khor bris// lte bar bcas pa'i rtsibs brgyad la// mkhas pas bsgrim ste dra bar bya// dkar dang ldan pa'i zla gam la// gcig dang gsum nas mgo btsugs nas// 'am
256b6(rnying rgyud): gsum rab tu mgu ba'i phyir// nyams su len par byas la bsgrub// dbus su ye shes bdag po la// shar du nag 'joms chen po ste// lho ru ya ba ti zhes bya// nub tu khrob rmig pa la// byang du bdud 'joms dgod par bya// shar lho lho rab nub byung dang // byang shar
256b7(rnying rgyud): su dag da ba ni// glang mag kong tse gcod spyong rje// las grub brgyad de go rim bzhin// steng 'og dmar po nag 'joms gnyis// yab yum gnyis med bris te dgod// zla ga ma gsum lam mo gsum// sgo bzhir sgo srung ma rnams bri// de ni yum dang bcas pa rnams
257a1(rnying rgyud): khro ba yab dang su mthun pa'o// sems dpa'i 'dug stangs gnas byas la// sgeg mgayon du brten byas la// sngags g.yag mangs pa tshogs par byas// mgu ba'i phrin las brtsam par byas// skye tshe thal brnyas pa la// dmaH/
257a2(rnying rgyud): la yi gzugs lta bur// byas pa'i snying gar bri ba ni// a mas la sid+d+hi 'am// gang 'dod pa yi ya ga de// phaT dang swA hA mda' ltar bya// ming byang gang ltar bris byas la// gang ltar 'tshams pa bzhin du gzhag/ de la 'di yad rab tu brjod// oM a kro badz+ra bAn tin+da
257a3(rnying rgyud): ga badz+ra swA hA/ oM a kro te ka shAn ting ba la tsu zhes brjod nas/ snying gar brgyab na thams cad mgu nas dadapa' sems kyis zhi bar gyur to// des ni zhi ba'i las byas zin nas phyogs bcu'i gdug bzhi par byas te/ bdag la mi dga' ba med na las 'grub pa yin no// dpal zla gas
257a4(rnying rgyud): nag po'i rgyud las/ thams cad zhi bar bslab pa'i skabs te gsum pa'o// / de nas phyogs skyong gi gshin rje rnams kyi phrin las rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs 'di/ thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i ched du/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed ga shrIn rje'i
257a5(rnying rgyud): gshed chen po la phrin las rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs phul/ rab tu ser zhing gser las grub// btsem 'dra ba'i dbyibs can la// dpal rgyas sems dang ldan byas la// rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis su// rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs bshad par mdzod// ces pa gshin rje
257a6(rnying rgyud): gshed la phul// gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cigazung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad byas par bya phyir du// sa gzhi gnas dang ri rab ser// gru bzhi khod snyoms bcom 'dra// rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis su// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa yi tshul/
257a7(rnying rgyud): ngos chag chag btab byas te// rnal 'byor dam pa blo ldan pas// thig ni gdab par rab tu btsam// gser las grub pa'i thig skud la// dpal dang gzi mdangs bsod nams tshogs// 'phel zhing rgyas pa'i sems dang chas// slob ma dam pa las grub par// bsams
257b1(rnying rgyud): rbeg ga par bya// degang gse mugs// tsog pa gso mas grug// grwa / rnams thugs las thob// nas nga dgas ldan pa// theg pa na da du gyur// mthu das pa b+hag byasan dgan// dam drags pabs yang ga/
257b2(rnying rgyud): rin chen spyi la krung 'dug byas la// rin chen rigs kyangs srub ste// dbus sugasang sngags padag po// rgyags phyogs sgo bdan pa rnams// tham bzhin du rloms nas kyang // rang dwagis skyes du da ba byed do// oM sa kr-itag su pa lan d+ha/ oM ma gro tas pa tan
257b3(rnying rgyud): ste/ zhes pas bdag po yang yamA la// 'khor bcas 'brir b.las bsam// rang reng bskyed pa dmang rtse// sngags dang ldan pa da 'dzin pas ma// gzug dang parta dang mthod pa dang // phyag bying ba la sogs pa yi// las kyi b+ha bam lus pa// thams cad ma lus
257b4(rnying rgyud): bya// bskyed dang grub pa'i 'bras bu ni// rgyas par bstan te thag ni ring / rang bub 'bras bud lags so// phyogs dus kun napa gshegs pa yis// dngas grub dam par ba la nas/ 'dren pa dba' bos yang dag bshad// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor
257b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin byas la// sa zhag gser las grub pa las/ gzugs ni dam pa rab tu bya/ phyir rgan gan rgyal mdan byas nas// trA~M praSh+Ta A yu Sha.AH/ snying gang bris nas brjod bya ba// snying po sngags kyi dam pa ste// bla med dam pas rab tu bshad// oM dz+ra bASh+Ti A yA la
257b6(rnying rgyud): na shrI ma~M Sh+T+r-i AhA/ brjod na thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ro// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i skabs te bzhing // / de nas yang phyogs sbyong gi gshin rje rnams kyis/ phrin las dbang gi sgrub zabs 'di// 'jigs
257b7(rnying rgyud): byed gzhin rje'i gshed pa la bral lo// rab tu dmar zhing zangs las grib// zangs las 'brel ba'i yul dag la/ rang dbang med par dbang bsdus nas// 'du ba'i sems dang ldan byas te// dbang gi dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod// ces po gshin rje gshed la phul
258a1(rnying rgyud): gshen dag shad pos bka' stsal ba// nyon rgyag nga shig rdol na// thams cad ba dang ba sgra nga bya// zangasas mdas pa'is dag la// skyel 'khor sam gong pa // / legs par yod sems na pa dang // thog sa
258a2(rnying rgyud): dung ca// rkeb pa mings byi pa/ kun thags nga gas ngas// da kyi gang ma thas bya sa// deg pa ladan pas sa// tham cad pa thams ga thugs// tsal bu yang thogs nags da// cis ni 'a dag ba das
258a3(rnying rgyud): bshad par byas te rab tu bstan// gzhan yang rab tu bshad bya ba// sems kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de// bla med yang dag nges pa'i lam// sangs rgyas byang chub la sogs rnams// gzhung las 'byung ba'i tshig don rnams// ma nor gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du/
258a4(rnying rgyud): bslab na 'grub par bshad pa'o// de dag dgug par 'gyur bas na// phal pa gzhan lta spos ci dgos// srung dang 'dren pa byang chub lam// 'di dag go 'phang thob bya'i phyir// nyung dkar rkang rjes sa 'am gzhan// khrag gsum thal ched bsres byas la// gzu'i nang
258a5(rnying rgyud): b+hasal// gzug nyis mi bskyang la// skud pa dmang po zangs la sogs// bcings nas bsdams te dam dkris nas// dkyil 'khor gyi ni thog tu gzhug/ nyung dkar zangs ni bsres byas te// dud pas gabud de la bdug/ de la bdug par gyur pa dang // bzang po'i
258a6(rnying rgyud): snying po brjod bya zheng // lan grangs khri tshad du ma ru// brjod na sangs rgyas la sogs rnams// 'gugs par gyur napal pa gzhan// smos ci dgos te nges par 'gugs// oM badz+ra a kro many+dzu thA ba shaM ma ho sarba ti la b+h+yAM/ lan grangs mang du brjod byas na// ji ltar bas ma pa
258a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'gugs// chu thug bkrum pa'i khra ba dang // mi yi lag pa'i khu ba gnyis// sngam bzhin du dgug byas na// 'grus par srung zhes dpa' bos bshad// yang na nga ga lag kyang ring // zhes gsungs pas thams cad ma lus pa dbang du 'dus pas dbang
258b1(rnying rgyud): phyogs thams cad nas// mtshol spang ma 'jub ltar 'dus te bdag gi dbang du gang labyu ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// zhes pa gshin rje gshed pos gsungs so// dpal bla gsang rtag po'i chud las/ thams cad dbang du grub bskabs te la ba'o// / de nas yang
258b2(rnying rgyud): stsogs skyong gi gshin je gshed rnams kyis phrin las drag po'i bsgrub pa 'di bzhin gshin rje gshed la phul lo// rab tu gnag cing gnam lcags 'dra// mon nag sog po khros pa'am// srin mo'i mdung rtse gshibs pa 'dra// khro bo chen po'i tshul can gyis// gdug pa'i
258b3(rnying rgyud): sems dang ldan byas te// drag po'i dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod// ces pa gshin rje gshed la phul// gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// phyogs skyong gshin rje ma lus kun// khro bo'i tshogs su 'dul mdzad de// pa bzhin
258b4(rnying rgyud): mthu chen 'di brjod do// 'byung med ye shes dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhen byas te// bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste// yum yang de bzhed de yi 'od// yab yum gnyis med byin rlabs las// thams cad shes rab 'dra 'dulas// byeg spang rgyam par
258b5(rnying rgyud): las byas// de ni las kyi thig ces bgyi// thig bzhe btab pas le'u tsher gu// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi ma khyud bcas// kun tu gru bzhi ga chad can// gru chad rgyan ldan dur khrod rgyan// mdzes par bris te gzhan du min// bsten pa'i lha rdo snga ma bzhin
258b6(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa'i sngags 'di brjod byas pas// bdag dang 'dra bar bskyed par bya// oM a kro te ka s+yAM sa badz+ra ba tA lA rAg sha man/ g+h+r-i g+h+nal+lA/ b+h+r-i b+h+yoH/ s+ya b+ha dz+dzaH/ hU~M b+h+yaH/ ts+tshits+tshaNAM d+h+yAr+d+hats+tsha dz+dzadz+dzaH/ dr-iH baM hoH/ d+h+r-in+ta n+yai d+ha dz+dzaH/ zhes brjod pa rtsom gyis 'ja
258b7(rnying rgyud): rten gyi khams 'di dag ga yos sa// rab tu kun tu g.yos so// rab tu kun tu ldeg go// rab kyi kun tu 'ang chem mo// dbus mthon mtha' dma'/ mtha' mthon dbus dma'/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
259a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i bdag nyid des 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das rab tu gsung gi gsang sngags gsungs pas bdag cag sgro lags so// 'jig rten du mthuldan 'di lta bral bdag zhub lags sa// de nas bcom ldan
259a2(rnying rgyud): 'das rang bzhin khro bar mdzad pa de la/ bdag mngon du sems can thams cad kyi don rab tu yang zhu bar 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen pos 'dul ba de mdzad pa des 'di skad ces gsungs so// oM shrI pa ra yak+Sha g+ha h+ya sarba ta ki badz+ra kA la rU pa mA ra ya phaT zhes
259a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs pas 'jig rten na dbang che ba dang / mthu che ba la sogs pa btul nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang // gsung du med pa'i chos nyid la// rang sems 'phro 'dur gyur pa las// phyogs bcur gsungs pa de dag yin// zhes
259a4(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ drag po'i sgrub thabs te thams cad btul nas tshe 'phrul bstan pa'i skabs te drug pa'o// // de nas nan tan bskyed byas te/ 'jig rten gshed pos drag po'i tsham rngams bshad par bya// 'jig rten bcud
259a5(rnying rgyud): kyi gdug pa kun// tsham rngams glog ltar 'gru ba las// ngo mtshar ya mtshan bsgrag par bya// e ma'o yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' dkyil nas// phyogs bcur 'phro ba byang chub sems// rigs kyi yab dang de bzhin btsun mo ni// rtag par bsgom ste de bzhin shes
259a6(rnying rgyud): par bya// rdzas dang phyag rgya sngags dang bcud rnams ni// gzugs dang 'dod pa'i 'bras bu gang 'dod 'grub par rol// mi dge bcu dang ldan pa yis// rnam par 'dren pa des byas te// sngags dang phyag rgya rdzas rnams dang // ga pu pad+ma dam pa dang // khams pa yi 'jim pa ni// khrag
259a7(rnying rgyud): sngagasum dang gi wang ngo // de dag phrin las mchog yin te// 'grub par 'gyur bar gdon me za// bla med dpa' bos yang dag gsungs// phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus kun// 'dul bar 'gyur te the tshom med// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ drag po'i skabs te
259b1(rnying rgyud): bdun pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'gal ba cham la 'bebs 'dod na// dur khrod lung dang mthun pa'i gnas// dgon pa lta bur song nas ni// thog mar bsod nams tshogs kyang bsag
259b2(rnying rgyud): phyir bshags 'bul la sogs pa gdon// tsha tsha nye 'don la sogs bya// ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya// bA gI shwa ri 'bru drug 'don// 'jam dpal mtshan ni yang dag pa// rtag tu gdon par da ma yang bca'// grub pa'i nyi ma gang yin la// bsod nams
259b3(rnying rgyud): tshogs ni ci nus bsag/ de nas drag po byed 'dod na// tha chung bzhi yi mar ngo la// maN+Dal gtsang ma dris byugs la// dka' thub drag po'i sdom pa byas// ku sha'i stan la 'dug nas ni// mgo bo rma bya bzhin du dgug/ ru rakra yi phrong ba bgrang // mgon po
259b4(rnying rgyud): nyid la gus byas te// sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa ni// yi ge bcu bdun nus thang gis// drug 'bum dag tu bzlas pa bya// de ni bsnyen pa dang po yin// phyes ni ri rab rtse mo la// gsum 'bum dag tu bzlas pa bya// de ni bsten pa gnyis pa yin// de nas dkyil 'khor gtsang ma'i steng /
259b5(rnying rgyud): wi'ungam dkyil 'khor gtsang ma'i steng // 'jam dpal sra gzugs ri mo'am// gzhug pa'i spyan sngar nyis 'gram bzlas// de ni bsnyen pa gsum pa ste// bye ba gcig 'bumathon pa dang // me tog la sogs mchod pa bya// phyi dang nang gi mchodan pas mchod// bstod pa la sogs kyi
259b6(rnying rgyud): rigs bya// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas rtags rnams 'byung // 'jam dpal sgra yi zhal 'dzum mam// rtags ni bzang po 'byung ba ni// dngos grub la sogs blang bar bya// de nas drag po'i sbyor la 'jug/ dur khrod ma la yar song la// mi sba ro tshal rab blangs te// khrag chen dag tu sdang
259b7(rnying rgyud): par bya// khrag sna tshogs kyi khu bas bkru// btsir la thal chen sa dkar gyis// mdog bsgyur phur bzhis brkyang la bskam// zla ba nag po'i chos drug nas// brtsams te phyi gtor la sogs gtong // mthog zug dbang gzug gser skyems gtong // srid pa'i lha 'dre sde brgyad la/
260a1(rnying rgyud): bden pa dang rgyab brten ma b+hed bsgo// tham dmar btab la khrag nag la// gshin rje'i drag sngags dag dang bsgrag/ sho rde'u dkar dag brdeg par bya'o// bsnyen pa'i snying po hrI t+taM bzlas// zla ba nag po'i chos drug ni// nyi shu gcig
260a2(rnying rgyud): dbu btsog nas// nyi shu drug ni tshun chad du// rus thang su ni bzlas pa bya// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ nyin phyed tshun tshod bzlas pa bya// mchod dang bstod pa la sogs bya// brkyangs pa'i ras chen blangs nas su// gzhan med sol 'thal
260a3(rnying rgyud): bganyis// kA na ka yi khu ba dang // pra rtsi sogs dang dug sna tshogs// til dang nyid dkar mar khri dang // rang gi smin lag khrag sna ni// rnyed na phyi sa ra khrag dang // ske tshes dkar tsan+dan dang // rgya skyegs ldo dngos yung bas bris// ma dag shin rnga'i lto bar ba rdzag
260a4(rnying rgyud): dbang ni chung ma'i snying gar bya// zhi ba tsan+d+ra'i dbus su bya// rgyas par 'dod na glang pos so// bde 'dod rta dang ma he'i 'phongs// bskrad 'dod rnga mo'i 'phongs su bskyon// lpags pa lug gi khog par bya// gnan pa ri rab 'og tu ba// so so'i rdzas dang las rnams ni/
260a5(rnying rgyud): rig pa can gyis shes par bya// gshin rje zla gsang dag po 'di// zla ba gsang bang sngags pa yin// phrin las bya ba'i rim pa ni// gsang ba'i lus su shes par bya// 'khor lo bca' ba'i rim pa ni// bslangs pa'i ras pa drug rtsigs pa// ma da lum dumar sa
260a6(rnying rgyud): dang // kha shog cag sna tshogs rnams la// rang gi srin lag khrag dang sbyad// sdug tshwa byas la bri bar bya// sdug gra bya dog thag pa'i sgo// mi grir shi ba'i skal yang // phyir la sogs pa bya bar gsungs// sgro rtsa sprad pa sdo mar bcing // 'a bor lo bri ba'i rim pa yang /
260a7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i las su shes par bya// 'khor lo ze nas smon lam gdab// rang gi a mr-i ta la sogs// mchod cing bstod pa pa sogs bya// bdag nyid ya mAng+ka kar bsgom// sku mdog skang zil nag po'am// chu rlangs nag po'i sprin dang 'dra// kham na ga pa
260b1(rnying rgyud): pasbyin du brdzas// skAr kham la sbyin ma ser// glog 'gyu smin ma shal bgrad pa// ljags 'grel tshems gtsigs gsus khyim che// lus dang yan lag nags dkris// ro nye kha nas 'jog kyang zlos// gdug pa'i mthon rgya sna tshogs 'dzin/
260b2(rnying rgyud): ltang cha bdag nyid bsgom// mkhas pas rang gi rag pas dpyad// thod pa 'og ma khri steng ngem// za ma tog gi khri steng gzhag/ steng ma'i thod pa sdug ma la// sngon dmar brgyangs la yas man gdab// nyi shu ba dun gyi sa drol// ke ma'i rib rtser shar na/
260b3(rnying rgyud): ljags bgo zhing bgrod dkar 'gro// dra rak+Sha yi phreng ba bgrang // dbyug to thogs la sdigs mdzub bsgred// phyag kyang mi 'tshal lam mi bzung // phrad na gang yin brlag par byed// sgra bcad byas te khri khri bzlas// rnal 'byor nang la gtam zer na// lag gi san yi
260b4(rnying rgyud): gdab par bya// skom dang zas ni 'dod pa'i phyir// lag gi brda yis blang bar bya// spras na rnal 'byor rang don zad// de yi phyir na lag brda' bya// de yi tshon 'di yang gdon// yA mA ra tsa sa do me ya che ge mo pra ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas dmar thag chad par /
260b5(rnying rgyud): khi bzlas pa bya ba yin// dmar thag chad nas sngags gzug bcad// phur bu gdab dang lcang dkar brdeg/ pho nya bcol bskul drag tu bya// mnyes dbang bcug tshongs gdab// nyin gnyis pa la 'di yang gdon// ya ma don Na yod la cheg mo ga tsar rje phas dam
260b6(rnying rgyud): sngags gzhug gcad// las kyi rim pa god dang 'dra// nyin gsam po la 'di yang gdon// ya ta yo na ra ya k+She ya che ge mo mur tsa ya hU~M phaT/ dmar thag chad nas sngags gzhug gcad// las kyi rim pa god dang 'dra// nyin bzhi pa la 'di yang 'don// yak+Shi ya r+d+han rna mA ya
260b7(rnying rgyud): zhig bA ra ya trU~M phaT// dus ni 'brug dang 'tshub sa mas gdab// gdags mig nyi shu rtsa ldani// mnan pa'i 'khor long gzug par bya// mnan pa'i gzugs ni ri ba bri// rbod parab chad nag po 'am// ngag dag glan pa bkram shes// nang du bcug pa ribang ze /
261a1(rnying rgyud): wA bang them pa'i dog dag gam// ro khang du tho bya N+ya gnan// gta pag shin rje nyid la ste// dang ni ral pa tshur dga'o// rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og d+ha ga nan// gnan par lha ni la pa cang dgra ste// rgya dag 'dra ba'i gzugs chen la/
261a2(rnying rgyud): ma he nag po dag la bskon// gshin rdo'i dbyug pa nag po thogs// de lta bu yi dngos po la// bdag gis ral gri'i phyag rgya bcas// sa gzhi chen po gshags nas ni// gshin rje yi ni lag tu gtad// ri rab chen po nyid kyis mnan// don yod zab pa'i
261a3(rnying rgyud): pho zang gdab// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ drag po bca' gzhi'i skabs te brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drag po'i las dag byed 'dod pas// yid 'ong mthun pa
261a4(rnying rgyud): gnas lam du// rnal 'byur mos dang dad pa yis// bla ma mnyes byas dbang dag mnos// lung dang man ga thob nas kyang // brtson 'gras chen pos myur du bsgrub// gnas dang gzungs ma dag dang ni// lha spyod ldan pa dag gis kyang // 'khor lo rgya dang
261a5(rnying rgyud): snag tsha'i chu// smyug gu'i rgyu dang dus phyogs dang // mkhas pas zla gsang rgyud nas bshad// drag po sa yi maN+Dal yang // bslad dang gzung dang bslang bsogs// mkhas pas zla gsang chud las so// drag po'i dkyil 'khor bri ba yang // thig g.yog mtshan ldan
261a6(rnying rgyud): gzungs mAl// bsu ti yaM thig dang thal chen tshon du dang // rgyu dang man ngag shes pas bya// shar dub d+mo dang phyogs dang mtshams// phyogs tshe rig pas blta bar bya// stegs pa 'dom gang gra bzhi la// nag cag gsum dang spang rdul yang // blugs rgyud las shes par bya// byin rlabs

261b1(rnying rgyud): ldan par bya// ya ma med k+She zhes bya// phyogs bzhi dbus kyi le'u tse// drag po sngags kyi yi ge dgod// bcu gnyis rtsibs dang ldan pa la// rA dzas do bzhi dag dgod// rA Na yo ni dag dang yang // ra ya tsa ni zhes pa ni// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la dgod par bya// thig skor
261b2(rnying rgyud): gsum pa dag la ni// bcu drug rtsibs dang ldan pa la// hrIHSh+T+r-iH'i sngags kyi yi ge dag/ bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel la dgod// rdo rje rna pa'i phyi rol du// sgo dang sgo khyud ldan pa bya// dbus ni drag po gru gsum gnag/ ling co bzhi ni phyogs dang sbyar// sa stong mdzes pa'i
261b3(rnying rgyud): tshon du gtang // bcu gnyis drag po bcu drug rgyas// rdo rje lcags la gru chad ljang // mtha' ma lcags ri sgo ni phyogs dang sbyar// gshin rje lha ni lho shar byang // bu don lho yi phyogs su dgram// sha khrag rdzas dang me tog sngo// lho yi phyogs nas dbul bar bya// drag
261b4(rnying rgyud): po rdzas kyi ga bu de// mnga' gsol dbang bskur byas nas kyang // dkyil 'khor steng du bzhugs su gsol// 'khor lo bcu gnyis rtse la yang // phur pa bcu gnyis rim gyis so// 'khor lo bcu drug rtse mo la// ke seng bcu drug phur pa dgod// sgo bzhi pase mo'i phur pa bzhi/
261b5(rnying rgyud): nyi shu rtsa brgyad rtsang la yang // dbang phyug mda' gsol bar khyams la'o// bsgrub bya'i dam rdzas gtor ma yang // bsgrub bya'i lha ste dpal la gcig/ bsnyen pa'i lha ste ya mAn+ta kar gcig/ las su gnyer ba'i lha ste nyi ma bzhi pa la gcig/ phrin las gnyer ba'i lha ste gri tho

263b2(rnying rgyud): yu ma rol pa mdzad pa dang // lhag pa'i byang chub sems nyid de// rdo rje'i lam nas rab byung ste// yum gyi mkha' la 'phros pa dang // de la b+h+rUM zhes brjod pa yis// byang sems hUM bsgril ba cur gyur te// mkha' las bton nas 'khor lo ye// rtsibs
