265b6(rnying rgyud): bskyed// ting 'dzin gnyis kyis rang rgyud dag sbyangs nas// rig pa'i ye shes yi ge mu rugasal// spro bsdus 'jam dpal sems dpa'i srung bskyed de// gong ma lta bu'i las dag bya ba ni// bsod nams tshogs kyi las dag go// rdo rje sems dpas rab tu sems la zhog
265b7(rnying rgyud): dpa' zlags nag po'i rgyud las/ bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag gi skabs te bcugasum pa'o// / de nasa'ang medapal ga shin rjes 'di snyed brjod do// yid 'thad mtshan ldan gnas dag tu// gong gi bsod napas tshogs la gnas pa yang // sbyi
266a1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba dag gi mtshams bcad nas// 'i khro la sogs bskang bshags dag par bya// de nas ting 'dzin rnam gsum sgra bsdu yis// bdag nyid gshin rje'i gshed kyi sgrar bskyed la// g.yon du yum bskyed mdun du sras mchog bskyed//
266a2(rnying rgyud): g.yas su yum bskyed ma tshogs dang rgyas te// srugs thugs kyi kyis brnab pa dang // ye shes med pa lda dpa gyur nas// ya shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor spyan nga nga// mchod stan la sogs rdzogs pa dang // bdag grags rgyag rnaM sa
266a3(rnying rgyud): lha mo bzhi// spos te spyan drangs phyag 'tshal gzug pa dang // mchod pa la sogs lha mo bzhis byas te// bzlas brjod bsnyen pa'i 'ang bgrangs dbul ba ni// rang rig ye shes gnas su dag pa'i rtags// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang // bcud kyi 'jig rten sa yi
266a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor// dbyings nyid gnyid mtha' med pa las// skye 'gro gzugs su snang ba las// gshed po yab dang yum du mgyur gang yang med// dper na til 'bru mar gyis gang ba bzhin// bdag nyid tsit+ta'i gzhal yas khang // rin chen gur phub 'dra ba ru// bdag nyid zla
266a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i maN+Dal bsam// rig pa'i ye shes yongs su grub pa'i rtags// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang gsal bar bsgom// thugs kar rdo rje rtse lnga bsam// de yi bum pa dag la yang // sngags kyi sa bon yi ge hUM// de mtha' bcu bdun bskor bar bsgom// lha rnams
266a6(rnying rgyud): zags kar de bzhin ci 'drang bsgom// de nas bdag rnyed thugs kanas// sngags bzlas sngags skye bsngags 'thos pas// 'dum gang pha rol gyin char du// sgra rnams pa mor gyur nas kyang // de dag zhal nas gas sngags bzlas pa las// 'od bar mchod pa
266a7(rnying rgyud): dang sbyi mor byung // par 'gros 'phags pa rnams pa 'di zer ros// skrag sung thugs nyid mnyis pa'i mdzad pa 'phrul// 'od par de dag pa dag la chung 'dus pas// sgeg sung thugs kyi byi rlabs bdag la thim par bsam// de sbyar ba sbyin pajug 'bras byas pa ni// sngon du
266b1(rnying rgyud): stanapa sa/ phagan // smra zugs pa nas/ byas na pa gru sa 'a pa dpa// dasu sa na da pas gsus pa// 'a
266b2(rnying rgyud): gnas dgas// maN+Da ma chag cag legs btab la// me tog kris sgral tshogs pa nas kyang // gang ma lta 'i bsnyen pa gras sa 'bas bzlas pa ni// nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin zhes gshed ngos bshad// dpa yang gi seng dag pa'i rgud pas/ gang ba
266b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i skabs te 'aco lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin de gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// yid 'thad mtshan ldan gnas dag tu// gong ma'i las rnams mthar gyung ste// nye bsnyen las la gnas nas kyang // des ni rtags pa
266b4(rnying rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur// grub pa'i rtags ni byung ba dang // khyad par dngos grub rdzas bsags te// dam ser ba yi 'o ma dang // mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyang ba dang // dngos grub rdzas rnams bkod nas kyang // bdag gi thugs las 'od zer phang 'phros pas// bde bar
266b5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs dam bsngal// bris spu dngos grub rdzas la thim bsams shing // 'bum phrag gcig gi bzlas pa bya'o// g.yal dang sbrid pa brgyad bskum gnyid kyang spang // de bzhin spangs pas ni bsam 'grub ces bshad// dpal blags
266b6(rnying rgyud): dag po'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa chen po'i skabs te bcu drug pa'o// / de nas yang gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cigazung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// ngas gsungs pa la sems thung cig/ yid 'thad mtshan ldan gnas dag
266b7(rnying rgyud): 'bram thag gcig gi bsnyen pa yang // snga ma'i las su bya par gsungs// bdag nyid gsheng po'i mthu ldan pas// mdun gyi ri rab bsam pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bsam byas te// bdag gi thugs kar yi ge ya// nag po ma 'dra 'od 'a4
267a1(rnying rgyud): bsam// de mthar bzlas pa'i yig 'brus bskor bsam la// de bzhin bdag gi thugs ka nas// sngags ni rab tu bzlas pa las// 'od 'phros las kyi gshin rje la// de yi 'od zer phog gyur pas// thugs dam bskul nas
267a2(rnying rgyud): dngar cig kyang // 'dug pa'i dbang med 'od bar 'gyur// gshed po'i bka' nyan gsung sdod bsam// las la sbyor ba'i bsnyen pa ste// 'chi bdag las kyi gshin rje rnams// gnas su gtong ba gshed pos bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'chi bdag
267a3(rnying rgyud): bdud dang gshin rje'i bsnyen pa'i skabs te bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// gsad pa las kyi bskyen pa ni// yid 'thad mtshan ldan gnas dag pa// gong gi
267a4(rnying rgyud): las la gnas byas te// de yang 'chi bdag bsnyen pa ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis dril za bzla zhes bshad// las la sbyor ka'i dus de ru// sna la ro tshes ras btsal te// mas yang bgrang ba'i tshes brgyad dam// nyi shu gnyis kyi nub mo ni// dur khrod gling nag ras blangs la//
267a5(rnying rgyud): gsum du bajug byas la// 'chi bdag gshin rjo de la ga stem// yab phram las la sgo ka ye// sngags 'di nyid kyang rab tu bzlas// oM sa ma ya man+ta thA/ a kro te kA kA la dA pa hUM phaT/ ces bzlas la// nyi shu drug gi snga drol// ro ras bkru dang brgyad kyad bya// haM phye /
267a6(rnying rgyud): chad skrag com nye// dbang du bsdu ba'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM du man+ta kar tI Ta phaT/ ces brjod/ stag tse mnye ba'i las zin nas// de bzhin dgang kA 'khor lo bri// bri ba zin nas lhar phyag 'tshal// bka' bden pa 'grub par gyur cig ces bya// yang na dra rjod
267a7(rnying rgyud): ras med na// thod padag la 'khor lo bre// a ga tse ngos su 'chi bdag gzugs bres la// gzugs kyi snying gar ming byang bris// dgra yi ming rus thod par gzhug/ 'khor lo dbus kyi ya las kyang // 'chi bdag gshed po'i sku ru bskyed// phyogs kyis
267b1(rnying rgyud): ma me de k+She// bzhi las gshed bzho'i spar bskyed pas// bdag gi mdun du ri rab las// gser gyi ri bdun bcas pa bsam// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed po yi// rnal 'byor cha byad ldan byas la// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong yang // chang bar bcug la
267b2(rnying rgyud): con bsam// ri rab bdag gi spyir brdeg ste// ri rab rgya gramags par bas ma// de bzhin sngags 'di rab tu brjod// oM na mo bud+ha d+harma sa g+he b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga ta kro d+ha bi dzA ya ag+ni dz+wa la ni dza tra pr-i ta shi ya hUM hUM phaT phaT ces brjod pas// ri rab rgya kram gshag bas
267b3(rnying rgyud): zhing // gnas kyi gshin rje 'gugs bsam zhing // thugs ka'i yi ge ya nag po// tha ma dbang sdud sngags kyis bskor ba las// 'od zer 'phros pas 'og phyogs su// 'chi bdag gshin rje gtso bo 'khor// 'bum phrag bcas la 'od phog pas// rang dbang med par
267b4(rnying rgyud): de bkug nas// de la sha khrag sna tshogs kyis// gtor ma rdzas kyis mchod par bya// b+han+da 'drub khrid nang bcug la// dbang du bsdu ba'i sngags bzlas la// bdag las 'phros pa'i gshed po dang // grangs med 'phros pas 'chi bdag tshogs// rang dbang me dpa rabatug
267b5(rnying rgyud): byas te// zod pa'i nang du bcug pa la// zhabs g.yas rdo rje'i phur ba yis// gzir bas skad ngan 'a dod 'dod// rang dbang med par dbang du bsdus// bka' nyan ci gsungs brjod par bsgom// skya rengs dang po shar ba la// 'chi bdag gshin rje 'khor bcas pa/
267b6(rnying rgyud): gtor ma byin te gshin rje nyid// pho nyar bkye la dgra po dgug/ lha dang dpral la sogs pa bya// nyi ma rtse la shar ba dang // b+han+da dkyil 'khor gru gsum steng du bzhag/ de bzhin bsad pa'i sngags bzlas te// bdag nyid thugs kar yi ge ya// sngon ga gnag le 'tsher bangasam
267b7(rnying rgyud): madrag sngags 'bru bdun pa// me lce 'bar ba 'dra ba bsam// gsang pa las kyi sngags 'di bzlas// m-i ny+dzi d+hIHpo kr-i t+panan che ga mo shatr-i nA sha ya hU~M phaT/ ya ma rA ngos do ma ya tsog mo a mu kaM pra ma ya hUM / brjod pam/ 'od par bdag la pog gyur pas// nga dbang med par bsrung gyur dang /
268a1(rnying rgyud): gshed po ya ma rA dza bskul// de yis phyogs skyong gshin rje bskul// de yis ma mo mkha' 'gro dang // rdo rje ging pho ging mo dang // bdud la sogs pa dbang med bskul// de bzhin gzas po dngos bkug nas// thod par bcug ste gnas
268a2(rnying rgyud): pa las// gsang ba las kyi sngags bzlas pas// star tshan rtsi spur mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam// dgong gi dmar thag chad pa dang // gshed chen ya ma rA dza la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma bshams// be con phyag rgya bcas nas kyang //
268a3(rnying rgyud): gnag pa'i spyi bor de brgyab pas// tshangs pa'i rtsa bcad mgo 'khor bsam// nyi shar rtse nas las brtsams te// bdag nyid thugs kar yi ge ya// 'bru bdun me ri 'bar bar bskor// gsad pa las kyi sngags 'di bzlas// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i tA na na che ge mo sha truM na sha ya hA
268a4(rnying rgyud): phaT/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ che ge mo a mu kaM mur tsa ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ 'od zer bdag la phog gyur pas// rang dbang med par bskul nas kyang // de yis myos byed 'bar ba bskul// de yis phyogs skyong gshin rje bskul// de bzhi ni ma mo mkha' 'gro dang // gong bdud
268a5(rnying rgyud): 'dug pa'i dbang med bskul// de bzhin dmigs pa'i dngos bkug nas// 'dug pa'i dbang med thod par bcug/ gsad pa las kyi sngags bzlas pas// stang tshan rtsi spur mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam// de bzhin dmar thag chad pa dang // gshed po myos
268a6(rnying rgyud): byed 'bar ba la// mnyes pa'i sha khrag gtor ma sbyin// gshed la bcol bskul drag tu bya// phyag rgya gong bzhin bcas nas kyang // be con lte bar brgyab pas ni// lus brgya la yid 'khrugs 'chi bar bsam// bdag gi thugs ka'i ya nag po// drag sngags bdun gyis
268a7(rnying rgyud): bskor ba la// gsang pa las kyi sngags bzlas te/ oM hrIHhrIHbikr-i tA na na sha trUM nA sha ya hUM phaT/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She ya che ge mo a mu kaM rak+ta tsa ra ya hUM phaT/ 'od zer bdag la phog gyur pas// rang dbang med par bskul nas kyang // gshed chen Ad+ya ma ru bskul// de yis
268b1(rnying rgyud): kAs skyong gshin rnga bskal// de bzhin ma ma mkha' 'gro dang // gling dang gang mo bdud la sogs// 'dug pa dbang mad bskul bar bsam// da yi gzas pa pa bkug nas// dbang mad zad par bcug par bsam// gsang ba las kya sngags darnas sa
268b2(rnying rgyud): dzan+da rtsi spud mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam// de bzhin dmar thag chad pa dang // gshed chan Ar+g+ha ma ru le// sha khrag mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'bral// be tson mgrin par brgyab pa yi// khrag tsar lcag gis song bang ba // bdag gi
268b3(rnying rgyud): yi ge ya// drag sngags 'bru bdun bskong ba la// gsang pa las kyi sngags bzlas te/ oM ts+tshit+kaN ba~M kr-itAn nA sha trU~M nA sha ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sh+me ya dz+nyA ni d+ha ma ya/ cheg mo a mu ki mA ra ya h+ne phaT/ ces brjod pas/ 'od zer 'dag la phog kyang pas/
268b4(rnying rgyud): par bskul nas kyang // de yis ral po tshar dgu bskul// de yis phyogs stong gshin rje bsgral// de bzhin ma mo mkha' 'gro dang // gang po gar mo bdud la sogs// dadug pa'i dbang med bsngal bar bsam// gzas pa bkrag nas thod par bajug/ rnyeng
268b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sngags bzlas pas// skar tshan rtsi slar mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam// dgang ka'i dmar thag chad pa dang // gshed rngan ral pa tshad dgul// sha khrag sna rdzogs gtor ma sbyin// drug po'i phrin las bcol baphrul bya// de bzhin
268b6(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya yis// snying gar brgyab pas srog bcad nas// dbugs kun gyi la gyung bar bsam// gsad pa mA ra'i man ngag 'di// gshi rje gshed po bdag gis kyang // thugs kyi sbom bu kha phye nas// rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod la gyos// dpal zla gsang dag mo
268b7(rnying rgyud): rmu las/ gsang ba las kyi bsnyen pa'i skabs te brjobargyang po// / denas ma skabs kyi bden pa lagardordo rjes 'di skad ces gapa sa te// pa' bldan pa jigs byed gshan// drag pa gas pa'i 'khong // spyod pa da dpa
269a1(rnying rgyud): gas// sa shAgag na pa du// dru ban ma nga ma ldanan// 'das la 'du pas// nags rnamal d+ha// marnas pa brnyan pas na dgapa// dpa ma
269a2(rnying rgyud): 'debs pa'i sngags ni gang la bgyi// sdebs pa'i grogs ni gang la bgyi// rno ba'i ngar ni gang la bgyi// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' stsol cig/ gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad brjod// nyon cigazung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// drag po gsang ba'i 'khor lo la//
269a3(rnying rgyud): na
269a4(rnying rgyud): zheng drug shul spyod// lha spyod bsgrub pa ldan pa yi// dbang rtul can gyi rnal 'byor pas// bstan pa gnyen po bsrung don du// dgon pa chen po gnas mal der// bya byed zang zing 'du lo sbyad // 'tsho ba'i yo byad dpags te bstar// b+ha ba thams cad rjen nas ni//
269a5(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa de// ting 'dzin gsal dang brtan pa yi// lha yi rnal 'byor rtse gcig bya// thun mong dam tshig bsrung zhing bsgrub// khyad par dam tshig spyod cing dor// bsnyen bsgrub phrin las gzhung bzhin bya// tshang zhing rdzogs pa'i grangs bsnyen
269a6(rnying rgyud): la// 'khor zhing phyin pa dus bsnyen yin// mthong ngam thos sam nyams su len// mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang // zhi rgyas gnyis kyi 'khor los mchod// dbang drag gnyis kyi 'khor los mnan// zhi rgyas gnyis kyi bsrung phan gdags// dbang drag gnyis kyis bsgral bar bya//
269b1(rnying rgyud): dadu ma gdan pa sna sa/ sma ga ga sa / klas // sa dang / nga// na mas sa/ shA dun na sa
269b2(rnying rgyud): su dag
269b3(rnying rgyud): dal bang rnam pa gyus te/ glegs ma shes// dgas sa pa'i mdzina'i de / 'di rkyen dag di byu sa// thabang drab nga ba da'o// dper gro' bang sag byu dang// ga dang
269b4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ma // zhing tshang 'asogs// lamang 'thas pa'i mtshan nyid de// thags bral pa'i se mas na// nyin ma bab tu sbyin rji 'di sa// ba ba 'arlab pa thub pa// sems paskyed pa dang byu dkro zhing // ma gas
269b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan/ ma tho byed// de las rnam pa gzhan du yang // 'ding rgyal dang spang ba dang // dang gang dbang du thub dang // dbye ba blang dgrag dang sto pag dang // gsang dang gnan pa la sogs pa// de'i rkyen dang stsol pa dang // dras dang las thazas byed pa yi// 'be
269b6(rnying rgyud): gling bskyod pargyas pa'i// 'khor zhing gcod cing 'bigs pa dang // bdur dang 'bral zhing ldad byed da// glezhi pazhing gnan nyid 'dregs pa dang / jug cing rnam par 'joms par byed// las dang srid pa'i mabar yon// lus kyi 'dzin pas srid par 'dzod//
269b7(rnying rgyud): rkyen 'grol 'jig rten bskyed// nyon mongs las dang drug bsngal gyi// rnam pa gsum dnga'i bor zhing gro// 'das dang daltar gnas pa dang // 'byu dang mi 'angs kyis 'byung dang // skad kyi 'byung ba'i rdzun gyis na// skad cig ma yi tshun gyis 'khod// de can
270a1(rnying rgyud): dmadan rnams pa// dbyung dukun san b+ha zla ba las// bskul pa rnam 'khor zho sa// bangs cag nam grangs sa// 'azhar ma'adang gagan bstan pa yin// bdag shugs bkang lag bang// nga dag dang/
270a2(rnying rgyud): po dag poH// ye dwags grong khyer btsam thas la// snrel zong ma su ma rga zad 'angs// yi dwags gos la khram thos te// dbyibs ni zla ba lta ste// spen nas yongs su zlum pa ste// rim pa gsum ldan me dag/ bcu gnyis 'ang drags
270a3(rnying rgyud): sa // mye gdang bcwa gnyis la// ban+d+ha badren la sogs sngags kyis mangs/ 'di lta bral 'khar yin// sbyin rtsa lag gi bcings pa sa// mig pa'i shes pa ldan pa dus// rgyu mthun mtshan ma'i 'khor lo pa// man ngag cad kyi la 'byong ba
270a4(rnying rgyud): ba nga drug pa gags nas / ma rnam pa'i migs pa'o// kyi gan pa ny-ig 'ams hU~M// thugs ga zhag tu mar// b+hA bar ka la lags pas// bdag ci 'di snyas pa byed pa/ bzeng chug cang 'ad pa dang // 'ad byeng gsod
270a5(rnying rgyud): des y-igs// gangs dam gas// mag pa smra swA~M sa kAnas mad// klu dgag gang dag nga dz+ra/ bdag nyid pas ma pa brnal gyisaldan sa rdzas sa pa la// khyum dge dang nag dang // rnam khye
270a6(rnying rgyud): sa/ klub da ga de// dgrag can mas gdas bad gzugs / na drug ste/ ba ga zugs sa pa/ dag pa gas kyis pag ra/
270a7(rnying rgyud): mye// seMn nga ba thag rmugs pa// rgya bang mya ga mas// drug pa'ims rnams rdzogs me // sa mang ma ma// sa dag pa mas bad sa// thabs pams sa rgyas lnga// sras pa gas nas gang ga tu /
270b1(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa cha dang bajug pa'i / 'jaman
270b2(rnying rgyud): ral ma yi zhabs mas gril// yi dwags grong ngam sme btsog khyim// mchod rten 'gag ma lha khang sgo// rgya mtsho'i 'gram mam lung mdang // rdol de rab gzugs zas la// stang du la dang dz+ha la sa mnan// gshin tshe'i lag tu gtad khram thu// thun pa brgyad pa
270b3(rnying rgyud): brdab par bya// spos pa drug pu ni lkugs pa kha// nye ma dang po'i thun gyis mnan// gzer ba mda' thun badz+ral gzer// nyi ma gnyis pa'i thun gyis zab// lhags pa khrag thun myos pa phur// nyi ma gsum pa'i thun gyis zab// gsang banyung nags mtshan// nyi mngan
270b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i thun gyis mnan// mtshon ngan thod pa khrag gis byug/ khrag sdu drug sna sngar byas nas// shan dmar dug phyogs dug thun bzlas// glen lcags thod pa'i kha than te// lugs mda' lcags gzhu mda' thun bzlas// gri po'i thod par mtshan brdar pa'o// mthis nad
270b5(rnying rgyud): thod par sa ser gsed// gla ba gsar thun sngags kyis so// spro ba'i thod pa khrag thun dang // spros pa zhung thun bzlas pa bya// rabs chad thod pa nyung thun dang // sa tshon thun du shes par bya// chu shel sgron ma rlabs po che// lkugs pa mon mo'i lag g.yabs kyi// srid
270b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dmag dpung ra mda' bzlog/ ya ma rA dza'i g.yab kyis g.yab// gsur dang sme ba'i dung pas bdug/ gcer bu spyi tsug ngu 'bod bya// mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag tu// gzer gnon drag po'i mngon spyod bya// drag po'i thun sngags kha nas bzlas/
270b7(rnying rgyud): khrung thun ya rbad na thun ya zad phung br-i na ya/ khrag thun ya rbad/ dang po dang lo lo gyi gye/ srog la yaM yaM snying la thun/ kha brgyad thun yang brdeg par bya// lha srin sde brgyad la sogs pa'i// srid pa'i dmag dpung phab nas ni// drang srong dmod pa'i ljags zor dang // sna
270b8(rnying rgyud): tshogs sngags kyi sbyor ba dang // lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pas bya// khru gang gru bzhi zabs yod par// ga bu rdzas kyi sbyar bde// 'byung po'i gtor ma gshin rnga la// byin la lag tu gtad kham bya// rang gi yi dam bsgom bya zhing // byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma ni//
271a1(rnying rgyud): sa sros tshon lho phyogs gtang // sgrol ba'i drag sngags brnag pa'i lung // bstan pa bsrung ba gnan pa'i gter// phrin las drag po sngags kyi mtshon// 'khor lo phun sdebs sgrol ba'i 'gyor// rdo rje sems dpa' gzungs shing tsha
271a2(rnying rgyud): dpal zla gsang nag po'i chud las/ 'khor la thun sdebs kyi skabs te bcu dag pa'o// / de nas gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad brjod// bstan pa srung ba brnag pa'i lung // thugs kyi man dag sngags zor mchog/ sgrol ba 'phrin las
271a3(rnying rgyud): thabs su// 'khor lo byad sdebs man ngag 'byor// bka' la bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// rang sems dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas// snying rje dag tu srog ltar brten// byams dga' btang snyoms de bzhin du'o// mdo sogs 'don zhing bsam gtan bya// rgyun gyi yid ma
271a4(rnying rgyud): gcig pas// bla ma dag la rtag tu bkur// des kyang dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin gzhug/ thag chen dam tshig sdom pa bshad// rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya bsten// sgrub thabs man ngag legs par blang // de nas mchod pa cho ga bzhin/ nyin de dag tu byas nas kyang //
271a5(rnying rgyud): sku gzugs dag kyang 'bad de bya// bde ba'i stan la lus sems gzhag/ sum 'bum mi skyo'i bar du bzlas// de 'og ri rtser gnas byas la// rlung za zhing ni bzlas pa bya// 'bum bcu'i mtha' ru phrin las brtsams// nam mkha'i sgron ma mar dus tshe/ yi dwags grong bcom shi gos
271a6(rnying rgyud): la// yi dwags 'khor lo gdug pa yi// 'khor lo gdug pa'i lte ba la// re'u mig dgu yi mo tshams bor te// bcu gnyis 'khor lo gdug pa'i nad// bcu bdun la sogs gsang sngags dang / zlum pos bskor ba'i byi rim na// hraHSh+T+rIHming yig dbyangs tshogs rnams// drar
271a7(rnying rgyud): zod sol ba dug sol gyis// srin mtheb gung mdzub sbyar ba yis// khru gang gos gnyis ras mchog la// gdug pa'i yi ge g.yas g.yon bzlog/ de nang chud pa'i skyes bu gnyis// zhal bgrad spyan bzlog 'khor lo 'dzin// phyag zhabs mgur chu ro nyes brgyan/ mi skra
271b1(rnying rgyud): gdug bzung gcig rjod na du/ yang
271b2(rnying rgyud): dbang po bsdams te bri// gnyis sbyar rgyab la nya yis// bsdams pa'i tshul du mkhas pas bri// gdug pas bzung zhing thod nang tu// dril byas sngon dmar byad kyis bsdams// gdug pa'i zong nag ltos 'gro bri// mngar dang klu sman rtse mchog gis//
271b3(rnying rgyud): cing snal la mag dang bya/ gdug pas bzung zhing thod par gzhug/ sngon dmar byad zag bzhis btab la// 'azung ste nyin mtshan ma nor ba zlas// kha nas drag po'i sngags bzlas pas// rdo rje rlung lce srung ba las// sngon dmar gdug pa'i ro nya'i tshogs// dur khrod sol bas du ga sog
271b4(rnying rgyud): smar// lcags sam 'ug pa'i sgo rtsa yis// gsang pa'i sngags dang ming rus bri// dug can nad kyi bsgrub bya la// dug lce nag pos bsdams par bsam// 'chi bdag bshan pa'i yi dwags tshogs// gtum po dug gi kha blangs can// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pas/
271b5(rnying rgyud): bcing lkugs shing bzung nas ni// gshin rje gdug pa'i khang pa ru// dbang med las kyi 'jug par bsam// hrIHAHgajug pa'i sngags kyi mthar// hUM dang ming spel A kar Sha// dza gnyis dgug pa'i gsang sngags bzlas// ske tshe drug kun sngags kyis zab// zla na
271b6(rnying rgyud): mar dus tshe// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi klu gsum ste// lcags khri nag po'i steng dag tu// yi dwag gdug pa'i gzig zhag/ ya sogs gdug pa'i gsang sngags rnams// zhi khro rdzogs nas gzude// rdza mkhanas lag bu rgya// gdug pa ga bu shing ba'i chad// ga
271b7(rnying rgyud): byas nang du ro nye gnyis// phyi nang gnyis su 'bud du bya// ga bu dag la 'khril pa'i tshul// me yi sprin mag pu gnag/ gdug pa'i zod nag ga bur gzhug/ snron dmar gnyis kyi zi gus bsdams// shar nub lho byang phyogs mtshams su// gdug pa gnas pa'i
271b8(rnying rgyud): dag la// sgo bltas khyim nas 'dom gang du// rdo la 'jig rten gzugs bris la// sa sgo phye la khyim bdag zad// mthun pa'i rdzas sbyin mgu bar bya// ga bu gdug pa'i sbyor bde// legs sbas steng nas 'jig rten gzhug/ gang la bya ba'i dus dang lo// gnyen po gang shis
272a1(rnying rgyud): mAkhas pas dbyud // zlab nag po'i ma ngas s+ho// drang srong rgyu ba'is phyogasas// byad snyoms 'khar ma'i bcan drug// khyab 'dug mtshad cing khyim bdag zad// gnar bu lta tshugs ra dang 'brad// mnyas
272a2(rnying rgyud): dbang gzug ru dung 'bud// mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag tu// bso shing mchod cing gtad khram bya// khyab 'jug gdug pa'i dmod pa bor// yi dwags gdug pa'i smon lam gdab// nag gdug pa'i dmod bcol bya// rang nyid lha ying rgyal gyis/
272a3(rnying rgyud): dkar po rdo rje rgyabs ma la// sa sgo bcad la rgya yis mnan// sdom la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// g.yeng ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// phrin las rdzogs dang gsang sngags bzlas// bslab bya'i gzugs phung ma zhig par// gdug pa sbal gyi sems 'dra
272a4(rnying rgyud): pas// ma zhig bar du gtang mi bya// zhig ste mngon du gyur pa dang // spar zhing g.yo ba'i cho ga bya// bskyed dang spyan drang mchod bskul rnams// bsgom rgyud mdzes thun nang du'o// bla ma'i gdams ngag dam pa yang // yid la nan tan gzhag par bya//
272a5(rnying rgyud): chub sems nyid sems la bzhag/ dam tshig bsrung sdom mi nyams bsrung // bka' la bshad pa rjes mthun par// rdzas dang lag cha mthun bsdebs shing // rtag tu dur khrod dgon par dga'// dus dang lo tshigs dam bcas pa// mi 'da' ga
272a6(rnying rgyud): ltar byed pa ste// mtshan ma mthong dang bzlas pa rdzogs// rgyan gyi yi dam che ba ste// de lta bu yi rnal 'byor pa// bden pa grub pa'i nus pa yod// shes rab snying rje rab ldan pa'i// dbang thob dam tshig srog ltar bsten// mi 'jigs dpa' bo brtul
272a7(rnying rgyud): zhugs can// man ngag yod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rang don phran thogs ma yin pa'i// dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod pa dang // bstan la zhe sdang gnod byed pa// bkang gsang ston pas bshad pa yi// drag po'i mngon spyod zab mo'i lung // gshin rje gshed
272b1(rnying rgyud): bdag gis kyang // thugs kyi sgom nas bton pa 'di// 'bar la byad snyoms bdag pa'i phung // mAn ngag ma da shas bya// las kye byeb thun tshogs rnams// man+tang gdon gyis shes par bya// zung zad mi mthun mtho dang stod rnams// DA
272b2(rnying rgyud): gsang nag po'i rgyad dag las// gsang ba mdzes thun gzhung ltar bya// de la mchod pa gsungs pa ni// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// tshogs bcad bcu drug tha ma la// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog
272b3(rnying rgyud): 'gro la phan pa'i gtso chen gyis// sman par dgongs te bzhes su gsol// tshig gnyis btags la dbul bar bya// bstod pa la sogs byed pa na// de bzhin rtsab mtshan brjod las// 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung /
272b4(rnying rgyud): bdud sogs kun gyis bstod byas mthar// mtshan gyi sngags brjod bstod chen bya// sngags mchog mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal// zhes pa nas/ ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa// sring ba'i dra ba 'doms pa po// zhes bstod pa tshig rkang drug pa dang / drug tu
272b5(rnying rgyud): rtsa bzhis bstod pa 'bul// yang na 'dud pa nyi shu nas// mtshan stegs brjod la 'a stong chung bya// yang na mdzes thun gzhung bzhin bya// bskal pa sprul nag 'khyil ces gtad// 'khor lo byad stems gsang thabs 'di// dkon mchog gnod cing bstan pa 'dzeg
272b6(rnying rgyud): mngon spyod thugs rjes bskal pa'i phyir// mi tshe ga za snyad tsam du brjod mi bya// chu srin mgrin par rin chen chud pa ltar// bong du sbas te yongs su bsgrag pa min// gshin rje gshed po'i thugs kyi yod bcud 'di// phyag na rdo rjes rab tu gzung zhing nyon// dpal zla
272b7(rnying rgyud): gsang nag pa'i rgyud las/ tshon gyi gu gu sngon dam byed stems kyi skabs te nyi shu pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rdeg shed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// las kyi bya ba gzhan zin nas// drag po'i 'khor lo mnan pa 'di// lag na rdo rjes
273a1(rnying rgyud): can gyi dang chos kyis yang rngan
273a2(rnying rgyud): rab zung // shin tu dgon pa'i gnas nyid du// drung khrad krung nas ngas blangs te// gakhar la ma pa rdul bzhin du// mAr yaya bar+d+hanyid// nga bzhin 'dod pa'adabyabs sa bca'// gang ma bstan pa rdzogs pa dang // mang du
273a3(rnying rgyud): thabs kyid mardzas de// mchod rten 'og tu gnan par bya// bdag nyid gshed por bsgom byas la// mchod rten de nyid ngo bo yang // ri rab gling bzhi chas par bsgom// ri rab ston bzhugs pa ste// sgrol ba'i yum dang sbyor ba'i yum// shar dang rgyab tu gnas par
273a4(rnying rgyud): byang na sras mchog gnas par bsgom// de bzhin rab tu mnan cing gzir// ri rab zung bzhir laM ser bzhi// de las gling phran bcu gnyis bsam// ri rab dog tu gzas pa po// gshin rje ral pa tshar dgra yis// lcags thag sngon pos bcings pa de//
273a5(rnying rgyud): pa ma ri la mnan nas lpags phur la// dngag bsam shing tsam btags pa ste// sra sgrogs kha nas khrag sngags gan bu cing // mig tu rig rig 'dod 'bod// ci mdzad srong zhig zer zhing mnan par bsam// 'khor lo bri ba'i dus su yang // dmigs pa'i ming dag gzhu
273a6(rnying rgyud): pa ni// 'khor lo nyid la mi shong zhing // mi btub pa rnams gud du bri// de dag bris te gdags par bya// gnas dang thabs ni 'di yin te// ya la sogs pa'i yi ge wa// gral ni hUM phaT bar mtshams bzhi// rtsibs kyi re lu cha bcu gnyis dang // mtha' bsgor med bris
273a7(rnying rgyud): le'u co brgyad// de dag nyi shu rtsa dgul// gud du meng gi mjug tu yang // mA ra ya zhes bris pa 'khor lo gnyis// khasbyar ba yi nang du gzhug/ 'khor lo srid pas spel la bzhag/ ngan sngags bzlas pa'i dus su yang // bzhi pa'i ngan sngags khri phrag na/
273a8(rnying rgyud): de dag bton pa'i rjes la yang // yi ge bcu pa nus tshad bzlas// de tshe mchod pa 'bul ba dang // de cho gtor ma gtong ba dang // ye shes lha la thugs dam bskul// las kyi gshin rje ma mo rnams// rak+ta gsol zhing dgug pa'i phrin las bya// 'khor lo sbeng pa'i
273b1(rnying rgyud): dus su yang // gzhan rnga dag la gtud pa ni// zas kyi mchod pa bsham pa dang // bdag nyed gshad par bsgom pa dang // 'the bdag dgongs su gsal ba dang // rang gilas kyi gang bcu dang // bsrub b+hang rgyad par rtse dang // gzhan rje rtsal ba
273b2(rnying rgyud): nas// dam tshig phyag rgya rab bstan cing // dam tshig snying po rab tu bzlas// de bzhin dam la mi 'da' dang // dmadzes mchod pas mnyes byed dang // las kyi phyag rgya bzung ba dang // dpa tshig bskul te las kyi gnye dag tad dang // man bsgrag
273b3(rnying rgyud): gtad pa'i las rdzogs te// 'khor lo sba ba'i dus su yang // gshin rje dag la gtad pa ni// drang srong dmod pa'i ston lam gdab par bya// de la mnan rdzas bsag pa ni// mi khra gar khrag drug la sogs// pho rog 'ug pa phu gung spro// srin pa'i ming dang
273b4(rnying rgyud): drug pa'i mig/ brjod dang la phug ske tshe dang // g.yang mtha bo skra dang nas// de la sngags te mnan pa'o// snyir na gnan pa'i las byas na// gshed po'i dgongs pas gnan pa dang // phyag rgya'i stobs kyis gnan pa dang // gtar khram bcu gnyis tshogs mdad pa dang
273b5(rnying rgyud): ya stags gdug pas mnan pa dang // de dag rdzas kyis gnan pa'o// drag po'i sngags kyis gnan pa dang // smon lam gdab cing gnan pa dang // drang srong dmod pas gnan pa'o// 'di nas lho yi phyogs rol na// dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong pha rol na// thod pa lcags kyi
273b6(rnying rgyud): sbed na// yi dwags kun gyi sde dpon po// ma ma kun gyi tshogs ne mo// gson gshin gnyis kyi za ma kha la// gson bskos la 'debs pa po// shi ba rnams kyi gshin bu rje// dge ba can gyi ltang 'dzin la// sdig pa can gyi chad pa mkhan// legs nyes thos ba
273b7(rnying rgyud): gcod pa yis// chos rgyal gshen rje zhes bya ba// mngon shes rdzu dbul mthur ldan pas// 'khor bcas khyed la gan par bya// de dag rab tu mnan kyang na// de yi chog 'dings bshad// lag na rdo rjes rab tu thung // dpal sngags dag por chud las/ 'bong

274b2(rnying rgyud): gyis// sa la dmigs pa'i gzugs byas la// ting gar ming dang rus 'acas gzhug/ gzhan yang ming leg mang po dang // mi bsad mtshon gyis ling+gag tub// dum bu re dang med byer re// sha che na gtu par sdug pa// drag pa'i sngags kyis gos la bdag

274b5(rnying rgyud): ba / mi yi nga ga mi yiH// sman dang ma rdzags dag gsal bar brtsam// ti na gyi gro 'angs gnas nas rnyed// 'o bang byags zlas pa shes margyad/ khye rdzas gnyis sa dbang bgribs par bas pa//

274b7(rnying rgyud): drug rje sa du babrang phreng ba dngas// dbu po 'arjod bcings shing // med pa 'bar ba nga na bzhugs// shang blom tshams sa gnyis su 'ad pa zhugs// de nas yang po khrom te/ pramo te/ zhes pas ma yisadra tub/ thar ba zhing / bramo smin gsung byag pa dang /
275a1(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa pon du srin rgyal macan bsdams pa/ g.yas par man la shes kyi ma mga' bsdams pa/ g.yo dang po me dang bsdams pa/ tha ma gnyis gnyis dal thu bsdums par bzlom/ brgyal zhing srin las bcol/ bklag dbus
275a2(rnying rgyud): a b+hed mar ser me yi lha// zhes pas bstod/ dpal zla gsang nage po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo ho ma sbrel gyi skabs te rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpapa gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad brjod do// e maho lag nardo rje dzin pa khyod// dus pa
275a3(rnying rgyud): tham byung ba'i tshe// dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod pa'i dus// bstan pa gnyen po 'dzeg pa la// sngags kyi yang spring 'khrul 'khor bshad// snod dang ldan la bstan gyur na// 'dzam gling nyi ma shar ba 'dra// snod min kun la bstan gyur na// dus min par ni sros za
275a4(rnying rgyud): skems// sngags la bye brag mang bzhugs kyang // rtsa ba'i snying po lngar 'dus te// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po dang // yon tan phrin las lnga ru 'dus// bzhi ni nye bar bsnyen pa dang // bsgrib dang las la sbyor la 'jug/ rgyun du grangs shing las la sbyar//

275a6(rnying rgyud): nyi ma bzhi pa la// yi ge 'bru brgyad g.yon du bskod// phyi yi nang ni bzhi snying dril la bskor// gyi yi gsang bar bskor ba ni// bzhi snying dril la g.yas su bskor// nang la gsum du dbye ba ni// kyi yi dus su bskor ba ni// a kro te ka bcu bdun pa'o// nang gi

276a5(rnying rgyud): yeng yeng seng sed byed na ye me 'grub// myos shing gnyid che'i thebs pa ni// sgrib pas phog pas bshags pa bya// snying 'byo ma dga' sngags rdor dang // dbru cad mtshang b.ru bshad// gyi ga tsog gapa la natheb pa yin// dga' zhing gas pa na 'grub pa yin//
276a6(rnying rgyud): ma bka' stsal pa// myog migs 'bying ba ni// rgyab brten yod pas sgyur mi 'grub// bdag pas kho dag zir mthon// 'khyab pas ma mo bskung bzlog bya// galag ru byung nas gsang na lo ru 'god// ting 'dzin gsal zhing dngos byung na/ lo byang tshun
276a7(rnying rgyud): par bshad// ting mdzinags pa zhing 'cha byed na// zla btsun chad 'tsho bar bshad// doni mi 'gyur ba 'i rtags// khyi ma rnams ni yid mi brtan// g.yon gyi dri la sngags dmachog yang rting las// sngags 'a dril la khya bar bshad// zab yang snying drug dzo dang /
276b1(rnying rgyud): grang bu so na sra bskyed dag// dadag nye bar bsten pa'o// srog ba rgya ba mjug sda nga // yang snang bsdub dang las bsgrub pas// dbyangs dang nga chag btad// pas bang kyang madrug lag gag/ nga bag zug su sa dang // 'artag
276b2(rnying rgyud): 'tha' gzeng shi dang // khrag skyug rims nang mdze shu dang // ltas ngan cho 'phru'i thog ser dang // gsobs dadabab bcang ga byed kyang // rtse ba dam tshig yu snying dang // dbyangs kyi yang snying jug dadang // srog ge snying po dang /
276b3(rnying rgyud): da pa'i sngags dag ni// 'bru'i btags pas 'grub par bshad// phyi nas bsnyen pa rdzogs pa na// nyams su lon dang gsang rgya bo dang // su yang rung ste the tshom med// bzlas pa lasA su rudra ba dang // brdabs shing sngags pas dgyeb par bshad//
276b4(rnying rgyud): zhed depar bathu shing // dang pa zlagasang nag pa'i rgyud las/ sngags kyi yang snying 'khrul 'khor gyi skabs te gsum pa'o// / de nas bsad dpalas kyi yang snyi 'di gzungs so// 'dra' pab dkyil 'khor dra ba yang /

283b2(rnying rgyud): dam las pa 'da' phrin las mdzod// yang yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// byang phyogs gshin rje lha mchog ni// sa dang bum pa rgya gram bsnams// jibs su byas pa'i rta lachings// bu na na ga mo gosabyangs ma// ngo ma serang nag rab can// ga
283b3(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi gtsol 'khyud// g.yon bdud khrag gcil stob// yang gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul ni// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khrem la thob// gling chen bco brgyad las 'i srul
283b4(rnying rgyud): 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab pos ma yi// dmalas ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// ya ba yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// byang shing chos kyi phul po ni// dmar po thod pa mang 'gazhung sdams// tshabs su skrod byed rnga mo chings// rnam
283b5(rnying rgyud): na mo mgo 'phyangs ma// khro mod mar mngal pa can// g.yas bathabs kyi gtsapa 'khyud// g.yon pa rung thug gcil stob// yab gcig 'ang ma dpal bka' bla gas// dmadzas gtong ma 'angad yongs la// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed pa mdzod// @
283b6(rnying rgyud): thobacu yis khram la thob// ding rjen 'tsha brgyad las la sbal// 'chi ba dag 'bor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dmalas ma 'dang phrin las mdzade// yab yum gnyis me thugs kyi sras// 'og phyogs ral patshar dbu ni// spug nag lpag
283b7(rnying rgyud): ri rababasnams// tshabs sum he sngo nag chibs// lha mo nag mo mgo 'phyangs ma// khro mo spug nag ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gzol 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtsel stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma
284a1(rnying rgyud): 'di yongs la// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu las khram la thob// gang chen bco brkyang las la sbrul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab pos ma ya// dam pas ma 'anga'adzin
284a2(rnying rgyud): sa mdzad// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// 'og phyogs gshin rje thod dbug ni// nag po lag na thob bskams// tshabs sus bdag sgeg pa tshabs// sa bdag stong khyab mgo 'gyangs ma// khro mo nag mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs
284a3(rnying rgyud): su nasu
284a4(rnying rgyud): dag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab bo sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da'aphrin las mdzod// ces bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'khor rnams las la bskul te/ so so'i gshed bskos so// 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// phyogs
284a5(rnying rgyud): skyong gi gshed bsko ba'i skabs te so gcig pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ nyin bzhi'i lha'i ging bzhi la phrin las bcol ba 'di gsungs so// rA dza ha la 'khor lo'i lha// 'khor lo nag pa~M mA ra'i bdud/
284a6(rnying rgyud): dug gi mtshon cha sngags kyi them// rdzas kyi sbyong ba thabs kyi ngag/ bsnyen pa bya ba gsang ba'i thabs// hrIHdz+dzaH s+yod ka ma yi ngag/ 'khor lo bskor ba mnang ga gter// bla gsang nag po gcas pa'i grogs// bar bar spyi rgyad thabs kyis phul// dmar nag khram bdag
284a7(rnying rgyud): man ngag thabs// gshed po bdud kyi man ngag gter// las grub gnan pa rang gi snying // drang srong dmod pa phyogs med grogs// de bzhin spyi rgud thabs kyi phul// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa// nyin bzhi lha yi geng bzhi bskul// hUM/ nyi ma dang po'i rtsis byed ging /
284b1(rnying rgyud): bram drang srin pa nye// bar snang khams pa yid kyis chu// gsang bar dbang bsrung gang gi bdag/ rtag zhu stag ral srul mnapa// phyag na shad pa kyis byed gang // bdag gis mnyes 'di yis nyes// gnal nag pa'i rtsis su drug/ mug ca gang byu na
284b2(rnying rgyud): ngas// gtad dom btang shir re// nyi ma gnyis pa'i rtsis byed ging // ya ma rang gnyen rdo'i ging // zhal ba gra ma che gtsogs kha dog nag/ thod sbrul g.yang gzhi sul gsol// bla mar nag partsibs bu tshabs// phyag na go rdol ces bye shing // bdag pa
284b3(rnying rgyud): nyes 'di yis nyes// sho rdo la nag po'i kyis su chug/ srog tshod snying byung skyong pog rmongs// gtad do pa btad shor re// nyi ma gsum pa'i rtsis byed zhing // da sha grI ba bdud kyi gleng // nigapa shu za na shA zhwa can// nag po snying dkar thibs su tshabs// ni sha zla dang
284b4(rnying rgyud): 'thung // dug mda' 'phen zhing mi shA za// rtan gzhon pa 'dul khrir bcas// phyag na dkar nag ces byed ging // bdag gis mnyes kha yis nyes// sho rde le dkar nag kyis su chug/ srog tshad steng phung skyong bogazangs// gtad dom btang shor re// nyi ma padi
284b5(rnying rgyud): rjes byung ging // yak+shar da gnod sbyin ging // nyon pagapa' rtanag bzhon// zab srag nag po srul gsol// bdud zhags nas po dag la 'debs// dbu la dom thu dag pa gsol// phyag na dkar nag rtsis byed gang // bdag gis mnyes kho las nyes// sho rdal
284b6(rnying rgyud): rnag pa kyis su drug/ srog tshod snying phyung spro 'brog rmongs// gtad dam btang shor re// bdud rje rbad bu ma la li// laji za dper mo la// d+ha sha kI badz+rad thu ri la le// yak+shar+thad la la// zhes ni brgya sha dz+wa la bgrang ngo // dpal lpag sang dag pa'i rgyud las/
284b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi lha'i ging bzhi la brin las bcol ba'i skabs te so gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'jigs byed chen po la 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis shin tu dgyes pa'i yi rang nas/ mgrin gcig tu 'dug ste 'di skad ces brjod do// hUM gtum chen rab 'bar
285a1(rnying rgyud): gzhan 'joms mdzad sa// shes 'tham las thug par yod ldan thod// phyug mnan mang po bsgrub pa'i masbyar babar// rab ba gzhadang 'joms lajug cal btang // rdorje bral bu ba ba can dang // gcanag zan gdus dram/
285a2(rnying rgyud): pags tron na bzlar gsol// mi mgo thod rngon phreng bas sbal brgyan// brkyang bsgra ma tshul gyis gshin rje zhabs kyis gnon// mi bzad khro ba'i rgyal po gdong drug rtsis can// paT gyis bams gsum spangs mdzad ga bdug gdang sa// shaze mgo bca dang bu'i tho dang bcings// stan 'tho/
285a3(rnying rgyud): tsam gyis bdud kyi seng chen 'thebs// lcags 'thil choms kyi can thag rten pa 'brebye shig/ 'khor grimamo mas ni 'dang zhing 'ad// de bsag thug da sbyi na gzhan sa smos ci dgrog// rgan sa gtogs pas lhaben kyab 'jug kyang // thab bkyis bcas pas thag su gnyed pa
285a4(rnying rgyud): bdud// stong kha zas med par byed pa'i zhalag dang su shing // khrog tu mtsham na mra chen po bstan pas kyang // tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams rdul gyi thig 'jog cing // nang gtong srin mo tshogs rnams 'dang shing 'jud// mya phreng khrag dang bcas pa'i zhags thog nas// phyag na
285a5(rnying rgyud): tri shU la mi mgo ba bsnams shing // dngos grib mtshig gi rmad khrag zhal du gsol// khyud dang jug pa lta bu'i khra bskams shing // dam las ldog pa dag la gtong bar byed// gnod sbyin mi sman phreng bas sbrul brgyan// rdo rje brjid pa'i stangs stabs gar byas pas// dung
285a6(rnying rgyud): khrid chen por mtshan mor rab chuba'i// ro langs mgo bcad po yis chem chem bza'// ngo mthong tsam gyis dma' 'bab zhabs la gtug/ yon tan byi bas brgyan pa'i lha khyod la// bltabs bzod par dka' yang bdag 'dud na// gdug pa'i sems kyis bdag dang
285a7(rnying rgyud): bdag gi 'khor du gtogs pa la// gnod par byed pa'i mi dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs// zung zhig non cig sgrol mdzod dag shin rje gshed// yun gyi lhar yang khyod la gsol 'debs na// ring ba gser gyings la bya gnas pa// bya yi rang bzhin por nas gser
285b1(rnying rgyud): mas ngas// dang go nga na nga / gcod sa ya gdang// 'das ca na// da na tu nga//
285b2(rnying rgyud): na// thams pa'i rna pang bdag lagan pa dang // rdzag pa ni 'ardzun gyis bdag pa gdags sugs // khyed ster bdag byed dbyar bad byug la// na ga nas tha~Md bdag drwa marnas pa ba 'a ga/

285b5(rnying rgyud): da ma dus 'jigs byed chen pa 'i lta par rnams kyis rang gi dkris pa'i baspyad pa sas nas skyongs kyi bdag po dpa laphyag na da'i dang / stodags brjod par gta pa rnams kyis kyin gcig tu pa da da de sa la/

286a6(rnying rgyud): na ga/ snang bdag// pa kyis sa pa rgyad/ // mams // gaslo pa sa/ /
286b1(rnying rgyud): pa rdzas dang mchod rdzas dang // mi ga rta sha'i gtor maru// rus pa sna tshogs brgyan byas pa// gshed po rab phram sras la gzhag/ bu nag tun g.yug nag nyid// ljin ga phag pa dzag par rting // g.yag dag glang dang nad kyang // sha dang khrag dang rus pad+ma
286b2(rnying rgyud): si shas brgyan la zangs su gang // bdud po brtul dgod par bya// shap+da khrag sna'i gtor ma la// spyan gzigs dkor rdzas brgyan pa bzhi// zhwa bzhing ging chen bzhil gzhag/ sman dang dgang byung ba pos// snang phreng srog la bdud dbang dpur/
286b3(rnying rgyud): gsu/ gsung rgyun du gtang // rgyal mtshan chen pa bzhi yang gzug/ dang nag phur phrag byi dgag yang bzhi brdag/ lug nag 'phen bca'ang rog dmigs pa'i rten// sgyer pa stag pa la sogs dag pa yang // mgo mjug mi rdong bzhogs pa khram shing bya// drang
286b4(rnying rgyud): po'i sngags bzlas rim par tham la gdab// yi dgas gos la 'khyod lo bris byas te// drug dang thod pa mabs pas bri bar bya// gzi brjid 'phags pa 'jam dpal yab yum dang // bka' nyan nyi ma bzhi ba'i lha bsgrub 'tshad// khrab thogs bdud rnams las la bskul
286b5(rnying rgyud): phye zad// thod pa mtshan nganar rog khrag thugs la// rang srog ming bris drod pa'i nang du'o// dpral bar mthongs bzhag rab 'grib byas pa// tham gyis dgrag cing tham sngags bzlas par bya// yod gra 'an tse dum phug/ khra mthong bachog mo mA ra ya gug leng
286b6(rnying rgyud): hA/ zhes shing khram gyi skabs srung ts+tsha/ ting 'dzin rnamags ma gsal bsgom la// dbang chen 'byung ba'i ba brtsegs la// hU~M las 'bar ba'i gzhal yal khang // 'phar lo rtsings brgyad bu khyud ldan// kra cha bang khams su khyed pan//
286b7(rnying rgyud): phyogs rus pa'i gzhal yas 'a // lho phyogs kyi la gzhal pas khang // rdza phyogs zag gi gzhal yas 'ad// byang phyogs dbugs kyi gzhal yas 'ang // dbus su la mchen po ste// gshin rjem haM ma dz+wal ba'i gdan// hU~M las gshed pa'i spar kyar
287a1(rnying rgyud): te// skad zil mdog 'dra gnag la 'byor// stag spags gang rjen sbrul nag chun po dang // thod pa la sogs dung khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// zhal drug bcu gnyis phyag dang ldan par bsgom// g.yas g.yon yum dang mthun du sras
287a2(rnying rgyud): mchog ste// rgyan dang cha lugs phyag mtshan gsal bar bsgom// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad steng du rdebs ma ste// dri las dgra bgegs bsnol ba'i gdan du bsam// de steng ya bcug dan steng 'od dang zer 'phro ba// spro bsdus yalas khram thogs bdang po bcu
287a3(rnying rgyud): steng gi bdud po 'bar ba ya chen ni// g.yu 'brug zhon pa glog gi zhags thog bsgom// shar gyi bdud po rol po ral pa can// rnga mo zhon nas ral gri thogs pa bskyed// lho phyogs khram bdag srog bdud ma che ba can// bdud sha zhon nas zhags pa thogs pa baphyar// nub
287a4(rnying rgyud): zla bdud mong po zhags pa can// 'phrong bu zhon nas gnam lugs phur thogs bskyed// byang du srog bdud gser gyi sta re can// khyud chen zhon nas sta re thogs pa bskyed// shar lhor khram bdag gnam btsan thog po rje// rta la zhon nas gnam lcags 'phen pa brtser/
287a5(rnying rgyud): lho nub khram bdag par btsan ri bo rje// chung lha zhon nas chung nag g.yab 'debs bskyed// nub byar khram bdag se 'dzin sdi dra ba rje// phag pa rtang zhon khram shing thogs pa bskyed// byang shar khram bdag ro langs nag po rje// chu gang zhon nas sta re thogs pa bskyed/
287a6(rnying rgyud): rdog phyogs nag po yab rje khrag 'thung ni// stag dmar zhon nas sbrul dmar zhags thogs bskyed// re re'i 'khor na bdud kyang bsam yas te// rang bzhin gnas nas 'khor bcas spyan drangs pas// grub pa'i gnas su de 'dra gyon par bsam/
287a7(rnying rgyud): sgo nang rten bzhilha/ yi gang bzhi yang // bka' zhan byed pa'i 'gugs byed dza las bskyed// de ltar bskyed pa'i bdud po de rnams kyis// bstan pa bshig cing sbru la brdo ba rnams// zhags pas bcings shing la las kham la 'dengs// la las mtshan
287b1(rnying rgyud): sa pa las cad dang drang// gnab brdzum nag thas panags spags// mig tha' bar pa dang ca ba dang / ud pa na ba ngags pa nan/ tunanas bya rtags pa byed pa/ ga gapa dab ma
287b2(rnying rgyud): bla bar bsngal// sra ba tra bu khrag sar bag por bdun tab smraH// bri'am 'bum na bdud rnapas mngon du byon// mon dang btsun pa skad rigs mi mthun pa// lngab sngob sna zhing las la mngon pyod// gtum chen stod pa badzin pas
287b3(rnying rgyud): hUM/ bskal pa snyigs ma'i lnga brgyal// khro rgyal gshin rdo'i spyan snga dam bcas pa// mi bzung chen ba zlog bdag kun 'dul byed// 'ang ma dpal gshen rjes dmar gyi ad+hI dang // bdud rtsi dam kying brdzis dmapa 'di// khrir rdzogs nga
287b4(rnying rgyud): nas dbang bsgyur bas// bdud 'khor yongs kyis sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung // lus kyi dam 'og a ra yaM// ngag gi dam tshig ni ra yaM// da ma las sam 'ad 'phrin las mdzod// steng phyogs bdud kyi gzhal yas nas// dbang ba ma chen tha byed de/
287b5(rnying rgyud): gsu 'brug sngon po'i rtul zhon// lag na glog dmar thog zhags thogs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dang mkhrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi sgying la ya// bdud kyi khram khra ma khram la thob// oM snying khrag tsed+ha zad/ drug mug khra matod ta zag
287b6(rnying rgyud): che ge mo mAr ya khug ling swA hA/ zhes bdod cig tham la rim gyis gdab/ rak+Sha sle shing bdud rnams las la rbad// sun nag 'bibs pa'i gzhal yas nas// nag po yab rje khrag 'thung ni// stag chen dmar po'i rtal zhon// lag na sbal dmar zhags pa thags// sdang ba
287b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dpral ya// skyes pa dang mkhrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la la// bdud kyi khrim tham tham 'thob// me snying khrag so/ rbad/ drug zug khram tor ta zang/ che ge mo mAr ya khrag ping sA hA/ shar phyogs rus pa'i gzhal yas nas// shar ba dang ma ping la ba

289a7(rnying rgyud): bsres la ba zhag/ bdag nyid mji nag par gan te// srogs snying ba rgyan dungs// oM sha na na d+he/ kha na gan ma ma// sku bathug rjen/ mi tan taran/ ab cag tsu ga/ mu pog/ toH/ oM ya badz+ran sa dran/

289b2(rnying rgyud): byebs par bzlas// stong gsum mun par gtong byed na// mun pa'i dus su drug khrag la// nyi mags dpa'i drig sngags bzlas// rang sngags mjug tu mu na gtibs brjod// snying gsum bdud kyi lum dral gyis// sred cigacong lag yo 'du ma /

294b2(rnying rgyud): l-i/ dmu bdud sprul pas dbab cing gsang ba'o// ma ma sa ma ya mthag sham ti 'ga' nas kha ya kAru ti tsa pA la ya aM/ yu sha ha ra d+ha ra/ u ma ma nga ma ni sha trA nA sha ya ni dza dzaH/ ma mo'i gdon gyis dbab gisang pa'o// tri dkar gyi gro dul dul gyi khrag pa

294b5(rnying rgyud): chen nyid la rab bstod cing // gza' bdud chen po rab tu rbad// hUM/ ri rab phyogs bzhi mchoms brgyad nas// lha srin sde brgyad bskul re ran// khyab 'jug chen po sba bzhengs shig/ gtum po chen po bskyod tsa na// gzab bdud 'jug cing ki kang 'be da

295a6(rnying rgyud): sher gyi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// dmu bdud chen po hA li ka/ b+hi nur tsing ki kang 'bebs// da mu yi ki kang 'bebs par byed// byang gi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i mo// bdud po dog ti 'bar ba'i gzugs// bdud kyi ki kang 'bar ba 'bebs// ki ka
295a7(rnying rgyud): 'bar bcang ka/ nub kyi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// srid pa'i mam nims dang ral// ma ma ngaka kang kun gyi bdag/ ljang sngon chen mi ka kang 'ab bas/ su nub mtshams nas bskyod can// rag bye dag mgong rtsegs te// skar can 'ab pa dza
295b1(rnying rgyud): na po// sngon du su phrad khyud med za// khyod ni kho chen sprul pa ste// lha nub pa tshams nas sku bskyod nas// lha srin sde brgyad dmag dpon byed// nub nas shar du bapyad can// srid pa'i ma mo'adamag dpon byed// na dang na ke kang dbab pa'i dus la dbas//
295b2(rnying rgyud): mtshams nas bskyod can// dag lha'i rgyal mo dmag dpon byed// thog dang bu yug ki kang ni// dam sri gdug pa'i snying la 'bebs// byang nas lho ru bskyod can// bdud dmag kun gyi dmag dpon byed// bdud kyi ke kang 'ung bum 'beb // @
295b3(rnying rgyud): kAng dgral ya// byang shar mtshams nas bskod can// srin po 'bum gyi dmagang dpod byed// srin po'i ke kang dpra la yaM// gri thabs sti rdzogs ki kang yi// shAr nas nub tu bskyod rkyen// da su bdud yongs kyi mag dpor byed// dmado pa la

295b5(rnying rgyud): thog dang ser ba'i sna 'dren cing // thog ser mdze nad ki kang 'bebs// nub bung mtshams nas bskyod tsan// gti grer gsod pa'i ki kar 'bebs// mdun du gang byung khyur mid byed// ki kang sna tshogs 'bebs pa'i bdag/ ki kar ste tshogs dgra la ya// 9

295b7(rnying rgyud): shan ti kral dzi de/ zhes ni gsang pa'i las sbyor bya// chu 'khrugs drag tu 'bebs 'dod na// sngags kyi mnang gzhag gcig bya// oM mai kha kha thun 'thun/ rai yaM ra yaM/ na bu tan ka kha ler thun thun tu/ zhes pa'i sngags bzlas khro tshul bstan// mig brjog khang cu

296a4(rnying rgyud): drug/ rlabs chad thod pas steng nas dag pa// gru gsum nang du gzhag par bya// bsnyen pa bya ba'i thabs dag la// lha bsnyen sum stong byas nas ni// chos bzhi bco lnga brgyad dus la// gza' chen nyid kyi snying po bzlas// stong rdzogs thun la nyung gis bras/

308b3(rnying rgyud): shesams zad pa la sa/ mangs/ mnal masam pa dadu pa pa pa sha byed/ cang mam da/ shAthal pa bya/ sha tanathas pa n+ti/ zhes tha'as sa du ba rnas/ sa pa dag pa'i gas la ba nam da po la dus kyi sa nga//
308b4(rnying rgyud): nas sa
308b5(rnying rgyud): grub tsan yod pa'i sar gtor na rims nad sna tshogs na bun bzhin gtibs nas 'ong ba dang / thog mer 'ong ba dang / serab drag tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro// dpal zla gas nag po'i rgyud las/ nang ngan sna tshogs gtang ba'i skabs te zhe brgyad pa'o//
308b6(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gsheng bas pa' 'a jam pa dbab pa'i phyir/ snrung bag gang gi zugs gsungs/ dbang dang dam cig ldan pa las// bla ma mnyes pa'i mams// lta ba yangs shing sman la mgoms// slob dbe na mnyas pa grags gzung
308b7(rnying rgyud): ba dang ga shegs pa zu hU~M// rigasam kyi ma thag dag ra // skye 'a med pa da// yang bag zug pa brnyas sa// cag phrag sod kyi nang skyes// gang dru ba banas tha gas pa / tha ba mchad pa seng ge srungs// da dgas
309a1(rnying rgyud): la chagaH// sa tun nas gyur// gsang byaman pa/ ngal ba na pa 'du/ 'du rkad ba ngal ba rnam pa hA/ 'dags pa de zhes dal ma byas/ rgyags nga thu nag/ gdag
309a2(rnying rgyud): 'chi shes// ma kya mas kyi dag tha// dag 'don phrag shing 'dibaskabangs// do di ma bdag tu rnamams// gnas gzha dag tu / ming byeb shi pad/ sa dang gca/ sus kagasopa// nas
309a3(rnying rgyud): pa dang // dpying ngas sa mad bti ga// nas bras bu la gsal ya pa // gsung tapal dang // rtswa rdzas la mags du thas dmus// yal bathar 'ang na gdugs thes// srog dgad/ ba pa myed// ris la bris sa ma chags drug sa// shang na
309a4(rnying rgyud): gzigs pags/ 'thas migs pa'i bags la/ rtab gas rgyal dzaH// rol thugs pa nang pa ts+tsha// dngas sa thugs gags pa/ ma zad tham dza nga // bde gas nga ci nga// pags byed da yos bcan pag ga
309a5(rnying rgyud): yang shed tan dang // phrad bram la grags phran gzigs kyis// de la mtha' ma bkar ta dgram// sras dang mi tag mar me dang // de gling pa wang drung la sogs// sku gzugs da mi mtha' ma bzhug/ badz+rad dkar po'i tshul sogs// dang
309a6(rnying rgyud): 'bar grong bkang pa gnyis// sgra ga nags de mi tha ma nga gram// bung dkar nyung nag ste tshwa yang // dag pa sngags kyi mtshon dugazhag/ gzhan yang maud dpa ng+gA tho grus du / khur ba nam grangs mang ngo nang // zlog pa sman dang dro gros rnams// des srid ma mtha' mar
309a7(rnying rgyud): dgras// gshe gagang pa'i sprir brnam la// rnyeng babargyartsa bcung drug na// oM ma gra taka yi mnas tan ma maH thA hU~M Ta/ oM kAl rU hU~Ms/ oM hrI ba na tu d+hu Tas/ bdag 'byin pa grus pa sgyu bya// de nas dpang dbyer pa dang /
309b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal po btsun pa'i las bya'o// spyan drang phyag 'tshal bzhugs su gsol// phyag chab gsol dang gdan sems drab// mchod pa 'bul zhing bstod pa bgyi// 'dzab bzlas dam chog drag tu bsre// rgyal ba'i srog snying 'di skad brjod// oM shrI mA ny+dza ya ma rAng mas//
309b2(rnying rgyud): e kang tirjo / hrI tsA pa la a sh+tsag ma swA hA/ shes ni khri 'bum grangs bsnyen gyi// rdzas kyis mchod cang rtig tu bzlas// klub nas sngags 'dis rab tu nga/ ta li bu li bai ri la dang / l-i'i pra mAn+ti/ dri rtse bral ba na/ gau ti ka la sa/ kro d+ha na~M la tAM/ shas kyi
309b3(rnying rgyud): mAtI/ mu re re tre/ trai tri/ haM shag haM sha ga rba/ che ge mo tsit+ta la dza/ de bzhin rgyal po drag tu rbang // gal te las byed ma btu baH// rgyal po shis 'di yis bstan// ma ra na pra ma ra tsa tsi ta pa li a li sa ma ya aM ku shadza dza/ phyag rgya bzhi yis gzugs//
309b4(rnying rgyud): bcings te// sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod// rgyal po dang la dbang med par// rdul napa khrag tu 'dzag cing 'ong // de bzhin gsang pa'i las thabs kyang // skyo 'bog shi ba'i ldan phor du// de nyid rang gi snying khrag dang // drug rtswa gsum dang mi khrag dang // brnag
309b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i ming rus bres ti gzug/ dur khrong ri sa ste pa la// gsod pa'i 'khor la bca' bar gsungs// dang po nyi ma bzhi pa'i sngags// de yi phyi ri ma rgyal po'i drag sngags bri// yang ri mag yi dreg sngags bri// thod pa dril la rgya bram bcing // nyen bzhin la yi gang ban
309b6(rnying rgyud): bskul// skabs su gang chen bco brgyad bskul// bim bzhi pa'i las kyang \u0f7f/ oM madrA d+ha thun b+h+yo \u0f7f/ dgra ba 'a srog la thebs/ mrag mar na thun/ dgra bo'i snying shag/ tsha'i bdun/ dgra da'i bkrag la ben/ rlag dza rwa thibs chug// dgrang 'i khrag la
309b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzib/ b+ha ba ste bdun de/ seMs la dzi/ steng te snying ladun/ khrag ta khrag lathun gyi rjod rje mugs/ bung dka nyu nag ge col// drag tu lags la brdeg pa bre// dkar pa gcig gis thug sa dam pa rnyeng // rtogs kyang 'di bzhin ston pa ngas// gi zla'am dang rjer
310a1(rnying rgyud): sa dang // 'bag tu mes na tha mar bshad// bcad pa zhang gra dag pashes sam// dmag dpon pas na 'brang du bshad// rgyam pa nyid mthang nyams su ston// dkar byung narab tu bshad// bkang bshags bya'i dngos grab
310a2(rnying rgyud): blang // dam chog pasre gang srin las bco// danam 'bar lazad par bca// shang du pa ba ltas bu theg dang // rgyal rags kyang nga byas gyur na// sbya 'bag ma dang lhag pas de// 'dudu 'angaganam rigs dang // mabar bang gnanan gnas lags 'byang / dun
310a3(rnying rgyud): dpel zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ rgyal po phyi ltar sgrub pa skyo 'bog gi skabs te zhe dgu pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos rgyal po nang du bsgrubs te sgro 'bog gtong ba 'di gsungs sa// lkog mar bla ma mnyes byas shing // sgrib paskyong zhing dam tshig
310a4(rnying rgyud): bsrung // mtshan ldan dgon pa'i gnas nyid du// lta brgya bskyed 'jam dpal bsnyen// bla ma mnyes pa'i rim gro bya// dkyil 'khor bcig dang chag chag gdab// de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// thig bzhi btab la le'u tshe dgu// dbus kyi le'u tshed kar pol// shar ser
310a5(rnying rgyud): sngo nub dmar byad ni ldang // mtshams bzhi spug nag sgo dang bcas/ dbus su gru gsum re re bri// de nas tsan+dan dkar po 'am// rgya shug dkar po'i phrar pa dgu// srog bdag dgu ru mda' gsol la// dar dkar srog snying bri ba te gdags// 'di skad btsod la dgod par bya/
310a6(rnying rgyud): dbus phyogs shel ri shel gyi khang pa nas// khams gsum srog la mnga' mdzad pa// srog bdag nag po ral pa can// bstan pa bsrang phyir gshegs su gsol// bsam pa bsgrub phyir gshegs nas kyang // pho brang dbus kyi le'u tshol// dgra bgegs bsno
310a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i gdan stengs su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// ging kar sa ma ya teSh+Tha lhan/ zhes dbus su dgod do// rgyal rigs sreg la mnga' mdzad pa// srog bdag rgyal po khu le shod// dkyil 'khor shar gyi le'u tshel// dgyes shing brtan par
310b1(rnying rgyud): bzhugs su gsul// ma tha' srog la mang 'a mad pa// rgal ba can pa mags yang// chags dal 'apar ba'atshal// dkyis shing bdan par bkrugs sngagasapa// rnas rigs mag la mnga'am dngag// la bstan pa ga sa yang // de ba
310b2(rnying rgyud): mi phyogs su dgod// dmangs rigs srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po bram ze yang // de bzhin byang gi phyogs su dgod// bud med srog la mang mdzad pa// rgyal pa chen po shang ze yang / dkyil 'khor shar lho'i le' tshor dgang // byis pa'i srog la
310b3(rnying rgyud): mnga' mdzad pa'i// thal ba chen po / khad kyang // dkyil 'khor lho rab le'u tsher dgrad// mi nag srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal ba chen pon 'dakyar // nub byang dkyil 'khor le'u mor dgod// zol song sog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po nyig yang //
310b4(rnying rgyud): byang shar dkyil 'khor lo 'tsher dgod// de nas mchog gi phrar ba bzhi// nyi bzhi'i gang bzhing mnga' gsol pa// ris mthun dar gyi rbad pan gdags// zin las btsal phyir sgo bzhir gdab// dar dung gsum dril mtha' ma bskor// bla rgyan logs kun cimang
310b5(rnying rgyud): dgram// dar dkar kur phrab za 'og gdan yang btid// de nas dbus kyi srog bdag la// gtsang rgya bre gang lha bshos la// ri rang tshul 'dra zheg byas la// dbus su h+lag mtshi gla dgral// mtshal gyi mkhrar thabs nya mig bri// rtse la za rgod kyul mchun dang /
310b6(rnying rgyud): dang dkar gdugs gcig sbed nas dgab// dngul gyi g.yer kha g.yag rnga bon// lpags bu dkar po'i blungad bu gdags// tha ma'i tshigs la ming rus gdags// gzhan yang phyag ma tshigs gsum bachad// mtshal dang ldong ros sgo sprad la/ mkhar thabs bris
310b7(rnying rgyud): lartse kha spad// lce la dar lce re yang gdags// bar bar ra dkar byad bu dang // dung dang zangs dang rin po che// b+hu ru mgron bus gser gdags// tha ma'i tshigs la ming rus gdags// lcang ma mtho re ba bzhi la// mtshal lamar mas kyis g.yung drung bris//
311a1(rnying rgyud): ga dkar la yang

311a3(rnying rgyud): de dbus su gzhag paraH// ha kyis drang por ra 'ang gagang du// gser dang mang rjed sbyar ba wa// phyogs bzhi dbum dang lu rug lag/ gas ma tshe dang blang nag dang // chang phud dgangs na bu mig za// de gsupa gcig tung kris pa dgag/ ngag sa

311a7(rnying rgyud): dIkA la mA ra mA rA ya swAH/ don phrag bdag rang ni steng po'o// 'di 'gyur srog bdag ni snying ba'o// mai dz+ra me ma hA ba ra swAhA/ e ag ga \u0f7fmA hA/ oM yug ga shAm po \u0f7f/ oM drang rtsirta ba swaH/ oM gang shing kai dz+dzaH/ yod song pa ya ts+tsha/
311a8(rnying rgyud): men 'dab hU~M/ oM swan+da stsu pa te zla'i ldaH/ de rnams sreg ga tong byen// chog gsal dang rjong ba ldang // sbya rangs shang rnas khang dpas bsngal// glathung ba'i rtags rnams sbyin par ngos// rang 'drang mgasu 'dra nga // rab la sgrani dang sa da//
311b1(rnying rgyud): l+r-ing ma 'o da m+ba r+b+yA// de la dbang bskur dam pas bya// rbad skyugs brdzangs shi phrin las btsal// AmAHpra ma na kA ra ka tsar mun tram hA shad tsaka tsal bang bing dgra po mAr yata bcab/ dran rgyal ba 'khor dang bcas pa rnams las la zad pa'o// danas tu
311b2(rnying rgyud): dkar po'i thong pa'i nang pa rnag pa'i ming rus brgyag la/ rta zong za 'og dag gis sril// dam sre spro na gzhug pa'i phyir// khrag ma gru grul skyer ba dang // maman+ta gor tsan la// rgyo 'brog gtang ba'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM mI ma ma nga gzun b+h+yo/ mahA nga rdzun
311b3(rnying rgyud): d+h+wadz+dza/ mahA bar+d+ha d+ha ma hA de ba mad+hA r+yAd+haN+Dod+d+ho/ oM dz+yo ta ya rbota yA/ rba ta yutrA t+yA ya/ kyai g+ha~M g+h+nAH gIng kAr ging kar/ gang dz+wal gling dz+wa la/ ya thA grI ba/ yaH grI ba/ d+hi ge gr-I wa d+ha sha brI la/ myaH dkar po d+han+ta/ de ni srog bdag 'khor gyi smai dag tu
311b4(rnying rgyud): bsngags so// de nas brnag pa'i ming rus la// rang dang rtse ba'i sngags brjod cing // phrar ba rnams kyis rim pas gdab// gtso bo'i phur ba snying la gdab// khu li shod kyi gsang bar gdab// rgyal po ag gi lag pa g.yas/ rgyal po ug gi dpung pa
311b5(rnying rgyud): gla bye// rgyal bad+hA nI'i lag pa g.yon// shang ze'i rkang pa g.yas sre ga dag/ de kho dpung mgo g.yas su gdab// rdo khod dpung mag ga yon laM gdab// ti zlas dang ba g.yon la gdag/ gsang pa nyi ma bzhi pa ste// nyin bzhi lha yi ging bzhirtsa// de nas

311b7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed bas rgyal po gsang bar sgrub pa'i thabs thams cad kyi mtshig tu byung ba'i de gsungs so// rnal 'byor yon tan ldan pa des// bla ma mnyes pa rab byas te// mgon rje bya bzhin du dgug/ de mtshig chen bsrog bzhin bsrung // gzhan
312a1(rnying rgyud): danam yan dang dan du// dur 'das du gan par 'gro// phre bshags sdig spangs bsad nams bsag/ mnyes dbang ga zug klud gto ga // shAk+kul 'khor ba/ kulnga cag nagagadab// thig ga dab dkyil 'khor
312a2(rnying rgyud): dgra yi sngags bris pa// dbus su dkar bskyed 'dren dgod// rgyan dang cha lug sa gsal bar bskyed// shar phyogs rtsibs la khrul dgang // lho'i rtsibs la lag ge dgad// rnab kyi rtsibs la ug ga dag du// byang gi rtsibs ladrang ze gad// shang ze shar la par/
312a3(rnying rgyud): mkhod napal nyen byang // de ltar zla bzhing dag par bya// 'khar gzhang du bar bamigs// / snying sna chags ste ga tur ma pa sham// phrag dkang snying phrag mthal ba// phrag tu'i nang du med dus gzhug/ nga kyi gyen du brdzun la bzhag/ dar /
312a4(rnying rgyud): dkar tshil gyis kha bcad la// dbus su srog bdag nyid la gzhag/ shar du khrag sta'i gtor ma gzhag/ g+ho ru sha sna'i gtor ma gzhag/ nub tu rus pa'i gtor ma gzhag/ byang du mkhal ma'i gtor ma gzhag/ de nas sgo bzhi'i gtor ma yang //
312a5(rnying rgyud): shar sgor mchin pa sna tshogs gzhag/ lho sgor sha chen 'bru sna gzhag/ nub sgor mtsher ba sna tshogs gzhag/ byang sgor tshil du sna tshogs gzhag/ gtor ma de dag nang du yang // bshos bu ma khyid re btsugs la gzhag/ de la smyug rgod re la yang // phod
312a6(rnying rgyud): dkar pags dra dkar po dang // med bya 'i yang btags la gzhag/ phyogs ma nor bar gzhag pa yang // man 'jig steng du gzhag par bya// shar du lug dkar g+ho ra// rlub ba ba dkar byang du // bgazan gzugs bus dkar bar bsngar/
312b1(rnying rgyud): sems can dngas su yad na rab// med na gang rung gcag gi ster// ming rus bris te gdags par bya// dkyil la bar ston pa 'brag zang du// dam gra' gzugs dang ming rngam gzhag/ sha zag sa chags gtang ma la// che zhal kha tha yod pa la/
312b2(rnying rgyud): rak+ta'i gas nganan chas pa gcig/ dkyil 'khar byad shar mtshams su gzhag/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum gsal bar bsgom// gzhal yas gdan bcas sman drang bskyed// bdag nyid gshed po rags pa brnam la// rgyal po 'khor bcas gsal bar brnams/
312b3(rnying rgyud): spyan drang bzhugs mchod tshul bzhin bya// rtag tu snying pa 'di yang bzlas// oM 'bar sha ma hA rA dza swA hA/ oM khu le ma hA bar ma swA hA/ A~M ag ge ru Na swA hA/ oM yug ge ma le swA hA/ oM drang ze bab+hA swA hA/ oM shang ze shang ka ra ma swA hA/ oM da khod pa
312b4(rnying rgyud): par swA hA/ oM ni khong par hi ti swA hA/ oM sAr+ya tsan+da ma hA khu le swA hA/ de ni rtsa ba'i drag sngags te// grub rtags sku yang dngos su ston// me dang 'od dang sgra yang ston// skra dang byi la seng ge 'bag/ dge ba shes bcad po lta bu dang // dmag dang ni lta bur
312b5(rnying rgyud): ston par nges// rgyal po drag tu sngags 'dis rbad// oM ma hA dra ma ra kA rak+ta tsa ra mu tra ma hA ni te tso ka tsa la bing bing dgra bo mA ra ya ha ba hab/ 'khor bcas las la gtad pa'o// lha dang dbye ba drag po'i sngags 'dis dpral// ma hA sa ma ya ra kA la hA rAng thun thun grol
312b6(rnying rgyud): phral/ de nas bsgrub pa thon nas kyang // gsang pa'i phur pas gda' ba ni// dbus nas phyung la 'di skad do// b+h+rUM/ khro bdag chen po snying 'byin gyis// dpa' bo chen por dbang bskur bas// dgra snying dkar nag mtshams su gdab// btab nas myur du
312b7(rnying rgyud): brlag gyur cig/ kI li kI la ya tsit+ta mugs/ dkar po snying 'byin lhan lhan// hU~M/ khro bdag chen po khrale shod// gsod pa'i phur bar byin brlabs te// phrag khyim g.yas dang g.yon du gdab// btab pas khrag skam myur du gsod// badz+ra su ta tsa
313a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ dak+Sharlabs nan/ thA// zla ba dag srog padag ag yang // 'gugs pa'i bdag par mnga' gas lanas// nA ma g.yas dang g.yan du gdab// panab pas ma bris pa k+Sha yas sa // ma tsal mas mthabs thabs
313a2(rnying rgyud): hUM/ khri bdag sgrol ging ug ge yang // rno ba'i dpal du byin brlabs nas// spyi bo'i gtsug tu btab bas kyang // klad gzer mgo dang 'dar bus sod// mas bra ha tshal pa tshal pa ka ru hU~M hUM/ b+h+rUM/ khri bdag shan pa dang ze yang // 'debs pa'i dpal
313a3(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs nas// mkhal khung gnyis su gdab par bya// btab pas chu 'gag sked nad sod// bi ma la bi khA ya bi ma nad shar phaT dza/ hUM/ khro bdag srog gtsed shang ze yang // zur gsum rtse mor byin brlabs te// mchin ma phog/ dung rtsa la gdag
313a4(rnying rgyud): btab bas mchin nad khrag gis sod// mas la khum ta ra la tshad pu rer dgra bo mA ra ya dza/ hUM/ khro bdag gsod dga' da khod kyang // thog med 'debs par dbang bsrung nas// sha mtshan rmen bu'i dkyil du gdab// btab pas spos nad gum bus sod// kha la ru tse kha
313a5(rnying rgyud): mal shra phu phaT dza/ hUM/ dgra bla'i rgyal po ni khod kyang // rtse gsum dar can rab 'byin bskyed// mcher pa'i dbus su btab nas kyang // mtshar nang lkugs nad skyo bo gathong // me kha kha ru tse bag sha nu tra rig me mu ru mu ru phaT dza/ hUM/ gsang ba'i srog bdag nyi zla yang /
313a6(rnying rgyud): phur pa'i lha ru dbang bskur nas// rkang pa'i mthil du gdab par bya// zha grum sgrar nad 'theng grum gtong // 'ba' lu ba gte rag sha kha khrag rngubs rngubs/ phur sngags btab nas thun sngags brab// oM mA ma mA ra ya thun d+ho/ ma ra ra tsa thun d+ho b+h+yo ma hA ba ba ma hA de ba ma hA ru trats+tsha
313a7(rnying rgyud): bya// bru~Mn gyis brgyab ste brlag par 'gyur// 'dru ga tubs la gtor mar stsal// reg sum rtse la yas su tha bsngal// rgyal ba bsrung ba'i sngags ni/ e 'du she sha sha bra la ma marba tra// dral khril/ srog bdag 'dzir dang bcas las nir sgrub pa'i sngags
313b1(rnying rgyud): oM dzam be la she ba la goms b+hu mu tru hU~M s+thA hA/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas byes su gar 'gro yang dgra bgegs mi 'byung ba ni/ oM nas nenas na haM shi kar ka ra mar mar ru lu ru lu phaT phaT d+hUH/ rgyal pos gal te bdag gam gzhan la 'tsho bar gyur na/ nge k+ko/
313b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i sngags la/ mu ma hA rA dza ba shan zhil zhil shAn+da ting swA hA/ ma hA rA dz+nyA shan ting swA hA/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas rigs chud 'phrog pa dag/ rabs bcad pa'i sngags la/ oM ma hA ka la gangs dri mo bdud rnams rnga ma dza ma swA hA/ rgyal pos ye 'du
313b3(rnying rgyud): brgya drug cu dang thob shar gtang ba'i sngags la/ oM m+b+ha ya r-I/ yi ngar srog ca la khas kha sa mer me ru sA ta/ rgyal pos ser rab 'bebra pa'i sngags la/ oM b+hU ta pre sha thor b+ha/ nal chem chem b+h+yo/ hrur rgyal gyi/ kha shwar ni ba shar shar/ nam tsham
313b4(rnying rgyud): b+h+yo/ rgyal pos ltas ngan 'beb pa'i sngags la/ oM shar gling ram shag/ rgyug rgyug/ ram chug/ srog la chug/ sha sha dgra bo'i gling la sha/ 'phra til ram khyer sa de srog/ rgyal po sa ya Na stab bsnol gtong ba'i sngags la/ oM ma hA prag shing
313b5(rnying rgyud): mi ru kha la a tsi ma sha dgra bo phrol phrol shig b+h+yo/ zhes sngags kyi don bstan las rnams 'grub// gang la bya yang thogs pa med// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ rgyal po gsad bar bsgrub pa'i skyo 'bog gi skabs te nga gcig pa'o//
313b6(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos/ 'gal ba cham la dbab slad du/ gnod sbyin gdug pa'i zla gsang gsungs pa/ dad pa gsum ldan rnal 'byor pas// dam tshig rang gi srog bzhin bsrung // bla ma mnyes pa'i rim gro bya// dung khrod nags tshal dgon par
313b7(rnying rgyud): 'gro// gyi bshags 'bral la sogs pa 'don// bsad nams tshogs kyi yan lag bsag/ mnyes dbang gzug glang gtor gting // gnod sbyin 'de nyid bslab par bya// lcang sa can gyi po brang na// las grub rigs kyi zhing khams nas// gnad sbyin thob

314b1(rnying rgyud): gas nga yang thab ste// mdung du gang ba bzang pa dgong // mthun ldan mod pa rngamags ma du// 'phrag dras pa'i phyim dang / nga s+thA zags sngar la gzhag/ dbus kyi grags ma mthar dra bskod// nang drang bas rgyad thod pa ga rdung // thang dag kyang dan dra/
314b2(rnying rgyud): da// dag dang sde thag kyang bas dbang // dmigs pa'i thang rje ji bzhin bya'o// zad pa'i nang dugazug par bya// bathod kyang rkyong ba ba yinas sung// mngon mi'adas grangs kyang nal gyi// slong ngas rgyas me pas byeng // ji thug rten pa
314b3(rnying rgyud): de badzin yi ge dag dgras la// thun gyi thod pa/ kha yang bcad// de nas rim pas las rnams bya// b+he/ gsang pa thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// grub pa'i gnod sbyid chen po ldan 'dren na// byebs le'i da bor dang rab chas te// sangs kyis bskyed pa bapud phyir gno/
314b4(rnying rgyud): breg le/ zlabs pa ngas ma la hata/ gser ltar rab ci gastan pa'i ngos la// mthar bgan mag pa dang snang bltar// bdag gis kyad bcug byed kyu rang bzhin 'thab// zab pa'i dbang bya khyod pa phyag 'argyal ba// brtan par bklags shib di da
314b5(rnying rgyud): de kyi ga' bathams gzhis// \u0f88\u0f90 dang mnagal dang / ca dpang sa la brtan par bzums// sam sa na ma/ gapang dang ba rtsas pa'i sems phrad nyams pa// drang can rjod dgyu na mchod par 'thag// da kyi rna pa thu'i ma

314b7(rnying rgyud): ra ba dang / radra ba nga / snying la gang gar drung / srog bathong phreng nga / gan byin su dang dadang bya/ sag mas thag da nga me do// gang gi rjes kyipa rabatu 'dag/ thugs dam pa pram lda lababaco// ngas gang gas di gag pa'i 'dzin

315a2(rnying rgyud): dpa' thugs nan pa'i drud pas/ TIg gcod pa theg da sbyin gas dgrangs pa bang po nang du bathungs grubs tu ga ma / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das ga shing rjegashed pa ga pa'ang migs pa thub pa 'dig sangasas// dmachog
315a3(rnying rgyud): dbang thob pa'i thus// tha ma mnyes kyir yid 'ayang da thA'aM// sedon ma sbyin don du/ brtsub gang bzhin rnam pa gams te// da rti man ngag 'di bzhin bya// aka rba dang dus// phrag mig kan pa da ye// dwags ni di dge rjod// oM dz+wa la mamangal
315a4(rnying rgyud): yag shab gshas bu ldad de pa lam/ bgra shAsA hA/ 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste// sngon du bsten pa sum 'bum bya// lus bsrung blong ba 'di bzhin bya// dpung ba dag la btags kyang na// nang rnams thams cid byung bar 'gyur// de nas gsang ba'i sbyor ba ni// kAng ni ka dang bal
315a5(rnying rgyud): badrang // busu rdo dreg sha kar// dang nga 'asgol bslus nas kyang // gzugs lardzas drug mchod byas te// phyag zas bzlas pa byas gyur na// longs slod dpag med thob par 'gyur// khrag dang byung rgod rnamachin dang // b.lang dag la bzlas byin na// rta bong la sogs mig zlu ma rnams//
315a6(rnying rgyud): 'ching ma yang na stob 'gyur/ bas pa rgyamagagasam// grags 'di ba thas nas byin gra na/ / mthal bag da/ rata bar nga / spring la shar shar ru / srog sa zeng ba byeng / thang chen lang byin stu/ nga chen pakyang 'chi bar 'gyur//
315a7(rnying rgyud): dang // kadral yang // sngags banas pyid kyang na// lag 'byed na 'the bar 'gyur// shi li ka pas mar dang // d+hu r+m+ma b+hur ti sa bya// tha ba gzas zi nadus sraH// le byas te bslabs byas nas// chu cheganang du tha~Md pa gnan// mad dang grabs 'dzin par 'gyur/

315b2(rnying rgyud): ke'i mche ba dang // wa yi ril makyang drug par// nyi mgung ngamanam phyed na// sum 'bum bzlas te don po yi// mkhar la rgyab na 'jig cing 'gas// de nas thog chen 'bebs 'dod na// srin rdog drung chen sha ri dam// de rnams thod pa dum gsum du// lugs
315b3(rnying rgyud): sa'i khrag la sbyar laskal// gong gi sngags bzlas g+ha rten sra// gdon mitha par pog 'bebru 'gyur// 'jam dpal thagasang nag po'i rgyad las/ srog gcod lnga grig nod srin gyi thugs las gang ba bzang po gsang ba ltar bsrub pa'i skabs teng bzhi pa'o//
315b4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos/ 'gal ba cham la dab bslad du// gdug pa kru yi blagasang gsungs// rub phyogs pho brang rgya mtsho'i chu// ngo mtshang chu bo bzhi 'babs pa// rab tu mi sran klu yi gnas// de nyid dregs pa 'dul ba'i phyir//
315b5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan gshin rje gshed po yis// lag na rdo rje ra sku sprul te// lag na rdo rje thugs khros te// gser mig 'bar ba'i nga rgyal gyis// gdug pa'i klu rnams bred 'gyur te// rab tu mi srun gru rnams kyis// rab tu 'dzer te 'di skad smras// kye ma'i rdo rje gzugs mdzes
315b6(rnying rgyud): pa// rab tu rngams pa'i rdo rje'i so// lcags mchu 'bad ba rab tu brjid// gser mig 'bar ba rab tu bgrad// mgo la yid bzhin nor bus brgyan// shes rab thabs ldan gshog pa brgyad // thabs ldan sder mo rnam par gdengs// kye ma'o su stod mchog gi g.yang gzhes
315b7(rnying rgyud): brgyan// sku h+la phrul gyi chun pos brgyan// thod pa tshar gsum ser la la// rtsal 'phags khyad par de bzhin mthong // bdag cag rnams kyid mtshig lha// drag po'i cha byad tha las rgyal// drag po chen po bka' bzhin pa byed// zhes 'jor zhing 'thon nas dem tshig spras te grul 'jil
316a1(rnying rgyud): la// nga snru bal du ba nigs tAsaH/ danas gsang miga' bar bltas// nganal can pa byastan te/ dbang dubs sber dam chog phyag na bstan// dang pa gnyis sa nang drabacwapa// mdam parab tu
316a2(rnying rgyud): pa ste// khros pa'i nga rgyal 'di brjod do// ta ki dza de byi dzaHde d+hu ya hU ya/ hu lu hu lu pu rba te pu ru sA hA/ zhes brjod nas che ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nal rigs bzhi'i klu rnams la// rab tu che ba bstan pa'i phyir// nyid
316a3(rnying rgyud): kyi gzhal yas khang chen po// rab tu brjed pa 'di nyid du/ gyol song rigs bzhi dang thabs cig tu 'jug pa'i gnas 'di lta ste/ rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus gnas 'bar// ri rab mchod rten gzugs 'dral// bum pa yid bzhin ldang pos brgyan//
316a4(rnying rgyud): srul gnyis dar 'phyang lta bus mdzes// rigs bzhi'i rgyan gyis rab tu bklubs// sgo bzhi ka brgyad rab tu ldan// de 'og sum gnyis rab tu mdzes// byol song longs spyod rab tu ldan// de nyid bum pa'i khong ser na// gser mig 'ab ba dang thabs cig tu
316a5(rnying rgyud): bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ gzi brjid mtha' yas dud skyong dang // gang po nor ldan la sogs dang // dga' bo 'jog po ma dros dang // rigs bzhi'i gtso bo grubagyad de// sru la 'khril te rab tu gnas// gyad nor med la sogs pa'i rgyan// dar dpyang

316b5(rnying rgyud): ga g.yas kyi dang po 'khor lo phyar// bar ba lcags kyu tha ma thal mo sbyar// g.yon gyi dang pos rin chen bur bgyad bsnams// badra ba zhags pa tha ma thal mo sbyar// cung phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// ye shes mkha' lding rgyal po gze brjid 'ad

317b6(rnying rgyud): thabs ldan dza'i drag gis brjod// yid bzhin sto thug rdzogan 'bar// lugs kyim dod pa la gyis// rab rtag d+ha/ pa'i rnams sbyin pa 'dzin// nga ltar gshog bcangs pa rjed marjes// yuN+Dal gdug padabang du phud por 'dzad//

318a1(rnying rgyud): mtsho 'gram chu mig shing gcig rkang // nags rdzongs mthug po dur khrod du// maN+Dal ma mnyam yid 'ong la// ba las byung ba'i rnam pa lnga// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga pa byug/ de nyid byi gyis brlab pa 'gyur// hu sa ma ya ma gyi sngags//
318a2(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid chen por rab brtags te// thams cad grub par bya ba'i phyir// bdag nyid sde bongs dmigs te// bdag po bzhi yis dbang bskor ro// rdo rje'i sgra glang ma bsams te// gagra bro'u sngon mos dbang bskur ro// hri dang yabs ma drags pas dang ba sgyur 'o//
318a3(rnying rgyud): bdag dbang bskur// lte bar oM yig gnyen por re// de nas thig dang ri mo bri// pad+ma 'dab brgyad mu khyud ldan// gru chad sgo rnams de bzhin bri// lte ba mthi dag padu kar// mu khAd dmang po gu chad ldang // sgo rnams ser po sgo 'brar rigs// de bzhin ldan rnams rtse /
318a4(rnying rgyud): gnyen po dgod par bya// parla brgyad la bu chen brgyad// rang rang rtsa ba'i sngags kyang bri// rtsibs mtshan de ma bri bar bya// gru zad bzhi la klu mo bzhi// napa phun gru chad la// sgo 'bur ha sa trag rnams// shar nas bskod te rim par dgod// ces rgyan du bzlas pa'i yi ge dgu po 'di gsungs
318a5(rnying rgyud): ga rdzas ma la cheg mo zhig po dz+wa la zhes bslab par bya'o// zhag dgra bar du khrus byas te// zas rnams ldani spang bar bya// de nas khyab pa'i rtags rnam ni// dngos su longs spyad tshogs rnams 'byung // bar ni bas lngag zor ba 'byung // de nyid ma na du gyur tshad// rig pa'i sham thug dag pa
318a6(rnying rgyud): gti las la gzung // ces don thams cad grub par bya ba'i hrI// dbang bsgyur bar bya ba 'di gsungs so// darang dkar gzhi ma btings nas ni// pad+ma 'dab gi bri bar bya// dkar po la sogs bu khyud ldan// dbus su dam tshigs had god// de nas yid 'od bum pa la// bdun pa dgu pa'i ri mo bri// dge ban
318a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis por rab tu dmigs// bdog tshang ba'i ras kyis bcings// bya'osabu bra ma dang // drag po'i rdzas la bdug par bya// ngas la sogs pa'i gzungs thag gdags// sder gshog phyag rgya snying gar bstan// sman lnga smos pa rin chen sa// 'bul me tog lngal sogs// bcu gnyis lnga nyid byin gyis brda//
