318b1(rnying rgyud): man gas pa/ gas 'o// rtags pa su bya/ dngags pa'i yan lag gsum pa na// yig na gcigagal par bshad/ skyes pa dag pa gnas nas phrus// yon lag la gcag ga las/ nga chags pa smra pa// yig dmig pa ga ma
318b2(rnying rgyud): pabartan par bya// mkha' lding rgyal po de nyid bsam// de nyid gtsang ma'i ras kyis dkris// grwar bum ldan nam thus bsres bkra// de bzhin ma smin pas rnams bza'// zhes 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye ma'o rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag/ bdag gi mchog mngon dga' bas// dam tshig dkyi
318b3(rnying rgyud): 'jug na// tshod kyi mchog gtsa lags kyi// longs spyod chu yo po brang nas// rigs pa'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cig/ ces gsol to// nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi bu// yongs spong glu yi rigs kyipa 'grub// pho zung yid 'ong mngon dga' nas// rab tu gdug pa'i tharnams pa// yid 'di
318b4(rnying rgyud): rab gnas pas// de ring khyod kyis bcang bar gyis// zhes dbang bsgyur bya'o// de nas yang bar chad bsal ba'i phyir// rma byas pardeg cing ga yul badrug/ ces gsungs so// snying po rigs bzhe du rgyan dang // dang sa chod pan ma to zer// longs spyod tshogs kyi zhal zas dang // rten gyi bu mang pa dang
318b5(rnying rgyud): bskur bya'o// de nas dmatshig rten 'brel gyi skying pa 'di sbyin par bya'o// rigs ldan thog med drug pa yi// sngags ldan sngags kyi bdag po khyod// de ring dam tshig 'di byung la// yid bzhin rin chen gter bzhin tshangs// nam mkha'i dngos po mi gnas pa// tsho mdzod kyi gzhas kyang zhing // snang me lnga /
318b6(rnying rgyud): pa ring bo las// rnam shes ldan pa'i thogs med ni// rnam shes sgra yi bo las// yi ge phreng ba nyid du bkod// rtag li li tri ya pa tri s+thi ra/ zong grI/ tri ya kra rum twe yaM/ he he hrI dz+dza b+h+yong / zhes ten 'brel gyi snying pos yongs su sa pa bya'o// de bslab par du bulas ga m-i d+ha// de mi sbyor ba yongs pardzog
318b7(rnying rgyud): dang // bu'i gyur ba tshang bar bsreg par bya// 'dini dang bar na du ba tug ces// de das klu la spong ba 'dig sungs so// rtag gnas shing garang nag nas pa'is// de la drung napa 'dam pa'i mtha bal// sa mnyen byin po dag dang mnyam pa sres pa// tha yi di'i gtugs byas pa//
319a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ mgo gcig srul mgo bdun gyis brgyan// g.yas na rin men bar ba'i bum pa rdzogs// khadog mthing galus kyis sbyin pa na// po la yi ga di ni 'dis mya yin te// rtag tangs// na smram shes de bzhin byed pa/ drug da ba dru garjod po// sa drug par ltang
319a2(rnying rgyud): gsal nas nyi shu pa nyid rtag par bzlas// ji ltar nus bzhin du mang bzlas te/ de ltar bzlas tshe gzugs deg bur gzhug/ gzhan gyis mi mthong rang gi spyod yul nyid// rtags dang mtshan ma rang rang gzugs su 'gyur // bzlas pas skyon mchid pa dbul bar bya// nA ga rA dza'i gzugs pa drim
319a3(rnying rgyud): par bsam// de nas gtad pa'i las byed 'dod na// bdag nyid mthu stobs bdag por bsam byas la// thugs kar mkha' lding rA dza gsal byas te// chu gtor mngar dang ldan pa sbyin byas la// seng ldeng phur ba bdag 'dra bsam// de yi gsang sngags nyid kyi byin gyis brla// bdag gis de nyid
319a4(rnying rgyud): dril zhing nA gar bsdig/ ka la rU ba tsag tshag dam dam/ brgya'am stong du bzlas pa byas nas ni// gsang sngags 'di yis gtad par bya bar gsungs// A~M nA ga rA dza dzaHhUM baM hoH/ che ge mo A ka R+sha ya A kang+ga ye hUM/ tsin yang tsirda yang / len yang len yang / nA ga chings nA gachings/ nA ga sngo banA
319a5(rnying rgyud): ga sdom/ de skad ces ni lan gnyis brjod/ mi 'di bdun rgyud rtsa ba chod// ces bsgo/ 'di skad ces gnad la bor/ gdug pa klu yis dgra 'di ma bsad na// phyag na rdo rje rang gi mgo 'gems so// khong nas snying khrag 'dzag par byed// de skad ces brjod gnad la bor// de nas gnan pa'i sngags
319a6(rnying rgyud): 'di gsungs// mdze thod dam pha mes kyi thod pa ru// ming dang rus bcug sngo dmar skud pas bcings// bud med zhabs mas gtums la khyim gyi gting du sba// nub sgor kha bltas khyim gyi bdag po la// ba dmar glang dmar 'bri yi rA tse'i nang // ming rus 'chi rkyen gang 'dod bris pa de// lho phye zlal lcong
319a7(rnying rgyud): lho du bcug nas ni// hUM gis mtha' skor ba ni tshig mi bya// kun la gang 'dod 'chi rkyen bris te sba// oM laM suM laM pra ti sA nan ti ste ti sgra/ oM che ge mo laM nan/ snyam pa nan/ mA naM/ oM naM ni ti khas bye'u char khas/ nan ti khas/ pra nan/ pra khas/ nA ga pu ka/ nA ga pu ka/ nA ga laM nA ga laM swa hA/ bdag la mi tshug
319b1(rnying rgyud): byaphyir gang mi smos// gnon pa'i rkang pa rdo rje rgya gram bsam// sa brko rang gi grib ma rab tu spang // mnyes dbang gzug g+ha srin dbang du bsdu// de ltar byas na las rnams nges par 'grub// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ gdug pa klu nad ltar bslab pa'i skabs te drug pa'o// de nas klu'i dang /
319b2(rnying rgyud): sngags dgod pa'i sngags 'di gsungs/ nA ga rA dza ba su ki ni stam/ nA ga rA da ba su ki ni da dza/ nA ga naM nA ga ni dza dza dza/ yu yu yu dam pa ni/ dum pa ni yu/ nA ga rA dza ba su ki a mi ta sarba sa ma ya/ nA ga rA dza baM tsa ka l-i/ nA ga rA dza ra t+na nA ga yu/ nA ga pu ka hUM dza hU~M dza/ oM che ge mo dad do// che ge mo sa ma ya da ho/
319b3(rnying rgyud): hUM d+haka hUM/ oM nA ga dA dza ba su ki dwai ngi / a a dad nan/ oM nA ga rA dza dzaHhUM bi hoH/ che ge mo A kaR+sha ya A kar+N+Na ya hU~M tsa na yang tsin yang / len yang le nA yang / nA ga chings nA ga chings/ nAg sdoms/ nA ga sdoms/ nA ga bu ka/ nA ga puk+ka/ sbeng byu / che ge mo mA da ya dza dza hU~M phaT/ nA ga dA dzA ba lu kidza
319b4(rnying rgyud): de dgra po mA ra ya dza da hU~M phaT/ oM la pra laM ba ti s+thA nan/ sti ta ste \u0f7f/ oM tshig mo lenan/ stam b+ha nan/ m+bA ra ya nan/ i na na/ ti khas/ bye'u char khas/ nan ti khas/ pranan/ pra khas/ nAg pu kaM/ nI ga pu ka/ nAg le/ nA ga laM swA hA/ nAg rlung nan/ nAg kum smyonan/ nAg kra ma hA/ de bzhin rdza rnam
319b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs gyur na/ mdzen drol mA ra ya'o// 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ mdze nad dz+wa la klu'i bla gsang gi skabs te bdun pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// gyad kyi rgyal po zla gsang nag po 'di/ dus phyi ma 'jal
319b6(rnying rgyud): 'byor pa gang zhig bsgrub pa'i las byed na yang dam tshig lngas mi 'da' la 'khor khro ba dang khro mo dang / gang dang bdud ma mo la sogs pas kyang nga'ad mchog 'di rjes su bsgrub par mdzad pa so dus tha ma la gsang sngags chos 'di rnal 'byor pa'i sprul brdzo ba rnams la/ ngam
319b7(rnying rgyud): chog gi dbang gis thogs bya bar zhal gyis pa zhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po dang / gseng ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang / rgyud kyi rgyal po blogs nag po dang bcas pa 'di bstan pa thams cad bsrung ba pe long yin par rig nas/ phyogs
321a1(rnying rgyud): skyong gshin rje yab yum dang / bdud dang / ba can dang / ging dang / lga dang / klu dang / stan dang / gza' dang / gnod gyen dang / ma mo la sogs pa 'dus pa phal mo che rnams kyis shin tu
321a2(rnying rgyud): dam zhing ngo mtshar skyes nas bstod pa/ e ma'o nyes bcom logs ldan mtshan bzhi mtha' las 'das// bdud dang gshin rje la sogs kun gyi gshed// rU tra gdug pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad pa// thugs rjes sgrol mdzad khyed la
321a3(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal bstod// shes rab chen po nam mkha'i nyi mar gsal// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer dbyings su 'char// dpa' brtul myur ba'i shugs kyis dregs pa sgrol// bdud 'dul dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// rin chen
321a4(rnying rgyud): gter ltar 'dod pa kun skong zhing // bde gshegs lung dang gtan tshigs kun gyi mdzod// 'jigs byed rgyal po zla gsang nag po'i rgyud// dregs pa tshar gcod rgyud la bdag cag 'dud// ces bstod nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi dngal
321a5(rnying rgyud): bsngas mo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'khor gyis bstod pa'i skabs te lnga bcung brgyad pa'o// // 'jam dpal thagasang nag po'i rgyad rdzogs so// // slob dpon pa
321a6(rnying rgyud): su d+ha re dang / gzubs chen sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ guh+NaHts+tsha shrI kA la a pra ha re kA la taH/ bod skad du/ dpal bla gas nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'ang ma dpa' gshin rje'i dashed po la
321a7(rnying rgyud): ga 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ga shin rdo gshed po lha mcho ga ya mAn+taka/ lho phyogs gshin rdo'i gnas/ ngur khrod chen po gtu mdzag tshal zhes bya ba na/ su blon dpag tu med
321b1(rnying rgyud): ga pa sa ba sagasags srungab/ ba thogan pasags pang sa spong ba/ 'khor lagag tumam pa' bdang dag dang / 'thong ma dang gnas grags sa da rdzogs pan nan 'ab gtu bregs pa sags dang / mas ma cad pa da/
321b2(rnying rgyud): mchog ca dang dang chen dang 'jug pa ba 'a drub/ bam chen pa'i gapal sa min ci ka thab na/ 'khor lo 'bar pa'i ga gdan man/ thod pa rtsigs pa'i tshogs tho'athar chung ba/ slong rkun po'i thar dang / tha chen gyi rgyal
321b3(rnying rgyud): 'aman gdugs dang / dpal dang phyogs pa zhing bkram pa/ rbata mang po sprin lta gtebs pa/ rtse nam thag 'dzag pa/ swab nas khrag khrol ba/ logs nas khrag gi gam chu'abab pa/ bskal pa'i mo sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ keng rus kyi dung na
321b4(rnying rgyud): dang / gan ma thugs yang dang / 'amang po bzhal yas dang / ro sngags kyi ngu khrod la sags pa/ thar zad kyiganas nga ba pa / nyim mo shel dang thab jug la dang / spyad baphra men gyi mdang / yod pa/ gza skar bang sa
321b5(rnying rgyud): bcan pa/ mtshan chen gyi rlabs dang / rlung dag ni/ grib so dang / keng rus kyi ring ba dang / mer zhe nabs yod pa/ mtha' phrag pa'i nag pos bskor ba/ de lta bu'i gnas de na/ dur khrod sa rabams pa yang po bstsags pa la/ mi gtsang bas
321b6(rnying rgyud): na sa/ yin na pa/ 'dzus ba dang / da pam pa dang / bams pa dang / rnam par rnam 'a dang / rnam pa da bang pa dang / rnam par bams pa dang / rarings pa dang / rnam par rings padad/ keng rdzas kyad pa dang / smras pa thal ba dang / tham
321b7(rnying rgyud): pa dang / rnatha par thub pa dang/ langs pa dang / gnang dang / zab pa dang / 'brel ba dang / bum khrod kyi rol 'drad pa dang / gshog pa dang / gtu cing 'gyod pe dang / la pangs spyod pa dang / jer khrod kyings yongs su mnan pa
322a1(rnying rgyud): nga / khrag dang drag dang / chu ser 'dag pa dang / mig cang pa 'dzag pa dang / de lta ba'i gnas des/ ga dang gzhag dang / dam dang dza dang / ngag dang / kang ka mtsha sa dang / kun lag gsheg
322a2(rnying rgyud): spang gi de non dang / ce sbyang ro rngams khwa dang 'ug pa dang / len lu ba dang / srin buka kA ru dang / de dag la sogs pa sha za khrag 'thung ba dang / rus pa 'cha' ba dang / lngagartog byed pa dang / bany+dza dang rgod dang rnga dang sde lpags 'don pa dang /
322a3(rnying rgyud): 'chang dang 'dod dang rgol ba dang / drag po rkan rjeb ltas ngan skad sgeg pa dang / gzugs mi sdug dang 'dzum pa'i mdangs 'don dang / 'khor lo'i gro brdang ljags kyi mnga' 'phen pa dang / skyugs pa'i klu len mi nang dung 'thung dang / dang gyi g.yabang da
322a4(rnying rgyud): rang rang la khro dang / sha za khrag 'thung drag po rkan rdebs dang / brda' dang gar ba sgrar rdo rje thog 'phen dang / gti mug mang po'i dur khrod ri ltar spangs pa dang / 'dod chags raka'i mgrong 'khyil ba dang / zhe sdang rus pa'i drar khror mkhar du btsigs pa dang /
322a5(rnying rgyud): rab tu 'jigs shing skyigaya' ba'i gnas de na/ ma he dang / glang po che dang / gshin rje 'bum mnan pa'i khri la nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brtsegs pa'i steng na/ 'jam dpal lha mchog ya mAn+ta ka nyid/ yu ma dang gnyis med pa rkyang bsum tshul du bzhugs so//
322a6(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang khyad par 'khor du bstan pa gzhan nu bde mchog dang / gzhon nu bde ba'i snying po dang / gzhon nu mang rtse dang / gzhon du ba de ba'i 'byung gnas la sogs pa dang / phyogs bcu dus gsum bdi gshegs 'khor dang btus// phyogs byung gshi du
322a7(rnying rgyud): yuma'abor rnams dang // 'jig rten drug byed gshin rje gshed bzhi dang // gzhan yang yang gzugs kyang mthu chen rnams// srid gsum mun par gtong ba'i brjod po bdud ma dang // 'jig rten mes bsreg pa can po bson mo dang // skyo bog gtang bar byed
322b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i ging gi 'khor tshogs dang // drag po gnam lcags 'bebs pa lha dang sman gyi 'khor// chu 'khyags khrag tu 'bebs pa gza' 'khor dang // srog bdag lnga gri thogs pa'i gnod kyin 'khor tshogs dang // mngon da tshul gajug pa klu yid khong tshogs dang /
322b2(rnying rgyud): yams dang nad gtor ma mo'i 'khor tshogs dang // log rlag par byed pa ro langs pho mo'i 'khor tshogs dang / gzhan yang dri za'i rgyal po kha thun ra k+ka la sogs dri za 'khor sde dang / bshan pa nag po la sogs gshin rje'i 'khor sde dang / thA ga rAng la
322b3(rnying rgyud): sogs zla'i 'khor sde dang / ya kra mgo dgra la sogs gnod sbyin 'khor sde dang / stong gsum kun nyal srid pa khram 'debs la sogs ma mo'i 'khor sde dang / ha nu pa sha la sogs bdud kyi 'khor sde dang / shu ba srog len la sogs pa tsan gyi 'khor sde dang //
322b4(rnying rgyud): dkar po snyid 'byin la sogs srog bdag 'khor sde dang / gzhan yang lha srin sde brgyad rang rang 'khor mang yang / nad gtong khram 'debs bsam gyis mi khyab dang / gzhan yang 'dod pa'i bu mo'i tshogs rnams dang / rgyal mo dang ni yang rgyal mo/ blon
322b5(rnying rgyud): mo dang ni yang blon mo// bran mo dang ni g.yog mo'i tshogs// de dag la sogs 'khor na yang // 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad bdag mo// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad gtong tshogs// bsam gyis mi khyab thabs cig bzhugs// be tA li dang ral ga rdzig gnyis//
322b6(rnying rgyud): g.yas nas 'khril te gnyis med bzhugs// g.yon nas mdun gyis bltas te bzhugs// gzhan yang gshin rje'i 'khor tshogs 'di lta ste// 'khor bar byed pa'i ya ma rA dza dang // yid 'khrug byed pa'i myos byed 'bar ba dang // khrag phyag byed pa'i
322b7(rnying rgyud): 'chi bdag ma ru co// thams cad 'joms byed ral pa tshar dgu dang // kong tso brag kyo na a bgrang mgo dang // ya ba ti dang mig dmar dang // rmig pa lha mchog til ba dang // chos kyi rgyal po nag 'joms dang // phya sangs dang ni dmar po dang // thod/
323a1(rnying rgyud): dpag la sogs bka' tan rnams// bzad brtag nyis 'amar gyis bku// e kaHta btA le// ro langs nag mo mag 'byung dang // ma khyen ga mamag 'thang dang // badz+rad modag mar mate// rba
323a2(rnying rgyud): srin nag mo mgo 'phyang dang // sa bdag nag mo mgo 'phyang dang // mi bzad bdud mo mgo 'phyang dang // patsan mo nag mo mgo 'phyang dang // gyi long nag mo mgo 'phyang dang // bdud mo nag mo re ma ti// sa 'dag nag mo mgo 'phyang dang // sa srin nag mo
323a3(rnying rgyud): mgo 'phyang dang // klu srin nag mo mgo 'gyang dang // lha mo nug mo mgo 'phyang dang // de ltar yum dang thabs cig go// yab yum 'khor yang 'di lta ste// ya mA rA dza'i 'khor dag na// bdud rtse rgyal po dregs pa gsus po che// gshin rje dmar po
323a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor dag na// srog bdud mched gsum gnas pa ni// srog bdag snying 'byin bcon 'gong dmar po dang // bdud kyi rgyal po lag tu spyan gcig dang // gzhan yang kong tso brag gyon 'khor dag na// bdud kyi rgyal po stag thabs gnas// a ba glang
323a5(rnying rgyud): mgo'i 'khor dag na// bdud kyi rgyal po a bi ra// tshogs po mgo dgu dag gi 'khor dag na// bdud kyi rgyal po gur bdud dang // bdud kyi rgyal po 'dzum med dang // ya ba ti yi 'khor dag na// bdud kyi rgyal po be len nag po dang // bdud kyi rgyal po
323a6(rnying rgyud): po lce ring dang // tel ba dag gi 'khor dag na// bdud kyi rgyal po gling bzhi phung byed dang // phya sangs dag gi 'khor dag na// bdud kyi rgyal po phya bdud dkar po dang // bdud kyi rgyal po kya bdud ldang nag dang // bdud kyi rgyal po phye bdud nag po
323a7(rnying rgyud): dang // bdud kyi rgyal po phra bdud sngon po dang // bdud kyi rgyal po rtsa bdu grang byed drag pa'i mgo can dang / badz+rad ba sbyong me 'bar ba dang / bdud mi lag spri'u'i mgo can dang / bdud rnam chen dung gi rna cha chen dang / ral pa tshar dgu'al bar dag
323b1(rnying rgyud): na// bse'i skyes bu gdug pa can dang // stag mgo can gyi 'khor dag na/ klu bdud nag po sbrul gyi bla ma can dang / gri thogs gang gi pho nya mo bcu dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor sdud pa 'on gyi dpal phrag na rdo rje yang mdud kyis
323b2(rnying rgyud): te/ bka' nod pa'i tshul du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ga shin rje'i gshed pa nyid/ 'jam dpal thugs kyi gsang rgyud rtsab chen po 'chad bar bzhes pa'i phyir/ thams cad sreg byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
323b3(rnying rgyud): so// zhugs pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten na dbang che ba dang / mtha stobs che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa/ lham srin grangs med pa ji snyed pa thams cad 'dir zhing zhum nas spa bkod do//
323b4(rnying rgyud): khams gsum dbang du bsdus/ srid gsum zil gyis mnan/ stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ mun nag gtibs te/ thugs ye shes kyi nyi zer gyi rtse la/ 'khor lo'i tshogs dang / gnam lcags kyi gzer dang /
323b5(rnying rgyud): lcags kyu dang zhags pa'i tshogs dang / lcags sgrog gi tshogs dang / zil bu'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phros te/ hU~M hUM dang / ha la ha la dang / hu lu hu lu dang / dzaHhUM baM hoH/ e ra li rdzing rdzing zhes 'brug stong gi sgra ldi rab tsam gyi sgra bsgrags
323b6(rnying rgyud): nas/ dbang du bsdus nas/ gdug pa can gyi 'khor rnams bred/ rab tu bred kun tu bred/ 'dar kun tu rab tu 'dar / sngangs kun tu rab tu sngangs/ thams cad kyang ngag gi sla bcom/ lus yan lag bskums/ sems zhum pas gtso ba la skyabs su dong nas/
323b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyang 'de ba la bkod do// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i byung khungs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// / de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das la/ mthu stobs kyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes bsdus nas/ gdug pa can kyi 'khor rnams
324a1(rnying rgyud): dag mthun par mgrin gcig tu thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho 'jigs byed tshogs kyig rtse// bdag cag gdug byed 'khor rnams kun// snang srid 'ang
324a2(rnying rgyud): khams 'di ru// stong gsum mun par gtong ba dang // 'jig rten khams kun bsreg pa dang // lo tog 'joms dang gnam lcags lce// skyo 'bog nyams dang srog gcod dang // mdo ri mas gtong ba'i las 'di dag/ bdag cag rnams kyi las sbrel pa
324a3(rnying rgyud): dpa' bo chen po ci la bskyon// thugs rje'i rgyun yang mi mnga' 'am// dpa' bo chen po khyod nyid ni// thugs rje byams pa'i mnga'u bdag na// 'di lta'i cho 'phrul ga la ston// gdug pa'i gsung sgra ci la sgrogs// thugs kyi sprul pa ci la 'byed// 'jigs bya
324a4(rnying rgyud): pos bdag cag la// las dang zas skal ci rigs gsol// zhes gsol to// so so rang rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM a k+Sho te ka ya ma rA tsa dz+wa la ri pa ye hUM/ ni kro d+hI shwa dI dzA la raM/ ya tra ga sha dz+ha la raM pa ya hUM/ ra rag mo k+Sho d+h+r-i shwa rI dza la ni g+haM/ yaM rag
324a5(rnying rgyud): sha dz+wa la rA pa ya tAM/ nag mo kro d+hi shwa rI dz+wa la raM b+hA ya d+h+waM/ oM hA trag mo dz+wa la ra pA ya hUM/ tsit+ta ro la krod+hI shU rI dz+wa la raM pA yad+h+waM/ oM rag sha ya ma sti tsA ra ya dz+wA la raM pa ya b+h+yAM/ oM ni tsi raN+Dod+ha tsa kro d+hI shAn+na t+ti ni dz+wa la raM/ oM dr-I dzag shar ku ma~M dz+wa la dI pa pA
324a6(rnying rgyud): hUM/ oM b+hI dz+wa l-i raM ba po d+hi shA ni na dr-i rI/ oM tra trag shA ni dz+wal ra~M pa ya b+h+rUM/ oM tra thag mo rag sha kro d+hI shwA ri hU~M/ oM many+dzu shrI nag po tratrug sha ni ya hUM/ oM nag mo ga sha kr-id+h+r-i tI rI ya hUM/ oM many+dzu d+d+hi badz+ra maro tra drag sha dz+wa la ri pa ban+d+haM/ oM nA ga kro rne thar
324a7(rnying rgyud): dz+wa la ra pa ye hU~M/ zhes phyogs skyong gi gshin rje rnams kyis phul lo// oM ma ma a ka tsi ti trag rag shi be ta li ra k+tam na 'dzi hU~M/ rag mo gu ma mar dun du b+h+rUM badz+ra ma b+h+yo dza/ kha rag b+h+ri kI rna~Mm b+h+yo dza/ zhes ro langs nag mo dang dmar mo'i tshogs kyis phul lo/
324b1(rnying rgyud): rba pa tham 'ag ngar thag na pa te por bdun ta pa staH/ sad+ya thAs d+hi b+ha ga gatshal pa yani / snang ba a ku ga dang / oM TIgs du rnam shi ba lu la su hAH/ thig nga gang dag khyon thams la ba bang tan sag/ gapa dang /
324b2(rnying rgyud): rlag snying la rag/ ma ma rag sha/ ma mra rag // rag stso bu bun sti la thun/ ngang steng la / Ta sa du mu d+hi / rAtsas ma pa tsung srung ngo / ra li bra ma ni dzi dz+riM/ phaT phaT/ swAhA/ 'dzin thob pa ya tha~M me / b+ha Ta lag sha
324b3(rnying rgyud): ta ra ra dAnA ma thig po tshol ma khrag gzang me pa hU~M/ oM n+ta ga nA tsam hA ka la ti bcas/ khyis lagaT d+his d+hA nag / de dag la sogs pag g-i ba med des pa na dang rna ma med/ rnam kha ste dang dza /
324b4(rnying rgyud): dang lto 'phye'i rigs// gnod sbyin srin po yi dwags dang // shaza 'byur po yul bum dang // srul po dang ni lus phul po// skem byed da ni rded byed dang // spro byed dang nigi ba gnon dang // gnon po dang ninam gru dang // de dag la sogs 'dong na pang /
324b5(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung bas ma mi khyab// bka' nyan zer zhing srog snying 'bul// gnas pa'i 'khor rnams mgrin gcig \u0f7f// thal mo sbyar nas sus phul ba// dur khrong me tog mtshogs // srin po ro dang ngo zung dang // mi d+ho dang ni ti dang // da pyid pa dang gnod byed pa/
324b6(rnying rgyud): ro yi 'phreng ba ro brtsegs dang // ba ma dang rdul dang bral ba dang // b+han d+ha dang ni skal tshigs dang // dbang po rkang dang l+h+wa ma dang // sha zag la sogs tshil bu dang // grod can la sogs te// gzhan yang ro yi rnam pa ni// bye ba la sogs chang du pang // 1

326b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyibs can la// dpal rgyas sems dang ldan byas te// rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis su// rgyas pa'i srub thabs bshad par mdzod// ces pa gshin rje'i gshed la phul// gshin rje'i gshed pos 'di skad gsungs// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje'i mtshar
326b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad rgyas par bya phyir du// sa gzhi gnas dang ri rab ser// gru bzhi khod snyoms bcom 'dra// rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis su// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa yi tshul// ldong ros chag chag gdab byas te// rnal 'byor dam pa blo ldan pas// thig ni gdang par
326b5(rnying rgyud): tu brtsam// gseng las grub pa'i thig zung la// dpal zla gzi ma dngas bsod nams tshogs// 'phel zhing byas pa'i sems dang bcas// slob ma dam pa las grub par// pas ma la thig ni gdab par bya// pho brang gser la rtse mogasu/
326b6(rnying rgyud): sdig pa gser las grub// gru chad sgo rnams lcags las grub// rnal 'byor sngags pa blo ldan pas// thig bzhi bzhi cha brgyad du gyur// mtha' nas thig gdab man ngag can// de la sogs pa brtsam par bya// rin chen skyi 'akrung 'dug byas la// rin man

327a1(rnying rgyud): yum la/ 'khor bcas 'thung ba las bsam// rang dang bsgred pa dam pa// rtags dang ldan pas stong 'din bsam// gzug dang bdan nga mchod pa dang // thag tu byed pa la sogs pa'o// las kyi khyab ma lus pa
327a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus tshang bar bya// bskyed dang bslab pa'i 'bras bur de// rgyas pa bsnyen te thag mi rang // rang rang bsgrub 'bras de la sogs// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yis// dngos thub dam par bster zhes// 'dren pa dbang pos yang dag pa sha

329b5(rnying rgyud): pho dang mo yis phye ba dang // gcod byed mtshon gyi 'khor lo la// de la stobs kyi 'khor lo 'jug/ me dpal sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// 'joms byed ya ma'i zhing khams na// 'joms byed drag po'i zhe sdang mchog/ 'bar ba dug gi dum bur bsdus// me 'bar dag
329b6(rnying rgyud): po'i 'bru la bstims// dbus nas mtshams kyi 'brub gnas su// 'dod pa'i dri ma bsdu byas te// rjes su mthun pa'i rnam par 'jug/ bsgral ba'i gnas rnams kun bsdus te// ma lus kun gyi sdig pa'i sgo// nye bar gyur pa'i yan pag yin// sna tshogs dug

330b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / lag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ bsnyen sgrub las kyi rim pa 'di// rnal 'byor can la gnas bya'i phyir// man ngag phreng ba bzhin du bshad// rnal 'byor bde ba thob pa yis// 'jug pa'i rim pa brtsam par bya// sngags
330b3(rnying rgyud): kyi tshad mthob pa yis// zla ba'i tshad ma shes gyur nas// rtags dang dus kyi sbyor ba yis// bsnyed dang nye bsnyen sgrub pa dang // rtsub pa chen po bzhis sgrub ste// bsnyen pa rjod lam thams cad du // sku gsung thug pa kyi 'khor lo yis// yan las
330b4(rnying rgyud): nyams bde bar bzlas// phyag rgya brten dang dmigs pa thob// bde ba'i ye shes rnyed pa yin// nye bar bsnyen pa'i rim pa ni// ma lus 'dus pa'i yi ge bcu// bdun dang bcas pa'i phreng ba ni/ dril bas gshed bzhi'i phreng ba ste// ji ltar gsungs pa'i
330b5(rnying rgyud): phreng ba nyid// mtha' rten skabs kyis byed pa yid// nyin dang mtshan gyi bye brag gis// so sor bsgril nas bzlas pa yin// de bzhin bzhi snying dril ba yis// 'khyil pa sbrul gyi 'gros thabs rbad// rus sbal 'gro ma dang bcas pa dang // ya yi mtha'
330b6(rnying rgyud): rten bcas pa nyid// de bzhin nye bar byas pa yin// sgrub pa las la sbyar ba ni// su yi phreng bzlog pa yis// lha rnams nye bar gzir byas te// bsten pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa'i// sngags kyi phreng ba 'di nyid la// las rbad pa yi sbyor dang bcas// mtha' rten rim
330b7(rnying rgyud): gyis bsgyur byas te// gang yin rim pa'i las bsrung ste// 'bur 'gro mgo mangs bdun pa nyid// las la sbyor ba dam pa yin// gris dngasas phyu ba ni// snga ma de bzhin shes par bya// nyin dang mtshan gyis phye ba ni// de bzhin 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya nyid// nye bar
331a1(rnying rgyud): hA/ rjes su bsgrub byaste// gang yin srung bar dbye byas la// rtags dang ldan par dkrug par bya// zha bar gnas su bcings nas ni// sgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya// thog mar bsnyen dang basbyin pa'o// sgrub pa la sogs
331a2(rnying rgyud): sngags nyid la// su gri 'khor lo la sogs pa'i// mtha' ten nye bar gyur nas ni// gang yin bya ba'i las rnams bsgrub// stag mo khru 'thab la sogs dang // seng ge mche sbyor la sogs pas// gsang po mchog gi smo ba yin// las rim nges pa'i
331a3(rnying rgyud): tshad mar bshad// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen sgrub kyi rim par bya ba'i le'u sto bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang gshin rje'i gshed kyis drag po'i las 'di gsungs so// de na sa nan tan bskye
331a4(rnying rgyud): te// 'jig rten gshed pos 'dul ba yis// drag po'i tshemathams 'ad par bya// 'jig rten bzud kyi gdug pazan// tshamang sa klog ltar 'gyung ba las// ngom tshur la mtshan paklag par bya// e mno// yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' rdo ldanas/
331a5(rnying rgyud): bcud 'gro bas byang chub sems// rigs kyi yang dang de bzhin brdzun mni// rtag par bsgos bzhin gshegs par bya// dzAs dbyug tu sngags dang bcas rnams ni// gzugs dang 'dod pa'i 'bras bug thob grub pa'o// mi dge bcu dang ldan pa'i rnam pa badzin
331a6(rnying rgyud): ba th+yaH// lags dang pya changs rnams dang // gcu drangs pa dang // khams ma dzim ni// khrag phrug sum nga gzung ngo // de dag chen las ma chog yin no// 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag rnamatha'o// tha med da pa dris yang dag gisangs// sa
331a7(rnying rgyud): bcu'i gdug pa ma lus kun// 'dul bar gyur pa rlo rtsom med/ dpa' thugs nag po rtsa pa'i rgyud las/ ga drug pa'i las bstan pa'i ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas pang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so//
331b1(rnying rgyud): sha rnam la 'angs na// rnam thad sta ma // dgan du sonan// thugams sa mas nus smras/ gas sa dang/ nang myadapas//
331b2(rnying rgyud): par bcom// wA grI gA ri wa ga 'dini// ni khri'i mchog tu gyur pa'i na// 'jam pa' mtshan pa brjod pa don// zab pa'i khyim gang yin la// bsad nam mtshogs na na nus pasag/ de nas drug pa byed 'a // chung bani mi ma ngapa/
331b3(rnying rgyud): gtsang ba'i dris byugs te// dkar thub drag pos bsdam par bya// klu ga'i stan la 'dug nas ni// mgo bo ma bya bzhin du dgug/ ru rak+ka yi phreng ba bgrang // mgon po nyid la gus byas te// sngon du 'gro ba'i bstan pas ni// yi ga bcu bdun nus thang gis/
331b4(rnying rgyud): drug 'bum dag tu bzlas pa bya// don bstan pa dang po yin// byis ni ngarabartse mo la// sum 'bum dag tu bkrus pa bya// de ni bsnyen pa gnyis pa yin// de nas dkyil 'khor gtsang ma'i steng // khri'u 'am dkyil 'khor steng du de// 'jam dpal sru
331b5(rnying rgyud): ri mo 'am// bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar nyis 'bum bzlas// de ni bsnyen pa gsum pa ste// bye ba gcig 'bum thon pa dang // me tog la sogs mchod pa bya// phyi dang nang gi mchod pas mchod// bstod pa la sogs ci rigs bya// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas rtags
331b6(rnying rgyud): rnams 'byung // 'jam dpal sku ni zhal 'dzum mam// rtagra ni bzang po byung ba ni// dngos grub la sogs blang bar bya// de nas drag po'i las la 'jug/ dur khrongs la yang song la// mi slar tshes ras blangs te// khrag chen dag tu spang bar bya// khrag sa
331b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis khu bas bkra// btsir la thal chen sa dkar gyis// mdog bskyar phu ba zhis brgyangs la bskam// zla ba nag po'i tshes drug nas// brtsams te phyi yi gtor tshogs gtang // tho dang dbang gzug gser byems gtad// srid pa'i lha srin sde brgyad pa/
332a1(rnying rgyud): ngan bdang napa na mthong // wagangs ta gas zlum g+ha / smyag na dgatugs dgang // gang dgang dag 'dag parabya// btsun pa ma sa// banag pa rnams dugags/ da
332a2(rnying rgyud): la dbu btsugs la// nyi shu drug ni tshun chad du// nus thang dag tu bzlas par bya// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i ta nan hU~M hU~M phaT phaT che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ nyi phyed tshun chad bzlas par bya// mchod dang bstod pa la sogs bya// brlangs pa'i ras de grangs nas su// gzhan
332a3(rnying rgyud): med sol ba thal ba gnyis// kA na ya yi khu ba dang // rtswa ci pog dang dug sna tshogs// til dang nyung dkar mar khru dang // rang gi srin lag khrag dang ni// rnyed na gyis bzag dang // hUM chos dkar tsaldan dang // rtswa sgeg ldong ros yung bas bri// mar
332a4(rnying rgyud): gshin rje'i lto bar gzhug/ dbang ni chung ma'i snying gar gzhug/ zhi ba zla ba'i dbus su gzhug/ rgyas pa 'dod na glang la'o// dbye 'dod rta dang ma he'i 'phongs// bskrad 'dod rnga mo'i 'phongs su bskyon// lhags pa lug gi khog par bya// mnan pa ri rab 'og
332a5(rnying rgyud): tu bya// so so'i rdzas dang las rnams ni// rig pa can gyis shes byas la// las bcu rim pa so sor dbye'o// gshin rje thags nag po 'di// zla la gsang bar bsngags pa yin// phrin las bya ba'i rim pa ni// gsang ba'i las su shes pa rub// 'khor
332a6(rnying rgyud): lo bca' ba'i rim pa ni// brkyangs pa'i ras la dug byugs la// mdol ldum bu thang phro ma dang // kho shog dug sna tshogs rnams la// rang gi srin lag khrag dang sbyar// snag tsha byas la bri bar bya// skyug gu pho rog 'ug pa'i sngo// mi grir shi ba'i rkang la yang //

333a1(rnying rgyud): mnan pa'i 'khor lor gzhug par bya// mnan pa'i gzugs na rnye ba bri// thod parabs cad dag po sa// ngag dig glen pa bkra mi shis// rlung du ba cug par bas nas// zhwa khyung them pa'i 'og dgas ma// ro bang dur khrong dag tuganan
333a2(rnying rgyud): gtad pag shin rje nyid la ste// dngos ni ral pa tshar dgu'o// rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og dag na// mnan pa'i sgra ni tshar dgu ste// rgyu nag 'angadra ba'i gzugs chen la// ma he nag po dag la bskyon// gshin rje'i dbyug pa nag pa thogs// de lta bu yi dngos po la// bdag gis ral gyi'i
333a3(rnying rgyud): bcas// sa ga zhi chen po gshegs nas ni// gshin rje'i rgyal po'i lag tu gtud// ri rab chen po nyid kyis gnan// don yod grub pa'i po thang gdab// chos gsungs so/ dpal gshin no zlags nag portsa ba'i kyad las/ yang gsang dag pa'i bca' gzhang

333a5(rnying rgyud): pa yin// dang por 'khrul mig 'khrul 'khor ni// mu khyud rjes su mthun pa ste// mu khyud nang pa'i bsor min par// thad kar btsal te blta byas nas// slar yang blta ba'i tshang du ste// bar dang ldan pa'i thig bzhi ste// snyoms par 'a gram gnyis su gdab// datsu

333b1(rnying rgyud): stong ban ste// rtogasu na' gaganas gnyisangs// lhag par bag sto thar gyur// dak+ta dag ma pa mas// sa srung ba dpe ma ni// su rme la bar mnas bya// tha bang po 'dabab // gcod do 'a //
333b2(rnying rgyud): kyis gyur bar bya// gcod byed las kyi rjes su drug/ gsum pa dbang chu dag khral 'bor ni// do pa gnon zhes byate// yon tan chud cing nges par gcod// khrag dza dbang rjod yin// de ste gnyis pa'i su // smigatong medapa pa'i bang po
333b3(rnying rgyud): dadi don dang dron 'brel las// sbyar ba'i las rnams 'dedabs pas 'grub// b+ha la gnad kyi 'khor lo ni// rtsa ba 'dus pa'i 'omatshan// yan lag rgyas pa'i snying po ldan// gnang dbu mi dang 'joms dus min// dang po 'dzul mig brgyad /

337a3(rnying rgyud): brda dung ldan pa la// 'khyil ba krul kyi myur thubs kyis// yan lag brdzu bdun 'khyor log cig/ de nyid snang ba dang po yin// de nyid dbus kyi sbyor ba yis// ta pal yi dgos bzhin na// 'khor mo gyi sar mugal// phreng ba ba
337a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin te// snga mji bzhin nyid la// dza ka'i spyi rol re ni mi gting // gsum gsum dong ging 'bru myur nas// lhag ma de bzhin rjes su gyur// gri 'khor lo la sogs pa// skabs kyis myang na ma lus 'grub// bsad pangar chog gi slong ba yin// drag
337a5(rnying rgyud): po brgya dngam bcu pa yi// 'khor lo las mtha'i rim pa yis// gnas kyis grong khyer chen po ru// gtang dang gnan pa rim bzhin bya'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal ga shin rje blagasang dag po rba ba'i rgyud chen po las// drag po 'khor lo sgru pa'i ngas
337a6(rnying rgyud): pathugs kyi caklu bstan pa'i lte'u skye brta drug pa'o// / de nas gshin rdo'i gshed po yis+ya// 'khor lo mchog gi las 'di rnams gsungs so// 'phrul mig maka'i stsal rnams// 'khor lo sbyor ba'i rim pa gnyis// phyogs kyi dang po rnas
337a7(rnying rgyud): ris rnapa sa 'arjes su rjong // dngus kyi 'phrag mkhris sa cu // rjes kyi sa pasasags byung / dzarjes dmam par 'arjes// des thams da // rma dang dru tshigs byung // de dag pa zhi nga gyu la// @
337b1(rnying rgyud): pa susi te// b+he tar me sbyar ba yin// dam pa gzhan yang bshad byu ba// dbus kyi dbru lnga mgyur byas// mdzums kyi gnyis par rjes kyar// las kyi b+ha zlag sbyor ba ni lngas// las rnams dra na byed pa yin// dwe'i rna
337b2(rnying rgyud): brtan pa// rlung dngas dang reg bya// nam mkha'i yid gzugs dang po yang// tha mA nyid la myang ba ste// de dag rim bzhin ltar bas ni// de ni bdag dbang sti pa ste// ris pa yan dgu gzung bzhin no// gzhan yang rim bad
337b3(rnying rgyud): ba// rgyang gA ga blan ma mkha' las// medang k+ta gled nyid spyod te// kun gyi tha mar de bzhin rlung // rim pas rjes su bsdeb par bya// de ni yul po rnon po sogs// nag po gdug pa'i sems ldan dran// bdag gi dbang mthar na
337b4(rnying rgyud): mtha' 'kho ba 'phar mA'i yul du bskrad// de bzhin rim pa gzhan yang ni// rlung dang reg bya nam mkha' sa// sgra dang lce dang de bzhin sgra// / rim pa de bzhin sbyang ba ni// des ni myos dang 'bog par byed// rim pa'i chog ldan pa yis//
337b5(rnying rgyud): pa gzhan yang byed pa yin// gzhan yang dbye ba'i sbyong ba ni// ti ka phreng 'byed pa ste// 'ad la sbyor ba yang dag ni// drung dang nam ma bA'as sgra dang // dge byi ngas dang dri rnams te// thog pa'i drung ni mabyung yang ste// ris pa bzhin nyung nga
337b6(rnying rgyud): bya// snang ba'i gnod pa malus pa// mi mthun rigs su 'byed pa ste// las kyi dbye ba ma lus byed// rang la rang yang 'joms byed cing // rigs gcig tud kyang 'byed par byed// de dag rim pa'i sbyor ba ni// sha za mgo bzhi de lta gnyis//
337b7(rnying rgyud): srub ched ga ga pa'i khong mimis// yang lag dag pa'i byor babyed// mchog gi las la skyer ba yin// gzhan yang yan ga rjod ni// ha drug pa'i dag to// 'thal par byed pa'i 'khor mdzin// las dbyeng pa'i gyur ba ni// 'a
338a1(rnying rgyud): sa / su du/ sa ma mag / sa kya // nasapa / snang /
338a2(rnying rgyud): thog ma'i nang // rim pa ji bzhin nyid sbyar ba// dang po las su bde ba yin// de bzhin drung skra chu dang lce// rna ba lus dang dus dang dri// ra dang nam mkha' de bzhin drung // de dag ji bzhin rim par bya// de bzhin gnyis pa'i sbyor ba yin/
338a3(rnying rgyud): gsu ma pa'i snang ba 'di lta ste// rlung dang sa m+me b+he sgra// mchu dang khye dang na ba lus// reg gyi dru na thog mtha' med// des ni stong ba gzhan yang byed// de bzhin rngam pa bA ya ni// rlung dang reg bya dras dus dang // dI dang ro dang yi gzugs med/
338a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin pog ma par mtha' sbyar// g.yo ba med cing rengs par byed// rim pa de bzhin las rnams ni// bya ba so sor sgrub par byed// rkyen dang sbyor ba gzhan la 'jug/ sbyor ba mchog gi dam pa yin// de bzlog pa yi bya ba yis// mi rgya g.yo
338a5(rnying rgyud): pa dang // 'jug byed ldog pa med pa'i las// mchog tu gsang ba bzhi yin no// rnal 'byor bde ba gnas pas bya// yang na gal te bde min 'ching // sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'grub par 'gyur// de bas shin tu thabs bstan bya// stobs med lam gyis
338a6(rnying rgyud): gnyi ga 'ching// 'chid med grol ba'i stobs kyis byu'o// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rdza ba'i rgyud las/ las tshogs bsdus pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rdo'i gshed kyis/
338a7(rnying rgyud): 'phrul 'khor gyi mtshon cha me lce lta bu'i rim pa'idi gsungs so// sreg cod byed 'khor min// gcod cing sreg pas skem pa la// thi mdeng gnon pasas gde bzhin// srud cing 'joms pas pab // 'doni du srin min ma badzin// zid pas na
338b1(rnying rgyud): par mabyed pas// drag pa ma ma sbyor ba yin// da la rnas pa 'di snyag// rmyi masbyor bar 'khor lo nyid// brgyad gnas dang ldan pa 'i 'dra/ rdo phyogs kyi dang ponas// rnal ma 'khrul ba zhin rjes mthu na gang / rgyan bya mnas gyu/
338b2(rnying rgyud): nyid mthar thug rim pa yis// ma lus dril ba'i phreng ba gcig/ a mu kA yi ming bcas pa// 'bras bu gzhom dang longs spyod gzhom// gzhom pa'i las rnams kun la shis// de bzhin phyogs kyi dang po gnyis// rim pa kun la mgo drangs te// ang
338b3(rnying rgyud): ga'i spu dang 'dra ba yin// de dog gsum pa la sogs pa'i// re mig bcu yi 'bru bcu ming // 'khor lo 'dab ma'i sod nas lkug/ bathun dang brgyan dang sngags dang 'dra// skabs kyi 'gyur zhing 'phen pa dang // de rjes rim pa'i 'phrub byad ni// 'khor
338b4(rnying rgyud): lo 'bar ba'i mchu dang 'dra// de ni kun gyi'ang mjug la gdags// rim pa de ltar de nyid du// kun gyi mjug la sbyar bar bya// de dag rim pa 'di yin te// thog mar 'bru gnyis de rjes la// gsum pa lnga pa bdun pa rnams// rim par sbyar deng de
338b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin bsdeb// 'bru bcu'i bar du rdzogs sbyar ba// dbang po lnga ni 'jams byed de// mchog tu skyes pa pho mo yis// dbang po gnyis po 'joms par byed// sa'u ta ru 'grang ba yin// de bzhin rim pa gnyis gnyis dor// bzhi pa'i
338b6(rnying rgyud): rim par sbyar bya ste// 'bru bcu ma lus dril ba ni// cha 'byed sbyor ba ma lus pa'i// 'byed dang 'khrug pa rnam dag 'byed// de bzhin phyogs kyi dang po nas// gzung ste gnyis dong 'bru bcu'i rim// gsum gsum dang na rim pasde
338b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin bzhi bzhi dor byas te// de ltar rdzogs par bsdeb pa ni// bslad dang skyo 'bog rim pa ste// drag po'i yan lag gnyis bsdus shing // de dag yan lag brjod pa rnams// drag po spogs pa'i yan lag la// rim pas de bzhin 'jod

339a2(rnying rgyud): da

339b1(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das gshan rdo gshed kyis 'khrul 'khar sngags kyi btub thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'ang gsungs sa// thabs dang shes rab bya brag gis// spa dang dbyangs kyi sbyor ba las// dag bsngags kyi 'bru bcas kyis
339b2(rnying rgyud): bya ba ma lus sgrub par byed// sma ni 'jug pa'i rgyu yin te// dbyangs na spong ba'i rkyen du bshad// de ni nye bar bstan pa ste// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'o// rig pa gnyis 'a // rdzogs
339b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad de// yon tan rdzogs pa'i yi ge bzhag/ de 'og dbyangs yig dang po ste// de rjes sgra yi dang po la// su mu ni yi gsum pa yis// de yi 'og nas nye bar spad // dbyangs bcu gnyis pas ster nas brgya
339b4(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa'i dang po la// dbyangs bcu gcig pas steng nas 'chan// sla yi dang po nye bar bzhag/ sgra yi drug pa'i dang po ste// de 'og lnga pa'i za ma bzhag/ nye bar bzhi pa'i dang po ste// de rjes sgra yi dang po bzhag/ ba
339b5(rnying rgyud): sha'i dang po ste// de 'og bzhi pa'i tha ma bzhag/ lnga pa'i tha ma nye bar te// bzhi pa'i dang po mthun par gdags// lnga pa'i gsum pa nye par te// bzhi pa za ma de la sbyar/ de rjes gnyis pa'i yi ge bzhag/ bsdu ba'i yi ge mya da
339b6(rnying rgyud): bdun pa u sha'i tha ma la// dbyangs kyi drug pas 'og nas brgyan// sra yi bdun pas steng nas te// lnga pa'i tha ma de rjes brgyan// de 'og lnga pa'i gnyis pa la// gsum po'i dang po nye bar sbar// 'di ni sra yi 'khor lo'i brdung /
339b7(rnying rgyud): pa bsdus pa'i mchog yin no// gzhan yang thugs kyi 'khor lon// bdud 'joms bden pa dbu ru bzhag/ drug pa'i gsum pa klad nas te// u sha'i tha mas 'oganas brgyan// de 'og lnga pa'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi gnyis pa 'og nas ga
340a1(rnying rgyud): dbyangs so gsam pas stang nas brgyan// de dzag su sha'i dang po la// gsum pa 'dang bsgyur ba ste// de la drug pa 'i gsum pas brgyan// dbyangs kyi gsam pas steng nas brgyan// de 'og lnga pa'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs na
340a2(rnying rgyud): gsum pas steng nas bcan// da ngog skya yi dang po la// jug pa'i gsum pas 'og nas brgyan// dbyangs phyogs ma pas steng nas bcan// su laM bzhi pa'i dang pos brten// de 'og gsum pa'i tha ma la// bzhi pa'i thams nye bar sbyad// de rjes
340a3(rnying rgyud): bsdu ba'i snying po gsum// sra yi dang po gsum par ltar// sra yi drug pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi ldabs 'og nas brgyan// sra yi lnga pa'i dang po bzhag/ de 'og bzhi pa'i za ma la// dbyangs yig gsum pas sted nas brgyan// de rjes bkrus
340a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying po gsum// bslang po'i yi ge nag po gsum// gsung gi yi ge phreng ba'o// sru gsung thugs kyi phreng ba 'di// brjod kyi 'khor lo'i yi ge'o// mtshan ma gsum gyis dgug pa ni// thog mar bsdu ba'i snying po hUM// de 'og wa sha'i
340a5(rnying rgyud): gsum pa ste// de rjes lnga pa'i tha ma bzhag/ drug pa'i dang po nye bar te// de 'og lnga pa'i tha ma bzhag/ de rjes drug pa'i dang po bzhin// de yang drug pa'i dang po de// de 'og lnga pa'i tha ma bzhin// de 'og lnga pa'i gsum pa la// nye bar dang po'i gsum
340a6(rnying rgyud): pa bzhag/ de 'og dang po'i dang po bzhag/ de nas drug pa'i dang po la// de rjes gnyis pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de 'og dang po'i dang po la// de nas drug pa'i gsum pa la// gsum pa'i gsum pas nye bar bzhag/ de rjes
340a7(rnying rgyud): gsum pa'i lnga pa la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de 'og dang po'i dang po la// drug pa'i gsum pa nye bar bzhag/ de rjes lnga pa'i tha ma ste// de nas u sha'i gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de rjes bzhi pa'i dang po la/
340b1(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de rjes bslus pa'i snying po hUM// de rjes lnga pa'i gsum pa ste// gnyis pa'i gsum pa nyer sbyar pa// drug pa'i gsum pa 'og nas gdags// dbyangs kyi dang po rjes su bsus// dang po bzhi pa'i nyer bzhag la/
340b2(rnying rgyud): dbyangs kyi wabs 'og nas brgyan// de rjes bdun pa'i gnyis pa ste// de 'og gnyis pa'i bzhi pa gnyis// de yi nye bar bstan pa ni// mtshan ma gsum gyis dgug pa'i mchog/ hUM dang phaT dngas ldan mas// skabs kyi yang dag las su
340b3(rnying rgyud): thun mong mchog gi dngos grub 'byung // dgug pa kun gyis rjes su 'jug/ gzhan yang nye bar bsnyen pa ni// yab yum gtso bo kun 'dus pa'i// gcig tu dril pa'i snying po ste// de nyid rjes su rgyas btab pa'i// byab kun
340b4(rnying rgyud): ma d+ha i du srin tra ta// theg lo gcig pa'i snying po ste// yon tan 'dren pa'i thog mar bzhag/ de nas bdun pa'i gsum pa bzhag/ de 'og lnga pa'i tha ma bzhag/ drug pa'i dang po rjes swa ste// lnga pa'i tha mnye bar bzhad// bzhi pa'i rna
340b5(rnying rgyud): gdags// de 'og gnyis pa'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi lnga pas ga nas brgyad// sra yi bdun pa'i dang po la// drug pa'i gsum pas 'og nas brgyan// dbyangs kyi gsum pas stong nus brgyan// deng dgadrag pa'i gsum la//
340b6(rnying rgyud): gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de rjes drug pa'i dang po bzhag/ de sogs pa'i tham ste// de nas bzhi pa'i tha ba yin// de rjes bzhi pa'i dang po bzhag/ de 'og sla yi dang po ste// de rjes drug pa'i dang po ste// swa ma 'i za mnye 'ar bzhag/ drug par
340b7(rnying rgyud): pa rjes su ste// gnyis pa'i dang po nye bar bzhag/ de ga drug pa'i gsum pa la/ dbyings kyi lnga pas 'og nas brgyan// de rjes drug pa'i dang po la// dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa yis brgyan// de 'ag sgra yi dang po 'og nas sbyar//
341a1(rnying rgyud): dbyangs kyi bcu gnyis pas// nye bar bsnyen pa'i yi ge ste// rjes su jug pa'i dang po bzhag/ lnga pa'i bla ma nyer bzhag ste// de 'og de nyid bstan pa las// dbyangs kyi dang po nyer bzhag nas// dbyangs kyang cu gtsugs
341a2(rnying rgyud): yis brgyan// sku yi dang po nyer bzhag ste// gnyis pa'i gsum pa de dog bzhag/ bzhi pa'i dang po bzhag pa la// dbyings kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa gnyis bzhag pa'o// de 'og lnga pa'i tha ma nyid// nye bar rjeb
341a3(rnying rgyud): gzhag rgya ste// de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa la// sra yi dang po gsum pa dang // nye bar sbyar te lnga pa yi// tha ma de 'og nyer bzhag la// bcu gsum pa yi dbyangs yig gis// sbyang nus brgyan pa'i sbyar ba'i ming // de ni gnyis su bstan pa te// de
341a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa'i dang po la// drug pa'i gsum pas 'og nas brgyan// skra yi dang po gsum pa sbyar// de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa dang // sru yig dang po'i gsum pas sbyar// de 'og bdun pa'i dang po la// u sha'i tha mas 'og nas brgyan// de 'og lta pa'i tha ma la//
341a5(rnying rgyud): dbyangs kyi thams 'og nas brgyan// de rjes bzhi pa'i dang po la// drug pa'i gsum pas 'og nas sbyar// de rjes sma yi dang po yis// gnyis pa nye bar bzhag pa'o// dajog lnga pa'i tham la// dbyangs kyi walas 'og nas brgyad// de rjes bzhi pa'i dang po la/
341a6(rnying rgyud): drug pa'i gsum pas 'og nas sbyar// de tog u sha'i gsum pa la// gnyis pa'i thams 'og nas spyad// dbyangs kyi gsum pas stong nas brgyan// skra yig dang po tha mar sbyar// de 'og spa yig dang po yis// gnyis pa nye bar bzhag pa'o// de
341a7(rnying rgyud): na pa gsapa pa du/ hU~M mi ga dang gi gsus su gyud// da ga 'i mag // de gdug pa'i gsus pa dang // de ga su le gsas pa hU~M// da dag slo 'i duma'o// dbyangs brgyagasam pas su sa brgyan// rnam pa
341b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis bstan te// dI dgas sha'i gsam pa dang // drug pa'i gsam pa nya ba k+Sha// / dbyangs kyi sgrub ste gnas pargyan// de 'ogs pa'i bzha pa bzhag/ dan su drug pa gsum pa bzhag ga na nga tra/
341b2(rnying rgyud): ma bzhag/ dbyangs yig brda gsum pa yis ni// steng nas brgyan pa'i meng de yin// de 'og bzhi pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de rjes sgra yi dang pol// dbyings kyi lnga pas jog dpa bcang/
341b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'i bzhi pa gnyis bzhag ste// de yi rjes su bstan pa ni// sgra yig dang po'i gnyis pa ste// de 'og zug pa'i tha ma bzhag/ de 'og lnga pa'i tha ma'o// de rjes bzhi pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas na/ de gdag pa
341b4(rnying rgyud): po ste// de 'og lnga pa'i tha ma bzhag/ de rjes lnga pa'i bzhi pa la// b+hu ma ha yis brgyan par bya// de ni gnyis bsnun nye bar bzhag/ 'di ni mkha' 'gro yi dwags rje// pho mo 'dus pa'i snying po ste// spyi 'dus gcig tu 'brel ba yin// de ni don
341b5(rnying rgyud): pra s+thir// basbyin pa dag gi skabs sa ni// mtshan ma gsum gyis dkrig par sbyar// gzhan yang de bzhin rjes 'dug ste// gang yin las la skur bani// rjes su mthun pa 'di sbyin sbyar// grwa yi drug pa'i dang po gnyis// lnga pa'i thams
341b6(rnying rgyud): bzhag ste// de 'og drug pa'i dang po la// lnga pa'i thamanyaM bar bzhag/ de 'og lnga pa'i bzhi pa la// b+hU ma hi yis brgyan pa ste// de ni gnyis bzhag nye ba ru// drug pa'i dang po gnyis bzhag ste// drug pa'i tha ma ter bzhag la// dbyangs yig
341b7(rnying rgyud): gsum pa yis ni// steng nas nye bar brgyan pa ste// bzhi pa'i tha mnyer sbyor te// de 'og gnyis pa'i dang po la// dbyangs yig gsum pas steng nas brgyan// bzhi pa'i tha mnye bar sbyar// de 'og bzhi pa'i tham gnyis// sbar ba nye ba
342a1(rnying rgyud): gas ga du ju// ga da du na/ / gag ga na /

342a3(rnying rgyud): dang po gsum par sbyar// de 'og lnga pa'i tha ma la// bcu gsum pa yis steng nas brgyan// de 'og lnga pa'i tha ma gnyis// de rjes smod pa'i yi ge gnyis// bstan pa rjes su mthun par bya// dgug dang gsod pa la sogs te/
342a4(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa kun gyi sngon 'gro bas// rjes su mthun pa'i de bzhin bsngo ba// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// phyag na rdo rje'i 'khrul 'khor 'di// drag sngags su gri'i so dang 'dra// dus dang skabs dang las kyis dbye// zhes gsungs

342a6(rnying rgyud): 'khrug pa'i 'khor lo 'di// phyag na rdo rjes rab tu zung // 'khrul mig drag po bcu bdun pas// rin chen rgyal po gser gyi 'bru// sbyor ba drag po thabs kyi bsdeb// dril bas 'khor lo mtshon chen tshul// brgyab pas
342a7(rnying rgyud): yang tog bdud kyi stobs// rin chen stobs kyi ngar spyad pa// su ces gang yang 'joms par byed// drag po ngar thung stobs kyi 'bru// stag mo mchong pa'i skabs tshul gyis// sdeb pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag ste// seng ge
342b1(rnying rgyud): 'grub sa nga// rnam ba ma 'bab bska pa 'dun/ drug pa' 'tha bas gang la ga// rdzam thal maldan padabs byu / 'a gargyab pas bzad/ dag pa nga dunang dbang drags
342b2(rnying rgyud): bskor pa'i 'khor la da bzhin te// thugs nas phyogs dazugs pazhir dri'o// rtsams nas marnams te ba mas rgya ma rnams/ rigs kyang bzhan paskor bste// thog sa dpas nas cigadungs te/
342b3(rnying rgyud): bar gyur// de nas kAr thugs gcig te// 'dams byed nan sngags sa snar/ de nas mya pa ga yon phyogs te// drin ldan pa yi yige bcud/ de na sa de bzhin rdzogasas so// snong ma mas gapa'i phyi
342b4(rnying rgyud): de nas bdaka 'tsham thod pa'i denas padaka tshogs gas bsdud pa'i ma gus+t+ya/ nangs pa dag
342b5(rnying rgyud): das da pa 'dartagasas s+ho/ dam mis byung shA/ de'adzin pang ga mam / 'ad ba nags 'byu sgyu/ sa bzhin pa lag smra // 'damag sag 'a ga / de na pa
342b6(rnying rgyud): sa kyi sna bshAn/ dam pas dpagazug sa phyi/ brjod pa mag/ derig da dgas pa// gnag / skas zhug pa/
342b7(rnying rgyud): gtsug pa'amagrag tu/ da ba tshu / denab sadapa tshig ma badzin gyimasani ming / dan tu ba mid/ la / ga
343a1(rnying rgyud): gyur ba dang // rdzogs pa bzhi yo slong ban// baban sa la bar byugs dpa k+kA / dwadus sa 'ag ste// dbusasanadapa' 'gu skyabs sas// rtag gcig dub mas 'ban pa
343a2(rnying rgyud): sbyar// rdo rje gsang ba glan po'i sngags// drag po'i sbyor ba'i rim pa yin// stag gi mchod pa'i byor thabs nyid// dril gnyis gzhan yang mchog nyid de// gsang ba'i rdo rje sngags kyi tshig/ gsang ba'i rtsa rgud bcud len pa//
343a3(rnying rgyud): thar pa'i thar pa ma lus 'joms// bka' yi gsang ba'i 'khor long bru// nag po 'bru zlas bdud kyi tshig/ drag po bsdus pa rgod kyi meng // yan lag ldan pas ma lus bskyed// 'di sa'i mthug po khong drag pas// 'di mi myong ba
343a4(rnying rgyud): sngar bzhin te// dbus nas thig drangs phyogs dang phyogs// mtshams sogs pa la sogs pa rnams// snga ma de bzhin rjes 'jug ste// zad logs stag gi 'byungs par 'dril// de nyid rim pa gzhan na// phyir lang bzhin bskor byas
343a5(rnying rgyud): te/ 'khrar ma 'phreng ba g.yas sa rnal/ de nyid rim pa 'di dag ste// b+han na ga ti kyi laka/ zab tu dang ni zha de// sman dang na twAm+b+hak+ShA/ sman ta dang lag smye sbyar// de bzhin tu dang / dz+nyA thA dan ted d+ha/
343a6(rnying rgyud): rim gyis sbyar bste/ de bzhin pa smyan sa dz+nyAr// de nas brgyad+ma swA hU~Ms+t+wa~M/ de dag de bzhin ri ma / rdorngaman po'i myor ba yin// dbazhin gzhan pa'i ltung ba sma/ rin chen gas sa yig rtsol sa// rnam
343a7(rnying rgyud): byin pa'i bang mtho da/ drug pa nyid kyi gaphu// mdun pa'i slo kau // rngog pa'i srung bas gni pa// rim pas me da na na/ gsas rigs rgyalas dag pa 'arjong/ na
343b1(rnying rgyud): mig sas+ho// dang sa kyang byu zhings pa mas// 'thar 'thalags pa skabs kyis pazlag// dag zugs pa na pa 'dam da pa yang // gta gnyis dag tugs par bya// ta ma thang sa dang banan kyang// gnadag gnas pa kyang/

343b5(rnying rgyud): malus 'dus pa'i lag nyer can// 'dus pa bzhi 'i sbyor btsun// 'dus pa jig yo yid kyis gzung // mun po rab ltar brtan brjid// 'bras pa med kyi kun rdzog nas// lus pa ma shes 'khor yang // gtsung ma
343b6(rnying rgyud): ra/ 'angs pa pa dag da ga gas gas/ dkyil ba da kA // ga tshu mag
343b7(rnying rgyud): su sun // dab du sa na sa su rgya/ pa sa ldan sa
344a1(rnying rgyud): 6'khrag 'thung dag rgyun \u0f7f// nye ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang rnan// nyim 'dakyil 'khar brda gnyis gcig/ brgyal kun gyi bdag nyid // gagasu ma kha'adas dgag bdag/ 'das dang ma 'das pan stsal ba// ba rdung ba
344a2(rnying rgyud): pa gser ltar 'khrug/ tshangs pa kun khyab nyi ma can// stong gsum gang ba'i 'khor lo 'bar// phyag rgya chen po'i sems dang ldan// thun mong sems dpa' khyad par can// sngar bzhin drag pos 'phang bar bya// las rnams the tshom med par 'grub// sme gcod
344a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo'i snying po rnams// rim pa ji bzhin bzlog pa ste// gnas gsum bzlog pa'i sbyor ba yin// sngags kyi dpal dang 'bar ba'i 'od// phyogs dang mthun par rdeg byed de// gang nas thon nas 'og mas gcod// 'khor lo 'bar na sngags kyi gnad// gang yin ji bzhin rim pa las//

344a5(rnying rgyud): skangs 'din chu 'dzin rdo rje'i gnad// 'dus pa ye shes thig ler ldan// stobs ldan rgyu ba med par gsal// rin chen yig 'bru snying por ldan// ma lus las dang mthun par sbyar// stobs ldan nag po dbu gcig bzhin// rigs 'dus gcod pa'i ngar ldan pa/
344a6(rnying rgyud): snying po rdo rje gsor ba'i gnad// de nyid ngas pa 'jug byed pa'i// mi 'gyur las kyi rdo rje'i gnad// de bzhin rim pa kun ldan nas// drag po spogs pa'i cho ga ste// dang po rlungs me dang gzugs// rnam shes ro dang nam mkha' dri// 'dug gi yan lag ma pa bzhin/
344b1(rnying rgyud): skabs dang bcas nas dbus sa ltar// rim pa dang pa sbyar ba ste// de bzhin gzhan yang rjes 'jug ste// rlung dang nam mkha' dod dri// dus mtshams la dang ngag bya dang // yan lags ngas sras dbag kyang // gsum lardung dang rag tha
344b2(rnying rgyud): rnab kye dang chu sbyar sbyar// bzhi pa'ang 'di ltar de bzhin te// rlung dang sgra dang chu dang ni// sna dang meg mes rla bsngob// yan lag lcag ma snga ma bzhin// skabs dang rjes su mthun par sbyar// 'di dag stor ba gsang ba ste// sral lag zag mig lus srin po'i/
344b3(rnying rgyud): bu mo kun 'gro chu srin mo'i// 'gros kyi sbyor bas 'di dag bstan// de nyid ga g+hig hrI shri pany+tsa'i// 'gros kyi de bzhin rim bzlog pas// drag po'i dreg sngags bdun pa ste// las kyi sbyor ba'i gcod byed pa'o// 'khyil ba'i 'bur 'gro 'bu ded yin// de bden
344b4(rnying rgyud): 'khyil pa sbal sngags dang // chu srin ka hi la yi 'gros// rim nas rim gyis dril byas te// spogs pa drag po'i ro khrag yin// drag sngags bcu bdun dril phreng gcig/ rmyab med pa'i las su byed// de yi spyod pa 'di dag ste// rlung dang nam mkha' reg bya dang /
344b5(rnying rgyud): sgra dang ma gzugs rnam shes ro// de bzhin dri dang dus mtshams lus// rna ba lce dang chu lha mig/ drag po'i 'khor lo'i gnas 'gugs yin// spobs pa'i sbyor ba'i dus mtshams bzhi// dril bas drag po'i khungs chen te// de dag zlog pa drag po'i sngags// 'bur 'gro mgo mangs 'dra
344b6(rnying rgyud): dad pa'i// drag sngags bzhi dang lnga pa yis// sbyor ba ma lus rdzogs byas te// skabs kyi las kyi byed par sbyar// seng ge mche sngar stag mo'i 'gros// stobs chen drag po'i sbyor tshul can// 'bru thus rdo rje'i dam yi sngags// spogs pa'i skabs su'ang drag por sbar//

345a6(rnying rgyud): thig g.yog mtshan ldan gzungs ma la// bsu'i thig dang thal chen chen// tu dang man ngag shes par bya// shar nub lho byang phyogs dang mtshams// phyogs cha rig pas blta bar bya// stegs bu 'dom gang gru bzhi la// chag chag gsum dang brkyang rdul bya// byin brlab rnam

346a4(rnying rgyud): mchod pa lnga yang 'bul// sa bdags 'dzin lha mo spyan drangs la// gtor ma chang phung mchod rdzas byin brlabs te// bsngos nasas blang tshig kyang brjod par bya// ngargyal khro bo rdo rje'i 'gros kyis bskor// sa blangs gzhi spang ba ni// bdag nyid khro bor gyur pa

348b1(rnying rgyud): ya dang ya// ya dang ya mnyam tsa dang dz+ha// ni dang namanyamar dang // mdang ma mnyam ya dang ya// g.yas bskor g.yon pa skong mo ma gnyis// ma nor ma log bribag ces// dam tshig yig dgod pa dang // a dang o mat+ka mra hI dang Tha/
