348b5(rnying rgyud): de nyid gzhug/ so so'i rigs kyi gzungs thag gdags// de yis gang byas gdon mi za// las rnams 'grub ces gshed pos bshad// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bca' ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa
348b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'jam dpal khro bo yis// gsang ba yang dag bshad par bya// las kyi mtha' ba rtul shes bya 'di// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// ngas bshad pa la sems thung cig/ bsad pa las kyi bsnyen pa ni/
348b7(rnying rgyud): yid 'thad mtshan ldan gnas dag tu// gong gi las rnams rdzogs byas te// de yang 'chi bdag bsnyen pa ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis dril la bzlas// las la sbyor ba'i dus de ru// sA la ro chos ras btsal te// mas yang ba /
349a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos brgyad de// nyi shuganyis kyi nub min// dur khrod gling nas ras grangs la// dam lagags pa du thugs zas la// 'chi bdag gshin rje de la bstim// yab sum las la stsu ba sas// sngags
349a2(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid kyang rab tu bzlas// oM sa ma many+dzu a kro ti ka kA la rU pa hU~M phaT/ nyi mu drug gi snga drol// ro ras bkru dang bcang sbyang bya// nyin byed dman chad sdug tsha mnye// dbang du bsdu pa'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM du ya ya mAn+ta ka ra hUM hU~M phaT phaT/
349a3(rnying rgyud): skrag cha mnye ba'i las zin nas// de yi dgongs la 'khor lo bri// bri ba zin nas lha phyag 'tshal// bka' bden 'grub par gyur zhes bya// yang na dur khrod ras med na// thod padag la 'khor lo bri// ag rtse 'ongs su 'tsho bdag gzugs//
349a4(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyi snying gar med byeng bri// dgra yi ming dus thod par gzhug/ 'khor lo dbus kyi ya las kyang // 'chi bdag gshed po'i spu ru bskyed// phyogs kyi ya me ta k+She bzhi// bzhi las gshed bzhi'i srub rmed pas// bdag gi mdun du ri rab
349a5(rnying rgyud): las// gser gyi ri bdun bcas par bsam// bdag nyid gshin rje'i gshed po yis// rnal 'byor cha byung ldan byas la// lag pa g.yas kyi mthe bong lhas// tshang bar bzug la btson bsam// ri rang dag gi sde rdeg sted// ri rab tu tham
349a6(rnying rgyud): gsal bar bsgom// de bzhin sngags 'di rab tu brjod// in ma prad+hA ya/ d+harmA sa k+Sha b+hA sarba ta thA ga/ kr-ita badza yA ag ni la ti/ dz+had+hA baMtA thAM yang hU~M hUM phaT phaT/ ces pas ri rab rgya gas gshegs// gnas kyi gshin rje dgug pas ma zhing //
349a7(rnying rgyud): thugs ka'i yi ge ya na ga po// tha ma dbang baspu'i sngags kyis bskyod// 'od zer 'bras po'i 'og phyogs su// 'chi bdag ga shin rje'i gtso bo 'khor// 'bru ma theg bcas pa'i 'od bog pas// rang dbang med par des bcug nas// de la gzug /
349b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi// gtor ma rdzas kyis mchod par bya// brgya 'bub khung nang bcug la// dbang du bsdu ba'i sngags bzlas te// bdag las 'phros pa'i gshed po la// grangs med 'phros pas gshed po'i tshogs// rang dbang med par bkug byas te//
349b2(rnying rgyud): thod pa'i nang du bkug bstim la// zhabs g.yas rdo rje phur pa yis// gzir bas skad ngan 'dod 'bod// rang dbang med par dbang du sdud// bka' nyan cigasung sdod par bsgom// skya rengs dang po shar ba na// 'chi bdag gshin rje 'khor
349b3(rnying rgyud): bcas la// gtor ma byin te gshin rje nyid// pho nyar bkye la dgra bo dgug/ lha dang phral ba la sogs bya// nyi ma rtse ru shar ba dang // ban+d+ha dkyil 'khor steng du bzhag/ de bzhin bsad pa'i sngags bzlas te// bdag nyid thugs kar yi
349b4(rnying rgyud): ge ya// sngo nag gsal la 'tsher ba bsam// tha ma drag sngags 'bru bdun pa// me lce 'bar 'dras bskor bar bsam// gsang ba las kyi sngags 'di bzlas// oM hrIHhrIHwi kr-i tA na na che ge mo sha tuM nA sha ya hU~M phaT/ ya ma rA dza sa to me ya che ge mo a
349b5(rnying rgyud): mu ki pra ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas drag tu brjod pa las// 'od zer bdag la phog gyur pas// rang dbang med par bskul gyur nas// gshed po ya ma rA tsa bsgral// des ni phyogs skyong gshin rje bsngal// de yis ma mo mkha' 'gro dang // rdo rje ging dang
349b6(rnying rgyud): ging mo dang // bdud la sogs pa dbang med bskal// de bzhin gzas pa dngos bkug nas// thod par bcug ste gnas pa las// bsad pa las kyi sngags bzlas pas// gtor tshan rtsi sbar mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam/
349b7(rnying rgyud): dgongs kyi dmar thag chad pa dang // gshed chen ya mA rA dza la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma bsham// be con phyag rgya bcas nas kyang // brnag pa'i spyi bor de bstan pas// tshangs pa'i rtsa bcad mgo 'khor bsam// nyi shar rtse nas las brtsam ste/
350a1(rnying rgyud): bdun nyid thugs/ mag+sas// 'ab da sa ra 'a ba gnor// sa 'dabanas/ na rgyanams canas d+d+hahA/ yam t+tanam / nas sa man ma sa
350a2(rnying rgyud): skad drag tu brjod pa yis// 'od zer bdag la log gyur pas// rang dbang med par bskul nas byung // de yis myos byed 'bar ba bskul// de yis phyogs myong gshin rje bskul// de bzhin ma mo mkha' 'gro dang // ging bdud gdug pa dbang byed 'phrul/
350a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin dmigs bya dngos bkug nas// 'dug pa'i dbang med thod par bcug/ bsad pa las kyi sngags bzlas pas// gtar tshan gyi sngar mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba ba rlag par bsam// de bzhin dmar thag chad pa dang // gshed chen myos byed 'bar ba
350a4(rnying rgyud): la// sha khrag mnyes pa'i mchod pa dbul// de la btsal bskul dag tu \u0f7f// phyag rgya gang bzhin bcas nas kyang // btson lto bar brgyab pas ni// sras brgyal yid dkrugs 'chi bar bsam// bdag gi thags ka'i ya nag po// drag sngags bdun rtsa
350a5(rnying rgyud): bskor ba la// bsad pa las kyi sngags bzlas te// oM hrIHdz+dzaHwi kr-i tA na ra sha ya hU~M phaT/ ya ta ya na ra ya k+She ya/ a mu ka~M rak+ta tsa ra ya hU~M phaT/ de skad drag tu brjod pa yis// 'od zer bdag la phog gyur pas// rang dbang med par 'khrul nas kyang // gsher
350a6(rnying rgyud): chetshen A d+ya me ru bskal// de yis phyogs skyong gshin rje bsku'i// de bzhin ma mo mkha' 'gro dang // gang dang ging mo bdud la sogs// 'dug pa'i dbang med bskal bar bsam// de yi sa gzas pa dngos bkug nas// dbang med thod par bcug par bsam/
350a7(rnying rgyud): bsad pa las kyi sngags bzlas pas// gtar tshan ci skur mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam// de bzhin dmar thag chad pa dang // gshed chen An+ya me ru la// sha khrag mnyes pa'i mchod pa dbul// be con mgrin par brgyab pas ni//
350b1(rnying rgyud): nam khrag sdug mngon du bsam// bdag gi thugs ka'i yi ga las// drag sngags bdun 'bru bskor ba la// bsad pa las kyi sngags bzlas te// oM hrI Sh+T+r-iH kr-i tA nA na sha rba mA sha dzI trA~M phaT/ yak+Sha yaH ni ra ma ya/ chag mo a s+ya kaM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ da dang
350b2(rnying rgyud): drag tu brjod pa yis// 'od zer bdag la rab log nas// rang dbang med par bskul nas kyang // gshed chen ral pa tshar dgu bsgral// de yis gyogs myong gshin rje baphrul// de yis ma mo mkha' 'gro dang // ging po gang mo bdud la sogs// 'dug
350b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang med bskul bar bsam// gzas pa bkug nas thod par bcug/ de bzhin bsad pa'i sngags bzlas te// gtar tshan rtsi sbar mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam// dgongs kyi dmar thag chad pa dang // gshed chen ral pa tshar
350b4(rnying rgyud): dgu la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma byin// drag po'i phrin las btsal bskul bya// de bzhin btsun phyag rgya bcings// snying gar ba rgyab pas srog bcad nas// dbugs kun phyi rol byung bar bsam// gsang sngags bsad pa'i man ngag yin// gshin
350b5(rnying rgyud): rje'i gshed po nga nyid kyis// thugs kyi sgrom bu kha phye nas// zhe sdang sngon du phyung ba 'di// lag na rdo rje khyod la byos// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba las kyi bsten pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//
350b6(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das drag pos 'di skad ces ched du gsungs so// dang po ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis// las kyi bya ba gzhan zin nas// ting nge 'dzin la rab 'jug pa// ngas bshad pa la sems thud cig/ hU~M log rtog gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i chos
350b7(rnying rgyud): nyid de// sems kyis brtags pas cing yang mi snang la// mi g.yo mi bsam chos kyi dbyings nyid dang // rig pa spros bral mi rtog pa ru bsgom// oM ma hA shUn+ya tAdz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ dbyings nyid nam mkha' stong pa'i rang bzhin las/
351a1(rnying rgyud): pa sems nalas nyim 'dusas 'ag// sa 'a sa la sa pa// sgyu / ma ma pal la ga// rdul sa thas rab 'byung ba/ banan san pa rdo rje 'bar
351a2(rnying rgyud): oM// badz+ra zhes 'gros 'dus pa las// rdo rje'i grwar dang sa gzhir bsgom// hU~M 'jig rten khams rnams ma lus kAr// de yi khegs bsregs kyangs nas// ye shes 'byung lnga rim gyis bsgom// me mngan // men ma mkha' spong po'i rang
351a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin la// brtan pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom// de ster raM las grwa gsum me// baM las bdud N+DI'i ngo bo laste// smin pas yi dkyil 'khor bsam// keng rdzas re rab steng dag tu// ye shes 'byung ba'i gzhal yas bsgom// hUM/ ye shes 'bar bya'i
351a4(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas khang // gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs dang // dkyil 'khor tshul du gzhal yas bsgom// b+hI dz+nyA na tsakra T+Thi// gzhal yas dbus su nyi zla'i steng // chu skyes steng du sems nyid ti// 'phros 'dus ral gri hrI sa mtshan pa// 'od su 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bsgom/
351a5(rnying rgyud): aM a ra pa tsan d+hI// 'jam dpal rdo rje zur phud can// sru gser mdog la zhi ba'i cha lugs 'chang // zhal gcig phyag gnyis shes rab ral gri 'chang // gzhon nu sgra sbrul phyag g.yon ut+pal te// mi 'grer shes rab po tis mtshan par bsgom// rgong
351a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de las ni// 'od 'phros phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs spyan drangs nas// nyi ma la zhugs mgon po nyid// bde gshegs spyan drang 'od kyi gong bur bsam// 'od phung de nyid khadog nag po hUM// 'gro 'dra'i tshul gyis rdo rje
351a7(rnying rgyud): snga mnan// shin tu brgyan panyid du bskam// badz+rad las 'di thar pa 'bras pas// rdo rje tham 'gro 'drams// zla ba'i rgyal phrag zhi rje gnong// dbug sum phrag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gyad kyi sa pa ma yi dgas gdan/
351b1(rnying rgyud): batha~Md byug dugs// sbyin pa'i na pags ga// sngags su mdzad d+hagayas napa'ams// thong ga pa// ga ngagags pagasan pa s+ho// las pa gas ba thu gnas kyang // thas da ba pa rgyul ba na/
351b2(rnying rgyud): tig lan nu ti na / // rnab du mye // bal ma na mapa bzlam ma pa // sam+b+ha// ma sa/ ma
351b3(rnying rgyud): yab mamapa pa brgya trA~M// gzhan cu gnyis nas 'ad // 'di rnams bsam pa'i dbang gis bskyed// grus cad tsha brnyanam// gshin ga ga nga sags sa// zlab rgyabya pa da
351b4(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa// lagan rngu rnam tu zang // zhes gsungs sa// dpal gzhan da gas nag pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ malog pa'i les TIg sa drug pa'o// / de nas yang ma tha stobs kyi dbang po laganardo rjes 'di da kyis
351b5(rnying rgyud): mo// gshin rje ga shed kyis gsungs pa dan// bdag spyad 'du ma don shid cag/ bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag dang // bsnyen pa dang n+de nye bsnyen pa// dngos thab ldan dang bslab pa dang // 'chi bdag bdang da drug shing rje'i bston pa
351b6(rnying rgyud): dang // bsad pa'i las kyi bsnyen pa gang lab ste// gshin rje'i gsheng pos bka' stsal cig/ gshin rdo'i gshed pos bka' stsal ba// nyon cig lagan rdo rje 'dzin// 'chi bdag rnams kyi bshad thub// de ya dron 'di yang dag zung /
351b7(rnying rgyud): dang por yid 'thad gnas btsal bar// cha tshenyi 'don 'bram la sogs// bsod rnams dag pa'i tshigs gsog pa// tshad med bzhi dang yan lag lnga// bdun gyis kun rdzob sems bskyed pa// don dam byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa/
352a1(rnying rgyud): rnam par mi rtog dang du ci rigs bsgom// de ltar ma rtogs 'gro la snying rje bskyed// ting 'dzin gnyis kyis rang chud don// rig pa'i ye shes yi ge muM drags la// spos bsdus 'jam dpal sems dpa'i sgrar bskyed de// gong ltar
352a2(rnying rgyud): pas rnams yongs su rdzogs pas ni// bsod nams tshogs kyi las de dang po'o// de las ye shes lha bsnyen ni// yang dag par ni bsdus nas bshad// yid 'thad mtshan ldan gnas dag tu// gong du bsod nams tshogs la gnas nas ni// phyi nang gsang ba'i
352a3(rnying rgyud): mtshams ni bcad nas kyang // zhi khro la sogs bskang bshags dag par bya// de nas ting 'dzin rnam gsum spro bsnga yis// bdag nyid gshin rje'i gshed kyi sgrar bskyed la// g.yon du yum bskyed mdud du sras mchog bskyed// g.yas su sgrol yum la sogs ra
352a4(rnying rgyud): bskyed la// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs dang // ye shes chen po lnga ru dbang bskur nas// ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor spyan drang dang // mchod bstod la sogs rim par rdzogs pa dang // bdag thugs phyag rgya bzhi las mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi// spros te
352a5(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal spyan drang bzhugs pa dang // mchod pa la sogs lha mo bzhis byas te// bzlas brjod bsnyen pa'i 'dzab grangs dbul ba ni// rang rig ye shes gnas su dag pa'i rtags// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang // bcud kyi sems can gshin rje'i
352a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor// dbyings nyid gting mtha' med pa las// skye 'gro'i gzugs su snang ba rnams// gshin rje'i gshed po yab yum du// ma gyur pa ni gang yang med// dper na til 'bru mar gang bzhin// bdag nyid tsit+ta'i gzhal yas khang // rin chen gur phub
352a7(rnying rgyud): 'dra ba ru// bdag nyid nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor la// rig pa'i ye shes yongs su grub pa'i rtags// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang gsal bar bsgom// thugs kar rdo rje rtse lnga bsam// de yi bum pa gdan la ni// sngags kyi sa bon yi ge b+h+rUM// de mtha'
352b1(rnying rgyud): bamangan bgang ba dag pa// zlurnams thags kar dbazhan ma bam// de nas bdag nyid thugs gnas// sngags panas sngags pas 'a 'dres pas// 'dagag papa sa byang chad du// tharnams sam kyang napa pang // dang na
352b2(rnying rgyud): sngags thos pa las// 'ad zeng mtshang ba'i ga dang skamar gyur // par dbyas 'phags pa rnams papag payis// thug sang drags nyid mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'thal// 'od ra de dag pa dag la chung 'dab pas// thag sung brag byed pa dbas ba
352b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzes par bsam// da 'dra bsnyen pa drug 'bram byas pa ni// sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa'i rim pa'o// de rjes zhe bsnyen bshad bya ba// gnas la sogs pa sngo du bstan pa bzhin// maN+Dal chag chag legs btab la// mr-i tag zis hra la sogs bstod
352b4(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // gong ma thar bsnyen pa tham 'bras byas pa ni// nye ba'i bsnyen pa zhes ni dpa' bas bshad// gzhan yang yang dag bshad byab// gnas sogs bsnyen pa dag dang bathun// sbyin du thab la bar rdzogs nas// te bsnyen pas la gnas nas dang /
352b5(rnying rgyud): des ni rtags bzang mthong bar 'gyur// thub pa'i rtags rnams byung ba dang // khya pang dngos grub rdzas pas gas te// dmar ser bkye' ma dang // mar dang spang tse sbar ba dang // dngos thab rdzas rnams bkod nas kyang // bdag gzugs pas 'od 'gre
352b6(rnying rgyud): pas// bdagashegs rnams kyi thugs dam rlung kyang bathul// rjes sra dang mthab rnas lathem pas ma zhing // 'gram thag ga cig gis sa thu ba ba na// thal dang byed pa babyung ba sgram gted kyang zad// brtan 'bres drug nabs sa pa bzhi du
352b7(rnying rgyud): den gzhan ya ga byab// yid lang sa chi ldan gnas dgacu// 'cha dag bdud sru bstan pa yang // yam gas sa byab gsung sa// 'jam thagag gi btsud pa ni// bdag ti dag gad pa'i mtha' nangs// bdu gyur //
353a1(rnying rgyud): debazhin gaphyogs pa gas pa ho// bdag ga thugs ga' pagalas// nags pa dra 'a gyu ba pa// dab bangs pa lathag 'bras pa dang // de bzhan padag ga thags panas// sngags na rab tu bzlas pasam sa// 'od pa
353a2(rnying rgyud): las ci gshin rje la// gshed po'i 'od kyi thog gyur pas// thugs dam bskul nas skad cig kyang // 'jug pa'i dbang med 'ong bar 'gyur// bdag gi bka' nya dag sung sdong bsam// las la sbyor ba'i brten pa ste// 'chi bdag las kyi gshin rje rnams/
353a3(rnying rgyud): gnas su gtong bar gshed pos bshad// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ lhang sgrub bdud bslab kyi ribab bsnyen sgrub bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag po lagan rdo rje
353a4(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// he he dpa' bo 'jigs byed ga tso// drag po bsad pa'i 'khor lo la// bskon pa'i rta dang 'debs pa'i sngags// sdebs pa'i grogs dang rno ba'i rdzas// de bzhin rkyen dang ma ldan na// 'bral dang ldog dang 'khyams par 'gyur// sdebs
353a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i grogs ni gang la bya// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' stsol cig/ gshin rje'i gshed pos 'di skad gsungs// lag na rdo rje rab tu nyon// drag po bsad pa'i 'khor lo la// bskon pa'i rta dang ma ldan na// rlung nag 'tshub sems 'phyangs dang 'dra// 'bral dang /
353a6(rnying rgyud): de ni 'khyams par 'gyur// brdeg pa'i rdzas dang ma ldan na// nam mkha' sbyin gyis khebs pa 'dra// drag po'i 'khor lo lto bral 'gyur// sdebs pa'i grogs dang ma ldan na// dpa' bo rnyed non med pa 'dra// 'khor lo rang la ldog par 'gyur// de bzhin grogs
353a7(rnying rgyud): rnamasangs bshad kyi// lag na rdo rjes rab tu drung // bka' dang bzung bzhin pa nyams pa'i// bsrung ba'i sdom pa mnyams par// rdzas dang lag chad ldan pa dang // bas ma gtan 'a sa pa sran tshugs shing // dam tshig bsrung zhing drug hrul spyod// spyod
353b1(rnying rgyud): sgrub bldan pa yis// dpa' brtul can su rnal 'byung bas// bstan pa gtan pa bsrung ngan du// mgon pa chen po'i gnas sa la dang // ba byed zang zung 'dra byed sbyangs// tshogs pa'i ma byung bsags te ra// bya ba thams cad bdan dbang // bad rna
353b2(rnying rgyud): 'dug byas la// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste// ting 'dzin gsal la brtan pas ni// lha yi rnal 'byor rtse gcig bya// thun mong dam tshig bsrung zhing sgrub// khyud par dam tshig spad cing dor// bsnyen sgrub srin las gzung bzhin bya// tshad nyid
353b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i grangs bsnyen la// 'khor zhing phyin pa dus bsnyen yin// mthong ngam thos sam nyams su len// mtshan pa'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang // zhe rgyas gnyis kyi 'khor lo mchod// dbang drag gnyis kyi 'khor lo mnan// zhi dus bsung phan gdags pa
353b4(rnying rgyud): yin// dbang drag gnyis kyis bskal bar bya// 'khor lo gzhan yang ci rigs par// dbye ba skad dgrag sogs gzhung bzhin bya// gang 'dod las de bsgrub byan// phyogs dang bsam sbyor rim pa dang // kha dog so so'i mthun rdzas ni// reg pa can gyis
353b5(rnying rgyud): shes par bya// de la 'char lo zhes grags pa// dbo ngas chog rnamagrangs so// nga sa hU~M yi mtshan nyid ni// rnam pa gzhan du 'gra zhing 'gro// sa sa rang gi mtshan nyid ni// gang la btags pa de ltar sdang // nges pa'i tshig kyang de bzhin te// rnam par
353b6(rnying rgyud): zhing 'gro ba dang // mi 'khor 'khor zhing 'gro ba dang // lte ba 'khong zhing rje mo gcod// de la grangs ni mtha' yas te// mdor na rnam pa gsum du shes// thugs rjes sprul pa'i 'khor la dang // las dang srid pa'i 'khor lo dang // 'jig rten lan ga nod
353b7(rnying rgyud): byed pa yis// bya 'thab pa'i 'khar lal// dben mo 'phang mgal mi dang // srog dang sgra ldan 'azer mdang // shing rtan chu 'khor la dang // chu dang mtshan gyi 'khar ler 'dod// las dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni// bragrA rjes phul pa'i 'khor bas
354a1(rnying rgyud): ni// nyon mongs 'dig cing sdug bsngal 'joms// bsgrub dang sgrub par byed pa yis// sems can kun gyi chud 'gro ba'i// ye shes semapa mtshon rnam grol byed// de las rnam pa gzhan ta'ang // zhi dang chus dang bsrang
354a2(rnying rgyud): dang // dgrag dang dbang du bya ba dang // dbye slod myos dang sgro 'bog dang // bsad dang mnan pa la sogs byed// de yi rkyen dang rtsol bdang // dus dang las thabs byed pa yin// mnan cid bstod pa'i chos pa yin// 'khor cing gzod cing dbigs pa
354a3(rnying rgyud): dang // bcu zhing 'phrul zhing srung ba dang // gzir cing mnan cing 'bigs pa dang // brdeg cing rnam par 'joms par byed// las dang srid pa'i 'khor lo ni// las kyi 'phen pas srid par 'khor// rtse nang rten 'brel 'jig rten basbed// nyon mongs la
354a4(rnying rgyud): dang sdug bsngal gyis// rnam pa gzhan du 'khor zhing 'gro// 'das dang da ltar gnas pa dang // 'byung dang ma 'ongs phyis 'byung dang // skad cig 'byung ba'i rgyun gyis ni// skad cig ma yi rgyan gyis 'khor// de bzhin phyi rol don rnams kyang // dbyar dbun ston
354a5(rnying rgyud): dpying ba las// bskal pa mang po 'khor zhing 'gro// dpe sa chog rnam grangs su// 'khor po'i rang bzhin bstan pa yin// bde gshegs bka' laganong ba la// 'chi bdag 'khor lo nag byos bya// yi dgas grong khyer bcom byas la// snrel brisapa
354a6(rnying rgyud): mgo thod blang // yi dgas gos la khram bris te// dbyibs ni zla ba lta bu la// kun nas yongs su grum pa ste// rim pa gsum ldan le'u tshe dgu// bcu gnyis bcu drug rtsibs bcas te// le'u tshe dgu dang bcu gnyis la// bcu bdun ya tshogs sngags kyis
354a7(rnying rgyud): mdzes// 'di lta bu yi 'khor lo ni// phyin ci log gis bcings pa yis// log pa'i shes pa ldan pa des// rgyu mthun mtshan ma'i 'khor lo la// mnang ga can gyi rnal 'byor pas// drag po'i gsang sngags par mi gcad// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs
354b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i// las kyi bshan pa'i mgo bkram ste// lcags k+Sha shag ti to mar// khan+ti be ra ka la sogs pas// brdag cing 'joms par byed pas ni// 'jab cing rgyug cing 'dod pa dang // 'dzin cang gsod par bsam pa yas// gang la bya ba'i rna
354b2(rnying rgyud): shes de// log pa'i stobs kyi gnas su mthong // khro bdag gshin rje'i gshed po ru// bdag nyid bsam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mtshan ma ming du bcas pa la// ske tshe dug dang nyung nag dang // thal khrag ku gum nyung dka gyid// rngub
354b3(rnying rgyud): dang gzir dang dbab pa dang // dgug cing rdo rje'i mtshon gyis gdab// sngon dmar byad du bcug pa de// ga'u kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ sgru bcad zhi khro'i sngags bzlas pa'i// drag po'i sngags kyis 'phes gyur na// gang la dmigs pa bas ba rgya ste// mgo
354b4(rnying rgyud): pa dang khrag skyug dang // myos pas mA ra ya gdon mi za// drag po'i las rnams rdzogs pa dang // mtshan ma ming rus bcas pa rnams// thod pa nag por rgyas btab la// dme bas bcus pa'i mtshan bcus byug/ ma la ya yis g.yog cing gtur//
354b5(rnying rgyud): ral ma yi zhabs mas gril// yi dwags grong ngam me brtsegs khyim// mchod rten dung ngam lha khang sgo// rgya mtsho'i 'gram mam lung mdo ru// rdol ri rab gzugs bris la// steng du laM dang shrI gnyis mnan// gshin rje'i lag tu gtad khrim bya//
354b6(rnying rgyud): khab rgyad kyang brdeg par bya// spos dang dug thun lkugs pa kha// nyi ma dang po bran gyis min na// gzer ba mad 'thun kla pa gzer// nyi ma gnyis pa'i thun gyis brab// skyug pa khrag thun mos pa phur// nyi ma gsum pa'i thun gyis brab// gsang ba'i nyung
354b7(rnying rgyud): nags yi tshon// nyi ma bzhi pa'i sngags kyis mnan// mtshan ldan thod pa khrag gis byug/ khrag sta dug s+t+ra slar byas la// shan dmar dug phyogs dug thun bzlas// glen lcags thod pa kha Tan de// lcags mda' lcags gzhu mda' thun bzlas/
355a1(rnying rgyud): tha ba 'i zad pa mtshan padang ba'o// mas na zad pasas gzang snang// zlabag par ban can sngagasas// sgrub 'thod pa khrag na dang // klas pa pam ldan 'anas par bya// rabs cang byud pa skang nag thag/ satshon thun bya
355a2(rnying rgyud): shes par bya// chu shel smon mablangs pa'i tshe// dbyug pa mnam 'i g.yas lag gas// srid pa'i dmag dpung ra mdang jog/ tsam mi'i gal ba kyis gal ba// gsung dang mime rnam pa'i drad pa btang // gcing du nga tshugs zeng bdag// mamaH
355a3(rnying rgyud): rkyen po rdzogs dag tu// gzing mnan drag pa'i mngon stong bya// drag pang dran sngags pa nas bzlas// nyung bran zad la/ na thu mad pa/ grang than zad la/ srog pa y-im/ snying 'dran pa/ kha brgyad than yang bdag par bya'o// rtswa phrin sde brgyad pa/
355a4(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'o// srid pa'i dmag dpung pa ba nas ni// drang sro da med pa'i sngags zor dang // sna tshogs sngags kyi sbyor ba dang // wa yi rdul babyor ldan pas bya// / khrag gu bzhi'i thabs yod par// gzungs kyi myong ba da // 'byung po'i gtor ma
355a5(rnying rgyud): gshin rjel// byin la lag tu gtang bram bu// rang gi yi ma bsgom bzhing // byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma ni// sa sros chen lho phyogs gtang // sgrol ba'i drag sngags pa rnag pa'i lung // bstan pa bsrung ba ga nad pa'i gter// phrin las drag pa/
355a6(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi mtshan// 'khor lo ldan rngubs bskal pa'i bcud// lag na rdo rjes zung zhig rmongs// zhes gsangs so// dang lag zhan rje zla gsang nag po rtse ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'khor mthun rdebs man ngag gi letra ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa la//
355a7(rnying rgyud): nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// bsnyen pa bsrung dang rnag pa'i phreng // thugs kyi man gzugs gzer mchog/ blam pa'i srin las myong ba drag// 'khor ma zung sdebs man dag 'gyong // bka' la bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// rang
355b1(rnying rgyud): dag pa' rnal 'gyur dus// nga tag tu dag sa bstan// byams dag pa btang snyams dpanan srung // ma mags nan pa 'bras ma gtud // na rtswa yadas cha gcag sa// nam dag la rtagatu dun ngas kya ma 'a bya
355b2(rnying rgyud): thog chen dam tshig sdom pa bshad// rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya bstan// srub thabs man drag legs par blang // de nas mchod pa'i cho ga bzhin// nyin re rtag tu byas nas kyang // sku gzugs med kyang 'bad de bya// bde ba'i stan la was se
355b3(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ sum 'bum mi lho'i bar du bzlas// de 'og ri rtse gnas byas la// rlung zas za zhing bzlas pa bya// 'bum bcu'i mtha' du bye ba brtsams// nam mkha'i sgron ma ra gsal dus tshe// yi dwags grong bcom shing sol la// yi dwags 'pho
355b4(rnying rgyud): gdug pa yis// 'khor lo gdug pa'i lte ba la// re mig dgu pa'i mtshams bor te// bcu gnyis 'khor lo gdug pa'i nang // bcu bdun ya sogs gsang sngags dang // zlum por bskor ba'i phyi rol na// hrIHSh+T+r-iHming yig sngags tshogs nam
355b5(rnying rgyud): dur khrod sol ba drug sogs kyis// srin mthe ba gung mdzub phyag rgya yis// khru gang gos gnyis ras mchog la// gdug pa'i yi ge g.yas g.yon gdags// de nang tshud pa'i skyes bu gnyis// zhal bgrang sun ba brog 'khor lo 'dzin// phyag
355b6(rnying rgyud): zhabs mgur chu ro nyas brgyan// mi skra dbang po bsdams te bri// gnyis sbyar rgyab la ro nye gnyis// bsdams pa'i tshul du mkhas pas bri// gdug pa gzung zhing thod nang du// dril byas sngon dmar drad kyis bsdams// gdug pa'i thod na
355b7(rnying rgyud): 'grogro// mngar dang zla sman gyi mchog gi// mechod kyang zad la masu par bya// gdug ngas gzung zhang thod par gzug/ sngon mar byung zag pazhis gdags pa// gzungs de nyin mtshan ma ning bzlas// kha nas rdeg pa'i sngags bzlas pas//
356a1(rnying rgyud): rje rlung l+ya'i sbyor ba las// sngon dmar gdug par nya 'a tshogs// ngur khrod sa la bdug sogs sbyar// lcags sam thag pa sgro rtsa yis// gsang ba'i sngags dang ming rus ze// drug can nad kyis bslab bya la// dug ldan ga/
356a2(rnying rgyud): pas theg par bsam// 'chi bdag ba shan pa yi dwags tshogs// ngan khrod sol bdug tshogs sbyar// gdug pa drug gi brnangs can// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pas// 'dab ched bslab bya bzung nas ni// ga shin rdegasasag pa'i khang par/
356a3(rnying rgyud): dbang med las kyis 'jug par bsas/ Sh+T+r-iHgadrug pa'i sngags kyi mthar// hU~M dang maung waMl yA // / nga gnyis 'khrugs pa'i gsang sngags 'azlas// se tshong gcang sngags kyis bris// b+ha ba nag po'i mthu chos// 'kham la rtsibs pan
356a4(rnying rgyud): gragasum ste// chags ri nag pa'i steng dag tu// mi dag gdug pa'i gang n+d+ha// ma tshogs gadrug pa 'i gsang lags banas// zhi ma rdzogs nas gzaste// rdu ma khanas lag 'a chu// gdug pa'i gtsu gang pa'i tshad// gnyis byas nang rnga
356a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis// kyi nang gnyis su 'brar dza \u0f7f// gang dag la khrel pa'i tshul// thAs sman ma gzug nag// gdug pa'i khyod nag ga'adag rgyug/ ldan dam gnyis sa tha zas bsnams// shar lci bathang phyogs mtshams zla// gdug pa gnas par
356a6(rnying rgyud): yul phyin nas// sgo ltar khyim nas 'dam gang dra// rdo la 'jig rten gzugs bris pa// sasgo rgya la khyim bdag 'bod// mthun pa'i rdzas sbyin mgu bar bya// gzhug drug pade sbyor ba de// legs sbas steng nas 'jig rten bzhag/ gang la
356a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i dus dang mo// gnyen pag rigs mkhas pa spyad// zla ba nag pa ma gyis// drang srong drub phyogs dag tu// byang sems 'am ma'i bcan drug naH// khyab 'dug ma rgyad kyang khyim bdag zad// gcer bu gyi chags 'dad 'thad//
356b1(rnying rgyud): sa dang ga sa mdung zad// mA mthan gnyan pa'i phyags dag// zas gang mtshad ci gtad thams// tha 'dug gdag pa'idamang pa bar // yo gsug ngag pa slan las gdag/ dgag na na nas/ da
356b2(rnying rgyud): sa// dag yani rje rgyalalas ma ste// ma smra bad la rgya sa mnan// phreng la gnas pa'i rnal 'byung ba// g.yeng ba me dpa pa ting 'dzin gyis// dran lam rdzogs kyang gsang sngags pas// gags pa bzhin papa
356b3(rnying rgyud): srul kyi sems 'dabs// bzhi 'didag tu mizla// zhog ste mang ni dgyur bye dang // sar zhing gso pa'i chog bya// bskyed dang sman drang mchod bskul rnams// drug pa sgra yi gags pa zhi ba// tha ma'i gdams dgadang pa ya/
356b4(rnying rgyud): brnag ste gnan par bya// byang chub sems gnyis sems la bzhag/ dam tshig bsrung ma tshams mi nyams bsrungs// bka' yi ched pa rjes mthun par// rdzas dang lag cha mthun rdzob cing // rtag tu drang srod dgon par dka'// nga
356b5(rnying rgyud): dam bcas pa'i// mi 'da' gzhung ltar byed pa ste// mtshan ma mthong dang bzlas pa rdzogs// kun gyi yi dam tha ba ste// de lta bu miN+Dal 'gyur la// bden pa 'i sgrub pa nus pa yid// shes rab snying rje ldan pa yis// dang pog pa rjo/
356b6(rnying rgyud): wAng brtan// ma 'jigs dpa' bo 'ja zhugs can// man dag ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas// rang dan bla ma mya yin pa'o// dkan mchog dgra'aphang smod pa dang // bstan la zhes gan byung pa// bka' gas pan pas bgadu pa/
356b7(rnying rgyud): pa mngon spyod za' mo'i lung // sangs rgyas rmas pas zhe sdang ba// bcud du bsdus nas bshad pa 'ang// 'khor lo byad snyems 'jug pa 'don// bstan pa gnyen po me bsku na// man reg can gyis der shes bya// las kyi bya ba mthun tshogs rnams//
357a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ gdams dag bzhin du mkhas pas bshAd // mchod bstod la sogs rim pa yang // 'dam dbyangs thabs gsungs pa 'don// 'dir ni drag pa nyid du brjod// dakhar po khyud snrums gsang thabs na// dkon ma cho lda/
357a2(rnying rgyud): cing bstan pa bshig/ mngon spyod thugs rjes bskal ba'i phyir// ming tshig tha snyad tsam du brjod ma bya// chu srin gre bar rin chen tshud pa bzhin// khong du brnags te yongs su bsgrag par bya ba min// gshin rje'i gshed po'i thugs kyi yang brgyad 'di/
357a3(rnying rgyud): lag na rdo rjes nyon la rab tu zung // zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ tshon gyi rde'u sdod mar 'khor lo byang snyems kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin che'i gshed kyis 'a
357a4(rnying rgyud): log nan pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so// sgrub pa chen po yongs rdzogs nas// drag po 'khor lo mnan pa 'di// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung // shin tu dgon pa'i gnas nyid du// dur khrod gling nas ras blangs te// 'khor lo'i rim pa tshul bzhin bri//
357a5(rnying rgyud): ra ya yi ling+ga nyid// ji bzhin 'dod pa'i dbyings su bca'// gong ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang // 'khor lo bcas kyi dam rdzas de// mchod rten 'og tu gnan pa bya// bdag nyid ya mA n+ta ka gnyis// mchod rten de nyid ngo bo yang // ri rab gling bzhi chas pa
357a6(rnying rgyud): bsgom// ri rab lho na bzhugs pa'i tshe// sbyor ba'i yum dang sgrol ba'i yum// shar dang nub nas gnas par bsgom// byang nas sras mchog gnas pa ste// de bzhin rab tu gnan ci gzir// ri rab zur bzhir la ser bzhid// de la gleng dran
357a7(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis bsam// ri rab 'og tu gzas pa ni// gshin rje ral pa tshar dku yis// ljags thag sngon pos bcings pa de// pa ma rim mnan nas lcags phur la// dpag bsam shing brtsams btags pa ste// lcags srog nag pos bcings
357b1(rnying rgyud): zhes na// kha nas khrag skrag rgan 'brud cing // mig rtsa rig ga zhadan rtsa rang// ci mdzad pa na 'ang zer zhing mnan par bsgom// 'khor lo bri ba'i dus su yang // dmigs bya'i mang dag 'jug pa ni// sdebs la 'khar la'i bar dran// gzod pa
357b2(rnying rgyud): tshwal dz+ra gzug par bya// gzhan yang gdags yig btags lag // gnas dang thabs ni 'di ltar bya// ya la sogs pa'i y-i ga la// grwa bzhir lci la na par mtshams pazhi // rgyangs kyi dbu ma chabacu gnyis dang // mtha'
357b3(rnying rgyud): dris leng tshe brgyad// de dag nyi shu rtsa dgu la// gung du ming gi mjug la yang // spra gri bris pa'i 'khor lo gnyis// kha sbyar ba yi bar du gzhug/ 'khor lo sngags ni ka ba ste// mtshan rtags sbyar la rab tu bsgrub// de dag don rnams dag
357b4(rnying rgyud): sbyar// a kro te ka rgyan gyi sngags// de dag bsgrub pa'i dus su yang // mi lus phra men mgo bo can// sran dang bran 'khor la ma dang // mchod rten chen por brten pa dang // me chen rtag tu 'bar ba dang // rgya mtsho dag la mi nub dang // de dag ma
357b5(rnying rgyud): bar du bgrang // grub pa'i mtshan rtags byung ba dang // sbyor pa nyi ma bzhi la 'jug/ khugs pa'i mtshan rtags byung ba dang // g.yas bskor bsad pa'i drag sngags dang // chu 'dril drag sngags bsad la 'jug/ rtsa ba'i lha rnams ma grub par// phrin
357b6(rnying rgyud): las sngags kyang chud zos pas// lha grub grub nas las kyang bya// khugs nas de dag g.yas bskor bya// de ltar byas na gdon mi za// gshin rje'i gshed pos gsungs pa'i don// ma khugs bar du g.yas bskor na// skrag nas dom dred las
357b7(rnying rgyud): me 'grub// lpags nas g.yas bskor byed dus su// g.yon bskor byas na sngags log nas// rnal 'byor 'khor du rkyen du 'gyur// ro lang sa dag gi sngags bzlas nas// sngags pa rang nyid 'chi bar bshad// sa ma ya dag par ma bsrungs na/
358a1(rnying rgyud): srog par chad dag tu 'gyur// dbang dram 'dus lhag lag ma// dbyangs kyi yig bzlam par bya// rkang 'don ldan na skar chur dgod// mas nyad dag la rtsu ba kyang gtud// mkhrugs pa la 'gas drang padra// blang sa
358a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro bar rab tu bshad// ldog 'dra dam tshig lugs mtshungs na// ru khugs chen po bya bar gsungs// sngags bdun 'gyur sngags tshad dag la// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin tshad ma ni// ting 'dzin yang yeng byed pa dang // seng mer byed na ye mi 'a/
358a3(rnying rgyud): myos shi dag nyid che 'gribs pa dang // sgrib pas phog pa bshags par bya// snying 'phyo mi dga' sngags nor na// 'bru cheng ma tshang ba ru bshad// tshig tshig gsal na 'thems pa yin// dga' zhing theg na 'grub pa yin// bslu' bya dag gi tshad la
358a4(rnying rgyud): ni// mi gsal bying bar gyur na ni// rgyab rten yod pas myur mi 'grub// bdag pas lo ka drug pa na// brgyabs le mar bskang bzlog bya// g.yog du byung nas bsad nas 'gro// ting 'dzin gsal zhing dngos grub na// lo byed tshung chad
358a5(rnying rgyud): 'grub par byed// ting 'dzin gsal cing tshig 'byed na// zla ba tshun chad 'chi bar bshad// de ni mi 'gyur ba yi rtags// phyi ma 'gyur bas yid mi brtan// g.yon dral dam tshig yang snying las// sngags 'di dril la bya bar bshad// rtsa ba
358a6(rnying rgyud): snying drug po dang // 'bru dgu po ni kun skyed dang // de dag nye bar bsnyen pa'o// srog gi rtsa ba mjug sdud do// yang snying bsgrub dang las bsgrub pa'o// dbyangs dang dam tshig de kho na// las de gang byed mjug la gdags// spro 'bog ltog pa

358b3(rnying rgyud): yang bsad pa las kyi yang snying 'di gsungs so// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba yang // 'khor lo bzhi la be con bzhi// 'khor lo brgyad la ral gri brgyad// gong ngas rdo rje be con dang // ral gri la sogs dgad pa Ta// rdo rje drug gi

359a1(rnying rgyud): mAr yarbat+ma/ ta ma la/ gsun tug par bdag pa sa// bsad+ma pa las sa yang sna // / ya t+ta ma yi sabs dpa// gsun nams ste/ sad+yAg+sa / swA ta yams catam/ rgya tapa/ nyal ba/

359a3(rnying rgyud): byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs pa// aM A/ i sI/ u sa?/ r-i rI/ khaM lAM/ e o/ a AH/ ka khrag gyur/ tsa tsha ra d+ha ta/ TaN Da D+haH/ ta thad d+ha na/ pa pA ba b+ha ma/ ya la wa/ sha Sha sa hak+Sha/ sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor man pa
359a4(rnying rgyud): la// gyi nang gsang ba gsum du bshad// de lags ma gas ma dgra du 'gyur// phyi yi gyi ltar drung ba ni// nyi ma dang po dag la'ang / ya mar tses to me ya/ a mu kaM pra mon sha sa ru ni hUM laT/ nyi ma gnyis pa dag la yang / ya m+be to
359a5(rnying rgyud): tama?/ a mra kar ga tsa ya hU~M phaT/ nyis gsum bdag la yang // ya ta mo ni ra yi k+She la oM mra kaM p+pa nga ya maT/ nyi ma bzhi pa dag la yang // ya ny+dza la tsan ra ma ya/ a mra ka mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ de dag las kyi mthang phrad na// oM dzany+dza
359a6(rnying rgyud): pau t+ti ka/ yAm+mAr+d+ha ka/ kA la d+b+ha bi/ d+h+r-i ga ku ru ni b+h+yasaH/ ces bzlas te las kyi mtha' snong kyi nyim bzhi pa'i kha bsnyungs so// nang ni m+b+hi bzung ba ni// ya ma d+haHsa to ma yA/ ya ma ta rba na yo ta la/ ya ta yo na rA yA k+She ye/ ya la na
359a7(rnying rgyud): bzla byung dril l-ig yin // rgya migasang ba drang bani// ya ma r+tha ni \u0f7f ye k+Sha ya/ ya snre la tsani ya ta ya/ ya ta yon tra ti/ me ya/ ye me tos car sa ya/ bzhi snying dril la g.yas su bskor// nang gi phyi lta drang pani/
359b1(rnying rgyud): Ang zhing ba ste// sngon du ngagra pa' bstan pa yaH// oM a\u0f89\u0fa4 ti kA la san+ta ka ha na ma bag+h+nAn phaT/ nang gi nang dra drang ban// nye bar bslab pa gas kyang \u0f7f// las kha' bstan pa khri yang 'azlas// ya ma ma ta k+Sha k+tar tsas te/ dran ma na/
359b2(rnying rgyud): ram can/ nang gi gsang bar drang ba ni// 'phye bo 'gros shes bya ba dang // gsang po'i phrin las bsad pa bzhid// ya ma s+t+rai ta mri ran yon/ ta saH/ zhes pa g.yas bskor drung ba'o// gsang ba kyi lhang drung ba ni// u
359b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdzag sngags 'bru bdun pa// g.yon du bdun bskor drang bar bya// nyi ma dang po dag la'ang // ya ma rA dzas te ma ya/ ra tsas to ma ya ma/ tsas to ma ya ma/ tsas ta ma ya ma rAH/ to mi ya ma dA tses te/ nyi ma dang po khri khri bad+d+has/
359b4(rnying rgyud): ma gnyis pa man chang la// g.yon du 'ogagacing gang bzhin paskor// dang ba nub mdza pa ni// sa ma me tan+te/ Sh+T+r-iHa mya ka tshig ma tha mo ya rbad ya/ nub gnyis pa las drang ba ni// dacis to// Sh+T+r-iHdz+dzaHsa khrug tshig ma
359b5(rnying rgyud): ya rbad ya/ nub gsum pa la ni/ run yo ni/ hrISh+T+r-iHa mu ka che ge mo mu rtsa ya rbad ya/ rngub bzhi pa la drang ba ni// ra~M ya tsani d+hIHSh+T+r-iHa mra kaM che ge mo mA ra ya dza da ya/ gsang ba'i nang du drang ba na/ bsang ba'i drag sngags bdun pa ste// ga
359b6(rnying rgyud): su bdun bskor drang bya ba// yar ni dza ya k+She ya/ ran tsi ya k+She ya ma/ ni tsa ra ya k+She ya ma mang / tsa ya k+She ya ma ra ni/ ya k+She ya ma dze tsin+da tsi/ k+She ya ma dza ni tsa ya/ nyi ma gnyis pa man chad bshad// g.yas su drang ste steng yang gcod// gsang
359b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i gsang bar drang ba ni// rngub dang po la drang bar bya// ya mak+She ta me hrIHSh+T+r-i thAka pa ye/ dgra bo pra ma ya rbang ya/ rngub gnyis pa la drang ba ni/ da ni tsa ya hrIHdz+dzaHka pa ye/ dgra bo raka tsa yaM/ zad ya/ nub gsum pa la drang ba ni/ ra
360a1(rnying rgyud): yon ljot+t+raHga pa la/ dgra ba mar na ya rgyad/ nub bzhi pa la nang ngan/ tas tsa Sh+T+r-iHka pas/ dgra ba mar yazad/ dam la snang las la byung // ban snying gcig tu dril ban// gsang ba 'gasang bang
360a2(rnying rgyud): drag po'i gnam 'brus zhes kyang bya// dus dang tshe dang las zung dang // bsod nams bad+ma ni skal ba zad// yi ge zad pa zhes bya'o// de ltar byas na su nas sra// gang na gang la byas kyang 'grub// ru khugs chen po zhes kyang bya// drag po stag ma
360a3(rnying rgyud): zhes kyang b+ha// bya rog 'khu 'phrigs zhes kyang bya// nyi ma bzhi pa'i las la 'jug/ nyi ma dang po dag la'ang // tshangs pa'i rtsa gcad mgo 'khor gyir// sngags dang be con phyag rgya bca'// nyi ma gnyis pa dag la'ang // kha nas khrag sdug
360a4(rnying rgyud): gzhug pa'i phyir// sngags dang lus dral phyag rgya bcang // nyi ma gsum padag la'ang // tsiN+Da gzer du gzhug pa'i phyir// sngags dang snying gzhag phyag rgya bca'// nyi ma bzhi pa dag la'ang // gzugs phung ba drag par bya ba'i phyir//
360a5(rnying rgyud): ra ya nyid gdon mi za// sngags dang 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcang // rang rang drag po'i drag sngags 'don// de na g.yu yi spyang mo'o// dang po dag la lha bsnyen pa// sku gsung thugs kyi snying pos bsnyen// khugs pa'i rtags dag byung ba dang /
360a6(rnying rgyud): gzus pa dgug pa'i las bya ste// nyi ma dang po dag la'ang // ya ma rA dza sa to ma ya/ che ge mo A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ hI ma gnyis pa dag la'ang // che ge mo A yu d+hon A kar+Na ya hUMdza/ nyi ma gsum pa dag la 'ang // che ge mo te ya nr-ir a kaH
360a7(rnying rgyud): ya hU~M // nyi ma bzhi padag la 'ang // che ge mo dA pa s+than d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hU~M phaT// de nas dbye ba'i las bya ste// ta ma dang po dag la'ang // srog lha dag dang dbye bar bya// byang ga thug pa'i gung rul// mA ra ya yaM ming dus bskyon// gru su la du pa
360b1(rnying rgyud): bdug byazheng // ya ma rA tsas to ma yang ste/ bshag srog gi lha dang byas shig/ gnyis pa dag la pho lnga dang // gsum pa dag la yul lha dang // bzhi pa dag la dgra lha dang // lha rnams dag dang kye zhes bya'o// myi nang gsang ba'i sngags kyis kyang /
360b2(rnying rgyud): dgad dag la bsngags shing brdeg/ ya mA rta ka gas la bsgom la// phur bu dag gis brdeg par bya// oM ne ma ra yang/ ya ma snying ya ma khrag/ tshal pa bair la/ dum bu dum bu/ gshen rje nag po dkun khrag dgra bo mar ya / oM ne ma rje/
360b3(rnying rgyud): ta ki ra \u0f7f/ ba ta li kro d+hI shwa rI snying mgo chod/ rtsa la zhon/ khrag mgo chod/ khrag la kI li kI la ya/ bai ra la rbad/ dum bu dum bu/ gshin rje nug po de kun khug/ dgra bo mA ra ya dza/ aM ni mA ra ya nr-i/ d+he ta yan/ ta ko ra tsa/ pe ta li/
360b4(rnying rgyud): mgo chod/ rtsa la zhon/ lkog mgo tshod khrag la kI li kI la yo be re la rbad/ ya ma rA tsas ta me dun b+h+yo/ ya ma rA dza ster te mdun b+h+yo/ ya me to ru ma ya/ ya ta yo ni/ snying la sha ya me/ rab tu khros te phur bas 'jig/ gang 'a thogs pa med

360b7(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i snying po ka ba gnyis pa la/ ya mai to ru na ya ta ya/ Ar+ya dmar po'i snying po ka ba gsum pa la/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ral pa tshar dgu'i snying po ka ba bzhi pa la/ ya k+She ya tsa na ra ma ya/ 'di ni 'debs pa'i ka bzhi ste// tshangs pa'i ma

362a1(rnying rgyud): gsum pa dag re re la 'ang // byin gyis brlabs pang tang lan dang // rab rgya dang las dang sgra// de dag rnam badrug tu 'dad// mdang ma yamatshan nyid kyang // g.yas dang gsan gyi bye drag nas/

362b7(rnying rgyud): yi ge gzung // pad+ma ral gri'i mtshams su'ang // de nyid de la dgod bya ste// pad+ma rin chen mtshams su'ang // rjes su mthun pa'i yi ge la// de na gnyis ldan pas steng nas brgyan// de nyid de la dgod par bya// rdo rje rin chen mtsham

364a7(rnying rgyud): phyogs mthun bsdeb bya ste// phyogs dang mthun pa'i le'u tshil// a dang lbab tir ga zung ste// gnyis par A dang su sr-i ngam// gsum par me dang mge ra // bzhi par me dang nub na dr-i// lnga par su dang mnyeg stor// drag par
364b1(rnying rgyud): gyun// sman pa ga/ brgya ga // grubs// byarnams su // 5 nan ga/ da sangs tu/ ma sa dgung na// da na mad /
364b2(rnying rgyud): srang medang du ma \u0f7fkA rba~M y-i// bcudrug sams ya lung // 'di ni gsang pa'i sbyor ba te// thabs rkyen gnyan gyi mtshan can yin// ritshig sa lang po'i dam pa la// pad yi skyeng po gsing ba'i ming // don ga
364b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i don gsang ste// snor ba thad da da ba zlatheb// rgya rkyen 'greng ba'i 'khor lo bya// skabs kyi dbang bskur 'od bar 'bar// 'byung ba 'i skor ba'i ming yin te// rdo rje bas shes dbang baphrad nas// drug pa rdeg gyen kyil mdzang tsud// 'dzag pa
364b4(rnying rgyud): bdi la margyan bskyed pa'o// tham snying po nga gis 'dred// dang ma yin sbyar ba'i 'bru// 'khar la dam par dag par bya// dam yon tan yin lagan// gsang bde ga pa'i rim par bshad// sa gsungs so// dpal gshin rte rtags
364b5(rnying rgyud): nag po rtsu ba'i rgyud las// bdud mo'i snying po slar ba dang dgod pa'i ledu skye so 'dun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// 'byung ba baspu pa'i rim pa dang // las kyi mad byung chen po 'di // rdul 'byor can la gnas bya phyir/
364b6(rnying rgyud): lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung // las kyi rim pa'i rdo rje ni// sbyor ba bzhi yi yan lag can// gzigs pa bzhi po don chen bslab// 'gro stobs brgyad kyis yang dge sbyong// bcu gnyis tshul gyis las byed ste// las ni sna tshogs sbyor bar byed// pad+ma
364b7(rnying rgyud): chen mi mi tang // nyim nu drung dornga dang // lcags bdad dang pozag te// rlung gi chen pa ng+ka' 'angs// sa min lha'i khu ba bzhin// las kyi 'dzin pa'i don byed de// de bzhin po khyib can dang // gsar kyi dgra khrig brlab pa dang // brtson ma rjon/

365b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin drug pa'i mang // drang nga bzhin gan la gyur// mab 'dren ma dag ga lugs nya na// drug pa'i mar gnyid la// sus la bar la'adas sag sa// bkang ba'i klung ba snor ba bzhan// bsdebs nas 'gran pa' 'an ba byud pa// lag rdza bshad du
365b2(rnying rgyud): nas// byur ba g.yod pa ma mas pa// 'jug pa ngas par gdags pa min/ dmas kyi gyur bcang ba ste// ngag ziganas kyi 'dzin pa yin// ma bzhi pa'i rim pan// bdud mgrizhan gyur bgyi// the rnams kyi bang la /
365b3(rnying rgyud): po g+hor dpag med las// mkha' 'gro drug ma'i sbyor bas// gnas log drag po'i rim pa yin// rengs dang 'grags pa mA lus byed// las gsang gnyis dang kun rdzogs yin// de yi rim pa 'di dag tu/ ta ta ti ye 'gros sbyangs kyis/
365b4(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng badril ba yin// de bzhin phyogs kyi dang pa nas// rimigasargya ba bzhin cig/ nges par 'bad pa'i zung pa sa// grwa khyung labur de'i ba yin// ga ma dbyas nas 'du/ sa// 'brungagam drug 'dre na
365b5(rnying rgyud): drang // mtha' rten gdags pa sngar bzhin te// drag pa'i las la spa bre dang // 'phen pa'i 'bru brgyad rim par sbyar// phyir ma lnga pa'ang bzhin te// mu khrung phreng ba'ang rim pa gcig/ taM pa ta ya 'gros kyis te// gor mthong nga
365b6(rnying rgyud): par bsdeb// rim pa de bzhin kun la'ang // mgo dang mdug ma rdza ma bzhin// mchog tu gsod la spor ba nye// rig pas bslus pa'i ye shes wa// sde rtsi bas sbyor bas 'khor lo gcag/ yan lag lnga bsdus 'dus zung las// zla'ang /
365b7(rnying rgyud): 'grob byed drug dumadu na pa'i mag thangags/ 'dras bas mtshan du ma ston to// dra' bas thugs kyi thang bas ma// ba pas nges pa'i mi 'dug ga nga/ nga mjug pa 'dapa te// the dang phyogs dang du ma

366b1(rnying rgyud): dpasags rdzas nasum ldan bya// sragasung thugs kyis 'khar ba rgyas ldan pa// rams ma shang thun dag pa mang byas nas// dal yang dag bstan nas brtan sa// las kyi mthun par gnyar rdzas rabasgyur nas// sag gas bas
366b2(rnying rgyud): dam// kha ta gang da dra srin khyi dang spel// de dag rnams kyis dang sa ma'i len srung // rtsel mdzod rdzas 'dod pa'i le bya// bod pa nag por thugs kyi 'khor lo dpyod// bslang ba'i 'khor po lus sam gzhan yang bya// rngon du
366b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par slar// drag po bsad pa la sogs nyer bsgrub pa// su pa mA we te bAn la'i rdzas// rin chen snga lnga 'brug gi/ rus pa ste// gang 'dod bsgrub pa'i rdzas ni tshogs par bya// thod chen gang la 'dod pa'i rjes de wa kar bya// bod pan
366b4(rnying rgyud): 'jug ste ta log rdza rnams ni// sa gnyis yub med pa'i rtse mo gnyis// ni ma ba sres sol spus g.yas thog ma blugs pa// sngags kyis 'khor lor bcug ste gang 'dod la ru mnan// drag po'i las ni spos dang bsad la sogs// sbal gyi srams ma
366b5(rnying rgyud): rjong bar te// 'dra ba'i nad la bas dper shes pa yan// de rjes mthun pa'i yan lagajigs par bya'o// thabs kyi stobs kyi 'brel pa'i rim pa na// 'di dag bsdebs te dbu thag dngul lpags 'dra// bya ba'i las bu bar ma sngar gdon ma bya// 'a
366b6(rnying rgyud): byed rgyo 'phrul ston pa'i lnga 'byed pa'i// 'jug cing las rnamam rdzogs pa'i don byed pas// dbus kyi in kun 'gro lag pa med// phyogs bcu las kyi sngags de dang por man// dbus nas gshin rnga'i phyogs 'phrog yas bdor gyis// dza la thug pa'i
366b7(rnying rgyud): par ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// spyi srog yin te kun gyi thog mar sbyar// zlogasas las sbyor kun dang sbyor bas na// sa bon rgyu gnyis skyo'i klung du'ang sbyar// mu khyud phyir ma ma bdud las kye phreng // phyi rim 'khor lo shar phyogs rtsibs lan//
367a1(rnying rgyud): dngas pabugasang pa sronas // dbus nas nub tu de bzhin ga yas bkar nas// dbus nas thabs pakyang dam par bsgrub pan// lkugasung yang nyarnam lus bsdus pa sos// gsang bas gag nang dang // nga /
367a2(rnying rgyud): mong ma dbus nas de bzhin // rim pa 'dzang mar gling ba bdun sbyar bya// gle du ltar te lhag ma tha mar yin/ don rgyan bzlas mchog tu 'dren pa ste// gshin rje'i phyogs kyi kho pa ma pan// de bzhin 'ar 'dzul gyis so ba ste//
367a3(rnying rgyud): dang byang dang de bzhin galas skor yin// thog ma tha ma de bzhin de bzhin sbyar// rdo rje u d+his srog gi zag pa yin// de bzhin gsam pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa ni// gong ma bzhin te dbus nas shang du sbyar// de bzhin rim pas g.yas su bsor pa te/
367a4(rnying rgyud): me sngar bzhin rdo rje srin po yin// gnod sbyin phyogs kyi byor po dam pa na// gong ma bzhin te dbus nas sbyor ru lcar// de bzhin rim pas g.yas sa bkor lda na// tha ma thog ma 'dra gong ma bzhin sbyor te// ma lus 'dus pa'i
367a5(rnying rgyud): bar bsgrub pa'i gsang ba nas zhes r+b+ba// yun man sbyor ba rdzogs te las mchog yin// phreng zag chad la sogs pa'i las byas nas// 'khor po ma lus rim par g.yon sbyar bas// dbus nas pang bzhin rim par bsdeb pa 'o// ngag pong 'gror ba dras
367a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i ud+hi can// shin thugs sgra bdag nyid gzhan dbang bskur// gal te rtsom na pa de gshegs can 'dir 'dus// brtan pa'i glan pa dmigs pa'i don rnyed nas// tshul bzhin bsgrub na 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur// myur ba gzhan yang ri ma par rten lung te/
367a7(rnying rgyud): spyi ma 'tshar lo rnams la sbyar bya 'o// skyeskye ba dang sa kyi phyogs dang // gnyis gnyis nar gyi skye nas ngem pa las// g.yas nas bskor te yang dag gyur ba nyid// dbus kyi'i mang mo gnyis pa gsum pa y-i// drams dod gtas do sang bad
367b1(rnying rgyud): ga ma tha ma sar bzhin sngar byas la// 'din pa yi sbyin pa bstan pa ste// dang bsngags kyi phreng ba rnal ma yin// gsung ga gsum panye bar 'jug sdud pa// spyod ba las la 'jug pa' byed pa ste// gnad sbyin phyogs kyi 'khor mi g.yas 'amar /
367b2(rnying rgyud): tha ma'i 'khor lo gzung ste de dang der 'brel pa// brgya byin i lam mtshams kyi dbus phyogs gzung // de nas de nyid dbus phyogs 'khor lo'i bsdeb// de nas rim pas gshin rje'i 'khor lo la// lte bar dbus phyogs dang po gnyis bzung ste//
367b3(rnying rgyud): lephyogs kyi 'khor lo lto bar sbyar// de log gnod sbyin 'khor lo yang gzung ste// e li mtshams dang de 'og gnyis par ltar// de rjes phyi rol i lo mtshams dang ldan// de nas de bzhin a 'og mchoms su gyur// de nas rim par ti li mtshams
367b4(rnying rgyud): 'dug ste// de 'og su byin mtshams su nye bar sbyar// mgo mjug dang pa snga ma dang sbyar te// zam 'ong bzhag skabs kyis las kun sbyar// yon tan sku yis sbyor ba'i las rdzogs te// skabs kyi sbyar bsam lus don 'grub dgyur// gsang
367b5(rnying rgyud): yang gsungs bzhin rab sbyar ba// oM 'gra si na la b+h+yo/ mA ma rak+Sha b+he/ khaM lasarba da sha b+he/ us tsas+sa sha b+h+yo/ sa ma ya rak+ka sha tsakA lo la 'ur 'ur tug tug chem che ma ye yaM rbad drag tu phob pob ma mtsho tshe/ med dang sbyar nas skabs kyi 'jug/ snying
367b6(rnying rgyud): dang skabs kyis sbyar// las la sbyar bas cho ga'i rim pa yin// mu khyud nang la thugs kyi phrin las te// ki laM mtshams nas rim par brgya byin phyogs// sbyar bas e nas mtshams su nye bar dril// de 'og gshin rje rim par sbyor phyogs te// de rje
367b7(rnying rgyud): dbus kyi pra kyin mtshams su bsdeb// de nas lam gyi mtshams su nyer dril ba// de nas lha lam mtshams su 'gro ba'i phyogs dang bsgeg/ de 'og ku bin mtshams yin dbus kyi ta la sbyor// de nas de bzhin me lam mtshams su dril// de nas de ban
368a1(rnying rgyud): gan thun ma chog pan// dbyas sa pa nam rnams na ma lam ma tshams sa rlol// dranasun nyad phyogs nanagasas srung// dang 'dang b+ha bus DU maH// mang gnas dngas thub paskar ba ma gadrangs pa
368a2(rnying rgyud): di na mchog tu sbyar ba'i las kun byeng// de na las rgyal dngas grub bslab pa'i grwaH// gsang bzugs kyi yang bsko'i ma gnyis bdus// 'don dan chen mul snying bzhin du// b+hair mi 'azung bar 'a dad pa'i 'khor du bzhug/ thab sgrubs kyi
368a3(rnying rgyud): palud pa yin// rang rang phyogs mtshams brjeb bya bus su yang // rus sbal dgros kyis so sor skur ba ni// sro dgra'i nye bar thil ba zhes bya ste// lam mtshams ni kun tu'ang rim gyis sbar// de bzhin rim pas sa sor sbyar bar bya// de bzhin
368a4(rnying rgyud): bas de dang ma rtogs las rnams la// g.yel thog sang po'i gnas su gang 'dod dag // de bzhin rjes su bskangs pas las gan khrab// 'phar med pazhi ma khyud rim pas bzhag// dbus kyi mtshams bzhid byas phyogs ban pa/
368a5(rnying rgyud): pas phyogs dril 'dod pa'i snying por lan// 'di na theg chen rigs bdun 'bebs pa yin// sbyor ba gzhan yang 'dod pa rnam dag na// don 'grub yang dag rnams ni bshad byab// rtse ri ma de bzhin dang po 'khor lo nas// dang po 'ad bras ni kun
368a6(rnying rgyud): mgo yin te// drangs nas rtse mo'i 'khor lo dam pags ma// g.yas su bskor nas rim pas bsgreb bya ste// gshin rje pi lam gyogs kyang de bzhin de// gnod sbyin phyogs kyang de bzhin ter byas pa// kaM lam mtshams ni rngam pas gang phung bya// dbus
368a7(rnying rgyud): gyi de bzhin skabs kyi sbyar byas nas// mchog tu srog la 'joms yin lpags pa'i las// dbus kyi 'khor lo 'bru rnams skabs kyi snga ma bzhin du lhur// phyogs kyi dang po 'khor lo dbus ma yin// 'bru rnams bsdub sbyor ma pas sngam bzhin// gshin rje phyags
368b1(rnying rgyud): debakun rdzas mthun te// dbus kyu sbed pa dang bar sbyar ba bzhin// brjod na gang 'dod yum du 'grub 'gyur te// gzar dang lkog 'khra gnang rnams gtong // de bzhin ram pas 'khor la dang po mos// dbus kyi 'bru gzung za ba la khor po rnams// ram
368b2(rnying rgyud): na de bzhin te// gnod sbyin 'khor lo rtsa bar gnyis gzung ste// dbus kyi 'khor lo snga ma bzhin spangs nas// gang yin ming dang snying po bcas bskul te// las kyi lhor bsnga ma bzhin bcas nas// yul khams pha brang bcas te dbang du bltar// gzhan yang

368b4(rnying rgyud): ba shes pa'i las ni kun byed yin// de bzhin gshin rje'i dbus kyang dbus// rim pas sdad kyi rjes bzhin phyur ba ste// gnod sbyin phyogs su'ang rim pas dbus bsde ba de bzhin te// slar yang gshin rje snga ma bzhin bsdeb pa// 'di ni gsang ba'i las kyid bzhin te/
368b5(rnying rgyud): nga spus dang rengs la sogs pa'i las// sbyar ba re re rjes 'jug pas skya bas// de dag las kun rim gyis byed de yin// dbus kyi 'khor lo'am skabs kyis rim sbyar bya// dang po gnas kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa ni// rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo mu khrud rim gnyis ldan// da
368b6(rnying rgyud): 'i 'khor lo snrubs bzhi la// cha mnyam thog bran bzhi zhwa le cha dbu// de dag kun kyang rnabs brgyad labar lor bcas// mu khyud theg bzhi za ma re rim bkyed// phyogs bzhir gnyis grangs bcug nyis 'gyur// dbus kyi lte ba'i dbus su gu bzhad bya// mtha mar po
368b7(rnying rgyud): sogand kyi yig dbru dgod// gsod pa las 'byung ba zhi'i yi ge 'brug bces gzung // kaM lam pa tshams su phaT te mAr la// de rnams rim par gams nas mthun par dgod// gsal thog/ las la ka lam mtshams su 'gro// de bzhin bu ti ng+ra dang ha ram bzhin// dze
369a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ / mdun ma 'dod pa'i stor po yin// phyogs bkar bas dul te ga zal bu rnamasaH// da bzhin rim pas rgya shAs dgod// gyu ma 'khor po'i grubs bgyu la// bcu na 'kha la thugs pa'i bya bzung ba// klu ma mthams nga dag ba
369a2(rnying rgyud): sogs 'khor lo'i rim pa ni// chu yi snying po gnyis ni so sor dgod// de 'og mtshan ma'i ming yin phan ngag/ de gnyis sbyor ba gcig la dgod par bya// de 'og 'don yig mi dgod rtsibs gnyis la// rjes su mthun par snga ma gnyis bzhin dgod// de nas ma klad de

369a6(rnying rgyud): god drug par shig dgod bya// bdun par de bzhin bzung gyi brgyad par mo// dgu par drag dgod de bzhin gsum pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa la// dgod rim lnga las bzlog ste dbyas su ni// sgra yi yi ge tsam dgod gnyis par mo bzhag ste// gsum par dbus bzhin pazhi par gnyis pa
369a7(rnying rgyud): par sdud pa'i yi ge phra dgod bya// zag par ring po'i la bzhag bdun par mu// brgyad par las yig shin dgod bya ste// dgu par de bzhin ring po la dgod par bya// 'khor lo bzhi pa de bzhin rjes mthun te// dbus su bskal pa'i yi ger bzhag gnyis par de// gsum par sdang ba'i yi ge

370a1(rnying rgyud): mda' gsol spang skong gtong dkar btang // sna tshags gtor ma gser sdums kyis// phyogs skyong gtsug lag srung ma dang // sta klu la sogs sde brgyad dang // khams gsum 'gro ba rags drug dang // mA ra ya yi yul dang lha// kho lha mche dpa lha dang
370a2(rnying rgyud): dang // bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu la// bcol gtam bya zhing mchod sbyin stsal// sleb pa rnam gnyis sbyang ba dang // bsod nams tshogs chen spel ba'i phyir// dang du blangs te mchod cing dgod// rab tu chu cher spel bar bya// dbang gzug la sogs ste sngags
370a3(rnying rgyud): gdon// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas mnyes bya'i phyir// zhi khro'i bsnyen bsgrub zhag gsum bya// ya mAn+ta ka'i lha bsrub ni// lo zla tsam du yun bsring ste// bzlas pa yig 'brub cu bdun pa'o// bdun 'bum bsnyen du tshang bar gdon// 'dis ni gdong bzhi 'khor bar nges// 'di
370a4(rnying rgyud): yi bsrub pa'i dus su ni// dang por ta ka yab yum bskyed// dzAM ya hUM ya hU~M ya zhes brjod de// dkar po sngon po dmar po dang // sdang kur snang ba'i ya bzhi las// slar ni yis spros pa dag/ 'gro ba yongs kyi don byas te// rang skal phrin las yongs rdzogs nas// gtso
370a5(rnying rgyud): yab yum thugs dam bskul// saM ha ra nas slar bsdus pas// yig 'bru thugs mtshan dag tu gyur// de bzhin mo shing bsdus pa las// ya ma rA tses ho me ya/ e ka tsa ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hUM ya g+ha dz+wa la ni snying khrag ya ga mo skyeng rtsa la tiSh+Tha lhan/ sngags kyi sku rnams gsal
370a6(rnying rgyud): bar rdzogs// ya ma rA tsa yab yum ni// mthun par sku mdog mthing nag po// yag sha dz+wa la yab yum ni// sngo nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis po// ma ru tso ni yab yum gnyis// dmar nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis so// dog ti nag po dud ka ste// lus po gcig la
370a7(rnying rgyud): mgo bo dgu// mgo lus med par mig gis khengs// lag na chu srin zhags pa thogs// yan lag stong khams kun tu thul// yengs med rtog pa brtas pa ru// yid kyis dmigs shing blta byas te// lAr tse sha bzhi po las// slar na yis spros pa dang // dang skal srin
370b1(rnying rgyud): las rdzogs pa dang // 'byung bzhi rtsad bcad sbrang 'dus nas// phyag mtshon bzhi yi 'phro 'du las// gdong mo bzhi yi srur bskyed de// ri rab shar lho'i gru mtshams su// yi ge ma las rtag srin mo// srin mo'i gzugs pa sug mgo can// de nas dbyug gi sgra sgrogs shang //
370b2(rnying rgyud): lo yog thos nad gtong bar bsgom// ri rab kyi ni lho rngub tu// bi ge ra las bam srin mo// srin ga nag dred mgo can// kha nas klog gi phreng ba rgya// klad nad gtong ba'i bdag mor bsgom// ri rab nub byung bri mtshams su// yi ge tsA las kong srin mo// srin mo dam
370b3(rnying rgyud): parda glang gdong // snga nas bu yug 'byor zhing ni// kha nas ser ba 'phro ba las// gzer nad gtong ba'i bdag mor bsgom// re rab gru mtshams kyang shar du// yi ge sha las 'brog srin mo// srin mo ldang nag chu srin gdong // kha nas thog gi phreng 'bengs shing // rtog pagag pa
370b4(rnying rgyud): ga mor bsgom// yab yum 'khor bcas de dag kun// srin po srin mo'i sha gzugs can// dur khrod kyi ni chas brgyad dang // chas par 'dres shing gsal bar bsgom// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs spyan drangs te// dz+dza ches dbyings mi mngon dbyangs rnyed nas// 'jam dpal
370b5(rnying rgyud): gzhon nur spu sprul pa// bstan pa rgya mtsho ba spang mdzad lha// 'khor dang bcas pa spyan 'dren na// ma'i thabs kyi rol pas gshegs// oM badz+ra sa mA dza NAM/ hU~M gru gsum mthing nag 'bar klong du// rta ro 'bram ni gtal du bkram// mo ro 'bum brdegs gzhal yas
370b6(rnying rgyud): 'dir// 'jam dpal yab yum 'khor bcas rnams// thugs dam dbang gis gshegs su gsol// phyogs bzhin ma mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// stag srin sde bzhi 'khor bcas kun// bstan pa bsrung phyer spyan 'dren gyi// thugs dam dbang gis gshegs sug so
370b7(rnying rgyud): srin mo chen mo khyod bzhi yang // nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'brug sgrogs shing // bar snang khams nas glog 'gram// ri rab rtse nas thogs 'beb ma// ri rab gling bzhir dbang bsgyur ma// 'jig rten khams su rtsal dbyin ma// pho log klad nad gzer thabs dang // theg dang
371a1(rnying rgyud): ser ba ldog pa'i bdag/ 'jam dpal gshed po'i spyan snga ra// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas bzhin// gdung ba'ing ros bdag 'bod kyi// dmar gyi gtor ma dam la 'dra// rje sngon gyi bskal pa dang po la// ba
371a2(rnying rgyud): pa bsrung bar zhal 'ches ma// sbas shing gsang ba'i ma mo rnams// dgra bo 'dul phyir nga tshur byon// bstan pa bsrang gi da tshur spyon// sbyin thang dbab kyi da tshur spyon// hUM shar phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// shar gyi stag seMd
371a3(rnying rgyud): zor ba gdong // srid gcig po log bdag mo da tshur skyon// lho phyogs nam ma pa'i dkyil yangs nas// ban srid skrag nag dred mo gdong // srid gcig glang thabs bdag mod tshur spyon// nub phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// kong srin
371a4(rnying rgyud): dmar nag ban glang gdong // sring gcig ser 'bebs nag mo da tshur spyon// byang phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// 'brog srin ljang nag chu srin gdong // sring gcig lhog rgal bdag mo da tshur spyon// hUM khro rgyal gshin rje nag po yang
371a5(rnying rgyud): dang // srog gi gshed po yab yum ming srid bcas// bstan pa bsrung ba'i lha mchog 'khor bcas rnams// gnas 'dir gshegs shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// srid pa gsum yang mnga' ba zhes pa// bstan pa gnyen po bshig
371a6(rnying rgyud): pa yi// dgra bo 'dul phyir brtan par bzhugs// thugs rje dpal dang ldan pa yis// thugs rje'i byin brlabs char ltar 'bebs// dpal ldan yi dam mnyam pa'i dbyings// 'gro ba yongs kyi gter gyur pa// khyod la bus pas gya
371a7(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// thugs rjes gshad bzhir spu sprul pa// bdud 'dul dbu brtsegs srog gshed bzhi// shes rab yum chen srog 'dul chen mo bzhi// thabs dang shes rab zung nyid dang // 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang la phyag 'tshal lo// lo
371b1(rnying rgyud): bdag gshad pa'i bka' nyan zhig/ bstan pa rgya ma rdzo bsung mar dam// sras shing gsang ba'i ma bzhal// gdung ba'i yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo// b+h+rUM yab rtseg sa yi rgyal po gshin rnga'i gshed// nag sor gsha gdug pa 'angams ma
371b2(rnying rgyud): lu yi cha lugs gtum rdal 'jigs par ston// gtum jam drag shul can la phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M thugs rje nyi zer lta bu sprul pa'i wa// sog gi gshed po 'jigs byed bzhi// srog len yum chen bzhi po dang // gnyis su med pa
371b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i la// mkha' dbyings gsar ba'i gnas chen du// gdug pa ma lus 'dul ba'i dpal// srog gshed srog len yab yum dang // rnal 'byor bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// gdug pa ma lus 'joms pa yis// gdug pa 'dul mdzad dkyi
371b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor tshogs// lha mchog ya mAn+ta ka yis// dkyil 'khor bcas pa khyed cag gi// mdzad pa ma lus bdag gis gyis// sangs rgyas bstan pa bdag bsrungs pas// ya mAn ka'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// bdag gi bsam pa bsgrub pa dang /
371b5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa gnyen po bsrung du gsol// gdug pa ma lus 'joms shing sbol// ya ma dam sri cham la 'bebs// rngam pa'i zhal du mthun pa'i rdzas// dmigs kyi 'bul lob zhes su gsol// hUM gdug pa thugs rjes sgrol ba yis/
371b6(rnying rgyud): srog gi gshed po yab yum la// mnyes pa'i mchod pa mthun pa'i rdzas// dmigs kyis 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// hUM phyogs bcu nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// sbas shing gab pa'i gdor mo bzhi// nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'brus
371b7(rnying rgyud): grogs// bar sdang khams nas glog 'gram// ri rab rtse nas thog 'bebs shing // khrag gi ser ba lhog rgal bdag/ dam rdzas mchod pa'i bye brag rnams// dmigs kyi 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba
372a1(rnying rgyud): mkha'// rta ro dag ni dreg par brtsegs// mi ro dag ni gcal du bkram// mar rta ro 'khri steng na// ri rab brjid pa'i spang bzhengs pa// lha mchog ya mAn+ta ka ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag zhal/
372a2(rnying rgyud): dbu skra srid gsum zor tshogs bcings// smin ma glog chen 'grub yis// gdug pa thams cad sreg par mdzad// spyan gsum ye shes 'od 'phro can// shangs ni ri rab phur bur brjid// zhal nas hom khung gdangs pa'i zhal// ljags
372a3(rnying rgyud): ni ho ma gzar rlom pa'i zhal// mche ba phur bu bsnol ba'i tshems// ba spu rtsang phrar gshibs pas bltams// g.yas pa'i phyag gis sa gzhi mnan// g.yon gyi phyag gis nam mkha' 'degs// zhabs kyis dmyal ba'i gtan pa mnan//
372a4(rnying rgyud): gdug pa ma lus 'joms par mdzod// thams cad khro ba khyod kyi sku// hUM de dang gnyis med spong ba'i yum// pe ta yak+ka mi bzad sba// rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang mthun// re rab 'khod pa'i bdag mo ste// spyan gsum nam mkha'i thod gdebs
372a5(rnying rgyud): can// ri rab mchog gi thor tshugs la'o// spyi bo'i gtsug nas 'od zer 'phro// skra mtshams sprul pa'i pho nya 'gyed// dpral ba'i dbyings nas 'brug gi sgra sgrogs shing // sprin ma nam mkha'i glog ltar 'gyu// shang sa nas pra yugs rdzi ba
372a6(rnying rgyud): 'phrul// zhal nunas nad kyi rgyal pa 'bud// thugs kyi dkyil nas gzer chen 'bebs// yak+ka dz+wa la 'bar ba ni// dam tshig rak+Sha ha ling ka/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis gru gsum zhal// g.yas pa sta re'i dbyug pa 'phyar// g.yon pa rak+Sha'i
372a7(rnying rgyud): rgya mtsho rlobs// rdo rje yakrA ma yis ni// sru la dgyes shing 'khril bar sbyor// bstan pa rgya mtsho srang mdzad lha// ki kang rog ti mi bzad pa// lus po gcig la mgo bo dgu// mgo gcig srin po'i mgo bo ste// ba ti ba ta mgo bos ni// srin
372b1(rnying rgyud): rba ba canagagang 'bebs// mgag gang za sa// na nga gtung babs// ga ga 'dugs pa/ ga na na// gagang ga ga bas// nag gtsug du na du// ga na ba cu na
372b2(rnying rgyud): ki kang 'bebs// mas gcig khyab 'jug sprul pa'i wa// aspen yongs kyi kau kang 'bebs// mgo gcig bai run rtsa ste// g+h+r-i bur 'khrugs pa'i ka kang 'bebs// mgo gcig tsa ra ka yi mgos// drug po nad kye ke kar 'jebs// mgo gcig
372b3(rnying rgyud): sngon drag po ste// sre thabs sna tshogs ki kang 'bebs// rog ti mu rog mgo brtsegs des// sad dang ser ba btsa' dang mrag 'bebs// nang ngan sna tshogs kyi kang 'bebs// dam tshig nyams pa'i srog zan po// dam las 'das pa zad pa
372b4(rnying rgyud): sha du jugs na 'ang // ba zhes ma lda / sa 'di ba'i dam thal d+hA ga ga / ga pa pa pa // na par byeg pa/
372b5(rnying rgyud): gcig zug gnyis lhag na gzhal// g.yas na nad kyi rgyal ba bskams// g.yon pas 'phrag mo zhing chung bstod// kha nas thog gi Ta yug lhag/ lho ya ba ma srin drid mogadong // zhal gcig rgyag gnyis mthing nag zhal// g.yas nA nad kyi rgyal ba brnam
372b6(rnying rgyud): g.yon na thog gi 'phreng ba bsnams// kha nas lcags kyi ser ba sgrag/ nub kyi kong srin pa glang gdong // zhal ga cig phyag gnyis dmar nag zhal/ g.yas na nad kyi rgyal ba bskams// g.yon na glog gi phur bu 'drim// kha nas khrag gi ser bstug/
372b7(rnying rgyud): ge 'dru/ phrin du srin gdang // zhal gcig phrag gnyis ldang ni gzhal// g.yas nad kyi rgyal ba bskams// g.yon na sar ba'i rgyal pa thogs// kha nas ser pa'i bu yug 'thor// 'khor gyi ma mo 'bum ldesan// gal gcig tug gnyis skrag na gzhal//

373a4(rnying rgyud): ya~M ma ga/ lam ga naH/ zhi tshul pa/ rjem thaldam tha ni/ mAr lan paT/ la d+ha yad+ha pa d+h+we/ mAbyam byam b+h+yAm man+da/ snang gang gyur na \u0f7f/ mata nahU~M/ yaman ma tha~Mg sa maT+Ta/ be te pa y+ya saH/ #

373b1(rnying rgyud): bam ban/ rnam pad pa/ rnam sa rgyas ga pa smras/ d+hA mar ma/ yang lag/ ma ma sa sa laldan// yul na rnamamasan cad smra / ma skyed par mang / gshog/ bgag
373b2(rnying rgyud): tshab mo zag la mra sha ya/ sarba pr-i tsatsa pas dpe so ba k+Sha ba de ta na/ kye la ma tses to me sa/ ya ma dran po ta ya/ ya ta ya na ra ya k+She pa/ ya k+She ma tsan ra ma ya/ oM a rbo ta kA la ma d+ha ka NA~M/ dgra bgegs ma pa badzu / gal ta bang pa
373b3(rnying rgyud): bab pab hu shra shar shang thug zug dgra la phrom/ ke te ke ta swa hA/ oM na ma a ka ha ra tsan ma hA ka ru/ na ma khe she tse he d+ha swAH/ oM ya mAn+ta ka/ shI ya mAn+ta ka ki tsi d+hu/ ma ma nya kha Sha re kha nyag/ khe te rme/ ya to tsa ko dra dgra bo nA rag na/ sug nyel kha tshal/ ya rba to bram
373b4(rnying rgyud): she shwA ya mAd+ha ka tsa mra nya su mu nya mu ku ma gu lu du sha dgra bo mA ra ya na/ sa gi tsata Tu lu shu lu/ duHhru la pu thu la/ mra li shu shu t+te te tse ra t+te/ hU ya hU~M ya ro ti swA hA/ pre mu sha pro/ ya ma sho sha phaT/ oM nag sha shur+ya ga le le/ su badz+ra yag+ha ha te badz+ra rak+Sha pheM/ ma mar ril/
373b5(rnying rgyud): run sha ka rba daM wa~M/ ya mAn+ta ka a kar du dra duru mr-i dzang / du sran ag ner gro ta ga swA tra/ kyang rje kyang mo tsu ru tsu ru phaT/ pro pu na pro/ e ba sha me kai dus ma shig ke dz+wa la dag shang spring lan zad bum/ rar du de shag dzi lA d+ha/ nA ga Ne oM hril shang shang shag brda du
373b6(rnying rgyud): dzag sno la thi la zhwad me kyil shang \u0f7f/ a pa la mas/ rmA sa sa m+b+ha ma dzag ga dzal thal shar \u0f7f/ e pa sha ma ke nAm+ba la shAng ga dardzal hU~M/ oM sen men khrag pa pra rbA rngubs saH/ oM rangadran shig rdul gang / oM ya
373b7(rnying rgyud): yaM ye hril shar da / oM nA ga hri las la shag sad dun sa ma khri thil sgo/ oM ya ma spring la mthag bral zil zil shag shagase na ya smai/ dz+wal e badz+ra khrag tig sba bzad/ oM badz+ra tsakra troka tar zad/ oM badz+ra ba shang l+r-i da shid la 'ang
374a1(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra rig pa ru kar zag par zad / oMk+ShaH/ so/ zad snying khrag zad/ b+har ba la/ oM 'phags te man sbyor grags/ 'phags tes man ta chod/ dang tshad/ dang sngags/ dang khams/ da ts+tshen
374a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzini dgra po rbanan/ tri ta ta ra ga zad/ oM badz+rar zad/ bsham pa khrag ti chud/ kha~M ril zad/ badz+ra mug tig dang ya ti barbad/ oM rak+Sha ni ti ba/ pra ti dz+nyA nAd dartsibs/ badz+ra srabs ril zad/ badz+ra dang ring / oM badz+rad dming/ oM badz+ra snyi
374a3(rnying rgyud): chod/ kha la rba mu ta taM ting / pun taM ting / dar na rbad nan/ dgra bo nan/ oM kr-i ti pi cer tsa rbad/ oM ho te/ paka tsa d+h+waM/ ya ma rA tsas ho mo ya hUM phaT/ oM shrI mak+Sha badz+ra kro ti ba ta tsakra oM hU~M badz+ra satwa hUM/ tri lu ra ba d+haM/ badz+ra kI li ki la yaM sarba
374a4(rnying rgyud): n+dan mA ra ya hU~M hU~M hUM phaT phaH/ ya dz+wal thil byor shang / yam snye ya mdzag/ rgal ji 'dzil/ shag shag mA ra ya 'o/ in thaM zla po shag/ pa ra man+ta be ta ne ti sha~M ya hUM phaT/ pA ra pra dza ba tA ga ye hUM phaT/ dran rtagaswa sa ma pathA/ 2
374a5(rnying rgyud): siden ma mahA/ u nu sA sha dpral mo/ kham pa chad shag dasal rtsa/ ya ma snying yam thas/ yam du/ yam 'dus/ yum lderje 'dus 'dus/ ya ma rAdza 'jas 'dus/ ya ma ra ya snying la sen 'dir thogs ma/ mas rnams/
374a6(rnying rgyud): rbad/ sum ril rnam shes zad puM/ oM badz+ra ya mAd+ha ka ya/ badz+ra ya ma hA dza ya/ badz+ra tig sA yaM/ badz+ra kha dz+re/ ba rbaM ya/ bdo shan mu ru ya/ badz+rA wA lu ya/ badz+ra te sha me kha ya/ badz+ra mang pra ba ya/ badz+ra po bong ya/ @
374a7(rnying rgyud): dpral/ 'jam du thul/ yang la/ nga mdzud/ 'i yon na tanan/ tel mnyam tan kyilas ma / mi gas ka/ rdus ni gat+pa la tas \u0f7f/ zang tu ngal a/
374b1(rnying rgyud): ra shar sha la lha hUM phaT/ ces bcom ldan 'das kyi drag po gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyis/ zhing bcu ma lus 'dul bar gyur to// dpal gshin rje tha gsang nag po rtsa ba'i chud las/ rak+Sha 'bar ba gza' mjug gi sngags rim gyi le'u ste zhi gnyis
374b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // de nas mgon po gshed chen gyis// sbyin thang las kyi rim pa dang // bsnyen bsgrub thus ka mdor bsdus pa// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis zung // 'dir ni gza' mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir// las kyi rim pa 'di rnams
374b3(rnying rgyud): bshad// gza' mchog rog ti sgrub pa dang // sring mo bzhi yi sgrub thabs dang // 'di dag bsrub pa'i rdzas dag dang // dmago bskos ki kang 'bebs lugs dang // rgyu ba'i dus dang chos grangs dang // 'jug cing gdon pa'i dus tshod dang //
374b4(rnying rgyud): gum pa'i rtags dang mtshan ma dang // thugs rje'i las kyi bzlas pa dang // bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i bzlas pa dang // bsten pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang // bsgrub pa dang ni bsrub chen dang // bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i dam rdzas dang // las la srung ba'i chos
374b5(rnying rgyud): nga / bskul tshig rnams kyi bye brag dang // phur bu las kyi bye brag dang // 'jug gcod las kyis gnan thabs dang // sbyin thang las kyis brus ka dang // rnam grangs bcu bdun las kyi sbyor// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// khub 'jug
374b6(rnying rgyud): chen po rA hra la// 'di bsgrub pa yi ma rdzas ni// shing ljon dag gi shun pa la// dam sri'i ming dang rus bris te// bsegapa kha sbyar nang du'o// dkar gsum mngar gsum klu sman dang // la sman rtse sman sna tshogs dang // dri yi tshul po ga par
374b7(rnying rgyud): dang // spar te bsag pa nang du stsal// de nas par+d+ha'i thod por du// sha pA nam pa sna tshogs dang // skye tshe shang tshe nyung nag ti la// thal chen gsung dang khrag chen rnams// ba ya ma sbyar la phyal// khrag sna tshags pa'i dmar thab dang // dkar
375a1(rnying rgyud): thab rgyu g+sas// gsu sa su dag pa dang// 'a du sa 'a na // na gas// dpag pa

375a4(rnying rgyud): byung // gyar te rdzas chos chos grangs dang // nyin mtshan dag tu 'khor mo d+ha// chos grangs dag la dbang byed de// ki kAr 'brebs grags nges pa yis// bskum pa 'jim pa tshal bzhin byer// rog nyi nag po bsgrub pa yis// gru bzhi pa
375a5(rnying rgyud): stegs bral// dbus su e ni gra gsam gyi// zung du gzug pa'i skyeng rngan// shar rngul bltas lung pa nas// sred rdo dkar po btsal byas la// shar lho'i rtse la gzug par bya// rngub tu bltas pa'i wang ma nas// skyed rdog po btsal
375a6(rnying rgyud): byas la// lho nub ce la gzug par bya// byang du bltas pa'i lung mdo nas// phyed rdo dmar po btsal byas la// byang gi rtse la gzug par bya// btsugs la gshin rje rnam gsum po'i// spyan drang ba stem mchod dbang bskur la// de la

375b4(rnying rgyud): rje'i rgyal po nag 'joms rje// bstan pa rgya mtsho srang mdzad lha// gu gsum rtse la gshegs su gsol// de nas thod par drangs te bskyon// bstan pa rgya mtsho sung mdzad phyir// bstan pa bshig pa 'gugs mdzad lha// ya ma rA
375b5(rnying rgyud): nga'i dus la bab// ma ru tse yi dus la bab// gshin rje nag po'i dus la bab// sprul pa'i mnga' dbang gshin rje rnams// ling+ga dang bcas thod pa 'dren// bstan pa bshig pa kun drangs nas// dmigs pa'i rten la bstims byas te//
375b6(rnying rgyud): gshin rje rnam gsum phyag tu gtad// mi thar gshin rje'i lag tu bsgral// ri bo gsum gyi rtse la bstsal// sdug bsngal mang po ya reng // ki kang mang pos srog bcad nas// gdong mo bzhi yis rngam zas byas// rA hu la yis khyar mid blas/
375b7(rnying rgyud): gshin rje rnams kyi lto ru ldan// lhag ma lus pa med par ni// gshin rje rnams kyis bzhes su gsol// thod pa leng+ga la sogs pa'i// dmigs pa'i rten kun drangs byas la// skyed bu gsum la bskyon par bya'o// mda' gang dam ni gu zhi pa

376a3(rnying rgyud): yul rdzogs pa// rims nang snga tshogs gtang ba'i phyir// sngon du bshad pa'i rdzas rnams kyis// rlung dra drug lnga snganags thugs// bskab ste mkhar dang yul la ba dag/ gza' bdud su pa'i dus tshad du// rlung dang shA ser byung ba la'o//
