376a5(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gza' mchog bsgrub pa'i las kyi rim pa dang / bran gyi bus kag ces pa bsdus pa'i le ste zhe gsum pa'o// / de nas gshin rdo'i gshed po yis// 'gal ba cham la dbab pa'i phyir// sbyin thang lAs
376a6(rnying rgyud): rim pa 'di// yang dag bsdus te bshad par bya// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung // bstan pa srung byed yul phyogs su// lo tog smin 'joms gzhom bya'i phyir// ra rog dang ni khyi rgya yis// khrag snga bsres pa grod pa gang // mA ra ya yi yul
376b1(rnying rgyud): phyogs kyi// lha rten rnams ni chu mig khang// dug shing dag dang nyung nag ni// rtsi shing dag la me btang la// rnal 'byor dam rgan bdag nyid ni// gshin je ba ni yag ste// gtsug na me 'bar slar bsgoms la// dud ka dbu gnyis phrag bzhi pa/
376b2(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa dud ka nag po'o// g.yas pa rdo rje pre le can// g.yon pa b+han d+ha rgyo zhags// sbran nas thug gi ser ba 'bab// sbyin mtshams khro gnyer klog tu 'gyu// rkan spa ba rdebs pas 'brug chen sgrogs// dur khrod sna tshogs chad kyis
376b3(rnying rgyud): bcan// de 'dra'i sgra ru bdag bsgom ste// mdun du maN+Dal chag chag gdab// sa da kar ras ni bag phye yis// gan mthe'u yi ni gzugs bris la// nyi ma'i rtse la bdag nyid kyang // shar du kha bltas gnam bre'u 'ang // mgo bo shar du bstan pa bzhag/
376b4(rnying rgyud): snying ge ru ni nr-i badz+ra// bya ba legs par bris la bzhag/ snying gar nyung nag shing bu'am// yang na dug shing gdug pa la// rgya tshil gu gul la sogs bsreg/ grod pa'i khrag la sbyin bya// oM ba nA ya ka yung nag khrag shing ma thug sA hA/ ku hi hu ha~M kha li
376b5(rnying rgyud): dza du trenan gzer khu shing pu le swa hi/ mi shi khra na nas ni pu hi ka ha khu nan pu tri kring me dz+ra raM swa hA/ zhes pa bzlas te/ me btang / ling+ga khrag blag sbyin bsreg bya// ting 'dzin sngags bzlas 'od zer 'phros// skye 'gro thams cad gshin rjer gyur// gnam theTa'i snying ga
376b6(rnying rgyud): gzer bsam ste// kha nas ser ba 'bebs par bsgom// grod pa'i khrag lkug khab kyis gtsags// 'dod pa'i zhing gseb kun tu 'jud// khrag 'dzag rjes su ser ba 'bebs// tshigs khrid bya ba'i rim par bshad// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyang //
376b7(rnying rgyud): phyogs gshin rje yab tis// lo nad sbyin thar dbab pa la// nyung dkar dang ni til nag dang // radadrug re lug spyad zer dang // khrag chen dur khrad sol ba dang // yugs sa mo yi dor ma dang // bdud rtsi dang sbyar dpa' byed du// gong gi rdzas rnams de dra thugs//
377a1(rnying rgyud): gang yin pa'i na rten nam// chu mig ga ni nang dus// rdzas kyis bum pa ma byung bar// thog dang ser ba dras med dpab// yang nagadug pa'i rji dang // tham grang ma'i mapa ni// a nen drang du bsreg par bya'o// thal ba sa pa mo gnang
377a2(rnying rgyud): tu// kun du khyab par gtong zhing bzlas// sngags la nan tan rab tu baphyed// rdzas rnams sbed kyang drag tu bzlas// oM badz+ra sa mA ya sha sha phaT phaT/ hu lu hu wa band thor lo ri li sha pa ka Ta la ma nu pa ba ne sA hA/ 'bum phrag bdun du bzlas pang ba// ru mig nang nas ba
377a3(rnying rgyud): khros nas thog chen rang la 'ong // nA ga se sar nA ga pus pa dang // 'dam bu rtsa ba dbang po lag pa dang // shu dag la sogs klu sman sna tshogs dang // dkar gsum mngar gsum gtor mar rin chen brdar// dar sna lnga yis steng nas lhab rtsub bya// bden pa pad ra zhing mchod pas ma
377a4(rnying rgyud): par bya// lha klu dag la dbang gzug bcol gtam bya'o// thog las bsrung phyir sngags 'di drag tu bzlas// nA ga mu ti sa ma ya a a a/ de nas thog las rdo rje gur gyis bsrung // rnal 'byor de la thog gis mi tshugs so// bog ser dbab sngags 'di yang mun tu bzlang
377a5(rnying rgyud): ya ba ti yi thog ser dbab thabs te// 'di la drag po'i btsan thog mchog tu gsungs// gshin rje ral pa tshar dgus las byas te// thog dang ser pa dbab lugs ni// bdag gi gshin rje ral pa tshar dgra yi// cha lugs nag po ral pa tshar dgu dag/ gyen pa
377a6(rnying rgyud): te dgra sta lcags kyu dang // zhags pa tho ba thogs par bsgoms nas ni// nyung dkar rgyal po khrag chen 'o ma dang // lan tshwa dag la bsngags te sngo la gtor// sngags la nan tan bskyed la grangs med bzlas// pi bi shar dza la dza la phug phub mun zhes// thabs swa
377a7(rnying rgyud): gsum byas rdzas dang thal 'jim dang // lo la gtong zhing yul der gnan par bya// de nas drag por yid 'dod phebs pa dang // ser ba de nyid bcang par 'dod pa yang // dkar gsum dag dang mngar gsum dang // 'bru sna spos dang gu gu la dkar po dang // thab tu stsal
377b1(rnying rgyud): ti sngags 'das gcad par bya// ral pa tshad dgralas can sngags 'dis gzud// rnga dru gzhi pa ta'i zhes brjod do// des ni ltar 'dad pa'i las rnams byed// ga shAn rje me rda tsa ya las bya ste// mnad ser ba 'bas na 'di ltar bya// bdag nyid ga
377b2(rnying rgyud): waM mdog dmar nag chen po la// zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa ste// zhing dbyug 'khor lo 'bar ba can// dur khrod can gyis brgyan par bsgom// thog bsreg nad kyi las pa yis// lce ba dang ni gyes bu dang // dri mgrod kyi ni thal ba dang // grangs med
377b3(rnying rgyud): par sngags 'di bzlas// ta ki dza ti ki dza/ hu ya hu ya hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ b+hi dang ra dang bud med kyi// mngal khrag dang ni sngo snga dang // mjo mo'i 'o ma dang bsres te// ma thar phur ba dang zab bya// yang na rdza so ma btang la// sngags bris snod dkyil
377b4(rnying rgyud): pab grub skye// thod pa'i dkyil du lbab man na// ma hu tse yi dbab legs te// 'di yang las kyi mchog tu bshad// ya ma rA tsi'i las byas te// thog dang ser ba'i dbab lugs ni// bdag nyid ya ma rA tsa ste// sbag nag zhal gcig phug gnyis pa/
377b5(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa rdo rje spu gri la// g.yon pa thog gi phreng ba can// de 'dra'i sbu ru bdag bsgoms te// chu mig dang ne lha rten du// bla ma'i hom shing khru gar bya// lug sha nya sha la phug dang // ro ldang ba \u0f89\u0fa4 lan tshwa dang // ma bdud dang ne ku yul
377b6(rnying rgyud): dang // rgya tshol skam po dag pashams te// khrag sna dag dang khrag chen du// sbyar te ga'u khengs pa der// rdza sa rnams bdug cing hom du sbyar// sngags 'di dag tu bzlas par bya// nA ga nA ga na ka la ka la phaT phaT/ sdo lnga rnams kyi rngang
377b7(rnying rgyud): rlangs dang // rdzas rnams sreg pa'i rlangs pa nyid// sprin du chags pa rlang gis gtor// sprin nag 'thor zhing 'khrugs pa dang // klu nag gel pa mgo lnga yis// kha nas khrag gi ser ba dag/ gzhung dang bcas te dbab par byed/
378a1(rnying rgyud): nyung dkar dang ni zangs rdeg dang // mA ra ya yi yul phyogs kyi// ma mig gnyen po'i chu gsum la// sngags te bzlas la sman du gtor// gcer bur phyung ster khyi yi// khrag gis ngo gdong bug nas ni// brang brdung 'ad
378a2(rnying rgyud): da mos brdab// des ni ser ba nges par dbebs// ya ma rA tsa'i dbab lugs so// myos byed 'bar ba'i dbab thabs ni// gshin rje myos byed 'bar ba ni// sed nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// chibs su gshed po 'brug la bcibs// phyag ga
378a3(rnying rgyud): ga gi phur bu 'dril// zhal nas khrag gi ser ba 'bebs// da ltar bdag nyid bsgoms nas ni// so ma btang ba'i rnga nang du// khyi dang phag gi 'o ma dang // sngo sna tshogs pa bslus nas kyang // ra rog khrag dang de bsros la// rgya tshil gyis ni me btang la//
378a4(rnying rgyud): sum rtse ru de bskol la// gshin rje'i drag sngags bzlas te dbul// drag po'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya// oM ta ki dza hi byi tsi hi byi \u0f7fhi ha ya hU~M phaT/ gnod sbyin gang gis mi bzlog ste// myos byed 'bar ba'i dbab lugs so// brag gyon kor rje'i gzhi
378a5(rnying rgyud): rdo yis// da mod btsugs drag pos dbab thabs ni// bdag nyid ya ma rA tsa ste// su mdog nag po 'bar ba la// lus la brag nag gos su gyon// lag na ljags kyi 'khor lo bskor// de 'dra'i sgra ru bdag bsgom ste// rta na gar dog khyin
378a6(rnying rgyud): brag sde gsum bsres grod pa gang // khyer ted mod btsugs 'dug nas su// lce shing gi ni hom byas te// sngags de bzlas shing lce shing gi// hom du khrag sna gsum po sbreng // oM bu dzi khu kra tsi khrug/ shar shu shar shu yang sha
378a7(rnying rgyud): tun mi tsa kha na nye du nyags// sngags de bzlas shing ra rog gi// lpags rlon brdab cing 'o dod 'bod// ra lpags ras song khas phug bsreg/ gdon mi za bar phebs par nges// brag gyon gshin rje'i dbab lugs so// hUM chen ya
378b1(rnying rgyud): ka yes// gling bzhi phung byed gzhi bslab ste// sal ba'i ser ba dbab thabs ni// chu mag kra yang ngas pa'i sar// ra khyi chu bo khrag dang ni// ra yi 'o mar sbar byas nas// rabs chad nag pa'i thod par// blugs ta ngag pa mkhar dag pa// dkyigs rnas pa
378b2(rnying rgyud): te bzung bas ni// bdag nyid ya mA N+Da kar bskyed// spyan drang ba stim ste mchod nas ni// bsten pa tho dang sngags bzlas nas// de nas ma mo'i sngags 'bum bzlas// dza dza ma he d+haH/ sa ma ya snying la rag nag mo his ma ya dus tri grom mar klo ya mtho/ badz+ra
378b3(rnying rgyud): yang brjod de bskul// gling bzhi ma mo nang 'khrug byed// nyid sha nyid gis za mo Sh+yo// hU~M gling bzhi ma mo chen mo ni// shin tu mi bzad sdig mo che// srin mo zos ma 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rdo rje lha mo dam tshig ma// ral pa phyed kyis gnam khebs ma// ral pa'i zar bus skar 'bral ma// 2
378b4(rnying rgyud): zhag gi thig les brgyan// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// rtag tu bshug pa'i glu len ma// lag nu bdud kyi khram pa ma thogs// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// nam mkha'i khams kyi glog ma sbyin// srid pa gsum gyi chu 'bebs ma// chu yi sbyin thang dbab pa'i dus la bab// oM rak+ka ma sa ma ru
378b5(rnying rgyud): gu rga dgra ldibs/ ni sha ku ru kha ra ma so ti ku sha sha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ so te ku sha sha hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ zangs bu mgo la bkal te sngags rnams drag tu bzlas/ thod pa'i rdzas su bzlas/ gshed chen ya mAn+ta ka'i dbab lugs so// drag po btsan thabs rim pa brgyad// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung // zhes gsu
378b6(rnying rgyud): so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dmag dpon brgyad kyi thog ser sbyin thang dbab pa'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o// / de nas ya mAn+ta ka yi// thog zor thun gyi dus su yang // phrin las myur bar bya ba'i phyir// drag po'i bskul pa 'di
378b7(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// lci shir gyi stag srin zor ba gdong // na bza' stag gi shun chen gsol// bse yi ra la pa shar ra// zhal nas 'brug gi sra spog ma// g.yas na bse yi phur pa 'dril// g.yon na khrag zor dmar po 'phen// dam nyams dgral lo myog thor/
379a1(rnying rgyud): drug dang thagag su yang na// dam nyams ngas pa gzugasas// der ba ga nas sa dpa // matar dang yang na// rgyu kham b+h+yaH/ zlum+b+hal bam srin dud ma gdung // rnabab 'ad kyi man can gsul// mthung ga dral ba dang /
379a2(rnying rgyud): 8// zhal nas klog gi 'di 'brum// g.yas nag nam lpags sta re bsnams// g.yon na khrag zer dmar po 'ben// du ma nyams dpal ga bar thabs thong // thig dang sar ba'i sde yang 'dzin// dmanyams dgra ya~M rtsa la rdzogs sa// rang ba ston pa pa
379a3(rnying rgyud): ba// maud ra mu yum khar k+sha dz+haiM hA trAM/ hUM nub kyi kong phrin pa glang gdong // na bza' ba sgang shun chen gsol// zangs kyi ral pa sha ra ra// zhal nas gnam lugs thog 'bebs ma// g.yas na zangs kyi rnon po bsdams// g.yon na khra gtod dmar /
379a4(rnying rgyud): po ben// dam nyams dgral gleng tha~Mng mthong // thog dang ser ba'i sna yang 'dren// da ma nyams dgra po'i yul phyogs sa// ri rab nub nas ser ba phong // oM ma da kra du la tse la kha d+h+waM \u0f7f/ hUM byung gi 'phrog srin chu sri da gdong // na bzil chu srin ga yang gzhogs la/
379a5(rnying rgyud): lcags kyi ral pa shar ra// kha nas khrag gi ser ba 'bebs// g.yas rdo rdo rje ba con thogs// g.yon na khrag zor dmar po 'phen// dam nyams dgral rtog ni 'thod// thog dang ser ba'i lnga yang 'dzin// dam nyams dgra bo'i yul phyogs su// ri rab byang nas ser
379a6(rnying rgyud): phob// oM tsa tu ma thA sta la tu hU~M hU~M ng+ga/ de nas yang ni gshed po yis// las kyi bskal pa 'di gsungs sa// hUM shar gyi stag srin por ngagadong // lus po gcig la mgo dong pa// phyag na thog dang sang ba bskams// zhabs ni gnam lpags phrang bu dang /
379a7(rnying rgyud): lpag kyis zlog gi phreng ba 'gro// ma la ma thal ba mar ba 'babs// brlangs dmang po sdug ltar 'bru// thal mo bdabs pas 'jug rkyen sgrogs// gang po stag srid dgra yigashed// dam nyams dgra ba snying na ma dzangs// spu bas dang bunan/ spro bang ma
379b1(rnying rgyud): da mog dang // pra mdag sngo s+ya thal mdog ma// dbu lA ma la phyag bcur gdengs// dkar sdo dmar ldang nag pa'i dbu// kha nas klog gi phreng ba 'gyu// mtshol mthal ba sar chen 'babs// g.yas kyi phyag lngas mo snying 'byid// g.yon gyi phyagan
379b2(rnying rgyud): nga 'drin lcags kyu thogs// thal mo brdabs pas 'brug chen spogs// skra ni ma mo'i ral pa can// mchog gir la na ga ti li li// ral nag snyigs pa'i nang shed nas// bse yi ma mo bdun 'bum 'byung // 'jig rten khams kun sreg cing g.yo// ya ma da

379b4(rnying rgyud): na spa brdabs pas 'brug chen sgrogs// ldags nas glog gi 'phreng ba 'gyu// phyag na thog gi rgyal mtshan bsnams// mchil ma thal bas sar cher 'bebs// gsod byed chen mo bse gdong ma// mna' zan dam nyams bka' gcog pa// ya
379b5(rnying rgyud): la b+h+yo/ ya dang dgra la jo pa ti/ rbad bu nan/ byang gi 'brog srin chu srin gdong // sde mdog sngo mthing chen mo la// ljags kyi ral pa sha ra ra// ral pa lugs 'od 'bar ba las// lcags kyi srang mo nyi la lo// lcags kyi mtshor bas rdzog
379b6(rnying rgyud): na skra brdebs pas 'brug chen spogs// zhal nas khrag gi ser ba 'bebs// kha rlangs thog gi Ta yug 'thul// phyag na rdo rje btson bsnams// dam tshig nyams pa'i snying 'dren ma// dgra snying za zhang dag khrag 'thung // don snying dkar dag mtshams nas pa/ yam
379b7(rnying rgyud): 'i snying 'gro/ sAr yan rbad dran nan// drag po thun zor dus su ni// las 'di bskul bar rab tu gces// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gza' mchog ming srang gi thun gyi bskul ba las kyi la
380a1(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad par bya// phur bu las kyi bye brag 'di// gnam lcags dang ni khro chu dang // sde'u thun gyi mtshon cha dang // mi phyugs bsad pa'i mtshon du ma dang // nom nyin ngar dang bcas pa dang // lcags sna lnga po de dag pa// mgar
380a2(rnying rgyud): gsod la dga'// mig dang brar bu 'brang dras sa// thar par don badrung da zhis// ma tshig pa ni bco chud dam// yi na mor tshogs parta nyis tshad drubya// yang namar bzud cid du te// yung nam gsum sar 'dzud// las medabyungs
380a3(rnying rgyud): drag ni// mgo yi sor gcig tshad du bya// sked pa sor gcig de bzhin te// stod ni bur brgyad dag tu bya// smad ni zur gsum dpal du bya// seng ldeng la sogs gdug pa'i shing // tshed ma rno ba gang dag dang // sngar bzhin dag tu phur bya'o// gdab kar na
380a4(rnying rgyud): gyis brlab pa ni// dang por chos kyi su ru dmigs// de nas longs spyod rdzogs skur brlab// sbrul sbar byin gyis brlab pa ni// phur bu rog ti nag por dmigs// ye shes rog te nag po banyim// bzlas pa'i yi ge 'du ti yis// bsnyen pa'i tshad du phyin pa de

380a7(rnying rgyud): g.yon la khyab 'drug bsgom// mu'i mo g.yon gyi btsun// datsags lab nyid du bsgom// srin lag g.yon par c-ika/ mthe'u chung g.yon pa ldang sngon po// mtheb srin g.yas la stag srin te// mtheb srin g.yod la dred migadang // mdzub steng g.yas
380b1(rnying rgyud): laphan la dag dang // mdzub stang g.yan la chu srin gdang // da ltar 'dris gsal goms pa dang // phur bu reg ti nag por bsam// dpal la dwa phul nyid de// gsal bar bsgom sa rdal dril la// 'debs pa'i tshul bstan tsam gyis kyang // srid pa

380b4(rnying rgyud): yis ni dbugs la rngubs// la la yis ni khrag la 'jibs// pa la yis ni rtsa nas 'dren// la las glo snying nang rol 'dren// la las klang khrag 'khrug cing za// ki kang phab nas gsad pa la// rjes shul med par za byed cing // mA ra ya yi yul dang / tu/
380b5(rnying rgyud): ser ba sna tshogs char ltar 'bebs// thog gi ser ba slong ltar 'dril// pho log glang thabs gzer thabs dang // lhog rgal bam nag la sogs pa// ki kang sna tshogs dus med 'bebs// lha dang phye la phur pas gdab// thun dam zod kyi las rnams dgrab/

381a1(rnying rgyud): bsag par bstan pa dang // bsnyen pa dang sa nyid bstan pa'o// thabs dang dag pa nam gnyis kyis// bsod nams bsag par cha gar 'dad// rbab dbyab nges pa'i chog/ dam pa zang num pa ban pa// ba pa 'das
381a2(rnying rgyud): pa yin// dab pa la yang 'dra gnyis te// gnas dang 'atul thugs mtshad ma bdag/ mchod rdzas bzhag dang dngas su brten// dam tshi gting 'don 'phro'adra dang // thub par tugs dang thar ba'i thabs// bar drugacod pa'i bgegs dang ni// grub pa'i rtags na
381a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i babs// sgrogs pa chen po'achag ste// drug thus ting 'dzin bcug nyis gyis// thu 'ablang ba'i chag 'dod// phrin las dag la rnamagasam ste// 'a'od mi 'dor te mnan bsreg go// dus dang gang zag 'aslor ba gnas// me bya ba das pa
381a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo sgra byed mthun pa'i dpe// grub byed thogs dang ma phu ba pyod// phrab pa'i rtags dang ma tham sgrogs// dbyeng bcugasum de ba cug ces// zhes gzhan dang gshed pos dang / gsungs so// dpal gzhi rje nags dag pa'i ba'i rjod las/
381a5(rnying rgyud): ma myong bstan pa'i ma jus khre brdzun pa s+ho// de nas bcom ldan 'das gzhin rje'i gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs s+ho// mchod mtshon mnon pa'o// rdo'i slob dpon spa dang stsogs// be tsom med par bskal bas 'drab// phagasus
381a6(rnying rgyud): byed ba la// brtan sngan pyid 'bring // stan dbyed brdung thung lug pa// stag sbrul dbyang da da dbang gis// dbyar dgran 'bring ma sgra yos la// kyai 'jug dbyer dgran bla mar 'grub// de ni lokag za pa'i gshad// khyad par nyi ma gA shid
381a7(rnying rgyud): dbyar rlung 'jug cing dgun drung 'byung // de la dus lugs dpar shis// zhag gi gshad du gyur pa yang // rab bzhi la bcu bzhi shes// 'bring po bzhi yi bcos la// ba rdung bzhi yi badru drug so// myos bzhi ba rgya dang bcug cig dang // bco lnga bco brgyad nyi shug nyis/
381b1(rnying rgyud): ti Ta lnga dang nye thad pa// dus ni srad dang marngo dang // 'jing dang nam gung nam chung dang // nya shar ma rengs shar ba dang // nyin mtshan zhag na gar ma bzhin// dpyir ma gshin mer gyan chu// btsal nas gsad pa'i dus bstan pa// dpya ra zas bdun
381b2(rnying rgyud): dag la shis// tha chung nye shu bdun la shis// dbyar rje chos brgyad 'bring po ni// bco brgyad thachung nyi shu brgyad// ston pa chos dbu'am 'bring po ni// bcu dgu za chung nye bu dgra// dgun tshwa gsum la de bzhin te// dus sugasang po'i las la 'jug/ sa yi las
381b3(rnying rgyud): lad gyid thugs m+b+ha// shing gi dbyer bu ston ni mi// dgran ni lcags khams 'chi ba'i sa// de ngas zhag gshed btung bar bya// rab bzhin rtal btsod// ni chung ngus su 'bring bzhi pa// brgyang zhal brdeg par b+ha// dgran gsum skar ma gsus #
381b4(rnying rgyud): skar ma 'i ga shed sa dus suni// spyad babs thams cad rab na yang // zhag 'thung la sogs thong rnams shes// l-ir+tha zhag gis ngas bstan nas// dus rtsod rngon pa brtan par bya// sems can med dag nyid log pas// dengs mya dang 'a khyams pa // 'du sa dam/ ga sa

387a6(rnying rgyud): ldan pa bri// dbus su lag na rdo rje ste// 'khor lo bzhi la bya khyung bzhi// gru chad mchod pa'i bum pa bzhi// sman lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga// 'bru lnga me tog lnga la sogs// bcu gnyis lnga nyid byin gyis brlab// sgo bzhir mchod pa'i gtor ma bzhi//
387a7(rnying rgyud): 'ba' ma ha stas bcangs pa yis// sor mo lnga yi phan tse'i rje// mkha' lding mchod pa'i rdzas su bzhag/ de nas ting 'dzin rim pa ni// dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems// gnyis pa snying rje 'byung ba ste// gsum pa chu'i rnam pa las// baM gyis bon/
387b1(rnying rgyud): las byung ba'o// tu mtshan pa dbus san// la la ma na can rab bskyed// dastangs sa khams ga // / rdarjegashog pa rtson rlabs las// bya khyung rgyal ba bzhi byung bas// dkar dang nga mar dang sor dang ldang // 'khar mangs dran byung
387b2(rnying rgyud): 'dam// shang phyogs 'thar med rtsibs 'ongs sa// ye shes ma par lded stengs pagyi// phra ma dag dgang mer 'da'abar ba// dbug sa mdo ma zab// dang la dmar ning spyan yang dpung // dal ga dpa' pa rdzogs pa tshul// mi shes
387b3(rnying rgyud): kashog gdengs su dngas shin dug mo/ sgra dang yan lag rin chen bai rdur rgyan// phyag zug g.yas kyi dang po 'khor lo 'bar// par ma lcags kyu tha ma thal mo sbyar// g.yon gyi dang po rin chen bur brgyad bsdams// bar ma zhags pa tha mthal po /
387b4(rnying rgyud): dul phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// ye shes mkha' lding rgyal po gze brjid 'od// dbu gsum mdog dmar ral pa lcang lor 'khyil// zhal gdangs ye shes gshog pa chen po gdengs// sru dang yan lag ye shes me chen 'bar// lcags
387b5(rnying rgyud): seMrdordo rje lnga bsdams// bar ma lugs kya tha ma rin po che// g.yon pa dang po rdo rje pad+ma 'bar// bar ma dgas pa tha ma dbyug to 'phyar// b+h+yo phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs pa// ye shes mapa' lding chen po mchen 'bar// dbu gsum mdo/ sa
387b6(rnying rgyud): pagyin du 'phye'i// yan lag rin chen sbal mchen bar// ye shes gshog pa rgya chen bcung bskum mdzad// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na men 'bar// bar ma lugs su tha ma dpag bsam shing // g.yon gyi dang po ye shes pa kyang/
387b7(rnying rgyud):  / sasu las
388a1(rnying rgyud): pas sgra 'bang ba// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang par la gri 'byar// bar ma lcags su tham shing zag pa dpung // g.yod kyangs 'khor la 'ab nga bsnams// bang sa zhugs pa rnam gshag rnam bachungs// de rnams kya
388a2(rnying rgyud): snying po khro ma las bskyed// de bzhin spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol// phyogs dang mchod dang bstod dang bzlas pa tshul bzhin bya// ba lin la sogs byed pa dang // 'ba' ma ha sdus bcings pa yin// sor mo lnga yis bcangs pa'i rjes// zan cangs dkar
388a3(rnying rgyud): gsum 'bru dang stan gyis mchod// oM rA tsa ra ba ma hA ga ru Ta/ hUM hUM pa lin pAprA tsa b+hUkAk+Sha hi/ zhes pas b+hA tsa dbul bar bya'o// de nas rgyu du sngags 'di bzlas/ oM ka yod ke/ khrung kAr khAng kar/ sha ma dang dbyig du/ sha ma rang dbyig d+ha/ badz+ra
388a4(rnying rgyud): ma hA kro d+ha hrI phaT/ gsang sngags rtsa btsun du drangs// mkha' lding gsang ba'i las byed na// bdag gam gzhan la gdug pas 'jigs// ga ru rgyal po mchod 'dod pas// gnas khang pa yi zhangs su// snum pa'i sa 'am bgazan la// ga ru'i gzugs
388a5(rnying rgyud): byas rten bcas te// bapir la sogs pU dzaM dang // 'ba' ma ha g+has bcangs pa yis// sor mo lnga yis pu tsa rdzas// ga du ra nga nyid la dbul// snying po gang yang rung // gcig gis sna drangs brjod rjes la// mnyes pa'i bstod pa 'di yang 'bral// gzu
388a6(rnying rgyud): nyid brjod nas kyang // de rjes bu tsa ras tu brjod// thog mar oM dang sta byas dbul// 'di ltar gzhung bzhin byas nas ni// ka la sha ta zin pa la po// grol bar 'gyur ba the tshom med// de nas gnyen po rigs bzhi la// mnyes pa'i bstod pa 'di yang 'dul//
388a7(rnying rgyud): hUMrig sngags mthu stobs bdag bong su// oM mdo lug mthi la dkyil na rdo rje 'bar ba 'dra// zhi langs gsung skad bton pas stong gsum dbang du sdang // khams gsum drag tu g.yos pas klu chen po mo btul// mkha' lding rgyal po 'jigs pa ga ru Ta// lcags/
388b1(rnying rgyud): ga / ga la su/ smra sa rgyu tu rgyu du su sa /
388b2(rnying rgyud): sa/ ni// mas sa
388b3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa sa da// shA gyur// surdzun rnams sa pa// / ga zhugs// tham // sa
388b4(rnying rgyud): dmangs rigs su pa mdzong gyis bsko// rdo ngon po sa brim gnyis brtsigs// g.yed gyi srani gnyis tho te can// babs d+hA rdo rje gnyis brjod// yod ba na dong byagajug na 'bar// lcags kyi bachu ni dngu' ces// ra chu dad 'a
388b5(rnying rgyud): gsosu las su maH// thal 'ijig dbang gyud// kyis cwo da gyu bya'o// de nas yang sbyi 'angs gshe ga sred pas/ gangag ga cwal baphrul 'dreg lo// bang ma
388b6(rnying rgyud): ljongs chu du 'dur lo // mahA NA gam dzang 'a'o// mas blang gA rnam pa la// rdzog suM dbas dang l+h+wal gag/ nyid byed kyi brnangs sam las mi gas/ tha byed pa'i phyi sa bams// 'a
388b7(rnying rgyud): rnams ci rtsi par bya nga/ 'ad nyid byu jug sa migs / 'dag sa ba byung // rdo nga ba ma// ga nga mas dpar srung // yangs jugs papa dang gyung ba// shi phyi
389a1(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur// skye bar ma rig rte bdung // de nas thig ga ma// pad+ma 'dab brgyad du thung ldar// tshad stornapas bzhin gyi// sgrub mthing dag pad+ma kar// mu khyud dam sung ldangarnams sa
389a2(rnying rgyud): gas/ sa su sa du na /
389a3(rnying rgyud): gdakod// shar nas bad+mo te r-i ma bas dgod// ces mun du bzlas pa'i yig dgu pa 'di bslangs so// dz+nyA nA gan ts+tshas ma la/ chog mo zhig ti dzA ma la// bslab par bya'o// zhag dgu par khrus // zas pa dag ni thang par bya// den
389a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtags rnams ni// dngos su phongs spyod tshogs rnams 'byung // rab ni bas ldag 'thor bar 'byung // de nyid sngon du gyur tshe'o// rigs ma'i sham bu gdags par bya// smr-i ta ma gu ti sa las la bzhud// de nas don thams cad rngub par bya
389a5(rnying rgyud): dbyung ba snang ba zhes drigasasas// dring dgang ga na// la ba' ba // dbyung pa 'ijigs byung rngan// da sa nga theg ni da// de dam 'ad shes pa la// bdu pa dag pa ra mig/
389a6(rnying rgyud): dmigs// kha dog tshangs pa'i ras kyis bcings// drag po'i rdzas la bdug par bya// ras la sogs pa'i gzungs thag gdags// sder gshog phyag rgyas snying gar bstan// sman lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga// 'bru lnga rin chen lnga la sogs// bcu
389a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis lnga nyid rkyen gyis brlab// oM AHdz+nyA nA ga pra ya?mr-i/ TIg smra ban+danA zhes ma ra swA hA/ dmigs pa'i yan lag gsum panid+ha// yi ga~M rtsa gcig sprul par shar// hUM babyed pa bdag nyid rdzas smras nas// yan lagag cig cig la/

390a1(rnying rgyud): dang brgyan pa rab tugacas// bu'i skyong ba 'di gsungs so// nAg gnas shing nag gnas pa'i sar// de la d+had nas 'jam pa'i sna b+hU ba lA// sa gnyen ldan pa dag dang rab sas nas// \u0f89\u0fa4 yi rgyal po da gzugs
390a2(rnying rgyud): byas te// lus bcus mgo gcig sul mgo bdun gyis brgyan// g.yas na rin chen 'bar ba'i bum pa thogs// kha dog mthing ga lus kyi chu srin mnan// oM gyis yi ge 'di ni de'i rgya yin te// nA ga ba su tri ni s+t+waM/ de nas gsal ba skyed sngags
390a3(rnying rgyud): 'dis dbug par bya'o// nA ga rA dza ba su ki ni dza / de ltar gsalan nyi shu pa nyid rtag tu bzlas// ji ltar nus pa bzhin du rab bzlas te// de ltar bzlas te gzugs de par bur gzug/ gzhan gyis mi mthong rang gi spyod yul yin// rtags dang
390a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma rang dang gzugs su 'byung // bzlas pas skyon mchod pa dbul bar bya// nA ga rA tsang gzugs la thim par bsam// de nas gtad pa'i las rnams byed 'dod na// bdag nyid mthu spobs bdag por bsam byas la// thugs kar mkha' lding
390a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal po bsam byas te// chu gtor mngar dang ldan pa byin nas ni// seng ldeng phur ba bdag dang 'dra bar bsam// de yi gsang sngag gnyis kyis byin gyis brlab// bdag nyid de nyid dril zhing nA ga brdeg/ kA la rU pa chag chag dam da ma ni// brgya'am/
390a6(rnying rgyud): stong du 'azlas pa byas nas ni// gsang sngags 'di yis gtad par bya bar gsungs// oM rtag rA tsa hU~M baM hoH/ che ge mo A kar ShA ya/ a kar ShA ya/ hU~M tsan yang chen yang / len yang len yang / dzA gcings nA ga cings/ thA ga sdoms hA ga
390a7(rnying rgyud): de skad ces ni rab tu lan gnyis brjod// mi 'di'i bdun pabargyud rtsad nas chod ces bsgo// 'di skad ces ni ga nad la por// gdug pa klu yis dgra 'di ma bsad na// phyag na rdo rjes rang gi mgo bo 'gems// khong nas snying khrag dron mo 'dzag par byed// de skad
390b1(rnying rgyud): na gad dang / dadas sa dag ngags 'das// mang dam pa mi badzad par// gdangasab spang ba spang pa sa// da ma bas pa dgazums ga tungs// sa shag nga byas chu ba stsa la// nga
390b2(rnying rgyud): mang dbang gyi la// pang ngas ma bye ge mas par// bye la tshang po/ bajuganapa de// rdzogs mthal skong ba ni gzeng ba// bran la la ga nga gyin pa // sems pad / te/ mi rnyigs pa dang /
390b3(rnying rgyud): g+har+than/ mA nan/ oM nan nan/ te 'am/ gye'u char kha na rti las/ pra nan sra khas/ rtags ka nAg su ka/ rAg lam nA ga la~M ma sA hA/ bdag la mi tshugs bya sti dgung mi spos// mnan pa'i rkang pa rdo rje rgyag mangs ma// sa ba no rang gis grib ma rab /
390b4(rnying rgyud): ma nyes dpang gajug grub sa da bangar bdu// de ltar bus na des par las rnams 'thab// de nas klu'ijig sngags rgod pa 'di gzingasas// dag ta bas kaun rje/ rtag dzub tsu ga ni dzang / ga lha ning ngo / yusus/ dum pa su pa'i

391a1(rnying rgyud): las kyi 'khor la rdzogs pa dang // mtshan martags dang ldan pa yis// mdzend dz+wa las mA ra ya'o// zhes lag na rdo rjes rab tu gsungs so// dpal gshin rje rdza gsang nag po rtsa ba'i chud las/ gzug pa kra'i thags mngond
391a2(rnying rgyud): rdola'i le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po la/ 'dum pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ shin tu dga' ba yi rangs nas/ rang rang dga' ba'i bstod pa phul nas methu stobs kyi bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /
391a3(rnying rgyud): stong gsum mun par gtong ba'i bdud po pho mo rnams mgrin gcig tu thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to// he he dpa' bo chen po yab cig mchog/ 'jigs byed chen po gshin rje'i gshed// dpa' bo 'khor lo bdud 'khor bdud// gshed pos bsgo ba'i bka'
391a4(rnying rgyud): rnams nyan// bdag cag 'khor gyi bdud po rnams// phyin ci log rnams 'dul slad du// tshul bzhin bsrub na ji ltar bsgrub// rdzas dang yo byad gang la rten// las la gtang na ji ltar gtang // 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal nyan// de nas bcom ldan
391a5(rnying rgyud): 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ shin tu rngam pa'i sgra 'brug stong ldi rab tsam du dus gcig tu bsgrags nas/ bdud kyi tshogs thams cad dbang du bsdus/ zil gyis mnan nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// nag po bdud rtsi
391a6(rnying rgyud): tshogs rnams kun// phyin ci log rnams 'dul slad du// bya ba'i las de bsgrub pa dang // rten pa'i rdzas dang bskul ba'i thabs// me mthun sbyor ba gsod 'dod na// ngas bshad pa la sems mabud cig/ ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan gshed chen pos//
391a7(rnying rgyud): 'phrin las myur gyir bdud kyi sgrub thabs 'di nyid gsungs so// thog mar dang po dad pa rab tu gces// bka' yiganas sa ma dga' ba'i gnas dag tu// dbang thob bya phyir bla ma mnyes bya zhing // dkyil 'khor bres nas dam tshig dbang rnams nod// dgos pa bcu
391b1(rnying rgyud): phyi man gang yo pa sa// man gzab nas bstan partsub mtha' sa byur// bsgyud pa ba gyid thanangs 'bad bsag/ las gnas srang kyil 'phor bya// 'dam gang thab da dug zag cag cag gdab// 'ab pas brgya thugs ma thug ma gsum/ dang/
391b2(rnying rgyud): tshad bzhi chags ri lags bzhin bya// rtsod pa'i gling brdo rje bgrar// bskal pa'i mi drug nag drung dzab ldan// grags sagashin rdzo ga shed ba ste// blag sags pa la yab yum sras dang gsum// seng ldeng lasogs mchog ga phreng pa shing // yab
391b3(rnying rgyud): mngang gsol dbang bsgyur byin gyis brngub pa'o// lcags phur la sogs mchog gi khrir ba brtsa// khre ma thogag drang po bcu ru mang 'gasal la// 'khor lo gribs brgyad dag la dgod par bya// dar nag tsad panar mgyis dbang bar gdags/
391b4(rnying rgyud): ste chu 'bar ba la chen te// shwar du rol po ral pa can// lho rma khram bdag srog brdad ste// zla bdud yor ba zhags can drab// byang du srog bdud sbyar can// shar lho khram bdag thod po che// lho nub par btson ri rdo rje// nub kyang seng 'dzin rdzog dang je/
391b5(rnying rgyud): byang shar 'bar ba nag pa rje// sgo bzhir bka' nyan zhing chen bzhi// rtsang bzhi dag las dbang bslar dgod// mthun pa'i rdzas dang mchod pa'i rdzas// mau sharta sha'i gtor ma la// rus pa'i snatshog btsun byas nas// gshed po yab yum sras la bzhag
391b6(rnying rgyud): nagar+b+ha nag lug nag skyid// khyi nag phag pa rog po'i snying // g.yag dang glang dang brgod snying // sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang // mi shas brgyan bzangs bu gang // bdud po bcu por dag par bya// sha lnga khrag sna'i gtar ma la// lhan gzigs dkar chas pa
391b7(rnying rgyud): pa bcoM// sgro zhi'i zhing chen bzhil bzhag/ sran dang ga myu pa mas// sngang srid sdig la brdad dbang bsgred// rtsig sung rtag sung rgyun drugatang // rgyal mtshan chen pa bzhi gzugs// da nag sri zum kyi nag ga yang gzhi gdags// tshig nag/
392a1(rnying rgyud): 'bem brgyad rog dmigs pa'i sa// skyed pa la sogs stag bdagal yang // mgo na drug ma nor gzhogs la kham shing \u0f7f// drag po'i sngags pakas rim pas tham la gang du// ye dwags gas la dang pa / dru
392a2(rnying rgyud): dang phod pa mkhas pas bri bar bya// gzi brjid 'phags pa 'jam dpal yab yAm dang // bka' nyan nyin bzhi'i lha bsrub mchod// khra ma thogs bdud rnams la sa la bskul phyir zad// thod mtshan ngan par ra rog khrag blugs la// ra sog bris bzod pa'i nang
392a3(rnying rgyud): du 'o// dpal 'bar ngos bzhag re bas gril gyis la// / zag gis blugs shing khram sngags bzlas par bya// oM dgra r+thi tsit+ta thun mugs// tha ma gtor che ge mo mA ra ya/ gug yid rbad swA hA/ bzlas shing khram gyis skabs su bkug/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum
392a4(rnying rgyud): gsal bsgom la// dbang chen 'byung ba rim brtsegs te// b+h+rUM las 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud ldan// gru chad par khyams sgo khyud ldan// shar phyogs rus pa'i gzhal yas khang // lho phyogs mo yi gzhal yas khang /
392a5(rnying rgyud): nub phyogs khrag gi gzhal yas khang // byang phyogs dbugs kyi gzhal yas khang // dbus su ya ma chen po ste// gshin rje mahe bsnol ba'i gdan// hUM las gshed pa'i sgrar gyur to// stang zil mdog 'dra gnag la 'tsher// stag lpags glang chen sbrul nag
392a6(rnying rgyud): rgyan po dang // thod pa la sogs dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// zhal drug bcu gnyis phyag rgyar ldan par bsgom// g.yas g.yon yum dang mdun du sras mchog ste// rgyun dang cha lugs phyag mtshan gsal bar bsgom// 'khor lo rtsi bas rgyad steng du ni bsam ste//
392a7(rnying rgyud): dzaM las dgra bgegs bsnol ba'i gdan du bsam// de steng yabacu 'od zer 'phros pa las// 'phro 'dus ya las bdud po bcu// steng gi bdud po 'bar ba ya chen ni// g.yu 'brug zhon pa klog gi zhags thogs bsgom// shar gyi bdud po rol po ral pa can//
392b1(rnying rgyud): rngamazhon nas rapa gri mog pa bskyed// rtswa phyogs khram bdag srog bdud mche ba can// brgyad gzhon nas nags pa thog pa bskyed// rngub tu thubadud yor po zhag pa can// 'grong ba zhon nas lcags thar zhags pa thogs pa bskyed// grang du sdug bdud gser gyi ltar
392b2(rnying rgyud): can// khyud chen zhon nas sbya thogs pa bskyed// shar lho khram bdag gnam btsan thog po je// rta la zhon nas gnam lcags thog 'bebs bskyed// lho nub khram bdag par btsan ri yi je// rlung ga zhon nas rlung nag g.yab 'debs bskyed// nub byang khram
392b3(rnying rgyud): bdag seng 'dzin lding dang de// phag pa rtang zhon khram shing thogs pa bskyed// byang shar tham bdag ro langs nag po rje// chu grang zhon nas star thogs pa bskyed// 'og phyogs nag po ya ba rje khrag 'byung ni// rta dmangar zhon nas srul dmar thogs pa bskyed/
392b4(rnying rgyud): ra nga'i 'khor na bdug dang bsam yas te// rang bzhin gnas nas 'khor bcas spyan drangs pas// sgrub pa'i gnas sa da ltar gyon par bsam// sgo bzhing nyin bzhi lha yi gang bzhi yang // bka' nyan byed cing 'grags 'dren dzaM las bskyed// de ltar bskyed
392b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdud po de rnams kyis// bstan pa bshig cing sba la bsngo ba rnams// zhags pas 'chings shing la las khram la 'debs// la las mtshan 'debs la los kun du 'jug/ gan bub rdul nag 'jog cing khrag tu lhag/ migs rig rig 'o dong
392b6(rnying rgyud): tsar cod 'bod// kyis ma'on thod zer zhing gsod par bsgom// ting nge 'dzin gyis de ltar gsal ba skyed la// drag sngags 'di bzlas brjod rnams myang bar bsgrub// ru khAb kre mu jug tsang khrag/ tsa pad la sa dun pas ho// khri'am 'bum na badrad nam
392b7(rnying rgyud): mngon du 'ong // mod dang btsad po skad rigs mi gcig pa// lnga ba ldib sgras shing las la mngon du byon// gtum chen bstod la bdud rnams las la bskul// hUM bskal pa skyigs ma'i lnga brgyal// khro N+Da la gshin rje'i spyan sbar khas blangs pa// mi bzad
393a1(rnying rgyud): chen po srog bdag kun 'dul byed// 'jam dpal gshin rjes dmar gyi ar+g+haM dang // bdud rtsi dmar gyed ma rdzas dam pa 'di// khram thogs bdud la byin nas dbang bskur bas// bdud 'khor yongs kyis bde gshegs bstan pa
393a2(rnying rgyud): bsrungs// lus kyi dam tshig a ra yam// ngag ge dmachog dir ya ma// dam las me 'da' phrin las mdzod// steng phyogs bdud kye zhing khams nas// 'bar ba ya chen ba med ni// g.yu 'brug sngon mo'i rdu la zhon// lag na srog dmar thod zhags thogs//
393a3(rnying rgyud): sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dang mkhrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi spring la ya// bdud kyi tha ma pa ma khram la thob// oM snying khrag rag tsit+ta rbad/ dun rmugs khra ma tor ta rbad/ che ge mo mA ra ya gug leng swA hA/ zhes pas brjod cing khra ma la rim par
393a4(rnying rgyud): gdab// dak+ta sbrengs shing bdud rnams las la rbad// phun nag 'khyil pa'i zhing khams nas// nag po yab rje khrag 'thung ni// stag chen dmar po'i rtu la zhon// lag na sbrul dmar zhugs pa thogs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar mkhrid la
393a5(rnying rgyud): shog/ skyes pa dar ma'i snying la ya// bdud kyi khram pa ma khram la thob// oM snying tse/ d+harbad/ dun tshugs khram tor ya nad/ che ge mo mA ra ya gug ling sA hA/ shar phyogs rus pa'i zhing khams nas/ shar bdud rol po ral pa can// phung srirnga mo glog 'phye
393a6(rnying rgyud): zhon// lag nag nam lcags ral gri rnams// sdang bar byed pa'i dgral ya// skyes pa dar mjed la shog/ skyes bu mi yi rting la ya// bdud gi khram pa ma khrim la thob// oM snyid khrag ci d+ha rbad// dun rdugs khri tor ta rbad/ cheg ma lngar la grag ling wAhA/
393a7(rnying rgyud): sgra phyogs me'i zhing khams nas// blam bdag srog bdud mche ba can// bdud sha nag po rubarngubacibs// lag na 'dzin byed zhags pa bsnams// sdang bar byed pa'i dpral yaM// skyes pa dar mkhrid la shog/ skyes bra ma yi snying pa ya// bdud
393b1(rnying rgyud): kun na du na tu sku sa
393b2(rnying rgyud): sa
393b3(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa su

394a1(rnying rgyud): pau dpral ba// smras pa dar mkhrid la shog/ skyes bum yi rnying pa ya// bdud kyi khram pa ma tham la thob// bram sngags bkras shing raka/ sbeng // khram bdag ro langs nag pa rje// chu glang bran po rta marngon// lag nag na pa sngags
394a2(rnying rgyud): re thogs// sdang bar byed pa'i dpra la ya// skyes pa dang mkhrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram pa mkham la thob// oM hing khrag tsit+ta prad// dran rmugs khram tor ta rbad/ che ge mo mA ra ya grag leng swA hA/ gshin rje nag
394a3(rnying rgyud): 'dral la bab// 'bar ba nag po'i dus la bab// sha za nag po'i dus la bab// nag po lnga gsum dus la bab// rol po rtsa gsum dus la bab// sbrang sngon 'bar mni dus la bab// rna lo mig bzhi'i dus la bab// ces pas rbad cing kha da
394a4(rnying rgyud): k+ta glengs shing min pas bcol// nyung dkar nyung nag dug khrag la// dra ga sngags 'di yis brdeg par bya// rbangadra tshal pa thun khrag/ shri thi ma mo co bran khrag la kha la ya chu kun khrag mi sha rol tham thag/ khram tong tsar bun khrag/ stongs su ba than ma
394a5(rnying rgyud): ma gu par thun khrag/ che ge mo mA ra ya bun khrag/ ces ni rab tu khros par brdeg// gtang ba'i yas su bya ba yang // khram dang 'khor lo thod par blag/ chu mig rngub tu bltas par gtad// gtor ma gtor zhing smon lam gdab// bsad pa nyin bzhi'i gang bzhi/
394a6(rnying rgyud): 'phang bdug bran thun du 'phang // sreg pa khram shing thod pa ste// tsher ma can gyi shing btus la// grog po bu gzugs phyin pa bsreg/ mnan pa'i 'khor lo chu mig mgor// nag po klu yi lag tu gtad// gdab pa rang dang thar pas gdab// de na bdag pa mthar

395a5(rnying rgyud): bdud// yid la mun 'jibs dam la shog/ dkar mo 'bar ma spyan gcig ma// sngon mo stag ri bsen mo 'khol// dmar mo g.yu klu gnyen mo 'khol// nag mo dred mo ma yams 'khol// ser mo rlung gshog dbang ldan 'khol// dkar ltang 'u
395a6(rnying rgyud): mgo dri za 'khol// sngon ga sreg byed gshin rje 'khol// dmar me sgeg ma srin mo 'khol// sngo lnga zhal thogs rung lha 'khol// dgra po'i rnam shes brgyad pa mun ltar gtibs// ha na ha na/ sti ta sti ta/ ru dmam sa ya ya dzu la rji / mahr-i dza/

395b1(rnying rgyud): zaza na sum dru brar ba le/ khe le kha le shag zum gnan/ ha rbad/ chu mkhrag ril srog bcud ril/ de dag gas cing gzing ba dang // gnan cing 'phangs dang bsreg cing gtad// 'khor po bri bya yi ge dgod// dbye dang dkug dang bsgrim pa'i las// man

395b4(rnying rgyud): la chag chag gdab// dbus sa gragasu ma ma khyid gang ba// zlag mdamar ba zod thang dkar// grwa cang ldar dag ske bzhi ser// bdud po ha du b+hag sha ba// dar la gzugs bris dbusas dgod// lcags sa ma mchog gi spa pa pa// gshed por byin ba thabs
395b5(rnying rgyud): dbus su dgod// ya dang nag po lce bzhi la// phyogs bzhir bdud bzhi'i gzugs bris dgram// shar du khul khyab pa dgod// lho ru nag po bkrag med dgod// nub tu so 'dar 'khrig pa dgod// sor mo'i rtsa skams byang du dgod// ji za khung brdzun shar du

399a2(rnying rgyud): po'i nad rnams dang // dus min ma mo mang du 'byung // 'jigs pa srin po so nag dang // mig rtsad dmang la sdang mig bgrad// mche ba gtsigs te za ba'i tshul// mda' zhugs pa yi gdon dang bcas// rlung nag 'tshub mar bcas te 'ong // sbal pa mu stegs dgra

399a4(rnying rgyud): char pa 'ong // nag po chen po 'khor lo thogs// gdon gyi gtso bor sbal te drug/ chu ba'i dus dang mtshungs rjes ni// mtshan ma myur du 'grub par 'gyur// des na dbabagasad sbyor ba brgyad// nges par rgyu ba'i dus su bya/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/

399b1(rnying rgyud): bsad dpa'i mas da // rdzongs ci gang ma tho/ nab dus du ma sa/ ba ga na sa// ga ga sa nga/ du pa na// gang sgyus mnas pa yang/
399b2(rnying rgyud): da kyi rgya ba min// lagan rdzogs pa ma// gabang ba d+ha ba das na// rjes da dri ba'i 'dag pa dang // gos drab pam rnying pa la// gdug pa gzugs brtan pa dbyu te// rnam yangs gan nga bas dbyas rab// gong pa'i rdzas da pags pa/

399b4(rnying rgyud): bsad// twar khrod ram sa ma shi thun la// brkyang rdul byas te thug nag bya// yang nad ma pa nyid dum// de la gnas pa'i sbyor ba'o// mAng nga dbab pa'i las byan// dam gri yul gyi thu sogs pas ga/ gragasas pa 'am rabs cad thong // rang seM da
399b5(rnying rgyud): ra khrag kyi zag mi khrag dang // mngal khrag la sogs dam khrag sags// ba dkar 'o ma mdza dang ra// 'o ma sogs dang sbyar bar bya// lnga sna drug dang gagul spar// gar 'bebs rgya mig gra yod sar// bsregs ma bkrol naku rnams dang // dus tshe dang rtsa ba'i
399b6(rnying rgyud): gdang bcugs sa// rdzu byags thug tu 'a byud des// ma / dz+nyA ba dzam paH/ thegasal // zhes pa ni bral payin pa'i gdon rdzogs pang dang ban// dag rang sa mA sa/ dag ting / sa te ta /
399b7(rnying rgyud): myong sab kyis da ga sa ma// bab ga ngang ba// bgang shA su du mi/ dang bcu rtsu bas sa 'anga'o// thams papa/ bgro ga brjig dus nga
400a1(rnying rgyud): un mdzan/ sha d+hi ni sha ne dang / ma mo'i gdon gyis gas dad bab pa'o// tri dkar mo tri dul dul snyid kha dag la ril ri la/ tshe mchom rtsal thun shrIg mAr ya dza/ rgyal po sngo sbas dbabagasad pa'o// ya ma tsan d+ha d+ha ha dza la
400a2(rnying rgyud): khra dar na sha ya/ dgra bo nr-i du mar na sod sod cho mchom shig/ gshin rje'i gdon gyis dbab gsad pa'o// ma hA ni tri sa b+h+yo sA can d+ha ru bi ni/ rA hu la dgra po tsit+ta la 'bun dza ho kha'i he ka li ma hA tsan d+ha mA ra ni khug dzadzo/ gza' bdud chen pos dpag gsang par//
400a3(rnying rgyud): bdud rdi nir tri san tri ya/ ma hA ya b+h+yo// baM khaM so b+he rbad/ srog rtsa thun che ge modza ni dza/ zhes pas gar dmigs thogs pa med// gtum chen nyid la rab bstod cing // gza' badra chen po rab tu rbad// hUM ri rab phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad ni// lha rman
400a4(rnying rgyud): sde brgyad bskul re ran// khyab 'jug chen po skra bzhengs shig/ gtum po chen po bskyod tsam na// gza' bdud ngan po ka kang 'bebs// de yis ki kang 'bebs byed pas// gza' bdud chen po mi bsun pa// khyab 'jug chen po kun tu rgya/ 'jigs byed
400a5(rnying rgyud): rog ti sprul pa'i las// lus po gcig la mgo bo dgu// mgo lus med par mig gis khengs/ ro stod mi la ro smad spul// lus ni brjed pa'i dud ka la// lag na chu srin zhags pa thogs// pha ni srin po ma ni kru// klu srin tshogs pa'i mthu bo che/
400a6(rnying rgyud): nub mtshams nas sku bzhengs nas// zla ba'i rjes gcod shar du chug/ nyin mo rgyu zhing mtshan mo 'doms// bar snad khams nas rgyu ba'i tshe// 'jig rten khams kun sgrol bar mdzad// lo nyes 'khrug pa yams nad gtong // nyi ma zla ba lho ru Ta/
400a7(rnying rgyud): mtsho'i ting na gnas pa'i tshe// klu rnams kun yang 'khrug cing slong // thog ser sa g.yos ke kang 'bebs// 'jigs byed chen po mi bgrangs pa// mig brgya po la kha sdong po// dus tshod chos grangs kun gyi bdag/ lha 'dre kun gyi nang yan byed//
400b1(rnying rgyud): phrin sde brgyad dmag dpon byeng// 'byung ba lnga yi bdud chen po// mtshan na rnam pa dgu dru dod // steng 'og rdzogs marnams thams cad nas// kun nas chu zhang ki kang 'babs// myo nub mtshams nas bskyod pa'im// phrin pa ra ka ba \u0f7fsa hA// ka
400b2(rnying rgyud): pa ta chen pos bya// srid pa'i ki kang chen po 'bebs// shar lho mtshams nas spyod pa'i tshe// drang srong chen po rA hu la// drang srong gas ni ki kang mchog/ ki keng bdag nyid can zhes bya// byang shar mchoms nas brjod tsam na// 'jigs byed ra tsasa?
400b3(rnying rgyud): gcan 'dzin// bi na yag pho nyar 'gyed// ki kang 'bebs pa'i las la brtson// nub byang mtshams nas bskyod ce na// ngu ba 'jug rings chen po ste// 'jig rten khams na mthu po che// 'jig rten g.yo dgul rjod pa'i bdangag // lho la phyogs nas
400b4(rnying rgyud): bapyod pa'i / khyab 'angag can pa thub ste// rngus tshad chos grangs kun sgrug/ sbrel pa'i sgra na ka kang 'bebs// shar kya phyogs nas paskyed pa'am// dam bdud can po nyas// bi dI \u0f7f ka kang brgyad// dbul ste/ bye
400b5(rnying rgyud): byung gi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// bdud po rog te 'bar ba'i gzugs// bdud kyi ki kang 'bar ba 'babs// ki kang 'bar bar tsa ka/ nub kyi phyogs nas bskyod tsam na// srid pa'am mo rnams dang rol// ma mo'i ke kang kun gyi da/
400b6(rnying rgyud): chen po ke kang 'bebs// lho nub mtshams nas bskyod tsam na// rog te bya rog mgo brtsegs te/ bskal chen 'bar ba'i 'od chen po// spun du zhum med pu phrad za// khyod ni khro chen sprul pa ste// lho rung mtshams nas sru bskyod nas// lha srin
400b7(rnying rgyud): brgyad dmag dpon byed// nub nas shar du bskyod tsam na// srid pa'i ma mo'i dmag dpon byed// nad ngan ki kang dbab pa'i dus la bab// shar lho mtshams nas bskyod tsam na// bradud dmag kun gyi dmag dpon byed// bdud dmag ki kang hur
401a1(rnying rgyud): yang na // / // // sa// sa// smra// / sum dug nga
401a2(rnying rgyud): rna mangs myed pa ga pa'i rnas / ma brgyad du shA sa// ka
401a3(rnying rgyud): sa / / / nga
401a4(rnying rgyud): klung ming byed// ki kang maphyogs gribs pa'i bdag// ke kang sna tshogs dbasngal// zhes pas cad ze / / bsadan na za gzugs bag/ mau ba tI'i k+Shi ma ma/ shu dz+r-i sha~MH/ shA ma kA la la/ sig ma ma ma phy-i// bra mra rba/
401a5(rnying rgyud): na/ dz+ra thAthA/ be ta da// par smad d+hab t+ta / ra haM/ shapa s+thA pa/ la d+d+he/ ces rnaM ba pad pa'i las dzu \u0f7f// tshul chags da/ sngags kyi lan gzhagag g+saH// oM m+b+ha banan
401a6(rnying rgyud): oMr ye/ na sud+ha nA nag ste/ ra thun thun rba/ oM mjug pa'i li shar ma lu ga zil// thaM/ kha dag ji khyer 'dod pa ltar// mtha' bskur las kyi sngags kyisaH// dbupas dang gang 'dod kyong nga ni// ji ltar khas grangs bzhin bya// mi 'brad paH
401a7(rnying rgyud): ga m+b+hizla/ da pa 'am zhi byings rgya'o// rigs ma du pa'i zla yin/ drug dusas ngas ni 'dod par bya'o// seM seM byas da ga ga pa 'i spang ba du bac+doM dgrus nas tshu na// tshig zug nga /
401b1(rnying rgyud): nig sbyin las// thag srin dmar po 'dril bar bsam// rngas rnams pang shAng sngags sbal las// sar ba khrag tu 'ang bar bsam// gnas ris thag gang dra'ong // b+hA ri sha yang gdon ma tha// zhes gas dusaso// dpal ga shin rdza zlags nag pa
401b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud las/ chu 'khyags khrag tu dbab pa/ khab 'jug gza'i zla gsang gi le'u steng dgu pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po des/ chu 'khyags khrag tu dbang pa'i phyirarog te nag po nad bslab 'di ga
401b3(rnying rgyud): ma// drir zhidas la sags pas// dkyil ba'ang thugs na blugs ma \u0f7f// thug sa ma sngags ma dang ro ldan// ma 'i byod pa 'og ga// mang zhagal rdzogs thug cogs// ngag dang sro ka ga mthu/ dpas ra ba na
401b4(rnying rgyud): 'i// bu gsum nang dragazhag par bya// bsnyen pa bya ba'i thabs dag le// lha bsnyen sum stong byas nas ni// chos bzheb co lnga brgya dus la// gza' myod nying kyi snying po 'bras// stong rdzogs dran la dang da/ theg/ mi bya ga phyis nga yi
401b5(rnying rgyud): a ta swA hA// skyong rdzogs thun khrag dag la bsnyen// i tsapa nyid du la ma mA kro d+ha ka phapa tA sha sha la shad dz+nyA \u0f7f/ ljags pa sgo nga mkhri bstim// bzlas pa rdzogs nas chung gis zab/ nyi shu dgu 'amachos gcag la// brtad pa rdzogs nas sa ga
401b6(rnying rgyud): then gcig gnas sarten du brdung// mis mchor bdugs sngags bzlas// oM tri rje tri po lad+mo bur/ sbyin thang phob/ dragar ga steng pa rag s+ho// khrag la ru sha ma b+h+yo// 'bu sa na mab+ho// zan d+har skem bya// btsan padrad khro khyo b+h+yo// na
401b7(rnying rgyud): marmongs kyi/ lpags sgrog khrol/ mi rengs sod/ byang rje rgyar mo ru Ti ru hU~M phaT/ de nas zer sngags mdzub ba stan la// yul gyi phyogs su bzlas pa d+ma// ri'i rtser song la thun thor 'phang // chu skyes zlab chos can 'o// nyi shu dbu ma par basbyin rdzogasanas
402a1(rnying rgyud): chu la khyag zla ba kun tu dpab// de ltar las rnams byas gdan// chung khrugs thag tu bab 'gyur // / sbyin 'angadi rab bkyil bar das// dpalag kin+da d+ha na gsang nag pa rtsa ba'i spyad chen po las/ rdul chags khrag tu dang du/
402a2(rnying rgyud): pa khyab 'jug gza'i zla gsang gi le'u ste drug cu ba'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jig byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'gal ba cham la dbab pa'i phyir// khyab 'jug gzang mi gsang bslab gsungs// sug zan chen po
402a3(rnying rgyud): nyi zla'i gnyen// drag po chen po phul// khrag tu dbab pa'i las 'di yin// dur khrod la sogs gnas dag tu// maN+Dal chag chag thig gdab bri// dbus su su gsum brtsegs ma la// mu lud rnam po thod sring btang // ba'i rigs dang
402a4(rnying rgyud): mthun par bri// sbrul sngo dag gi shun pa la// rdzas kyi phud blag med rus gzhug/ 'khyil pa'i tshul du ge 'ur gzhug/ gragasu ma dbus su bzhag la bslab// dkar zab dmar thab sngo thab gsum// gri gsum nub ma dag la bzhag/ sha rus khrag
402a5(rnying rgyud): bcos dang dzin// da rje pa' ldan pazhal ba ste// mdzag ti la lkog pa ltar spros// rnam tha yo grag pa / dag gsum med dgas pa ldan dang // gra zu drug pa 'angs rgya rnams// mdzad rjes pas 'ja /
402a6(rnying rgyud): rdzas bsdus pazod pang bsag+ha// rtser rog po'i ra la ni// sngags bris ke n+da ming byang bris// lha srin sde brgyad mchod rdzas dgram// thun rdzas thod 'bring snyed du bzhag/ rang nyi dgashin rje'i gshed po rje// yid ma bcas pa rdzogs pa dang // grog
402a7(rnying rgyud): 'di ni dus thang brjod// oM a bi sha la bu ru ma shi kha la a ta lAhA/ stong rdzogs thun la mchod pa bya// hUM 'jigs byed chen po hu la// su mdog dung kha jigs byed khengs// gshin rje gshed pa zhabs drung // kul bang ba da srung khas
402b1(rnying rgyud): blangs pas// dum 'dar 'da' dar ma byed par// dmangs mchod pa 'di yang la// dam nyams phrag cagachad pa dang // yul du yon du ser bathob// tab pa shA king drum ka rdza ma shib gi tshul d+ham tI snangaH/ dus cad brgyad la gtor ma sbyig// dad+han/
402b2(rnying rgyud): zhang bslab pa'i dus chod rnams// gzhung mthun nyams su len pa dang // drag po thun gyi rdzas kyang dgram// ga'u'i nang du rngan gyis zab// oM mu ka ye ka pa yaM a pa ye/ Sh+T+r-iHwi bin ta yul 'di'i lo tog la/ dzA pa te zla la/ ma hA po d+ha ga bab ta/
402b3(rnying rgyud): shar shir ta shal de hUM phaT/ thig ni nag cig me/ gnyis med drag brgyad bcad du phreM// nam mthongs kye/ lugs sgrog khrol/ mi rengs sod/ rkyang rje rgyangad mo tsu ru hUM phaT/ stong khri thon nas rdzas kyis brab// de nas lha srin sbrul pa brgyad// sngag
402b4(rnying rgyud): kyi gang gi mtshan du brab// trag dag mo hri la shag rbad/ ser trail shad byo// de ni ma mo'i drag sngags so// A le me la b+h+yo// ru lu ru lu ma ma trag ra ka sha hril trel shar b+h+yo// dgra lha'i rgyal mo'i drag sngags so// A lo me la b+h+yo// oM pa sha
402b5(rnying rgyud): mi kai rA hu la hUM shag shar shad hril b+h+yo// de ni bdud kyi drag sngags so// oM ser khrag la mu sha ga tu ba swA hA/ de ni srin po'i drag sngags so// oM ra~M trai thun shag ri la raM shad b+h+yo// de ni dmu'i drag sngags so// oM ya ma snying ya ma khrag rA phul la zil rje la
402b6(rnying rgyud): shag shag sen se na ya ya b+h+yo b+ho re re hri la hri la/ de ni bgegs kyi drag sngags so// zla gcig dus brgyad phyogs nas brdeg/ ling+ga bsngar zhing bun rdzas brdeg/ gtum chen bstod la gza' mchog rbad// bA phur ling+ga dag la brde// chos grangs thems nas grub
402b7(rnying rgyud): rtag 'byung // rdzas dang blun zor sngags dang ming // dbus kyi rabs chad thod par blug/ sa ser yul dbus la sogs su// skya rengs gzar du btab la bzhag/ yang na rim pa gzhan yang ste// sri'u phro ma g.yul thog sbyor ba ni// me lce lta bu'i rim pa ste//
403a1(rnying rgyud): dag slar ba dbyengs nyid de// dad pa'i thag na bdag su 'a dus// ma mas bdug nyid da dbang ni// / narangs mi thal bar bsdu bya// dag pa 'dag nas sa thab na// sa ca spyan na na ba//
403a2(rnying rgyud): dz+ha na ga pa/ shedas mer chen por da ngags pa de nas thun gyis zor byas te// dmangs maN+Dal gong bzhin pa// dam sri yul gyi chu sogs pasags// sgraganyen bslab rdzogs byed du ste// byed ni man chad sngags 'di bzlas// i wA la leg pa pa// swa pa'i
403a3(rnying rgyud): \u0f7fwi kr-i da/ sbrul 'di'i ma thog la dud dzam/ dkar thom/ hu ti trA~M/ yug ti sde/ na shwa rA sha ta drag tu pab/ da pa tI nA hru la/ a mr-i te ka phob/ ra shwar shar ta hU~M phaH/ tsa mu le/ agre dag mo kor te swA hA/ rgyang mo gyang rje tsA ru tsu ru hU~M phaT/
403a4(rnying rgyud): haM dr-i mur mur sha ru ru gr-i/ gang gi thig nag brtags nas kyang // de la sham bu 'di yis gdags// ma mo seng g.ye/ ma mo bya rtsa ya/ ma mo tsad+hA ye/ ma mo srog tsa ye/ dgra'i lo thog sgur po la mar ya hUM phaT/ snying po sngags kyi bar bar // mchod cingag
403a5(rnying rgyud): ma dbul par bya// rabasgral zab kyis thugs dam bskang // bon nas gnas gzer ril bye// dkar thab dmar thab sngo thab gsum// gcig tu dril bas bzhin bya// dmar rings sor ni phyogs su 'gangs// gong gis sngags bzlas mdzub ris bya//
403a6(rnying rgyud): la 'joms par 'gyur// yang na nu skyes rdzogs pa la// bya ba 'jug gtor makun tu gtang // blo phur btab la bsad las bya// par bar lha dang dbye bar bya// de ltar byas na rab 'bring gis// gnam lcags lde dang dmu rdo dang // chu 'khrugs khrag tu dbab
403a7(rnying rgyud): par bya// de la 'di la las dag na// dus gang yang drang ba dang // thag dang tha khrul/ lcags ts+tsha kyai bye ma rnams la sngags la/ yul gang yang rung ba'ide rten nam dzu mig tu sbas na/ yul de sbyin pa rlung gis kye te thob gyur/ yang na rdzas de rnams
403b1(rnying rgyud): la ril bu byas la/ de ltar dgra bo'i khang thog tu bstud na khang pa 'jig par 'gyur ro// yang de rnams la brjod nas chu mag kha brang du blta bar sbas na/ gong ltar drangs par sha za zer 'ong ngo // sran de'i khar pa chags pa la bzlas nas khyab 'jug rgya ba'i dus su kha brang du
403b2(rnying rgyud): bltas par sbas na thog drag po 'bebs par 'gyur ro// 'bra sna tshogs dang / 'brug gi rus pa dang / chu srin gyi sder mo la bzlas te 'og tu sbas nas phyogs bcu ru gtor na ser ba khrag tu 'bab par 'gyur ro// ka na ka mo dang kyi dag de'i mchi ba la sngags nas
403b3(rnying rgyud): phyogs su gtor na rkang nang du 'gyur ro// de la sogs te las thams cad dgrub par 'gyur/ ser ba bzlog pa dang shwa bzlog pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ nyung dkar la bzlas te gtor na bzlog par 'gyur ro// mag la ya til brjod nas gtor na bzlog par 'gyur ro//
403b4(rnying rgyud): dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ chu 'khyags khrag tu dbab pa gza'i zla ga sang gi le'u ste re gcig pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po gshin rje'i gshed pos/ 'jig rten gyi khams ga dbab pa'i phyi
403b5(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug chen po phyi ltar bsrub pa 'di gsungs so// lhor ba lta brag chen po seng ge mchongs pa 'dra// yang na dmar me 'dra ba'am// dur khrod la sogs dgon pa'i gnas dag tu// rnal 'byor goms pas yo byad ldan byas te/ 'phags pa la sog mchod cing gtong ma
403b6(rnying rgyud): gtang // gros kying gtsang ma mda' gang gru bzhi la// mtshal la ma ldong ros dag gis thig gdab skye// leng tshe dgu pa dag gi tshad du bya// dbus sug pur dgu gi cu grags te// dang dam ngas sam dkar 'jam la// lce chen dbang phyug dag gi gzugs bris te// spyug mas
403b7(rnying rgyud): me dag la dgod pa bya// sted nas la banan dgag gdugs kyis dag pa// des mthams pa di byung ba'ing ban pa zhig cu/ zugs rini'i ma ma bzhi pa dag pa yang // rgyam smin ma pa de lag rgya dgod// sa
404a1(rnying rgyud): rnga chub rta// byung draganod sbyin smras pa dkod// dal byor ma matogs grags pa skod// mchod pa lngad dang gtor mag ga/ nang du tshal khrug dang byu bcug/ byang gzug pa dmigs pa ma du za// rgyu
404a2(rnying rgyud): dgrag zugs bya// snying gar thig le dkyil du meng dus gzugs// ske nas sdod mar spyad pas gdags par bya// lag pa g.yas kyi srin lag rgyal 'gal// nas gos ljang nag gon mtha~Md nag bcings// drang zhid ngas mam thang lo'i pags pa la// rdzi
404a3(rnying rgyud): rtsal kha dog ser por sbyar// dug dang khrag gis 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bris// 'khor lo'i rtsi bas la gshin rje'i snying po dgod// dbus kyi lte bar lha chen po yang dgod// g+hi'i mthog gi dbab gas dag gis bskor// 'khor lo mnga' gsol smon lam geng
404a4(rnying rgyud): bram ze la sogs mdo can thod par gzhug/ de yi nang du bse dang lcags zangs dang // dngul dang snying sna khrag sde mang byug ste// le'u 'bras bu mnI'i'aM kha la gzhag/ ting 'dzin rnam kang ma rim gyi tshul bzhin 'askyed// dbang chen rim brtsegs steng du drug cang /
404a5(rnying rgyud): bsam// bruM las 'bar ba lha 'i gzhal yas khang // phyi dang nad med kun tu gsal bar bskyed// dbus su ma he 'am chen bsnol ba la// nyi zla 'khor lo rab tu gsal ba'i steng // ya las rang ma dpal gshed po 'bang ba'i sgra// rna la rtag
404a6(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis gsal bar bskyed// de yi 'khor na gnas pa ste// ma hA de ba hUM zhes brjod pa yis// dbus su lha chen dbang phyug de ba yang // sku mdog nag po spyan gsum mche ba can// rtse gsum 'bar gyu gi can mtshan g.yas// zhabs rdo rje ban g.yon
404a7(rnying rgyud): pade// sprin mtshams thog kru bskal nga'i thog 'dengs sam// 'khor gyi lha yang rtazhon thog 'bebs pa'o// de bzhin ter 'dzin gyis gsal bsgoms la// gzhon rdeg shi pos sras 'thung dang du rjod// hU~M rta gan pa ma gyis bgrang pa'i yang rtsenas// na
404b1(rnying rgyud): dbang gis bstan pa 'phel mdzad cing // ma hA da ba lha chen dbang phug gaH// bstan pa bshig pa'i dgra rnams bsgral ba dang // sangs rgyas bstan bsrang dkon mchog bstod pa'i phyir// 'khor bcas ma lus spyan badren gshegs su gsol// aumra\u0f89\u0fa4 na rtan du bya/
404b2(rnying rgyud): ha su d+d+ha bi hoH/ dga' zhing gas pas pus btsugs thal sbar nas// lha mchog khyod kyi yon tan rab brjod cing // tsam pa ka dang parlar ba gtor nas// dang 'dir bstod da khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// khyod kyi thugs ni nam mkha'i dkyil 'dra dang // 'od
404b3(rnying rgyud): las 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// thogs med mkha' lding nam mkha'i gdan stengs su// brtan par bzhugs nas bdag la dngos srab sgrol// 'khor gyi lha chen mi bzad thog 'bebs bzhi// shugs kyis thogs med rta mchog gdan la bzhugs// ma hAde ba
404b4(rnying rgyud): ni sa ma ya lter ldan// lha yul gtsang ma dag las rab bshams te// bram ze mtshan ldan chags pas rab tu mchod// 'bras dang ku shar bcas pa'i yon chab 'di// ga pur gur gum gla rtsi lce po gsogs// til mar gsung can rang gsal ma
404b5(rnying rgyud): mchog/ ru dra ka la sogs pa'i dri yi chu// lag pan mar dang bcas pa'i thar ma bshos// drang rdung ngu dang zangs dang bkra shis dang // rdo rings dza rba muny+tsa ta me li// cha lang pi wang tam bu hud mangs dang // kru kar rol mo byed 'jo dag la sogs/
404b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i yo byad thams cad ma lus kun// mchod par 'bral lo thugs rjes bzhes su gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga pung+ga d+ha pa A lo keg t+te ra lai AHho// sku mdog nag po sran gsum mche ba gtsigs// drang srong cha lugs parda'i phreng pas brgyad//
404b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi gling bzhi longs la khyab par gzigs// snyan pa 'dral sla gsung ging ro can// dbang phyug chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor gyi lha ni sprin po bzhi// rtul bzhon par la gri bskor// thog ser 'bebs pa'i las la 'gyod// khyed la bdag // bdas
405a1(rnying rgyud): ga tu du tu kun tu tu na rgyu na na
405a2(rnying rgyud): ga /
405a3(rnying rgyud): dzugs da
405a4(rnying rgyud): sa smras /
405a5(rnying rgyud): sa
405a6(rnying rgyud): sa sa smras
405a7(rnying rgyud): na sa /
405b1(rnying rgyud): 'phros pas// thog chen sna tshogs skar ltar 'khrugs// nyams pa'i dag la thog mda' ya// skad cig tsam la phung bar gyis// rta stang stob cing rak+ta sbeng // rtag tu 'brug dang ser ba dang // skrag dang thog dang shA brad 'ang // rnam pa nags krung dag gtung gzug/ ma
405b2(rnying rgyud): lha rten nu mi sha ga ma// mchod rten lnga lang phrag 'og \u0f7f// lhag par dag yi go kha 'am// nyal ba'i rdzas sam mal 'og tu// 'khor lo gcas kyis thod pa sba// drag sngags 'di bzlas rjod par bstims// oM tsa d+har mu bar shA pra man marjed pa dgra 'o'i yul khams sa//
405b3(rnying rgyud): bul pa hUM pa mo swA hA// zhes ni thod pa'i nang du bzlas// gtor ma gtang zhing smon las gdab// brim sku dag la rten bcas la// grwa phying maN+Dal dag la zil// rtag tu lha rnams mchod gyur na// yid kyis ce bsams 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dang
405b4(rnying rgyud): gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten du thog dbab pa lha'i zla gsang gi le'u ste de gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed gshin rje'i gshed pos/ 'gal ba chas la dbab skad du// thog dbanga' lha'i nang bsla
405b5(rnying rgyud): gsungs// srid pa'i mgar gyis ma brdungs mtshon// mi sred byang chub sems kyi dpal rang mtshon// rlung gi bshams pa'i dar gyi mtshan// me srud chen po mtshon dpal dar can des// 'byung ba gzhan gyis mi tshugs shing // de gtid dang las thogs chags med par
405b6(rnying rgyud): 'doms// de nyid bsgrub phyir dur khrod la sogs su// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang b+ha bzhi la// dbus su su gsum e brtsigs te// 'khor lo bzhi dang rol mtsho bdun// gser dbus su ya mAn+ta ka ste// steng du lha chen dbang phyug yab yum dgod// 'khor lo bzhi la
405b7(rnying rgyud): pa// khrag nagamam tha dang 'a mang byed // rgyam byor rgya la migs pa na// sngal gra bldanan dang// dung gsu sa mang brgyad shing ma da// dri'isu ma ma pa ga thong// ga sa lung mgyings 'dod//
406a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ rdo lha yi blon por mnga' yang gsol// bdas kyi bu dang cub tu rtsibs la dgod// thug don lha mthun por mda' yang gsol// lcags kyi phrar ba byung gartsibs la dgod// gnod sbyin lha ma sgron por mnga' yang gsol// 'khar ba'i phung ba
406a2(rnying rgyud): dbus kyi e la dgod// dbang phyug chen po ma hAr mnga' yang gsol// sro ga ras sam shin shun darang dkar la// lha rnams rtsu ba rang rang snying po dang // dab pa 'i rdzagrwa dang dmigs bya'i yul ming dri// rdzod dmar skud pas dmigs pa'i ming rus mgul du gdags// rabs chad nag po'i
406a3(rnying rgyud): thod pa kha spyod la// zod pa'i kyi nad med par khrag gis byug/ steng gi thod pa yab tu mnga' yang gsol// 'og gi thod pa yum du mda' yang gsol// thod pa steng mar yab kyi sku yang bri// thod pa 'og mar yum gyi su yang bri// thod pa'i rtsib pa ring dmigs pa
406a4(rnying rgyud): ming yang bris// dpral bar rus bris kha ru ming byang bri// snying gar dri bris 'doms su bla dgas bris// de yi mtha' mar kha sbyar dza dzes bskor// gog shing shun zhing gi pags pa la// dgra gzugs bris la dbang phyug yum la brgyan// 'khar ba'i bu
406a5(rnying rgyud): gzhug/ gro ga shog bu shing gi lo ma la// lha chen tshogs bdag dbang phyug chen po khyod// khyod kyi btsun mo mA ra ya 'dis spyad// 'khor gyi lha rnams myur du bskul mdzod las// 'di la dbang phyug chen pos thog chen po ba// thod pa de yi mgul du ga dag
406a6(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// spyod pa'i rdang dud me thag skam po dang // gser gyi zangs kyi lcags kyi 'khar gyi dang // dngul dang thog lpags thog zer shi ba paM// snying dang dus be sha yang skal// thod pa/ Sha sbyar mi yi rgyas paso bcing // skye gsum la la chu gsum steng du bzhag/
406a7(rnying rgyud): skyes me tog sa tshogs dang // 'dod pa na yangs spyod zas rnams dang // rtun chang spang dang 'bras chang dang // tho chang dang ni a 'bru sha/ de dag mchod pa'i rdzas su dgram// sna tshogs sbyid dang khrag tu sbyar// bung ma 'bras kyi gto ma bzhi// ma smon po bzhi yang Ta
406b1(rnying rgyud): lin ji ltar 'dad pa dbyangs// gzugs me byas la mdun du bzhag/ sngags kyis thub cang gsang las bya// ting 'a na gdan bcas gzhal yas bzud// yam trug 'khrugs par bsgom// gdan du la dgas gdang bar bya// dbang phyug chan pogs pa bsgoms te/
406b2(rnying rgyud): kyi lha bzhis bskor bar bsam// e ma hA de bkal traM/ zhes tsa dadabang phrag chen po yang // nag pa sten gsum mche ba rab tu gtsigs// phyag mtshan rtse gsum thu gi rgyal mtshan g.yas// zhags pa dren tshul bcod dag tshul g.yon// rdzas
406b3(rnying rgyud): ngos po che bas// gser gyi ral gre 'bar bklang la bskor// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i ral gri krol btags// de 'dra rab tu gsal bar bsgom par bya// shar phyogs lha yi phyag na dngul gyi gzhu ba rungs dngul mda' phyag na bskams// dngul gyi 'khor lor rtsor
406b4(rnying rgyud): 'jug rta zhon nas ki kang phag la bcug/ rlung gi thog 'bebs ser ba'i sbyin thang gtong // lho nas gser gyi thog chen gong bzhin 'babs// nub nas zangs thog byang nas lcags thog 'bebs// de 'drags la bsgom yengs par mi bya'o// d+hi rnam sa mtshan
406b5(rnying rgyud): gseg gyi ter bstan// byang chub chen po mchog gi phrag nani// brjid 'dral can pa su ru spel ba'i rgyal// byung shad ma rnams nam spu bde shin tu bstan// ma bar snang smin gtibs dkyil 'khor nas// smra dag dbang ring dpung can/
406b6(rnying rgyud): dadapang thug gtub 'a// drags sbyin gyi gtebs nas nam mkha' gang bar bya'o// gcing gan stobs kyi drag thosrabs kyis gdon// bdud padag po su gis se mcho can// bdun par shag pa jug na ldanan//

407b3(rnying rgyud): drug gnod pa'o// dpa' bo chen po stag gi pags pa thogs// 'khor nga lha mi blon po bzhi zhes bskor// phyag nas phyogs ma kun d+ha rnam thongs pa// smon lam khyad par ma sa ma thu sung la// bla ma lta bu'i rnam par thar pas la// yan mdzad dang

407b7(rnying rgyud): na thams sa phram// shel gyi khu 'bang rdul lo lo// gser thog lpags thag rnams so chem// gnam phrugs ral grig la bskur// gser gyi sha rlung glog chen 'khrug/ ngo po gye lnga yang thog chan 'bangs// shar thugs dri zang zheng khams nas/
408a1(rnying rgyud): la blon po yang // dngul rtseg tu mang mdu 'phags te// log nas dadung kyi thog chen 'babs// dngu gyi thog chen bung ru// ke gang po dral dra las la 'dzud// thag sar sbyin thang blo brir 'babs// de bzhin phyogs kyi blon bzhi bskal//
408a2(rnying rgyud): log gi dang bsngags thod par bstim/ ur choms chad na la re shad shad byo/ dza rak+sha bi ta mA ra ya snying la rbad// tsit+ta bi ri la kha ga tshal pa paM// rak+ka ya gra bi dA ba la rbad/ ngu tshe'ur choms/ rbad na la ram shad shad nag po srog la choms choms/ phobs pobs/

408a4(rnying rgyud): cig/ tsog cag tril hri la phob ya/ de ni zad dbab pa'o// de bzhin thod pa kha sbyar te// dmigs pa'i yul gyi dbus su sgra// lcags phrar mkhar gyi rmang du sba// zangs phur yul lha'i rten sar swa// dbul phud rta yi bres su sba// de bzhin byas nas phab gyur na/

408a6(rnying rgyud): gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// bstan pa gnyen po bsrung ba'i phyir// thog dbab lha yi gsang bsrub gsungs// rma bya dag gi rgyal mtshan la// dmigs pa'i ming rus 'og tu bcug/ smyug rgod rtsad ni bzhig shags la// ling+ga dag gi ske ru gdab// phying

408b2(rnying rgyud): tal pa la tag dang // de bzhin sa tshogs thang dkar nag/ zhing chen pags pa mtshan ngan la// yul gyi mang dang brnag pa'i ming // de bzhin gyis te der bcug ste// spyan drang bzhugs michod pastim par bya// rngag chags 'di dag rab/ bajam// mahAn+dan
408b3(rnying rgyud): be she a nA ya po ba/ ha ra tsan+da ha ra ma ha tsan+tA ha ra yak+Sha pak+ka phob/ rak+Sha ma ya k+Sha b+h+yo// shar she la ha la ha la b+har+tha pra che po ba// pra tse ba tse ha ra hi ri dza du ti b+h+yo// rag rak+ta tseR+Sha ma hA shar ti nan d+ha ra tsan d+ha pa tsa ha la ha la dar da ra phaT/ rak+Sha tsa d+he ma hA shat+ta dz+yaH/

408b5(rnying rgyud): zan la sems can gyi gzugs ste tshogs byas te/ khrag gis thugs la khang pa'i thog du bzhag na/ sems can de nyid mang por 'phel nas khang ba'am khang gseb cu skang sna tshogs 'don zhing 'ong ngo // sman 'dri ta sa 'dzin dang / 'di wang la sngags nas rnga ma grags

408b7(rnying rgyud): sngags btab nas dbang phyug chen po la mchod nas/ phyugs 'ga' nyungs pa la gtad na phyugs 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rma bya'i rgyal mtshan la bsngags nas/ rtag tu lus la bcangs na nang mdze 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// sbyor ba'i rim pa bsdus par gsungs so//
409a1(rnying rgyud): dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten khams su thog dbab pa'i blugasang lhags bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ster bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rdo gshed pos thugs rin chan ga rdza

410b3(rnying rgyud): du ne ngan ting du la ya ts+tsha b+h+yo// ma ru ngag dag mai dz+haiM// ma ma ru ru rag mo kyo// snying ga rak+Sha ti ta ma g+ho// rag mo ma mkhong gi snying la ya b+h+yo// rag mo tsa ba zag la mu sha/ snying tsa ru ru tsa pa la ma ma gyo// snying sha ti dmar po bran gyo/ 5/ snying tsal dbar po rdzun no// shir khrag la dpa
410b4(rnying rgyud): sbyin \u0f7f// seM/ 'i dmarang po thun to// de ni ma tho rbad pags te// nga rang thub pa'i dgas dang gyur// de nas gas pa'i las than// rang rang ba rtags phrag bzhin spang // ma mo bas dpa than sngags dang // rang rang ribs na dab pa'i rdzogs// gnas
410b5(rnying rgyud): gshed pos dbang bsdus pa// oM kang ti sa tsu gser gdab// gong gi rnga sa la sngags 'di brdeg/ trag dak+sha kha mun tra/ ma tra ma mun dra lu ru lAn+nats+tsha hrI b+h+yo// rag mo te ku ma tsatsa kha la mra ta// ru yu ru lu ma tedz+ye// rug+sa thun b+ha rtso// dang / shri rar bun/ sa ma yadzan/
410b6(rnying rgyud): rkang thun/ bi bal na cid pa pos tha // phaT \u0f7f/ dra bas sa/ kha ma mam thal lam/ thog pa thuH/ snying pazed pa/ ga ga drug pa'i rngam blangs pa/ e ga tis mang nad gdang / thug dan pa 'dang / ba dang rna bsas rgyams na pa rlung gzang
410b7(rnying rgyud): smin pa ma la/ dgagramar yangang / rim nyims de dang na ba // rgyas rgyas cigagis la zhig sa/ / brgyad/ khyed cigazums she/ yang yang dum phum/ bang mi ma ba na/ ga pa/ dris pa la
411a1(rnying rgyud): bum srid/ mar gang zad su mas // ba drag pa gam sad/ brag thams ni rbad yod/ non tham than sod/ gang btags dung na babang// de nas rgyun dang bar 'a// mdzod rten bum par bsnga' ba \u0f7f// mu mog nang san
411a2(rnying rgyud): dbang yang ga // yab sgram dog sa gdugs me pa// rang shA rdzogs kyis pasad// dkyil 'khong ga thang dang dru ba na// skye ba brten pa sa gnang gtang // zhes ba shad du// dang 'ag tsu rgyagasang nag pa za ba'i da las/ ngang sngags rgyag
411a3(rnying rgyud): dbab pa ma mor thugs bathun pa'i le skar lbu pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal ga shin rje'i gshed pas 'di sad kyis bka' bram hA// drug lab cham la dbab pa'i byer// ma mo stong gi las mkhanam// nag mo mi ma med gas ma chags
411a4(rnying rgyud): dpa' ldan nag mo res tis// nad ba dge ma la rnags gsum// dang por chos dang dag bshags sogs// rib pa de bzhin stong bar bsgom// 'byung ba sa lnga'i gnas las bskyed// sems kyi rang bzhin gshed pa ste// steng las 'jog pas sun pa te/
411a5(rnying rgyud): chud rtogs pas gtor ma badrub// srog gi snying pos dbral bar bya// dak+Sha na mchod yis brlab// bar dra bsku tshig gang rung baphral// denas bsgrub par byu ni// dkyil 'khor mthong nag zugasum la// thag ma dmar po gsum gyis bskor// dzang par tham
411a6(rnying rgyud): bzhi rngan// shin tu drag po'i snod nang du// tsid+ha dang ni rak+ta dang // btsan drug rnams ni thug par bya'o// nal bu'i shA dang shes rab mtshal// nal bu'i banad+ha'i nang du blag/ nal bu'i snying la rtag tu bod// bya nag yug nag rten du bcang // nal bu'i gas dul d+ha
411a7(rnying rgyud): dongs// dar dag 'phur sde btags te zung // gtor ma spyan gzigs ldan pas bslang // tshad ba rbang pa gsang pa'i sngags// wang dkar thang nag rdzas rnams la// bdun 'bum grangs ni rjo dgyur na// rims nang sa tshogs char bzhin 'bengs// lha rmang phron
411b1(rnying rgyud): stong nas dzan po ba nan/ ya gas/ stong ba dag ga/ zag sa dang dang gyu/ mamadzad pade rtso ga 'ang/ nas dzin pa'i mchog ldanano// ma rag mtham thal/ 6'angs/ slob sag drug na tu d+ha// rkang ba gsug tha gang drung da/ ma
411b2(rnying rgyud): yabadz+ra la~M hU~M phaT/ masrog tugatug kham la Sh+Ta rbad/ mthag thun/ spreng lam mtho// sa ma yarbad/ kha thun rde dza / mamo gas thig nag mo 'das// rims dang khrug lpag nad gi sugasod// ma mngangag snying dag gi tra bra rbang / dza thang zang rtsig meng d+ha badz+rad cang /
411b3(rnying rgyud): blangs kyi 'asre ba te badrang dang / kha 'dang yid yad thams thams cad drang so la bu 'a 'dzad cad pa d+ha/ bdag nyid kyi shi rjeg shed bsgom te// gshed po'i sngags papa ma 'phros pas// yi ge ma yis stong gsum bkang // yang 'dzas pade shegs rnams kyi rdugs dpa
411b4(rnying rgyud): brdal// sar 'dus sems dpa'i dang du btsu 'thas// mar da gyi mi dkyim 'thor snyam ldan ces dab // yig 'jig du ma gyi phyi ba dang babrar nas// malas sum nyid kyi su gyur te// su dag nagaso shing tu gtum ba la// shin zhig pa zhang gcing
411b5(rnying rgyud): phug zhem// ral gri ban d+ha dmar bkyi g.yas rim bzhin// shak+ti tre shul mgral nas dar dpungs g.yon// ral pa gcig tu bsgrengs pa lan bug yon du 'khyil// swa snyed sbal la zad pa'i 'greng bas brgyan// rta lhag mi rtog cod pan dang nag dargyad //
411b6(rnying rgyud): g.yas sbal gyi gdangs ka yad// mgral nas sel sman 'grol ba'i sman g.yon pa// se ge mgul nas 'phyong khrod rnon do shal byas// bong brag pa la zhon gzhan yang che ba'i rgyan// gzug pa'i chun rnams stong gis brtsan par bsgom// ting 'dzin patsha
411b7(rnying rgyud): dpa' las 'od zeng ni// sngags kyu 'bang ba'i 'od zer rab 'phros te// bdag nyid rkyen ma'i gro gnas rab 'a phrul lo// srid pa ma mas sto/ gas mdengs par bya// gshin rje'i tshe g+sa rtsis kyang ni de bzhin no// srog la rnams pakun gyis bsko bar bam//
412a1(rnying rgyud): tha la yang nas yang du// / bzod pa 'bab sa la tsha 'jal 'byung // de ltung dab tu yang mas sgom par bya// yongs par kyar nag tsug kyang mi 'grub ste// gtugs sogs su pa ma ma pas// gang 'thab la ngas/
412a2(rnying rgyud): 'bas ste// sgrazlog pa mig tu'i gdog 'ad pang// gan tha brdal thogs panas thag tu sdug ba da 'dod par cing dbags dang 'bral la khyad// bung kyi spong nang du 'dug par dmigs// dpa bamams ga shed pos dbang byed/
412a3(rnying rgyud): nga'i tshul gyis bstod pa 'di skad dbul// dpal ldan dag mo ma pham srid gsum mgon// bdag rin bgrub byer zlum tha gsum gzho pa yang // sgyid rje'i dbang gis rjes la thob pa yi// shes rab sa tshogs bapas kyis ma dron ma da// mA mi bru 'jog da/
412a4(rnying rgyud): mo char spen pa dag// mchog mo nag mo shin tu gtum pa'i phra// shin du skem pa'i keng dus mche ba ma// zhal gcig phrag bzhi zhapas gnyis rab tu brjod// ral pa gcig sang lan thas mod du 'grel// sra snyed sbrul lathod pa'i theng bcan// da rtsig tog
412a5(rnying rgyud): dang dag med pa dang // lagag cang gis dang da gsur dpar// por dngas pa khar bcug mche ba'i// rnam par gzugs nas zhag sa shin tu dace// sun ga pas sbal sti ma tha la nas jel gsal byed// gdag pa bdul nas tshangs pa/
412a6(rnying rgyud): donas pa// skad ci g.yon pa se gangal ba can// dpa' ba 'ams gsus seng ge'i su stsogs dus// phyag bzhig las med par la gyi bsdum sa// tshig mthod pa bad+ha pa la 'don// cag ga san da rjo nagagate bsgrums/
412a7(rnying rgyud): la napa dbyangs pa las// sheg tir bakhrim tshan thar ba yis// spem yin kyi zad pa pa dag 'a byas// blang bam thog tshun myed g.yogs mangs// srung nis pan thang gro ba sa kyis pal// khyod mgrus pa'i shes byin// rgyas
412b1(rnying rgyud): dbang po bzhi 'i sked tshangs can// zhabs gnyis lpags ldog dag gi mangs par brtan// khrug zhag thig le mang pos mtshon char zas// bong brden kon mtshan mo dun khrod sgra// gad ni drang dang 'brug ga sgra sgrogs shing // mam mkha' 'gro sha ma dam la thad/
412b2(rnying rgyud): lha phyogs gshin je'i pho brang dag tu gnas// dam pa'i sa nas gzugs sku ldan nyid ma// ting 'dzin dbang thob gzugs khams gnas su gyon tsam na// tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs phyag byas ma// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas su byon pa'i tshe// dbang
412b3(rnying rgyud): phrug chen po sgra la nyer 'khril ma// sum cu rtsa gsum tshal bzhir byon pa'i tshe// lha rnams dbugs byang rgyal bzhin phyag byas ma// lha ma yin rnams phrang bar byas pa'i tshe// lha men rgyal po kun gyi phyag byas ma// sku mdog re rab che las sgrol ba'i tshe//
412b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i zad ka'i phyogs nas nyi ma zla ba 'char// brgya byin phyogs skyong lha yi phyag byas ma// rgya mtsho gting nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skems rgyas ma// sa 'og dbang po kun gyis phyag byas ma// lha mo khyod sa cho 'phrul 'di bstan pas// bdud dang gshin rje'i rgyal po
412b5(rnying rgyud): 'dang zhing 'drad// ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za rngam zhing dgod// tsit+ta rin chen gur phub gzhal yas nas// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ga'ur 'bar// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dug gi bcud bsdus nas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim mdzad ma//
412b6(rnying rgyud): ge rlangs pa nag po'i phyogs rnams kyis// bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi'i nad ni khong nas spong // de phyir nad kyi bdag mod ma la 'du// phyo gos bcu'i 'jig rten bdud rtsi'i bcud bsdus nas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la thi ma mdzad ma// bdud rtsi'i rlangs pas dkar
412b7(rnying rgyud): po 'brags rnams kyis// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhing nad rnams kyad nas gcod// bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal po dam la 'dra// gang zhig khyed la dad na ma bas byams// de phyir nad kyi bdag mo sman gyigatso// lha mo khyod la bdag nyid rtag tu bstod// rgyal ba shAs thub
413a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i ldan pa // dus 'di bdag gis 'ayod pa yod// gas nan dang ga pa sa latshogs// nang du na ca mangs rgyad zlag// dan pa 'chags rnas mas skad dbang da// slo dag zhugs pa
413a2(rnying rgyud): pas 'di ma thogs byur du kyis// bstan pa bslang phyer slar du 'grub par gyis// 'di las 'das na sangs rdzas rgyal ba'i ska bslus pas// dras gas ma chul bas mag dang snyir 'gems shog/ de skad rgyal pa'i sgran las blangs dam bcas pa'o// dang /
413a3(rnying rgyud): bcas bzhin du lung du chen las gyis// rnal 'byor bdag gi 'khor rnams la// khyod kyi zhal nas bdud rtsi'i char phob la// nad tshogs sdug bsngal tshogs ni zhi bar mdzod// zang zing la tog 'bru yi phung po dang // rin chen rkang 'gros phragase rnams rje
413a4(rnying rgyud): bar mdzod// bla ma snod cing dkon mchog dbu 'phang spod// bdag la dge ba'i bar chad byed pa'i dgra// khyod kyi khong nas drug gi rlangs phung la// 'dra ba rnam pazhi'i nad ni 'dra drug/ bag bzhis la lgang nas rdebs su drug/ don nyid sbrul khong na la tha
413a5(rnying rgyud): phyag chug/ las ngan 'khor tshogs chongs gdungs su drug/ mkha' lding rgyal po'i tshogs kyi ltas ngan thob// dam bca' bzhin du bcol ba'i phrin las myur du mdzod// ces pas bstod cing phrin las bcol gyur na// gong 'dod rims nad thogs su 'bebs
413a6(rnying rgyud): mi srog bsdus te gas dper bya'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal ga shin rje thagasang dag po rtsa ba'i chud las/ yams kyi bdag mo ma mo'i thugasang bstan pa'i mi ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed thos 'di
413a7(rnying rgyud): ces gsungasas// 'gal brtsam la dbab pa'i phyid// nadang na tshog dba' ba'i thabs// ma maM'i gsang spu bklags shig pa 'di// thabs kyi sbyong ba yang mod kyang // brdzun rnam pa pazhiru 'das// bla med sbub mthurang 'byung // 'jig rte/
413b1(rnying rgyud): bzung ba da sa// na 'grol grub pa'i byung ban// rdzas gyonas pa dag las byung // gad na dang rnams bcas pal// rnam sangs ma nid thad par dang // rnam pa gnyis nigs la zlas te// rdzas dang gdan bcas pa bstan// mar dgas dpa thung ban
413b2(rnying rgyud): gang la'ang 'di las yod ma ben// ma mo nAg sdug dkar mo dang // dpar ma'i tshogs kyi las dag las// rims dad btang ba mang med kyang // kun gyi phyag brtan nges te// 'di dag bslab ste nad dbapan// rims nad rdza tshogs stong gsum 'gengs
413b3(rnying rgyud): de yis mas ni 'di ltar bya// rgyag zer gyis ni bi'i khrag/ btsan dag zar chub bres nas kyang // bas so ga dang mangs gyur// thugs 'di ba ta ba ste spyod yang btud// ra shi shi ta ti se ma da/ srog phran gragaso par gang zad du// lusad/

414a1(rnying rgyud): khri'am 'bum bzlas te/ sha la reg pa'i gos la bslus na/ mdze dang phol 'bras kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro// mdze khrag du chang dang sbyar nas ltor btadang/ sgying la babaste nas mdze dang / mngon 'khor bas 'chi bar 'gyur
414a2(rnying rgyud): ro// de nas yang dug rdzas dang rims khrag sna tshogs sbyar nas/ gong gi sngags rnams drag tu bzlas te/ yul mkhar gyi lha rten nam/ chu mig ku btsan yod nges pa'am/ brag bru yod sar gtor na/ rims nad sna tshogs na bun bzhin du 'thibs te 'ong ba dang /
414a3(rnying rgyud): thog mer 'ong pa dang / ser ba khrag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rab tu gsal ba'i sbyor ba drug po'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje na gsang nag po rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ nad ngan snga tshogs btang ba'i ma mo'i thagasang ge le'u ste bdun pa'o//
