414a5(rnying rgyud): shid spyod lam goms// slob dpon mnyes pa'i thugs bzung nas// man dag thugs la phur te bsgrub// de gsum rtse dang brag dkar dang // lha khang dur khrod be'u'am// yang na kha phyogs shar bltas su// rtsa ba thag yod rtsi shing gyes// shad

414b1(rnying rgyud): lags la// de nas stegs tha brtsegs pa yang // ma gying rnams ma dang brkeng la// nas 'bras 'bru yi gcal yang dgram// gzur da tipa la dang // chu skyes la sogs dri thos dang // ya la dang tha re 'phan gzugs ces// srog bdag dkang po nyid 'byor

414b3(rnying rgyud): dang // pase dang bye ru gser dang ni// lpags spud dkar pos brgyan par byas// gzhan yang gagod na rgod dang // thung grom la sogs sun gzigs dag/ de ma tha ma ba skor tedagra ma// spos dang gi rtog ma ma dang // dza gling di wang la sogs da // grag sa
414b4(rnying rgyud): de ye mtha' ma da bzhag/ tsan+dan dkar po'i chul sogs// dung sogs kha phor bkang ba gnyis// sku gzugs de yi mtha' mar bzhag/ wang dkar cang nag sde tshe yang // ga pa sngags kyi mtshon du bzhag/ gzhan yang rgong sna tshogs dang // wAr ba'i rnam grangs
414b5(rnying rgyud): zer ba dang // sgeg pa sman dang dri spos rnams// bris skud yi mtho byer dmam// gshin rdo ga shi pa'i srung bsgoms la// snying po bcu dang rtsa brgyad brjod// oM a kro ta ka yasa? n+ta ka han mthatha na rjelab/ oM kA la d+hab hUM paT/ auSh+Ta tr-I mi rkun ne rje rje
414b6(rnying rgyud): baT phaT/ bdag mthun parlab lus bsgya hA// de nas dbang dru sgru ba dang // num po dkrug pa'i las byung ba// spyan thang phyag 'tshal bzhugs sugs pa// phyag chab gas pa dang gdan thams tshangs// mchod pa 'bral zhing bstod pab po// 'dzu

415a1(rnying rgyud): yo ba la rbang / la lag nan/ thal ba na/ rma nya ga la pa/ gr-I tI ka la la// ga shi / mdzi 'dzi nga/ gag h+Na shag du/ ga ma sa// laT/ de bzhin rgyal bdag tu cad// gal te las byed ma bcab na// rgyab
415a2(rnying rgyud): 'i shis 'di yis bstan// mar nA pra mar tsan+da t+pa pa lings ma ya/ a thaM nga / phyag tu bzhi yis gzugs bcings te// sngags ni ba rgya dang rtsa brgyad brjod// rgyal po dang pa dbang med par// rdul dang thag tu 'jog cid 'ong // de bzhin gsung pa'i las
415a3(rnying rgyud): thubs kyang // mye 'bog shrI pa'i srad por du// de nyid rang gi sbring khrag dang // dug sna dgra dang dpe blag sbyar// brnag pa'i ming dus bris te gzhug/ drung khrod ro ras rnying pa la// gsad pa'i 'khor lo bca' bar gsungs// dang po nyi ma bzhi yi sngags/

415b2(rnying rgyud): 'bog btang ba'i le wa ster brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos/ rgyal poning du ba rbab gi slong bog gis gsad pa 'di gsungs so// thog par bra ma mnyes byas te// sri'ab byung zhid dam tshogs bathag tshan ldan/

415b4(rnying rgyud): drab dmar byang ldang // mtshams bzhi skrag nag blo dang bcas// dbus su grags ma re re the// de nas tsan+dan dkar pong ma// chu shug dkar po'i grang ba dgu// srog bdag dgu ru mnga' gsol la// dang dkar srog steng bris te gdags// 'di skad brjod pa
415b5(rnying rgyud): dgod par bya'o// sbed dbus kyi shal ro shil gyi khang pa nas// khams gsum sgrog la mnga' mdzad pa// srog bdag nag por la pa can// bstan pa bsrang zhir gshegs su gsol// bstan pa bsrang kyir gshegs nas kyang // pho thang dbus kyi ling rdol// dgra bas
415b6(rnying rgyud): bsnol ba'i gdon stengs sra// dgyes shing brtan par bsngags su gsol// gi kAr sa ma ya hi N+Da wAn/ de skad brjod la dbus su dgod// rgyal rigs srog la mnga' mdzad pa// srog bdag rgyal po khu le shod// dkyil 'khor shar gyi ling tshal// bkram/
415b7(rnying rgyud): su gsol pa skang bzhin no// bram ze'i rigs la mnga' mngod pa// rgyal po chen po ag ni yang // spyi phyogs dkyil 'khor ling tshol// de sa rigs sog pa mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po sreg ge yang // de bzhin drub kyi phyogs la dgod// dmangs
416a1(rnying rgyud): rigs srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal ba chen po drung se yang // de bzhin byang gaphyogs la dgod// bud med srog pa mda' mdzad pa'o// rgyal po chen po shangs yang // dkyil 'khor shar lho'i ling rtsol// zas
416a2(rnying rgyud): grog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen pod khod kyang // dkyil 'khor lho nub le tsha la// me nag srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po ni khod kyang // nub byang dkyil 'khor lo tsher 'khor// rgyal srong srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen
416a3(rnying rgyud): yang // bung shar dkyil 'khor le tsher 'bod// de nas mchog gi skur pa bzhi// nyin bzhi gling bzhir mda' yang gsol// rigs mthun dang kyi cod pan gdags// phrin las bcol phyir sgo bzhir gdab// dar spang bakhril la mtha' mang ba
416a4(rnying rgyud): bla rgyan 'og rgyan ce mang dgram// dang dkar gung dbu bza 'og gdan yang bting // de nas dbus kyi srog bdag la// gsang phye bre gang lhab shos la// ri rab tshul du 'dra byas la// dbus su skyug mchog dpral// mtshal gyi mkhar thabs nya mig
416a5(rnying rgyud): bri/ rtsel bya rgod rgyal mtshan dang // dang dkar gdug gcig steng nas dgab// drang gi g.yer ka g.yab rngazod// lpags bu dkar po'i blad bu gdags// tha ma'i tshig la ming rus gdags// gzhan yang sdug tshig gsum brgyangs la/
416a6(rnying rgyud): mtshal dang sdong ros sgo smad la// mkhar thabs bris pa rtse bskrad// rtse la dang gyi re yang gdags// byang bar dar dkar sdong po dang // dung dang zangs dang rin po che// byi ru mgron bu mi sar gdags// tha mar dgra'i ming dus gdags// lcang ma ma
416a7(rnying rgyud): reb bzhi la// mtshal la ma ga yung dung ris sra bri// thod rer lpags ming rus re// de bzhin btags pa rim par bzhag/ gzhan yang phung dang nya sha dang // bu ram 'bras chan gtor ma yang / za 'og dar dang lpags dkar dang // rin chen gsal
416b1(rnying rgyud): rgyagapa bkong na// gtanan nag pa / kya ba 'gyu // gso dang nga ba// tshogs pazhin su ra// gcog tu do sa nga/ da/ zu gangs mag tu/ dag mdzu bal
416b2(rnying rgyud): dag grags can rnas pa ra// bdag nyid na byags mang na du bzheg/ sman yang srim dang mitag dang // yang mang pa gleng dang // mdzad pa'i ma tha~Md kyigasu pa zhi ma// de'ag+sa dkar po gang yangs// rang

416b4(rnying rgyud): gcig bkal lag tsug/ gshin rje'i gshed por dgas pa bsgoms la// sngags brnas pa stod pa med draH// ber mun mod chen yang brdung // snyan gas na dpab dang sman dung dang // phyag 'tshal bzhugs dang mchod pa 'bral// bstod pa
416b5(rnying rgyud): zhing smon lam gdab// thugs dam 'apral zhing phrin las bcol// srog snyeng 'di ni rtag tu drangs// oM hrI hri dubya khyung kar mar ma ra ya swA hA/ de ni srog bdag rang gi snying po'o// 'di ni 'khor gyi sgrog pa dag chud kyi snying po'o// oM khu le ma hA bar ma
416b6(rnying rgyud): oM a ka rba swA hA/ oM mrag shas le swA hA/ oM ba~M ti ba me he wAr+tha/ oM shes she ga ra swA hA/ oM khong ba pas swA hA/ oMn po dper nyid swA d+ha/ oM sa d+ha tsir+tha pra trA Ta me swAhA/ de rnams ting gi snying po ste// mi chog g.yal dang srid pa dang // dwags

417a1(rnying rgyud): bskrad dam bag// ba dgas pa dang nang thon pas stsol// oMm man/ rA bar bdun dun paka' ba dgras sa bya brtag mab bcas pa rnams las la nad pa'i mags
417a2(rnying rgyud): de nas rta dkar thod pacha// brnag pa'i ming rus gzugs bcug la// ta bod pa 'og dag gis zil// dam gro lha ru gzhug pa'i phyir// khrags ma sra gral phyar ma dang // mtsho wang gau ro tsa na sa// skyo 'bog gtod pa'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM ma mar ga zan
417a3(rnying rgyud): mastAr thun b+h+yo// mAhA pa wa/ ma hA de wa/ ma hA ru m+b+ha b+hA// a bo ta ya bo ta ya/ trA ta ya rba ta ya/ khre la k+ku la/ ging ka ging ka ra/ ging dz+wal ga dz+wal/ yag/ thib/ dag ze ba/ de grib/ pra Tha dkar ma d+mo// dan
417a4(rnying rgyud): srog bdag 'khor gyi lce 'bog btang pa'i sngags so// de nas brnag pa'i ming rus la/ rang rang rtsa ba'i sngags brjod cing // phur pa rnams kyis rib pas gdab// gtso ba'i phreng pa snying la gdab/ rgyal po ag ni lag pa g.yas// rgyal po ug nas
417a5(rnying rgyud): dpung par gdab// rgyal po drang ses lag pa g.yon// shar ses rkang pa g.yas la gdab// da khod dpung mgo g.yon la gdab// nyi zlas dpung pa g.yas la gdab// bsad pa nyi ma bzhi pa ste// nyin bzhi lha yi ging bzhis bya// de nas rta yi thod pa ru/
417a6(rnying rgyud): laMng+ga'i mtheb shul thun rdzas sprul// lha khang gnam la btags gyur na// sgo 'bog khrag nang pAr ya ro// zhes gsungs sa// dpal zla gsang nag po rtsa ba'i chud las/ rgyal po nang du bslab ste lho bog btang ba'i le'u ste re dgu pa'o//

417b2(rnying rgyud): gsum la// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thod phreng bcas// klu chad sgo bzhir ldan pa la// dur khrod brgyad dang ldan par bya// gru gsum me 'od 'bar ba bri// sgo bzhi dgu gsum re re bri// de nas mchog gi phur pa dgu// srog bdag dgu yi sngags bris la// dbus
417b3(rnying rgyud): sra dkar po'i snying bzhi dgod// rgyan dang cha lugs gsal bar bskyed// shar phyogs rtsibs la khu le shod// lha yi rtsibs la ag ni dgod// nub kyi rtsibs la ug ste// byang gi rtsibs la zangase dgod// shang se shar la da khod s+ho// ni khod rkub la ti tra
417b4(rnying rgyud): byang // de ltar sgo bzhi dgod par bya'o// 'khar gzhong dung phor bseg ba tu// snying sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dgram// lug dkar snying srog ma bral ba// srog rtsa'i nang du ming rus gzhug/ snying rtse gyen du bstan la bzhag/ dar dkar tshil gyis kha bcad
417b5(rnying rgyud): la// dbus su srog bdag nyid la bzhag/ shar du khrag sna'i gtor ma bzhag/ lho ru sha sna'i gtor ma bzhag/ nub tu rus pa'i gtor ma bzhag/ byang du mkhal lnga'i gtor ma bzhag/ de nas sgo bzhi gtor ma yang // shar skrod mchin pa sna tshags bdag
417b6(rnying rgyud): lho sgor sha chen 'bu sna tshogs// nubasgor mchod pa sna tshogs bzhag/ byang du tshil bu rkang sna tshogs// gtor ma de dag nang du yang // bshos bu ma khyid gang par btsugs la bzhag/ de la smyug rgod re re la// pad dkar lpags bu dkar po dang // ming byang brtags
417b7(rnying rgyud): pa ri yang gzug/ phyogs bcur mngon par gzhag par bya// mi 'jigs pa yi steng du yang // shar du lug dkar lho ru bya// nub tu dadakar byang du khyi// bag zan gzugs byas dkar por bsgyur// sems can dngos su yod na rab// med na gang rung gcig gis bsred
418a1(rnying rgyud): ming rus bris te gdags par bya// dkyil 'khor lho nub 'bung khung du// dam gri'i gzugs dang ming rus gzhug/ sha khrag sgra tshogs gtor ma la/ tshil chen zhal khebs yod pa la// raka'i gsang nan chas pa gcig/ dkyil 'khor byang /
418a2(rnying rgyud): shar mtshams su bzhag/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum gsal bsgoms la// gzhal yas rten bzlas dkyil 'khor bskyed// bdag nyid gshed por gsal bsgoms la// rgyal po 'khor bcas gsal bar bsgom// sngan drang bzhugs mchod tshul bzhin bya// rtag tu snying po 'di rang
418a3(rnying rgyud): brjod// oM bri ba ra sha ma hA rA tsa swA hA/ oM khu le ma hA be ra ma swA hA/ oM a ka rut+na swA hA/ oM yug sha ma le swA hA/ oM drang seb+ha ba swA hA/ oM shang se shar kang ri swA hA/ oM ad khod pi pi sar swA hA/ oM ni khod pa rire hi he swA hA/ oM sU r+ya god+ha ma hA khu le swA hA/ de ni rtsa ba'i drag/

418a6(rnying rgyud): dbang po'i phur bas dbang bskur nas// dgra nying dkar nag mtshams su gdab// btab nas myur du brlag gyur cig/ kI li ki la ya tsi d+ha mug/ dkar po steng 'byin tsit+ta lhan lhan/ hUM rgyal po chen po khu le shod// gsod pa'i phreng par byen brlabs te// kha /

418b6(rnying rgyud): b+h+yo/ mahA tsa thun g+ho b+ha/ mthab ma ma hA de wam hA ruka ts+tsha s+ho/ yun gyis brgya ba ste brlag par bya// li dag tu bas la gtor mang bsngal// rigasu ma rtsel yas stegs bstsal// rgyal pos spang ba'i sngags ni/ oM bdu la sha pra la ma marba rba ba wang khwa swahA/

419b7(rnying rgyud): nag zugasum la// blag ma gsum kyis skor brig dmang sdug mdo'i rabs bskod// dbus su gshed po la ba yum ste// mdun du ga ba bzang po dgod// mtshan rjen pod pa dum gsum du// la phrag rus pa' phyem la// snying rta khrag sa spar la bzhag / dgas kyi bu gsum bur drab to// nang du bas med thod pa la//
420a1(rnying rgyud): chung nag mcho dang lan tshwa dang // dug dang dam khrag sbyang bas dgang // dmigs pa'i ming dus ji bzhin dbyibs// bcas la zad pa'i nang du 'phrul// dang khrod mong khyed btsam nas kyang // mtshan ma 'a ras blangs brkyang brtul bya//

420b2(rnying rgyud): 'das gshin rje'i gshen pos/ gad ba bzang po gsang bltar bslab pa 'di gsungs so// dmachog gsang sa thub pa'i bus// bla ma mnyes phyir yid 'thab dbul// mi don ma yin dang don du// bskyab pa gong bzhin tshul ba sham te// de nas man dge nga
420b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin gyi// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ lo mig kar sha pa ni la// sngags ni 'di dag rab tu bzlas// a~M dza laM ma hA dza laM/ yAg sha dag sha si sA lpad ma pi bag sha swA hA/ 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste// sngon du bsnyen pa sum dbum bya// lus bsrung

420b6(rnying rgyud): gsum// sngags 'di bzlas nas byin gyur na// oM badz+ra d+hi ti tang / ra ta ma rung / snying la shad shang/ drang srog la breng phreng thun rnga/ glang chen baglad 'chi bar 'gyur// bse dang kAng ka kA ru la// sngags de bzlas nas byin kyar na// lug labyin ni 'che bar 'gyur/
420b7(rnying rgyud): ba ling ka dang a mar dang // bu ram sbyar ti ri lu zas// tha ba gzas zin dus su bya// lin bcas te basprul nas kyang // lhog pa dkar nag 'chi bar nges// yang na spangs nas 'chi bar nges// yang na zha brum 'gro me nus// dang po khas blangs bzhin du bya// 5
421a1(rnying rgyud): dang sbyang ka'i mche ba dang // wa yi ral ma sbrang drag la// nyi ma byed dam nam phyed na// sum 'bum pa zas ta na po sa// mkhar la brgyab na 'dzag cang 'gas// de nas thag chen 'babs 'dod na// gsang dngul zangs dang 'khang 'dug
421a2(rnying rgyud): min do nga chen shA rer// de rnams thod pa dam gsum bu// grags sa'i khrag la thur la bsngal// gang ga chags babras b+ha rten sra// gdon mi za bar thog 'bebs 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje zlagasang nag po rtsa ba'i khyad chen po las/ grogs

421a5(rnying rgyud): tshig rjes su bgrub par 'tshal bas/ dus tham gsang sngags kyi chos 'di/ rnal 'byor pa'i skul bsngo ba rnams bskal ba la/ dam tshig dbang gis grogs bya bar// zhal gyis bzhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos/ gsang ba'i bdag po
421a6(rnying rgyud): na rdo rje dang/ sogs myong ga shin de la ba yum dang bdud bcan dang / gang dang / lha dang / sman dang / gza' dang / klu dang / gnod rten dang / ma tsho la sogs pa 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams ces/ rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal thags nag pa 'di/ bstan pa thams cad srung
421a7(rnying rgyud): 'jo ma mang yin par rig nas/ shin mas shi sakyi rjes nas btsud pa/ a ma nyaM/ me ma thags ldan ma na mtha' lam 'das// bang dang gshin rje la sogs sun cig shid// rlu gdug pa tshig pa rnams pan 'dra' ba/ bregs rjes

422a1(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+tha many+dza shrI ya mAn+ta kA/ grAH/ man+taH/ tanaH/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed kyi gsang rgyad/ chos dbyings rnam dag skye med las// skye ba'i tshul bas na
422a2(rnying rgyud): srul pa'i sra// bcom ldan che ba lha yi dpal// 'jigs byed chen po bsam ma khyab// thams cad srung snang ma lus pa// sra gsung thugs la phyaga'itshal lo// las spyad phrin las sngags su bstan// tshe 'phrul
422a3(rnying rgyud): bstan pas ma las 'das// 'dul stangs bsam las 'das pa'i phyir// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad ste// dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // brgya rtsa gcig dang bye ba'i las// drug dang gcig tu bstan pa la// thA dadanges pa ma
422a4(rnying rgyud): par bstan// lha srin sdebargyad gdul bya'i phyir// brgyad du bstan pa nges pa dang // 'gro drug don du drug bstan dang // su gsung thugs dang ldan phyer gsum// nges pa de bzhin gzhag pa'o// bgegs rigs mi sun kun
422a5(rnying rgyud): las 'chol ba// gang yang 'dran khyad par shes pa ni// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i bsam pa bya// kun bzang rnam dag mkha' klong nas// dus gsum bde gshegs zhi khro sbal// kun gyis dbang bskur gshin rje'i gshed/
422a6(rnying rgyud): dpya dang phyag zhabs gang 'thad pas// mos pa byab shin tu gces// gshin rje'i rnal 'byor brtson pa yis// gang la las la be tshom med// de la 'di du smos pa la// la la gA zhung de yod pa dang // gdu yang 'dang
422a7(rnying rgyud): 'dir spros rtsa pa'i sngags rdzas gnyis de ma tshom ma byung // dam pa'i le'u ste gcig pa'o// / oM ya mun ta/ b+h+rUM/ kAl ng+ku thA/ oMm+baSh+T+r-iHba~M kr-i tAn hU~M/ ma
422b1(rnying rgyud): yam nang du/ sogadrug las mthab ba tha ba bsdud pa // dpa yang dag ba byung snang// des dan nags gas papa/ a ya um+ba rgyun na gyis d+hA ma/ rnaban byangang/ d+han+taHtha sta/ nga rdza/
422b2(rnying rgyud): \u0f7fhU~M phaT/ su to r+g+ha hUM phaT/ lnga lngar bstan pa yang // yang na bste yan lag gi// dang po dang ni de mtha' la// las su bsngags pa de kho na'o// oM yaM mAn te ka dwAH/ kA la rU bid+hid+ha/
422b3(rnying rgyud): oM man dz+ra shrI dzA dzA/ oM ya ma rA dza dz+nyA dz+dza/ de dag rtsub bgrang ba'i nges pa'o// de las lan cig ste ka hA ngas pa'i rtsa ba bstan pa la// dmigs pa de kho na de lan cigab+hU ya dz+nyA na hUM/ bai du ya ma dzA ya nan/ oM ma khwa
422b4(rnying rgyud): kha thun mug ni na/ oM ya ma kha thu ni rA dzaM/ oM shrI a kro bya tsi dza hUM/ hUM hu ho ro te k+ShA ya bAka/ tsit+ta dzaHhUM baM hoH// yan lag lnga'i skyo nas de bzhin du// dmigs pa bcas nas byas pa de lta'o// rnam pa kun tu de bzhin
422b5(rnying rgyud): pa kho na'o// / mnan nam gzing ba'i mgo bstan tshogs// le'u ste gnyis pa zhes bya'o// / rdoHhUM baM hoH/ oM a kro taM ka ya mAn traka sa ma ya s+t+waM dzaHhU~M baM hoH// oM sa ma ya ma g+hu hUM/ mu dra ya mAn ta kA pa
422b6(rnying rgyud): hUM hAM dzaM/ ya mnak+Sha ya dzA dzA/ gu ya u hr-i daM d+h+r-i/ las de gong 'og thams cad kyang // rig pa bde ba dba' zhig gis// de bzhin bcol pa'i rnam pa des// bka' las de ltar snang bar khas// ya ma rA dza na rdo /
422b7(rnying rgyud): zhes pa de yis thams cad du// brlag mang de mi lus de bzhin bcol// bde bar der ni nges par rigs ma ru// wa ma he ma b+h+yo hUM phaT swA hA// de ni nges pa'i mad yang // 'byung ba jide bzhin ltos pa des// khams gsum pa cam
423a1(rnying rgyud): rtag byud// na na can drun su myogags d+hag sus rnasas na gtan ma na gyu/ btsud pad/ sa sgrug sa / na can ma byas// thugasas ldan nanaman/ tha nang
423a2(rnying rgyud): sa mgro d+hA ya tA dz+nyA sa/ 'ang ma dbyangs khro gags dpa'i byeng po de ni byings su ma \u0f7f/ mno di yin par bsngags de yang gapas kyi rnam par shes bya'o// oM man+ta shrI ya ma ngam mo e ke dzadzA d+ha/ / rag
423a3(rnying rgyud): ba~M hrIH/ khang khrims ba 'gro/ mtho/ rlung zad// dz+dza/ gnang/ mam thing // ba mun r+tha/ tsa~M d+ha dad+ya/ ma rA ya bA / bal myur ba la byung / ma mthum mahA/ mang dri da du/ rba thams mas thal nadas/ nga
423a4(rnying rgyud): mang gang // gzeng sngags pa dag sa sa yin// de ni man ngagazhin par bya// don yang dag d+ham pa kha// lid kyigasam pa zhes d+ha li// de d+ha thams tata t+ta dmya mas ma ya gra gra thAm lam ze la lan nad mnam / oM mar+tha shwe sa man+taka/ u dzas mtho d+ha d+haN+Da ma
423a5(rnying rgyud): ma po N+Di d+hi gan ma/ dzad/ blang pa shing / rig sa nying chubaste// ga pa mun kyi/ dag sa ti gang kyi/ rngam tham mug+sa/ go// slang ya ga dul la thams na sa/ mngam chenas ldan da / sa ta galas nga /
423a6(rnying rgyud): zlos pa ye shes phun du zlas// rdzas de rgyu de ga nas gas pa// rmongs par mi bya khong nag pa'o// oM sa ma ya/ A d+ya mar+d+ha shrI mr-i tra ya mA drug pan+di kau d+hi d+hAH/ oM sa ma ya mar+d+ha shrI yai man+taka ta ka ya ma rA / a ma e ka ta Ti ts+tsha/ Thag ra k+Sha ru ta sI kha rag ma myo/ rang
423a7(rnying rgyud): matakra ma / las d+g+haH/ l-i la lagacin nam labyung / snying la ga suM sa hU~M t+te/ del 'di sa gang dag bye // dran gying gcis pa yin me kyang // tha pa'i lhag pa ga' mas med// de yang dbye pa la bya ba da la/ 'i skye na pa nas rgya

423b2(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa ni// mthun pa'i grogs su 'gro ba yin// de yang 'dir te dag pa'i lags// a a kro tikam b+h+r-i kA la d+hA pak+ka yan na/ baM bad ru la? d+hAng / we tshal pa yin te/ ga ni nan/ mA ru yan na/ oM ya hU~M kaSh+Ta/ AH te/ oM da
423b3(rnying rgyud): pa zed nad ma dzub n+tu/ yum ya mnak+te/ srogaHla mu ga te zad/ rtswa rtsa rang zad/ ma e khrag la duni du ni snying gtub/ srin po'i dus pa la rlo maco ma dz+wal/ gnyen de'i khrag lnga ldan ldan thob/ khru la dzi 'i'i dri zad/ oM khrag thun mug// a mug la

423b6(rnying rgyud): par gyis// e la zhes brjod ya byir gyis// dmigs pa'i dgongs pa sangs par gyis// leT b+he lngang zhes 'o// / tha ma'i gsang sngags zhes bya ba// ya dang mA dang ra dang ngo // sa dang te dang ma dang ya/ ya dang me dang te dang ru// na dang mi da da dang ya/
423b7(rnying rgyud): ya dang da dang yo dang ni// ra dang ya dang k+Sha dang ya// ya dang sde dang ya dang ngo // ni dang ra dang ma dang ya// rtsa ba'i yi ge 'di rnams kyang // 'ang me dbyangs dpal gyi thugs yin zer// da lta ma yin las byed pa'i// gshin rje 'jo ba yi rtogs yin// de la rtsa bar
424a1(rnying rgyud): Tha// yang nas srin rje brgyad kyi// Nab bzlas pa yin par bzhug/ dbyer gsang drags shesaH// dbus na la ga nas yo dgas chen pa'o// rkyen brngu drug gnas can// nya srin rje btud pa ma dang brtas/
424a2(rnying rgyud): bcu drug dag cu 'dod// yang na las kyigashin rje brgyad du 'dog// de yi chung ma brgyad dang ba drug 'dod// yang na gang chen brgyad dang chung mar ga cas// ga / byas kyang dregs pa brgyad// dbyer las mkhan zhes sa grags// de la dpung kyi ya drugs rgyan
424a3(rnying rgyud): yaM// rdzogs dang mtshams su par 'phros pas// yanas yang dmyal ya brgyad pa// 'dam dbyung sa khro bas yabatud man na// pha la bskal zhing tshur la bzlas// spya dang gu dang non sbyin no// rde ba min nam mnga' lding // me mche da 'phye'o// /
424a4(rnying rgyud): ltar bltas nani de ltar snang ba'o// srin po ma mo bdud dang ni// gshin rje rgyal 'gor brtson dang ni// klu srin bgegs chen 'byung po brgyad// nang ltar de tshul grags pa yin// rgyas kyi rgyal po ya bi ta// glang mgo tel ba bya sangs dang // ral patshar dbu sdigs /
424a5(rnying rgyud): dang // myos byed 'bar ba brgyad du bstan// badz+ra gang dang badz+ras// badz+ra ldan po badz+ra sbyin pa dang // badz+ra d+ha 'dzin padz+ra kun sru dang // badz+ranas pal bdaganas med de// ging du grags pa dzin// de rnams pas mkhan len par gcig/ phur la las rgya
424a6(rnying rgyud): gshen rje pho mo yin// bsro ba'i las byed dkrug pa'o// a mu kaska ma ya hUM ma ra shrI kra ma nA sha ya hUM phaT/ a mu kai rig tsa ya trUM mA ra ya b+h+r-i ngaM d+hA sha ya hU~M phaT/ a ka mur tsa ya hUM/ mar shrI kr-i nAn ya tru~M dzaH/ a mu ke mA ra ya hAM/ mar b+hI Sha~M/ nA sha

425a1(rnying rgyud): rdzas// dgongs pa su ba dad rdeg pa yang // mtshan ma grol dus mAn na pa'o// don bcu chang bar byed dgos te// rgyud gzhan kun nas zhib par bstan// 'dir ni sngags rnams chun tu gsungs/
425a2(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bdun pa zhes bya'o// / lho phyogs gshin yul dme nag tu// 'jam dpal khros pa gshin rje'i gshed// 'chi bdag bshan pa'i tshogs rnams la// zhe sdang rang 'dul drag sngags chud// rtsod dus bsnyen pa mar 'grib la//
425a3(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba yin gyis gzhan du min// zhal gas ma mthing nag drag po'i sgra// ro langs sras mchog yab yum bzhi// bsgom pa yin gyi gzhan du min// rtsags ma rtsa bzhi bcu gcig dang // bcu gnyis dgu dang bdun du bstan// rgya na
425a4(rnying rgyud): med ri ti stong // 'jig rten pho mo'i srog tu bstan// bsnyen pa dang ni nye ba'i mchog/ dam pa yin nam zer ba'i mchog/ shes pa nyams su blangs pa'i mchog/ dpal gshin rje'i gshed pos gsungs pa// gdug pa gtan nas chaga' la
425a5(rnying rgyud): mas yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// gsang bsngags kyi rgyud las phyi ma'i lo'u ste brgyad pa'o// / 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma rdzogs so// / gnubs pad+ma dbang rgyal gyis thugs kyi brtag
